# language_name:        Chippewa
# closest ISO 639-3:    oji
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1833
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     KEKITCHEMANITOMENAHN GAHBEMAHJEINNUNK JESUS CHRIST, OTOASHKE WAWWEENDUMMAHGAWIN.
# english_title:        The New Testament in Chippewa
# URL:                  https://archive.org/details/kekitchemanitom00tanngoog/
# copyright_short:      © Packard and van Benthuysen, Printers
# copyright_long:       Translated by Edwin James, assisted by John Tanner.
# notes:                The ISO 639-3 code 'oji' is an incluse code referring to all Ojibwe variants. The variants in this old translation seems to be closest to current Chippewa, which has a more precise ISO code 'ciw'.
#
#
# METAHCHINK GUHGEQUAWINUN .
#
# I .
# Neen Kekitche Manitomewâ , gá be ságizzeinág ákeeng Egyptink owwâkânewegewâmink ; kâ oweuh bakânizzit keguh Omanitomeseenâwâ , neen atuh keguh Omanitomenáwâ .
# II .
# Kâ kago keguh i-izzhetoseen kago aezhenágwuk gezhigōnk , giya kago aezhenágwuk ákeeng , giya nebeeng anámuhkumik ; kâ keguh shuhgushketowâsewung , kâ keguh uhnoketowâsewung : neen Kitche Manito Kemanitomewâ , neen giáwashkid Kitche Manito neembuhshunzhawâwâg uhbenocheug ōsewân omutcheizzhewabizzewininne newin ánekách bemátizzewinun uhgew shânganemidjig , neen keshawâtizzenotágowâgdush metoswâk uhgew siágeidjig kanowandungig neenguhgequawinun .
# III .
# Kâween keguh pâpezhinduhzeenâwâ Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitomewâ otuhnozowin ; Kitche Manito oguh buhshunzhawân oweuh pâpezhinekânegoot .
# IV .
# Kunwandun unwabewinnegezhigut ( me eu uhnumeagezhigut ) quiuk che kunwandumun ; ningōtwâswogwun keguh uhnoke kokkinná ketuhnokewin , neezhwâswogwundush , me Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitomun otunwabewin , eu gezhigut kâween keguh uhnokese , keen , keguis giya , kedânis ketuhnoketâgaweninne kebemetágunequan , ketáwase-emug giya miátáwizzit oweuh iát beenjeiuhe kewegewâmink ; ōnje ningōtwâswogwun me Kitche Manito ge ozhetōt gezhik giya áke kitchegumme kokkinná giya anduhgook ; názhwâswogwunigutinik ge unwabit , me wanje Kitche Manito shâwandunk unwabewinnegezhigut .
# V .
# Kitchetwâwanim kōs , keguh giya , kegezhigutomewân che guhgânwâwun ákeeng Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitōm gá menik .
# VI .
# Kago nisshewakan .
# VII .
# Kago bisshegwâtizzekan .
# VIII .
# Kago kemotekan .
# IX .
# Kago we bátámákan kewejetuhkewamágun unishâ .
# X .
# Kago we otâpenumowâkan kewejetuhkewamágun , owegewâm , owewun , otuhnoketâgaweninemun , obemetágunequamun , opezhekemun , obazhekokazhemun kokkinná , giya menik azhe debandunk kewejetuhkewamágun .
#
#
# NUHGUHMOWIN .
#
# Ondâshán kitche Uhchichâg
# Betōndush kokkinná
# Ga ōnje pâpenandumáng .
# Neendainang betōn .
# Nōsinán gâgineek nuhdush
# Neenguh 'zhe pajewemin ,
# Ozâm pungee sâgegoyun
# Che sâgeunkdush keen ?
# Máno ōndâshsán nâsinán
# Sháwanemeshinâng
# Benesenuhmowweshináng
# Kekitche Kechichâg .
# Benázekowweshinâng
# Shâwandágoozewin
# Neenkákegunináng átōn
# Pâpenandumowin .
40001001	Jesus Christ David oguisun Abraham oguisun ogata omisshomishun otuhnozowinewân .
40001002	Abraham geōndiná Isaac ; Isaac geōndiná Jacob ; Jacob geōndiná Judas giva wekânisun ;
40001003	Judas giya Thamar geōndináwân Pharez giya Zara ; Pharez geōndiná Esrom ; Esrom geōndiná Aram ;
40001004	Aram geōndiná Aminadab ; Aminadab geōndiná Naasson ; Naasson geōndiná Salmon ;
40001005	Salmon giya Rachab geōndináwân Booz ; Booz giya Ruth geōndináwân Obed ; Obed geōndiná Jesse ;
40001006	Messe geōndiná David Ogemá ; David giya Urias owewe buneen geōndináwân Solomon ;
40001007	Solomon geōndiná Roboam ; Roboam geōndiná Abia ; Abia geōndiná Asa ;
40001008	Asa geōndiná Josaphat ; Josaphat geōndiná Joram ; Joram geōndiná Hosias ;
40001009	Hosias geōndiná Joatham ; Joatham geōndiná Achaz ; Achaz geōndiná Ezekias ;
40001010	Ezekias geōndiná Manasses ; Manasses geōndiná Amon ; Amon geōndiná Josias ;
40001011	Josias geōndiná Jechonias , giya wekânissun ope gá má jenintwâ Babylonink .
40001012	Ope áshia gá májenintwâ Babylonink , Jechonias geōndiná Salathiel ; Salathiel geōndiná Zorobabel ;
40001013	Zorobabel geōndiná Abiud ; Abiud geōndiná Eliakim ; Eliakim geōndiná Azor ;
40001014	Azor geōndiná Sadoc ; Sadoc geōndiná Achim ; Achim geōndiná Eliud ;
40001015	Eliud geōndiná Eleazar ; Eleazar geōndiná Matthan ; Matthan geōndiná Jacob ;
40001016	Jacob geōndiná Joseph , Mary ōnâbamun , ween ogebenenekánán Jesusun ashenekâzot Christ .
40001017	Kokkinná bemátizzewinnun . Abraham ōnje , nánazh David ushenewin ánekách bemátizzewinnun , giya ōnje David nánahz ope gámájenintwâ Babylonink ; usshenewin ánekach bemátizzewinnun ; ōnje dush eu ope májenintwâ Babylonink nánazh Christ usshe newin ánekach bemátizzewinnun .
40001018	Wiazhkut buttuhpábundung kezhik Christ , me gá izzhewabuk ; Mary ogeen gewâweendummátinnun chewetegâmát Joseph ; uhbwaw dush wetegandewât mikkowâ zhunjikoot ōndozhat Kitche Manito ochichâgwun .
40001019	Joseph dush onâbamun gemanobemátizze aninne kâ meenwanduhze che manussheát netawâch uhpukkawenát kemōch wawane enandum .
40001020	Mágwouh náguttuhwandunk azhewabutinnik , binnuh Kitche Manito omezhinowamun oguhnonigōn inábundum , otigōndush , Joseph , David oguissun , kago shágwanemokan , che otâpenát Mary cheweweun , zhunjekoot Kitche Manito ochichâgwun wandozhajin .
40001021	Guhtuh oguisse , kegieshenekáná Jesus , ōnje ween oguhbemájeán otuhnishanâbamun omutche bemátizzewinnewâ ōnje .
40001022	Kokkinná o-ō gá izzhewabuk che tabwawinnewung manitowâzōt gáekettōt .
40001023	Binnuh oskeneegequa tuhsunjeko giya tuh oguisse , guhtuh eshenekânâ Immanuel , me che ekettōnk Kitche Manito wejewinnunk .
40001024	Joseph dush gwashkoozit gá onishkât owwetotum gá agoot Kitche Manito omezhinnowamun , medush oge otâpenán wewun .
40001025	Kâ wepamáseen chebwâ benenekánát neettam oguissun Jesus dush oge ezhewenán .
40002001	Ope Jesus nágit Bethlehemink Judeaink , mágwouh Herod ogemáwit , binnah nebwâkâweninnewug wâbunōnk be ōnjebáwug Jerusalemink betakoshinōg .
40002002	Ekettōnk , ánde zhiaht wuhow nágit Jewug otogemámewân ? Onje neengewâbománán otonungomun wâbunnōnk neembeunnummeatowândush .
40002003	Medush Herod ogemá nōndunk o-ō kitche sunnágandum , giya kokkinnâ Jerusalem owejewân .
40002004	Gámowōnjeat ogema sáságewichegaweninnewun giya oshepeegaweninnewun okuhquajemán , ánde Christ che negipun ?
40002005	Ekettowug Bethlehemink Juedeaink , me gáezhebe-egat manitowâzōt .
40002006	Giya keen Bethlehem enuhkuhkakummig Judah kâween nōndás ketuhpetandágoozisse ogemág Juda , ōnje keen tuh beōnjebá ogemá ga ogemákundowât neenduhnishanâbamun Israel .
40002007	Medush Herod nandomát nebwâkâweninnewun kemōchdush oguhquajemán ánápe gáwábummint unnung ?
40002008	Otizzhenázhowâ dush Bethlehemink eketto dush máchág nundowâbomik wawane ōshke uhbenoche , mikkowwug dush beweendummowweshig , neenguhbe-ezhá che annummeattowwuk .
40002009	Gánōndowwâtdush ogemán mácháwug , binnah dush unnung gáwâbummint wâbunōnk negânewun be-ezhá nánazh beuhgojin tibbishko ōshke uhbenoche zhiát .
40002010	Wiábomáwât unnungwun gegitche bâpenanemowug .
40002011	Buhtukoshinnowât wegewamink owâbomáwân ōshke uhbenocheun giya ogeen Mary medush pongeshinōg , uhnummeatowâwât piákinummowât dush ototossowinnewân omenáwân ánish , ozâwâ shoneá giya annōch manomágwuk .
40002012	Kitche Manitoan otigowân inâbundumōg kago une-ezhá kago uzzhiát Herod , quiukigo ezhekewag anduhnukkeyag , medush azhemácháwât .
40002013	Ká mácháwât , binnah Kitche Manito omezhinnowamun obeotissegōn Joseph inábundum ekettōnk , oniskân , otâpin ōshke uhbenoche giya ogeen waweep ezhinneshemouh Egyptink , emá ián nánázh minowâ che guhnoninán , wánje Herod oguh nundowâbomán ōshke uhbenocheun che we nissát .
40002014	Wanishkát dush ototâpenán uhbenocheun , giya ogene nebádibbik medush gemáchát che zhát Egyptink .
40002015	Medush emá geiát nánazh Herod onebōt me májetabwâwinnewunk gá ekettōt manitowâzōt Kitche Manito otonozowinnink , neengenundomá neenguis che benuhguitunk Egypt .
40002016	Medush Herod ope wiábundunk nisshewunnázhummigoot nabwâkâwinidjin kitche nishkâtizze , azhe uhnokeet kokkinná nesintwâ uhbenocheug Bethlehemink giya gewetáiuhe otunnukkewinnink Bethlehemink názho peponggizzidjig giya nowutch babewizzheidjig kokkinna gá negidjik gá mácháwât nebwâkâweninnewug .
40002017	Medush tabwawinnewung gá ekettot manitowâzōt , Jeremy ekettōnk ,
40002018	Ramáink ekettowin genōndám , ōmbegezing ázhequang , kitche kushkandummowin , Rachel mowwemát onejânissun , kâween bonanduhze wanje towât onejânissewân nebonit .
40002019	Heroddush gánebōt , binnuh , Kitche Manito omezhinnowamun obeottssegōn Joseph inâbundum Egyptink ,
40002020	Ekettōnk , onishkân , otâpin ōshke uhbenoche giva ogeen ezhán enuhkuhkakummik Israel : genebowug nandowábundungebuneeg ōshke uhbenoche obemátizzewin .
40002021	Medush azhe onishkât , ototâpenán uhbenocheun giya ogene , medush azhe máchát ennuhkunkakummik Israel .
40002022	Nuândágat dush Archelaus ogemáwit Judeaink nábishkowât andánit Herodun oasun , kotáje we-ezhát emá , gá enâbundunkdush gebowânnát Kitche Manitōn azhe gōshquatát shezhát Gallileeink .
40002023	Be-ehát betunnukkeet otanonk ezhenekáta Nazareth me chetabwâwinnewunk gá ekettowât manitowâzojig , guhtuhezhenekâzo Nazarene .
40003001	Ono gezhigutōn tukoshin John Baptist beguggequat buggwuttuhkummigáng Judeaink ,
40003002	Ekettōnk , ánwanindizōk : Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew tuhgoo .
40003003	Me ow gátepájemint odikitowin manìtowâzot Esaias ekettōnk , inwawin ázhequang buggwuttikummigáng quiuk omotoeuk Kitche Manito omikkunnuh .
40003004	Mego uhow John okonâssun kitche áwase obewyun ōnje oshichegâtanewun giya pusquagunne kitchepezoon kachepezoot , májit uhtissáwiasheun amwâjin , giya ámo seenzebáquut .
40003005	Medush azhe ezháwât nopeming uzzhiánit , Jerusalem giya kokkinná Judea , kokkinná giya uhnōch Jordanink andájig :
40003006	Medush azhe baptizegowât emá Jordanink , oweendummowwâwân omutcheizzhewabizzewinnewân .
40003007	Wiábomát takoshinnowât nebená Phariseeug giya Sadduceeug owwe baptizemiggoozewât ; otinnân , oh mutche kenabeekotōk , owanan aninág che ozhindumag Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin ?
40003008	Ezhe bemátizzig che ōnje nágwuk iyánjetoyag azheizzhewabizzeyag .
40003009	Kago enandunkago chewekettoeyag , Abraham nōsenán ; ketenenim , Kitche Manito otákushketōn ono ásineen otáōnje ozheán uhbenocheun Abraham che onejânisit .
40003010	Nōngum wâgâkwut atta ojebekâwit metig kokkinná giya metigōg wanje mache menekânewidjig tuhguhwiegâzowug skotang che oppuggenintwâ .
40003011	Kebaptizinnim nebe , che ánwanindizzoyag weendush buhnopenuhzhit owushema apetanágoose , kâ neenduhpetandagoozisse ometikwukkizzenun kunnága che pemewetowwuggebun , ween keguh baptizemiggowâ Kitche Manito ochichágwun ōnje giya ishkota .
40003012	Nōskâchegun otuhkonán oninjeeng , oguh cheshuttaán ototossowegummik , oguhmowōnjetōn opuhquazhegunne ototossowening , okonâssundush tuh châgetawun gâgega ishkotang .
40003013	Jesusdush Gallileeink beōnjebá Johnun che baptizemiggoot Jordanink .
40003014	Johndush otinnân , kâween ; attow onisheshin keen chebaptizemeyun , keendush kebenázekow innuh ?
40003015	Jesusdush otinnân , mego n'dáwâch gaizzhewabuk nōngum , me gaizzhewabizzeung kokinná quiuk izzhewabizzewin medush azhe baptizeát .
40003016	Jesusdush biáptizeint mego quiuk biezhe mooshko-moot nebeeng ; binnuhdush gezhik bákishkâne , owâbomándush Kitche Manito ochichchâgwun , benázhukketágoot omemeeng beezhenágoosewun , opeponeenotágōndush .
40003017	Binnahdush oweuh ishpemink beōnjegeto me wuhow siágeug neenguis , neen gitche meenwandum .
40004001	Ochichawgwundush buggwuttuhkummigáng otizzhesugábegenán Jesusun Mutche Manitōn che kuggwadebanemi goot .
40004002	Mukkuhtakat nennetumuh tusso gezhik , nennetumuh giya tusso dibbik , medush ope bukkuttat .
40004003	Kagwadebanemigoojindush bowotissegoot otigōndush , kishpin keen Kitche Monito oguissun áweyun tuhguh ekettōn ano ásineen puhquazhegun che ōnje gezhetōnk .
40004004	Nuhquatunk eketto , oshepe-egâtamuggut kâween aninne tah ōnje bemátizzisse bizzhisshik puhquazhegun , kokkinná ekettowin Kitche Manito otonink ōnje ságáuhmomuggut koshuh .
40004005	Mutche Manito kitche otanonk otizzhewinnegōn otowwenámattábe-egōn okittegummig kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk ;
40004006	Otinnândush , kishpin keen Kitche Manito oguissun , aweyun , tuhguh gwoshkonin : oshepe-egâtamuggut , keguhmenik omezhinnowamun keche ōmbinnequaw oninjewâng chebetakozetashinzewun ásineeng , keguh tasinnegōg dush .
40004007	Jesusdush otinnân ; minowâ oshepe-egâtamuggut , kâween keguh kugwadebanemáse ke Kitche Manitōm .
40004008	Menowâ otizzhewinná kitche ishputtenâk wudchewink , otinnoummowândush kokkinná ogemáwewinnun ákeeng giya ogitchitwâwizzewinnewân .
40004009	Otinnândush kokkinná ono keguhmenin kishpin pongissinun uhnummeatowweun .
40004010	Jesusdush otinnân , neempikwunnáng ezhán Mutche Manito , oshepe-egâtamuggut , keguh uhnummeatowwâ Kitche Manito , ween atuh keguhtabanemik .
40004011	Mutche Mantodush máchá , unnuhgunnát Jesus , binnahdush Kitche Manito omezhinnowamun betakoshinōg beunnoketá goot .
40004012	Jesus nōndágat John uhgepáquount azhe ezhát Gallileeink .
40004013	Onuhguttándush Nazarethink , betuhnukkee Capernaumink , quiuk kitche gummink Zabulon giva Naphthalim .
40004014	Chetabwawinnewung gá ekettot Esaias manitowâzōt .
40004015	Enuhkuhkakummik Zabulon , giya enuhkuhkakummik Naphthalim cheege kitchegumme agâmank Jordan , miátáwizzidjig Gallilee .
40004016	Anishanâbag námátábidjig kushke dibbikuk , ogewâbundánáwâ gitche wassaánik , giya námátábidjig squâbemátizzewinning enuhkuhkakummik wassasamuggut .
40004017	Me ope Jesus miáje guggequat , ekettōnk , gwakandumōk , Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew tuhgoo .
40004018	Bamosatdush , cheegebeeg kitchegummink Gallilee owâbomán neesh wâkânissindenidjin , Simon , Peter ezhenekâzo giya Andrew wekânissun , pukkobewabinnáwân uhsubeen kitchegummeng , wanje kego-ekawât .
40004019	Otinnândush , nopenuhzheshig cheotâpenagwâ aninewug kewetotonenim .
40004020	Bâbegadush onuhgunnáwân otussubbewân , medush azhe nopenánáwât .
40004021	Anenugguttunk dush emá , minowâ neesh wâkânisindenidjin owâbomáwân James Zebedee oguissun , Johndush wekânissun , nábequânink iáwug mámowy Zebedee ōsewân puhpuggwâwâwât otussubbewân , onundomándush .
40004022	Bâbegadush onugguttánâwâ nábequânewâ , giya ōsewân uhnopenánáwândush .
40004023	Jesusdush babáezhát kokkinná Gallilee kekinnoumágat uhnummawegummigōnk guggequatdush ogemáwewin omeenwâjemowin giya uhnojemōat wiákoosenidjin giya uhnōch mámákizzenidjin .
40004024	Giya uhtuzzhemint , kokkinná tatakosana Syria ; betowâtdush kokkinná wiákoosenidjin , kokkinná giya papukkân ákoosewin giya kitche wesuggandummowin ogo giya gagishkowâjig Mutche Manitōn , giya kawunnátizzidjig , ogo giya nabowidjig , uhnojemoátdush .
40004025	Kitche nebenádush anishanâbag onopenánáwân , Gallilee wânjejig , giya Decapolis , giya Jerusalem , giya Judea , giya agâmank Jordan .
40005001	Wiahbomahtdush anishanâban wudjewink oketáke ezhá , uhnammattábit otoskenaganum obeotissegōn ,
40005002	Obákinnándush otōn , uhgguggekimmát ekettōnk :
40005003	Tuhshâwandágoosewug katemákezidjig ochichâgowâng Kitche Manito otogemáwewin tuhiáwug .
40005004	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug gashkandungig , tuhmennowânegwandumōg .
40005005	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug biakâtizzidjig , áke oguhdebandánâwâ .
40005006	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug wanduhnándungig , wandábágwajig mennoizzhewabizzewin , tuh tabesinnewug .
40005007	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug shawanjegajig tuhshâwandágoosewug .
40005008	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug bánetahajig , oguhwâbomáwân Kitche Manitōn .
40005009	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug , innuhwandewin wazhetojig , tuh enáwug Kitche Manito onejânissun .
40005010	Tuhshâwandâgoosewug uhgew kotuggeinjig menno-izzhewabizzewin ōnje , Kitche Manito otegemáwewinning guhtuh iáwug .
40005011	Keguhshâwandâgoozim gamegooshkâchekowint ganunnánduhkooint , gawebátámint neen ōnje .
40005012	Keguhkitchebâpenanemōm , keguhmennowânegoozim , ga ezhe tepáummágowizzeyag ishpemink , dibbishko gátotowâwât manitowâzonidjin maweshá .
40005013	Keshewetágunnewim ákeeng : shewetágun bánátuk , áneen gageezhe shewetágunáummink ? kâningōt inâbuhtussenōn , tá sâgitchewabinnegáta che tuhtuhkokâtumming magwa eninewug .
40005014	Kewassashkánâwâ áke ; otanuh pequuttinōng attag ká tágátoseem .
40005015	Aninne sákáungin wassâkoninjegun , kâween anámiuhe otossowinnink otattose ; wassâkoninjegunâtikgōnk koshá otattōn , me wassâkōnandummowintwâ kokkinná beendik abidjig .
40005016	Wassanummow , eninewug kemenobemátizzewin oguhwábundánâwâ , azhe bemátizzeun , oguh mennoinanemawân . Kitche Manito ishpemink andát .
40005017	Kago neembenisshewunájetōn kiut kuggequawin giya manitowazojig , enandun kago , kâ neembenisshewunájetoseen koshá chetabwawinnewunk .
40005018	Kagat ketenenim , gezhik giya ákee tuh máchámuggut káween pâpish pungee tuhmáchámuggussinōn Kitche Manito oguggequawinnink nánazh kokkinná tuh tabwawinnewung .
40005019	Owagwandush gawe bokobetogwan punge o-ō guggequawin , chekekinnoummowât dush aninnewun che totuminit , nōndás tuhapetandágoose Kitche Manito otogemahwewinnink . Owagwandush gaezhe gugekemágwain chekonoanduminnit o-ō guggequawin owushema tuhapetandágoose Kitche Manito otogemáwewinnink .
40005020	Ketenenim ketizzhewabizzewinnewâ nowutch manoizzhewabussinogwan azhewabizzewât oshepe-egaweninnewug , giya Phariseeug , kâ keguhpeendegaseem Kitche Manito otogemahwewinnink .
40005021	Kegenōndám gata anishanâbag gá ekettowât , kago nisshewakán , owagwan dush ganisshewagwan tuhnunnezánese tepakonegawinnink .
40005022	Ketenenimdush , owagwan ganishkâtizzetowwâgwan wekânissun unishâ , tuhnunnezánese tepákonegawinnink , owagwandush gaenágwan wekânissun , Raca , tuhnunnezánese gegetowinnink , owagwandush , keguhkepátiz , gaenágwan , tuhnunezánese mutche ishkotang .
40005023	Petoeyun wâsáságewitchegayun sáságewitchegawinnink , medush emá cheenandumun kekánis mánátanemik :
40005024	Nuhguttun emá sásagewitchegawinnink kesáságewitchegun ezhán owwe mennogunnōnetig kekânis ; umbadush bebuhgittenun kesáságewitchegun .
40005025	Mennogunnonetig mutche enandeyag gazhetinna ; uhbwâ pukkanitteyag bōchigo náágutch tuhmena tebákonegawinning , tebákonegawenine dush oguhmenán kepáquowaweninnewun medush keche owwe kepáquount .
40005026	Kagat ketenin kâ keguhságáunze uhbwá tepáummun che tibbishkosag .
40005027	Kegenōndám gata anishanâbag gáekettowât , kago bishshegwâtizzekan .
40005028	Neendush ketenemin , owagwan kunnowâbomágwan equawun ga-enáguhtuhwandummogwan bisshegwâtizzewin , mego áshia gebisshegwátizzit otaink .
40005029	Kishpindush kekitcheskezhik ōnje mutcheizzhewabizzeun , kechebetōn , wabenun , nowutch attow onishsheshin ningōt oyug chewabenumming , kokkinná keow chewabenummingebun mutche ishkotang .
40005030	Kekitchenik ōnje mutcheizzhebizzeun , kishkeshun , wabenun , nowuch attow onishsheshin ningōt oyug chebemátizzeyun kokkinná keow chewabenumingebun mutche ishkotang .
40005031	Ge-ekettōm , owagwan gawabenágwan wewun , mazaniegun oguhmenán , chebokobetowât wetegandewinewâ .
40005032	Ketenenimdush , owagwan gawabenágwan wewun , meatuh bizzhegwâtizzewin ōnje wabinát , mega ōnje bizzhegwatizzit , owagwandush gawewegwan gá wabenint bizzhegwatizze .
40005033	Minowâ kegenōndám gata anishanâbag ge-ekettowug , kago bokobetokago kedikitowinewâ , keguhizzhewabiz ningotono gáaketo-yunne :
40005034	Neendush ketenenim , kago guggatinnámoekan pâpish , kago wekâ ishpemink nánápemokan ; Kitche Manito onammattábewin iá .
40005035	Kago wekâ áke nánápemokan ; Kitche Manito otuppizzit abewin ; gamá Jerusalem , me o-ō Kitche Ogemá ototanuh .
40005036	Kago nánápemokan kestegwân , kâ ketákushketoseen bazhek menesis , chewâbeskâ attoyun gamá chemuhkuttawâtto-eyun .
40005037	Kegegetowin tuh izzhisse á , á , kâween , kâween , kishpin kago owushema ezhissag , mánátut .
40005038	Kegenōndám ge-ekettōnk , oskezhik mashkōt oskezhik , wepit mashkōt wepit .
40005039	Neendush ketenenim , kago muhmutchetotátekago , oweuh bukkittaōk kinowâng meezh ázhowwinnow .
40005040	Oweuh tepákonik otâpenung kebeenzikowâgun , meezh kekitchebeenzikowâgun , giya ,
40005041	Oweuh we-ezhámik nego tebiegun , neezho tebiegun ezheweje .
40005042	Meezh oweuh kago nundotumōk , oweuh weattáwemik kago , owwe .
40005043	Kegenōndám ge-ekettōnk sâge kewejetuhkewamágunug , shinganim miátáwizzidjig .
40005044	Neendush ketenenim sâge miátáwizzidjig , shâwanim kákámikkig mennototow shânganemikkig , uhnummeatummow mutchetotoquá .
40005045	Keche onejânissemenag Kitche Manito , ween otizzhenázhowân gezis che mokung che sâgâssegatummowât machebemátizzinidjin giya manobematizzinidjin , omenándush kemewunâbo kuggiganezinidjin , giva quiuk bemátizzinidjin .
40005046	Siágeikkig ságe-utwâ aneen ween enábuhtuk ? kâ nuh e-e totunzewug mowōnjichegajig tebâummatewin ?
40005047	Kishpin kekânis atuh suggenninjenut áneen ween enábuhtuk kâ nuh e-e totunzewug mowōnjechegajig tebáummátewin ?
40005048	Quiuk izzhewabizzig kōsewâ ishpemink quiuk azhe izzhewabizzit .
40006001	Awngwawmezeyuk , kago mennoizzhewabizig kago anosumewât eninewug keche wâbomenagwâ : eu totumag , kâ keguhtebáummág waōsemut ishpemink ayát .
40006002	Eu ōnje kago nōndágotokan a-eshenekaneun katemákizzinidjin kago menutwâ , kagiannizzidjig andotummowát uhnummeawegummigōnk giya kitche mikkânâng aninnewun chewâbomigowât . Kagatketenenim tuhtebáummágowizzewug azhewabizzewât .
40006003	Ningōtono a-eshenekaneunnin kago kenummunjenik oguhkekanduhzeen kekitchenikkâng gagotumun .
40006004	A-eshenekaneun tuhgemotut , gezhigōnk waōsemut , owâbundán gámotuk , ween tebinowa keguhtebáummág chenágwuk .
40006005	Uhnummeayunnin , kagototunkan andotummowât kagianizzidjig , uhnummeawájin meenwandumōg nebowwewât uhnummeawegummigōnk anásummissinkdush wegewámun otanonk ; anninewun chewábomigowât , kagat ketenenim tuhtebáummágowizzewug azhewabizzewât .
40006006	Keendush wâuhnummeayunnin peendegen andáyun , kepáquun ketishquândem , gezhigōnk waōsemut uhnummeatow , ween owâbundán gámotuk , ween tebinowa keguhtebáummág chenágwuk .
40006007	Uhnummeayunnin kago nebená násáb ekettokan , miátáwizzidjig andotummowât , enandumōg owushema tuhnōndowâung nebená ekettowât .
40006008	Kago uhgew inuhwâkan , gezhigōnk waōsemut okekandán nandowanduhmun chebwâ guhnonut .
40006009	O-ō keguh ezhe uhnummeá , waōsemegoyun gezhigōnk abeyun kitche kitche twâwandágwuk kedeshenekâzowin .
40006010	Ketogemáwewin máno tuh tuhkoshinnomuggut , azhe meenwandumun máno tuh izzhewabut , omá akeeng ishpemink giya .
40006011	Mezhishinnâng nongum gezhigut gamejeyâng .
40006012	Menowweshawwanemeshinnâng gá mutche totumángin giya neenowint azhe menowweshâwanemungidwâ oweuh gá mutchetotowweyungidjin .
40006013	Kago kuggwadebanemishekángan ; ikkoonuhmowishenáng kokkinná miánátuk : meenze kako keen kedebandán nebwâkâwin , tabwawin , mushkâwizzewin , keen ōnjemuggut .
40006014	Kishpin nayáb sháwanemutwâ gámutchetotummowâjin kosewâ keguhshâwanemigowâ .
40006015	Kishpin nayáb shâwanemásewut kosewâ kâ nayáb keguhshâwanemigoose .
40006016	Makuttakayunnindush , kago kuhgianizzidjig innuhwâkan , okekinnowâjeowân oskezhigowan muhkuttakazun che enanemigowât aninnewun ; kagat ketenenim tuhtebáummágowizzewug azhewabizzewât .
40006017	Keendush makuttakayunnin , nuhmuhqueem kesepekeengwam .
40006018	Kâween aninne keguh ōnje muhkuttakase , waosemut ishpemink owâbundán gámotuk me gaonje mukkuttakayun , kōsdush owâbundán gámotuk , ween tebinowa keguhtebáummag chenágwuk .
40006019	Kago attowwanemokan katattowwanemowin ákeeng , manitōnsug giya agwâkoosink chebánátuk , giya gamotishkidjig wanje bogona-ummowât uhgemotewât .
40006020	Ketattowwanemowin gezhigonk attōn , kâ manitōnsug giya agwâkoosink oguhbanájetoseenâwâ giya bogonaegajig gamotiskidjig kâ oguhkushketoseenâwâ .
40006021	Menik keiayun che attag me keta che attag .
40006022	Wassayág weow , me oskezhik , keskezhik onissheshin kokkinná keow wassayá .
40006023	Keskezhik mánátuk , kokkinná keow tuh kitche kushke tibbikut .
40006024	Kâ oweuh aninne tuhneezhissewun gatebanemigoojin ; bazhek otásâgeá bazhekdush otáshineganemán , bazhek otá aeendenán , bazhekdush otá osittáwaneman ; kâ ketá kushketose che sâgetoeyun kekitchetebinnowawizzewin , giya cheságeut Kitche Manito .
40006025	Me wanje aninnán , kago papahmandunkan kebemátizzewin , gamejeun giya gaminnequayun giya keowwink gá ágweyun : bematizzewin kâ nuh owushema enandágoosenōn mejim anaindágwuk ? giya keow kawnuh owushema enandágoosenōn ágwewin anaindagwuk ?
40006026	Wábum benassewug kâ ketegasewug kâ pushkooshegasewug , kâ mowōnjichegasewug kago ototossowegummigōnk ; Waōsemutdush ishpemink obimushumán ; kâ nuh owushema ketuhpetandágoozisse apetandágoosewât ?
40006027	Ahneen uhow andushsheyag gakushketopun nowutch chekenozit unishigo enandunk ?
40006028	Wagonan apitche wanje náguttuhwandumun ketuhgwewin ? Wâbum mushkota-opineeg binná azhekewât kâ unnokesewug kâ bemenuhquasewug .
40006029	Ketenenimdush Solomon kokkinná ogitchetwâwizzewinnink kâ kunnága ge-ezheose bazhek uhgoo azheowât .
40006030	Kitche Manito kishpin eu ezhe uhgwittōt mezhuskeen nōngum gezhiguk ketegânink attag , wâbunkdush skotang oppuggittōng ; kâ nuh ketaezheágwegoose , oh sebiskátch tabwa-andumun !
40006031	Kago papámándunkan , ekettōnk wagonan gameejeunk , wagonan gaminnequayunk wagonan ga ágweunk ?
40006032	[ Miátáwizzidjig nandowâbundummowât kokkinná ono iuheen ] waōsemut gezhigōnk okekandán munazeyag kokkinná ono iuheen .
40006033	Nundowawbundumōk Kitche Manito otogemáwewin giya quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , giya kokkinná ono iuheen keguhmenigowá .
40006034	Kago papámandunkan wâbunk , tebinowa oguhwemikkân wâbunk , tatussin sunnágut andussogezhiguk .
40007001	Kago tebakonákan oweuh , kâ oweuh keguh tebákoniggoose .
40007002	Ga ezhe tebákonegayun me ga ezhe tebákonegoeyun , ga ezhe tebiegaeyun , me ga ezhe tebiogoeyun .
40007003	Ahnde wâbundumun natchegánik kekânis oskezhigōnk , kâ dush kekekanduhze nowutch natchegág keskezhigōnk ?
40007004	Ahneen gaenutebun kekánis muhmebeto-eyán natchegág keskeshigōnk , binnádush nowutch mechâ , natchegág keskezhigōnk attag .
40007005	Kagianezeun ! otâpenun tebinowa kitche natchegág keskezhigōnk umbadush keguhbuhguhkáb chekitchebetowât natchegánik kekânis oskezhigōnk .
40007006	Kago menákan ánemooshug katche apetandágwuk , kago kemegissun oppuggittowâkan kokooshug , uhnishigo oguhtuhtukkokâtánâwân , tuhgwakegawbowewugdush , áwunjish chebekobininnagwâ .
40007007	Nundotomun kago , keguhmenigo , nundowâbundun keguhmikkân , pápágáquuhumun tuhbákishkâ .
40007008	Kokkinná ganundotungig oguhtiánâwâ , ween nandowabundunk omikkân , weendush pápágáquuhunk tuhbákishkâne .
40007009	Oweuh nuh eninne andushsheyag kishpin oguissun nundotumágōt puhquazhegun ásen otámenán innuh ?
40007010	Kegoiun nundomát genabeekōn nuh otá mená ?
40007011	Mázheninnewuggizzeag kekekandánâwâ wanisheshink chemenagwâ keenejânissewâg , kâ nuh waōseag otámenáseen wanisheshin nandotungig ?
40007012	Eu wanje ogo azhe nundowwanemagwâ chemanototonágwâ giya keenowá mennowtotowwik : me o-ō tepákonegawin , giya manitowâzojig .
40007013	Peendegen wâbwâg 'squandam ; mangutteyág ishquandem giya manguttayág mikkun isquâbemátizzewinning guhezhewinnegoon nebenádush peendegawug .
40007014	Oanje wâbwâg ishquandem giya wâbwâg mikkun bemátizzewinnink giezhewinnegoōn , babazhek omikkânâwâ .
40007015	Tuttebábundun kagenowishkidjig manitowázojig manishtánishshewyán buhuhgweewâjin , anámiuhe dush mieengunug .
40007016	Keguh ōnje kekanemáwâg mehekânewewât : aninnewug omowōnjetonâwâ shomenun menasagâwunjeeng ianuh ?
40007017	Me eu wanishzezhit metig ōnje netáwiggenōn wanisheshin weágimmenun mutche metigdush netáwiggenōn mutche weágimmenun .
40007018	Wanisshezhit metig kâwekâ ōnje netáwigginzenōn mut che weágimmenun , mutche metigdush kâ ōnje netáwigginzenōn wanishsheshin weágimmenun .
40007019	Kokkinná metigōg wanissheshinzenōg netáwiggink tuhkishkekowâwug 'skotang oppuggináwug .
40007020	Uhmenekânewewât me ga ōnje kekanemintwâ .
40007021	Kâweenigo kokkinná Kitche Manito , Kitche Manito , azhidjig , tuhpeendegasewug Kitche Manito otogemáwewin , ween utuh quiuk azhewabizzit nōs gezhigōnk andát azhe nundowanmát che izzhewabizzenit .
40007022	Eu gezhigut , kitche nebená neenguhegōg , Kitche Manito , Kitche Manito , kâ nuh neengemanitowâzosemin ketuhnozowinnink ? Ketuhnozowinninkdush kâ neengesâgitchewabinásenánig mutche Manitōg , ketuhnozowinninkdush nebená kitche unnokewinnun kâ nuh neengeunnoksemin ?
40007023	Neenguhenágdush , kâwekâ kegekekanemissinnonim ; kogág mutche izzhewabizzeyag !
40007024	Oanje owagwan n'wândummogwan ono neengegetowinnun , che kunwandunk , che totunk , nabwákâ-enineeng tuh enandágooze , ogittábeek wazhetot owegewam .
40007025	Kemewunábo gepongesin , gemooshkuhun gegitchenodin , pugátásin e-e wegewamink kâdush gepongesinzenōn , ōnje ogittábeek ge-oschichegâtag .
40007026	Owwagwandush n'wandummōgwan ono neengegetowinnun , che kunwanduhzik che totunk , kagebátizzit anninne tuh enandágooze , wazhetōt owegewam nagowwikkâng .
40007027	Kemewunâbo bangissingin gemooshkuhun gegitchenodin , gepugátásin e-e wegewamink , medush gepongesin , gegitche pongesin .
40007028	Jesusdush gázhetát o-ō ekettowin anishanâbag mámukkâtandumōg aekettōt .
40007029	Otizzhe guggekemán , ōnjittá chetabwatuminnit : kâweendush azhewabizzewât oshepe-egaweninnewug .
40008001	Buhnesawkewait wudjewink , kitchenebená anishanâban obenopenánigōn .
40008002	Binnádush wamegenidjin obeotissigōn , ekettodush , neendogemán enandumun ketá bene .
40008003	Jesushdush otânginnán oninjeeng , ekettodush á , benezin : bábegadush wamegeet gebeneze .
40008004	Jesusdush otinnân , kago oweuh anninne weendummowâkan , máchán owwe wâbunduh keow sáságewitchegaweninne , meezhdush kesáságewitchegun Moses anákonegat .
40008005	Jesusdush bowotittunk Capernaumink shemágunisshe ogemá obeotissigōn bekuhquajemigōon :
40008006	Ekettonk , neendogemám , neendoskenegam shingeshin wegewamink , inápinat nebowe ápiche wesuggandum .
40008007	Jesusdush otinnân , neenguhbenojemoá .
40008008	Shemágunisshe ogemá otinnân , neendogemam , kâ neendapetandágoozisse chepeendegayumbun andáyán : ekettoeyunigo neendoskenegam tuh nojemo :
40008009	Anninne neendow shemahgunishun kanowanemát , máchán anuggin bazhek aninne máchádush ; ōndás anuggin bazhek aninne bemáchádush , neendoskenegam anuggin , o-ō totun , totumdush .
40008010	Jesus n'wândunk , mámukkâtandum , otinândush n'wâpenánigoojin , kagat ketenenim , kâwekâ neengemikkummowâse gaezhe kitchemushkâwandunk kâween Israelink .
40008011	Ketenenimdush , kitche nebená tuhtuhkoshinōg wâbunōnk giya engábeunnōnk wanjebájig tuhnammattábewugdush mámowy Abraham , Isaac giya Jacob , Kitche Manito otogemáwewinnink .
40008012	Ogemáwewindush onejânissun , kushkedibbikuk tuh oppuggináwug , gatuzzhemowwit gatuzzhe muhmutwa-ábetashink .
40008013	Jesusdush otinnân shemágunisshe ogemá kewan andáyun , anandummun keguhtotágo : otoskenegamundush nojemo wun mego e-e tebiegun .
40008014	Jesusdush buhpeendegat Peter owegewámink , owâbomán wewinne ogene shingeshink ákoozinnit .
40008015	Otânginnándush oninjenink , mego ákoosewin nuhgunnegoot : onishkâdush unnoketowwât .
40008016	Wanákooshik betowwât kitche nebená Mutche Manitōn gagishkowwâjig : sâgitchenázhowândush Manitōn uhgegetōt ; nojemoándush kokkinná wiákoozenidjin .
40008017	Me chetabwawinnewunk gá ekettōt manitowâzōt Esaias : ween tebinowa ogeotâpenán neennenuhmizzewininán , máchetōtdush neendákoozewininnán .
40008018	Wiábomátdush kitche nebená anishanâban nopenuhnigoot , otinnân otoskenegamun agâmank che ezháwât .
40008019	Medush bazhek ozhepe-egaweninnewun obeotissigōn , neendogemam , keguhnopenuhnigo tibbe ga iezháwunnan , eketto ,
40008020	Jesusdush otinnân , wâgooshug wâzhewug giya benasewug babámissajig owussisonewug , aninne oguissundush kâ ningooche innuhquashinse .
40008021	Minowâ bazhek otoskenegamun otigōn , neendogemám , máno neettum neenguh máchá che ni-ishemug nōs .
40008022	Jesusdush otinnân , nopenuhzheshin , mahno nabojig weenowâ tuh ni-ishemáwân onebomewân .
40008023	Gá bozitdush nábequânink , otoskenegamun onopenuhnigōn .
40008024	Binnádush kitche mámángáshkâ kitchegummeeng , ningwâshká nábequân ; Jesusdush nebá .
40008025	Otoskenegamundush obeotissigōn otuhmuttinnegōn ekettowugdush , neendogemám bemájeisshináng , neennebomin .
40008026	Otinnândush , wagonan wanje sagizzeyag ? keenowâ tiabwatunzewag ! Medush ge onishkâ gesheguhnotán nodin giya kitchegumme , medush kitcheánwâtink .
40008027	Mámukkâtandumōgdush aninnewug , ekettowugdush owwanan aninnewenandush wuhow , nodin giya kitchegumme otabwatágōn .
40008028	Agâmank mazhagâwât andánukkewât Gergesenug , neezh aninnewun onuhquushkowán Mutche Manitōn ogegishkowâwân , jebagummigōnk beōnjeságáumōg ; mutche áwishug kâ oweuh geniuhe bamosase emá .
40008029	Binnádush ázhequawug ekettowug , áneen gatotonáng wejewinnáng Kitche Manito oguissun , wemutchetotowweyáng innuh bow-ōnje ezháyun ?
40008030	Nága wásá kitche ningotwawân kōkōshug papátuzzhetáwug .
40008031	Mutche Manitōndush otigōn , sâgitchenezhoweyâng máno kōkōshug neendábeenzikowânánig .
40008032	Otinnândush máchág ; buhságáummowátdush otowwepeenzikowâwân kōkōshun , kokkinnádush ningōtwawân me azhe nesâkewabi-ittewât kishkuttenâng , azhe pukkobebi-ittewât kitchegummeeng , medush azhe nebowât .
40008033	Kanowanemápuneegdush otanonk ezhenisshemowug , ge-tepájemowug kokkiná gá izzhewabuk .
40008034	Binnádush kokkinná otanuh ságáumōg che uhnoquushkowâwât Jesusun , wiábomáwât okuhquájemáwân ningooche pukkaiuhe che ezhánit .
40009001	Medush owwe ezhe bozit nábequânink betukkummoōt tebinowá andánukkeet .
40009002	Binnádush obetowâwân aninnewun ákoozinit nebowe , shingeshink nebágunink ; Jesusdush ope owábundán omushkâwandummowinnewân , otinnân wiâkoozenidjin , neenguis wuhnanegwandun , kemutche-izzhewabizzewin menowweshâwandágwut .
40009003	Ahnintdush oshepe-egaweninnewug ittewug , wuhow aninne unishâ otinwâtán weow .
40009004	Jesus okekanemán aketonit otinnân , wagōnan wanje mutche enandumag ketaewâng ?
40009005	Wagonan nowutch wanepunnut , che ekettōnk , menowweshâwandágwut kemutche izzhewabizzewin , uhgamá che ekettōnk , onishkân , bamosan ?
40009006	Che ōnje kekandumagdush , aninne oguissun uhkushketot uhmenowweshâwanjegat mutcheizzhewabizzewinnun : ( otinnân wiákoozenidjin ) onishkân , otâpin kenebágun , andáyun ezhán .
40009007	Medush onishkât azhe ezhát andát .
40009008	Anishanâbagdush wiâbundummowwât azhewabuttinik , mámukkâtandumōg kitchetwâwanemáwât Kitche Manitōn , gáezhemenát aninnewun o-ō tinnouh kitche izzhewabizzewin .
40009009	Jesusdush ningooche ezhah , owâbomándush aninnewun nammattábenit , tebákonegawegummigōnk , Matthew ezhenekâzo , otinnândush , nopenuhzheshin , pusegwedush onopenuhnán .
40009010	Jesusdush nammattábe wegewamink owwesinit , binnádush kitchenebená tebáummátewin mowōnjichegajig giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig obewetubbimmegōn ween mámowy giya otoskenegamun .
40009011	Phariseeugdush wiábundummowât azhewabuk , otinnáwân otoskenegamun , wagonan wanje wetopomát ketogemámewâ , tepáummátewin mowōnjichegajin giya miázheninnewuggizinidjin ?
40009012	Jesusdush n'wândunk otinnân , uhgew manobemátizzidjig kâween wenuhnândowweiggoozissewug , wiákoozidjig suh atuh wenuhnândowweigoosewug .
40009013	Mácháa koshuh , owwekekandumōk o-ō atumink , neweián shâwanindewin kâweendush sáságewitchegun : kâ neembeonjeezháse chenundomugwâ manobemátizzidjig , machebemátizzidjig atuh bowanje ezháyun keche ánwanindizzowât .
40009014	Medush obeotissigōn John otoskenegamun , ekettowugdush wagonan neenowint giya Phariseeug muhkuttakayáng sussug gwonuh ketoskenegamugdush kâ muhkuttakasewug ?
40009015	Otinnândush magwouh innuhwandejig mámowy iáwât , kâ kushkanduhzewug wâkoongajig , pánemá Dakawinnittewâjin tuhkushkandumōg .
40009016	Kâ oweuh aninne attoseen ōshke manitowagin gata buhbeezikowâgunink ; kishpin attōt owushema támánátut .
40009017	Kâdush oweuh aninne , ōshke shomenâbo ótâ attose gata omotáng omotag tá bekooshkág , shomenâbodush tá segissa omotagdush tá bemátut : ōshke shomenâbo koshuh ōshke omotâng otattōnâwâ me niyazh wawane kunwanejegâtag .
40009018	Magwouh tuzzhindunk ono iuheen , bazhek ogemán beochichcheengwunnittágōn ekettodush , neendânis nebo , betângin chebemátizzit .
40009019	Jesusdush pusegwe uhnopenuhnán , mámowy otoskenegamun .
40009020	Binnádush equa ákooze ussheneezhopeponun , mozhuk misque ōnjegâne beopikquunishkágōn betânginumágōn ishquaiuhe obeenzikowâgun .
40009021	Enanindizzo , tângenummowwugigo obeenzikowâgun neenguhnojim .
40009022	Jesusdush gwaketát , owâbomándush , eketto , nuhnegwandun neendânis , kemushkâwandummowwin keenojemoiggoon : equadush nojemo mego e-e tebiegun .
40009023	Jesusdush buhtuhkoshink ogemá owegewamink , owâbundán nagummojig giya anishanâbag kitche ōmbegizzewât .
40009024	Otinnándush towwishkuhmowweshig ; oskeneegequa kâween nebose , unish nebá ; ogitchebápeáwândush .
40009025	Oságitchenázhowân anishanâban , peendega otowwe sugginnekanát medush oskeneegequa azhe onishkât .
40009026	Medush azhe kitchetuzzhindummink kokkiná emá enuhkukkakummik .
40009027	Jesusdush anemáchát , neezh kagebeengwanidjin onopenuhnigōn onōswawamiggoot , ekettowugdush David ogoissun shâwanemisshinnâng .
40009028	Buhpeendegat wegewamink , kagebeengwanidjin obeotissigōn , Jesusdush otinnân , ketenandám innuh neendákushketon o-ō chetotumán ? Otinnáwândush á , neendogemám .
40009029	Tánginummowândush oskezhigone eketto , anandumagigo máno tuh izzhewabut :
40009030	Azhewâbewâtdush , Jesusdush otinnân che tepájemosinnit ; che gátonit .
40009031	Gá mácháwâtdush ogitchetuzzhindánâwâ emá enuhkukkakummik .
40009032	Ane ságáummowâtdush binná netágegetosig aninne bená Mutche Manitōn gagishkowwât :
40009033	Mutche Manitōndush gásâgitchenizzho-oont , natágegetosig me azhenetagegetōt ; anishanâbagdush mámukkâtandumōg ekettowugdush , kâwekâ wâbunduhzeem cheizzhewabuk Israelink .
40009034	Phariseeugdush ekettowug Mutche Manitōn nezhokomágōn che sâgitchenázhowât manitōn .
40009035	Jesusdush papáiezhá kokkinná otanowun giya otanowansun , kekinnoummágát uhnummeawegummigōnk guggequawin ogemáwewin , nojemotōtdush kokkinná ákoosewin uhnōch giya inápinawin , magwa anishanâban .
40009036	Wiábomatdush kitche nebená anishanâban , ogeshâwanemán , ōnje wunnemikkowwewug , siswashkâwug manishtânisheeng oweuh kanowanemiggoosigwânin .
40009037	Otinnândush otoskenegamun , netáwiggitōngin bátienut ; unnoketâgaweninnewug agâsenug .
40009038	Uhnummeatowwik tabandunk netáwiggitōngin , cheizzhenázhowât quiuk ga unnokenidjin ogittigânink .
40010001	Gah nundomátdush asheneeshinidjin otoskenegamun , omenán mushkâwizzewin che ságitchenázhowâwât Mutche Manitōn , giya chenojemoáwât kokkinná ákoozewin , giya kokkinná inápinawin .
40010002	Ashe neezhinidjin anonájin otuhnozowinewân uhgew : Simon , Peter ezhenekâzo , giya Andrew wekânisun ; James , Zebedee oguissun , giya John wekânisun ;
40010003	Philip giya Bartholomew , Thomas giya Matthew mowōnjichegat tebáummátewin , James , Alpheus oguissun , giya Lebbeus , Thaddeus ezhenekâzo .
40010004	Simon , Canaanite , giya Judas Iscariot wâbuggittinát .
40010005	Uhgew ussheneezhidjig , Jesus otizzhenázhowán otiângwâmemán ekettōnk , miátáwizzidjig andánukkewât kago ezhá kago , kokkinná giya otanowun Samaritanug kago peendegakago .
40010006	Ezhág wanisshingig manishtânishug wegewamink Israel .
40010007	Che unne iotittumag ningooche , guggequayeuk ekettōnk ; ogemáwewin gezhigōnk bazhew tuhgoo .
40010008	Nojemoik wiákoozidjig , beneik wamegidjig , onishkâbenik nabojig , sâgitchenizzho-ōk Mutche Manitōg , unishâgo kegeiám , unish megewag .
40010009	Kago otâpenunkago ozâwâ shoneá , giya shoneá giya misquâbeek keshoneámashkemootâng .
40010010	Kago pemewunnakago , kago neezhōshkunkago beenzikowâgunnun , kago newawân mukkizzenun giya suhkáoonun : unnoketâgaweninne otá ián mejim .
40010011	Owagotogwanigo otanuh gapeendegawagwan , kuhgwatwayeuk , owwanan owushema apetandágoozit : wetegamik , nánázh che nuhguttumag e-e otanuh .
40010012	Otittumagdush wegewam , ekettoeyeuk , tuh innuhwandewug o-ō wegewam .
40010013	Kishpindush apetandágwuk , innuhwandumōk , kishpindush apetandágoozinōk nayáb otâpenumōk owwe innuhwandumagobun .
40010014	Owwagwan gapeendegunissinnowagwan giya gabezindosinnowagwan , ope ságáumag eu wegewâm , eu edush otanuh , bowwewabishkumōk weágusseun kezittáwâng .
40010015	Kagat ketenenim , nowutch attow onisheshin , Sodom giya Gomorrah , eu gezhigut ope tebahkonegang euedush otanuh .
40010016	Binná kemájenázhuhonenim manishtânisheeng magwa mieengunug ; eu ōnje , genabekōnk ezhe nebwâkâwandumōk , giya omemeeng ezhe wângowwizzeyeuk .
40010017	Tuhtebábum aninnewug ! bōchigo keguh buggittanemigowâ , gegetowinnink keguhbuhshunzhaogowâg uhnummeawegummigōnk .
40010018	Keguh ezhewinnegōm anosumubbewât ogemág , giya kitche ogemág , neen ōnje : keguhgoocheiggowâg ogemág giya miátáwizzidjig .
40010019	Tebuggeminágwâ , kago náguttuhwandunkago gaekettoeyag , mego e-e tebiegun chemenigoeyag gaekettoeyag .
40010020	Kâween keenowâ keguhgegetoseem , kōsewâ ochichâgwun tuh gegetowun keowwewâng .
40010021	Wekânisemá oguh buhgittinnán wekânisun che nebonit , giya ōsun uhbenocheun , uhbenocheugdush oguhwebátámáwân onegeiggowân che nebonit .
40010022	Kokkinná aninnewug keguh sheenganemigowâg neen ōnje , weendush gamennototunk nánazh otishquâbematizzewin tuh gâgega bemátizze .
40010023	Megooshkâcheikwâ o-ō otanuh , minowâ bazhek oppuggizzoon : kagat ketenenim uhbwâ châgishkumag otanowun Israel , aninne oguisun tuhtuhkoshin .
40010024	Oskenegamemá kâ owushema apetandágoozisse tabanemigoojin apetandágoozinit , unnoketâgaweninnedush kâ owushema apetandâgoozisse otogemámun apetandágoozinit .
40010025	Ta apetandágwut ōshkenegish cheyapetandágoozebun tabanemegoojin ; unnoketâgaweninnedush otogemámun : tabanduminit wegewâm , ezhenekânáwât Beelzebub , owushema otienáwân andánidjin .
40010026	Kago gōsá kago , kokkinná giátōng tuhbákissin , tuhkekandágwut .
40010027	Kokkinná kago menik n'wândumag ketowwaggâng , anegōk tebatotumōk ogittegummig .
40010028	Kago gōsá kago natojig weowwemá kâdush otánesásew ân ochichâgomá , gosittowik natōt weowwemá giya nasát ochichâgomá , mutche ishkotang .
40010029	Kâ nuh neezh kitchekitchegânasheug átándissenug bazhek shománeka ? kâween bazhek tuhpongeshinze ákeeng , kosewâ bwâ totunk .
40010030	Kenesisewân kestegwânewâng , kokkinná uhginjegâtawun .
40010031	Kago kotaje kago , owushema ketuhpetandágooz nebena kitchekitchegânasheug .
40010032	Owwagwan ga agutchetowwissegwan anosummeskezhik aninnewun ; kâ neenguh águtchetowwisse anosummeskezhik nōs gezhigōnk ayát .
40010033	Owwagwandush ga águtchetowwegwan anosummeskezhik aninnewug , neenguh agutchetowâ anosummeskezhik nōs gezhigōnk ayát .
40010034	Kago enandunkago , neembeizzhenázhuhán innuhwandewin ákeeng ; kâween innuhwandewin neembetoseen , meatuh uzzhoweshk .
40010035	Neembetotowwâ aninne chekekámát ōsun giyu odânisemá che kekámát ogeen , náángunequadush chekekámát oziggoozissun .
40010036	Aninne shânganemigoojindush , tebinowa otinotawizzewin tuháwewun .
40010037	Ween nowutch siágeát ōsun gamá ogeen , owushema azhe sâgeit , neendoskenegamun kâween áwisse , weendush nowutch siágeát oguissun , gamá odânisun apetanemit , neendoskenegamun kâween áwisse .
40010038	Ween kagwadebanindizzosig chenopenuzzhit , neendoskenegamun kâween áwisse .
40010039	Ween makunk obemátizzewin , oguhwunnetōn , weendush gawunnetōt obemátizzewin neen ōnje , oguh mikkán .
40010040	Manototōk , nemennototág , manototowwit , omennototowân biezhenázhuhonit .
40010041	Ween manototowât manitowâzonidjin manitowâzōt otonozowwinnink , tuhtebáummágowizze manitowâzōt otonozowinnink , weendush manototowât quiuk azhewabizinidjin quiuk bemátizzit otonozowinnink tuhtebáummágowizze quiuk bamátizzit otonozowinnink .
40010042	Owwagwan ga mená-ágwan tuhkegumme minnequâchegunnink , bazhek uhgoo babewizzheidjig neendoskenegamug , otonozowinnink , kagat ketenenim , tuhtebáummágowizze .
40011001	Jesusdush gá-eshquâ guggekemát ussheneeshinnit anōnájin , mácháwug , papáguggequawât kokkinná otanowun .
40011002	John magwouh owwâkâneewit , nōndum Jesus enunnokeet , neezhdush otoskenegamun otuhnonán che kuhquajemáwât Jesusun , ekettowugdush .
40011003	Keen innuh buhegoyumbun che tuhkoshinnun , neenguh beánán innuh bakânizzit ?
40011004	Jesusdush otinnân máchág owweweendummowwik John menik kago wiábundumag menik giya n'wândumag .
40011005	Kagebeengwajig wâbewug , nanepinizzidjig bamosawug , wamegidjig benizzewug , kagebisshajig nōndumog , nabojig onishkâwug , katemákizzidjig meenwâjemowin guggekimmáwug .
40011006	Tuhmennowânegoozedush ween ganiskâtizzetowwasegwan neen ōnje .
40011007	Gámácháwâtdush , Jesus guhguhnonát anishanâban ogetuzzhemán Johnun ; wagonan buhgwuttuhkummigáng ge ezháyag gáwewâbundumag , áságunushk innuh kooshquâsin ?
40011008	Wagonan ge ezháyag gáwewâbundumag ? Aninne nuh saságákoniat ? binná uhgew saságákoniajig ogemá wegewâmink táwug .
40011009	Owwagwan koshá ge-ezháyag gáwewâbumag ? manitowâzōt innuh ? kagat ketenenim owushema apetandágooze , manitowâzōt apetandágoozit .
40011010	Me wuhow azhebe-egâzōt , binná neendizzhenázhowâ nemezhinnowam che mikkunnákowwit negân .
40011011	Kagat ketenenim , uhgew equawun banenekânegoojig , kâ oweuh owushema apetandágoozisse apetandágoozit John Baptist , weendush ápitche nondás apetandágoozit ogemawewinnink gezhigōnk , owushema apetandágooze , apetandágoozit John Baptist .
40011012	John Baptist ogezhiguttomun ōnje , nánazh nōngum , ketwan guhgânjish peendegawug ogemáwewinnink gezhigōnk .
40011013	Oanje , kokkinná manitowâzojig giya tebákonegawin nânazh John ogezhiguttomun gemanitowâzowug .
40011014	Kishpindush wetabwa-andumog , me wuhow Elias wâtuhkoshingebun .
40011015	Owwagwan watowwuggâgwan chenōndnnk , máno tánōndum .
40011016	Ahneen uhgew azhenágoozewât anishanâbag ? uhbenochenik ezhenágoosewug nammattábidjig átawawinnink , guhnonáwât uhnew ánint , ekettōnk :
40011017	Neengenōndágomutchegamin kâdush kegenemisseem , neengemowwinotonemin kâdush kegekushkanduhzeem .
40011018	John tuhkoshink , kâ wesenese kâ giya minnequase ekettowugdush Mutche Manitōn otiáwân .
40011019	Aninne oguissun tuhkoshink , wesinne giya minequa , ekettowugdush binná , nebátizzid , manequashkid otinowamágununnewân tebáummatewin mowōnjichegajig , giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig : nebwâkâwin koshá okekanemán otuhbenoche-emun .
40011020	Medush májegeshegunnotánun otanowun gátuzzhe kitche unnokeet , ōnje kâ gwakanduhzewug .
40011021	Kesunnágiz Chorazin ! kesunnágiz Bethsaida ! onje ono kitche unnokewinnun gáizzhewabuk keenowa , izzhewabukkebun Tyrink giya Zidonink , maweshá tágeánwanindizzowug pangwewungin otágebeenzikánâwwân .
40011022	Ketenenimdush , nowutch attow onisheshin Tyrink giya Zidonink , eu gezhigut tebákonegawin keenowâ gaizzhewabizzeyag .
40011023	Keen giya Capernaum , ketōmbishkâ gezhigōnk , keguh neeswabinnego , keguhoppugginnego mutche ishkotang : ono kitche unnokewinnun gá unnokeeng keowwink , ge unnokeengebun Sodomink , tá ge bemátut nánazh nongum gezhigut .
40011024	Ketenenimdush , nowutch tuh onissheshin eu gezhigut tebákonegawin Sodomink keen ga teyun .
40011025	Medush ope Jesus eketto , megwatch nōsa tabandumun gezhik giya áke , ōnje kegegátowwag ono iuheen nebwâkâweninnewug giya manobemátizzidjig kemizzhishshowwinnummowwâgdush uhbenocheug .
40011026	Kagat nōs , anandumunigo kegetotum , me quiuk izzhewabut .
40011027	Kokkinná kago iuheen nōs neengemenik : kâ oweuh oke kanemáseen oguisemá meatuh osemá , kâdush oweuh okekanemáseen osemá meatuh oguisemá , weendush oguisemá omikko wâmegoon .
40011028	Benázekowweshig kokkinná gwatugge-unnokeyag , giya buhyawunnayag , keguhtunwabeinnenimdush .
40011029	Otâpenik neennápekágun , kuhgekinnowabomeshin : neembakâdiz neengittemánganim neendaink , keguhmikkândush unwashemonowin kechichâgōnk .
40011030	Neennápekágun bakâdizze , neembemewunnán nángun .
40012001	Eu ope uhnummeagezhiguk Jesus ogeshábooshkowwân mandaminun ketegânink , otoskenegamundush buhkuttawun , omuhmebinnawândush mandaminun uzzhumwâwât .
40012002	Phariseeugdush wiábomáwât otinnáwân , binná ketoskenegamug kâ onissheshinzenōn totummowât , uhnummeagezhiguk .
40012003	Otinnândush , kânuh kegenōnduzeem David gá totunk bakuttawât giya uhnew wâjewajin ?
40012004	Uzzhowwepeendega kitche uhnummeawegummik , omejindush puhquazhegun anandágoozit che mejesig .
40012005	Kâ nuh kegewâbunduhzeem mazaniegunnink , tebákonegawinnink uhnummeagezhiguk sáságewitchegawinnewug begobetowât uhnummeagezhigut kâweendush oweuh ningōt tá egooosewân ?
40012006	Ketenenimdush oweuh omá , owushema apetandágooze , apetandágwuk kitche uhnummeawegummik .
40012007	Kekandumagobun o-o atumink , shâwanindewin neenguhtián , káween sáságewitchegun , kâ ningōt ketá enásewug uhgoo machetotunzikwâ .
40012008	Aninne oguisun odebandán giya uhnummeagezhigut .
40012009	Anenuhguttunk emá owwe peendega uhnummeawegummigōnk .
40012010	Binnádush aninne oninj kuhgezhewigininne : okuhquájemáwândush , quiuk nuh tá izzhewabut nojemoint uhnummeagegezhiguk ? owwe kushketonâwâ ningotono wetotowâwât .
40012011	Otinnândush , oweuh nuh andussheyag , bazhek iáwât manishtânishun , beenjissatdush weembuhkummigáng , uhnummeagezhiguk kâ nuh otáwekobinnáseen ?
40012012	Ahneen menik owushema apetandágoozit aninne , manishtânish apetandágoozit ? eu ōnje enandágwut che manototumink uhnummeagezhiguk .
40012013	Otinnândush aninnewun shebinnekanin , shebinnekanitdush , nojemomugguttinnego azhe iánik e-e bazhek .
40012014	Phanseeugdush ságáumōg , owwe tebákonáwât Jesus che nissint .
40012015	Jesusdush kakandunk , onuhguttán emá , kitche nebenádush anishanában onopenuhnigōn kokkinnádush onojemoán .
40012016	Otinnândush oweuh che weendummowwâsigwâ .
40012017	Me chetabwawinnewunk , gá ekettōt Esaias manitowâzōt : ekettōnk ,
40012018	Binná neendoskenegam gá onâbumuk , siágeug , neengitchenuhniandum neenguh attowân neenchichâgwun chetebákonát miátáwizzidjig .
40012019	Kâ tuhgekowwetunze , kâ tuh ázhequase , kâ oweuh aninne oguhnōnduhze otinwawin mikkunâng .
40012020	Mákibbetōng áságunusk , kâ tuh bokooshkâsenōn , puhquanawât sasubeeg kâ oguh áta-unzeen pánemá azhenázhowât tebákonegawin che bukkinágat .
40012021	Otonozowinninkdush miátáwizzidjig che tabwatummowât .
40012022	Betowâdush bazhek gagishkowwât Mutche Manitōn , kuhgebeengwat kâ giya netágegetose , nojemoándush ; kagebeengwat giya netágegetosig , wâbe , gegetodush .
40012023	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag mámukkâtandumōg ekettowdush , kâ nuh wuhowisse David oguisun ?
40012024	Phariseeugdush n'wândummowât ekettowug , wuhow kâween ween ságitchewabenáse Mutche Manitōn ; Beelzebub wagemákundunk Mutche Manitōn atuh onezhokomágōn .
40012025	Jesusdush kekanemán anandummowât , otinnân , kokkinná ogemáwewin nanáwinnittizzomugguk , banájeittezomuggut , kokkinnádush otanowun gamá wegewam nanáwinnittizzomugguk kâ tuh nebowwemuggusinōn .
40012026	Mutche Manito sâgitchewabenát Mutche Manitōn nanáwinnittizzo ; áneen otogemáwewin ga ezhe nebowwemugguttinne ?
40012027	Beelzebub nezhokomowwit sâgitchewabenug Mutche Manito owwanan názhokummágowât keenejânisug sâgitchewabenáwât , eu ōnje wenowâ uhgew keguh tepákonigōg .
40012028	Kishpin koshá sâgitchewabenug Mutche Manito Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ōnje , Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew ketotissiggoon .
40012029	Owwanan gawepeendegagwan mashkâwizzit aninne owegewamink che owwe nisshewunnájetowwint otinotawizzewin neettam mashkâwizzit aninne otámámázhegwuppinnán medush ota banájetowân owegewamene .
40012030	Oweuh wâjewissik , neendossittáwanemik , weendush miáwundowejewesik kitche siswashkâwug .
40012031	Ketenenim , kokkinná mutchebemátizzewin , giya mutchegegetowin aninne tuh menowweshâwandágooze , oweuhdush mutche enát Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , kâ tuh menowweshâwandágoozisse .
40012032	Owwagwan ga mutche enágwan aninne oguisun tuh menowweshâwandágooze ; owwagwandush ga mutche enágwan Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , kâ tuhmenowweshâwandágoozisse , ga áquo ákewung minowâdush che ákewung .
40012033	Onisshezhit metig omenewit onissheshin , mutche metigdush omenewit mánátut , metig onje kekandágooze omenewit .
40012034	Mutche genabeekotōk ! Mutche iáwisshetōk ! Ahneen ga ezhe kushketoeyag che mennogegetoeyag , mazheninnewuggizzeyag ? Oanje uhbátienutinnik otaink otōn gegetomugguttinik .
40012035	Manobemátizzit aninne ōnje she onissheshininnik ototossowinnink otaink ságáummomuggut wanissheshink : machebebemátizzitdush aninne mutche ototossowinnink otaink beságáummomuggut mutche iáwish .
40012036	Ketenenimdush , kokkinná kuhgebázetágoozewin aninne ga ezhe gegetōt tuh tebákoná tebákonegawegezhiguk .
40012037	Gegetowinnink ōnje , kâkago tuh mikkunzeen miánátuk , gegetowinninkdush guhtuh ōnje mikkán miánátuk .
40012038	Medush ánint oshepe-egaweninnewug giva Phariseeug otigōn , neendogemám kewewâbominneme kitche unnokewin che totumun .
40012039	Ulmuhquatunk otinnân , machebemátizzidjig giya bashegwâtizzidjig kuhgwatwawug wewâbundummowât kitche unnokewin ; kâween kago kitche unnokewin tuh wâbunduhásewug meatuh Jonas manitowâzōt otunnokewin .
40012040	Jonas gebeenzo niswa gezhik giya niswa dibbik kego omissuttáng : medush ga izzhewabizzit aninne oguisun cheábit niswa gezhik giya niswa dibbik áke otaewung .
40012041	Aninnewug Nineveh tuh pusegvewug tebákonegawinnink tuh mutche enáwug uhgew anishanâbag : ōnje gegwakandumog ope Jonasun gagekimmegowât ; binnádush oweuh omá owushema apetandágooze , apetandágoozit Jonas .
40012042	Ogemáqui shâwunnonk tuh pusegwe , tebákonegawinnink oguh mutche enán uhnew anishanâban , ōnje waquâkummigáng áke ōnjebá owwe bezindunk Solomon onebwâkâwin binnádush owushema apetandágoozit bazhek omá , apetandágoozit Solomon .
40012043	Wânizzit Mutche Manito gá ságizzeennotowwât aninnewun bamosa bangwuninnink nundowâbundunk che unwabit , kâdush omikkunzeen .
40012044	Ekettodush nayáb neenguhkewa andáyán , omikkândush bizzhishshegwuttanik , cheshuttiegâtanik , bisshegandágwuttinik .
40012045	Medush azhe nánát neezwaswa mutche iáwishun Manitōn , peendegawugdush owwe uhbewât , squâchdush wuhow aninne owushema izzhewabizze neettam antipun : me ga izzhewabizzewât uhgew anishanâbag .
40012046	Magwouh guhguhnonát anishanâban , binná ogeen giya wekânisun nebowwewug áquutchink beowug che guhnonintwâ .
40012047	Oweuhdush otinnân binná keguh giya kekânisug áquutchink nebowwewug , kebeiggōg weguhnonikwá .
40012048	Guhnonátdush otinnân : owwanan innuh neenguh ? owwananug nekânisug ?
40012049	Oshebinnekatowândush otoskenegamun , eketto , binná neenguh giya nekânisug .
40012050	Owwagwan gatotummogwan gaezhe meenwandunk nōs gezhigōnk andát , me wuhow nekânis , neendowwamá , neenguh .
40013001	Eu gezhigut Jesus geságáum genammattábe cheegebeeg kitchegummeeng .
40013002	Gebegitchemowōnjeittewug anishanâbag , uhnammattábit medush geáwa bozit nápequânink , genammattábitdush ; kokkinnádush anishanábag nebowewug cheegebeeg .
40013003	Kitche nebená uhnōch oge-enân buhbawatágoozewinnink : ekettōnk : ketegawemnne geságáum owweketegat :
40013004	Opedush kategat , ânint menekânun , pemaiuhe gepungisinnōn , benasewugdush gebe-ezháwug gebemozhugindummowât .
40013005	Ahnintdush ásinnekâng gepungesinnōn gwetch ákewunzinōk : bâbega , gesâguhkewun , ōnje kâ kippuggâsinōn áke .
40013006	M'wákuhung gezis , gechâgetawun giya ânga ojebekâwunzenōn geotâpetawun .
40013007	Ahnint menasagâwunjeeng gepungesinōn , menasagâwunjeendush geságuhkewun , geningobemuggiggenōndush .
40013008	Ahnint gepungesinōn onissheshink áke , gemenekânewunnōndush : ánint ningōtwásetussenōn , anint ningōtwâsemetunnuhtussenōn , ánint niswemetunnuh getussenōn .
40013009	Owwagwan watowwugâgwan chenondunk máno tuhnondum .
40013010	Otoskenegamundush ogebeguhnonigōn , ekettowugdush , wagonan buhbawatagoozewinnink wanje gagekemutwâ ?
40013011	Nuhquatunk otinnân , ōnje kege-eznemenigōm keche wekekandumag kiátuk ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , wenowádush uhgew kâ menasewug .
40013012	Owwagwan ayágwan me gamenint , kitche nebená oguhtiánun , weendush ayásig oguhotâpenummowwá menik ayát .
40013013	Eu ōnje guggekemugwâ buhbawatágoozewinnink kâ wâbissewug anábewât , giya kânonduhzewug ánuh nōndummowât , kâ nissetotunzewug .
40013014	Uhgew ototossigōnâwâ eu Esaias manitowâzōt gá ekettōt , nōndumag keguhnōndám kâdush keguh nissetotunzeem , enábeyagdush keguhwâbundám kâdush keguhnissetowwenunzeem .
40013015	Oanje uhnew anishanâban otaewân kippupggáwân , giya otowwuggáwân kâgwetch nōnduhzewug , oskezhikowân águhwâbewug che wâbissigwâ oskezhigowâng , che nissetotunzigwa otaewâng che mennoizzhewabizzissigwa , konemá neendá nojemoág .
40013016	Mennowânegwuttōn koshuh keskezhigōn , ōnje wâbemuggut , giva ketowwuggun , ōnje nōndummomuggut .
40013017	Me wanje eninnuhgook , bátienowug manitowâzojig giya menno-izzhewabizzidjig aninnewug , ogewegoochewâbundánâwâ wiábundumag , kâ ogewâbunduhzeenâwâdush , otánuhwenōndánâwâdush nōndumag kâdush ogenōnduhzeenâwâ .
40013018	Nōndumōk ketegaweninne obuhbawatágoozewin .
40013019	Oweuh nōndunk ogemáwewin ogegetowin nissetotunzik medush tuhkoshink ow mázheninnewuggizzit uhmowwuttenunk gá ketegâtummowint otaink , me wuhow gá iát , pemaiuhe gá pongesin menekânun .
40013020	Ween gá iát asinnekâng gá pongesink menekânun , ween onōndowwân ekettowin , bâbegadush pâpenanemowinnink we izzhewabizzit .
40013021	Oanjedush kâ ojebekâwisse weowink , wanebak májeke bunge , koshá wanje izzhewabuk uhsunnáguk giya osittáwanindewin ekettowin ōnje , náágutch nishkâtizze .
40013022	Ween gá iát menekânun menasagâwunjeeng gá pongesingin , ween nōndunk gegetowin , giya kunwanindewin o-o áke giya wiazhindewin kitchetwâwizzewin ; wanje wunnissing gegetowin kâdush menekânewisse .
40013023	Ween gá iát wanissheshink áke , ween gá nōndunk ekettowin , onissetotándush , netáwigginōn , ánint ningōtwâktuswa ánint ningōtwassemetunnuh metoswa ánint nissemetunnuh tuswa .
40013024	Minowâ buhbawatágoozewin oge ezhewenán ekettōnk ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , aninneeng ezhenágoozewun kategâtummágoot wanissheshink menekânun ogittegânink .
40013025	Aninnewug magwouh nebáwât , shânganemigoojin be-ezháwun , mutche mezhuskeen obegittegâtuminne ketegânink .
40013026	Mandámin siáguhkeet , netáwigginnōndush , mutche mezhuskeen giya ween geságuhkeeg .
40013027	Tabandunk ketegân otoskenegamun obeotissigōn obe kuhquajemigōn , kânuh wanissheshink menekânun kegekittegâtunzenun kekittegânink ? áneendedush wanjebámuggut mutche mezhuskeen ?
40013028	Otinnândush shânganemigoojin ogebetotuminne , otoskeegamundush okuhquajemigōn , neenguh ezhámin innuh che omozhuggindumáng ?
40013029	Oge enândush kâween , konemá uhmozhegindumag mutche mezhuskeen keguhbanájeáwâg mandáminug .
40013030	Máno mámowy , tuhnetáwiggenōn nánazh pánemá mámáng neenguh enág mámájig ; neettam mámoyeuk mutche mezhuskeen , iyuzzhebetoyeuk che châgizzumink , mandáminugdush peendegush neendotossowegummigōnk .
40013031	Minowa buhbawatágoozewin , oge ezhewenán , ekettodush ogemáwewin gezhigōnk ápiche âgâseeng menekân azhenágwuttinne , aninne watâpenunk ogittegâtunk ogittegânink .
40013032	Báságin menekânasun , miáchegingdush me owushema s'wângunk unne metigowunnōn , benasewugdush gebebonewât otikwunnink .
40013033	Minowâ buhbawatágoozewin oge ezhewenán , ekettōnk ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , wanje ombishkág puhquazhegun azhenágwut , equa ogeotâpenán , oge gátōn nisso tepiegun báság puhquazhegun nánazh kokkinná geōmbishkág .
40013034	Kokkinná ono iuheen Jesus ogeezhewenán buhbawatágoozewinnink , kâweendush kago pukkânussinnōn .
40013035	Me che tabwawinnewunk gá ekettōt manitowâzōt , neenguhbákinán netōn buhbawatágoozewinnink , neenguh tebátotán gágátōng oppinna aquo ákewung .
40013036	Jesusdush kokkinná ogemájenázhowân anishanában , azhe peendegat wegewamink , otoskenegamundush gebeezháwun obeguhnonigōn , weendummowweshinnâng buhbawatágoozewin mutche mezhuskeen ketegânink , ekettowug ,
40013037	Otinnândush nuhquatunk , wanissheshink menekánun kategâtunk , me aninne oguisun .
40013038	Ketegân áke , wanissheshin menekânun , ogemáwewin onejánisun , mutche mezhuskeen , mázheninnewuggizzit onejânisun .
40013039	Shângandágoozit gá gittegâtunk mutche mezhuskeen Mutche Manito ; mámáwin isnquâákewung ake , mámájig , mezhinnowamun .
40013040	Mega izzhewabuk eeshquâ ákewung che mozhuggindumink mutche mezhuskeen che châgizzummink .
40013041	Aninne oguisun oguh ezhenázhowân omezhinnowamun chemozhuggináwât kokkinná mutchebemátizzinidjin otogemáwewinnink , kokkinna giya mutchekago .
40013042	Oguh oppugginnáwân mutche ishkotang emá tuzzhe mowwewug tuzzhe muhmutwaâbetashenōg .
40013043	Manobematizzidjigdush gezis azhewâkashkât tuh ezhewâkashkâwug ōsewa otogemáwewinnink : owwagwan watowwuggâgwan chenōndunk máno tuh nōndum .
40013044	Minowa ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , kache apetandágwuk azhenágwuk mikkegâta ketegânink , wuhow aninne makung , minowâ otánjegátōn , azhe bâpenanemōt awe ezhe-átáwat kokkinná azhe tebandunk medush azhe kishpinuttot e-e ketegân .
40013045	Minowa ogemáwewin gezhigōnk átáwaweninneeng azhenágoozewun onundowábundánun wanissheshingig megisug .
40013046	Makunkdush bazhek wanissheshininnik megis awe ezhe átáwat kokkinná otiemun azhe kishpinuttōtdush .
40013047	Minowa ogemáwewin gezhigōnk uhsubbeeng ezhená goozewun kitche gummeeng azhe oppugginnint , uhnōch azhenágwuk azhemowōndobetōndush .
40013048	Mooshkenat azhe nátagámebetōn cheegebeeg genammattábewugdush azhe mowwunjetowât wanissheshininig , bábenummowât ototossowinnewâng , miánátutinnig owabinnánâwâ .
40013049	Me ga izzhewabuk eeshquâ ákewung , mezhinnowag tuh be-ezháwug che mozhugginnáwât mache bemátizzinidjin , magwa manobemátizzinidjin ;
40013050	Che oppuggináwât ishkotang , che tuzzhe mowwewât , che tuzzhe muhmutwa-abetáshinnowât .
40013051	Jesusdush otinnân , kenissetotám innuh kokkinná ono iuheen ? ekettowugdush , á neendogemám .
40013052	Otinnândush , eu ōnje washepe-egait nasetotunk ogemáwewin odikittowin , eninneeng ezhenágooze , kokkinná kago wanissheshink , ōshkeiuhe , gataiuhedush buhsâgizzetōt ototossowinnink .
40013053	Me gá izzhewábuk ope gá gezhetát ono ekettowinnun , medush azhe máchát .
40013054	Tuhkoshink tebinowa andánukkeet ogeguhgekinnummowân otuhnummeawegummigowâng : gekitche mámukkâtandumōgdush , ekettowug . Ahneende gá ōndinnunk o-ō nebwâkâwin giya ono kitche unnokewinnun ?
40013055	Kânuh wuhow áwisse okotossoweninne oguisun ; kâ nuh ogeen azhenekâzonit Mary ? giya wekânisun James , giya Joses , giya Simon giya Judas ?
40013056	Otowamándush , kânuh kokkinná , omá iásewug ? ánepe wandenunk kokkinná ono kitche iuheen ?
40013057	Medush azhe nishkanemáwât . Jesusdush otinnân : manitowâzōt mizze ogitche apetanemáwân , meatuh tebinowa andánukkeet giya tebinowa andát .
40013058	Kâween kago kitche enunnokese emá , ōnje kâween tabwa-anemásewân .
40014001	Medush ope Herod ogemá nōndunk uhtuzzhemint Jesus .
40014002	Otinnândush otoskenegamun , me wuhow John Baptist geábejebá ; mewanje izzhewabuk kitche unnokewinnun mesâbundiewat weow .
40014003	Oanje , áshia Herod ogetuhkonán John , ogetuhkobinnándush , ogekepáquowân , Herodias ōnje , wekânisun Philip owewinne .
40014004	Gá ōnje izzehwabuk , John oge-enán kâween quiuk izzhewabussinōn wetegamut .
40014005	Opedush ōnjittá wânissát ogegosân anishanâban ōnje uhmanitowâzōt John oge-enanemáwân .
40014006	Heroddush ningōtink ope wâkomát owejetukkewamágunun , Herodias odânisun geneme anosumubbewât , Heroddush gemeenwandum .
40014007	Oge-enátdush uhgemushkawwegeezhwat owagotogwanigo ganundowandummowweyun mego chemeninán .
40014008	Ogeendush ge-egogobun keche ekettōt , mezheshin John Baptist oshtegwân otossowinnink .
40014009	Ogemádush ge osittáwandum , máno n'dáwâch ge enandum , ono giya ōnje gá bezindágoojin , eketto keche ezhe menát ezhe nundotummágoot .
40014010	Medush gá ezhe unnokeet John geáwe kishkequaoont , kepáquotewegummigōnk .
40014011	Oashtegwândush gebeechegâtag otossowinnink azhe menint oskenegequa , oskenegequadush azhe betowât ogeen .
40014012	Otoskenegamundush gebe-ezháwun azhe otápenummowât weow owwe ni-isshemáwât , gebe-ezháwug geweendummowwât Jesusun .
40014013	Jesusdush ope gánōndummowint , azhe nuhguttunk emá enuhkuhkakummik , nábequânink owwe ezhe bozit : buggwuttuhkummigáng che ezhát enezheka . Anishanâbagdush nōndágawât uhnopenánáwât , bamosawât .
40014014	Jesusdush geságáum , kitche bátienowun anishanâban wiábomájin , ogeshâwanemán , ogenojemoándush wiákoozinidjin .
40014015	Wanákooshik obeotissigōn otoskenegamun , ekettowugdush buhgwuttuhkummigá o-o shegwouh ozâm onákooshik , otánōnk izzhenazhuh anishanâbag , otákishpinuttōnâwâ gamejewât .
40014016	Jesusdush otinnân , kago tuh májásewug : keenowâgo usshummik gamejewât .
40014017	Oge egōndush nânwâtik atuli puhquazhegunun neezhdush kegoiug neendiámin :
40014018	Ekettodush , betowweshig .
40014019	Medush gáezhe guhnonát kokkiná anishanâban che nammattabenit ákeeng , gá ezhe otâpenunkdush nánwâtik puhquazhegunun neezhdush kegoiun , ishpemink azhe enábit , megwetchinnát , bokobetōtdush nánwâtik puhquazhegunun , gá ezhe menát otoskenegamun , otoskenegamundush omenáwât kokkinná anishanâban .
40014020	Kokkinnádush getabissinnewug ; metoswa ussheneezhdush kokobenágunun gemooshkenawun menik ashquundummowât .
40014021	Nánun metoswâk getusshewug gáwesinidjg , equawug , uhbenocheugdush pukkân .
40014022	Bâbegadush azhe bozinnázhowât otoskenegamun agâmank che ezhánit , mázhenázhowâtdush kokkinná anishanâban .
40014023	Gá mázhenázhowâtdush anishanábnn , oketáke enezheka , ezhá che uhnummeát wanákooshikdush emá iá ezbeke .
40014024	Nábequandush nowwuggâm geuhgwinda ánuh bemewabuhunk ōnjeshkuhwâ ánáquut .
40014025	Neo tebiegun ápiche tibbikuk , Jesus azhe ezhát nábequânink ogittebeeg geunnebamosa .
40014026	Otoskenegamundush ope wiábomiggoot ogittebeeg bamosat kitche sagizzewug , ekettowugdush , jebi wuhow ; ge ázhequawugdush sagizzewât .
40014027	Bâbegadush Jesus ogeguhnonán , neen kōshâ kago sagizzekago .
40014028	Peterdush otinnân , wiáwewunnan , nundomeshin che názekonán ogittebeeg che bamoseyán .
40014029	Otinnándush ōndás , Peterdush azhenezituhkōkeet nábequânink nebeeng , owwe názekowât ogittebeeg geunnebamosa Jesusun shezhát .
40014030	Wiábundunkdush kitchenodininnik , azhe sagizzit opedush wâunnegozábeet , azhe bebágit , ekettodush , neendogemám bemájeisshin .
40014031	Bâbegadush Jesus oshebinnekatowân azhe otâpenát , otinnândush , binná me o-o , ōnje mushkâwanduhzewun , wagonan wanje tabwa-anduhzewun ?
40014032	Tuhkoshinnowâtdush nábequânink me azhe bonánemuk .
40014033	Nábequanink ábidjig oge uhnummeatowâwât ekettowugdush , kagat keen Kitche Manito oguisun .
40014034	Agâmank mazhuggâwât Gennesaret otittummowât .
40014035	Anishanâbagdush emá andánukkejig nōndummowât , me kokkinnâ gábiezhewaweendummátink , kokkinnádush wiákoozinidjin azhe betowwint .
40014036	Okuhquájemáwândush che tângennummowâwât ishquaiuhe obuhbeenzikowâgun , menikdush gátânginnummowâwât genojemowât .
40015001	Eu opedush ogebenázekágōn Jesusun oshebe-egaweninnewug giya Phariseeug Jerusalemink ōnjebájig , otigōndush .
40015002	Ahneezh uhgew ketoskenegamug , gata ezhittwâwin wanje begobetowât , binná kâ kesepekeninjesewug bwâ weesinnewât .
40015003	Otinnândush wagonan giya keenowâ , wanje begobetoeyag Kitche Manito otizzhetwâwin tebinowa ketádissokânewâ we ioeyag ?
40015004	Wanje izzhewabuk Kitche Manito oge-eketto kitche twâwanim kōs keguh giya , owwagwandush ga mutche guhnōnágwan osun gamá ogeen mego che ápiche nebōt ,
40015005	Keenowâ koshá aketoyag , owwagwan ga totummogwan kago anenummowâjin osun giya ogeen nishkâtenummowât , kâtuh papámanemáse .
40015006	Me o-o azhe banájetoeyag Kitche Manito oguggequawin ketádissokânewân ōnje .
40015007	Kuhgianizzidjig ! ápiche wawane kege ezhe tuzzhimmigowâ Esaias , ekettōnk ,
40015008	Uhgew anishanâbag , kitche bashew neembeguhnonigōg oskezhigowâng giya otonewâng , otaewândush kitche wásá pukkân innuhgotanewân .
40015009	Kâ ningōt inâbuhtussinnōn uzzhuhnummeatowwewât tebinowa anandummowât otizzheguggekimmáwân aninnewun gagekimmáwâjin .
40015010	Onundomándush kokkinná anishanâban , otinnândush , bezindumōk , nissetotumōk .
40015011	Kâween eu pândegamugguttinnik otōnink , aninne obanájeiggoozeen : siágummomugguttinnik otonink me bánájeiggoot .
40015012	Otoskenegamundush benázekágoojin ekettowug kekekandum innuh Phariseeug enishkâtizzewât gá nondokwâ gá enutwâ ?
40015013	Otinnândush kokkinná mezhuskeen nōs gezhigōnk kâ ketegâtunzeeg tuhbuskobitchegâtag .
40015014	Bonim binná : kishpin kuhgebeengwawât sagábeginájig kagebeengwanidjin kokkinná beenjissawug wánekânink .
40015015	Peterdush nuhquatunk otinnân , weendummowweshinnâng o-o buhbawatagoosewin .
40015016	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ nuhgwunnuh giya kenissetotunzeem ?
40015017	Kâ nuhgwunnuh muhshe kenissetotunzeem pândegamuggukkin otōnemáng ezhámuggut tuhbuhzheesh ōnje ságáummomuggutdush ?
40015018	O-o edush otōnemáng wanje ságaummomuggut , otaink ōnjebámuggut , me aninne banájeiggoot .
40015019	Oanje otaink wanjebámuggut mutche enandummowin , nissittewin , bisshegwâtizzewin kemotewin kuhgenowishkewin mutche gegetowin .
40015020	Me ono banájeiggoot aninne : kâween o-o owesinit bwâ kesepekeninjeet aninne obanájeiggooseen .
40015021	Jesusdush gáezhenuhguttunk emá enukkuhkakummik , tuttebao Tyrink giya Zidonink ezhá .
40015022	Binnádush equa Canaanink andánukkeet , ogebenázekágōn ogebekitcheguhnonigōn otigon : shâwanemeshin neendogemán David oguisun , neendânis kitche kotuggittōn Mutche Manitōn .
40015023	Kâ pâpish oguhnonáse , otoskenegamundush obenázekágōn otigōn , támewinnázhiegâzo , kebemigoskâzomigōnán ekettowug .
40015024	Nuhquatunk eketto , kâ neendizzhenázhiegáz , meatub katemákizzit waneshink wegewamink Israelink .
40015025	Medush gebe-ezhát equa obeochicheengwunnittowwân ekettodush , neendogemám , nezhokomowweshin .
40015026	Oge-ezhe nuhquatowwândush , kâween onissheshinzenōn che mukkummint uhbenocheug puhquazhegun , anemōndush che oppuggetowwint .
40015027	Ekettodush kagat , neendogemám , anemōg koshá omejinawâg babángissininnik ábewebetowwint puhquazhegun , tabanemigoojin otuhtopowinnink .
40015028	Jesusdush otinnân , oh equa , kekitchemuskâwandum , anandumun máno keguhtotágo , bâbegadush nojemowun odânisun .
40015029	Jesus nuhguttunkdush emá enuhkukkakummik , biezhe ezhát cheegebeeg kitche gummeeng Gallilee : azhe oketâkewât wudjewink owwe nammattábit .
40015030	Kitchenebenádush anishanâban bowotissiggoojin , obenáwân mamákizzinidjin , kagebeengwanidjin , netágegetosinidjin papukkân giya inápinajig , otuhpuggináwân Jesus ozittáng ogenojemoátdush .
40015031	Medush ope kokkinná anishánâbag wiábomáwât mamákiz zinidjin nojemonit , kagebeengwanidjin uhwâbinnit giva uhnōch anápinajig genojemowât , uhnummeatowwâwân Kitche Manito Israel omanitomun megwetchináwât .
40015032	Jesusdush ogenundomán otoskenegamun , otinnândush neenshâwanemág anishanâbag , ōnje neesogwun neengewejewegōg kâdush kago otōnje mejeseenáwâ : kâdush neenguh mewinnázhuhwâseeg magwouh bukkuttawât , konemá tá wunnnemikkowwewug ningooche .
40015033	Otoskenegamundush nuhquatunk ekettowug , ánepe ga ōndinumunk puhquazhegun , ga usshummungwâ ? ápiche buhgwuttuhkummigá omá .
40015034	Jesusdush otinnân , áneendushwâtik puhquazhegunun iáyag ? otinnáwândush , neezhwaswâtik puhquazhegunun , pungeedush kegoizansug .
40015035	Otinnândush anishanâban che nammattábenit ákeeng .
40015036	Ogeotâpenándush , neezhwaswâtik puhquazhegunun , giya kegoiyun , medush gá azhe uhnummeát , obokobetōt omenándush otoskenegamun , otoskenegamundush omenáwân anishanâban .
40015037	Weessinnewât , kokkinnádush getabissinewug , neezhwaswadush kokobenágunun gemooshkenawun , menik ashquundummowât .
40015038	Gá weesinidjig , newin metoswâk koosewug , ápedush equawug uhbenocheugdush pukkân .
40015039	Májenázhowâtdush kokkinná anishanâban , Magdalaink gebe-ezhátdush .
40016001	Phariseeugdush giya Sadduceeug , obenázekágōn obeguhgwadebanemigōn okuhquajemigōn : wâbundi-isshinnáng kache mámukkâzinnágwuk gezhigōnk ōnje , ekettowug .
40016002	Nuhquatunkdush otinnân , wanákooshig ekettoeyag , tuh kitche mennogezhigut , misquhqut :
40016003	Ekekeshapdush , tuh máznegezhigut nōngum , misquhqut giya ningwânuhqut . Kuhgianizzeyag ! kenissetowwenám gezhik a-ezhenágwuk , kânuh giya kenissetotumzeen kakinnowâtuk o-o gezhigut ?
40016004	Miázheninnewuggizzidjig bashegwâtizzidjig anishanâbag , kuhgwatwawug wewâbundummowât miámukkâzzenágwuttinig , kâweendush kago miámukkâzenágwuttinig tuh wâbunduhásewug , meatuh Jonas manitowâzōt otizzhewabizzewin . Azhe májátdush uhnuggunnát .
40016005	Otoskenegamundush agâmank gá betukkoshinnowât , omikwandánâwâ wunnekáwât puhquazhegun .
40016006	Jesusdush otinnân , ángwâmizzeyeuk , kago tângenummowâ kago , Phariseeug giya Sadduceeug wanje ōmbishkág puhquazhegun .
40016007	Guhguhnōnittewug , ekettowug , me eu ōnje gebetosewung puhquazhegun .
40016008	Jesusdush kakandunk eketto , keenowa tiábwatunzigook , wagonan wanje guhguhnōnnittizzeyag , ōnje gebetosewag puhquazhegun ?
40016009	Kánuh kenissetotunzeem , kânuh kekunwanduhzeem , nánwâtik puhquazhegunun giya nánink metoswâk aninnewug , áneendush menik kokobenágunun gámooshkenag ?
40016010	Giya neezhwaswâtik puhquazhegunun , new metoswâkdush aninnewug , áneenmenikdush kokobenágunun gámooshkenag ?
40016011	Ahneen azhe nissetowwissewag tuhzhinduhzewân puhquazhegun che tánginuhzewag Phariseeug giya Sadduceeug wanje ōmbishkag ?
40016012	Nissetotumōgdush , uhgetuzzhinduhzeeg puhquazhegun wanje ōmbishkag , uhgetuzzhindunk koshá Phariseeug giya Sadduceeug omutche guggequawinnewâ .
40016013	Buhtuhkoshink enuhkuhkakummik Caesarea Phillippi , okuhquajemán otoskenegamun , ekettōnk , áneen azhewât aninnewug , owwanan neen aninne oguisun anwâzhewât ?
40016014	Ekettowugdush , ánint ekettowug , keen John Baptist , ánint Esaias , ánint Jeremias , ánint pukkân manitowâzōt .
40016015	Otinnándush , owwanan wiáweyán keenowâ ekettoeyag ?
40016016	Simon Peterdush eketto ; keensah Christ , gâgineek bamátizzit Kitche Manito oguisun .
40016017	Jesusdush nuhquatunk otinnân , kitche wawane quiuk aketoeyun Simon Bar-jona , kâween misque giya weyâs kege-kekinnoummâgooseen , nōs kōshá gezhigōnk andát kakinnoumōk .
40016018	Ketenenimdush keen Peter [ ásin ] omádush ásineeng neenguh ōzhetōn neenduhnummeawegummik , mutche-ishkota otishquándem , kâwekâ oguhmámázhetose .
40016019	Keguhmenindush ábápegiegun ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , owwagotogwandush ga tuhkobetowunnan ákeeng , guhtuh tuhkobetōm gezhigōnk , owwagotogwandush ga áhbuhnummowwunnan ákeeng tuh ábuhum ishpemink .
40016020	Otiáng wâmemándush otoskenegamun cheweendummowwâsigwâ oweuh , ween Jesus , Christ che áwit .
40016021	Euedush ope Jesus miájetepajemōtowwât gaizzhewabizzit , che ezhát Jerusalemink , ga ezhe guhwâtuggeint , ga ieendotágoot okewanzeun giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun , giya oshebe-egawewinnewun keche nissintdush keche ábejebát minowa niswogwunnuhguttinnik .
40016022	Peterdush pemaiuhe guhguhnonát , otinnân , neendogemám kâween tuh izzhewabussinnōn , nōngum aketoeyun .
40016023	Gwaketá guhnonát Peter , neempikquunáng ezhán Satan , aninnewug otisshichegawinnewâ ketizzhenáguttuhwandán , kâween Kitcne Manito otisshichegawin ketizzhenáguttuhwanduhzeen .
40016024	Jesusdush otinnân otoskenegamun , owwagwan aninne ga nopenuhzhegwan , tá ângwâmanindizzo che guhgwadebanindizzoot che nopenuhzhit .
40016025	Oanje owwagwan gawe iângwâmandumogwan che bemajetōt obemátizzewin oguhwunnetōn , owwagwandush ga wunnetogwan obemátizzewin neen ōnje oguhmikkân .
40016026	( Wagonan anábuhtuk aninne , kokkinná kago ákeeng keche tebandunk wunnetōtdush ochichâgwun : wagonan aninne ga átáwat mashkōt ochichâgwun ? )
40016027	Aninne oguisun tuhtuhkoshin ōsun ogitchetwâwizzewinnink , mezhinowamundush oguh bewejewiggōn kokkinnádush aninnewug wawane tuh tebáummowâwug gáenunnokewât .
40016028	Kagat ketenenim , ánint omá nábowwidjig kâ tuhnebosewug chebwâ wâbomáwât aninne oguisun bemushkâwizzit .
40017001	Gah ningōt waswokoniguk , Jesus otâpenán Peter , James giya John wekânisun oge-ezhewinnán 'sputtenánik ezheke weenowâ atuh .
40017002	Otánjenágwittōn weow anosummegâbowewât , oskezhikdush gezisōnk ezhewâbiskânewun .
40017003	Binnádush Moses giya Elias , obeotissigōn obegugguh nonigōn .
40017004	Peterdush otinnân , neendogemám onissheshin omá keche iáyángebun kishpin anandumun niswa wegewamun neenguh ozhetomin , bazhek keen ōnje , bazhek Moses , bazhekdush Elias ōnje .
40017005	Magwouh uhgetōt , binnuh kitche wâbeskâ ánáqut bamásininnik tibbishko , binnádush gegetowin ánáquttōnk be ōnzittagwut ekettōnk , me wuhow siágeug neenguis ; bezindummowweshig .
40017006	Otoskenegamundush nōndummowât , mego azhe pongesinnowât oskezhigowâng sagizzewâtdush .
40017007	Jesusdush betânginát otinnân , onishkág kago sagizzekago .
40017008	T'wâskâbenát , kâ oweuh aninnewun owábomásewân meatuh Jesus .
40017009	Buhnesâkewat wudjewink , Jesus otinnân , kago oweuh aninne weendummowwâkago , nánazh pánemá aninne oguisun ge ábejebát .
40017010	Otoskenegamundush okuhquajemigōn , wagonan wanje ekettowât oshebe-egaweninnewug Elias neettam tuhtuhkoshin ?
40017011	Jesus oguhnonân otinnân , kagat Elias neettam tuhtuhkoshin nayáb chebeuttowât kokkinná kago .
40017012	Ketenenimdush , maweshá getuhkoshin Elias kâdush okekanemásewân azhemeenwandummowâtigo ogetotowâwân . Me giya dibbishko oguh totowâwân aninne oguisun .
40017013	Otoskenegamundush enandumog uhtuhzhemát John Baptist .
40017014	Beotissáwâtdush bátieninnit anishanâban , aninnewun obenázekágōn , obeochicheengwunittágōn ekettodush .
40017015	Neendogemám shâwanemeshin , neenguis kawunnátizze , kitche sunágut , iápe 'skotang pongesin , iápe nebeeng .
40017016	Neengebetowwâgdush ketoskenegamug kâdush onojemoá sewân .
40017017	Jesusdush eketto , oh tabwa-anduhzeeng mutche bemátizzidjig anishanâbag , áneenmenik gá wejewinnán , aneenmenik gatuzzhekonán ? betowweshin omá .
40017018	Oge sheguhnonándush Mutche Manitōn , me azhe ságáum bâbegádush quewezans nojemo .
40017019	Otoskenegamundush obenázekágōn ezheke , okuhquájemáwândush , áneen neenowint azhe kushkeásewungid , che sâgitchenázhowungid ?
40017020	Otinnândush , ōnje kâ kemushkâwánduhzeem , kishpin punge atuh mushkâwandumagobun , ketá etám o-o wudjew , ewata tuzehe ánjesin , mego che ánjesingebundush , kokkinná giya kago ketátotám .
40017021	Wuhow towuh Manito , kâ ságáunze , meatuh muhkuttakawin giya uhnummeawin ōnje .
40017022	Unnekewawât Gallileeink , Jesus otinnân , aninne oguisun tuh buhgittinemátinun , aninnewug oninjewâng .
40017023	Medush che nissáwât niswokonigukdush tuh ábejebá jebagummigōnk ; kitche kushkandumōgdush .
40017024	Buhtuhkoshinnowât Capernaumink , watâpenungig tepáummátewin benázekowwâwán Peterun , ekettōnk , kânuh ketogemám oguh tepáunzeen tapáummatewin .
40017025	Nuhquatunk eketto , á , wegewaminkdush ope be-ezhát Jesus otinnân , áneen anandumun Simon , owwananun watâpe , nummowâwâjin tepáummátewin ogemág ákeeng , tebinowa onejánissewân , uhgamá miátáwizzinidjin ?
40017026	Peterdush eketto , miátáwizzinidjin : Jesusdush eketto , onejânissewân obebandánâwádush weowwewân .
40017027	Che nishkâtizzisigwâdush , kitchegummeeng ezhán , owwe pukkobewabenun megiskun , otâpin kego neettam ga gōndunk , tá wânobenut shoneá keguh wâbundán : otâpenun , meezhdush uhgew , ánint neen ōnje anintdush keen ōnje , che tepáumunk tepáummátewin .
40018001	Eu opedush otoskenegamun biezheotissiggoot Jesus , ekettowugdush owwanan owushema nâgânizzit ogemáwewinnink gezhigōnk ?
40018002	Jesusdush onundomán uhbenocheun , nowwiuhedush onammatábeán .
40018003	Ekettodush , ketenenim meatuh ezhe uzzhakewayag , uhbenocheink che enandâgoozeyag kâ keguh peendegaseem ogemáwewin gezhigōnk .
40018004	Owwagwan ga tuhbussebuggittinnummogwan weow uhbenoche-eeng me ga ápiche nâgânizzit , ogemáwewinnink gezhigōnk .
40018005	Owwagwandush ga shâwanemágwan uhbenocheun o-o andágoozinidjin neenduhnozowinnink , me giya neen uhsâwanemit .
40018006	Owwagwandush gamutchetotowwâgwan uhbenocheun tiabwatowwinidjin , tá onissheshininne besebocheguhábekōn nápekonint , owwe pukkobewabenint ápiche keenweendummá kitchegumme .
40018007	Sunnágut izzhewabut ákeeng bamátizzidjig , wanje izzhewabuk mutche bemátizzewin : mutche bemátizzewin ōnjittá tuhtuhgo , sunnágut koshá eu aninne mache bemátizzit .
