40018008	Kishpindush keninj uhgamá kezit ōnje mutche izzhewabizzeun , kishkeshun , wabenun , nowutch attow onissheshin eu totumun , che bemátizzeyun , kokkinná keow chewabenumingebun mutche ishkotang .
40018009	Kishpindush keskezhik ōnje mutche izzhewabizzeyun , kitchebetōn wabenun , nowutch attow onissheshin ōnje mennobemátizzeeng bazhekwunk oskezhigomá neezhik keskezhigōn chewabenumingebun mutche ishkotang .
40018010	Tuttebábin , kago mánátanemákan bazhek uhgew babewizzheidjig , ketenenim uhgew omezhinowamewân gâgineek iáwun ossummeskezhik nōs gezhigōnk andát .
40018011	Oanje aninne oguisun tuhkoshin , we bemájetōt wanátukkin .
40018012	Ahneen anandumag , aninne ningōt wâkoozinnit ománishtânishemun , bazhekdush wunneshininnit , kânuh otánuhguhnáseen shângussemetunnuh ussheshângusswe , wudjewink ezhát che nundonawât wanisshininidjin ?
40018013	Mikkowwâtdush nowutch tá bâpenanemo uhnew bazhek ōnje , uhgewedush shângussemetunnuh ashe shângutchinidjin kâ ningooche ge ezhásewug .
40018014	Mego dibbishko ga ōnje wunneshunzig bazhek uhgew babewizzheidjig ânga enanduhzik kōsewâ gezhigōnk andat .
40018015	Kishpindush kekânis mutchetōtōk , názekow weendum mow gá mutchetotunk ezhekawwizzit , nōndōkdush kegebemájeá kekânis ;
40018016	Kishpin nōndosinōk , neezh uhgamá niswa otâpin , che wejewutwâ che bezindōkwâ , ope neezh uhgamá niswa , nōndágowât , tussink gegetoyun tuh sōngun .
40018017	Kishpindush tabwatunzik , uhnummeawinnink owwe tepájemōn , kishpindush tabwatunzik uhnummeawinnink , wabin , mutche áwishink apetanim .
40018018	Kagat ketenenim , owwagotogwan ga tuhkobetowunnan ákeeng tuhtuhkobeta gezhigōnk , owwagotogwan ga ábuhummowwunnan ákeeng tuh ábuhum ishpemink .
40018019	Minowâ ketenenim , kishpin niyazh enandumag kago kuhquajemag kōsewâ gezhigōnk mego che izzhewabuk .
40018020	Oanje ningooche neezh niswa aninnewug mowōnjeittewât neenduhnozowinnink , emá neendiá nowwiuhe .
40018021	Peterdush be-ezhát eketto , áneenmenik ga osittátotōwit nekânis che ábwa-anemugdush , neezhwâchink innuh ?
40018022	Jesusdush otinnân , ketenin kâween atuh neezhwâchink , neezhwaswa metunnuhtussink usshe neezhwâchink koshuh .
40018023	Eu ōnje ogemáwewin gezhigōnk aninneeng ezhenágoozewun wâ nuhgindumágoot unnoketágoojin .
40018024	Bazhek aninnewun betowwâ , omuzzenamágoojin metáchink metoswâk shoneá .
40018025	Kago tunizzik gatepiegat otogemámun otinnuggimegōn che átándewint weow , wewun giya onejânisun chetebiegâtanik omuzeniegun .
40018026	Medush azhe pongesin anosumegâbowid otogemámun uhnummeatowwâtdush , ekettōnk neendogemám , máno be-eshin kokkinná keguh tepáumōn .
40018027	Otogemamundush azhe shâwanemigoot , azhe bugitinegoot omenigootdush omuzeniegun .
40018028	Wuhowedush unnoketâgaweninne ane ságáunk owâbomân weejunnoketâgawemunnewun omazenumágoojin bazhekwâbeek : meenjimmenátdush ogoondágunink ekettōnk tepáummowweshin mazenumowweyun .
40018029	Wuhow weejunnoketâgaweninnedush azhe pongesin ozittáng ekettodush , be-eshin kokkinná keguh tepáumōn .
40018030	Kâweendush owwe beásin , awe ezhe kepáquowât ōnjitta che tebáunk .
40018031	Weejunnoketâgaweninnewugdush wiábundumowât andotumink , ge osittáwandumōg biezheweendumowwâwât tabanemikowâjin kokkinná izzhewabuk .
40018032	Tabanemikoojin azhenundomigoot otigōndush , mutche unnoketâgaweninne , kegemenin kokkinnuh kemuzaniegun ânga kegenundotummow .
40018033	Kânuh tá ezhe onissheshinzenōn , che shâwanemutebun keweejunnoketâgaweninne , gá azhe shâwaneminán .
40018034	Onishkâtizzewundush tabanemigoojin , azhe buggittinnegootdush che kotuggeint nánazh che tebáunk kokkinná menik mazaniegat .
40018035	Mego dibbishko nōs gezhigōnk andát , keguh tebuggindánâwâ kishpin menowweshâwanemásewutwâ kekânisug mache totummowajin .
40019001	Megah izzhewabuk Jesus eeshquâ ekettōt ono iuheen azhe máját uhnugunát Gallilee , be-ezhátdush cheegebeeg Judea agâmank Jordan .
40019002	Kitche nebenádush anishanâbag , onopenuhnigōn onojemoándush emá .
40019003	Phariseeugdush obeotissigōn , obekuhgwadebanemigōn okuhquajemigōn , quiuk innuh tá izzhewabut aninne che bukkawinnát wewun , tussink naskâtizzidjin ?
40019004	Oguhnonándush otinnân , kânuh kegenōnduhzeem wiazhkut Kitche Manito aninnewun ogeozheán equawun giya ?
40019005	Ekettodush , eu ōnje aninne oguh nuhgunán ōsun giya ōgeen , wewun che nazekowât , che bazhekwuninnik weowwewân .
40019006	Kâween kiábe neezhissewug bazhekowug , euedush Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt , kâ oweuh aninne otábegobetoseen .
40019007	Otinnáwândush wagonan Moses gá ōnje ezheummint wewemá , che menint muzaniegun che bukkawenintdush ?
40019008	Otinnândush , Moses gá ōnje totunk ketaewân mushkâwâg wiazhkut koshá wazhetōng áke kâween ge izzhewabissinōn .
40019009	Ketenenimdush owwagwan ga wabenágwan wewun , bisshegwâtizzewin atuh ōnje wabenát wewitdush bakânizinidjin , bisshegwâtizzit : owwagwandush gawewegwan wiabinnegâzonidjin me giya bisshegwâtizzit .
40019010	Otoskenegamundush otigōn , kishpin eu izzhewabuk aninne giya equa , unbwâ wetegandewât , kâ onissheshinzenōn che wetegandewât .
40019011	Otinnândush , kâween kokkinná aninnewug tá nissetotunzewug o-o ekettowin , uhgew atuh máninjig .
40019012	Oanje ánint eunuchug azhe negewât eunuchug , anintdush aninnewun ogeōzhetōnáwân , ánint tebinowa otizhetōnâwân weowewân ogemáwewin gezhigōnk ōnje : oweuh kushketōt che nissetotunk máno oguh nissetotán .
40019013	Uhbenōcheundush betowwâ , che tânginát oninjeeng che uhnummeátdush che shâwanemát , otoskenegamundush onishkâzomáwân bánánidjin uhbenocheun .
40019014	Jesusdush eketto , máno neenguhbenázekágōg uhbenocheug , uhgew towug ogemáwewin gezhigōnk iáwug .
40019015	Otânginân oninjenink , májátdush .
40019016	Binnádush aninne obeguhnonigōn , mennobemátizzeun neendogemám , wagonan ga mennoizzhewabizzeán che gâgega bemátizzeán ?
40019017	Otigōndush , áneen manobemátizzit wanje ezheun ? Kâ oweuh manobemátizzisse Kitche Manito átuh , wâgâgegabemátizzewunnan , kunwandun guggequawinun .
40019018	Ekettodush áneen eu guggequawin ? Jesus eketto , kago nishewakan , kago bishegwâtizzekan , kago kemotekan , kago guhgenowishkekan .
40019019	Kitchetwâwanim kōs keguh giya , sâge ketinowamágun tebishko azhe sâgeitezoeyun .
40019020	Oshkenowadush eketto , áshia kokkinná ono neengeizzhewabiz , wagonan minowâ ga izzhewabizzeán ?
40019021	Jesusdush otinnân kishpin ápiche enandumun che mennobematizzeyun átáwan menik anduneun , katemákizzidjigdush meezh , benopenuhzheshin , geguhtepáummágowizdush gezhigōnk .
40019022	Oshkenowadush nōndunk eu , kitche kushkandum ane máját ōnje kitche wânutizze .
40019023	Jesusdush otinnân otoskenegamun , kagat ketenenim kachetwâwizzit wiánutizit aninne kâween gwetch wekâ tuh kushketose ogemáwewin gezhigōnk che peendegat .
40019024	Minowâ ketenenim nowutch wanepunut , kitche áwase che shábotát shebákecheag sháponegun , kache twâwizzit wiánutizzit aninne ogemáwewinnink gezhigónk che ezhápun .
40019025	Otoskenegamun nōndumowât kitche mámukkâtandumōg ekettowug owwanan ga kushketopun ogemáwewinnink gezhigōnk che ezhát ?
40019026	Jesusdush ogunnowâbomán oguhnonándush , aninnewug ōnje kâ pâpish tá izzhewabussinōn , Kitche Manito ōnje kokkinná tá izzhewabut .
40019027	Peterdush otinnân , binná kokkinná kago neengenuhguttamin che nopenuhnigoyun , wagonan ga iáyáng mashkōt ?
40019028	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat ketenenim , kenowâ menik n'wâpenuzzheyag omá ákeeng , pánemá aninne oguisun ge námátábenit ogitche námátábewinink kenowâ giya keguh námátábim metoswa usshe neezh námátábewinun che tebugemintwâ metoswa ushe neezh tuswawân Israel .
40019029	Oweuhdush ga nuhganát wegewamun , owekânisewân otowwamáwân , ōsun , ogeen , wewun , onejânisun , otuhkemewân neenduhnozowinink ōnje , ningotwák tussink owushema oguhtiánun , giyadush tuh gâgega bemátizze .
40019030	Nebewâdush nōngum nâgânandágoozidjig squâch nōndás tuh apetandágoozewug , nebewádush nōngum nōndás apetandágoozidjig , squâch tuh negânandâgoozewug .
40020001	Ogemahwewin gezhigōnk aninneeng azhenágoozewun siáguhuminit kekeshap , we uhnonát unnokeweninnewun , che unnokenit ogittegânink .
40020002	Ope naquatágoot pungee shoneá apuhnonát che menát babazhek ogittegânink otizhenázhowân .
40020003	Naswo tepiegunak azhe ságáum , owâbomándush nebowinit bakânizinidjin , átáwawinink .
40020004	Otinnándush giya keenowâ owwe unnokeeg kittegânink , quiukigo keguh tepáumonim , azhe ezháwâtdush .
40020005	Minowa gesâgáum , ningōtwasetepiegunak , giya shângusse tepiegunak , mego minowâ andotunk .
40020006	Minowâ metoswa usshe bazhek tepiegunak geságáum , owâbomándush ánint nebowinit , otinnândush , wagonan omá wanjegâboweyag kubba kezhik ?
40020007	Ekettowugdush , kâ oweuh neenduhnōnigosenán , otinnândush , owwe unnokeeg ketegânink , quiukdush keguh tepáumōnenim .
40020008	Wanákooshik , tabandunk otinnân omezhinowamun , nundōm gá unnokejig meezhdush otebáummágowinewâ netam meezh squâch gá ezhájig .
40020009	Tuhkoshinowât ánint mametoswa ussheningōtepiegun májábuneeg owwe unnokewât ototâpenánâwâ andushewât bazhek shománeka .
40020010	Tuhkoshinowât netam gá unnokejig , nowutch nebená neenguhiámin enandumōg , ogeiánâwâdush andushewât bazhek shománeka .
40020011	Watâpenumowât shoneá , ominduhwumáwân tabanduminidjin .
40020012	Ekettowug , uhgew squâch gá unnokejig , negō tebiegun tebishko ketizzhe tepáummowwâg , azhe tepáummowweyâng unnokeyâng kubba kezhik .
40020013	Oguhnonándush bazhek otinnân , kâween kemutche totosenōn needje , kânuh kegeweendummosenōn bazhek shománeka ?
40020014	Otâpenun eu keshoneá , májándush , mego giya weenigo squâch ga menugwâ .
40020015	Kânuh quiuk neendotunze , anandumán totumán , tebinowa neendieem ? Kânuh kemeenwâbeze wâbomeyun menug bakânizit ?
40020016	Me dibbishko , nōndás apetandágoozidjig tuh negânandágoozewug uhgewedush nâgânandágoozidjig nōndás tuh apetandágoozewug ōnje kitche nebená nundomáwug babazhekdush tuh guggegináwug .
40020017	Jesusdush anemáját Jerusalemink shezhát , ningooche otoskenegamun pukaiuhe otizzhewinan , otinnândush .
40020018	Binná Jerusalemink ketezhâmin , aninne oguisundush tuh bugittenumátenun ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya oshebe-egaweninnewun , che 'squabemájeáwâtdush .
40020019	Miátáwizzidjig tuhmenáwug , tuh nisshebâpenuttowwâ , tuh kotugeá tuh suhsuhgáquowâ metigōnk niswokonigukdush tuh ábejebá .
40020020	Biezhe otisigoot Zebedee onejânisun ogene , mámowy oguisun , obeocicheengwunittágōn okuhquajemigōn kago .
40020021	Otinnândush wagonan wâiáyun ? Otinnân , mezheshin neezh neenguisug , bazhek kekitchenikkâng bazhekdush kenuhmunjenikâng che námáttábit , ketogemáwewinink .
40020022	Jesusdush otinnân kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ azhe nundotumag ; ketá kushketōm innuh che menequâchegayag , ga menequâchegayán menequâchegun , giya che baptizemigoyag ga baptizemigoyan ? otinnândush , neendákushketomin .
40020023	Jesusdush otinnân , keguhmenequâcheganâwâ manequâchegayán menequâchegun , keguh baptizemigōmdush ga ezhe baptizemigōyán , o-o edush , che námáttábeyag neengitchenikâng giya neennuhmunjenikâng , kâ neendá ezhe megewase , tuh menitimdush weenigo ánuhwe uhgew gázhetowâjig nōsun .
40020024	Metachejig nondumowât onishkâtezetowwâwân uhnew názho wâkânisindenidjin .
40020025	Jesusdush nōndunk , eketto , kekekandám ogemág miátáwizidjig ishpebugitinummowân weowewân .
40020026	Kaween keenowâ tuh izzhewabusinōn , owwagwandush owushema ga apetandummogwan weow , keguh pemetágowâ , owwagwandush ga ogemakâzogwan tuh unnoketága .
40020027	
40020028	Mego eu aninne oguisun kâween bekitche ogemákâzose unishigo koshá be unnoketágat , che megewâtdush obemátizewin che we nojemoát nebená .
40020029	Nagutumowât Jerichoink kitche nebená anishanâban onopenuhnigowân .
40020030	Binnádush , neezh kagebeengwajig aninewug cheegekuhnuh námátábewug , nōndumowâtdush Jesus bamosanit , ázhequawug ekettowug , neendogemám David oguisun shâwanemeshinâng .
40020031	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag ; onishkâzomigowân , pezán ábig otigowân , owushemadush anegōk ázhequawug Neendogemám David oguisun shâwanemeshinâng .
40020032	Jesusdush nōgegâbowe oguhnonán otinân , wagonan gatotonuhgōk ?
40020033	Otináwân , Neendogemám , tōskâbenishenâng neenskezhigonanin .
40020034	Jesusdush ogeshâwanemán , otângenumowân oskezhigowân , bâbegadush oskezhigowân gewâbewug , onopenuhnáwândush .
40021001	Bowotittumowaut bazhew Jerusalemink , Bethphajink wudjewink Olivet , Jesus otezheuhnonán neezh otoskenegamun .
40021002	Otinândush otanōng ezhág , quiuk anosumegâboweyaig , bâbegadush bazhekokshe keguh mikkowwâ , che tuhkobezōt , mánezheensundush mámowy , ábuhuh , betowweshin .
40021003	Kishpin oweuh anine ningotono enik , ezhe , ogemá onundomán bâbegadush oguh be-ezhe názhowân .
40021004	Kokkinná o-o gá izzhewabuk che tabwawinewung ga ekettōt , manitowâzōt .
40021005	Enik Zion odânisun , binná ketogemám kebeotissik , ketemáginágooze , pemomigo bazhekokashe .
40021006	Otoskenegamundush , ge-ezháwug gá enátigo Jesus ge izzhewabizzewug .
40021007	Obenáwân bazhekoksheen giya mánizheensun , okonâsewândush otattowwâwân azhe námátábeintdush .
40021008	Anishanâbagdush otuzhwagisetōnâwân okonâsewân mikunâng , ánintdush otikwunun okishkuhánâwân , uzhuttowâtdush mikunâng .
40021009	Anishanâbagdush unnenegânewug ánintdush isquiáng , ázhequawug , ekettowug , hosanna David oguisun , tuh shâwandágooze ween tuhkoshink Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , hosanna nâgânizit .
40021010	Buhtuhkoshink Jerusalemink , kokkinná otanōnk eketto wug , owwanan wuhow ?
40021011	Kitche nebenádush anishanâbag ekettowug , me wuhow manitowâzōt Jesus Nazarethink Gallileeink .
40021012	Jesusdush peendega Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumigōnk sâgitchewabenándush uhnew átándejig , uhnewedush gâshpinutâzojig kitcheuhnumeawegumigōnk , ogwanuhbewabenán miáshkōtōnumátejig shoneá otuhtopowinun , giya atáwajig omemeen onámátábewinun .
40021013	Otinândush oshebe-egâta , nōs owegewam tuh uhnumeawegumigowun , keenowâdush kemotewegumik ketezhetōnâwâ .
40021014	Kagebeengwanidjin giya mamákezinidjin , obeotisigōn onojemoándush .
40021015	Ogemá sásâgewitchegaweninewug giya oshebe-egaweninewug wiábomáwât , kitche unnokewinun giya uhbenocheug ázhequawât kitche uhnummeawegumigōnk ekettōnk , hosanna David oguisun , kitche nishkâtizewug .
40021016	Otináwândush , kenōndowwâg innuh uhgew aketowât ? Jesusdush otinân , á ; kânuh wekâ kegenōnduhzeem uhbenocheug n'waninjig otōnewâng , kegebetōn ketuhnumeawin ?
40021017	Onuhgunándush , azhe ságáunk otonōnk Bethanaink ezhá , emádush nebá .
40021018	Kekeshap nayab ezhá , otanōnk , buhkuttadush .
40021019	Owâbomándush kitche shomenâtigōn kebikunáng obeotisándush , kâdush kago omikunzeen , otinândush unnemetigōn kago wekâ kago tuh netáwiginzenōn keen , bâbegadush metig otâpezo .
40021020	Otoskenegamundush wiabomáwât kitche mámukâtandumōg ekettowug binná bâbega metig azhe otâpezōt .
40021021	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinân , kagat ketenenim kishpin mushkâwandumag , kâween atuh wuhow ketátotunzeem , etumagdush o-o wudjew che bukobesag kitchegumeeng , mego ga izzhewabukebun .
40021022	Kokkinádush kago azhe nundotumink uhnummeáng , tabwa-anduming mego che izzhewabuk .
40021023	Buhpeendegat kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninewug , giya okewanzeug obeotisigon , otigōn , áneen wanjetotumun ono iuheen , owwanan gá menik mushkâwizzewin chetotumun ono iuheen ?
40021024	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinán , keguh kuhquajeminenim giya kago , weendumoweyun , giya neen keguh weendumōn wanje totumán ono iuheen .
40021025	John obaptizewawin , ánepe wanjebát , gezhigōnk innuh ōnjebá , anineeng innub ōnjebá ? guhguhnonitizowâtdush ekettowug gezhigōnk ōnjebá ekettoeyunk , keguh kuhquajemigonán , uhnish e-e tabwatunzewag ?
40021026	Kishpindush anineeng ōnjebá ekettoeyunk , kegosánánig anishanâbag , ōnje kokkiná John manitowâzōt otuhpetanemáwân .
40021027	Otináwândush Jesusun , kâ neenkekanemásenán , otinândush kâween ketá weendumosenonim andotumán ono kitcheunnokewinun .
40021028	Ahneendush anandumag ? aninne nezhewun oguisun , obenázekowân bazhek , otinân , neenguis máján , owwe unnokeen nōngum gezhigut neenkittegânink .
40021029	Otinnândush ōsun , kâween neenguhdezháse ; náágutchdush ositáwandum azhe májâtdush .
40021030	Obenázekowân minowâ bazhek , mego dibbishko anát , otigōndush oguisun , neenguhdezhá , kâdush ge-ezháse .
40021031	Uhgew nezhewât , áneen tiabwatowât ōsun ? otinnáwân neetam , Jesusdush otinnân , kagat ketenenim , bashegwâtizzidjig guhtuh ezhawug ogemáwewinnink gezhigōnk , uhbwâ keenowâ ezháyag .
40021032	Oanje John kebeotissigōwa , quiuk izzhewabizzewinnink kâdush kegetabwatowwâsewâ , bashegwatizzidjigdush ogetabwatágōn , wiábundumagdush tabwatowâwât kâ kegepapámanduhzeem che tabwatumumbun .
40021033	Bezindumōk minowâ bazhek buhbawatágoozewin ; ketegaweninne ketega ketegânink , omitchekunekatán , owunnekâtán shomenâbo ozhetōng azhe wâkiegunnekâtunk azhe owweátdush ketegaweninnewun , azhe máját kitche wassâ ákeeng .
40021034	Mamáwinnewunk otoskenegamun ánint ketegaweninnewun otezhenazhowân che mámáwât .
40021035	Ketegaweninnewugdush ogetuhkonáwân azhenázhowâjin , obuhshunzhawâwân bazhek , onisáwândush bazhek pemosinuháwândush bazhek .
40021036	Minowâdush ánint otoskenegamun otezhenázhowân owushema menik azhenázhowâpun , minowâdush dibbishko gátotowwâwât .
40021037	Squâchdush oguisun otezhenázhowân , ekettōnk oguhgosittáwân neenguisun .
40021038	Ketegaweninnewugdush wiábomáwât , ekettowug binná wuhow mutchekewis , umbasuh nesátá keguh otâpenummowândush otiemun .
40021039	Ogetuhkonáwân áqutchink ketegân ezhewenáwân azhe nesáwatdush .
40021040	Tabandunkdush tuhkoshink áneen gatotowât uhnew ketegaweninnewun ?
40021041	Otinnáwândush oguhgitcheneshebápenotowwâ ono ketegawemimewun bakânizzinidjindush oguhtowweán okittegânun gatebaummágoojin ganetáwiggetōnit .
40021042	Jesusdush otinnân kânuh wekâ che wâbundumag mazanegunink ásin wazhegajig ningooche che oppuggittowwât , násábdush eu che be áttag negânasugág wegewamink ? me eu Kitche Manito oteschichegawin miámukkâzâbunduminkdush neenskezhigonánig .
40021043	Me wanje eninnân ogemáwewin gezhigōnk keguh otâpenumagowâ , menáwugdush anishanâbag netáwiggink kago che betowwât .
40021044	Owwagwan ga pongesinōgwan omá ásinneeng tuhbegooshin , oweuhdush tuhsozōt tuh ápiche besebozo .
40021045	Ogemá sásâgewitchegaweninnewug n'wândummowwât obuhbawatágoozewinnun okekandánâwâ weenowâ tuzzhemigowât
40021046	Wâtângenáwât koshá , ogegosáwân anishanâban ōnje manitowâzōt otuhpetanemâwân .
40022001	Jesusdush nuhquatunk otinnân , buhbawatagoozewinnink .
40022002	Ogemáwewin gezhigōnk , ogemáng azhenágoozewun gá ozhetōt wekoongawin ozhittowwât oguisun .
40022003	Otoskenegamundush otuhnonán , che owwe nundomáwât ga be-ezhánidjin , kâdush webe-ezhásewug .
40022004	Minowâdush ánint otoskenegamun , otuhnonán ekettōnk , ezhe uhgew nandomugik , binná gezisin newesinnewin , neembezhekemug giya uhnōch wâninonidjig genesâwug , kokkinná kago gezissin , bewesinig wekoondewin .
40022005	Obâpeáwândush , bazhekdush okittegânink ezhá , bazhekdush otátáwawegummigōnk .
40022006	Ahnintdush otuhkonáwân buhnundomigowâjin obuhbukkittáwâwân , onesáwândush .
40022007	Ogemádush nōndunk , nishkâtizze , omenissenoweninnemundush otuhnonán , medush geáwâ nesâwât uhnew gáneshewanidjin azhe sukummowwâwâtdush ototanuhwinne .
40022008	Otinnândush otoskenegamun , wekoondewin gezesin nandomugebuneeg kâ ta apetandágoozissewug chenundomintwâbun .
40022009	Májág mikkunâng ezhag gawâbomagwâbego , nundomik che be-ezháwât wekoondewin .
40022010	Azhe májáwâtdush anoninjig mikkunâng papámowōnjeáwât menik makowâwât manobemátizzinidjin giya machebematizzinidjin wekoondewindush ápiche ge mooshkena wâsinidjig .
40022011	Ogemádush buhpeendegatbewâbomát wâsininidjin , owâbomán bazhek aninnewun , kaween wekoondewinne buhbeenzikowâgun otuhgwissink .
40022012	Otinnândush , needje ahne andeun beuhgwissewun wekoondewinne buhbeenzikowâgun ? Kâdush kushketose wegegetōt .
40022013	Ogemádush otinnân otoskenegamun , tuhkobenik oninjeeng giya ozitáng ningooche ezhewinnink , kuske tibbikuk oppugginnik ga tuzzhe mowwit , ga tuzzhe ábetashink .
40022014	Oanje kitche nebená , nundomáwug , babazhekdush guhgegináwug .
40022015	Phariseeugdush owwe gegetowwug onugemáwât owwe tuhkonáwât .
40022016	Otezhenázhowândush otoskenegamewân mámowy Herodianug ; ekettōnk , neendogemám neenkekandámin tabwayun azhekekinoummágayun Kitche Manito otezhetwawin kâdush oweuh owushema ketuhpetanemáse aninne , mego ieezh apetanemutwâ .
40022017	Weendummowweshinâng áneen anandumun ? quiuk innuh che tepáumink Caesar tepáummátewin ?
40022018	Jesusdush onissetotowwân ananduminit ekettodush , wagonan wanje kuhgwadebanemeun , kuhgianizzidjig ?
40022019	Wâbundi-ishig shoneá tebáumag tebáummátewin . Betowâwândush bazhek shoneá .
40022020	Otinnândush owwanan washebe-egâzōt ?
40022021	Otinnáwândush , Caesar . Otinnândush meezh Caesar tabandunk meezhdush Kitche Manito tabandunk .
40022022	N'wândummowâtdush eu eketōt , mámukkâtandumōg onuhgunáwândush azhe májáwât .
40022023	Mego e-e gezhiguk obeotissáwât Sadduceeug , kâ kago ábejebáwin anandungig .
40022024	Ekettowugdush , neendogemám , Moses ge eketto aninne nebōt onejânississig , wekânisun tá wewinne wewun , che netáwegittummowwât uhbenocheun wekânisun .
40022025	Wâjetukkewamenungōg neezhwaswa wekânesindewug sazekizzitdush wiazhkut wâwit , me azhe nebōt , bwâ onejânissit azhe nuhguttummowwâtdush wekânisun wewun .
40022026	Mego kokkinná neezhwâchewât , gá ezhe nebowât uhbwâ onejânnissewât mamashkōt ánuh gewetegamáwât .
40022027	Squâchdush equa giya nebo .
40022028	Okuhquajemáwândush , áneen wuhow wewun ga enint ábejebáwât ? kokkinná gewetegamáwât .
40022029	Jesusdush oguhnonán kewunisshinōm kekanduhzewag oshepe-gâtag giya Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin .
40022030	Oanje , ábejebáwinnink kâ wewewin tuhgosinōn , mezhinowang tuh ezhenágoozewug ishpemink Kitche Manito andát .
40022031	Tuzzhinduminkdush ábejebáwin , kânuh wekâ kegenonduhzeem Kitche Manito anik .
40022032	Neen Abraham omanitomun , giya Isaac omanitomungiya Jacob omanitomun ; kâween nabojig otomanitomiseenâwân , bemátizzidjig suh omanitomewân .
40022033	Kitche nebená anishanâbagdush n'wandummowât o-o kitche mámukkâtandumōg oguggequawin .
40022034	Phariseeugdush n'wandummowât kibbetonawât gagitonidjin Sadduceeun , azhe mowōnjeittewât .
40022035	Bazhekdush gágetoweninnewit okuhquajemigōn kuhgwadebanemigoot .
40022036	Neendogemám áneen eu kitche guggequawin tebákonegawinnink ?
40022037	Jesusdush otinnân , wuhow , sâgeik Kitche Monito kokinná ketaink kokkinná giya kemushkâwizzewinnink .
40022038	Me eu kitche guggequawin .
40022039	Wiánekasink mego nagânuk tibbishko , keche sâgeut kejetukkewamágun azhe ságeittezoyun .
40022040	Ono neezh guggequawinun mámowy tebákonegawin giya manitowâzojig .
40022041	Phariseeug mowōnjeittewât Jesus okuhquajemán :
40022042	Ekettōnk aneen anandumag , owwanan wuhow Christ ketenandám , owwanan oguisun ? otinnáwândush David oguisun .
40022043	Otinnândush áneen David ochichâgōnk , Kitche Manito enint , ekettōnk ?
40022044	Kitche Manito otinnân neen Kitche Manitomun , námáttábin neenkitchenikkáng nánazh shângannemikig anámiuhe kezittáng neenguhtuhság .
40022045	Daviddush kishpin Kitche Manito anát , áneen ga ge ezhe oguissit ?
40022046	Kâdush oweuh aninnewun oguhnonáseen , kâweendush oweuh aninnewun minowâ oguhquajemigooseen kago .
40023001	Jesusdush oguhnonán kitche nebená anishanâban giya otoskenegamun .
40023002	Ekettōnk oshebe-egaweninnewug giya Phariseeug námáttábewug Moses onámátábewinnink .
40023003	Eu ōnje kokkinná kago aketowât , kunwandumōk , totumōk , kago ween andotummowât totunkago , ōnje ekettowug kâdush totunzewug .
40023004	Oanje ogoozegotonáwân bemewunánun otonuhgátuháwân aninnewun , ozám gosegwun aninne che bemewetopun weenowâdush tebinowa kâ kunága otángenuhzenáwâ .
40023005	Weenowâdush kokkinná totumōg otunnokewinnewâ aninnewun che wâbomigowât ; ápiche omichegetōnâwân ogitche buhbeenzikkowagunewân .
40023006	Omeenwandánâwâ owushema meenwâtag wegewamun wekoondewinnun che attag , giya ogemá námáttábewinun uhnummeawegumigōnk .
40023007	Giya che uhnummekowweendwâ mikkunâng , giya uzzhenintwâ , Neendogemám , Neendogemám .
40023008	Kâweendush keenowâ Neendogemám keguhenásewâ bazhekgo atuh ketogemám , Christ , kokkinná dush ketowekânissindim .
40023009	Ká oweuh nōs keguh enásewâ ákeeng , bazhekgo átuh kōsewâ Kitche Manito gezhigōnk .
40023010	Kâ oweuh Neendogemám keguh egoosewâ , bazhekgo atuh tabaneminag , Christ .
40023011	Owwagwan ga nâgânizzegwan ketá otoskenegamenun .
40023012	Owwagwandush ga gitchetwâwanemogwan weow tuhtuhbussebuggittinnegâzo , owwagwandush ga tuhbussebuggittinumōgwan weow me ga gitchetwâwandágoozit .
40023013	Kekitchesunnagizzim oshebe-egaweninnewetōk Phariseeitōk kuhgianizzeyag ! ōnje kekepáquoánâwân ogemáwewin ge-zhigōnk otishquandem , kâ kepeendegaseem giya oweuh wâpeendegat che peendegasig .
40023014	Kekitchesunnágizzim oshebe-egaweninnewetōk , Phariseeitōk , kegittánâwân shegág owegewamewân , wewiazhichegayagdush , kekitchekeenwâtōn ketuhnummeawin , owushema keguh otissegōnâwâ mutchetotátewin .
40023015	Kekitchesunnágizzim oshebe-egaweninnewetōk , Phariseeitōk kuhgianizzeyag , kebabágewetáskánâwâ kitchegumme giya áke owwe enásneyag oweuh , opedush ga ásheyagoon owushema ketotowwâ mutche ishkota che oguissit , keenowâ izzhewabizzeyag .
40023016	Kekitchesunnágizzim oshebe-egaweninnewetōk , Phariseeitvk , kagebeengwayag , kagenowizzhewayag , ekettoyag owwagwan ga ezhe mushkâwegeezhwagwan kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk , kâ tuh áwunzenōn , owwagwandush ozâwâ shoneá kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk ga ezhe mushkáwegeezhwagwan me atuh cheáwung .
40023017	Kekuhgepátizzim , kekuhgebeengwam ; áneen owushema apetandágwuk ozâwâ shoneá , uhgama kitche uhnummeawegrummik .
40023018	Owwagwandush gá ezhe mushkâwegeezhwagwan sáságewitchegunko 'zhuttag , kâ tuháwunzenōn , owwagwandush ga ezhe mushkâwegeezhwagwan sáságewitchegunnik me ga áwung .
40023019	Kekuhgepátizzim , kekuhgebeengwam , áneen owushema apetandágwuk sáságewitchegun uhgama sáságewitchegunko 'zhuttag ?
40023020	Owwagwan ga ezhe muskâwegeezhwagwan sásagewitchegun uzzhuttanik , mego omushkâwegeezhwat kokkinnágo menik atanik .
40023021	Owwagwandush ga ezhe mushkâwegeezhwagwan kitche uhnummeawegumigōnk e-e mushkâwegeezhwat uhnewedush andánidjin .
40023022	Owwagwan ga ezhe mushkâwegeezhwagwan gezisōnk , azhe mushkâwegeezhwat Kitche Manito onámátábewinnink .
40023023	Kekitchesunnágizzim , oshebe-egaweninnewetōk , Phariseeitōk kuhgianizzeyag : matáchingin bazhek ketepáumágam kenuhguhtamdush , wazhebe-egâtag tebákonegawin , shâwanindewin , mushkâwandummowin , me ono gagetotumagobun eu edush pukkân kâ ketáge-ezhenuhguttunzeem bwâ izzhewabuk .
40023024	Kagebeengwayag kagenowizzheyag , keshábobegináwâ pingoosh , kitche áwase kemizzewagōnâwâ .
40023025	Kekitche sunnágizzim , kebenetonun onágun giya menequâchegun áqutcheiuhe , beenjeiuhedush mooshkenawun miánátuk .
40023026	Kuhgebeengwa Pharisee , benetōn onágun giya menequâchegun beenjeiuhe âqutcheiuhedush tuh benut .
40023027	Kekitchesunnágizzim , oshebe-egaweninnewetōk , Phariseeitōk , jebagummigōn manobe-egâtagin ketezhenágoozim meenwâbomenágwitōn áqutcheiuhe beenjeiuhedush mōoshkenawun jebi okunun kokkinná giya miánátuk ?
40023028	Me ezhewabizzeyag manobemátizzinidjin ketezhenágoozim beenjenádush kemooshkenam kuhgianizzewin giya mutche bemátizzewin .
40023029	Kekitchesunnagizzim oshebe-egaweninnewetōk Phariseeitōk kuhgiazizzeyag , ōnje ketozhetowwâg manitowâzojig ojebagummigōn kemanobeánádush manobematizzidjig ojebagummigōn .
40023030	Kedikittōmdush , kishpin bemátizzeyungobun kezhiguk magwouh kōsenánig bematizzewât , kâ neendáge otâpenunzeem manitowâzojig omishquemewân .
40023031	Kedikittōmdush keenowâ , gá nissájig manitowâzojig onejânissewân áweyag .
40023032	Mooshkenatōg kōsewâg otepiegunewâ .
40023033	Kegenabekowim , kemutchegenabekotawizzim áneen ga ezhe getishkekumag mutche ishkota obánáje-ewawin ?
40023034	Binná ketezhenázhuhmonim manitowâzojig , giya nebwâkâweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , ánintdush keguh nesáwâg , keguh sussuhgáquowâgdush metigōnk , ánint keguh buhshunzhawâwâg uhnummeawegummigōnk giya áyagâmotanuh keguh ezhenázhowâwâg .
40023035	Kokkinná misque keguhotissigonâwâ , manobemátizzidjig nasinjig , omisquemewân , manobemátizzit Abel omisqueemōnje , nánazh Zacharias , Barachias oguisun omisqueem , ween gá nesag missowiuhe kitche uhnummeawegummik giya sáságewitchegun kozhuttag .
40023036	Ketenenimdush kokkinná ono tuhmokishkâwun nōngum bemátizzinik .
40023037	Oh Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! gá nesájig manitowâzōnidjin kebemosináágdush azhenazhuhmágoyumbuneeg : nebená tussink neendánuhwemowōnjeág kenejânisng pekááquouh azhe mowōnjeát onejânisun anámeningwegun kâdush kege enanduhzeem .
40023038	Binná kewegewam kenuhguttumágōm bezhishegwuttag .
40023039	Ketenenim kâwekâ minowâ , keguh wâbomisseem chebwâ ekettoyag tuh shâwandágooze ween tuhkoshink Kitche Manito otuhnozowinnink .
40024001	Jesusdush geságáum nuhguttunk kitche uhnummeawegummik otoskenegamundush obeotissigōn , kekinnoummágoot wegewamun kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk .
40024002	Jesusdush otinnân , kewâbundânáwân innuh kokkinná ono iuheen ? Kagat ketenenim kâ pâpish bazhekwâbeek ásin tuhágwétosinzenōn , kokkinná tuhtibbinnewabinnegátâwun .
40024003	Magwouhdush námáttábit wudjewink Olivet , otoskenegamun obeotissigōn , ezheke , ekettowugdush , weendummowweshinâng áneen ope ono iuheen che izzhewabuk , áneen ga izzhewabuk tuhkoshinun giya eeshquâ ákewung ?
40024004	Jesusdush otinnân , tuhtebábig , kago oweuh keguhwiazhemigoozewâ .
40024005	Nebená tuh tuhkoshinōg neenduhnozowinnink , ekettōnk neen Christ kitchenebenádush oguhwiazhemáwân .
40024006	Keguhnōndámdush nundobunnewinun , giya che tuzzhindumink nundobunnewinun ; tuhtebábig kago keguh sunnágizisseem ; kokkinná ono iuheen tuh izzhewabut , kâdush muhshe guhtuh eesquâ ákewunzenōn .
40024007	Naningōtwawân papukkân azhe weenzowât , tuh ezhe mowwinnaotewug ogemáwewinnundush tuh mowwinnaotemuggutōn tuh guhwunándumōg tuh ákoozewug , áke tuhbekooshkâ kitche nebená .
40024008	Kokkinná ono kushkandágwutōn sunnáguk .
40024009	Tuhbuhgittinumátim keowwewân kuhgwatuggeitoyun , che nasegoyun , kokkinná keguhsheenganemigōm uhnōch papukkânizzidjig neenduh nozowinnink .
40024010	Medush ope kitche nebená tuh nishkâtizzewug tuh nishkanindewug , tuh sheenganindewug .
40024011	Kitche nebenádush tuhguhgenowishkindewug , keche muhmanitowâzowât keche guhgepázōndewât .
40024012	Oanjedush tuhbatienut mázheninnewuggizzewin , kitche nebená sáságeittewin tuh tuhkesin .
40024013	Weendush gamenototunk nánazh otishquâbemátizzewin , tuh gâgega bematizze .
40024014	O-o meenwâjemowindush tuhguhgekindim , anegoquág áke bamátizzidjig , medush ōpe che eeshquâ ákewung .
40024015	Opedush keguh wâbundám , kago kagwânesuggandágwuk bizzhishegwuttag , Daniel manitowâzōt gátebátotunk , nebowwing kitche ezhetwâwinning ( owwagwan nōndumōgwan máno oguh sissetotán . )
40024016	Medush ope uhgew Judeaink andájig , máno wudjewink tuhezhesawug .
40024017	Owwagwan giya ogittegummink ga iágwan , kâ tuhbenesândewase che sâgizzetōt kago andát .
40024018	Ketegâninkdush gaiát , kâ tuhkewase okonâsun che nâtit .
40024019	Kitche sunnágutdush uhgew anjegoojig , giya uhgew nōnáwâsojig ono gezhigutōn .
40024020	Uhnummeatowwik che sâgitchenázho-ogosewag pepōng , gamá unwabewinnegezhiguk [ uhnummeagezhiguk . ]
40024021	Medush ope che kitche sunnáguk , kâwekâ ge izzhewabussinōn aquo ákewung , kâwekâdush tuh izzhewabussinōn .
40024022	Meatuh ono gezhigutōn che tuhquâtōng kâ oweuh aninne tá bematizzisse , uhgewedush gagegininjig wanje guhgwâtōng ono gezhigutōn .
40024023	Opedush oweuh aninne ga enik , binná ! Omá Christ , uhgamá ewada Christ , kago tabwatowâkan .
40024024	Ga ōnje mokishkâwât kagenowishkidjig Christug , giya kagenowishkidjig manitowâzojig , tuh nágwut cheizzhewabuk , giya kitche mámukkâtandágwuk , kishpin izzhewabukebun tá gitche wiazhindewug ; gagegininjig .
40024025	Binná kege eninábun .
40024026	Uhgamá kishpin enikwâ , binná , buhgwuttuhkummigáng iá , kago ezhákan , uhgamá , beendik iá , kago tabwatunkan .
40024027	Tibbishko wâsummowin , wábunōnk beōnjebitag , gezhegátasag engábeunōnk , aninne oguisun tuhkoshink me ga izzhewabuk .
40024028	Tibbego nabōt che ábegwan , me emá megizzewug che mowōnjeittewât .
40024029	Bâbegadush ge-eeshquâ sunnáguk ono gezhigutōn , gezis tuh kitche dibbekissa , dibbikke gezis kâ tuhságâsegáse , uhnungwun giya tuh pongesinōg , mushkâwizzewinundush ishpemink tuh nuhningishkâwug .
40024030	Medush ope che kekinnowâtuk aninne oguisun tuhkoshink gezhigōnk , kokkinná bamátizzidjigdush che mowwewât , oguh wâbomáwândush aninne oguisun , chebeiát ánuhqutōnk tuhkoshink mámowy kitche mushkâwizzewin giya kitche twawandágoozewin .
40024031	Oguhmájenázhowândush omezhinowamun , keche nōndágomutcheganit nōndágomutchegun , medush che mowōnjeittewât gagegininjig ákeeng ayájig .
40024032	Owwe kekandumōk kitche shomenátig obuhbawatágoozewin : otikwunun ope nouhkágukkin ságebugukdush kekekandánâwâ nebin bazhew tuhgoo .
40024033	Opedush wâbundumag kokkinná ono iuheen keguh kekandánâwâ uhbazhewunk 'squândamink .
40024034	Kagat ketenenim uhgew nōngum bemátizzidjig kâween kokkinná tuh nebosewug , chebwâ izzhewabuk kokkinná ono iuheen .
40024035	Gezhik giya áke tuhmájámuggut , neendikittowindush kâ tuh májámuggussinōn .
40024036	Euedush gezhigut , euedush tepiegun kâ oweuh aninne okekanduhzeen ; mezhinowamundush gezhigōnk kâ ōkekanduhzeenâwâ ; meatuh nōs .
40024037	Tibbishko gá izzhewabuk Noe ogezhigutomun , mego ga ezhewabuk ono gezhigutōn aninne oguisun tuhkoshink .
40024038	Ono gezhigutōn uhbwâ mooshkuhunk áke , gewesenewug , geminnequawug , gewetegandewug gemenittewug wetegandewinnink , nánazh eke gezhigut Noe ogebōzit kitche nábequânink .
40024039	Kâdush ogekekanduhzeenáwâ , pánemá kokkinná wiabábokowât ; mego galzzhewabuk aninne oguisun ope tuhkoshink .
40024040	Neezh ketegânink ga iájig , bazhek tuh otâpená , bazhek tuh ishkonnâ .
40024041	Neezh equawug che besebochegawát , bazhek tuh otâpená , bazhek tuh ishkooná .
40024042	Ukkowâbig , kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ ketogemámewâ ope tuhkoshink .
40024043	Náguttuhwandumōk o-o , kishpin tabandunk wegewam kekandungebun ope gamotishkid tuhkoshink , tágeukkowâbe kâ tágebegobegâtosininnne owegewam .
40024044	Mega ezhe gezhandumag aninne oguisun che tuhkoshinzik ope ukkowâbomásewut .
40024045	Owwanan wuhow quiuk izzhewabizzit nabwâkât unnoketâgawewinne , tabanemigoojin ga ezhe buhgittinnegoot owushema che apetandágoozit uhnew anint , che menátdush gamejenit ope che gezhigutinik ?
40024046	Tuhshâwandágooze wuhow unnoketâguweninne tabanemigoojin tuhkoshininit mikágoot eu enunnokeet .
40024047	Kagat ketenenim oguh ezhe buggittinán kokkinná tabanduminit otunnokâjegun .
40024048	Mázheninnewugizzitdush unnoketâgaweninne kishpin ekettōt otaink , tabanemit kâ muhshe tuhkoshinze :
40024049	Máje buhbukittawât weejunnoketâgaweninnewun , giya chewesenit , giya cheminnequat , giya chekewushquabeet :
40024050	Tabanemigoojindush me ope che tuhkoshininit ope nundowanemásig .
40024051	Medush ga ezhe bokootchezhogoot , che menintdush che ábit , mámowy kuhgianizzinidjin , ga tuzzhe ōmbegizzit ga tuz zhe muhmutwa ábetashink .
40025001	Ogemahwewindush gezhigōnk , metoswa oskenegequag tuh ezhenágwut , azhe otâpenummowât wâsâkoninjegunun ságáummowâtdush owwe nuhqushkowâwât wâwewinidjin .
40025002	Nánun nebwâkâwug , nánundush kuhgebátizzewug .
40025003	Kagebátizzidjig ototâpenánâwân wâsâkoninjegunewân kâdush pemeta otuggowetoseenâwâ .
40025004	Nabwâkâjigdush pemeta otuggowetonâwâ ototâsowinnewâng mámowy wâsâkoninjegunewân .
40025005	Magwouh bwâ tuhkoshininit wâwewenidjin , kokkinná ge-nebáwug .
40025006	Wiábetá dibbikuk , oweuh mutwanōndágooze , binná wâwewit tuhkoshin , beságáumog che unnokwushkowwut .
40025007	Kokkinná oskenegequagdush onishkâwug onánáittowâtdush wâsâkoninjegunewân .
40025008	Kagebatizzidjigdush otinnáwân nabwâkânidjin ; mezheshinâng pemeta , newâsâkoninjegunenánin átawun :
40025009	Nabwâkâjigdush otinnáwân , káween eu , konemá kâ táta tossinzenōn keenowint neenowint giya che ioeyung , atáwajig ezhág owwe kishpinuttoyeuk ga ioeyag .
40025010	Gá májáwâtdush owwe kishpinuttowât , wâwewit azhe tuhkoshink , uhgewdush gázhetájig otunnewejewâwân wâwewenidjin , unnebeendegawât wetegandewinnink , squandemdush kepáquiegâtag .
40025011	Náágutchdush oskenegequag kagebátizzidjig tuhkoshinōg , ekettowugdush , Neendogemám , Neendogemám , pákindanuhmowweshinâng .
40025012	Ekettodush kagat ketenenim , kâ kekekanemissenōnim wiáwewagwan .
40025013	Ukkowâbig , kâ kekekanduhzenâwâ gezhiguk gamá tepiegun aninne oguisun che tuhkoshink .
40025014	Ogemáwewin gezhigōnk aninneeng ezhenagoozewun kitchewâssá pabámátizzit onundomándush otoskenegamun omámenándush otebinowawizzewin .
40025015	Bazhekdush nánink metoswâk shōneá omenán : bazhekdush neezhink metoswâk , bazhekdush metoswák , me gá izzhemenát májátdush .
40025016	Weendush nánun metoswâk gá menint , awe ezhe átáwat nánwâk shoneá , minowâdush nánwâk ogezhetōn .
40025017	Weendush neezhink metoswâk gá menint , neezhink metoswâk ogezhetōn .
40025018	'Ow edush ningōtink metoswâk gá menint , azhe wânekat ákeeng uhningwuhung , uhgátōt tabanemigoojin oshoneámene .
40025019	Wekâdush tabanemigowâjin tuhkoshinōn , [ giya omuzeniagun oshebe-egâtag ogetuhkonumene . ]
40025020	Neettam obenázekágōn , nánink metoswâk gá menint , minowâ nánink metoswâk owushema opetōn , ekettōnk , Neendogemám , nánink metoswâk shoneá kegemeezh , binná nánink metoswâk minowâ neengekushketōn .
40025021	Otogemámundush otigōn , kitche wawane kegekunwandum agâsenug ; keguh ezhein che tebandumun kitche nebená kago , peendegen ketogemám opâpenanemowwinnink .
40025022	Be-ezhádush ween nezhink metoswâk gá menint , ekettodush , Neendogemám , nezhink metoswâk shoneá kegemeezh , nezhink metoswâk minowâ neengekushketōn .
40025023	Otogemámundush otigōn , kitche wawane kegekunwandum agâsenug , keguh ezhein kitche nebená kago che tabandumun , peendegen ketogemám opâpenanemowwinink .
40025024	'Ow edush ningōtink metōswâk gá menint , eketto , Neendogemám , kegekekanemin kesunnâgizzeun , bushkooshegayun ukko uhketegasewun mowōndonegayun ukko uhgeziswawabinegasewun .
40025025	Neenge gotájdush , neengewegátōn keshoneám ákeeng ; binná eu ketieem , otâpenun .
40025026	Otogemámundush nuhquatunk otinnân , mázheninnewuggizze ketimishke unnoketágaweninne , kegekandán bushkooshegayán uhgeketegasewân , uhmowōndonegayándush uhgesiswawabinegasewân .
40025027	Ningooche ketáge attōn neenshoneám , takoshinán neendágeián gageunnewisag .
40025028	Muhkummik shoneá , nánink metoswâk aát menik .
40025029	Kokkinná uhgew gá gushkitchegajig tuh menáwug , nebenádush oguhtianâwâ , oweuhdush kago kâ kushketosig otuhmukkummá menik iát .
40025030	Kushkedibbikut owwe oppuginik unnoketâgaweninne ningōt inâbuhtizzisse che tuzzhe mowwit che tuzzhe muhmutwa ábetashink .
40025031	Ope tuhkoshink aninne oguisun mámowy ogitchetwâwandágoozewin kokkinná giya omezhinowamun bewejewât , medush benámáttábit ogitchetwâwenámáttábewinnink .
40025032	Annosummábitdush tuh mowōnjeittewug , kokkinná azhe weenzojig medush ga ezhe nánáwinát , tibbishko aninne azhe nánáwinát , mánistânishun giya mutche mánishtânishun .
40025033	Ogitchenikângdush ogi-ussán mánishtânishun , onuhmunjenikângdush ogi-ussán mutche manishtánishun .
40025034	Ogemádush ga enát uhnew ogitchenikâng ga ábinidjin How ! bemájág nōs opâpenanemowwinnink , otâpenumōk oge máwewin kege ōzhetágōm wiazhkut miájeōzhetōng áke .
40025035	Bakuttayán neengeusshummig , gâskuhnábágwayán neengemeni-ik , miátáwizzeyán , neengepeendegunik .
40025036	Peengwoshshâgitteyán , neengeuhgweik , geákooseyán neengenuhnândowweik , kepáquiegâzoyán neengebemowwuttissig .
40025037	Manobemátizzinnidjindush che guhnonigoot , Neendōgemám , áneen ope gá wâbomináng bukkuttayun gá usshuminnángdush , gâshkuhnábágwayun gá meni-innángdush ?
40025038	Ahneen ope gáwabomináng miátáwizzeyun gepeendeguminnángdush , uhgamá peengwoshshâgitteyun gá uhgweinnángdush ?
40025039	Ahneen ope gá wâbomináng ákoozeyun uhgamá kepáquiegâzōyun gá názekonángdush ?
40025040	Ogemádush oguhenán guhnonát , kagat ketenenim , bego kegetotowwag uhgew nekânisug neenigo ketotowwim .
40025041	Oguhenán onuhmunjenikâng nábowwidjig , kogág mutche iáwishetōk , gâgegâ ishkotang ezháyeuk gá ōnje ezhichegâtag Mutche Manito giya omezhinowamun .
40025042	Oanje ope bukkuttayán kâ kegeusshumisseem , gâshkunnábágwayán kâ kegemeni-isseem .
40025043	Miátáwizzeyán kâ kegepeendegushisseem , peengwoshshâgitteyán kâ kegeuhgweisseem , ákoozeyán kepáquiegâzoyán , kâdush kegebemowwuttissheseem .
40025044	Oguh enáwândush , Neendogemám , áneen ope gá wâbomenáng bukkuttayun , gâshkunnábágwayun , miátáwizzeyun , peengwoshshâgitteyun , ákoozeyun , kepáquiegâzoyun , uhshâwanemissenowângdush ?
40025045	Oguh enándush , kagat ketenenim , kishpin uhgew nekânisug azhe mutchetotowwagwânin , neen kemutchetotowim .
40025046	Uhgewedush tuh ekogáwug , gâgega kotuggizzewinnink tuh ezháwug , manobemátizzidjigdush gâgega bemátizzewinnink .
40026001	Jesusdush gázhetát kokkinná ono ekettowinun , otinnán otoskenegamun .
40026002	Kekekandánâwâ gá neesokoniguk , wekoondewin kubbekosag aninne oguisundush tuhbuhgittinemátinun , tuh suhsuhgá quowâdush metigōnk .
40026003	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug sazekizzidjigdush anishanâbag mowōnjeittewug , kitche ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne Caiaphas owegewamink .
40026004	Guhguhnonittewât , tebuhgemáwât Jesusun che nesáwât .
40026005	Ekettowugdush , kâween wekoondewinne gezhiguk , ozám tá ōmbegizzewug anishanâbag .
40026006	Jesusdush Bethanaink uzzhiát , Simon wamegeet owegewamink .
40026007	Equawundush obenázekágōn , ásine muhkuk obetōn , kache sunnáguttinnik pemeta bándanik , azhe seginunkdush ōshtegwâninnink uhnámáttábit .
40026008	Otoskenegamundush wiábunduminit nishkâtizzewug , ek ettowug , wagonan o-o wanje wabenumink ?
40026009	O-o pemeta tá ge átándim nebená , che menintwâdush katemákizzinidjin .
40026010	Jesusdush nasetotunk , otinnân , wagonan wanje megooshkâzomut equa ? Kitche wawane getotum .
40026011	Gâgineek katemákizzidjig kewejewigōg , neendush kâween gágineek kewejewissinnonim .
40026012	Wanjetotunk segenunk nestegwânink , gezhá uhjebanákowit .
40026013	Kagat ketenenim , tibbe anegoquág áke , o-o meenwâjemowin che tebátotummowweengan , wuhow equa gá totunk , gâgineek guhtuhtuzzhingegâta .
40026014	Bazhekdush azhe neezhidjig , Judas , Iscariot azhenekâzōt ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun otezhánun .
40026015	Otinândush uhnew , wagonan ga meezheyag , keguhbuhgittenumōndush ? Medush azhe átándewât , neeswa metunnuh tuswâbeek shoneá .
40026016	Eu opedush mozhuk azhe ukkowâbit che buhgittenummátewint weow .
40026017	Neettam gezhiguk wekoondewin gwazhegōnk puhquazhegun otoskenegamun obenázekágōn Jesus obe-egōn ; ánepe ga tuzzhe gezhetayáng kubbekosa wekoondewin ?
40026018	Ekettodush , otanōnk ezhág , enik wuhow towuh aninne , ogemá eketto , neendishquâtáwin tebishkosa , neenguh kunwandan kubbekosa wekoondewin andáyun , mámowy neendoskehegamug .
40026019	Otoskenegamundush anátigo Jesus totumōg , gezhetáwugdush wekoondewin .
40026020	Wanákooshikdush námáttábe , mámowy metoswa azhe neezhidjig .
40026021	Owwesenewâtdush otinnân , kagat ketenenim , bazhek keenowâ andussheyag oguhbuggittinummágan neow .
40026022	Kitche kushkandumōgdush , ekettowug , Neendogemám , neen innuh ?
40026023	Otinnândush , wuhowissuh ween wâjegwâbiegamit onágunink , me 'ow ga buhgittinit .
40026024	Aninne Oguisun ezhá , azhebe-egázt ; tuh kitche sunnágizzedush wuhow aninne , ga buhgittenummágat aninne , oguisun tá gegitche onissheshininne wekâ negissigobun .
40026025	Judasdush ween bagittenát , okuhquajemán , Neendogemám , neen innuh ? Otinnândush kege-eket .
40026026	Magwouhdush wesenewât , Jesus puhquazhegun omámōn uhnummeádush megwetchenát , obokobetōn omámenán otoskenegamun ekettōnk , otâpenumōk , me o-o neow .
40026027	Ototâpenándush menequâchegun medush azhe uhnummeát , omámenándush ekettōnk kokkinná menequayeuk .
40026028	Me o-o nemisqueem ōshkewâweendummágawinnink , wanje seegwabenummink kitche nebená anishanâbag , che mennowweshâwanemintwâ omutche izzhewabizzewinnewâ .
40026029	Ketenenimdush kâween minowâ neenguh menequaseen uhmenewung bemáqut , chebwâ eu gezhigut , menequayán ōshkeiewunk mámowy keenowâ nōs otogemáwewinnink .
40026030	Azhe nuhgummowwâtdush uhnummeawegummigōn , azhe ságáummowwâtdush , wudjewink Olivet ezháwát .
40026031	Jesusdush otinnân , kokkinná keenowâ keguh nishkâtiz zim neen ōnje nōngum dibbikut , ōnje oshebe-egâtag , neenguh buhkittawâ kanowanemát manishtânishun , mánistânisbugdush tuhsiswashkâwug .
40026032	Ge ábejebáyándush , neenguh negâne che ezháyán Gallileeink .
40026033	Peterdush otinnân , ánuh kokkinná aninnewug , tá nishkatizzewât , kâween wekâ neenguh nishkâtezisse .
40026034	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat ketenenim , nōngum dibbikuk , uhbwâ pekááquouh nōndágoozit , nisink keguh eket kâ kenissetowwenōsenōn .
40026035	Peterdush otinnân , ánuh ketáweembenamin kâwekâ neenguh eket kenissetowwenōsenōn , kokkinnádush mego aketowât otoskenegamun .
40026036	Jesusdush azhe ezhát mámowy otoskenegamun ketegânink Gethsemane ezhenekâtag , otinnândush otoskenegamun , námáttábeyeuk omá , ewada neenguhdezhá che uhnummeáyán .
40026037	Otunne májenán Peterun , neezhdush Zebedee oguisun , májedush kitche kushkandum .
40026038	Otinnândush , neenjechâg kitche kushkandum kagâ beengâwanemo , bakân ukkowa omá , ukkowâbeyeuk .
40026039	Owushemadush pungee ane ezhát , azhe pongesinkdush oskezhigōnk , azhe uhnummeát ekettōnk , oh nōs , tá azhe máje máno o-o menequâchegun neenguh kuhbekágōn , kâweendush owushemá , neen anandumán , keenigo anandumun .
40026040	Obeotissándush otoskenegamun , omikkowwândush kokkinná nebánit , otinnândush Peterun , wagonan , kânuh ketáweejukkowwâbomiseem ningo tepiegun ?
40026041	Ukkowâbig , uhnummeag che kuhgwadebanemiggoosewag : ochichâgomá enandum , weowwemádush neennuhmut .
40026042	Májádush minowâ owwe uhnummeát , ekettōnk , oh nōs , o-o menequâchegun kubbekágoosewán menequayán atuh , anandumun tuh izzhewabut .
40026043	Tuhkoshinkdush owâbomán kiabe nebánit , [ ōnje oskezhikowân kosegwunninik . ]
40026044	Onuhgunándush májá , minowâ owwe uhnummeát , neessink násáb eketto .
40026045	Obeotissándush otoskenegamun , otinnândush , nebáyeuk umba unwashemonoyeuk ; tepiegun tibbishkosa aninne oguisundush buhgittenummátinun mache bemátizzidjig oninjewâng .
40026046	Onishkág , májátá , binná bazhew wuhow ween bágittinnit .
40026047	Magwouh gá gegetōt binná , Judas bazhek asheneezhidjig tuhkoshin obewejewegōn kitche nebená anishanâban , uzzhowweshkōn giya shemágunun otuhkonánâwân , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya okewanzeun , otuhnonigowân .
40026048	Bagittinnegoojin oge-enágobun , ga ogemuk , me wuhow , mushkâwemeenjimenik .
40026049	Bâbegá beotissát Jesusun ekettodush , Neendogemám , ojemátdush .
40026050	Jesusdush otinnân , needje áneen bienekáyun ? biezhe meenjimmenáwât tuhkonáwât .
40026051	Binnádush bazhek wâjewâjin shebinnekane , onuhnekibbetōt otuzzhowweshk , obuhkittawândush sáságewitchegaweninne otoskenegamun okishketowwuggagunámándush .
40026052	Jesusdush otinnân , benáun ketuzzhowweshk uzzhuttagebun ; kokkinná uhgew , tuhkonungig uzzhowweshkōn , uzzhowwesh oguhnesegōnâwâ .
40026053	Ketenandum innuh , kâ neendáge uhnummeatowwase nōs , bâbegadush neendámenik kitche nebená omezhinowanun ?
40026054	Euedush totumán , oshebe-egâzoyán aneen ga ezhe quiuk otōngebun ? me ōnjittá che izzhewabuk ?
40026055	Mego e-e tepiegun Jesus otinnân anishanában , gamotishkid kebenánâwân kebetuhkonumag uzzhowweshkōn giya shemágunun uhbetuhkoneyag ? andusso gezhiguk neengenámáttábe kekinnoummáting kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk kádush kegetângunisseem .
40026056	Kokkinnádush ono gá ezhewabuk che tabwawinnewung gá ezhebe egawât manitowâzojig , kokkinnádush otoskenegamun onuhgunnigōn májáwundush .
40026057	Gá otâpenájig Jesusun omájenáwân otezhewetowâwân Caiaphasun ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne uzzhiánit , oshebe-egaweninnewugdush giya okewanzeug emá mowōnjeittewât .
40026058	Peterdush wâsâ otezhenopenuhnán , sáságewitchegaweninne owwegewamink , peendegadush unnoketâgaweninnewun otowwewetuhbemán , owwe wâbundunk ga izzhewabuttinnik .
40026059	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giyá okewanzeug kokkinná giya gegetowwin onundowâbomáwân gagenowishkenidjin owwe bátámint Jesus .
40026060	Kâdush oweuh omikkowâse : 'squâchdush neezh gagenowishkenidjin tuhkoshinōg .
40026061	Ekettowugdush , wuhow aninne ge eketto neendákushketōn che bokobetoyán Kitche Manito otuhnummeawegummik , minowâdush niswokoniguk neendátagezhetōn .
40026062	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne pusegwe , otinnándush kânuh kenuhquatunze ? wagonan anikwâ uhgew ?
40026063	Jesusdush kâ ningōt ekettose , ogemá sásápewitchegaweninne otinnân , kuhgatin quiuk weendummowweshin , keen Christ Kitche Manito Oguisun wiáwewunán ?
40026064	Jesusdush otinnân , kege eket ; ketenenim koshá , náágutch keguh wâbomáwâ aninne oguisun che námáttábit , ogitchenikâng kitche mushkâwizzewin che beiát ánáqutōnk gezhigōnk che ōnjebát .
40026065	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnedush obegobetōn obuhbeenzikowâgun , ekettodush , gekitche mutche eketto , áneen anabuhtizzewât wâtokâzojig ? binná kenōndowwâ aketōt .
40026066	Ahneen anandumag ? nuhquatunk ekettowug tá buhgittandágooze .
40026067	Sikwánáwândush oskezhigōnk , buhbukkittaōnt ánintdush onuhnuhbuhgoskeninjetowwâwân .
40026068	Ekettōnk , weendummowweshinâng keen Christ , owwanan buhkittaōk ?
40026069	Peterdush áqutcheiuhe genámáttábe , oskenegequandush obeotissegōn ekettodush , keen giya kegewejewâ Jesus Gallileeink .
40026070	Peterdush eketto , kâween neenkekanemáse , kokkinnádush onōndágoot iánidjin .
40026071	Gá unne ságáunkdush , minowâ bazhek otoskenegaquan owâbomigōn , otinnândush uhnew iánidjin , wuhow aninne ogewejewân Jesus Nazarethink .
40026072	Minowâdush eketto uhmushkâwegeezhwat , kâ neenkekanemáse wuhow aninne .
40026073	Náágutchdush niánebowwenidjin obenázekágōn otinnáwân Peterun , kagat keen bazhek ketow , kenissetotágooz ge-getoyun .
40026074	Nishkâzetágooze ekettodush , kâween neenkekanemáse wuhow aninne , bâbegadush pekááquouh genōndagooze .
40026075	Peterdush omikwandan Jesus gá ekettōt , chebwâ pekááquouh mazatágooze nissink keguh , eket kâ kekekanemisenōn . Geságáum iázhequatdush mowwit .
40027001	Kekeshap kokkinná ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya okewanzeug , otonuhzemáwân Jesusun che nebonit .
40027002	Gá tuhkobenáwâtdush omájenáwân , obuhgittinummowâwân Pontius Pilate Kitche Ogemán .
40027003	Judasdush gá buhgittenummágat , wiabundunk bátámint geosittáwandum , obetōndush niswemetunnuhtaswábeek shoneá ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya okewanzeun .
40027004	Ekettodush , neengemutchetotum ge buhgittenummágayán wekâ mache totunzik misque . Ekettowugdush wagonash e-e neenowwint ? wâbundun keen e-e ketindowwint .
40027005	Oge oppuggitōndush shoneá emá kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk ; ningoochedush azhe ezhát owwe uhgōnittizōt .
40027006	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush ototâpenánâwâ e-e shoneá , ekettōnk , kâquiuk tá izzhewabussinōn che benuhumingebun e-e shoneá kitche uhnummeawegummigōn ototossowinnink , ōnje misque uhge tepiegâtag .
40027007	Otebuhgindánâwâdush ogegishpinuttōnâwân ákekōn wazheát otuhkeem , che buhgittanemintwâ miátáwizzidjig nabowâjin .
40027008	Eu ōnje e-e ketegân misque ketegân ezhenekâta nánazh nōngum gezhigut .
40027009	Medush getabwawingewunk manitowâzōt Jeremy odikittowin ekettōnk , ototápenánâwâ niswemetunnuh tuswâbeek shoneá gá enuhginzoot gá átándink ween Israel onejânisun gá átáwanit .
40027010	Wanje menintwâ ákekōn wazheát okittegân Kitche Manito gá azhe enuhginnit .
40027011	Jesusdush genebowwe anosummábit kitche ogemá , kitche ogemádush okuhquajemán ekettōnk , keen innuh ketogemakundowwâg Jewug ? Jesusdush otinnân , kedikit .
40027012	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya okewanzeug nanebekimmáwât kâdush ningōt ekettōse .
40027013	Pilatedush otinnân , kânuh kenōnduhze uhgew menik nanibbekimikwâ ?
40027014	Kâdush pâpish oguhnonáseen , kitche ogemádush mámukkâtandum ápiche .
40027015	E-e wekoondewinnink kitche ogemá gâgineek owwâkânint obuhgittinán nandomáwájinigo .
40027016	Bazhekdush owwâkânewe ápiche kekandágooze Barabbas ezhenekâzo .
40027017	Miáwunjeittewât Pilatedush otinnân , áneen wuhow ga buhgittenuhmonuhgook Barabbas uhgamá Jesus , Christ ezhenekâzōt ?
40027018	Okekandán guhgâwanindewin wanje buggittenint .
40027019	Uhnámáttábit tepákonega námáttábewinnink , wewun otezhenázhuhumagōn oweuh ekettōnk , kago ningōt totow wâkan wuhow manobemátizzit aninne , ōnje neengitchemegooshkâzâbundum nōngum gezhiguk ween ōnje .
40027020	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush giya okewanzeug iázhetágoozewug anishanâban che nundomint Barabbasun giya che nisshewunnájeint Jesus .
40027021	Kitche ogemádush okuhquajemán minowâ , áneen wuhow uhneezhewât ga buhgittenuhmonuhgook ? Ekettowug , Barabbas .
40027022	Pilatedush otinnân áneesh ween gatotowwug Jesus , Christ ezhenekâzōt ? Kokkinnádush ekettowug , tuh suhsuhgáquiegâzo .
40027023	Kitche ogemádush eketto , ánishween , áneen gá azhe mutchetotunk ? Kitche gegetowugáwunjish , tuh suhsuhgáquiegâzo .
40027024	Pilatedush wiábundunk kago kushketosig ozâm ápiche ōmbegizzewug anishanâbag , nebe ototâpenán , kesepekeninjeet ekettodush , kâween neen ningōtōno neendotowwâse wuhow mano-bemátizzit aninne omisqueem ; tebugindumōk keenowâ .
40027025	Kokkinnádush ekettowug , máno omisqueem neenguhmisque-egomin giya neenduhbenoche-emenánig .
40027026	Medush azhe buhgittinnummowwât Barabbusun , obuhshunzhawândush Jesusun , azhe buhgittinnát che suhsuhgáquiegâzōt metigōnk .
40027027	Kitche shemágunisshe ogemádush ototâpenán Jesusun , peendegunáwândush gegetowwegummigōnk , omowōnjeándush kokkinná shemágunnisshun .
40027028	Opeengwoshshâgetōbenáwân , miskobuhbeenzikowâgun otuhgwunnáwâwân .
40027029	Oweoqundush otōzhetōnâwâ menasagâwunjeeng , otussáwân azhe beenzikkonáwât , metigdush omenáwân ogitchenikkâng , otochecheengwunnittowwâwândush anosummegâbowid , azhe pâpenotowwâwât ekettōnk , pâpenanemōn Jewug otogemámewân .
40027030	Osukwânáwândush , omuhkummáwân metig , obuhketawâ wândush ōshtegwânenink .
40027031	Gá eeshquâ nisshebápenotowwâwât omuhkummáwân misko buhbeenzikowâgun , tebinowa okonâsun obeenzikōnáwân omájenáwândush che owwe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
40027032	Buh ságáummowwâtdush omikkowâwân aninnewun Cyreneink , Simon , ezhenekâzo , onundomáwândush che unne tuh konát metigōn , [ wâtuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt . ]
40027033	Watittummowwâtdush ningooche Golgotha azhenekâtag , me aninne weendibbigagun uzzhatummink :
40027034	Shewâbo omenáwân , weenzoop tuhgōnegâtane , gágotundunkdush kâ wemenequase .
40027035	Suhsuhgáquowândush metigōnk , mátuhonittewug agwidjin uhtátewug , [ che tabwawinnewunk manitowâzōt gá ekettōt , mátuhonittewug agweyánin , nekonâsundush uhtátewug .
40027036	Námáttábewugdush kunnowwâbomáwân emá .
40027037	Ogitcheiuhedush ōshtegwânenink otattowwâwân o-o oshebe-egun , me wuhow JESUS , JEWUG OTOGEMAHMEWAWN .
40027038	Neezhdush gamotishkidjig suhsuhgáquiegâzowug , etowwinnuh bazhek ogitchenikkâng bazhekdush onuhmunjenikkâng .
40027039	Bamosajigdush onisshepápizzhemáwân námequatowwâwât :
40027040	Ekettōnk , keen ga bokobetoyun kitche uhnummeawegummik naswokonigukdush ga gezhetoyun , bemájeittezoon , kishpin Kitche Manitōn oguisun wiáwewunnán , umba benesânduhwan metigōnk .
40027041	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , oshebe-egawennewug , okewanzeug , onisshepápizzhemáwân , ekettowugdush .
40027042	Obemâjeán bakánezinidjin , kâdush okushketoseen webemájeittezōt , kishpin kagat wagemáwegwan Israel máno tuh benesândewa metigōnk , medush che tabwatowwunk .
40027043	Obuhgittanindizzo Kitche Manitōn , tuhguh Kitche Manitōn oguhbemájeán watâpenágwan ; ge eketto , neen Kitche Manito Oguisun .
40027044	Gamotishkinidjin wâwâch tuhtuhgwâgiegâzo , mego giya uhnew agoot .
40027045	Ningōtwasso tepiegun ápiche gezhiguk máje kushke dibbikut ákeeng nânazh shângusse tepiegun
40027046	Shângusso tepiegunak , Jesus anegōk ázhequa ekettōnk , Eli , Eli , lama sabacthani ; uzzhekettōnk , Nemanitōm , Nemanitōm , wagonan wanje nuhgusheun ?
40027047	Ahnintdush nábowwidjig , ope nōndowwâwât aketonit ekettowug , wuhow aninne onundomán Elias .
40027048	Bâbegadush oweuh pemebutto , oskiebánun otōtapenán owwe uhgwinjemát shewâbōng , uhnemenummowwâtdush metigōnk che menequanit .
40027049	Ahnintdush ekettowug , boneik , tuhguh wâbomátá Eliasun che bebemájeiggōgwan .
40027050	Jesusdush minowâ wiázhequat anegōk , buhgittinátdush ochichâgwun .
40027051	Binnadush , wiáguhgōtag kitche uhnummeawegummigōnk bōkoojeishkâ , ákedush nuhningishkâ , ásineegdush bekooshkâwug .
40027052	Jebagummigōndush bákishkâwun , nebenádush , weowwewân mánobemátezipuneeg , ge onishkâmuggutōn .
40027053	Beságáumōg jebagummigōnk , ope Jesus neettam gá ábejebáunk mánáchtōng otanōnk gepeendegawât , owwe wâbundiewawât weowwewân kitche nebená anishanâban .
40027054	Naningōtwâkoozit shemágunisshe ogemá uhnewdush wâjewegoojin kanowâbomát Jesus , wiábundummowwât áke nuhningishkânik ono edush gá ezhewabuk , kitche sagizzewug ekettowug , mesuh wuhow kagat Kitche Manito Oguisun .
40027055	Nebenádush equawug emá ayájig , wâswâ ge enábewug gebenopenánáwân Jesusun Gallileeink che unnoketowwâwât :
40027056	Andusshewât Mary Magdalene giya Mary , James giya Joses ogeen , giya Zebedee onejânisun ogeen .
40027057	Wanákooshikdush , kache twâwizzit aninne Arimatheaink Joseph ezhenekâzo , me bazhek Jesus otoskenegamun .
40027058	Pilateun otezhánun , nundotummowwât Jesus oweow . Pilatedush eketto che menint .
40027059	Josephdush ototâpenán Jesus oweow , owwe wagenán báneguttinnik bebuhgewián neginōnk .
40027060	Otowwebuhgitandán tebinowa otōshke jebagummigōnk , ázhebekōnk wazhichegâtag ; kitche ásindush otezhetittebinán squandamink , azhe májátdush .
40027061	Emádush Mary Magdalene giya wuhow bazhek Mary , námátabewug anosumissink jebagumik .
40027062	Wiâbuninikdush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya Phariseeug mowōnjeittewug Pilate uzzhiát .
40027063	Ekettowugdush , Neendogemám , neengunwandámin , wuhow kuhgianezit , magwouh bemátizzit , eketto genissokoniguk neenguh ábejebá minowâ .
40027064	Unnokeen che aeenjetōng jebagumik che niswa koniguk , konemá otoskenegamun tuhkoshininit nebádibik begemotinit weow , squâchdush owushema tuh izzhewabut azhewabuk gá ezhe bitchetotumink .
40027065	Pilatedush otinnân akowâbidjig ketiáwâwân ; owwe sōngetōn , menik ga ezhe kushketoeyag .
40027066	Azhe májáwat owwe sōngetowât jebagumik , uhgokewussummowât ásin giya otussáwân akowâbunduminidjin .
40028001	Ashquaw unwabewinnegezhiguk anemájesag minowâ betuhkoshinōg , Mary Magdalene giya wuhow bazhek Mary .
40028002	Binnádush áke gegitchenuhningishkâ , Kitche Manito omeezhinowamundush gebenesewun , ningooche otezhetittebenán eu kitche ásin squandang jebagummigōnk atanik , azhe oppubitdush .
40028003	Oskezhik wâsumōnk azhenágooze , agwidjin giya gonink ezhe wâbishkânewun .
40028004	Azhe gosáwât akowâbidjig nuhningishkâwug nabōnginigo geizzhewabizzewug .
40028005	Mezhinowadush otinnân equawun , kago sagizzekago ; kekekanemenim nundowâbomag Jesus gá suhsuhgáquo-ont .
40028006	Kâween omá iáse , ge onishkâ , gá ekettōtigo , owwe wâbundumōk ketogemamenán geshingeshink .
40028007	Májág gazhetinna , owwe weendummowwik otoskenegamun , geábejebát , binnádush uhnegâne ezhát Gallileeink , me emá che wâbomag ; binná kege enenim .
40028008	Májáwug bâbega jebagummigōnk , sagizzewug azhe bâpenánemowât medush azhe májebi-ittewât oweendumowâwât otoskenegamun .
40028009	Magwouhdush unne uhpezekáwât owwe weendummowâwât otoskenegamun , binna Jesus onuhquskowâwân ekettodush , innuhwandeyeuk , ozittang obemeenjimmenáwân , uhnummeatowwâwâtdush .
40028010	Jesusdush otinnân , kago sagizzekago , owwe ezhe nekánisug Gallileeink che ezháwat me emá che wâbomáwât .
40028011	Magwouhdush 'zhezháwât , binna ánint ukkowábidjig otonōnk ezháwug , oweendummowwâwât ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , kokkinná azhewabutinik .
40028012	Mowōnjeittewugdush okewanzeug giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug azhe gegetowâtdush ; kitche nebená dioneá omenáwân shemágunishun .
40028013	Ekettōnk , ekettoyeuk otoskenegamun gebekemotewun eu weow , magwouh nebáyang .
40028014	Otisegootdush ogemá otwwugáng neenguhguhnōnánán ningōtōno che totosenowag .
40028015	Azhe otâpenumowât shoneá , totumōgigo anintwâ : o-o edush tepájemowin kokkinná tabwatumōg Jewug nânazh nōngum gezhiguk .
40028016	Medush usshe bazhek oskenegamemág Gallileeink ezháwug , wudjewink Jesus azhenázhowât .
40028017	Opedush wiábomáwât ochicheengwunittowwâwân ; ánintdush kâ getabwa-anduhzewug .
40028018	Jesusdush obeguhnonán , kokkinná mushkáwizzewin nemenigo gezhigōnk giya ákeeng .
40028019	Májág owwe guhgekemikōg kokkinná bamatizzidjig , baptizemikōg osemá , oguisema , giya ochichâgomá otonozowinnewâng :
40028020	Guhgekin che kunwandumowât kokkinná aeninuhgook , binnádush kewejewininim , mozhuk nánázh che eeshquâ ákewung . Amen .
41001001	Jesus Christ , Kitche Manito Oguisun , omeenwâjemowin .
41001002	Gá azhe ezhebe-egat manitowâzōt Esaias , binná neendezhenázhowâ nemezhinowam kenegânemink ; che unne mikkunákōg kenegânemink .
41001003	Oweuh otinwawin nundwawamoot buhgwuttuhkummigáng , quiuk wuhmotowwik Kitche Manito .
41001004	John ge baptizewa buhgwuttuhkummigáng , guhgequatdush baptizewawin oguhgequawin che menowweshâwandágwuk mutche izzhewabizzewin .
41001005	Otezhanâwândush Johnun buhgwuttuhkummigáng , kokkinná Judeaink andájig giya Jerusalemink , ogebaptizemigowân oweendumōwâwân dush omutche izzhewabizzewinnewân .
41001006	Johndush , kitche áwase obewyun agwit , pusquagunne kitche pezoot , uhtissáwiasheun amwâjin giya ámo seenzebáqut .
41001007	Guhgequadush ekettōnk , bazhek neembekechenopenuhnik owushema apetandágooze , kâ neenda apetandágoozisse che ábuhummowwugebun omukkizzenun .
41001008	Kebaptizenenim nebe , weendush keguh baptizemigowâ Kitche Manito ochichâgwun .
41001009	Me gá ezhewabuk ono gezhiguton Jesus Galileeink geōnjebá Johnundush oge baptizemigōn Jordanink .
41001010	Bâbegadush bieznemooshkomoot nebeeng , owâbundán gezhik bákishkânik , ochichâgwundush omemeeng ezhenágooze , bebonesindágoojin .
41001011	Gezhigōnkdush be ōnzittágwut gegetowin , keen kache siágeug neenguis neenkitchemeenwandum .
41001012	Bâbegadush ochichâgomá buhgwuttuhkummigáng otezhenázhuhōgon .
41001013	Emádush buhgwuttuhkummigáng ge iát nemetunuh tusogwun kuhgwadebanemigoot Mutche Manitōn , buhgwutch áwâseun wâjewâjin , mezhinowamundush unnoketágoojin .
41001014	Gá kepáquo-ont John , Jesus Galileeink betuhkoshin , beguhgequat Kitche Manito otōgemáwewin omeenwâjemowin :
41001015	Ekettōnk , kekenonowin kubbekosa , Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew tuhgoo ; ánwanindizōk , tabwatumōk meenwâjemowin .
41001016	Bamosatdush chegebeeg kitche gummeeng Galilee , owâbomán Simon giya Andrew wekânisun , puhkobewabenáwât ussubeen kitche gummeeng , ōnje kego ekawat .
41001017	Jesusdush otinnân , nopenuhzheshig , aninnewug che nōjeagwâ keguh ezhe-enenim .
41001018	Bâbegadush onuhgunáwât otussubewân uhnopenánáwât .
41001019	Gomape ane tunkoshink , owâbomán James Zebedee oguisun , giya John wekânisun nábequânink iáwug puhpugwâwâwât otussubbewân .
41001020	Bâbegadush onundomáwân , azhenuhgunáwât Zebedee ōsewâ giya unnoketâgaweninnewun nabequânink onopenánáwâtdush .
41001021	Azhe ezháwâtdush Capernaumink , bâbegadush unwabewinnegezhiguk peendega uhnumeawegumigōnk owwe guhgequat .
41001022	Mámukkâtandumōgdush azhe guhgequat , bazhek swângandágoozinidjin otezheguhgekemán , kâweendush azhewabizzewât oshebe-egaweninnewug .
41001023	Bazhek aninnedush otuhnumeawegumigowâng iá , Mutche Manitōn ogegishkowân , azhequadush :
41001024	Ekettōnk boneisshináng ! áneen ga totonáng keen Jesus Nazarethink ? kebenisshewunnáje-emin innuh ? kekekanemin wiáweyun , Kitche Manito ogitchemennobemátizzit !
41001025	Jesusdush ogesheguhnonán , ekettōnk , pezân ián , besâgizzenotow .
41001026	Mutche Manitodush , azhe nesegishkowât , azhe kitche ázhequat , me biezhe sâgrizzeinnotowwât .
41001027	Kokkinádush mâmukkâtandumōg , guhguhnonittewugdush ekettōnk , wagonan iuhee o-o ? wagonan ōshke guhgequawinenandush o-o ? tabanindinginigo ototowân Mutche Manitōn anátigo izzhewabizzewundush .
41001028	Bâbegadush kokkinná getatakosana enuhkukkakumik Galilee gewetaiuhedush .
41001029	Bâbegadush ságáumowât uhnumeawegumigōnk , gepeendegawug Simon giya Andrew owegewamewân mámowy James giya John .
41001030	Simondush wewun ogeen shingeshin ákoozit , ozâwabe bâbegadush oweendummowwâwân .
41001031	Azhe sugginekanát onishkâbenát , bâbegadush onuhgunnegoon ákoosewin , unnoketowwâtdush .
41001032	Wanákōshik pungeshemōk gezis , obetowâwân kokkinná wiákoosenidjin , giya Mutche Manitōn gagishkowâjig .
41001033	Kokkinnádush e-e otanuh mowōnjeittewug squandamik .
41001034	Nebenádush onojemoán wiákoosenidjin : sâgitchenázhowân nebená Mutche Manitōn , ototowândush Mutche Manitōn ohe gegetosinit ōnje okekanemigōn .
41001035	Kekeshapdush bwâ wâsayábuninik geōnishkâ ságáum , buhgwutchiuhe uhnumeádush emá .
41001036	Simon uhnewedush wâjewegoojin , onopenuhnigōn .
41001037	Makowwâwátdush otináwân , kokkinná aninnewug kenundowâbomigōg .
41001038	Otinnándush , minowâ ánint otanowun ezháta , che guhgequayán emá ; me bowōnje ságáumán .
41001039	Guhgequadush mizzewa Gâlileeink otuhnumeawegumigōwâng sâgitchewabenátdush Mutche Manitōn .
41001040	Wamegenidjindush obeotisegōn , obeochicheengwunittágōn ekettōnk , enandumun ketá bene .
41001041	Jesusdush shâwanemán , ezhenekane otângenán otinnândùsh , neendenandum máno keguhbenein .
41001042	Bâbegadush guhguhnonát ákoozewin , azhe nuhgunnegoot , benezitdush .
41001043	Bâbegadush omájenázhowân : ogeguhnonán ,
41001044	Otinnândush , kago oweuh ningōt enákan , ezhán owwe wábundi-ik keow sáságewitchegaweninne meezhdush kesáságewitchegun Moses azhe anákonegat , che ōnje tebákonumowât .
41001045	Azhe ságáunkdush anetebátotunk kokkinná : Jesusdush kâ ogeniuhe mizzhishshowwinnágwitoseen otanōnk áqutcheiuhe babáiát buhgwutchieeng obeotissáwândush anduswawânugizzewât .
41002001	Minowawdush owwe peendega Capernaumik , gomágo tussokoniguk , uhweendummátinkdush uzzhiát .
41002002	Bâbegadush , kitche nebená anishanâbag mowōnjeittewug , azhe mooshkenat kâ geniuhe peendeeasewug , kâ pâpish kebishquánt che nebowwewât , guhgequawindush oguhgekemán .
41002003	Benánáwândush bazhek wiákoosinit nabowit , newewug bamewinájig .
41002004	Bowotittunk bazhew e-e wegemam , kâdush kushketosewug wepeendegawât azhe puhsuggegâbowewât , otowwe muhmebetōnâwâ uhpuhkojegun eu wegewam , onesebuhgitinánâwâdush nebágun nabowit uhshingeshink .
41002005	Jesusdush wiábundunk omushkâwandumowinewâ otinnân wiákoosinit nabowit , neenguis , kemutche izzhewabizzewin menowweshâwandágwut .
41002006	Ahnintdush oshebe-egaweninnewug emá námátábidjig , enandumōg otaewâng :
41002007	Wagonan wuhow aninne wanje mutche tuzzhemát Kitche Manitōn ? Owwanan gagemenowweshâwandunk mutcheizzhewabizzewin mesuh ween atuh Kitche Manito ?
41002008	Bâbegadush Jesus kakanemát ananduminit , otinnân , wagonan o-o wanje mutche enandumag ketaewâng ?
41002009	Wagonan nowutch wianepunuk che ekettōnk , che enint wiákoozit nabowit , menowweshâwandágwut kemutche izzhewabizzewin , uhgama che ekettōnk otâpenun kenebágun , bamosan ?
41002010	Che ōnje kekandumagdush Aninne Ogiusun ta apetadágooze che menoweshâwandunk mutche izzhewabizzewin , ( otinnân wiákoosenidjin . )
41002011	Ketenin , onishkân otâpenun kenebágun andáyun ezhán .
41002012	Bâbegadush onishkâ ototâpenan onebágun , ane ságáum anosumeskezhik kokkinná ; mamukâtandumōgdush , omenawândush kitchetwâwizzewin Kitche Manitōn , ekettōnk , kâwekâ neengewâbunduhzemin che izzhewabuk .
41002013	Ságáumedush minowâ cheege kitchegumme ezhát , kokkinnádush anishanâbag obeotisigōn , oguhgekemándush .
41002014	Anebamosatdush ningooche owâbomán Levi , Alpheus oguisun , námátábit , tebáummátewinink , otinnândush nopenuhzheshin ; azhe pusegweetdush onopenuhnát .
41002015	Gá izzhewabukdush Jesus magwouh námátábit wegewamink nebená tepáummatewin mowōnjichegajig giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig mámowy ween giya otoskenegamun námátábewug ōnje bátienowug onopenánáwândush .
41002016	Oshebe-egaweninnewugdush giya Phariseeug , wiábomá wât wetopománit mowōnjiehegajig giya miázheninnewuggizzinidjin , otinnáwân otoskenegamun , wagonan wanje wetopomát mowōnjichegaweninnewun , giya miázheninnewuggizzinidjin ?
41002017	Jesusdush n'wândunk , otinnân , manobemátizzidjig , káween we nuhnándowweiggoozissewug , uhgew atuh wiákoozidjig , kâ neembe ōnje ezháse che nundomugwâ manobemátizzidjig , machebemátizzidjig atuh bowōnje ezháyun keche ánwanindizzowât .
41002018	Johndush otoskenegamun , giya Phariseeug otoskenegamewân muhkuttakabuneeg ukko ; obenázekowâwândush otinnáwân , áneen o-o John otoskenegamun , giya Phariseeug otoskenegamewân weenowâ muhkuttakawug ukko , keeendush ketoskenegamug kâ muhkuttakasewug ?
41002019	Jesusdush otinnân , tuh kushkandumōg innuh wâkoongajig magwouh wâwewit owejewegoot ? kâ tamuhkuttakasewug .
41002020	Ope gezhiguk ochichesag che otápenummowwintwâ wáwewenidjin medush che muhkuttakawât .
41002021	Kâ oweuh aninne otáshochegwâtunzeen ōshke manitowajin gata okonâsink , oshkeiuhe me wanje pekoothkág gataiube , owushemádush che banátuk .
41002022	Kâdush oweuh aninne otá attoseen ōshke shomenâbo gata omotáng , omotag ta bekooshkág shomenábodush tá segissa omotagdush ta banátut ; ōshke shomenâbo koshá ōshke omotâng otatōnáwâ .
41002023	Otunneshábooahkowân mandáminun unwabewinnegezhi guk , otoskenegâmundush omuhmebinnáwân muzzákoozeen .
41002024	Phariseeugdush otinnáwân binná wagonan wanje mutche totummowat unwabewinnegezhigut ?
41002025	Otinnândush , kânuh wekâ kewâbunduhzeem mazaniegunink David gá totunk ope bukkutat uhgewedush wâjewâjin buhkuttawât .
41002026	Peendega Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik , magwouh Abiathar ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewe omejindush puhquazhegun wâbundiewang anandágoozit che mejesig sáságewitchegaweninnewug atuh otámejinâwâ , omenándush wâjewâjin ?
41002027	Otinnândush , aninne geozhittowwâ unwabewinnegezhi gut : kâween aninne ge ōnje ozheáse unwabewinnegezhigut .
41002028	Oanje Aninne Oguisun odebandán giya unwabewinnegezhigut .
41003001	Minowawdush gepeendega uhnumeawegummigōnk , bazhekdush aninne nebowweninjeet emá iá .
41003002	Ogunnowâbomáwândush che nojemoát unwabewinnegezhigutinik ningōtōno che mutche tuzzhemáwât .
41003003	Otinnândush neboweninjenidjin emá nussowwiuhe nabowin .
41003004	Otinnândush anishanâban , quiuk nuh tuh izzhewabut mennototumink unwabewinnegezhigut , uhgamá mutche totumink ? che bemájeint oweuh uhgamá che nesint ? Kâdush ningōt ekettosewug .
41003005	Nábinna-ábomát ishketahat osittáwandunk ; otinnândush aninnewun shebinnekanin . Shebinnekanedush , nojemōmugutinnedush mego azhenágwutinik e-e bazhek .
41003006	Phariseeugdush ságáumōg , bâbegadush mámowy Herodianug tebuhgemáwât owwe bátámáwât .
41003007	Jesusdush májá mámowy otoskenegamun , kitchegummeengdush ezháwug nebenádush anishanâbag onopenánáwân Galileeink giya Judeaink wanjebájig .
41003008	Jerusalemink giya Idumeaink , enuhkukkakumik agâmank Jordan , uhgewedush andájig Tyrink giya Zidonink , kitche ozâmenowug , nōndágowâtdush gá ezhe kitche izzhewabizzit , obeotisigōn .
41003009	Otinnândush otoskenegamun che ōndinummowât nábequânans che be-egoot , owwe getiskekowwât .
41003010	Oanje kitche nebená anishanában onojemoát owwe tânginegoot miánuhmunjeowât .
41003011	Mutche Manitōgdush ope wiábomáwât pongesinōg anossumegâbowid ázhequawugdush ekettōnk keensuh Kitche Manito Oguisun .
41003012	Otinnândush che tepâjemigoosig .
41003013	Wudjewinkdush ezhá , onundomándush wâiáwâjin , obeotisigōndush .
41003014	Oguhgeginándush usshe neezhmetoswa che wejewegoot , che uhnonátdush che babákuhgequat :
41003015	Che kushketowât che nojemotowát ákoosewin che sâgitchenázhowâwâtdush Mutche Manitōn .
41003016	Simondush oteshenekânán Peter .
41003017	James Zebedee oguisun giya John wekânisun oteshenekânáwán Boanerges , uzzhatumink , unnemikke oguisun .
41003018	Giya Andrew , giya Philip , giya Bartholomew , Matthew giya Thomas , James Alpheus oguisun , giya Thaddeus , Simon Canaanite ;
41003019	Giya Judas Iscariot ga buhgittenumágat .
41003020	Wegewaminkdush peendegawât , kitche nebená anishanâban minowâ mowōnjeittewug kâdush kushketosewug che mejewât puhquazhegun , kitche ozâmenowug .
41003021	Anowamájindush n'wânduminit ságáumōg owwe meen jimenáwât , ekettowugdush kawunátizze .
41003022	Oshebe-egaweninnewugdush Jerusalemink wanjebájig ekettowug , Beelzebub otiáwân , onezhokomágōn sâgitchewabenát Mutche Manitōn .
41003023	Onundomán otinnândush buhbawatágoozewinink , áneen gagetotunk Mutche Manito che sâgitchewabinat Mutche Manitōn ?
41003024	Ogemáwewindush nezhoittezoot kâ tánebowese e-e ogemáwewin .
41003025	Wegewamdush nezhoittezoot kâ tánebowemugusinōn .
41003026	Mutche Manitodush pusequenotâzoot kâ tánebowese otáwaquâshkán .
41003027	Kâdush oweuh tá peendegase mashkâwizzit aninne owegewamink , meatuh netam tuhkobenát mashkâwizzit aninne che nisshewunnájetowâpun owegewamene .
41003028	Kagat ketenenim , kokkinna mutche izzhewabizzewin menooweshâwandágwut aninnewug oguisewân , kokkinná giya mutche gegetowin .
41003029	Ween atuh ga mutche enát Kitche Manito ochichâgwun kâtuh menoweshâwandágoozisse ga áquo ákewung , tuh nuhnezánese mutche ishkotang .
41003030	Wanje ekettōt , Mutche Manitōn otiáwân ge ekettowát .
41003031	Betuhkoshinōgdush ogeen giya wekânisun nebowwewugdush áqutchink unnokewugdush owwe nundomint .
41003032	Anishanâbagdush ogewetábetowwâwân otinnáwândush , binná keguh giya kekânisug áqutchink iáwug benundowâbomikwâ .
41003033	Nuhquatunk otinnân owwanan innuh neenguh owwananug nekânisug ?
41003034	Onuhbuhnayábomándush uhgew wetábetágoojin , ekettodush binná neenguh giya nekânisug .
41003035	Owwagwan ga totumogwan Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunk me wuhow nekânis , neendowamá , neenguh .
41004001	Minowaw máje guhgequa cheegebeeg kitche gummeeng , mowōnje otissigōndus kitche nebená anishanâban : awe ezhe bozitdush nábequânink námátábedush kitche gummeeng kokkinnádush anishanâbag cheegebeeg iáwug ákeeng .
41004002	Oguhgekemándush nebená kago buhbáwatágoozewinink otinnândush .
41004003	Bezindumōk , binná ketegaweninne ságáum owwe ketegat .
41004004	Saswawabinnegatdush ánint cheegekunuh pongesinōn , benasewugdush bemozhugindánâwân .
41004005	Ahnintdush ásinekâng pongesinōn gwetch ákewunzenōk bâbegadush ge sâguhkewun , ōnje kâ gwetch ákewunzenōn .
41004006	Gezisdush mokuhung ge châgetawun , ōnje kâ gwetch ojebekâwunzenōn , bâbegadush otâpetawun .
41004007	Ahnintdush menasagâwunjeeng pongesinōn : menasagâwunjeendush májegewug ningobemuggigenōn , kâdush mene kânewunzenōn .
41004008	Ahnintdush onissheshink áke pongesinōn negenōndush menekânewunōn , ánint nissemetunuh ánintdush ningōtwassemetunuh , ánint ningōtwâktussenōn .
41004009	Otinnândush owwagwan watowwugâgwan che nōndunk máno tuhnōndum .
41004010	Magwouhdush ezhekawizzit , uhgew babáwejewegoojin mámowy ussheneezhinidjin okuhquájemáwân buhbawatágoozewin .
41004011	Otinnândush , keenowâ kemenigōm che kekandumag kiátuk Kitche Manito otogemáwewinik , uhgewedush áqutchink iájig , kokkinná ono iuheen buhbawatágoozewinink geozhichegâtawun .
41004012	Oanje owâbundánâwâ , kâdush onissetowwenunzenâwâ , nōndumink nōndumōg , kâdush nissetotunzewug , konemá ningoting tá bábemiskotáwug , tá menowweshâwandâgwutdush omutcheizzhewabizzewinewân .
41004013	Otinnândush , kânuh kenissetotunzenâwâ o-o buhbawatágoozewin ? áneendush ga ezhe nissetotumag kokkinná buhbawatágoozewinun ?
41004014	Ketegaweninne ogittegâtán ekettowin .
41004015	Uhgewedush cheegekunuh uhgittegâtag , ekettowin ope ánuh n'wândumowât , bâbegadush tuhkoshin Mutche Manito otâpenunk gegetowin gá gittegâtág otaewâng .
41004016	Uhgewedush gágittegâninjig ásinekâng , n'wândungig ekettowin , bâbegadush mojegandumōg ototâpenánâwádush ekettowin .
41004017	Kâ gwetch ogebekâwissewug weowwewâng kitche wanebeek bemátutōn , náágutchdush kushkandumowin , uhgamá megooshkâtandumowin mokishkâmugut ekettowin ōnje , bâbega nishkâtizzewug .
41004018	Mewug uhgew gá gittegâninjig menasegâwunjekâng , onōndanâwâ ekettowin .
41004019	Kunwandumowindush o-o áke , kuhgianizzewin kitchetwâwizzewin , giya muhnazewinundush ánint iuheen peendegang , kebishkumink gegetowin kâ kago ōnje netáweginzenōn .
41004020	Mewug uhgewdush gá gittegâninjig onissheshink áke : onōndánâwâ ekettowin , ototâpenánâwâdush , netáwigenōndush weágimenun , ánint nissemetunuh ánint ningōtwásemetunuh ánint ningōtwâktussenōn .
41004021	Otinnândush , wâsâkoninjegun innuh betōm anámiuhe tepiegunink che attōng , uhgamâ anamiuhe nebágunink ; che attoseeng wâsâkoninjegunâtigōnk ?
41004022	Kâween kago tuh gátoseem kokkinná tuhbákesin .
41004023	Oweuh watówwuggâgwan che nōndunk máno tuh nōndum .
41004024	Otinnândush tuhtebábundumōk n'wândumag ; ga ezhe bezindumag keguh ezhe kekandám , keenowâdush n'wândumag owushema tuh mená .
41004025	Ween ayát tuh mená , weendush ayâsig tuh otâpenumo wâ menik ayât .
41004026	Ekettodush Kitche Manito otogemáwewin aninneeng azhenágoozewun ogegittegâtánun menekânun ákeeng .
41004027	Nebádush onishkâdush dibbikuk gezhiguk giya , menekânun ságuhkewun máje-eginōn kâ okekanduhzeen azhe iág .
41004028	Ahke onetáwigenōn tebinowa bazhekobuggizzewât , opedush muzzákoozeeg , opedush mooshkenat menugizzewât muzzákoozeeg .
41004029	Nátáwegingin wiábetag pushkooshegun buhgittinegâtag , ōnje mámáwin ochichesa .
41004030	Ekettodush , áneen ga ekettoyán Kitche Manito otogemáwewin azhenágwutinik ?
41004031	Wâsugunk menekânink ezhenágwut , me mámowy âgâsink kokkinná menekânun ope kategâtumink .
41004032	Opedush gágittegâtumink , máje-egin me owushema azheging kokkinná andussink weágushkōn , kitche begobemugut , benasheugdush beuhgewátashemōnōwug anámebemug .
41004033	Nebenádush buhbawatágoozewininik o-o azhenágwuk oguhgekemán anishanában , ga ezhe nondowâwât .
41004034	Kâween uhnōch otezheguhnonáseen , mozhuk buhbawatágoozewinink : azhekawizzewâjindush omizzhisshowwenumowân kokkinná iuheen otoskenegamun .
41004035	Mego e-e gezhiguk wanákooshik , otinnân otoskenegamun , agâmank ezhátá .
41004036	Omájenázhowâwândush kokkinná anishanâban , mego azhe májenâwâtigo uzzhiát nábequánink , nebenâdush nábequânasun owejewegōnun .
41004037	Medush azhe kitche nōdin peendáskádush nábequânink mooshkenabemugut .
41004038	Otákâninkdush nebá pequshemonink , otuhmuhtináwândush , otinnáwân , Neendogemám kânuh kepapámanemesemin , che neboyáng ?
41004039	Onishkâdush oguhnotán nodin , otinnândush kitche gumme , pezân ián , squiánemutdush kitche ánwâtin .
41004040	Otinnândush , wagonan wanje sagizzeyag ? wagonan wanje tabwa-anduhzewag ?
41004041	Kitche sagandumōgdush , mamashkot ittewug , owwanan aninnewenandush wuhow , nodin giya kitche gumme otabwatágōn ?
41005001	Agawmank mazhuhgâwât , andánuhkewât Gadareneug tuhkoshinōg .
41005002	Buhguhbátdush nábequânink , aninnewun bâbega obenuhqushkâgōn , jebagumigōnk beōnje ságáum , Mutche Manitōn gagishkowât .
41005003	Mego andát jebagumtnigōnk , kâdush oweuh aninnewun okushkeiggooseen che tuh kobinnegoot , kâ pâpish pewâbekōn .
41005004	Oanje nuhningin otanuhge tunkobenán pewâbekōn kushkâbegiegunun , obokobetonundush pewâbeko tuhkobitchegunun giya obogobetonun kushkâbegiegunun , kâdush oweuh aninnewun owângoweiggooseen .
41005005	Mozhukdush dibbikuk gezhiguk giya wudjewink iá , giya jebagumigōnk , ázhequat kishkezhootezootdush asineeng .
41005006	Wiábomátdush Jesus , wâsâ ōnje pemebutto owwe ochicheengwunittowât azhequadush ,
41005007	Anegōk , ekettodush , áneen ga totonâng Jesus , ápitche nâgânizzit Kitche Manito Oguisun ? ketuhnumeatōn Kitche Manito ōnje , kago kotuggizzekan .
41005008	Oanje oge-enán , besâgizzenotow keen wânezit Mutche Manito .
41005009	Okuhquajemándush , áneen azhenekâzoyun ? nuhquatunk eketto , menisseno , me wanje ezhenekâzoyán , ozâm enoyáng .
41005010	Otinnândush kago pukân akeeng ezhenázhowâkan Mutche Manitōg .
41005011	Emádush che'gudjew kitche nebená kōkōshug papátuzzhe wesenewug .
41005012	Mutche Manitōgdush otinnáwân , ewada azhenázho-oshinâng beenjinná kōkōshink .
