41005013	Bábegadush Jesus otinnân ezhág ; Mutche Manitōgdush kōkōshun otowwebeenzikowâwân kokkinnádush nesâkewabi-ittewug kishkuttenáng ( neezhink metoswâk tusshewug ) otuhpenawugdush kitche gummeeng .
41005014	Uhgewedush kanowanemájig kōkōshun , oshemowug , tepajemowâtdush kitche otanong euedush ákeeng , ezháwugdush owwewâbundumowât gá izzhewabuk .
41005015	Obeotisigōndush Jesusun , owâbomáwândush gá iáwât . Mutche Manitōn námátábe okonâse quiuk nebwâkâ , sagizzewugdush .
41005016	Uhgewedush gá wâbundungig gá izzhewabuk oweendummowwâwân gá totowwint gegishkowâpun Mutche Manitōn , giya kōkōshun gá izzhewabizzint .
41005017	Okuhquajemáwândush che nuhgutunk andánuhkewât .
41005018	Gá bozitdush nábequânink , wuhow Mutche Manitōn gá-gegishkowwât , okuhquájemán Jesusun chewejewât .
41005019	Jesusdush kâ omenáseen che wejewegoot , otinnândush , kewan , owwe weendummow anowamudjig kitche izzhewabuk gá totágoyun Kitche Manitodush gá ezhe shâwanemik .
41005020	Anemájatdush anemájetepájemo Decapolisink Jesus gá-totágoot , kokkinnádush aninnewug mámuhkâtandumōg .
41005021	Jesusdush gá tuhkuhmo-ōt agâmank kitchegumme : kitche nebená anishanâbag mowōnjeittewug uzzhiat cheege kitche gummeeng .
41005022	Binnádush obeotissegōn nâgânandágoozit uhnumeawegumigōnk Jairus ezhenekâzo , wiábomátdush pongesin ozittánik .
41005023	Anegōk okuhquajemándush , ekettōnk , neendânis kâgâ nebo , betângin che nojemōt che bemátizzit .
41005024	Jesusdush otunnewejewân . Kitche nebená anishanâban , onopenuhnigōn oningwashkowâwândush .
41005025	Equadush ákoozit usshe neezhopepōn ,
41005026	Mozhuk misquewe kitche nebenádush gá kotuggito ánuh nuhnândowweint , kokkinná ogebanájetōn azhetunit otinotawizzewin , kâdush nánazh mennoiáse ánjigo owushema ákooze .
41005027	N'wândunk iát Jesus betângenumowwât obuhbeenzikowagun .
41005028	Ekettodush tânginùmowwugigo okonâsun atuh neenguh nojim .
41005029	Bâbegadush omisquewit bátane , n'wâjemungin innuhmunje oweowink .
41005030	Jesusdush kakanemát , bemenuhningwashkowwint kuhgwatwadush , owwanan tiánginunk neembuhbeenzikowâgun ?
41005031	Otoskenegamundush otigōn , kewâbomág uhgew , bamenuhningwashkōkig ; kedikitdush innuh owwanan tiânginit ?
41005032	Onuhnundowâbomándush equa gá tânginegoojin .
41005033	Equadush sagizzit , nuhningiskâ , kekandunk nojemoint ; bepongesindush anosumenit , oweendummowwân kokkinná quiuk tabwawin .
41005034	Otinnándush , neendânis , kemushkâwandumowin kenōjemoiggoon , máján mennowânegoozin , keguh nojim eu ákoozewin .
41005035	Magwouh uhegetōt beōnjebáwug andát nâgânahdágoozit uhnumeawegumigōnk : ekettowugdush kedânis nebo , wagonan wanje megooshkâcheeowât kiábe ketogemámenán ?
41005036	Jesusdush n'wândowwât aketonit , otinnân nâgânandágoozit uhnumeawegumigōnk , kago sagizzekan , meatuhgo che tabwa-andumun .
41005037	Otiáwândush oweuh che nopenuhnegoosig . Meatuh Peter giya John , giya James , John wekânisun .
41005038	Peendegadush nâgânandágoozk uhnumeawegumigōnk owegawamink , onōndándush ōmbegizzewin , owâbundándush mawenidjin .
41005039	Gá peendegatdush otinnân uhnew , wagonan wanje ōmbegizzeyag mowweyagdush ? Oskenegequa kâween nebose , unish nebá .
41005040	Opâpeáwândush : kokkinná ope gáságitchenázhowât , ototâpenán oskenegequa ōsun giya ōgeen giya otoskenegamun owwe peendega ewada ōskenegequa shingeshink .
41005041	Ototâpenumowân oninjene , otinnândush Talitha cumi , me ánekuhnotumink ōskenegequa onishkân !
41005042	Bâbegadush ōskenegequa onishkâ pusegwedush bamosa ; ussheneezh peponuggizze ; kitche mámuhkâtandumōgdush anishanâbag .
41005043	Ogenummowândush oweuh che kekanduhzenit ; otinnândush che usshumink kago .
41006001	Onuhguhtahndush emá tebinowa andánukeet be-ezhá , otoskonegamundush onopenuhnigōn .
41006002	Unwabewinnegezhigutdush wachichesag májeguhgequa uhnumeawegumigōnk , nebenádush n'wândowâjig mámunkâtandumōg ekettowug , ánde wuhow aninne wandenunk ono iuheen ? wagonan nebwâkâwinnenandush o-o gá menint ? kitche unnokewin wanje gezhetōng oninjeeng ?
41006003	Kânuh wuhow áwisse okotossoweninne Mary oguisun James giya Joses giya Juda giya Simon wekánisun ? kânuh ototowwamán omá kewetegamegoosenáng ? azhe nishkanemáwâtdush .
41006004	Jesusdush otinnán , manitowâzōt kitche apetandágooze meatuh tebinowa andánukeet , magwaiuhedush tebinowa anowamájin tebinowadush owegewamink .
41006005	Kâweendush kago kitche unnokewin totunze emá , meatuh tânginát babazhek wiákoozenidjin nojemoátdush .
41006006	Mámuhkâtandumdush uhtabwatunzikwâ , papáezhádush otanowun papáguggequat .
41006007	Onundomándush ussheneezhinidjin , omajenázhowân , naneezhinit , omenándush mushkâwizzewin che sâgitchenázhowâwât wânezinidjin Mutche Manitōn .
41006008	Otinnândush kago che mâchetosigwâ bábámátizzewât , meatuh sukkáoon , kâween kago mashkemoot kâ giya kago puhquazhegun kâ giya shoneá ketotossowinnewâng .
41006009	Meatuh onuhnuhgákezitánewâng punge omuhkezinnewât : kago beezekunkago neezh beenzikowâgunun .
41006010	Otinnândush ningooche otanowun iotittumag , wiazhkutigo eu wegewam che peendegayag me mozhuk che abeyag nánazh che nuhgutumag emá .
41006011	Owwagwandush ga papámanemisenogwan , ga bezindosenogwan wenuhguhtumagdush emá , bowwissetanik weágusseun che ōnje kekandumowât uhmutchetotumowât : kagat ketenenim nowutch tuh onissheshin Sodom giya Gomorrah eu gezhigut tebákonegawin kâween ween eu otanuh .
41006012	Májáwugdush papáguggequawât aninnewug keche ánwanindizzowât .
41006013	Osâgitchewabenáwândush nebená Mutche Manitōn , uhsinnegonáwádush pemeta wiákoozenidjin , nojemoándush .
41006014	Heroddush kitche ogemá , onondágunun [ otonozowin kitche tatakosana , ] ekettodush John Baptist ge ábejebá , me ōnje kitche unnokewinun wâbundi-ittewug ween ōnje .
41006015	Ahnintdush ekettowug , ween Elias , ánintdush ekettowug , bazhek manitowâzōt uhgamá manitowâzōt anandágooze .
41006016	Heroddush n'wândunk eketto , me wuhow John gá gishkequashogebun , ábejebá .
41006017	Oanje Herod uhgeunnokeet uhgetuhkonint uhge owwâkânint Herodias ōnje wekânisun Philip owewun , ōnje uhgewewit .
41006018	Johndush uhge-enán Herod kâ quiuk izzhewabusinōn che weweyun kekânis wewun .
41006019	Me eu ōnje Herodias onishkanemán , neendágenesan enandum , unish kâ kushketose .
41006020	Oanje Horod ogegosán Johnun , kekanemint quiuk uzzhizzewabizzit giya manitowâzōt , otukkowâbomán n'wândowâtdush kitchenebená uhnōch kago ogeōzhetōn , onōndowândush pâpenanemowinink .
41006021	Ningōtink gezhigut wachichesag Herod onegewinne gezhigut , wekoonga okitchetwâweninnemun , shemágunisshe ogemág ogemágdush Galileeink .
41006022	Herodias odânisun bándegat , nemedush kitche meenwandunk Herod giya wâjewâjin : kitche ogemádush otinnân oskenegequawun wagotogwanigo ga nundotummowwewunan keguh menin .
41006023	Anápegeezhwât , otinnândush wagōtōgwanigo ga nundotummowwewunan keguh menin kagat kishpin ábetá neendogemáwewin .
41006024	Ságáum uzzhezhát ōgeen , otinnândush , wagonan ganundotumán ? ekettodush , John Baptist ōshtegwan .
41006025	Bâbegadush bebeendega otinnândush kitche ogemán ápadush ná-águtch mezheun onágunink John Baptist ōshtegwân .
41006026	Kitche ogemâdush geositáwandum , odikitowin koshá ōnje giva uhgew wâjewâjin ōnje kâ owwe ágoonwatowwâse .
41006027	Bâbegadush kitche ogemá unnoke che kishkegwazho-ōnt medush azhe kishkegwazhwâwât kepáquotewegumigōnk .
41006028	Obetōnâwâdush ōshtegwân , onágunink unmenint ōskenegequa ōskenegequadush omenán ōgeen .
41006029	Otoskenegamundush n'wánduminit obeotápenánâwâ obikkoweow owwe attowwât jebagumigōnk .
41006030	Uhgewedush anōninjig mowōnjeittewug Jesus uzzhiát oweendummowwândush kokkinná gá papá-andotummowât , papáguggequawâtdush .
41006031	Otinnândush be ezhág buhgwuttuhkumigáng unwashemōnōyeuk : onje nebená tuhkoshinōg , májáwugdush , kâ geni uhe wesenesewug .
41006032	Bukkawinittewugdush buhgwuttuhkumigáng nábequânink gemōch .
41006033	Anishanâbagdush wâbomáwân , májánit nebenádush okekanemáwân , bechebi-ittewugdush che ezháwât emá , kokkinnádush otanowun iōnjebi-ittewug mowōnjeittewât emá uzzhiát .
41006034	Jesusdush buhságáunk kitche nebená owâbomán anishanâban , ogeshâwanemándush , ōnje manishtanishink enandágoozewug , kâ oweuh kunnowanemiggoosewân : máje guhgekemándush nebená kago .
41006035	Ane onákooshik otoskenegamun obeotisigōn , ekettowugdush buhgwuttuhkumigá o-o shegwouh ozâm onákooshik .
41006036	Ningooche ezhenázhuh otanong che ezháwât che kishpinutâzowât puhquazhegun , ōnje kâ kago omejesenâwâ .
41006037	Otinnândush nuhquatunk , meezh gamejewât , otinnâwândush , neenguhtowwe kishpinuttōmin innuh kitche nebená puh quazhegun che usshumintwâ ?
41006038	Otinnândush áneendushwâtik puhquazhegun iáyag ? owwe wâbundumōk ; gá kekandumowât ekettowug , nánwâtik , neezhdush kegoiug .
41006039	Otinnândush che wejeendewât onámátábeándush ozâwushquâshkánik .
41006040	Nánebenabewug naningōtwâk , nanámetunnuhdush .
41006041	Watâpenunkdush nánwâtik puhquazhegun giya neezh kegoiug , gezhigōnk enábe uhnumeátdusn , obokobetōn puhquazhegun omenán otoskenegamun che attonit anosumubenit , neezhdush kegoiun omátáonán kokkinná .
41006042	Kokkinnádush wesenewug getabisinewugdush .
41006043	Ototâpenáwâdush usshe neezh metoswa kokobenágunun mooshkenawun menik ashqundummowât puhquazhegun giya kegoiug .
41006044	Gá wesenidjig nánun metoswâkoosewug .
41006045	Bâbegadush otinnân otoskenegamun che bozinit nábequânink che negânōnit agâmank che ezhánit Bethsaida , magwouh ningooche owwe izzhenázhowât anishanâban .
41006046	Gá májenázhowâtdush wudjewink ezhá owwe uhnumeát .
41006047	Wanákooshikdush nábequân nowwugâm iá , weendush ezheke âkeeng iá .
41006048	Owâbomán anegōk uzzhabowa-ánit , ōnjishkâwuhuhmōk washkedibbikutinik otezhánun ogittebeeg ane bamosa wâguhbikkotátingin otunnetotowwân .
41006049	Wiabomáwât ogittebeeg bamosanit , jebám enandumōg ázhequawugdush .
41006050	[ Kokkinná wiábomáwât kitche ojânemandumōgdush ] bâbegadush oguhnonán otinnândush , meenwandumōk , neen koshuh , kago sagizze kago .
41006051	Otunnenázekowán nábequánink , bonánemutdush , medush kitche sagandumōg kitche mámukâtandumōg .
41006052	Kâ omámenonanduhzeenâwâ gátotunk puhquazhegun , ōnje otaewân mushkâwânewun .
41006053	Gá tuhkuhmo-owâtdush ákeeng Gennesaret gebe-ezháwug kuhbáwugdush .
41006054	Gábegwâshkonitdush nabequânink , bâbega okekanemáwân .
41006055	Máje mowōnjeittewugdush emá andánuhkejig babámewetowât nábequânun wiákoozidjig , n'wândtimowât uzzhiát .
41006056	Kokkinná uzzhunnebábeendegat otanowun kitche otanowun giya otunnuhkewin , mikunâng otusáwân wiákoozenidjin , okuhquajemáwân che tângenumowâwât ishquaiuhe obuhbeen zikowâgun , menikdush tiángenáwât nojemowug .
41007001	Bemowoanjeittewugdush beotisáwât Phariseeug ánintdush oshebe-egaweninnewug Jerusalemink wanjebájig .
41007002	Wiabomáwâtdush ánint otoskenegamun uhmejewât puhquazhegun weeneninjewât , ( bwâ kesebegeninjewât , ) osittâwanemáwân .
41007003	Oanje Phariseeug kokkinná giva Jewug , kâwesenesewug bwâ kesepekeninjewât okunwandánâwâ gata ezhetwâwin .
41007004	Ahtáwawininkdush ōnjebáwât kâwesenesewug bwâ baptizewawât nebenádush uhnōch kago otepieganâwâ , minequâchegânsun , giya ákekōn giya ozâwâbeek onágunun giya otopowinun , obaptizewawin .
41007005	Phariseeugdush giya oshebe-egaweninnewug okuhquajemáwân , wagonan wanje kunwanduhzikwâ gata ezhetwâwin ketoskenegamug uhwesenewât bwâ kesepekeninjewât ?
41007006	Oguhnonándush otinnân , quiuk Esaias áshia kegetuzzhemigowâ , kagianizeyag , azhebe-egâtagigo , uhgew anishanâbag kache twâwanemidjig azhe guhnozhewât otonewâng , otaewândush kitche wâsâ attanewun .
41007007	Kâ ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn uhnumeatowwewât guhgequawinun ōnje aninnewug otezhetwâwinewân .
41007008	Oanje wabenuming Kitche Manito oguhgequawin kekunwandánâwâ aninnewug oguhgequawinewân , ákekōg giya menequâchegânsun obaptizewawin uhnōch giya kago oßo ezhenágwuk andotumag .
41007009	Otinnândush kagat koshá kewabenanâwâ Kitche Manito oguhgequawin owwe kunwandumag tebinowa ketizzhetwâwinnewâ .
41007010	Oanje Moses ge eketto kitchetwâwanim kōs keguh giya owwagwandush ganishkâtenumowagwan ōsun gama ōgeen máno tuh ápiche nebo .
41007011	Keenowâdush ekettoeyag owagwan ga enagwan ōsun gama ōgeen Korban , me che ekettōnk menetink , owagotogwar neen ga ōndizzewagwan , tuh wânuhke .
41007012	Kâ ningot minowâ oguh inábuhcheigoosen ōsun gamá ōgeen ekettoeyag .
41007013	Me eu azhe banájetoyag Kitche Manito oguhgequawin tebinowa ketizzhetwâwinewâ weioeyag ; nebenádush uhnōch ono azhenágwuk ketotám .
41007014	Gá nundomátdush kokkinná anispanâban , otinnân , bezindowweshig nissetotumōk kokkinná andussheyag .
41007015	Kâween eu bándegamuggutinik otōnink obánájeiggooseen aninne : siáguhumomuggutinik otōnink aninne me banájeiggoot .
41007016	Owwagwan watowwugâgwan che nōndunk , máno tuh nōndum .
41007017	Gá unne nuhgunát anishanâban unnebeendegat otoskenegamun uzzhiánit okuhquâjemigōn o-o buhbawatágoozewin .
41007018	Otinnândush kâ nuhgwuhnuh keenowâ kenissetotunzeem , kânuh kekekanduhzeem bándegamugutinik otōnink aninne kâ otábanâjeiggooseen .
41007019	Kâween otaing ezhámugusininne , omisutáng ezhámugutinne shábooshkágoondush metuhkummik .
41007020	Ekettodush ságáumomugutinik anineeng , me bánajeiggoot aninne .
41007021	Oanje ságáummomugutinik otaewâng aninnewug , mutche enandumowin , bisshegwâtizzewin , nesittewin ,
41007022	Kemotewin , suhságizzewin , mutche bemátizzewin , kuhgianizewin , guhgepátizzewin .
41007023	Kokkinná ono beenjinná aninne ōnjebámugutinnewun me bánájeigoot aninne .
41007024	Pusegwedush nuhgutunkdush emá , enuhkuhkakumik Tyre giya Zidon ezhá , peendegadush wegewamink oweuh che kekanemigoosig , kâdush kushketose wegázōt .
41007025	Bazhekdush equa odânisun wânezinidjin Mutche Manitōn ogegishkowwân nōndunk uzzhiát be-ezhá bepongesin ozitâng .
41007026	( Wuhow Greek equawe Cyropheneciaink andánukeet , ) okuhquájemán che sâgitchewabenát Mutche Manitōn odânisun .
41007027	Jesusdush otinnân , uhbenocheug netam tuh tabeginewug , kâ onissheshinzenōn uhbenocheug opuhquazhegunewâ , che muhkumintwâ anemōgdush che oppuggetowwintwâ .
41007028	Equadush otinnân , kagat Neendogemám , anemōg koshá anáme uhtopowin , omejinâwâ uhbenocheug báwebetowât puhquazhegun .
41007029	Otinnândush equawun , o-o ekettowin ōnje , ezhán , kedânis Mutche Manitōn geságáumōn .
41007030	Buhtuhkoshinkdush andát , okekanemán Mutche Manitōn gesâgizzenotágoot odânisun , odânisunduah nebágunink shingeshinōn .
41007031	Minowâ nagutunk emá enuhkuhkakumink Tyre giva Zidon , be-ezhá kitche gummeeng Galilee nowwiuhe tuhnuhkewin Decapplis .
41007032	Betowwâdush bazhek kagebeshanidjin kâ giya netágegetose , okuhauájemáwândush che tânginát .
41007033	Pemaiuhedush ezhewinná , beenjeninjene otowwuggânink , osikowâgundush otângesittowwân otanuhnewinne .
41007034	Gezhigōnkdush enábe , ázhenámōn , otinnândush Ephphatha , uzhekettōnk , tuh bákishkâwun .
41007035	Bâbegadush otowwugun bákishkânewun , otanuhnewdush gashuhwishkâne gegetōdush wawane .
41007036	Otinnândush aninnewun oweuh che weendumowâsigwâ : owushemadush obemetebátotánâwâ .
41007037	Kitche ozâm mámukâtandumōg ekettowug , kokkinná kago kitche menototum , kagebisshánidjin otezheán che nōnduminit , giya netágegetosinit che netágegetonit .
41008001	Ono gezhigutōn , kitche ozâm enowug emá ayájig , kâdush kago ogeiásenâwâ gamejewât , Jesusdush onundomán otoskenegamun otinnândush .
41008002	Neshâwanemág anishanâbag , ōnje nisogwun newejewegōg kâdush ōnje wesenesewug .
41008003	Kewanázhowugwâ bwâ wesenewât tá unnenōndawunnemikkowwewug ningooche , ánint kitche wâsâ ōnjebáwug .
41008004	Otoskenegamundush oguhnonigōn , ánde ga ōndinumunk puhquazhegun che ushumintwâ kokkinná uhgew , emá buhgwuttuhkumigáng ?
41008005	Okuhquájemándush , áneendushwâtik puhquazhegun ayáyag ? otinnáwândush neezhwâswa .
41008006	Otinnândush anishanâban che námátábenit michiuhe , ototâpenándush neezhwâswâtik puhquazhegun , azhe uhnumeát azhe bokobetōt , omenándush otoskenegumim che buhgitenummowât anosumábit anishanâban , azhe buhgittenummowâtdush anosumábit anishanâban .
41008007	Punge otiáwândush kegoizansun , uhnumeádush otinnândush che buhgitinumowât anosumábenit anishanâban .
41008008	Weesinewug , getabesenewugdush , ototâpenánâwâ neezhwâswa kokobenágunun mooshkenawun menik ashqundumowât .
41008009	Gá wesenidjig newinmetoswâkoosetoganug : azhe májenázhowâtdush .
41008010	Bâbegadush owwe bōzewug nábequânink azhe ezháwât enuhkuhkakumik Dalmanutha .
41008011	Phariseeugdush tuhkoshinōg , omáje kuhquajemáwân , che wâbundi-iggowât kitche unnokewin gezhigōnk ōnje , uhkuhgwadebanemigoot .
41008012	Kitche ázuhnámo ochichâgōnk , ekettodush , wagonan wanje kuhgwatwawât uhgew anishanâbag kitche unnokewin ? kagat ketenenim kâween kago unnokewin tuh wâbunduhásewug uhgew anishanâban .
41008013	Onuhguhnándush owwe boze nábequânink , agámank uzzhezhát .
41008014	Gewunnekawugdush we otâpenumowât puhquazhegun bazhekwâtik atuh otiáwân nábequânink .
41008015	Otinnândush tuhtebábig , kago tângenunkago , wanje ōmbishkág puhquazhegun Phariseeug giya Herod .
41008016	Ekettowug guhguhnonetizzowât , me eu uzzhiásewung puhquazhegun
41008017	Jesusdush kekandunk otinnán , wagonan wanje guhguhnoneteyag uzzhiásewag puhquazhegun ? kâ nuhgwuhnuh kenissetotunzeem ? ketaewân innuh gemushkâwâchegâtawun ?
41008018	Ketoskezhigōm ; kânuh kewabeseem ? ketotowwugim ; kânuh kenōnduhzeem ? kánuh kekunwandumáseem ?
41008019	Gábegobetoyán puhquazhegun nánwâtik magwaiuhe nánun metoswâk aninnewun áneenmenik kokobenágunun ashqunduming gá májetoeyag ? otinnáwândush , usshe neezh metoswa .
41008020	Neezhwâswâtik puhquazhegunundush magwa newin metoswâk , áneen menik kokobenágunun ashquadumink gá májetoyag ? otinnáwândush , neezhwâswa .
41008021	Otinnáwândush , áneen o-o azhe nissetotunzewag ?
41008022	Betuhkoshindush Bethsaidaink , betowwâ , kagebeengwanidjin aninnewun , kuhquajemáwândush che tânginát .
41008023	Osuginnekanán kagebeengwanidjin ahqutchink otanuh otezhewenan , osikwâtumowândush oskezhigōne , otângenumowân okuhquájemándush che wâbit .
41008024	Ishpemink enábe ekettodush , newâbomág aninnewug metigōg bamosawâjin inábomenágoozewug .
41008025	Minowâdush otângenumōwân oskezhigōne , guhgâzo mándush ishpemink che enábenit , medush wâweenga nōjemōt kokkinnádush aninnewun owâbomán wawane .
41008026	Kewanázhowândush andánit , ekettodush , kago otanōnk ezhákan , kago oweuh weendumowâkan , otanong .
41008027	Jesusdush mámowy otoskenegamun , otanowun Caesarea Philippi ezhá ; mikunângdush okuhquájemán otoskenegamun , otinnândush owwanan wiáweán azhewât aninnewug ?
41008028	Otinnâwândush John Baptist , ánintdush Elias , ánintdush bazhek manitowâzōt .
41008029	Otinnândush , owwanan wiáweán keenowâ aketoyag .
41008030	Peterdush otinnân , keensuh Christ : otinnândush , kago oweuh weendummowwâ kago .
41008031	Miáje guhgequadush , Aninne Osuisun tuh guhgwâtuggito nebená kago , ekettodush , okewanzeug neenguh wabinegōg giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , neenguh nesegōgdush genissokoniguk neenguh ábejebá .
41008032	O-o ekettowin mizzhishshowwinágwut . Peterundush ototâpinnegōn májeguhnonigoot .
41008033	Bábemushkotátdush gunnowâbomátdush otoskenegámun , ogesheguhnonán Peterun ekettōnk , neempikwunâng ezhán Mutche Manito , ōnje kâ kemenânduhzenun Kitche Manito tabandunk , meatuh aninne tabandunk manândumun .
41008034	Gá nundomát anishanâban giya otoskenegamun , otinnân uhnew , owwagwan ganopenuhzhegwan tuh tebanindizzo , tuh kuhgwadebanindizzo che nopenuhznit .
41008035	Owwagwan ga nojemotogwan obemátizzewin , oguhwunetōn ; owwagwandush ga wunnetogwan obemátizzewin neen ōnje , giya meenwâjemowin ōnje oguh bemájetōn .
41008036	Wagonan ga ōndizzegwan aninne , kishpin ánuh tebandunk kokkinná o-o áke , che wunnetōt ochichâgwun ?
41008037	Ungamá wagonan ga mashkotonungebun ochichâgwun .
41008038	Owwagwan ga águtchetowwegwan neen giya neendikittowinun magwaiuhe o-o bisshegwâtizzidjig giya mázheninnewuggizzidjig anishanában , ween Aninne Oguisun tuh águtche ope tuhkoshink , ōsun ogitchetwâwizzewinink mámowy omezhinowamun .
41009001	Otinnawndush uhnew , kagat ketenenim , ánint uhgew omá nábowidjig kâ oguhkekanduhzeenâwâ nebowin , chebwâ wâbomáwât Kitche Manito otogemáwewin betuhkoshink mushkâwizzewinink .
41009002	Gáningōt wâswokoniguk Jesus ototâpenán , Peterun , Jamesun , giya Johnun , kitche ishpuhtenánink wudjewink ezheke : pukkândush ezhenâgooze anosummegâbowewât .
41009003	Agwidjin wâkashkânewun , gōnink ezhewâbishkânewun , kâween oweuh nowutch otá wâbeshkâtosenun .
41009004	Wâbundiewawug weowwewân Elias mámowy Moses guhguhnonittewât Jesus .
41009005	Pelerdush oguhnonân otinnân Jesusun , Neendogemám , onissheshin omá che iyángebun , neenguh ozhetomen niswa wegewamun bazhek keen ōnje , bazhek Moses , bazhekdush Elias ōnje .
41009006	Kâ okekanduhzeen gá ekettōt , ōnje kitche sagizzewug .
41009007	Ahnáqutdush beuhguhwâtasana , gegetowindush beōnjesa ánáqutōnk , ekettōnk , me wuhow siágeug neenguis : bezindowwik .
41009008	Bâbegadush nundowâbewug , kâdush oweuh owâbomásewân aninnewun , meatuh Jesus giya weenowâ tebinowa .
41009009	Buhnesákewawâtdush otinnân kago oweuh weendummowwâ kago gá wâbundumag chebwâ Aninne Oguisun ge ábejebát .
41009010	Okunwandánâwâdush eu ekettowin , kuhguhquajindewugdush mamashkōt , wagonan eu ábejebáwin atumink ?
41009011	Okuhquajemáwândush ekettōnk , wagonan wanje ekettowât oshebe-egaweninnewug Elias netam che tuhkoshink ?
41009012	Guhguhnonán otinnân , Elias kagat netam tuhtuhkoshin , nayáb chebe uttōt kokkinná kago , oshebe egâtadush Aninne Oguisun , tuh guhgwâtuggito nebená kago kâdush oweuh oguh papámanemiggooseen .
41009013	Ketenenimdush Elias ázhia getuhkoshin , anandummowâtigodush ototowâwân , azhebe-egâtanik .
41009014	Bowotissátdush otoskenegámun , owâbomán kitche nebená anishanâban papámikkágowât oshebe-egaweninnewugdush guhguhnonittewât .
41009015	Bâbegadush anishanâbag , ope wiábomáwât , kitche mámukâtandumōg , omowwinna nuhnáwân unnemikkowwâwât .
41009016	Okuhquajemándush oshebe-egaweninnewun wagonan kaquajemagwâ uhgew ?
41009017	Bazhekdush anishanâba oguhnonán , ekettodush neenguis neembená , netágegetosig Mutche Manitōn otiáwân :
41009018	Ningoochego tiabebinnegoojin , begobinnegōn betawetōn , papáquayábetáshemono , neendánuhgebetowwâgdush ketoskenegamug che sâgitchenázhowâwât , kâdush okushkeásewân .
41009019	Oguhnonândush otinnân , oh anishanâbag tiabwatunzikwâ áneen menik gawejewinuhgook ? áneen menik ga megooshkâcheinnuhgook ? Betowweshig .
41009020	Obetowâwân , opedush wiábomát , bâbega Mutche Manitōn otátōskágōn , ákeengdush pongesin , tittebeta betawetōn .
41009021	Okuhquajemigōndush ōsun , áneen o-o watisekágōpun , ekettodush magwouh uhbenoche-ewit .
41009022	Nuhningim ishkotang oppuginán , naningōtinōnkdush nebeeng che nisshewunnájeint : kushketoyun ningotono che totowut ketá shâwanememe che nezhokomowweyâng .
41009023	Jesusdush otinnân kishpin tabwatumun , kokkinná gagekushketōm .
41009024	Bâbegadush ōsun uhbenoche , ázhequa ekettodush , gegizzebeeng uhmowwit , Neendogemám neendabwatum , nojemōtōn uhtabwatunzewân .
41009025	Jesusdush wiábomát anishanâban , mowundobi-ittenit nishkâcheguhnonán Mutche Manitōn , otinnândush ; netágegetosig giya kagebisshayun Manito , beságáun , kago minowâ beenzikowâkan .
41009026	Mutche Manitodush ázhequa , otátōshkâwân obesâgizzenotowwân ; bazhek gá nebōng ezhenágooze , nebenádush ekettowug , nebo .
41009027	Jesusdush osuggeninjenán , ōmbinát , onishkâtdush .
41009028	Gábeendegatdush wegewamink , otoskenegamun okuhquajemigōn áneen neenowint azhe kuskeásewungid , che sâgitchenazhowungid ?
41009029	Otinnândush uhnew , o-o tinouh , kâween uhnish otákushkeáseen oweuh che sâgitchenázhowât , meatuh muhkuttakang giya uhnumeáng .
41009030	Azhe nuhguttunk emá ane shábooshkân Galileo , kâ enanduhze oweuh aninnewun che kekandumenit .
41009031	Oguhgekemán otoskenegamun , otinnândush Aninne Oguisun buhgittinnemátinun aninnewug oninjewâng , oguh nesáwân , genesintdush , tuh ábejebá niswokonigutinik .
41009032	Kâdush nissetotunzewug eu ekettowin , shâgwanemowugdush we kuhquajemáwât .
41009033	Buhtuhkoshinkdush Capernaumink , gápeendegat wegewamink okuhquajemán , wagonan o-o buhtuhzhindumag buhuhpezekáyang ?
41009034	Kâdush oguhnonásewân , ōnje buhuhpezekáwât gemōch gebeittewug owwanan owushema apetandágoozit :
41009035	Gánámátábit onundomán ussheneezninidjin otinnândush , owwagwan owushema gawe apetandumogwan me nōndás ga apetandágozit che pemetowâtdush kokkinná .
41009036	Ototápenandush uhbenocheun , nowwiuhedush onámátábeân , watápenájin onikâng otinnân uhnew :
41009037	Owwagwan ga shâwanemágwan uhbenocheun , o-o azhenágoozinidjin neenduhnozowinink , neenigo neenguh monototag , owwagwandush ga menototowwegwan , kâween neen atuh omennototágoose omennototowân giya biezhenázhuhonidjin .
41009038	Johndush oguhnonán otinnân , Neendogemám neengewâbománán aninne sâgitchenázhowât Mutche Manitōn ketuhnozowinink , kâdush newebewejewegoosenán , neenge nuhgânánándush ōnje kâ newebewejewegoosenán .
41009039	Jesusdush otinnân , kago nuhgânákago , kâ oweuh aninne kitche unnokewin tátotunze neenduhnozowinink ga mutchetuzzhemit .
41009040	Ween wasittowwanemisenowunk , kemámowizzemin .
41009041	Owwagwan ga menienogwan , ningo menequâchegun nebe che menequayag ōnje kewejewâ Christ , kagat ketenenim , kâ oguhwunnetoseen otepáummágowin .
41009042	Owwagwandush ga nishkeiggōgwan bazhek uhnew babewizzheinidjin tiabwatowwenit , nowutch attow onissheshin , besebochegunábekōn nápekonint pukkobenintdush , kitchegummeeng .
41009043	Kishpindush keninj ōnje mutche izzhewabizzeyun , kishkeshun nowutch attow onissheshin che mákizzeun , che bemátizzeyun , che neezhink keninjeen gâgega mutche ishkotang che tunnákezoyun :
41009044	Emá mosa kâwekâ nebose , ishkota kâwekâ attasenōn .
41009045	Kishpin kezit ōnje mutche izzhewabizzeyun , kishkeshun nowutch attow onissheshin che mákizzeun cháwishkâeyun che bemátizzeyun che neezhink kezittun , gâgega mutche ishkotang che tunnákezoyun .
41009046	Emá mosa kâwekâ nebose , ishkota kâwekâ attasenōn .
41009047	Kishpindush keskezhik ōnje mutche izzhewabizzeyun , kechebetōn nowutch attow onissheshin , che bazhekwung keskezhik che peendegayun Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink , che nezhink keskezhigōn , gâgega mutche ishkotang che tunnákezoyun :
41009048	Emá mosa kâwekâ nobose , ishkota kâwekâ attasenōn .
41009049	Kokkinnádush tuh shewetágunuhwâwug ishkota ōnje , kokkinnádush sáságewitchegun tuh shewetágunâwâwug shewetágunink .
41009050	Shewetágun onissheshin : shewetábanátuk shewetágunnewung , áneen ga ge ezhe shewetágunnetōng ? Ketá shewetágunewim keowwewâng che innuhwandeyag .
41010001	Pusegwedush , nuhguttunkdush emá , obeotittán cheegebeeg kitchegummeeng Judea agâmank Jordan , anishanâbagdush obeotisegōn , minowâdush andotunk ukko ototowân , oguhgekemán .
41010002	Phariseeugdush obeotisegōn , okuhquajemigōndush , kuhgwadebanemigōn quiuk innuh tátotum aninne wabenát wewun ?
41010003	Otinnândush , áneen Moses gá eninág ?
41010004	Ekettowug , Moses ge eketto oshebe-ummowwint mazaniegun menint che wabenint .
41010005	Jesusdush otinnân nuhquatunk Moses kege oshepeummágowâ eu guhgequawin wanje uhmushkawizzemuguk ketaewân .
41010006	Wiazhkut koshuh ozhetōng , Kitche Manito oge ozheán aninnewun equawun giya ,
41010007	Me eu ōnje aninne oguhnuhguhnán ōsun ōgeen giya wewun che názekowât .
41010008	Uhgew neezh tuh bazhekowug , kâween minowâ tuh neezhissewug bazhekowug .
41010009	Eudush Kitche Manito mámowwittōt , kâ oweuh aninne oguhbogobetoseen .
41010010	Beendik wegewamink , otoskenegamun okuhquajemigōn minowâ mebego eu .
41010011	Otinnândush owwagwan ga webenágwan wewun chewewitdush bakânizzidjin , bisshegwâtizze .
41010012	Equa giya ga wabenât onâbamun , onâbamitdush bakânizinidjin , bisshegwâtizze .
41010013	Opedush ōshke uhbenocheun , betowwâwân che tanginát , otoskenegamun oge ezhe guhnonáwân bánánidjin .
41010014	Jesusdush wiábomát andotumowât , kâ meenwanduhze , otinnândush máno uhbenocheug neenguhbenázekágōg , kago nuhguhnázhowâkago , uhgew azhenágoozidjig Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink iáwug .
41010015	Kagat ketenenim , owwagwan uhbenocheing azhe tuhbuhsanemosegwan Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink kâ tuh peendegase .
41010016	Ototâpenándush onikâng , otânginát oninjeeng , oshawanemátdush .
41010017	Ságáunkdush , mikunâng anetuhkoshink bazhek obeōtigōn obeochicheengwunittágōn okuhquajemigōn , manoizzhewabizzit Neendogemám , áneen gaizzhewabizzeán , che gâgega bemátizzeyán ?
41010018	Jesusdush otinnân , wagonan mennoizzhewabizze wanje ezheun ? kâween oweuh mennoizzhewabizzisse meatuh bazhek ; Kitche Manito .
41010019	Kekekandánun guggequawinun , kago bisshegwâtizzekan , kago nisshewakan , kago kemotekan , kago guhgenowishkekan , kago wiazhemákan oweuh , kitchetwâwanim kōs keguh giya .
41010020	Oguhnonándush otinnân , Neendogemám , kokkinná uhnew neenge kunwandânun ga áquo uhbenoche-eweyán .
41010021	Jesusdush oguhnowâbomán , ogeságeán , otinnândush , bazhek kago kemuhnazin , owwe átáwan kokkinná anduhneun ketebinowawizzewin , katemákizzidjig meezh , ketebinowawizzewindush keguhtián gezhigōnk , ōndás , kuhgwadebanindizzoon , benopenuhzheshin .
41010022	Euedush ekettowin , me wanje kushkandunk , ōnje kitche wânuttizze medush azhe máját nuhguhnat .
41010023	Jesusdush gewetáiuhe enábe , otinnândush otoskenegamun , tuhkitche sunnágut uhgew wiánuttizzidjig che peendegawât Kitche Manito otogemáwéwinnink .
41010024	Otoskenegamundush mámukkâtandumōg o-o ekettowin , Jesusdush , oguhguhnonán otinnân minowâ , uhbenocheittōk , tuh kitche sunnágut uhgew siágetojig tebinowawizzewin , che peendegawât Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
41010025	Nowutch wanepunut kitche áwase che shábooshkunk shebákecheánik sháponegun , kachetebinowawizzit aninne che peendegat Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
41010026	Kitche ozâm mámukkâtandumōg , i-ittewugdush , owwagwan gagegâgegabematizzit ?
41010027	Jesusdush ogunnowâbomán ekettodush , aninne kâ tá kushketose , Kitche Manito atuh otákushketōn .
41010028	Peterdush omáje enán , binnâ , neengenuhguhtámin kokkinná kago , che nopenuhnegoyung .
41010029	Jesusdush nuhquatunk otinnân , kagat ketenenim , kâ oweuh aninne , oguhnuhguttunzeen wegewam , gamá wekânisun , otowwamán , ōsun , ōgeen , wewun , onejânisun , otuhkeem , neenduhnozowinink , giya meenwâjemowinink ōnje ,
41010030	Ningōtwâkmenik owushema oguhtiánun , nōngum bemátizzit , wegewamun , giya wekânisun , otowwamán , ogemág , onejânisun , otuhkeem kotuggizzewindush mámowy ; minowâdush che ákewung , che gâgegabemátizzit .
41010031	Nebenádush nōngum nâgânandágoozidjig ; nōndás tuh apetandágoozewug ; uhgewedush nōngum nōndás apetandágoozidjig , tuh negânandagoozewug .
41010032	Pezekáwugdush , shezháwât Jerusalemink ; Jesus unnenegâne , mámukkâtandumōgdush ; anenopenánáwât sagizzewugdush . Minowâdush ototâpenán usshe neezhenidjin , májedush weendummowwân ga izzhewabizzit .
41010033	Ekettōnk , binná , Jerusalemink ketezhámin ; Aninne Oguisundush tuhbuhgittenumátinun , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , giya oshebe-egaweninnewug ; tuhbuhgittinummowâwug oguh buhgittinummowâwândush che nebonit , miátáwizzidjigdush tuh menáwug ;
41010034	Oguhi-innowâwân , oguh pâpenotowwâwân , oguh buhshunzhawâwân , oguhsikwânáwân , oguhnissáwân ; geniswokonigukdush tuh ábejebá .
41010035	Jamesdush giya John , Zebedee oguisun , obenázekágōn , ekettowugdush , Neendogemám , ápádush totowweyáng azhe nundotumonáng .
41010036	Otinnândush , wagonan nandowwanemag che totonuhgook ?
41010037	Otinnáwândush , mezheshinâng , che námátábeyáng bazhek kekitchenikâng , bazhekdush kenuhmunjenikâng kekitchetwâwizzewinink .
41010038	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ , nandotumag : ketá menequachegam innuh nemenequâchegun ? ketá baptizemigōm innuh neembaptizemigōwin ?
41010039	Otinnáwândush , neendákushketomin , Jesusdush otinnân , kagat keguh menequâcheganâwâ nemenequâchegun ; keguh baptizemigōmdush neembaptizemigōwin :
41010040	Che námátábeengdush , neengitchenikânâng , giya neenuhmunjenikânâng kâ neenda megewase , meatuh uhgew gázhetowwâjig tuh menáwug .
41010041	Matáchejigdush n'wândumowât , omáje osittáwanemáwat Jamesun giya Johnun .
41010042	Jesusdush onundomán , otinnân , kekekandánâwâ uhgew wagemákundowwâjig miátáwizzinidjin , otuhbuhsheáwân .
41010043	Kâween koshá tuh izzhewabusinōn keenowâ : owwagwan magwa keenowâ gagitchetwâwanemōgwan , me ga otokenegameyag :
41010044	Owwagwandush ga ogemáwegwan , me ga otoskenegameyag .
41010045	Oanje Aninne Oguisun , kâween beōnje tuhkoshinze , kitchekitchetwâwanemoot ; keche unnoketâgaweninnewitdush otōnje megewan obemátizzewin kitche nebená , che ōnje bemátizzewât .
41010046	Betuhkoshinōgdush Jerichoink ; aneságáunkdush Jericho , mámowy otoskenegamun , kitche nebenádush anishanâbag , kagebeengwat Bartimeus , Timeus oguisun , chegekunuh genámátábe , nundotumágat .
41010047	N'wândunkdush Jesus Nazarethink áwit , máje ázhequa , ekettōnk , Jesus , David oguisun , shâwanemeshin .
41010048	Anishanâbandush , oguhnonigōn che pezán ábit ; ánjigo nebenádush ázhequa , David oguisun , shâwanemeshin .
41010049	Jesusdush nōgegâbowe , unnokedush che nundomint ; nundomáwândush kagebeengwat aninne , otinnáwândush , nuhnegwandun , pusegween ; kenundomik .
41010050	Ningoochedush , otuhpugitōn agwit , pusegwedush , obenázekowândush Jesusun .
41010051	Jesusdush otinnân , wagonan nandowwanemeyun che totonán ? otinnândush kagebeengwat aninne , Neendogemám , máno mezheshin newâbewin .
41010052	Jesusdush otinnân , kewan ; kemushkâwandumowin kenojeniōiggoon : bâbegadush gewâbe , otunnenopenuhnándush Jesusun mikunâng .
41011001	Buhtuhkoshinnowaut Jerusalemink , Bethphagink , giya Bethanyink , wudjewink Olivet , neezh otezhenázhowân otoskenegamun ,
41011002	Otinnândush , peendegayeuk e-e otanuh anosummeyag : pichenuk ge unne peendegayag , keguh mikkowwâ bazhek okazheens , kâwekâ aninne otuhpuhbissenun , ábuhōk , benik .
41011003	Kishpin oweuh aninne eninág , unishwin wanje totumag ? keguh ekettōm ogemá onundomán ; bâbegadush oguh be-ezhe názhowân .
41011004	Ezháwugdush omikkowâwân , bazhekokazheensun tuhkobizzonit 'squandamink mikunun nuhquamok ; otábuhwâwândush .
41011005	Ahnintdush emá nábowwidjig , otinnáwân , wagonan wanje ábuhumag bazhekokazheensun ?
41011006	Otinnáwândush Jesus gá enát ; ezhenázhowândush bazhekokazheensun .
41011007	Obetowâwândush Jesus bazhekokazhensun , agwewâjindush otattowâwân opikwunnánink , Jesusdush otasubbenun .
41011008	Nebenádush okonásewân otuswagizzetōnâwân mikkunâng ; ánintdush otikwunun okishkuhánâwân , metigōn unne uttowwâtdush mikkunâng .
41011009	Uhgewdush nâgânidjig , uhgewedush squiyâng buhtájig bebágewug ekettōnk Hosanna ; kitchetwâwandágooze ween tuhkoshink Kitche Manito otonozowinink .
41011010	Kitchetwâwizzewin kōsenán David otogemáwewin , betuhkoshink Kitche Manito otonozowinink : Hosanna nâgânandágoozit .
41011011	Jesusdush peendega Jerusalemink , giya kitche uhnummeawegumigōnk uhpapáwâwâbundán , kokkinná kago , wanákoshikdush , Bethanaink ezhá , mámowy ussheneezhinidjin .
41011012	Wiábunkdush kekeshap , beōnjebáwug Bethanaink , gebuhkuttadush .
41011013	Owâbomándush kitche shomenâtigōn wâsâ uhnebeeshewe , nundowâbundándush kago chemenewinit , beotissátdush , kâ kago wâbunduhzeen , mego atuh nebeeshun , kâmushie ope genetáwiggink uhmenewinnit .
41011014	Jesusdush otinnân metigōn , kâwekâ oweuh aninne oguh mejiseen wanje netáwegink wuhow metig . Otoskenegamundush nōndágōn .
41011015	Betuhkoshinōgdush Jerusalemink ; Jesusdush unnebeendega kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , omáje sâgitchewabenándush gâshpinuttâzonidjin giyadush átáwanidjin , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , ogwanuhbewabenandush miáshkotunuhmátidjig shoneá , otuhtopowinun , giya átáwajig omemeen onámátábewinun ;
41011016	Ogenuhummowândush oweuh aninnewun che unneshábowetōt otossowinun kitche uhnummeawegumigōnk .
41011017	Otezheguhgekemándush , otinnân , kânuh ezhebe-egâtasenōn , keche atumink o-o newegewam uhnumeawegumik mizze ákeeng ? keenowâdush , gamotishkidjig che owâzhewât kege ezhetōnâwâ .
41011018	Oshebe-egaweninnewugdush giya ogemá saságewitchegaweninnewug nōndumōg , otonuhgemáwándush ga inápenanáwât ; che nesáwât ; ogosáwándush , ōnje kokkinna anishanábag mámukkâtandumōg oguhgequawinink .
41011019	Wanákoshikdush sagaum e-e olanuh .
41011020	Kekeshapdush , ane guhbikowât , uhnew metigōn gaguhnonánápuneen , mishewâkooze kokkinná giya ojebekawit .
41011021	Peterdush omikwandan , otinnan Neendogemám binná , metig gá nishkâcheguhnonut mishewâkooze .
41011022	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , tabwatōwwil : Kitche Manito .
41011023	Kagat ketenenim , owwagwan ga etumogwan o-o wudjew , máján , keguh oppugginnego kitche gummeeng ; kadush tuh ágoonwayanduhze otaink , tuh tabwa-andumduh che izzhewabuk , ono iuheen aketōt oguhtian ga ezhindochegrat .
41011024	Me wanje ketenenim , kago nundotumun uhnumeáyun , tabwa-andun che iáyun keguhtiánundush .
41011025	Magwouhdush nebowweyun uhnumeáyun , mennowesháwanim uhgew nashkanemudjig ; me giya ween Kosewâ gezhigōnk andat che menowweshawaneminág , kemutche izzhewabizzewinewâ .
41011026	Kishpin menowweshâwanemásewutwâ , kâ giya ween Kōsewâ gezhigōnk andát keguh menowwesháwanemigoosewâ .
41011027	Tuhkoshinōgdush minowâ Jerusalemink ; mágwouhdush bamosat kitche uhnummeawegumigōnk , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , oshebe egaweninnewug , giya okewanzeug obenázekágōn .
41011028	Otinnáwândush wagonan o-o wanje totumun ono iuheen ? owwanan mánik mushkâwizzewin che totumun ono iuheen ?
41011029	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinnân , neen giya keguh kuhquajeminenim bazhek guhgwatwawin , nuhquatowweshig , keguh weendumonenimdush wanje totumán ono iuheen .
41011030	John obaptizewawin , ishpemink innuh ōnjebá , aninneeng innuh ōnjebá ? guhnozheshig .
41011031	I-ittewugdush guhguhnōnetizzowât , kishpin ekettoeyunk ishpemink ōnjebá ; unishween ge tabwatowwâsewag keguh egonán ?
41011032	Kishpindush aninneeng ōnjebá ekettoeyunk , ogosáwân anishanâban ; kokkinná aninnewug ápiche quiuk mamándáwizzit oge-enanemáwân Johnun .
41011033	Otezhenuhquatowwawândush Jesusun , kâween neenkushketosemin che ekettoyâng : Jesusdush otinnân , neen giya kâ keguh weendumosenōnim wanje totumán ono iuheen .
41012001	Omahje-enahndush , buhbawatágoozewinink , bazhek aninne gittega ogittegânink , gemechekunnekâtán , ogeozhetōndush gatuzzhe ōzhetōt shomenábo , wâkiegundush ogeōzhetōn , owwetowweándush ketegaweninnewun ogittegân , májádush wâsâ pukkân ákeeng .
41012002	Ahpiche kekenonowin áquo uhmámáng , otezhenázhowân unnoketâgaweninnewun , che mámáwât netáwegingin ketegânink .
41012003	Otukkonáwândush , obuhshunzhawâwândush , májenázhowâwândush bizzhishshik .
41012004	Minowâdush otezhenázhowân bazhek unnoketâgaweninnewun ; obemosinuháwândush , obemwâgunneáwân ōshtegwânink , omájenázhowândush iyuhguhtátuhkumik .
41012005	Minowâdush bazhek otezhenázhowân ; onesáwândush ; minowâdush nebewá , buhbuhketawâwug ánint , onesáwândush ánint .
41012006	Bazhekowundush oguisun , kitche sâgeán , squâchdush uhnew otezhenázhowân , ekettōnk , oguhgosáwân neenguisun .
41012007	Ketegaweninnewugdush i-ittewug , me wuhow ezheka oguisemá ; umbasuh , nesátá , otebinowawizzewindush keguhtiámin .
41012008	Ototâpenán , onesáwândush , osâgitchewabenáwândush ketegânink .
41012009	Ahneen ga izzhewabizzit tabandunk ketegân ? tuh be-ezhá , che nisshewunnájeát ketegaweninnewun , che menátdush ketegân bakânizinidjin .
41012010	Kânuh ketōnje wâbunduhzeenâwâ , o-o azhebe-egâtag ; eu ásin wiabenumowât ozhegajig beáwun 'squiewung wegewam :
41012011	Me o-o Kitche Manito otindewin , mámuhkâtandágwutdush keskezhigonáng .
41012012	Enandumōgdush che tuhkonáwât , unishdush , ogosáwân anishanâban ; okekandánâwâ nishkâcheguhgekemát ; onuhguhnáwândush , májáwug .
41012013	Otezhenázhowâwândush , ánint Phariseeug , giya Herodianug che tuhkōnint ogegetōwinink .
41012014	Buhtuhkōshinowât , otinnáwân , Neendogemám , neenkekandámin quiuk bemátizzeyun , kâ ketábátanemáse oweuh aninne ; kâweendush owushema bazhek kegunnowâbomáse oweuh aninne , mego debishko kokkinná ; quiukigo keguhgequa Kitche Manito oguhgequawin ; quiuk innuh tá izznewabut , tepaumink tepáummowwint Caegar ?
41012015	Tuhmemttemin innuh ; kâween innuh tuh menittissemin ? okekandándush kuhgianezenit , otinnândush , wagonan wanje kuhgwadebanemeyun ? wâbundi-isshin punge shoneá ,
41012016	Obetōnâwâdush , otinnândush , owwanan wazhebe-egâzōt ? otinnáwândush , Caesar .
41012017	Jesusdush nuhquatunk otinnân , meezh Caesarun tabandungin , meezh giya Kitche Manito tabandungin ; mámukâtandumōgdush .
41012018	Sadduceeugdush , uhgew aketojig kâ kago ábejebáwin , obeotissegōn okuhquajemáwândush ekettōnk :
41012019	Neendogemám , Moses neendoshebeummágonán , aninne wekânisun nebōnit , nuhguhnát wewun , onejânississik , wekánisun che otápenát wewun , che netáwegittowât wekânisun onejânisun .
41012020	Neezhwâswa wekânesindewug ; sazekezitdush wewe , nebodush bwâ onejânesit .
41012021	Iánekashkowât owewenun , weendush onebo ; kâ onejânesisse ; me giya ako nissewât .
41012022	Ako neezhwâchewât owewenun , kâdush onejânesissewug :
41012023	Squâchdush equa giya nebo ; ábejebáwinink ope ábejebáwât , owwannan wewun gá áwit ? ōnje neezhwâswa ogewewenáwân .
41012024	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , kânuh kewunneshinzeem , kâ kekekanduhzeem wazhepe-egâtag , giya Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ?
41012025	Oanje ope ábejebáwât , kâ tuhwewindesewug , kâ tuhmenásewug wewindewinink , me tebishko ga ezhenágoozidjig mezhinowag gezhigōnk azhenâgoozewât .
41012026	Tuzzhemintwâdush nabojig , che ábejebáwât ; kânuh kegewâbunduhzeem Moses gá ezhebe-egat , Kitche Manito ogeguhnōnigōn kebeensink ekettōnk ; neen Abraham Omanitomun , Isaac Omanitomun , giya Jacob Omanitomun ?
41012027	Kâween nabojin Kitche Manito Omanitokundowâseen , bemátizzinidjin Omanitokundowân ; me eu ōnje ápiche kewunneshinōm .
41012028	Bazhekdush oshebe-egaweninnewun obenázekágōn , onōndágowân guhguhnonittewát , onōndowândush wawane uhnuhnáquatowwât , okuhquajemán , áneen e-e mámowy nâgânuk kitche guhgequawin ?
41012029	Jesusdush otinnân , owushema apetandágwut guhgequawin o-o , bezindumōk , Israeletōk ; Kitche Manito neengitche Manitomenán , meatuh bazhekoot Manito :
41012030	Keguh sâgeáwâ Kitche Manito , kokkinná ketaewâng , kokkinná giya kechichâgowâng , kokkinná giya ketenandumowinewâng , kokkinná giya kemushkâwizzewinnewâng , me o-o netamissink guhgequawin .
41012031	Wiánekashinkdush , mego debishko azhenágwuk , keguh ságeáwâg wâjetukkemagoog , debishko azhe sâgeittezoeyag ; kâ kago guhgequawin owushema ápetandágoozenōn .
41012032	Oshebe-egaweninnedush otigōn , quiuk , Neendogemám ketabwa ; bazhekigo Kitche Manito ; kâdush oweuh bakânizzit :
41012033	Che sâgeintdush , kokkinná otaemáng , kokkinná giya ochichâgománg , kokkinná giya otenandumōwinink , kokkinná giya omushkâwizzewinink ; giya keche sâgeint owejetukkewamágun tebishko azhe sâgeittezoot , owushema apetandágwut , apetandágwuk kokkinná sáságewitchegunun .
41012034	Jesusdush wiábomát wawane uhnuhquatágoot , otinnán , kâween wâsâ ketiáse Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink . Kâdush oweuh minowâ okuhquajemigooseen kago .
41012035	Jesusdush nuhquatunk otinnân , magwouh guhgequat kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk : áneen oshebe-egaweninnewug ekettowât , Christ , David oguisun .
41012036	David ween tebinowa eketto , Kitche Manito ochichâgwun okekenoummágoon , Kitche Manito otinnân Nemanitomun , neengitchenikâng námátábin , nánazh shânganemikig keche ussugwâ kezitáng .
41012037	Daviddush ween tebinowa , otezhenekânán , Kitche Manito , áneen gage-ezhe oguisit ? Anishanâbagdush pâpenanemōwug , onōndowwâwât .
41012038	Otinnândush uhnew buhbawatágoozewinink , tuhtebábundumōk oshebe-egaweninnewug , meenwandumōg bamosawát guhgânwagutinik obeenzikowâgunewân , uzzhuhnummekowwintwâdush , átáwawinink ;
41012039	Ogemá námátábewinundush uhnumeawegumigōnk ; owushema meenwâtag wegewamundush anduzzhewekoondink ;
41012040	Ogittánâwâ shegág owegewâmewân , kuhgânwazhdush uhnumeawug we wiazhemáwât anisnanâban , mewug uhgew owushema ga gitche guhgwâtuhgeinjig .
41012041	Jesusdush anosumiuhe námátábit shoneá otossowinink , ogunnowâbundán , uzzhuhtowwât shoneá anishanâbag , nebenádush kache twâwizzidjig nanebená otuhpuggittōnâwâ shoneá .
41012042	Betuhkoshinkdush bazhek katemákezit shegá , otuhpuggittōn neezh babewâg shoneá .
41012043	Onundomándush otoskenegamun , otinnândush , kagat ketenenim , wuhow katemákezit shegá , owushema nebená otuhpuggittōn , kokkinná menik gá oppuggittowwât :
41012044	Uhgew oppuggittojig nanebená otiáwân ; weendush 'ow shegá oppuggittōt menik mego atuh ayát che ōnje bemátizzit .
41013001	Ane ságáunk kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , bazhek otoskemegamun otigōn , Neendogemám , wâbundun wagonan ásinenamun ono wazhegâgangin !
41013002	Jesusdush otinnân , kewábundánun innuh ono kitche wegewâmun ? kâween koshá , tuhnuhguhtunzeen bazhekwâbeek asin che ágwetōsink , kokkinná tuh binnewabinnegâtawun .
41013003	Magwouhdush námátábit wudjewink Olivet , anosumissink kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , Peter , giya John , giya Andrew , okuhquajemáwân gemōch ,
41013004	Weendummowweshinâng , áneen ope o-o che izzhewabut ? áneendush kekenowachichegawin o-o che izzhewabut ?
41013005	Jesusdush oguhnonán , máje eketto , tuhtebábig , kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoosewâ :
41013006	Nebewá tuhtuhkoshinōg neenduhnozowinink , tuh ekettowugdush neen Christ ; nebenádush oguhwiazhemáwân .
41013007	Opedush nōndumag , nundobunnewinun , tuzzhinduminkdush nundobunnewinun , kago sunnágandun kago ; uhnew tinnowun ōnjittá tuh izzhewabut ; waquiágdush , kámuhshe tuhtuhgoosenōn .
41013008	Ningōtwawân anwajig , oguh nundobunnetowwâwân pukkân ningōtwawán , ogemáwewin oguh nishkanemán ogemáwewin ; tuhnuhningishkâ áke omuhmeen , tuhbuhkuttawinewun , tuh sunnágut : me máje kushkandumowin .
41013009	Kunwanindizzōk , keguh buhgittinnegōm gegetowinink ; uhnumeawegumigōnk keguh buhbuhketaegâzōm ; keguh beezhewinnegōm anosumewât kitche ogemág , neen ōnje keche bátámintwa .
41013010	O-oedush nemeenwâjemowin , tuhguhgekindim anegoquág áke chebwâ waquiyáng .
41013011	Opedush májenegoeyag , buhgittinnegoeyag , kago nánáguhtuhwundun kago ga ekettoeyag ; owwagotogwan ga meniegowagwan eu tepiegun , me ga ekettoyag , káween keenowâ keguh gegetoseem ; Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ga gegetōt keowwewáng .
41013012	Wekânisemá oguh buhgittenumáganun wekânisun che nebonit ; ōsemádush oguisun ; uhbenocheug oguh nishkanemáwân onegeiggowân , oguhtotowâwândush che nebonit .
41013013	Keguh sheenganemigōm kokkinná , neenduhnozowinink ōnje ; weendush ga mennoizzhewabizzit che waquâshkung tuh gâgega bemátizze .
41013014	Opedush keguh wâbundám kagwânesuhgandágwuk bizzhishegwutag , Daniel manitowâzōt gá tebátotunk , nebowwing tinnōnk che nebowissingebun , ( owwagwan n'wândummogwan máno oguh nissetotán , ) medush ope , andájig Judeaink , máno wudjewink tuh ezhissawug :
41013015	Owwagwandush ogittegumik ga iágwan , kâ tuh benesândewase che sâgizzetōt kago andát :
41013016	Ketegâninkdush ga iát , kâ tuhkewase okonâsun che natit .
41013017	Kitche sunnágutdush uhgew anjegoojig , giya uhgew nōnáwâsojig ono gezhigutōn !
41013018	Unnummeatowwik , ningooche keche ikkoonázho-ogosewag pepōng .
41013019	Medush ope che kitche sunnáguk , kâwekâ geizzewabusinōn , aquo ákewung kádush wekâ , tuh izzhewabusinōn .
41013020	Meatuh Kitche Monito tuhgwâtōt ono gezhigutōn , kâ oweuh tá bemátizzisse ; uhgewedush gagegininjig , wanje tuhgwâtōng ono gezhigutōn .
41013021	Opedush oweuh aninne ga enik , binná , omá Christ ; uhgamá , binná ewada Christ , kago tabwatunkan :
41013022	Ga ōnje mokishkâwât kagenowishkidjig Christug , giya kakenowishkidjig manitowâzojig , tuh nágwut che izzhewabut , giya kitche mámuhkâtandágwut kishpin izzhewabukkebun , kitche wiazhindewug gagegininjig tebinowa .
41013023	Tuhtebábig ; binná kokkinná kege-eninnábun .
41013024	Ono gezhigutōn , gá eeshquâ o-o sunnágizzewin , gezis tuh kushkedibbekissa , dibbeke gezis kâ tuhsâgâsegase ;
41013025	Uhnugwug giya gezhigōnk tuh ōnje pongesinōg , giya mushkâwizzewin gezhigōnk tuh nuhningishkâ .
41013026	Medush ope che kekinowâtuk Aninne Oguisun che tuhkoshink , ánáqutōnk , kitche mushkâwizzewinink , giya kitche kitche twâwandágoozewinink .
41013027	Oguhmájenázhowândush omezhinowamun , che mowōnjeittewâtdush gagegeninjig mizzewa ákeeng áyájig .
41013028	Kekandumōk kitche shomenâtik obuhbawatágoozewin ; ope nouhkágukkin ságebugukkin , kekekandánâwâ nebin bazhew tuhgoo :
41013029	Me debishko , ope wâbundumag kokkinná ono iuheen , kekandumōk bazhew iág , debishko squândamink .
41013030	Kagat ketenenim , uhgew nōngum bemátizzidjig , kâween kokkinná tuh nebosewug , chebwâ izzhewabuk kokkinná ono iuheen .
41013031	Gezhik giya áke tuh májámuggut , neengegetowin koshá , kâtuh májámuggusinōn .
41013032	Euedush gezhigut , euedush tepiegun , kâ oweuh okekanduhzeen , Kitche Manito omezhinowamun kâ okekanduhzeenâwâ , oguisundush kâ okekanduhze meatuh osemá .
41013033	Tuttebabig , ukkowâbig , uhnummeág ; kâ kekekanduhzeem ope che izzhewabuk .
41013034	Tebishko aninneeng wâsâ natápapámatizzit , onuhguhtán andát , oweendummowân otunnoketâgaweninnemun , papukkân gaienunnokenit , otinnândush aninnewun kanowandunk squândem , che ukkowâbit .
41013035	Me o-o , ukkowâbig ; wanje eninnuhgook , kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ ope ga tuhkoshink tebandunk wegewam , wanákooshik , gamá ábetá dibbikuk , gamá pekááquouh mazatágoozit , gamá kekeshap :
41013036	Konemá wiebuh tuhkoshink ketá mikkágowâ nebáyag .
41013037	Aeninnuhgookigodush , kokkinná neendenág , ukkowâbig .
41014001	Gah nezhokoniguk , wekoondewin kubbekosa , quazhegōnk puhquazhegun giya ; ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , onundomikwandánâwâ , ga inápenánáwât , che nesint .
41014002	Ekettowugdush , kâween wekoondewinne gezhigutinik , ozâm tá ōmbegizzewug anishanâbag .
41014003	Uzzhiágdush Bethanaink , Simon wamegeet , owegewamink magwouh wesenewât equa obeotissigōn , wâbuhsinne muhkuk otián kache sunnaguhgindag pemeta ; obegoándush e-e muhkuk , pemetadush osegenummowan ōshtegwânink .
41014004	Ahnintdush nishkátizzewug , ittewugdush guhnōnittewât , wagonan wanje nisshewunnajtōng eu pemeta ;
41014005	Nebená tágekishpinuttōng shoneá , katemákizzidjig menintwâbun . Omutchetuzzhemawândush .
41014006	Jesusdush eketto , bōneik , kago megooshkâchekago , neengemennototág .
41014007	Katemákizzidjig gágineek kewejewegōg , anandumágigo ketámennototowâwâg ; kaweendush neen gâgineek kewejewesinōnim .
41014008	Menikigo azhe kushketōt , totum ; gezhá negân betotág neow che buhgittanemigōyan .
41014009	Kagat ketenenim , kokkinnágo ga bemetuzzheguhgekindink o-o meenwâjemowin , guhtuh tebátotán gá totunk , che kunwandunk .
41014010	Medush ope Judas Iscariot , bazhek asheneezhinidjig , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun otezhánun , webuhgittinumowât .
41014011	Nōndumowâtdush , pâpenanemowug , onuhgindâzowug che menint shoneá . Medush onundomikwandán ga ezhe onissheshininik ga ezhe buhgittenummágat .
41014012	Netam e-e gezhigut quazhegōnk puhquazhegun , kabekosag netágawin , otoskenegamun otigōn , ánde ga wetuzzhemejeyáng kubbekosa wekoondewin ?
41014013	Otezhenázhowândush neezh otoskenegamun , ekettōnk , otanonk ezhág , keguh nuhgishkowwa aninne , che bemetuhkonunk nebe menequachegunink ; unne nopenuhnik .
41014014	Tibbego che peendegagwan , enik manobemátizzit aninne tabandunk wegewam , ogemá eketto , áneendego andusshewesenink , neenguh tuzzhe mejim emá kubbekosa wekoondewin mámowy neendoskenegamug ?
41014015	Keguh tinouhmágowá munguhtag wegewam ishpemink ; gezhá kokkinná kago tuh atta , gezhá gezhetág emá .
41014016	Otoskenegamundush , otanonk ezháwun , omikkânâwâgo gáenát , ogezhissetōnâwâdush kubbekosa wekoondewin .
41014017	Wanákoshikdush Jesus tuhkoshin mámowy asheneezhenidjig .
41014018	Magwouhdush námátabewât , wesenewât , Jesus eketto , kagat ketenenim , bazhek andussheyag keguh buhgittenim .
41014019	Májedush kushkandumōg , bazhekdush otinnán , neen innuh ? minowâdush bazhek otinnân , neen innuh ?
41014020	Oguhnonán otinnân ; bazhek suh azheneezhidjig , wâjegwâbiegamit onágunink .
41014021	Aninne Oguisun májá azhebe-egâtagigo ; tuh kitche sunnágizzedush wuhow aninne ga buhgittenát Aninne Oguisun , owushema tá ge onissheshin , wekâ negesigobun .
41014022	Magwouhdush wesenewât , Jesus puhquazhegun omámōn , uhnumeádush obōkobetōn omámenán otoskenegamun , ekettōnk , otâpenumōk , mejik ; me o-o neow .
41014023	Ototâpenándush menequâchegun ; azhe uhnumeátdush omámenándush , kokkinná andusshewât gemenequawug .
41014024	Otinnândush , me o-o nemisqueem , ōshke wâweendummágawinink , wanje seegwabenumink , kitche nebená anishanâbag .
41014025	Kagat ketenenim , kâween minowâ neenguh menequase , uhmenewung bemáqut , chebwâ eu gezhigut menequayán ōshkeiewunk , mámowy keenowâ Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
41014026	Opedush gá ezhe nuhguhmowât , azhe ságáumowât wudjewink Olivet ezháwát .
41014027	Jesusdush otinnân , kokkinná keenowâ , keguh nishkâtezim neen ōnje , nōngum dibbikut ; ōnje oshebe egâtag , neenguhbuhketawâ kanowanemát mánishtânishun , mánishtânishugdush tuh siswashkâwug .
41014028	Ge ábejebáyandush , neenguh negâne che ezháyán Galileeink .
41014029	Peterdush otinnân , ánuh kokkinná tuh nishkâtizzewug , kaween neenguhnishkâtezisse .
41014030	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat ketenin , nōngum gezhiguk kagat nōngum dibbikut , uhbwâ neesink pekááquouh nōndágoozit , nissink keguheket kâ kekekanemisse .
41014031	Peterdush otinnán , ápiche anegōk , ánuh keguh weenbinnamin , chebwâ ekettoyán , kâ kenissetowwenōsenōn ; kokkinnágo me aketowât otoskenegamun .
41014032	Be-ezháwâtdush Gethsemaneink ? otinnândush otoskenegamun , omá námátábeyeuk , ewada neenguhdezhá che uhnum eáyán .
41014033	Otunne májenándush Peterun , Jamesun giya Johnun májedush kitche kushkandum ,
41014034	Otinnándush , neenchichâg kitche kushkandum kagâ beengâwanemo : omá iág , ukkowâbig .
41014035	Owushemadush ane-ezhát , me azhe pongeshin oskezhigōnk uhnumeátdush e-e tepiegun che májámuggut kishpin izzhewabukebun .
41014036	Ekettodush , Abba nōs , kokkinná keen kedebandán ; máno ikkoonuhmowweshin o-o menequâchegun ; kâween koshá anandumán tuh izzhewabut keenigo anandumun .
41014037	Obeotissán , omikkowândush otoskenegamun nebánit , otinnândush Peterun , Simon , kenebá innuh ? kânuh ketáweejukkowâbomisse ningōtepiegun ?
41014038	Ukkowâbig , uhnumeág che kuhgwadebanemigoosewag , ochichâgomá kagat enandum , weowemádush nenuhmut .
41014039	Minowâdush májá , owwe uhnummeát , nesink násáb eketto .
41014040	Tuhkoshinkdush omikowân minowâ nebánit , ( oskezhigowán kosegwuninik ) kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ , ga ezhe nuhquatumowât .
41014041	Obeotissáwândush neeswink , minowâdush nebáwug , otinnândush , nebáyeuk nōngum , unwashemonoyeuk : tepiegun tebishkosa , binná , Aninne Oguisun buhgittenummátinun máchebematizzinidjin oninjewâng .
41014042	Onishkág , májátá ; binná bazhew ween wuhow bagitinit .
41014043	Magwouhdush gágegetōt , tuhkoshin Judas , bazhek azheneezhidjig , obewejewegōndush kitche nebená anishanâban uzzhowweshkōn giya shemágunun otuhkonánâwân , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun oshebe-egaweninnewun otuhnōnigowân .
41014044	Bagittinnegoojindush , oge enágobun , ga ojemuk , me wuhow , meenjimenik , bakâne májenik .
41014045	Bâbegadush beotisát Jesus , ekettodush , Neendogemám , Neendogemám ; medush ojemát .
41014046	Biezhe meenjimenáwât , tuhkonáwât .
41014047	Bazhekdush emá nábowid , onuhnekibetōn otuzzhowweshk , obuhketawândush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otoskenegamun okishketowwugagunámándush .
41014048	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinnân , gamotishkid innuh kebenánáwâ , kebetuhkonumag uzzhowweshkōn giya shemágunun uhbetuhkoneyag ?
41014049	Iándusso gezhiguk neengeguhgequayán kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , kâdush kege tánginisseem , me ōnjittá , gá izzhewabut tuhtabwamugut wazhebe-egâtag .
41014050	Kokkinnádush otoskenegamun , onuhguhnigōn , oshemowug .
41014051	Bazhek atuh ōskenowa , onopenuhnigōn , bebuhgewiánnegin newagōtane weowwink , sáságewitchegaweninnewug , otoskenegamewân meenjimmenáwân :
41014052	Onuhguhtándush bebuhgewián negin , peengwoshshâgitdush oshemo .
41014053	Otezhewináwândush Jesus ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne uzzhiát ; ween mámowy tuzzhe mowōnjeittewug ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug okewanzeug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug .
41014054	Peterdush onopenuhnán wâsâ , nánazh debishko ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne andát , owetobemándush unnoketâgaweninnewun owwuzzōt .
41014055	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , kewanzeug , kokkinna giya gegetowin onundowâbomáwân gagenowishkenidjin webátámint Jesus , kâdush omikkowâse .
41014056	Nebená kegenowishkidjig owwe bátámáwân , odikittowinnewâdush kâ aeezh ezhenágoozenōn .
41014057	Ahnintdush anishanâbag kagenowishkidjig pusegwewug ekettowug .
41014058	Neengenōndowwânán wuhow aninne ekettōt , neenguh banájetōn o-o kitche uhnumeawegumik , oninjemáng gá ōnje ozhetōng , niswokonigukdush minowâ bazhek neengun ozhetōn oninjemáng che iōseeng .
41014059	Me eu giya , kâ ezhe nuhquatissewug .
41014060	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne gepusegwe nowiuhe , otinnândush , kânuh kenuhquatunze ? Wagonan anikwâ uhgew ?
41014061	Kâdush nuhquatunze , kâ gegetose ; minowâ ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne , okuhquajemán otinnân , keen innuh Christ , Shâwanjegat oguisun ?
41014062	Jesusdush otinnân , á , neen ; náágutchdush keguh wâbomáwâ Aninne Oguisun , che námátábit , ogitche nikâng kitche mushkâwizzewin , che iát ánáqutōnk ishpemink che ōnjebát .
41014063	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnedush , obegobetōn obuhbeenzikowâgun ekettōnk , gekitche mutche eketto ; áneen enábuhtizzewât wâtokâzojig ? binná kenōndowwâ aketōt :
41014064	Ahneen anandumag ? Ekettowug buhgitandágooze .
41014065	Ahnintdush omaje sikwânáwân , otuhguhneengwawâwân , buhbuhketawâwân , otinnáwândush , tuhtepájemotowwishenâng : unnoketágaweninnewugdush onuhbuhgoshkeninjetowwâwân .
41014066	Peterdush neeseiuhe iá , mámowy unnoketâgaweninnewun ; ōskenegequandush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne unnoketowât obenázekágōn .
41014067	Wiabomátdush Peterun owwuzzōnit , ogunnowabomán , otinnândush , keen wâjewut Jesus Nazarethink .
41014068	Ekettodush kâween , kâ kenissetōtōsenōn aketoeyun ; ane ságáumdush uhguhwâtachegunink , pekááquouh nōndágoozedush .
41014069	Minowâdush bazhek oskenegequa , ogunnowâbomigōn , omáje enán nábowwidjig me 'ow bazhek .
41014070	Minowâdush eketto , kâween ; náágutchdush nábowwidjig otinnáwân Peterun , kagat keen me bazhek ; keen Galilee aninnew , ketinwawin giya kekinnowâzetágwut .
41014071	Omáje nishkâzetágooze anápegeezhwatdush , ekettōnk , kâ neenkekanemáse aninne anduzzhemut .
41014072	Minowâdush pekááquouh nōndágooze , Peterdush omikwandán Jesus gá eketōt , chebwâ pekááquouh neezhink nōndágooze , nissink keguh eket kâ kekekanemisse : bâbegadush ságáunk uhmowit .
41015001	Kekeshapdush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , giya oshebe-egaweninnewug kokkinná giya gegetowin guhguhnonetizzowât , otuhkobenáwân májenáwân Jesus owwe buhgittinummowâwât Pilateun .
41015002	Pilatedush , okuhquajemán , keen innuh ketogemákundowwâg Jewug ? Oguhnōnándush otinnân , keen kedikit .
41015003	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush otuhpuhgutchesittowân uhnōch kago ; kâdush ningōt guhnokese .
41015004	Pilatedush okuhquajemán ekettōnk , kânuh kenuhquatunze ? binná , menik uhnōch kago uhpuhgutchesittágoeyun .
41015005	Jesusdush , kâ ningōt ekettōse : Pilatedush mámuhkâtandum .
41015006	E-e wekoondewinink , bazhek ukkobuhgittenummátinun owwâkânewit owwagwan ga nundomáwâgwan .
41015007	Bazhekdush Barabbas ezhenekâzo , tuhkobezo , mámowy gá wetokotátewâjin owwe begobetowât otanuh owwe nisshewawâtdush wanje kepáquo-ōninjig .
41015008	Anishâbagdush , májeázhequawug , okuhquajemáwât che totunk gâgineek andotunk ukko .
41015009	Pilatedush oguhnonán , ekettodush , kenundowwaninnemin innuh che meninuhgook Jewug otogemámewân ?
41015010	Pilate kosha okekandán guhgâwanindewin wanje buhgittináwât .
41015011	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush otinnáwân anishâban , che nundomáwât Barabbasun .
41015012	Pilatedush okuhquajemán minowâ , áneen che totowug enandumag wuhow Jewug otogemámewân anut ?
41015013	Azhequawug minowâ ekettowug , che suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
41015014	Pilatedush otinnân , anishween , áneen ween gá ezhe mutchetotunk ? áwunjish minowâ ázhequawug che suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
41015015	Opedush Pilate enandum che niandumeát anishanâban Barabbasun obuhgitenán , bashunzhaōntdush Jesus , guhgândwa che suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
41015016	Shemágunishun Praetorium wegewamink otezhewinnáwân , mowōzōndewugdush kokkinná shemágunishun ;
41015017	Misquagin otuhgwunuhwâwân , menasagâwunje owaoqun otozhetōnawâ obeenzekōnâwân ōshtegwâninink ,
41015018	Omáje uhnummekowâwândush ; pâpenanim , Jewug otogemámewân !
41015019	Buhketawâwândush ōshtegwâninink uhságunusk , osikwânáwândush ochicheengwunittáwug uhnumeatowwâwât .
41015020	Gá nisshebápenotowwâwât , ogezekōnâwân misquajin gá ágwewâjin , obeenzekōnâwâdush tebinowa okonâsun , májenadush owwe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
41015021	Bazhekdush Simon Cyrene andát , nopemink beōnjeba , Alexander giya Rufus ōsewân , otuhnonáwân che bemewinnát metigōn wâtuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt .
41015022	Be-ezhewináwân emá Golgotha aninne weendibegagun uzzhatumink .
41015023	Omenáwândush shomenâbo otuhgonummowâwân wâsugunink , kâdush oge otâpenuhzeen .
41015024	Gá suhsuhgáquowâwât mátuhonittewug obuhbeenzikowâgun , átátewug owwagwan ga iágwan andusshewât .
41015025	Naso tepiegunak , suhsuhgáquowâwug .
41015026	Ogitcheiuhedush ōshtegwânink , ezhebe-egata , JEWUG OTOGEMAHMEWAWN .
41015027	Minowâdush neezh gamotishkidjig , osuhsuhgáquowâwân , bazhek ogitchenikâng bazhekdush onuhmunjenikâng .
41015028	Medush tabwawinnewung azhebe-egátag , getuhgwâgiegâzo mámowy mache bemátizzinidjin .
41015029	Uhgewedush babámosajig obápenotowâwân , nuhmequatowâwâtdush ekettōnk , Umba ! keen ga nisshewunnajetoeyun kitche uhnumeawegumik , minowâdush che ozhetoeyun niswokoniguk ,
41015030	Bemájeittezoon , benesândowân metigōnk .
41015031	Giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug azhe bápenotowâwân i-ittewugdush mámowy oshebe-egaweninnewug , gebemájeág bakânizzidjig kâ okushkeáseen we bemájeittezoot .
41015032	Tuhguh ! Christ , Jewug otogemámewân tuh benesândewa metigōnk , wábundumunk keguh tabwa-andámin : uhgewedush wâjesuhsuhgáquiegâzojin obápenotowâwân .
41015033	Ningōtwâswa tepiegunak gekushkedibbekissa anegoquág áke nánazh shângusso tepiegunak .
41015034	Shângusse tepiegunak , Jesus anegōk ge ázhequa Eloi , Eloi , lama sabacthani ? uzzheketōnk , Nemanitōm , Nemanitōm , wagonan wanje nuhgusheun ?
41015035	Ahnintdush emá nábowwidjig ekettowug , binná onundomán Elias .
41015036	Bazhekdush gepemebutto oskiebánun ototâpenán owwe uhgwinjemát shewâbōng uhnemáquhummowâtdush áságunushkōnk che menát che menequat , ekettodush , boneik ; tuhguh wâbomátá Eliasun che bebemájeigogwan .
41015037	Jesusdush azhequa anegōk , buhgittenátdush ochichâgwun .
41015038	Medush wiáguhgōtag kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk bokoojeishkâ .
41015039	Shemágunisshe ogemádush emá nábowid , ope wiábomát che ázhequat che buhgittenátdush ochichágwun , eketto , kagat me wuhow Kitche Monito Oguisun .
41015040	Equawugdush emá iájig wâsâ enábewug ; andusshewât Mary Magdalene giya Mary , James agâshe giya Joses , giya Salome ōgeen :
41015041	Weenowâdush ope Jesus Galileeink uzzhiát , onpenuhnáwân , che unnoketowâwât , nebenádush equawug gáwejewâjin Jerusalemink .
41015042	Wanákooshikdush ( ânga me e-e gezhigut ozhetōng bwá unwabewinnegezhigut , )
41015043	Joseph Arimatheaink andát , kache twâwândágoozit aninne , obeán Kitche Manito otogemawewinink , obeōtisán Pilateun mushkâwetahatdush onundotummowwân Jesus oweow .
41015044	Pilatedush mámukkâtandum , bâbega nebonit , okuhquajemándush shemágunisshe ogemân , maweshá genebonit ?
41015045	Shemágunisshe ogemá gá weendumowât maweshá genebonit omenán weowwinne Joseph .
41015046	Otowwe kishpinuttōn wâbishke bebuhgewiánnegin ogushkewagenán bebuhgewián negin , otowwe buhgittenán jebagumigōnk ázhebekōnk weembitchegâta , kitche ásindush otezhetittebinán squândamink .
41015047	Mary Magdalene minowâ Mary , Joses ōgeen owâbomáwân uhshingeshink .
41016001	Gah eeshquâ unwabewinnegezhiguk , Mary Magdalene giya Mary , James giya Salome ōgeen , gegishpinuttowâgobun wâshkobungin , be-ezháwugdush wesinnegwunummowâwât .
41016002	Kitche kekeshap netam gezhigut unwabewinnegezhiguk májesag be-ezbáwug jebagumigōnk ope gezis mokuhung :
41016003	I-ittewugdush guhnonittewât , owwanan ningooche tittebinumonung o-o ásin , squândem atanik jebagumigōnk ?
41016004	Ane enábewât anewâbomáwân uhnew ásineen ningooche ge-ezhetittebinnegâzonit , ōnje kitche ásin .
41016005	Ane beendegawât , owâbomáwân oskenowan námátábenit ogitchenikâng enuhkuhkayá , agwit keenwâgutinne wâbishkegin obuhbeenzikowâgun , sagizzewugdush .
41016006	Otinnândush , kago sagizzekago , kenundowâbomáwâ Jesus Nazarethink gá suhsuhgáquiegâzōt ; ge onishkâ ; kâ omá iáse ; binná , omá ge ussint .
41016007	Májáyeuk owwe weendummowwikōg otoskenegamun , giya Peterun kenegânemink ezhá Galileeink , emá keche wâbomag , me aninág .
41016008	Bâbegadush májáwug , májebi-ittewug ōnje , nuhningishkáwug mámukkâtandumōgdush , kâdush oweuh aninnewun ningōtōno otenásewân azhe sagizzewât .
41016009	Opedush Jesus wanishkât kekeshap , netam gezhigut májesag unwabewinnegezhigut , owâbunduhán weow netam Mary Magdalene uhgesâgitchewabenumowâbuneen neezhwâswa Mutche Manitōn .
41016010	Azhe ságáumedush , owwe weendummowât uhnew gá wejewegoojin magwouh mowwemáwân .
41016011	Ope n'wândumowât uhbemátizzit uhgewâbomigootdush kâ tabwatunzewug .
41016012	Minowâdush , owâbunduhán weow neezh otoskenegamun , pukkân otezhenágwitōn weow , magwouh bamosawât nopemink ezháwât .
41016013	Májáwug owwe weendummowâwât uhnew ánint ; kâdush tabwatowâsewân .
41016014	Minowâdush owâbunduhán ashe bazhekwunidjin , magwouh námátábewân wesenewât , onishkâzomándush tabwatunzenit , mushkâwânik otaewân , ōnje kâtabwatowâsewân gá wâbomigoojin gá ábejebát .
41016015	Otinnândush , anegoquág áke papáezhág , papáguhgekemik meenwâjemowin kokkinná bamátizzidjig .
41016016	Ween ga tabwatunk , ga baptizeintdush , tuh gâgega bemátizze ; weendush ga tabwatunzik tuh banátizze .
41016017	Uhnew kekinowâtukin oguhnopenuhnigōnáwân tiabwatungig ; neenduhnozowinink oguh sâgitche názhowâwán Mutche Manitōn ; tuh gegetowugdush ōshke otanuhnewun ;
41016018	Oguh otâpenáwân mutche genabeekōn ; menequawâtdush mutche kago , kâ oguh manekágoozeenâwâ ; tiângenáwâtigo oninjewâng wiákoozenidjin , mego che nojemonit .
41016019	Medush eu gá eeshquâ guhnonigowât , Kekitchemanitomenán , gezhigōnk ōnje otâpená , owwe námátábe Kitche Manito ogitchenikâng .
41016020	Ságáumōg , owweguhgequawât kokkinná uhnōchigo Kitche Manitōn owetokágowân ōsōngetōn guhgequawin kakinowâtuk nopenuhtumink . Amen .
42001001	Oanje bátienowug gwaje oshebeungig owwe quiuk osittowwât ono iuheen ōnjitta tiabwatumunk ,
42001002	Tebishko quiuk gá ezhe weendummonungwâ , uhgew gá wâbundungig wiazhkut miájetáng .
42001003	Qundigo mennoizzhewabut neendenandum , ōnje wawane neengenissetotum kokkinná iuheen , wiazhkut , che oshebeumōnán wawane , manoizzhewabizzeun Theophilus ,
42001004	Quiuk keche kekandumun ono iuheen gá nōndumunin .
42001005	Herod ogemá Judeaink ogezhigutōmun , bazhek sáságewitchegâweninne Zacharias ezhenekâzo , áneka Abia ; wewun Aaron odânisun , Elizabeth ezhenekâzo .
42001006	Niyazh mennoizzhewabizzewug anosumeet Kitche Manito , bamosâng kokkinna Kitche Manito oguhgequawinink giya tebákonegawinink unishigo .
42001007	Kâdush otobenoche-emesewug , Elizabeth kâ onejânesisse ; niyazhdush kekáwug .
42001008	Gá izzhewabukdush , magwouh unnokeet , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otunnokewin anosumeet Kitche Manito andotunkigo ukko .
42001009	Sáságewitchegaweninnewug aeendotumowât , unnepeendegawâjin kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk weengwushkwushegawât .
42001010	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag aqutchink ayájig , otuhnumeatowâwân Kitche Manitōn magwouh weengwushkwushegang .
42001011	Kitche Manito omezhinowamundush owâbunduhán weow Zachariasun , ogitchenikámáng enuhkukkayá ōnje gâbowe andusshe weengwushkwushegawint .
42001012	Opedush Zacharias wiábomát , sunnágandum , sagizze .
42001013	Meezhinowandush otigōn kago sagizzekan Zacharias ; ketuhnummeawin nōndám ; kemeendemoyemishdush Elizabeth tuh oguisse , Johndush keguh ezhenekâná .
42001014	Keguh meenwandum keguh pâpenanim , nebená tuh pâpenanemowug ween ōnje .
42001015	Tuh kitche apetandágooze anosumeet Kitche Manito , kâ oguh menequaseen shomenâbo kâ giya kago mashkâwânik , tuh mooshkena Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ope negit .
42001016	Nebená Israel onejânisun Kitche Manitōn guhtuh oppuhgutchewug .
42001017	Tun negâne ween mámowy Elias ochichâgōnk giya omushkâwizzewinink che gwakenumowât ōsewân otaewân che sâgeáwât onejânisewân , che gwakenumink mache izzhewabizzidjig quiuk che izzhewabizzewât ; che gezheáwât anishanâbag che beáwât Kitche Manitōn .
42001018	Zachariasdush otinnân mezhinowan , áheen ga ezhe kekandumán o-o ? neen okewanzeew , nemeendámoyemish giya kekâ .
42001019	Mezhinowandush onuhquatágōn , neen Gabriel , anosumeet Kitche Manito neennebow nemájenizzhiegâzodush che weendumonán o-o meenwâjemowin .
42001020	Binná kâ keguh netágegetose , chebwâ ochichesag o-o gezhigut , ono iuheen che gezhetáng ; ōnje ká ketabwatunzenun neengegetowinun che tabwawinnewunk ope ochichesa .
42001021	Anishanâbagdush obeáwân Zachariasun , mámuhkâtandumōgdush kitche keenwazh uzzhenandit kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk .
42001022	Buhságáunk , kâ kushketose owwe guhnonát ; okekandánâwâdush uhgewâbundunk kago kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , otieninnummowân kâdush kushketose wegegetōt .
42001023	Gá izzhewabuk , bâbega e-e gezhigut wachichesag gá eeshquâ tát unnoke , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , unne kewa andát .
42001024	Gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono gezhigutōn , Elizabeth beunjeko náno gezisdush gázo , ekettodush ,
42001025	Me o-o Kitche Manito andotowit , ono gezhigutōn kanowâbomidjin we otâpenumowât neendágutchewin mágwaiuhe aninne .
42001026	Ningōtwâswo gezis Kitche Manito Omeezhinowamun Gabriel , Kitche Manito uzzhiát májenizzhiegâzo otanonk Galileeink , Nazareth ezhenekâta che ezhát .
42001027	Wewâbomát ōskenegequan ogegekemán aninnewun che wetegamát Joseph ezhenekâzo , David owegewamink , Mary ezhenekâzo ōshkenegequa .
42001028	Mezhinowandush obeotisigōn , otinnândush , pâpenanim , kekitche sháwandágooze , Kitche Manito kewejewik ; kekitche sháwandágooze magwa equanáng .
42001029	Wiábomátdush , kitche sunnágandum aketonit , nánáguhtuhwanindizzo wagonan atumogwan uzzheketōt .
42001030	Mezhinowandush otigon , kago sagizzekan , Mary ; Kitche Manito kegeshâwanemik .
42001031	Binná , keguh oguisse , Jesus tuh ezhenekâzo .
42001032	Guhtuh kitche apetandágooze , guhtuh ezhewenán owushema apetandágoozit Kitche Manito Oguisun ; Kitche Manitodush oguhmenán ōsun David onámátábewin .
42001033	Oguh ogemákundán Jacob owegewam gâgineek ; kâwekâdush tuh waquiásininne otogemáwewin .
42001034	Marydush otinnân meezhinowan , áneen o-o gageizzhewabuk ? kâ oweuh aninne neenkekanemigoose .
42001035	Mezhinowandush otigōn , Kitche Manito ochichâgwun keguhbeotissik , owushema apetandágoozit omushkâwizzewin keguh uhguhwâtashkág me ōnje wuhow ga negit ga ōnje ezhewenint Kitche Manito Oguisun .
42001036	Binnádush ketângoosha Elizabeth , ogegishkowâ ánuh kekât , ningōtwâswa gezis aquo ōndozhát bizzhishshiggoose uzzhiezhewenindebun :
42001037	Kokkinná iuheen tá ieendotun Kitche Manito .
42001038	Marydush eketto , binná Kitche Manito obemetágunequamun neendow , máno aketoeyunigo neenguh izzhewabiz , mezhinowandush obukkawinnegōn .
42001039	Marydush pusegwe ono gezhigutōn , buhbequhtenánik otanong Judea gázhetina ezhá .
42001040	Zacharias owegewamink unnebeendega , osuhgeninjenándush Elizabethun .
42001041	Megá izzhewabuk , Elizabeth ope nōndowât Maryun gegetonit uhbenocheun mámájewun omisutáng ; Elizabethdush mooshkin Kitche Manito ochichâgwun .
42001042	Anegōkdush gegeto , ekettodush , keshâwandágooze magwaiuhe equawug shâwandágoozedush ween gá negeut .
42001043	Ahneen o-o gageizzhewabuk , neen Kitche Manitōm ōgeen keche otishid ?
42001044	Oanje binná , pichenukigo kegegetowin n'wândumán netowugâng , uhbenoche mámáje nemisutáng pâpenanemowin ōnje .
42001045	Shâwandágooze ween tiabwatunk , ono iuheen wiáweendummowint Kitche Manito ōnje ga izzhewabuk .
42001046	Marydush eketto , neenjechâg okitchetwâweán Kitche Manitōn .
42001047	Neenjechâg pâpenahemo Kitche Manito bemájeit ōnje .
42001048	Kitche Manito ogegunnowâbomán obemetágunnequamun magwouh tuhbusandágoozit , kokkinná anishanâbag shâwandágooze neenguh egōg .
42001049	Ween gache apetandágoozit , neengegitchetotág ; kitchetwâwandágwutinne otuhnozowin .
42001050	Ogeshâwanemán uhnew gwassegoojin gâgeneek ,
42001051	Ogewâbundiewan omushkâwizzewin oninjekâng ; osiswabenán kitchetwâwanemonidjin magwouh mutche enandumowât otaewâng .
42001052	Ogitchetuhbuhsebugitenán kache apetandágoozenidjin onámátábewinewâng , otishpebuhgittenándush tuhbuhsandágoozenipun .
42001053	Ogetabeseneán bakuttanidjin wanissheshingin iuheen ; wiánutizzidjin omájenizzhowân bizzhisshik .
42001054	Ogenezhokomáwân Israelun otoskenegamun , che kunwandunk oshâwanjegawin ;
42001055	Gá ezhe guhnonát nōsenánig , Abrahamun , giya onejânisun , gâgineek .
42001056	Marydush owetegamán Elizabethun niswo gezis ; medush ope anekewat tebinowa andát .
42001057	Shegwouhdush ochichesana , Elizabeth che oguisit .
42001058	Owejetukkewamagunun , giyadush otinowamágunun , nondumōg Kitche Manito gá ezhe kitche shâwanemigoot ; pâpenanemowugdush
42001059	Gá izzhewabuk naswokoniguk gewetázhwâ uhbenocheun ; Zacharias otezhenekânáwân , uhnōzvt ōsun .
42001060	Ogeendush eketto , kâween eu , John tuh ezhenekâzo .
42001061	Otinnáwândush kâ oweuh anowamudjig o-o ezhenekâzose .
42001062	Kekinowâchichegadush ōsun , ween ga ge ezhenekánát .
42001063	Onundotándush ga oshepeunk , otoshepeándush , John ezhenekâzōt ; kokkinnádush mámuhkâtandumōg .
42001064	Otōndush bákishkâne bâbega , otanuhnew giya gashowwesinne gegetodush , ogitchetwâweát Kitche Manitōn .
42001065	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag emá ayájig sagizzewug ; kokkinnádush ono ekettowinun siswashkâwun buhbequtenâng Judeaink .
42001066	Kokkinná uhgew nōndowâjig , otaewâng otátonâwâ ekettowinun , ekettōnk owwanan uhbenochewenan ga áwit ? Kitche Manito oninj owejewegōndush .
42001067	Oasundush Zachariasun mooshkena Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , eketto .
42001068	Tuhshâwandagooze Israel ogitche Manitomun ; ogebenowwuttisshewa ogebemájeán otuhnishanâbamun .
42001069	Obeōmbinán ashkun che kunnowanemenunk David otoskenegamun owegewamink :
42001070	Mego e-e gá ekettopun mámandawizzidjig otonewâng , ōnje wiazhkut miáje ozhetōng áke :
42001071	Me konema ga ōnje bemátizzink oninjewâng kemiátawizzemenánik .
42001072	Chetotowwung azhe shâwandágoozewung gá ezhe wâweendummowintwâ kōsenánig , che kunwandumink gá ezhewâweendumágat .
42001073	Uhgemushkâwegeezhwat , gá ezhe guhgatenámemát kōsenánin Abraham .
42001074	Ketá shâwanemigonán che otoskenegamemenunk che gosásewungwâ kemiátáwizzemenánig ,
42001075	Mennobematizzewinink , quiuk izzhewabizzewinink , menik gezhigutōn ga bemátizzeyunk .
42001076	Keen giya uhbenoche ! owushema apetandágoozit omámándáwizzit keguhegōg , keguhnegâne Kitche Manito che unnetowwuhzhenegayun ;
42001077	Owwe kekándumonát otuhnishanâbamun , shâwanjegáwin , ábwayanindewindush omutche izzhewabizzewinewâ .
42001078	Oanje n'wâkung Kekitche Manitōmenán oshâwanjegawin , quiuk wâsayá ishpemink biezhenizzhuhumōnunk ,
42001079	Che wâsashkowintwâ kushkedibbikutōnk námátábidjig uhgowâtasinkdush nebowin , che quiuk kwōwetōng kezitánánig mikunnuh innuhwandewinink .
42001080	Uhbenochedush májege , sōngizzedush ochichâgōnk , buhgwuhtuhkumigángdush geiá , nánazh e-e gezhigut uhwâbundiint Israel .
42002001	Megah izzhewabuk ono gezhigutōn Caesar Augustus , ōzhetōn tepákonegawin , kokkinná ákeeng che tepiegâtag .
42002002	O-o tepáummátewin , netam uhge ozhichegâtag , Cyreneus magwouh uzzhogemáwit Syriaink .
42002003	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag ototanowink ezháwug owwe megewawât tepáummátewin .
42002004	Josephdush Galileeink ōnje máját Nazarethink , Judeaink che ezhát David ototanowink , Bethlehem atumink , ( ōnje me bazhek David otinotawizzewin . )
42002005	Che megewat tepáummátewin , mámowy Mary gá kekemájin chewewit uzzhunjekoot .
42002006	Mego gá izzhewabuk , magwouh emá uzzhiáwât , gezhigutōn tebishkosawun che negeáwusōt .
42002007	Onegeándush netam e-e ōguisun , uhbenōche okonâsemádush kushkewaginán , bazhekōkazheegdush andusshewesenewât obuhgittinán , ōnje kâ ningooche towuttasenōn usshungawegumigōnk .
42002008	Manishtânishun kanowanemájig , iáwug emá ákeeng , kunnowâbomât gittegânink otiámewân nebá dibbik .
42002009	Binnádush , Kitche Manito omezhinowamun obeotisegōwân , Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewindush ogewetáskágōnâwâ ; kitche sagizzewugdush .
42002010	Mezhinowandush otigowân , kago sagizzekago ; binná , menno-innuhkumigut kebetonim , kitche nebená anishanâbag che ōnje pâpenanemowât .
42002011	Kenegetágōnun nōngum gezhiguk , David ototanowink , ga bemájeinnag , Kitche Manito Christ .
42002012	Me o-o ga ezhe kekinnowâjetágoyag ; keguh mikkowâwá uhbenoche , uhbenoche-okonâsemán che weoquaginnegâzōt , bazhekokazheegdush andusshewesenewât che shingeshink .
42002013	Bâbegadush kitche nebená mezhinowan gezhigōnk wanje-enidjin owâbomáwân uhnumeatowwint Kitche Manito ekettōnk ,
42002014	Kitchetwâwizze Kitche Manito ogitche apetandágoozewin , ákeeng , tuh mennoinnuhwandewinewun che menno enandágoozewât kokkinná aninnewug .
42002015	Me gá izzhewabuk , ope mezhinowag gezhigōnk gá ezháwât , manishtânishun kanowanemajig i-ittewug , umbasino , Bethlehemink ezhatá , owwewâbunduntá o-o iuhe Kitche Manito wândumonunk ,
42002016	Kokkinnádush gebewawebishkâwug , omikkowâwân Maryun giya Josephun giya uhbenocheun bazhekokazheeg andusshewesenewât shingeshininit .
42002017	Opedush wiábomáwât , papáweendumágawug gá i-inintwâ uhne uhbenocheun .
42002018	Kokkinnádush nōndungig , mámukkâtandumōg , mánishtânishun kanowanemájig gá ekettowât .
42002019	Marydush okunwandánun ono iuheen , nánáguttuhwandunk otaink , uhnáguhtuhwandunk .
42002020	Manishtânishun kanowanemájigdush , kewawug , kitchetwâwandumōg megwetchenáwâtdush Kitche Manitōn , kokkinná ono iuheen ōnje , gá nōndumowât , ogewâbundánâwângo , gá enitwâ .
42002021	Nishwâswogwun gá guhbasag me uhge gewetázhoont uhbenoche , me owâwenint Jesus , ezhenekáná onozowin mezhinowan gá menigoojin bwâ negit .
42002022	Ono gezhigutōn gá kubbekosag ope bánezit , Moses otepákonegawinink gá ezhichegat Jerusalemink be-ezhewinná Kitche Manito chemenint .
42002023	( Azhepe-egâtagigo Kitche Manito otepákonegawinink , kokkinná uhbenocheug quewezansewidjig netam nágewâjin Kitche Manitōn che menáwât . )
42002024	Giya che sáságewitchegang o-o gá ekettōt Kitche Manito tebakōnegawinink ; neezh benaseug , uhgamá neezh omemeensug .
42002025	Binnádush bazhek aninne Jerusalemink andanuhkeet Simon ezhenekâzo ; wuhow quiuk manobemátizzit aninne , obetōn Israel omennowânegoozewin ; Kitche Manito ochichâgwun weowwink iáwun .
42002026	Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ogeweendumágōn , che nebosig , chebwâ wâbomát Kitche Manito Christun .
42002027	Be-ezhádush ochichâgōnk kitcheuhnumeawegumik ; Jesusdush onegeigōn bandegunnegoot uhbenocheun che totowwint gá enint Kitche Manito tepiegawin .
42002028	Ototâpenán onikang , megwetchenát Kitche Manitōn , ekettodush ,
42002029	Kitche Manito buhgitin nōngum ketoskenegam , innuhwandewinink , gá ekettoeyunigo .
42002030	Tebinōwa neenskezhigōnk nengewâbomá keshâwanjegawin ,
42002031	Azhe ozhetowwutwâ anosummeskezhik kokkinná anishanâbag ;
42002032	Wâsayá che wâsashkowwintwâ miátawizzidjig , giya ketuhnishanâbamun Israel ogitchetwâwizzewinewâ .
42002033	Josephdush giya ōgeen mámukkâtandumōg anduhzhindumingin .
42002034	Simeondush oshâwanemán uhnew , otinnândush Maryun , binná , wuhow uhbenoche námátábeá nebewá che ōnje pongesinowât minowâdush che pusegwewât , Israelink , giya kekinowâchichegawin che mutche tuhzhindumink ;
42002035	( Kagatdush uzzhoweshk tuh sháboose keowwink giya ) nebewâ otaewân otenandumowinewâ tuhbákishkânewun .
42002036	Bazhekdush equa Anna , mamándáwizzit , Phanuel odânisun , Aser otinowamágunink ; ápiche kekâ , neezhwâswa kekenonōwin uhgewetegamá onabamun , ōshkenegequawin ōnje .
