42002037	Neezhwâswa usshenewindush kekenonōwin ge shegawe , káwekâdush geságáunze kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , kubba kezhik kubba dibbik otuhnumeatowwân Kitche Manitōn muhkuhtakatdush .
42002038	Shegwouh buhpeendegat , megwetchenán Kitche Manitōn , otuzzhemándush Jesusun kokkinná uhgew nandowâbundunk bemáje-ewawin Jerusalemink .
42002039	Gá eeshquâ táwât kokkinná iuheen Kitche Manito tepákonegat , kewawug Galileeink , tebinowa ototanuhwewân Nazareth .
42002040	Uhbenochedush kitche maje-ege , kitche sōngege ochichâgōnk , mooshkena nebwâkâwin ; Kitche Manitodush ogitche sâge-ewawin omooshkenashkágōn .
42002041	Onegeigōndush andusso kekenonowin ezháwun Jerusalemink , tussink wachichesagin kubbekosa wekoondewin .
42002042	Usshe neezho pepōnuggizzit , ezháwug Jerusalemink aeendotumowâpunukko wekoōndewinink .
42002043	Ope tabishkosanik menik gezhigutōn , ukko ayáwât kewawug , uhbenochedush Jesus uhbe ishquieyâng Jerusalemink ; Josephdush giya ōgeen kâ okekanemásewân .
42002044	Ge unne májátōk , mámowy anishanâbag enandumōg , ningo gezis bamosawug , medush nundowâbomáwât magwaiuhe anowamáwâjin giya naguhtuhwanemáwâjin .
42002045	Kwânowâbomáwâtdush , nayáb kewawug Jerusalemink , nundowâbomáwât .
42002046	Me gá izzhewabuk ; naswogwunigutinik omikkowâwân kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , nussowwiuhe námátábe guhgequaweninnewun , bezindowwât gá gegetonit giyadush kuhkuhquajemáwât ekettowinun .
42002047	Kokkinnádush nōndágoojin , mámukkâtandumōg , azhe nebwâkât giya ane ezhe nuhquatunk .
42002048	Ope ( onegeigōn ) wiábomáwât mámukkâtandumōg , ōgeendush otigōn , neenguis , áneen wanje totowweyâng ? binná , kōs , neen giya kepapánundonaōninnemin kushkándumáng .
42002049	Otinnândush uhnew , ánishween nundonaoeyag ? kânuh kekekanduhzeem ōnjittá che papáunnokeyán nōs otenunokewin ?
42002050	Kâdush onissetotunzeenâwâ , wanje ekettōt .
42002051	Otunnewejewândush , Nazarethink , shezháwât odebanemegootdush onegeigōn , ōgeendush okunwandánun kokkinná ono okettowinun otaink ,
42002052	Jesusdush ashkum nebwâkâ , ashkum unnenetáwiggit Kitche Manitōn osâgeigōn giya aninnewun osâgeigōn .
42003001	Usshenahno kekenonowin Tiberias Caesar geogemáwe , Pontius Pilate ogemáwe Judeaink , Herod ogemáwe Galileeink , wekânisun Philipundush ogemáwe Itureaink , Trachonitis giya enuhkuhkakumik , Lysaniasdush ogemáwe Abileneink ,
42003002	Annas giya Caiphas ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , Kitche Manito odikitowin John , Zacharias oguisun ototisigōn buhgwuttuhkumigáng .
42003003	Beiezhádush kokkinná otunnuhkewinink Jordan , guhgequa baptizewawin ánwanindizzowin , omázheninnewuggizzewinewâ che ánwanindizzowât ;
42003004	Azhebe-egâtagigo Esaias mamándáwizzit omazaniegunink , inwawin nōndágwut buhgwuttuhkumigáng , mikunnâkowwint Kitche Manito quiuk wuhmotowwint .
42003005	Andusso wânuhtinág tuh mooshkena , kokkinnádush wudjewun giya pequttenán tuhtuhbuhsinegâtawun ; wâwâwushkág tuh quiukkoochegâta , uhgâwâg tuh shōshkoochegâtag ;
42003006	Kokkinnádush aninnewun oguhwâbundánâwâ Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin .
42003007	Otinnândush anishanâban , gábe ságáumowât che baptizeiggowât , mutche genabekotōk ! owwanan gá guhgázomik che ozhindumag nishkâtizzewin ga tuhkoshinomugguk ?
42003008	Netáwiggetōg weágimmenun ánwanindizzowin , kago enandum kago che i-ittezoeyag Abraham nōsinán keche ekettoeyag , ketenenim Kitche Manito otá kushketōn ono ásineen che ōnje ozheat Abraham onejânisun .
42003009	Wâgâqut chegegebeek metigōnk atta ; kokkinnádush metigōg manomenewisissigwâ tuhguhwâwâwug ishkotang uzzhoppugenintwa .
42003010	Anishanâbandush okuhquajemigōn , ekettōnk , áneen ga teyang ?
42003011	Otinnândush uhnew , ween názhininik obuhbeenzikowâgunun , oguh menán ayásininit ; ween weyâs ayát , me giya ween ga totunk .
42003012	Mowōnjichegajig tepáummatewindush tuhkōshinōg owe baptizemigoozewât , otinnáwândush , Neendogemám áneen ga teyung ?
42003013	Otinnândush , kago owushema nuhgindun kago tepágonegawin menik gá inuhgindumōnág .
42003014	Shemágunishundush okuhquajemigōn , ekettōnk , áneen ga teyung ? otinnândush kago oweuh mutchetotowâkago , kago oweuh aninne unishâ oppuhgutche-issittowwâkago ; ezheniandumōg ketepáummágowinewâ .
42003015	Kokkinnádush aninnewug , enandumōg otaewâng tuzzhemint John ween Christ wiáwegwan ?
42003016	Johndush nuhquatunk otinnân kokkinná , kebaptizeninnim nebe ōnje ; bazhekdush benopenuhzhit kitche owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozeán , ká neenduhpetandágoozisse ometikwukkizzenun che ábuhummowwugebun : ween keguh baptizemigowa Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ōnje , giya ishkota .
42003017	Noskâchegun otuhkonán oninjeeng , oguhbenetōn obuhgundiegun , oguhmowōjetōn puhquazhegun ototossowinink ; shegooshkiegunundush oguh châgizánun ishkotang wekâ wiátaunzeeng .
42003018	Kitche nebewâdush uhnōch kago oguhgequawin oguhgekimán anishanâban .
42003019	Heroddush ogemá gágesheguhnonit Herodias ōnje , wekânisun Philipun owewinne , kokkinnádush uhnōch gá ezhe mutchetotunk Herod .
42003020	Me o-o owushema uhgemutchetotunk , menik gábe ieendotunk uhgekepáquowât Johnun , uzzhowwakânát .
42003021	Gá izzhewabuk ope kokkinná anishanâban biáptizeintwâ , Jesus giya ge baptizeá uzzhuhnumeátdush gezhik bakishkâ ,
42003022	Kitche Manito ochichâgwundush omemeeng ezhenágooze bwânesundágoojin , gegetowindush gezhigōnk geōnjemugut , ekettōnk , keen siágeug neenguis ; neengitche nunniandum .
42003023	Jesusdush shie niswemetunuh tusso kekenonowuggizze ; ( anishanâbag enandumōg ) Joseph oguisun : me wuhow Joseph , Heli oguisun ,
42003024	Ween Matthat oguisun , Levi oguisun , Melchi oguisun , Janna oguisun , Joseph oguisun ,
42003025	Mattathias oguisun , Amos oguisun , Naum oguisun , Esli oguisun , Nagge oguisun ,
42003026	Maath oguisun , Mattathias oguisun , Semei oguisun , Joseph oguisun , Juda oguisun ,
42003027	Joanna oguisun , Rhesa oguisun , Zorobabel oguisun , Salathiel oguisun , Neri oguisun ,
42003028	Melchi oguisun , Addi oguisun , Cosam oguisun , Elmodam oguisun , Er oguisun ,
42003029	Jose oguisun , Eliezer oguisun , Jorim oguisun , Matthat oguisun Levi oguisun ,
42003030	Simeon oguisun , Juda oguisun , Joseph oguisun , Jonan oguisun , Eliakim oguisun ,
42003031	Melea oguisun , Menan oguisun , Mattatha oguisun , Nathan oguisun , David oguisun ,
42003032	Jesse oguisun , Obed oguisun , Booz oguisun , Salmon oguisun , Naasson oguisun ,
42003033	Aminadab oguisun , Aram oguisun , Esrom oguisun , Phares oguisun , Juda oguisun ,
42003034	Jacob oguisun , Isaac oguisun , Abraham oguisun , Thara oguisun , Nachor oguisun ,
42003035	Saruch oguisun , Ragau oguisun , Phalec oguisun , Heber oguisun , Sala oguisun ,
42003036	Cainan oguisun , Arphaxed oguisun , Sem oguisun , Noe oguisun , Lamech oguisun ,
42003037	Mathusala oguisun , Enoch oguisun , Jared oguisun , Maleleel oguisun , Cainan oguisun ,
42003038	Enos oguisun , Seth oguisun , Adam oguisun , Kitche Manito oguisun .
42004001	Jesusdush mooshkenashkágōn Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , Jordanink ōnje májá , ochichágomádush buhgwuttuhkumigâng otezhewinegōn ,
42004002	Nemetunuhtusogwundush Mutche Manitōn okuhquadebanemigōn . Ono gezhigutōn kâ ōnje wesenese ; ono gezhigutōn kabasag , wewesenit .
42004003	Mutche Manitōndush otigōn , Kitche Manito oguisun wiáwewunan , guhgâzōndun o-o ásin che puhquazhegunewung .
42004004	Jesusdush otinnân , oshebe-egâtag , aninne kâweenigo atuh puhquazhegun tuh ōnje bemátizzisse , kokkinná go giya Kitche Manito odikittowin .
42004005	Mutche Manitodush , wudjewink otezhewinán , owâbundiegoot kokkinná otuhnukewinun anegoquág áke ningo buhsungábowinink .
42004006	Mutche Manitodush otinnân , kokkinná o-o mushkâwizzewin keguh menin , giya ogitchetwâwizzewinnewâ ; ōnje neengemenigōm , oweuh go neendámená anandumán .
42004007	Kishpin uhnumeatowweyun ochicheengwunittowweyun , kokkinná keen keguh debandán .
42004008	Jesus oguhnonán otinnân , neempukwunâng ezhán Mutche Manito : ozhebe-egâta , keguh uhnumeatowwâ Kitche Manito , ween atuh keguh debánenik .
42004009	Jerusaleminkdush obe-ezhewinán , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk ogitcheiuhe onámátábeán , otinnândush , kishpin keen Kitche Manito oguisun , áweyun nesegwoshkonin omá .
42004010	Oanje ozhebe-egâta , oguhguhnonán omezhinowamun che kunnowanemikwâ :
42004011	Keguh tasinnegōgdush oninjewâng wekâ che betakoozetashinzewun ásineeng .
42004012	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , ekettōm , kâween keguh kuhgwadebanemáse Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitomun .
42004013	Mutche Manitodush ane guhbatotunk kokkinná azhe kuhgwadebanemát , obuhkawinán wanebeek .
42004014	Jesusdush kewa ochichâgomá omushkawizzewinink Galileeink : papátuhtepájemádush kokkinná o-o otuhnuhkewinink ,
42004015	Guhgequadush otuhnumeawegumigōwâng , kokkinná anishanâban ogitchetwâwanemigōndush .
42004016	Nazarethinkdush betuhkoshin , gátuzzhe netáwegit , ieendotunk ukko , unnebeendega uhnumeawegumigōnk unwabewinnegezhigutinik , kunnowâbundunk mazaniegun .
42004017	Eninumnowwâdush Esais mamándáwizzit omazaniegun : piákenunkdush mazaniegun , omikkowân she oshepe-egâtanik ,
42004018	Kitche Manito ochichâgwun neowwink iá , ōnje neenduhnōnik che guhgekemugwâ katemákizzidjig ; neenduhnōnik kechenojemotoyán , bakooshkág otaemán , che guhgekemugwâ buhgitinittewin owwâkânug che menint wâbewin kuhgebeengwajig , che buhgittinnegâzowât gwatugeinjig ,
42004019	Che tebátotán Kitche Manito omennowânegoozewin oke kinonowin .
42004020	Obuhtuhbenán mazaniegun , nayábdush omenán sáságewitchegaweninnewun azhe námátábitdush , kokkinnádush oskezhigowân abidjig uhnumeawegumigōnk meenjemosinnewun weowink .
42004021	Omájedush i-inán , nōngum gezhigut o-o ozhepe-egun tabwawinewun ketowwugáng .
42004022	Kokkinnádush wetokâzowug , kokkinná mámukkátandumōg mennogegetowinun ōnje ságáumomugut otonink . Ekettowugdush , kânuh áwissewun Joseph oguisun ?
42004023	Otinnândush , ōnjittá keguh ezhim o-o buhbawatágoozewin ; muskekeweninne , nojemoittezoon ; kokkinná menik n'wândumáng gá ieendotumun Capernaumink , ieendotun emá andanuhkeyun .
42004024	Ekettodush , kagat , ketenenim , kokkinná mamándáwizzidjig kâgwetch papámanemásewug tebinowa andánuhkewât .
42004025	Neendabwa aninuhgook , nebewá shegág Israelink iáwug Elias ogezhigutomink , ope gezhik kepáquiegâtag niswa kekenonowin ningōtwâswa gezis , ope ga kitche buhkuttawinewunk kokkinná ákeeng :
42004026	Elias bazhek atuh otanuh izzhenázhiegâzo Sareptaink otanuh Zidonink , equa shágáwit uzzhiát .
42004027	Bátienowug wamegejig Israelink , magwouh Eliseus mamándáwizzit , kâdush oweuh benichegâzose , meatuh Naaman Syrianun .
42004028	Kokkinná uhnumeawegumigōnk beendik ayájig , ope n'wândumowât ono iuheen kitche nishkâtizzewug ,
42004029	Pusegwewug , osâgitche gândowâwân otanonk , aquo gebuhgittenánink otezhewenáwân , owwe neeswabenint .
42004030	Nussowiego unne ezhádush shegwouh uhmáját ,
42004031	Capernauminkdush be-ezhá , otanuh Galileeink , uhguhgekemát unwabewinnegezhigutinnegin .
42004032	Mámukkâtandumōgdush oguhgequawin , gegetowin mushkâvâtinik .
42004033	Uhnumeawegumigōnkdush aninne Mutche Manitōn otiá wân , ázhequadush .
42004034	Eketto , boneisshináng ; áneen gatotonâng , Jesus Nazarethink ? kebenisshe wunnájeimin innuh ? neenkekanemin wiáweun , Kitche Manito okitche mennobemátizzit .
42004035	Jesusdush onishkâcheguhnōnát eketto , pezân ián , beságáun . Mutche Manitodush gáwewabenát nussowwiuhe obesâgizzenotowwân kâdush owesuggikkowâseen .
42004036	Kokkinnádush mámukkâtandumōg , i-ittewugdush , ekettowug , wagonan ekettowinenandush o-o ! tabanindinjin otezhemán wânizzenit Mutche Manitōn mego beságáuminit .
42004037	Kokkinnádush papátuhtepájemá emá otuhnuhkewinink .
42004038	Pusegwedush uhnumeawegumigōnk ōnje , owwe peendega Simon andát . Simondush oziggoozisun kitche ákooze : okuhquajemáwândush ween ōnje .
42004039	Onebowittowwândush guhnotunk ákoozewin , ákoozewindush azhe nuhgunnegoot ; bâbegadush onishkâ unnoketowwat .
42004040	Anepogeshemōk , kokkinná wiákoozenidjin aiáwájig , betowwâ otânginándush kokkinná nojemoándush .
42004041	Mutche Manitōn giya nebewâ osâgizzenotágowân , ázhequawugdush keen Christ , Kitche Manito oguisun , weendush nishkâcheguhnonán chegegetosinit ōnje okekanemáwân Christ áwit .
42004042	Wiábuninikdush obuhkawinán , buhgwuttuhkumigáng ezhá ; anishanâbagdush onundonawâwân , obeotisáwândush ogenuhummowâwât che májásinit .
42004043	Otinnândush , neenguhguhgequa Kitche Manito otogemáwewin ánint otanowun giya me eu biezhe uhnonigoyán .
42004044	Guhgequadush uhnumeawegumigōnk Galileeink .
42005001	Gah izzhewabuk , anishanâban weoquashkágoot , owwe nōndumowât Kitche Manito odikittowin chegebeeg nebowwe kitchegummeeng Gennesaret ,
42005002	Neezhdush nábequânun owâbundánâwân kitchegummeeng ; n'wâjekegoewajig geságáumowâgobun , ogesebeginá wândush otussubbewân .
42005003	Owwe boze bazhek nábequânink , Simon onábequân , okuhquajemán chenemenáwagânduhunk punge , námátábedush , anishanâbandush chegebeeg nebowwinit , oguhgekemándush .
42005004	Ashquâ gegetōtdush , otinnân Simonun , náwidj , keenweendumág ezhán buhgittin ketusubeeg kegoiug che peendáummowât .
42005005	Simondush nuhquatowân , otinnân , Neendogemám kubba dibbik neengebuhgittowân , kâdush kago neengenetosemin , mánodush aketoyun neenguhbuhgittenán neendussub .
42005006	Gá buhgittenáwât otussubbewân , kitche nebewâ kegoiun obeenduhánâwân otussubbewândush bekooshkâwun .
42005007	Owâtummawâwân bazhek nábequánun iánidjin , che bewejeiggowât , betuhkoshinōgdush , niyazh nábequânun obozeáwân kegoiun , niyazhdush keendâshkotawun .
42005008	Simon Peterdush wiábundunk , pongesin Jesus ochicheengwunánink , otinnándush , pukkawezhishsheshin , Neendogemám ; ōnje mutcheizzhewabizzit aninne neendow .
42005009	Mámukkâtandum , kokkinná giya wajewegoojin mámukkâtandumōg , enigoquakumik kegoiug otâpenintwâ :
42005010	Giyadush James giya John , Zebedee oguisun , mámukkâtandumōg , Simon owâjewegoojin . Jesusdush otinnân Simonun , kago ságizzekan ; náágutch aninnewug keguh nojeág .
42005011	Onábequânewândush buhguhbáwât ákeeng , onuhguttánâwâ kokkinná uhnopenuhnáwât .
42005012	Me gá izzhewabuk , magwouh bazhek otanong , uzzhiát , binná , aninne mooshkena omegewin ; wiábomát Jesusun , pongesin oskezhigōnk , ekettodush , Neendogemám , enandumun , ketá bene .
42005013	Shebinnekanedush eketto , neendenandum owwe benezin ; bâbegadush omegewin onuhgunnegoon .
42005014	Ogenuhumowândush , oweuh aninne che weendummowwâsig ; májá owwe wâbundi-ih sáságewitchegaweninne keow , sáságewitchegan Moses gá ezhe guhgekemenag .
42005015	Ashkum owushema tuhtepájemá ; kitche nebewâdush anishanâbag bemowōnjeittewug we bezindumowât giya uhnánojemoiggowât wiyiákoozidjig .
42005016	Buhgwuttuhkumigángdush ezhá owwe uhnumeát .
42005017	Me gá izzhewabuk ningōtink , magwouh guhgequat , emá námátábewug Phariseeug tabákonegajig , beōnje ságáunjig kokkinná otanowun Galileeink , Judeaink giya Jerusalemink : Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewindush emá iá che nojemoiggowât .
42005018	Binnádush , aninnewug benáwug nebágunink bazhek aninne nebowe ; ogooche beendegunáwândush owwe-buhgittenumowâwât anosumábit .
42005019	Kashketosigwâ we peendegunáwât , ozâm kippuggegâbowewât , ogittegumink ezháwug nowwiuhe uhnázhebuhgittenánâwân nebágunink nowwiuhe anosumeet Jesus .
42005020	Wiábundunk mushkâwandumowât , otinnân aninnewun , kemázheninnewuggizzewin kemenowweshâwandágooz .
42005021	Oshebe-egaweninnewug giya Phariseeug , máje i-ekettowug owwanan wuhow buh mutche gágegetōt ? Owwanan ga menowweshawanjegat mázheninnewuggizzewin ween atuh Kitche Manito ?
42005022	Jesusdush ope kakanemát ananduminit , otinnân , áneen anandumag ketaewâng ?
42005023	Ahneen nowutch wianepunuk , che ekettōnk , kemázheninnewuggizzewin kemenowweshâwandágooz ; uhgamá che ekettōnk , onishkân bamosan ?
42005024	Che ōnje kekandumag Aninne Oguisun uhkushketōt uhmenowweshâwanjegat mázheninnewuggizzewin , ( otinnân nábowwinidjin ) ketenin , onishkân , otâpin kenebágun , andáyum ezhán .
42005025	Bâbegadush onishkâ , anosumewât kokkinná , ototâpenán onebágun andát uzzhezhát megwetch uzzhenát Kitche Manito .
42005026	Kokkinnádush mámukkâtandumōg , megwetch otinnáwân Kitche Manitōn kitche sagizzewug , ekettōnk , neengewâbundámin miámukkâtandágwuk nōngum gezhiguk .
42005027	Gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen , geságáum , mowōnjichegat tepáummatewin Levi ezhenekâzo owâbomán , tepákonegawegumigōnk námátábe : otinnândush , benopenuhzheshin .
42005028	Kokkinnádush onuhguhtán , pusegwe , uhnopenánát .
42005029	Levidush okitche wekomán tebinowa owegewamink ; kitche bátienowun mowōnjichegaweninnewun , giya ánint owetopoman .
42005030	Oshebe-egaweninnewugdush giya Phariseeug onishkâcheguhnonáwân otoskenegamene ekettōnk , wagonan wanje wetopomagwâ wejemenequamagwâ mowōnjichegajig giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig ?
42005031	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinnândush , uhgew manobemátizzidjig kâween we nuhnándowweiggoozissewug ; uhgew atuh wiákoozidjig ,
42005032	Kâween uhgew manobemátizzidjig neembe ōnje ezháse , uhgew atuh miázheninnewuggizzidjig che ánwanindizzowât .
42005033	Otinnáwândush áneen ween John otoskenegamun , wanje muhkuttakawât nuhningim , uhnumeáwâtdush , Phariseeug giya otoskeneganiewân me giya weenowâ andotumowât ; keendush ketoskenegamug wesenewug menequawug ?
42005034	Otinnândush , magwouh anuhwandejig mámowy iáwât wâwewit , kâ kushketosewug che muhkuttákawât .
42005035	Pánemá ningōtink ope wâwewit ga nuhgunánâwân , ope bakawinittewâjin , tuh kushkandumōg .
42005036	Otinnândush , buhbawatágoozewinink , kâ oweuh aninne otááttoseen ōshke manitowagin , gata buhbeenzikowâgunink , kishpin áttōt owushema támanátut .
42005037	Kâdush oweuh aninne ōshke shomenâbo otá attoseen gata omotâng omotag tá bekooshkág , shomenâbodush tá segissa , omotagdush tá banátut .
42005038	Oashke shomenâbo koshuh ōshke omotâng otattōnâwâ niyazhdush wawane kunwanjegâtag .
42005039	Kâdush oweuh aninne magwouh menequat gata shomenâbo bâbega otánundotunze ōshke shomenâbo , gataiuhe nowutch onissheshin eketto .
42006001	Gah izzhewâbukdush áneká unwabewinnegezhigutinik ogeshábooshkowân mandáminun , otoskenegamundush omuhmebináwân mandáminun uzzhumowâwât .
42006002	Phariseeugdush otinnáwân , wagonan wanje totumag eu ketátotunzeem unwabewinnegezhigutinik ?
42006003	Jesusdush otinnân , kânuh wekâ kegenōnduhzeem David gá totunk ope bakatat giyadush bakatawât uhnew wâjewájin ?
42006004	Uzhunne peendega kitche uhnumeawegumik , omejindush puhquazhegun , omenándush wâjewâjin , anandágoozit che mejesig , meatuh sáságewitchegaweninnewug anandágoozewât che mejewât .
42006005	Otinnândush , Aninne Oguisun odebandán unwabewinnegezhigut giya ,
42006006	Gá izzhewabukdush minowâ unwabewinnegezhigut , ge peendega uhnumeawegumik uhguhgequat : bazhekdush aninne emá iá ogitcheninj shágwâkuttane :
42006007	Oshebe-egaweninnewug giya Phariseeus ogunnowâbomáwân , che wâbomáwât che nojemoát unwabewinnegezhigutinik ; ningotono che ezhe mutchetotowâwât .
42006008	Okekanemán ananduminit otinnândush aninnewun , shagwâkuttat oninje , pusegween omá nábowwin , pusegwedush nábowwe .
42006009	Jesusdush otinnân anishanâban , kewekuhquajeminenim , bezbek kago ; quiuk innuh tá izzhewabut menototumink unwabewinnegezhigut uhgamá mutche totumink , bemátizzewin che bemájeint , uhgamá che bánájeint ?
42006010	Gunnowâbomátdush kokkinná , otinnân aninnewun shebinnekanin , shebinnekanedush , oninj ; beenjewamugutinnedush tebishko e-e bazhek ezhenágwutinne .
42006011	Mooshkenagetâshowugdush ; gegetowugdush gawetotowâwât Jesusun .
42006012	Gá izzhewabuk ono gezhigutōn , wudjewink ezhá owwe uhnumeá , kubbadibbikdush iá uzhuhnumeatowwât Kitche Manitōn .
42006013	Wiábuninikdush , onundomán otoskenegamun ; ussheneezhdush oguheginán anoninjigdush otezhenekánán ;
42006014	Simon ( Peter giya ezhenekánán ) giya Andrew wekânisun , James giya John , Philip giya Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew giya Thomas , James , Alpheus oguisun , giya Simon Zelotes ezhenekázo ,
42006016	Judas , James wekânisun giya Judas ga buhgittinnegoojin .
42006017	Buhnesâkewat wejewân onebowwe mashkotank ; mámowy kokkinná otoskenegamun , kitche nebenádush anishanâban Judeaink wanjebájig giya Jerusalemink chegebeegdush kitche gummeeng Tyre giya Zidon wanjebájig obezindágoot , nojemoátdush wiákoozinidjin ;
42006018	Uhgewedush wânizzinidjin Manitōn gagishkow wâjig ; ototisigōnâwâ nojemoáwugdush .
42006019	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag wegoochetowug owwe tângináwât ; mushkâwizzewindush osâgizzenotagōn kokkinnádush bojemoát .
42006020	Otōmbinán oskezhigōn ogunnowâbomándush otoskenegamun ekettodush ; keshâwandágoozim katemákizzeyag Kitche Manito otogemáwewin keenowâ ketebandánâwâ .
42006021	Keguh shâwandágoozim menik buhkuttayag nōngum ; keguhtabesineem ; keshâwandágoozim keenowâ maweyag , nōngum ; keguh pâpim .
42006022	Keshâwandágoozim menik aninnewug shânganeminágwâ , pukkawinnázho-onágwâ owwe wejewissinowagwá , mutchetuzzheminágwâ Aninne Oguisun ōnje .
42006023	Pâpenanemoeyeuk eu gezhigut ; binná ketepáummágowinewâ tuh kitche apetandágwuk gezhigōnk ; debishko ōsewân gá totowwât manitowâzonidjin .
42006024	Kesunnágizzim koshuh che kuhgwâtuggittoeyag menik wiánuttizzeyag ! kegetiánun wanisheshingin ketiemun .
42006025	Kesunnágizzim menik tiabissineyag ! keguh buhkuttam . Kesunnágrizzim menik piápeyag nōngum ! keguh mowwim , keguh ázhequam .
42006026	Kesunnágizzim keguh kuhgwâtugittōm menik aninnewug nōngum manoguhnoninágwa ! me debishko osewân gá totowwânit kuhgenowishkidjig manitowâzojig .
42006027	Ketenenimdush keenowâ menik nōnaowweyag , sâge kemiátáwizzemug , manototow shângenemikkig ,
42006028	Shâwanim kákámikkig , uhnumeatummow mutche totōkwâ .
42006029	Oweuh buhkittaōk nuhbuhnashezhik , meezh ázhowweskezhik : giya oweuh otâpenunk kebuhbeenzikowâgun , máno oguh otâpenán giya kekitche buhbeenzikowâgun .
42006030	Meezh kokkinná aninnewug ga nundotumokwâ , oweuhdush otâpenunk ketunnokâjegun , kago nundotummowâkan minowâ .
42006031	Azhe nundowwanemutwâ aninnewug chetotōkwâ , me giya keenowâ totowwikōg .
42006032	Kishpin siágeikkig ságeutwâ , áneen ween enábuhtuk ? miázheninnewuggizzidjig osâgeáwân sâgeiggowâjin .
42006033	Kishpin manototowagwâ manototonágook , áneen ween enábuhtuk ? miázheninnewuggizzidjig mego e-e giya andotumowât .
42006034	Owweutwâ uhgew kekekanemutwa che tepáumokwâ , áneen ween enabuhtuk ? Miázheninnewuggizzidjig wuhtowweáwân miâzheninnewuggizzinidjin , me go e-e minowâ menik che iámowât .
42006035	Sâgeikōg kemiátáwizzemewâg , menototun , owwe-ewan , kago ween kago nundowwandunkago ; ketepáummágowwinnewâdush tuh kitche apetandágwut , owushema kache apetandágoozit keguh onejânissemigowâ , ween omennototowân uhnew miámoyáwuhmegoosigoon giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig .
42006036	Keshawâtizzig , Kōsewâ azhe keshawâtizzit .
42006037	Kago tepágonegakago , kâ keguh tepákonegâzoseen kago mutche tuzzhemá kago oweuh , kâ giya keenowâ , oweul keguh mutche tuzzhemigoosewâ , mennowweshâwanemág , kegun mennoweshâwandágoozimdush .
42006038	Menikōg , keguhmenigōm giya keenowâ ; mooshkenag tepiegun kuhginjetáegâtag , mámigobetōng , che názhesag bazhetushkenag aninnewug nayab keguhmenigowâg kekákegunnewâng . Mego e-e tepiegundush ga tepiegang che tepáummágoyun minowâ .
42006039	Buhbawatágoozewin oweendumowân uhnew : kagebeengwat otásuggábegenan innuh kagebeengwanidjin ? kânuh niyazh tuh pongesinzewug wânekânink ?
42006040	Oskenegamemá kâ owushema apetandágoozisse otogemámun apetandágoozinit ; kokkinná quiuk bamátizzidjig otogemámun azhewabizzinit tuh izzhewabizze .
42006041	Ahnde wabundumun náchegánik , kekânis oskezhigōnk , kâdush kekekanduhze kitche metig tebinowa keskezhigōnk attag ?
42006042	Ahneen ga enutebun kekânis , nekânis muhmebetoyán náchegág keskezhigōnk kâdush kewâbunduhze e-e metig tebinowa keskezhigōnk attag ? Kuhgianizzeyun , sâgitcbewabenun netam metig attag keskezhigōnk medush wawane che wâbundumowut , che webittowut kekânis nachegág oskezhigōnk .
42006043	Wanisshezhit metig kâwekâ mutche menewisse ; mutche metigdush kâween mennomenewisse .
42006044	Kokkinná metig ōnje kekandágooze uhmenewit ; aninne mawezosig kitche shomenun menasagâwunjeeng , shomenundush tuhtuhgágomenágâwunjeeng .
42006045	Manobematizzit aninne mennotahat , omennonetáwiggittōn wanissheshink ; machebemátizzit aninne machetahat , mache kago netáwiggittōt : omooshkenawinink otaink otonink ōnje gegeto .
42006046	Wagonan Neendogemám , Neendogemám , wanje ezheyag kâdush ween aketoeyán ketotunzeem ?
42006047	Owwagwan gabeotisegwan bazindunk neendikittowinun , aeendotunk , keguh wâbundi-innenim anandágoozinidjin .
42006048	Anineeng anandágooze , wazhetōt owegewam , timmeyánek otōzhissitōn , ázhebekōnk , ōpe mooshkuhung nebe bakittajewung , kâ mámázekâsenōn , ōnje uhge ozhissetōn ázhebekōnk .
42006049	Weendush , d'wândunk kâdush totunze , anineeng ezhenágooze ákeengigo otozhissitōn wegewam , nebedush bakittajewuninnik , bâbegadush pongesininne , bánátukdush e-e wegewam kitche apetandágwut .
42007001	Gah eeshquâ iekettōt kokkinná ono gegetowinun , anishanâbag bezindumowât Capernaumink beendega .
42007002	Shemágunisshe ogemádush emá andát otoskenegamun ákooze kagâ nebo .
42007003	N'wândunkdush Jesusun iánit unnoke okewanzeun Jewun otuhnōnán okuhquajemán che be-ezhát che nojemoát otoskenegamun .
42007004	Bowotisawât Jesusun , owawebemáwân bâbega , ekettōnk , mennoizzhewabizze wuhow aninne che totowwintebun :
42007005	Osâgean wâtokotáteyángig , neengeozhetoeyandush uhnumeawegumik .
42007006	Jesusdush otunnewejewân ; gwetchigodush bazhew bowotituminit owegewam shemágunisshe ogemá otuhnōnán otinowamágunun , ekettōnk , Neendogemám , kago megooshkâcheittezokan kâ neenda apetandágoozisse che peendegayumbun andáyán ;
42007007	Eu ōnje kâ neenda apetandágoozisse neenge enandum che beotisinámbán , ekettōnigo e-e gegetowin , neendoskenegamundush tuh nojemo .
42007008	Oanje shemágunishug neendebanemág , bazhek máján anugim , májádush , minowâ bazhek anugin , bemáján bemádush neendoskenegamundush o-o totun , anugin , totumdush .
42007009	Jesusdush n'wândunk ono iuheen , mámukkâtandum , gwaketádush guhnōnát anishanâban n'wâpenuhnigoojin , kâwekâ neendezhemikkunzeen mushkâwandumowin azhe kitche mushkâwandunk wuhow aninne , kâween Israelink .
42007010	Uhgewedush anoninjig , kewawug wegewamink , wiákoozenidjin omikkowâwân genojemōnit .
42007011	Gá izzhewabutdush wiábuninik unnebeendega otanowink Nain ezhenekâta ; nebewâdush otoskenegamun otunnewejewigōn , nebewâdush anishanâban .
42007012	Bazhew bowotitumowât kitche ishquandum otanong , binná , aninne gá nebōt bemeságizzeá , meatuh bazhekwuninnit oguisun meendomoyeá shegawe , nebewádush anishanâbag eu otanuh owejewegōn .
42007013	Opedush Kitche Manito ( Jesus ) wiábomát oshâwanemán otinnândush equawun kago mowwekan .
42007014	Obetânginándush tasâkonegán ; gá nebōt uhbemewinint bamewinájigdush nogegâbowewug , ekettodush , ōshkenowa onishkân ketenin .
42007015	Weendush uhgánebopun onishkâ námátábe , máje gegeto ; omenándush ogene .
42007016	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag sagizzewug ; kitchetwâwanemáwândush Kitche Manitōn ekettōnk kache mamándáwizzit ketotissigonán , Kitche Manito obemowwuttissán otuhnishanâbamun ;
42007017	O-o tepájemowin kokkinná tatakosana Judeaink kokkinnádush e-e tunnuhkewinink .
42007018	Johndush otoskenegamun oweendumágōn kokkinná ono iuheen .
42007019	Johndush onundomán neezh otoskenegamun , otuhnōnán che ezhánit Jesusun , ekettōnk , keen innuh wâtuhkoshingebun , uhgamá pichenuk innuh neenguh beánán bakánizzit ?
42007020	Uhgew aninnewugdush bowotissá wât Jesusun , ekettowug , John Baptist neengeuhnōnigonán , ekettōnk , keen innuh wâtuhkoshingebun ? uhgamá neenguh beánán innuh bakânizzit ?
42007021	Mego e-e tepiegun nebewá onojemoán wiákoozenidjin , giya wajebinnegoonidjin , giya Mutche Manitōn gagishkowwajig , nebewâdush kagebeengwanidjin owâbeán .
42007022	Jesus oguhnonán , otinnândush , májág , weendumowwik Johnun menik kago wiábundumag giya menik n'wândumag ; kagebeengwapuneeg azhewâbewât nanepenizzepuneeg bamosawug , wamegidjig benizzewug , kagebisshapuneeg nōndumōg , gá nebopuneeg onishkâwug , katemákizzidjig meenwâjemowin guhgekimáwug .
42007023	Tuhshâwandágoozedush ween ga nishkâtizzetowwissik .
42007024	Gá bakawinittewât John otanonájin Jesus máje guhnonát anishanâban , tuzzhemán Johnun ; wagonan buhgwuttuhkumigáng ge ezháyag gáwe wâbundumag ? áságunushk innuh kooshquâsin ?
42007025	Wagonan ge ezháyag gáwe wâbundumag ? aninne nuh suhsagákōniat ? binná suhsagákoniajig ogemá wegewamink táwug .
42007026	Wagonan ge ezháyag gáwe wâbundumag ? mamándáwizzit innuh ? kagat ketenenim , owushema apetandágooze mamándáwizzit apetandagoozit .
42007027	Wuhow ween wazhebe-egâzōt , binná neendizzhenazhowâ nemezhinowa , che mikkunákōk negân .
42007028	Ketenenimdush , uhgew equawun banenekânegoojig , kâ oweuh mamándáwizzit owushema apetandágoozisse apetandágoozit John Baptist , weendush ápiche nondás apetandágoozit Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink , owushemá apetandágoose apetandágoozit John Baptist .
42007029	Kokkinnádush anishanâban nōndágoojin giya mowōnjichegaweninnewug otuhnumeatowwâwân Kitche Manitōn baptizeáwug John obaptizewawinink .
42007030	Phariseeugdush giya tepakonegaweninnewug owabenánâwâ Kitche Manito odikittowin , Johnun che baptizemiggoozesigwâ .
42007031	Jesusdush eketto , áneen uhgew azhenágoozewât anishanâbag ?
42007032	Uhbenocheink ezhenágoozewug námátâbewât átáwawinink guhnonáwât uhnew ánint , ekettōnk , Neengenōndágomutchegamin , kâdush kenemiseem ; neengemowwinotonemin kâdush kegekushkanduhzeem .
42007033	John Baptist tuhkoshink kâ wesenese , kâ giya menequase shomenâbo kedikitōmdush Mutche Manitōn otiáwân .
42007034	Aninne Oguisun tuhkoshink wesene giya menequa , kedikitōm binná nebátizzid , manequashkid , mowōnjichegajig , giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig otinnowamágunnewân .
42007035	Nebwâkâwindush okekanemán otuhbenoche emun .
42007036	Bazhek Phariseeundush okuhquajemigōn che wetopomát . Unnepeeadegadush Pharisee andát owwe námátábedush owwe weseuit .
42007037	Equadush eu otanong , mutche izzhewabizze , kekanemát Jesusun námátábenit wesenit Pharisee andát , obebeendigutōn ásinne muhkuk pemeta kache sunnáguk ,
42007038	Onebowwedush opikwunánink ozitánink uhmowwit , omájedush gesebeginumowân ozitáne otojeendándush pemetadush kache sunnáguk oseginummowân ozitánink gesezetaándush wenesisun .
42007039	Phariseedush uhnew gá nundomiggojin wiâbundunk , ittizzo , wuhow aninne mamándáwizzit áwit , otá kekanemán uhnew equawun , o-o tinnouh wiáwenit tiânginnegoojin , ōnje mutche izzhewabizze .
42007040	Jesusdush guhnonán , otinnân , Simon kago neendián ga aninán . Ekettodush , Neendogemám , ekettōn .
42007041	Bazhek aninne mazenámowwint neezhewun mazenumámágojin , bazhek nánemetunuh tuswâbeek shoneá bazhekdush nánun .
42007042	Kago ayásigwâ gatepáummágawât omenán niyazh , unishâ , aneen uhow , nowutch ga sâgeintebun ?
42007043	Simon oguhnonán ekettodush , 'ow suh nowutch nebená mágewat neendenandum , otinnândush quiuk kege-enandum .
42007044	Gwakenumowândush uhnew equawun , otinnândush Simonun , Simon kewâbomá nuh 'ow equa ? Neengepeendega andáyun kâdush nebe kegemezhisse nezitun ōnje ; weendush kesebegenánun nezitánun ozebeengōn ōnje ; neengesezetaōkdush wenesisun .
42007045	Kâ kege ojemese : aquo beendegayán wuhow equa , otojeendánun nezittun .
42007046	Kâ kege nuhmuhkoshisse : wuhow equadush kache sunnáguk pemeta osinnegōnán , nezitáng .
42007047	Me wanje eninán batienutinnewun omutche izzhewabizzewinun mennowweshâwandágoozedush : kitche sâge-ewa , weendush punge mánint , punge sâge-ewa .
42007048	Otinnândush equawun , kemutche izzhewabizzewinun kemennowweshâwanemiggo .
42007049	Uhnewedush wâtobemájig máje i-ittewug , owwanan wuhow ga mennowweshâwanjegat mutche izzhewabizzewinun !
42007050	Otinnândush equawun , kemushkawandumowin kebemájeiggoon ; máján innowandewinink .
42008001	Gah izzhewabukdush náágutch , babáezhá kokkinná otanowun giya kitche otanowun , papáguhgequat Kitche Manito otogemáwewin omeenwâjemowin : azhe neezhinidjin owejewegōn ,
42008002	Ahnint giya equawun , gá nojemoinjig ákoozewin Mutche Mânitōn uhgegishkowâwâpun , Mary Magdalene ezhenekâzo , neezhwâswa Mutche Manitōn ogesâgizzenotágōn ,
42008003	Giya Joanna Chuza , Herod omezhinowamun wewun , giya Susanna , nebewâ giya ánint , otunnoketowâwân .
42008004	Opedush nebewâ anishanâban omowōnje-ittenit , obeotissigoot kokkinná otanowun ōnjenit , otinnân buhbawatágoozewinink :
42008005	Ketegaweninne ságáum owwe ketegat ; opedush ketegat ánint pemaiuhe pongesinōn ; tuhtuhkokâchegâtanewun benasheugdush omejinâwâ .
42008006	Ahnintdush âsinekâng pongesinōn ; bâbegadush siágukeeg nebobuttawun , ōnje kâ ojebekâwunzenōn kâ nebewunzenōn .
42008007	Ahnintdush menasagâwunjekâng pongesinōn ; menasagâwunjeendush maje-eginōn mámowy , onissegōnâwâdush .
42008008	Ahnintdush onissheshink áke pongesinōn , máje-eginōn , menewunōn ningōtwâktussenōn . Opedush aekettōt , ono iuheen , anegōk ázhequa , owwagwan watowwugâgwan che nōndunk , máno tuh nōndum .
42008009	Otoskenegamundush okuhquajemigōn , ekettōnk , wagonan guhgequawinenan o-o buhbâwatágoozewin ?
42008010	Ekettodush , keenowâ kemenigōm ono iuheen che kekandumag Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink ; ánintdush uhgew buhbawatâgoozewinink ; ánuh wâbewât kâ wâbissewug , anuh nōndumowât kâ nissetotunzewug .
42008011	Binná o-o buhbawatágoozewin ; menekân , me Kitche Manito odikitowin .
42008012	Ono pemaiuhe banjesingin , uhgew n'wândungig ; opedush Mutche Manito tuhkoshin , otápenummowân otaininink ekettowinun , che tabwatunzikwâ che kunwandágoozewâpun .
42008013	Ahsineeng ayájig , ope n'wândumowât onōndánâwâ ekettowin pâpenanemowinink ; uhgewedush wajebekâwizzissig wâ banátizzewug .
42008014	Onoedush menasagâwunjekâng bangisingin , uhgew , ope n'wândumowâjin sagáumōg , kuhgianizzewindush wânuttizzewin uhnōch giya sunnágizzewin , kâ kago ōnje netáwigginzenōn .
42008015	Onoedush wanissheshink áke bangissingin , me uhgew manobemátizzidjig wanissheshininik otaewân , n'wandumowât ekettowin , kunwandánâwâ ashkumdush unne netáwiggetōt .
42008016	Kâ oweuh aninne , sákáungin wâsâkoninjegun , otuhgwunnuhunzeen otossowin uhgama che attōt anámenebágun ; wâsâkoninjegunâtigōnk koshuh otátōn , anishanâbag peendega wât che wâbundumowât wâsayá .
42008017	Kokkinná kago kemōch kiátōng , náágutch tuh mokishkâ , kokkinná tuh kekandágwuk .
42008018	Tuhtebábundumōk , ga ezhe nōndumag ; owwagwan ayágwan tuhmená ; owwagwandush ayásigwan , tuh otâpenumowâ ayát anandágoozit .
42008019	Ogeen giyadush wekânisun obewâbomigōm , kâdush kushketosewug we be-ezháwât uzzhiát ozâm kippuggegâbowewât .
42008020	Oweuhdush otigōn , keguh giya kekânisug kebewâbomigōg , agutchink nebowwewug .
42008021	Oguhnonán otinnân , me uhgew neenguh giya nekânisug bazindungig Kitche Manito odikitowin , andotungigdush .
42008022	Gá izzhewabut ningōtink uhgezhiguk , nábequânink owweboze mámowy otoskenegamun ; otinnândush uhnew umbasino agâmank ezhátá . Májawugdush .
42008023	Magwouhdush pemázhewât , guhwingooshe ; pongisánemutinnedush kitche nodin kitche gummeeng ; nábequân mooshkenabegut , nuhnezânizzewugdush .
42008024	Obeuhmuttináwândush , otinnáwân , Neendogemám , Neendogemám , neennebomin . Onishkâdush , nuhnibbekindán nodin , giya tegowun : bonánemutdush , medush bonáshká kit che ánwâtin .
42008025	Otinnândush , áneen eu kemushkâwandumowinewâ ? Sagizzewugdush mámukkatandumōg , i-ittewugdush , owwanan aninnewenandush wuhow ! Oguhgekindán nodin giya nebe , otabwatágoondush .
42008026	Agâmankdush ákeeng Gadareneug andánuhkewât , anosumiuhe Galileeink .
42008027	Kabátdush , onuhgishkowân aninnewun be ságáuminnit otanonk , kitche maweshá Mutche Manitōn otōnje gegishkowân , peengwoshshâgitte kâdush wegewamink táse jebagumigōnkigo ieendá .
42008028	Wiábomátdush Jesusun , ázhequa , onegânemink pongesin , anegōkdush eketto , áneen ga totōnán Jesus nâgânizzit Kitche Manito ? ápadush kotuggezissewun .
42008029	[ Oanje oge-enán Mutche Manitōn che sâgizze notágoot aninnewun . Nuhningim ukko mutche kawunnátizze , pewâbekōn ukko tuhkobená , giya kushkábegiegunun ; obokobetumm ukko kushkábegiegunun , Mutche Mánitōn buhgwuttuhkumigáng ukko otizzhenizzhuhogon . ]
42008030	Jesusdush okuhquajemán ekettōnk , áneen azhenekâzoyun ? Otinnândush , menisseno ; ōnje kitche nebewá Mutche Manitōn ogegishkowân .
42008031	Okuhquajemáwândush , ápadush keenweendumáng ezhenizzhuh osewâng .
42008032	Emádush ningōtwawân nebená kōkōshug papátuzzhe wesenewug wudjewink ; Mutche Manitōgdush okunquajemáwân Jesusun che ezháwât uhnew kōkōshun . Omenándush che ezhánit .
42008033	Mutche Manitōgdush osâgizzenotowwâwân aninnewun , kōkōshundush otowwe beenzikowâwân ; nesâkebi-ittewugdush kishkuttenâng pukkobebi-ittewugdush kitche gummeeng .
42008034	Uhgewedush bamusshumájig wiabundumowât andotuminink , oshemowug , owwe tepájemowât otanonk , tuhnuhkewinink giya .
42008035	Ezháwugdush owwewábundumowât andotumink ; obeotissáwât Jesusun , omikkowâwân uhnew aninnewun gá sâgitchenotágoot Mutche Manitōn , Jesusun azhezittashink námátábe ōkonáse quiuk nebwâká ; sagizzewugdush .
42008036	Gá wâbundungigdush tepájemowug , gá ezhe nojemoint wuhow Mutche Manitōn gegishkowâpun .
42008037	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag Gadareneink andánukkewât , okuhquajemáwân che bukkawinnegowât ningooche che ezhát ; ōnje kitche sagizzewug . Nábequánink owweboze , nayábdush kewa andánukeet .
42008038	Wuhow aninnedush Mutche Manitōn gáságizzenotágoot , okuhquájemán che wejewân .
42008039	Jesusdush otinnân , kâween eu , kewan koshá andáyun , wâbundiewan gá ezhe kitche totōk Kitche Manito . Májádush papátepájemōt anegoquág otanuh gá ezhe kitche totágoot Jesusun .
42008040	Gá izzhewabukdush ope Jesus nayáb tuhkoshink , andánukeet , anishanâbag pâpenanemowug ; ōnje kokkinná ogebeegōgōbun .
42008041	Binnádush bazhek anime Jairus ezhenekâzo , nâgânizzit uhnumeawegumigōnk ; bepongesin Jesus ozitáng , okuhquajemándush che be-ezhánit andát :
42008042	Bazhekowun atuh odânisun , usshe neezho peponuggizze , shingeshin magwouh onebo . Magwouhdush zhezhát anishanâban gewetáskágōn .
42008043	Equadush bazhek mozhuk misque ōnjegâne usshe nezho pepōn , kokkinnádush obanájetōn otinotawizzewin uhnânândumōt , nuhnândowweint kâdush kushkeáse che nojemoint ,
42008044	Beopikwunishkágōn , betângenumowân ishquaiuhe obuhbeenzikowâgun : bâbegadush omisquewit bátane .
42008045	Jesusdush eketto , owwanan tiângenit ? Opedush kokkinná wiágoonwatummowât Peter , uhnewedush wâjewegoojin , ekettowug , Neendogemám , anishanâbag pemeweoquashkágōg , owwanan tiânginit kedikitdush innuh ?
42008046	Jesusdush eketto , oweuh neengetângenik : neenkekandán nojemoewawin sâgizzenotágoyán .
42008047	Opedush equa wiábundunk kushketosig che gázōt , benuhningishkâ bepongesin anosumeet , oweendumowân kokkinná anishanábag nuhnōndágoot , gá ōnje tânginát , azhe nojemōtdush bâbega .
42008048	Otinnândush equawun , neendânis , niandun ; kemushkâwandumowin kenojemoigoon ; máján innuhwandewinink .
42008049	Magwouhdush gá gegetōt , oweuh obenázekágōn nâgânizzit uhnumcawegumigōnk owegewamink , otinnândush , kedânis nebo ; kago sunnágimákan ketogemámenán .
42008050	Jesusdush n'wândunk oguhnonán eketto , kago sagizzekan ; tabwa-andum atuhgo tuh nojemodush .
42008051	Buhpeendegatdush owegewamink , ogenuhummowân oweuh che peendegasig meatuh Peter , James giya John , ōsundush giya ōgeen 'ow equazans .
42008052	Kokkinnádush mowwewug omowwemáwân : ekettodush , kago mowwe kago : kâween nebo , unish nebá .
42008053	Ogitchepâpeáwândush , ōnje okekanemáwân nebonit .
42008054	Kokkinnádush osâgittenán , osugginnekanán , oguhnonándush eketto , oskenegequa , onishkân .
42008055	Ochichâgomádush nayáb ototisigōn bâbegadush onishkâ ; guhgândwâdush che usshumint weyâs .
42008056	Onegeigōndush mámukkâtandumōg ; ogenuhummowândush oweuh aninnewun che weendumowâsigwâ gá totumink .
42009001	Omowoanjenundomahndush asheneezhinidjin otoskenegamun , omenán mushkâwizzewin che ogemákundowât kokkinná Mutche Manitōn , ákoozewindush che nojemōtowât .
42009002	Otuhnonándush che papáguhgequawât Kitche Manto otogemáwewin , che nojemotowâtdush ákoozewin .
42009003	Otinnândush uhnew , kago majetokago che papámátizzeyag , kago giya kago sukáoonun , giya mashkemoot , giya puhquazhegun , kago giya shonea , kago giya neezhōshkunkago beenzikawâgun .
42009004	Ningoochego wegewam peendegayag , iáyeuk emá minowâdush we májáyag keguh májám .
42009005	Owwagwan ga papámanemisinogwan , unne ságáumag eu otanuh , bowwewabishkumōk weágusseun kezitáwân , che ōnje kekandumowât uhmutche izzhewabizzewât .
42009006	Bukkawugdush , otunne shábooshkummowât otanowun guhgequawât , nojemoewawâtdush mizzewa .
42009007	Heroddush ogemá nōndum kokkinná Jesus gá ieendotunk ; sunnágandumdush , ōnje ánint ekettowug John uhgeábejebát ;
42009008	Ahnintdush ekettowug , Elias m'wâkeet ; anintdush ekettowug gata mamándáwizzit ábejebá .
42009009	Heroddush eketto , John neengegishkequawá ; owwanan wuhow nianōndumán ? Owwe wâbomándush .
42009010	Gá anoninjigdush , nayab tuhkoshinowât , tepájemowug gá ieendotumowât . Ototâpenándush gemōch buhgwuttuhkumigáng ezhá , otuhnukewinink Bethsaidaink .
42009011	Anishanâbagdush , kakanemáwât onopenánáwân : ototâpenán , iuhtepájemotowwân Kitche Manito otogemáwewin , onojemoátdush kokkinná wiákoozinidjin .
42009012	Kagâ ane dabekuk , asheneezhidjig tuhkoshinōg , otinnáwândush , ningooche ezhenázhuh anishanâbag , otanowink che ezháwât giya otunnuhkewinink , che nuhnebáwât , mejimdush che ōndinumowât : ōnje buhgwuttuhkumigáng omá ketiámin .
42009013	Otinnândush uhnew , usshumik gamejewât . Ekettowugdush , kâ kago neendiásemin meatuh nánun puhquazhegunun , neezhdush kegoiun ; meatuhgo owwe kishpinuttowungwâ kokkinná uhgew anishanâbag ga mejewât .
42009014	( Nánink metoswâk tusshetoganug eninnewug . ) Otinnândush otoskenegamun , nanánemetunnuh innuhbeikōg .
42009015	Getotumōgdush , kokkinnádush ogenámátábeáwân .
42009016	Ototapenándush nanwâtik puhquazhegunun , neezhdush kegoiun , ishpemink gezhigōnk enábe , uhnumeatowwâwât , obogobetōn , omámenándush otoskenegamun che buhgitinumōwât anishanâban .
42009017	Gewesenewug , kokkinná getabesinewug : uashe neezhdush kokobenágunun mooshkena otōmbináwân menik ashqundumowât .
42009018	Gá izzhewabuk , ezheke tuzzhe uhnumeá , otoskenegamun obenázekágōn okuhquajemándush , owwanan wiáweán azhewât anishanâbag ?
42009019	Otinnáwândush John Baptist ; ánintdush ekettowug , Elias ; ánintdush ekettowug gata mamándáwizzit abejebá .
42009020	Otinnândush uhnew , owwanan wiáweyán keenowâ ekettoeyag ? Peterdush oguhnonan eketto Christ , Kitche Manito .
42009021	Bâbegadush ogenuhummowân , che weendumowwâsigwâ oweuh aninnewun .
42009022	Ekettodush , Aninne Oguisun nebewátussink tuhguhgwâtugito , tuh wabinnegâzo ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , ōnje giya okewanzeug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , tuh nesá , niswogwunigukdush minowâ tuh ábejebá .
42009023	Otinnândush uhnew kokkinná , oweuh aninne enandunk che benopenuzzhit , tyângwâmanindizzo , tuhkuhgwadebanindizzo andusso gezhigut che nopenuhzhit .
42009024	Owwagwan ga bemájetogwan obemátizzewin , oguhwunetōn ; weendush ga wunetōt obemátizzewin neen ōnje , oguh bemájetōn .
42009025	Ahneen ga inábuhtuk aninne kokkinná áke che tebandunk , anegoquág , che wunetōtdush tebinowa ochichâgwun che wabinnegazōt .
42009026	Owwanan ga águtchetowwegwan , giya neendikitowin , Aninne Oguisun giya ween oguh águtchetágōn , ope tuhkoshink tebinowa ogitchetwâwizzewinink , giya ōsun ogitchetwâwizzewininne , giya Kitche Manito omezhinowamun ogitchetwâwizzewinewân .
42009027	Kagat ketenenim , ánint omá nábowwidjig , kâween oguh kekanduhzenáwâ nebowin chebwâ wâbundumowât Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
42009028	Gá izzhewabukdush , gá neezhwâswogwuniguk ope o-o gá iekettōnk , ototâpenán Peterun , Jamesun giya Johnun , wudjewink ezhá owwe uhnumeát .
42009029	Magwouhdush uzzhuhnumeát , miuginágooze oskezhigōnk , agwidjin wâbeshkânewun wâkashkânewun .
42009030	Binnádush , neezh aninnewun oguhguhnōnigōn , Moses giya Elias ;
42009031	Owâbundiewawug weowwewân kitchetwâwizzewinink otuzzhindánâwâdush onebowin ga totumink Jerusalemink .
42009032	Peterdush giya uhgew wâjewegoojin kitche kege binnegooshewug : wiábizzeengooshewâtdush owâbundánâwâ ogitchetwâwizzewin , giya neezh aninnewun wâjegâbowittágoojin .
42009033	Gá izzhewabukdush , ope bakawináwât , Peter otinnân Jesusun , Neendogemám , onissheshin omá keche iáyunk ; máno niswa wegewamun neenguh ozhetomin ; bazhek keen ōnje bazhek Moses , bazhekdush Elias ōnje ; kâ okekanduhzeen koshá aekettōt .
42009034	Magwouhdush uhgegetōt , ánáqut beuhgotane otuhguhwâtashkágōnâwân , sagizzewugdush ope chiakishkumowât ánáqut .
42009035	Ahnáqutōnkdush beōnzittágwat gegetowin , ekettōnk , me wuhow siágeug neenguis : bezindowwik .
42009036	Ope gá kubbekosag inwawin Jesus mikkowwâ ezhekawizze . Ogátōnâwâdush , kâdush oweuh aninnewun oweendummowwâsewân ono gezhigutōn gá wâbundumowât .
42009037	Gá izzhewabukdush , wiábuninik , buhnesâkewawât wudjewink , kitche nebewádush anishanâban onuhgishkowâwân .
42009038	Binnádush bazhek aninne magwa anishanâban , ázhequa , eketto , Neendogemám ápadush kunnowâbomut neenguis ; bazhekoot neenejânis .
42009039	Binnádush Manitōn otuhkonigōn , azhequago , ápiche obegobinnegōn názhubkobetawe otōnink suhgikkágoot uhgáwâko obuhkawinnegōn .
42009040	Neengekuhquajemándush ketoskenegamug che sâgitchenázhowâwât , kâdush kushkeasewân .
42009041	Jesusdush oguhnonigōn eketto , oh mutche izzhewabizzidjig anishanâbag , tiabwatunzigook , áneen menik ga wejewinuhgook , áneen menik ga sunnágizzeán keowwewâng ? omá tuhbe-ezhá keguis .
42009042	Magwouhdush be-ezhát , Mutche Manitōn ogeguhwewabinnegōn , obegobinnegōn . Jesusdush onuhnibbekemán Mutche Manitōn , onojemōandush uhbenocheun , omenándush ōsuninne .
42009043	Kokkinnádush mámukkâtandumōg azhe kitche mushkâwizzeet Kitche Manito . Magwouhdush mámukkâtandumowât kokkinná iuheen , Jesus gá totunk otinnân otóskenegamun .
42009044	Ono ekettowinun máno oguhgōndâsawun ketowwugâwâng : ōnje Aninne Oguisun tuhbuhgittinumátinun aninnewug oninjewâng .
42009045	Kâdush onissetotunzeenâwân ono ekettowinun , gátowâwug , kâ owâbunduhzenâwâ ; shâgwanemowugdush we kuhquajemáwât .
42009046	Tuzzhindizzowugdush , owwagwan owushema ga apetandágoozegwan .
42009047	Jesusdush kakanemát ananduminit otaewâng , ototâpenán uhbenocheun , wetuhbundi-ittizzoot .
42009048	Otinnândush otoskenegamun , owwagwan ga mennototowegwan uhnew uhbenocheun neenduhnozowinink , neea neenguh mennototág ; owwagwandush neen ga mennototowegwan , oguh mennototowân biezhenázhuhonidjin . Ween nōndás ga apetandágoozit andussheyag , ween owushema tuh apetandágooze .
42009049	John nuhquatunk eketto , Neendogemám , neengewâbománán oweuh sâgitchenázhowât Mutche Manitōn ketuhnozowinink ; neengegenuhumowânándush ōnje kâ kenopenuhnigoosenánig ,
42009050	Jesusdush otinnân kago nuhumáwâkago , ween shânganemisinowâng kewetokágonán .
42009051	Gá izzhewabuk , ope wachichesanik ishpemik che ezhe ōmbishkât gezhandum che ezhát Jerusalemink ,
42009052	Otuhnonándush ayánōniminjin negân : Samaritanugdush , ototanowewâng ezháwug owwegezhetáwât beáwât .
42009053	Opedush bamosat kâ ogepapámanemásewân Samaritanug , ōnje keshá ge kezhandum owwe ezhát Jerusalemink .
42009054	Opedush otoskenegamun James giya John wiábundumowât o-o , ekettowug , Neendogemám , neenguhnundotámin innuh ishkota gezhigōnk che châgizzōntwâ , Elias ga totunk ?
42009055	Gwakegâbowedush , nanibbekemát , otinnândush , kâ kekanduhzeem owwagwan eu ochichâgomá wiáweyun .
42009056	Aninne Oguisun kâween beōnje ezháse che banájetowât aninnewun obematizzewininne , meatuh che bemájeát ; minowâdush bazhek otanong ezháwug .
42009057	Gá izzhewabukdush , magwouh bamosawât , bazhek aninnewun otigōn , Neendogemám , keguh nopenuhnin tibbe ga papaiezháwunan .
42009058	Jesusdush otinnân , wâgooshug wâshewug , giya benasewug babámissajig owussissonewug ; Aninne Oguisundush kâ ningooche innuh quashinze .
42009059	Otinnândush minowâ bazhek aninnewun , nopenuhzheshin . Ekettodush , Neendogemám , ukkowa neenguh ningwuhwâ nōs .
42009060	Jesusdush otinnân , máno nabojig oguhningwuhwâwân onebomewân ; keen owwe guhgequan Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
42009061	Minowâ bazhek eketto , Neendogemám , keguh nopenuhnin ; buhgitinneshin ukkowa che owwe uhnummekowwugwa andáyán abidkig .
42009062	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ oweuh aninne otâpenunk bemebochegun bakish ábenábitdush , tá apetandágoozisse Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink che peendegat .
42010001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen , Kitche Manito [ Jesus ] oguhgegenán minowá neezhwâswa metunuh , omájenázhowândush , naneezh anosumme skezhik kokkinná kitche otanowun , uhnōch wâiezhán .
42010002	Otinnândush , ketegân ozâmenut , unnokejig âgásenowug ; uhnumeatowwik tabandunk ketegân , che uhnonát ga unnokejig ketegânink .
42010003	Májág azháyag ; binná ketuhnonenim manishtânishansug magwa mieengun iawug .
42010004	Kago , shoneá otossowin májetokago , kago giya mashkemoot , kago giya muhkizzenun ; kago unnemikkowâkago oweuh áninne mikunâng .
42010005	Owwagotogwanigo wegewâm ga peendegawagwan , me o-o netam ga ekettoyag , menno innuhwandewin tuh izzhewabut o-o wegewâm .
42010006	Oguisemá otinowândâsowin emá iág , ketinowandâsowinewân , máno emá tuh iá , iásigdush , ketinowandâsowinewá nayáb keguh otissigōnâwâ .
42010007	Mego e-e wegewámigo uzzhiáyag , mejig , menequagigo azhe menegoyag , ōnje unnoketâgaweninne otáián otepáummágowin . Kago mamashkōt peendega kago wegewâmink .
42010008	Owwagotogwanigo otanonk ga peendegawagwan mejigigo owwagōtōgwan buhgittinnummágowagwan anosumubbeyag .
42010009	Nojemoikōg wiákoozidjig emá ayájig , keguh enáwâgdush , Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew ketotissigōnâwâ .
42010010	Owwagotogwandush otanonk ga peendegagwan , pápámanemisinowagwá , sagáumōk mikkunâng , eu otanuh , ekettoyeuk ,
42010011	Weágusseun ogittotanowewâ agokag neowwináng kebuhwewabishkuhmoneme ; anawak ōnjittá Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew ketotosigōnâwâ .
42010012	Ketenenim , nowutch tuh mennoizzhewabut Sodom , ga izzhewabuk eu otanuh e-e gezhigut .
42010013	Kitche sunnágut keen Chorazin ! Kitche sunnágut keen , Bethsaida ! Kitche unnokewinun ge unnokeeng keowink , ge unnokeengebun Tyreink giya Zidonink tá ge ánwanindizzowug maweshá , mutche bebuhgewiánneginōnk tá ge námátábewug pingwekâng .
42010014	Nowutch tuh mennoizzhewabut Tyre giya Zidon tebákonegawe gezhigut , keenowâ gá izzhewabizzeyag .
42010015	Keen giya Capernaum , keōtmbishkâ gezhigōnk ; mutche ishkotang keguh neeswabinnego .
42010016	Ween ga bezindonág , neembezindág ; ween shânganeminág neen neshinganemik ; weendush shânganemit , osheenganemán biezhenázhuhonidjin .
42010017	Náshwásametunnuhwajigdush , nayáb tuhkoshinōg pânenanemowinink , ekettowugdush Neendogemám , kagat Mutche Manitōg neendabwatágonánig ketuhnozowin ōnje .
42010018	Otinnândush uhnew neengewâbomá Satan gezhigōnk ōnje pongesin wâsummowinink ezhenágooze .
42010019	Binná kemeninim mushkâwizzewin che tuhtuhkokânagwâ mutche kenabeekōg giya Mutche Manitōnsug , gá unnewishkowâwâg kokkinná Mutche Manito omushkâwizzewin , kâween ningotono keguh totágoseenâwâ .
42010020	Kago pápenandunkago keowwewân unnewishkowwagwâ Mutche Manitōg , o-o ōnje pâpenanemōk , ketuhnozowinewân oshebe-egâtag gezhigōnk .
42010021	Eu tepiegun Jesus pâpenanemo ochichâgōnk , ekettodush , megwetch ketenin , oh nōs tabandumun gezhik giya áke , uhgegátoyun ono iuheen gátowwugwâ nebwâkâweninnewug kegemizzhishshowwinumowâgdush uhbenocheug ; tebishko anandumun , oh nōs , kegetotum ,
42010022	Kokkinná iuheen nōs neengemenik ; kâ oweuh aninne okekanemáseen oguisemá meatuh osemá ; kâdush oweuh aninne okekanemáseen osemá , meatuh oguisemá , ween giya oguisemá wâkekinnoummágoot .
42010023	Gwakegâbowittowwândush otoskenegamun , otinnândush gemōch , tuh shâwandágwutōn oskezhigomán wiábundunk iuheen wiábundumag .
42010024	Keweendumōnim , nebewâ mamándáwizzidjig giya ogemág owwe wâbundumowât ono iuheen gá wâbundumag , kâdush oge wâbunduhzeenâwân , owwe nōndumowâtdush ono iuheen gá nōndumag kâdush oge nōnduhzeenâwân .
42010025	Binnádush bazhek gegetoweninne pusegwe uhkuhquadebanemigoot eketto , Neendogemám , áneen ga totumán che gâgega bemátizzeyán ?
42010026	Otinnândush , wagonan wazhebe-egâtag tepakonegawinink ? áneen aketomuhgut mazaniegun ?
42010027	Nuhquatunk , eketto , keguh sâgeá Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitōn kokkinnâ ketaink , kokkinná giya kechichâgōnk , kokkinná giya kemushkâwizzewinink , kokkinná giya ketenandumowinink ; giya keguh sâgeáwág wâjetukkewamudjig azhe sâgeittezoeyun .
42010028	Otinnândush , quiuk , kemennonuhquatum , me eu totun , keguh bemátiz .
42010029	Owwe mennoizzhewabizzitigo enandum , otinnân Jesusun , owwanan 'ow newejetukkewamágun ?
42010030	Jesusdush nuhquatum , eketto , bazhek aninne azhekawizzit Jerusalemink ōnje májá Jerichoink shezhat , chakishkowândush gamotishkinidjin , peengwoshshâgitobenáwan agwidjin , bemwâgunneáwândush ábetá nebo nagunnáwât .
42010031	Gá izzhewabuk sásagewitchegaweninne ewada magwouh zhezhát ; wiábomátdush agâmekunuh peme-ezhá .
42010032	Bazhek Levitedush , wiábomát obegunnowâbomán , agâmekunuhdush pemae ezhá .
42010033	Bazhekdush Samaritan , magwouh papámátizzit , be-ezhá uzzhiát ; opedush wiábomát ogeshâwanemán .
42010034	Onázekowân , otukkobetowân bemwâgunewinit , pemeta giya shomenâbo oseginummowân , otasubbeándush obazhekokazhemink , usshungawegummigōnkdush peendegunán uhkunwanemát .
42010035	Wiabunkdush , miáját , ogittenán ánint shoneá , omenándush usshungaweninnewun , otinnândush , kunwanim wawane ; kishpindush owushema banájetoeyun andussink o-o , minowâ tuhkoshinán keguh tepáumōn .
42010036	Ahneen uhgew nisshidjig wawejetukkewamágunidjig uhnew gá chakishkowânidjin gamotishkinidjin ?
42010037	Ekettodush , ween gá shâwanemát ; Jesusdush otinnân , maján , me giya keen owwe totun .
42010038	Gá izzhewabuk magwouh papámátizzewât , unne peendega bazhek otanuh , equadush bazhek Martha ezhenekâzo , opeendegunán owegewamink .
42010039	Wetiggikoan Mary ezhenekâzowun , Jesus ozittánink námátábe onōndowân aketonit .
42010040	Marthadush kitche sunnágizze unnokewin wegewamink , uhnōch giya kago , obenázekowândush eketto , Neendogemám , kânuh kepapámanemáse netiggik neennuggunik che unnokeyán ezheke ? guhgâzōn che be nezhokomowit .
42010041	Jesus oguhnonán , otinnândush , Martha , Martha , kesunnágandum , nebewá iuheen .
42010042	Bazhekwun atuh ōnjittá ga iáyun , Marydush otonábundán wanissheshininik weká ga otâpenumowâsewint .
42011001	Gah izzhewabukdush , magwouh uzzhuhnumeát ningooche , gá eeshquâ tát , bazhek otoskenegamun otigōn , Neendogemám , kekinnoummowweshinâng che unnumeáyáng , John azhe kekinnoummowât otoskenegamun .
42011002	Otinnândush , ope uhnumeáyag , ekettoyeuk : Waōsemigoyun gezhigōnk abeyun , kitchekitche twâwandágwuk keteshenekâzowin , ketogemáwewin máno tuhtuhkoshinomugut , azhe meenwandumun , máno tuh izzhewabut , ákeeng azhewabuk gezhigōnk :
42011003	Mezheshinâng andusso gezhigut gamejeyâng .
42011004	Mennoweshâwanemishinâng gámutchetotumángin ; giya neenowint azhe mennowweshâwanemungidwâ oweuh gámutche totowweumingin ; kago kuhgwadebanemisshekángan ; ikkoonuhmowweshinâng kokkinná miánátuk .
42011005	Otinnândush , oweuh andussheag otinnowamáguneyag ábetá dibbik oguh ezhánun oguh enándush , neendinowamágun , niswâtik puhquazhegun newe iáwân .
42011006	Oanje neendinowamágun papámátizzit neembeotisik kâweendush neendiáseen ga buhgittenummowwug anosumeet .
42011007	Weendush beendik ayát , kago megooshkâzomisshekan oguh enán , squândem kepáquiegáta , neenejânisug newepamág , kâ neenguh geōnishkâse che meninámbán .
42011008	Ketenenim , ánuh kâ tá onishkâse , che menát ōnje zhotinnowamágunit , koshuh ōnje megooshkâzomint guhtuh onishkâ che menát menik wâiámenit .
42011009	Ketenenim , nundotumōk , keguh menigōm ; nundowâbundumōk , keguh mikám , papágáquhumōk , keguh bákinummágōm .
42011010	Kokkinná nandotungig , otiáwân ; weendush nandowâbundunk omikân , weendush biápágáquounk , pákinummowâ .
42011011	Oweuh keguisewâg nundotumōnágwâ puhquazhegun ásin nuh otámenáwâ ? Kegoiun nundomát genabekōn , nuh ketá menáwâ ?
42011012	Wâwun nundotunk , ogâtekenábekōn nuh ketá menáwâ ?
42011013	Kishpin keenowá ánuh mutche izzhewabizzeyag keke kandumag wanissheshin chemenágwâ kenejânisug ; kânuh Kōsewâ gezhigōnk ayát otá menáseen Kitche Manito ochichâgwun uhgew nandotummowâjin ?
42011014	Magwouhdush ságitchenázhowât Mutche Manitōn , aninne ayáwât kâ netagegetose , gá izzhewabukdush ope Mutche Manito gá unne ságáunk , netágegetosigogobun gegeto ; anishanâbagdush mámukkâtandumōg .
42011015	Ahnintdush ekettowug , Beelzebub ogemá Mutche Manitōn , onezhokomágōn sâgitchenázhowât Mutche Manitōn .
42011016	Ahnintdush kagwadebanemigoojin okuhquajemáwân che wâbundiegowât che mamándátotunk gezhigōnk ōnje .
42011017	Okekanemándush ananduminit , otinnândush kokkinná ogemáwewin nianáwenumingin kâ ningotono inábuhtizzisse ; kokkinnádush wegewâm nianáwinnittezomuggukin pongesin .
42011018	Satandush nanáwinittezoot áneen otogemáwewin ga ge ezhe nebowwemuggutinne ? ōnje kedikitōm , neensâgitchewabenág Mutche Manitōg Beelzebub ōnje .
42011019	Kishpin sâgitchenázhowug Mutche Manitōn Beelzebub ōnje , owwanan keguisewâg wanje sâgitchewabenáwât ? Me eu ōnje uhgew ga ōnje tepákoninnágwâ .
42011020	Kishpin Kitche Manito oninj ōnje sâgitchewabenug Mutchè Manitōg , kekandágwut Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew ototissigoyag .
42011021	Mashkâwizzit aninne otushwewenint kunwandunk owegewâm , otunnokâjegun menno átane .
42011022	Owushema mashkâwizzinidjin aninnewun ototisigoot , mámázheiggoot omuhkummigoon kokkinná otushwewenun ashwepuneen omámonundush otunnokâjegun .
42011023	Ween wâjewissik neennishkanemik , weendush miáwundowejewesik siswashkâ .
42011024	Ope wânizzit Manito gáunne ságáunzeenotowwât aninnewun , bangwuhkumigáng bamosa , nandowâbundunk unwabewin ; kâdush kago omikunzeen , ekettodush neenguh kewanotán newegewâm gábe ōnje ságáumán .
42011025	Buhtuhkoshinkdush , omikân cheshuttiegâtanik suhsagâ chegâtanik .
42011026	Minowâdush neezhwâswa Mutche Manitōn ototâpenán owushema izzhewabizzinidjin azhewabizzit ; peendegawugdush emá uhtáwât squâchdush wuhow aninne owushema izzhewabizze netam antepun .
42011027	Gá izzhewabizzitdush , magwouh , iekettōt ono iuheen bazhek equa emá iát anegōk gegeto otinnân tuh shâwandágooze equa gá negeik .
42011028	Jesusdush eketto , kagat , owushema tuhshâwadágoozewug uhgew n'wândunjig Kitche Manito odikitowin kunwandumowâtdush .
42011029	Opedush anishanâbag mowōnjeittewât kippuggishkotátewât , máje iekettōt , me uhgew mazheninnewuggizzidjig anishanâbag , onundowâbundánâwâ mamándátotumowin , kâweendush kago mamándátotumowin tuh menásewug meatuh Jonas manitowâzōt omamándátotumowin .
42011030	Jonas gá ezhe mamándáizzhewabizzit Ninevitun zhiánit me giya ween Aninne Oguisun ga izzhewabizzetowwât uhnew anishanâban .
42011031	Ogemáqui shâwunōnk tuh pusegwe tepákonegawinink che bátámáwât uhnew anishanâban ; ōnje waquâgumigánik beōnjebá uhbezindunk Solomon onebwâkâwin ; binnádush , bazhek omá owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozit Solomon .
42011032	Aninnewug Ninevehink tuh pusewewug tepákonegawinink che bátámáwât uhnew anishanâban ; Jonas oguhgequawin ōnje gwakandumōg che ánwanindizzowât ; oweuhdush omá , owushema apetandágooze Jonas apetandágoozit .
42011033	Kâ oweuh aninne gá sukkáungin wâsâkoninjegun , ningooche ogátoseen gemōch , gamá anámiuhe mukukōnk , wâsâkoninjegunâtigōnk koshá , otátōn , peendegajig owâbundánâwâ dush wâsâkonanik .
42011034	Wâsayá weowwemán me oskezhikōmán ; bazhekōngin keskezhik , kokkinná keow tuh mooshkena wâsayá ; keskezhikdush mánátuk , kokkinná keow tuh mooshkena kushkedibbikut .
42011035	Tuhtebábin , wâsayá gagishkumun che kushkebibbekusinōk .
42011036	Kokkinná keow mooshkenag wâsayá , punge kuskedibbekusinōk , kokkinná mooshkena wâsayá ; tebishko wâsa wâsâkoninjegun azhe wâsâkonatágoyun .
42011037	Magwouhdush gágegetōt , bazhek Pharisee onundomigōn che wetopomiggoot ; unnebeendegadush owwe námátábit otopowinink .
42011038	Opedush Pharisee wiábundumowât , mámukkâtandum , uhgekesebegesig uhbwâ wesenit .
42011039	Jesusdush otinnân , keenowâ Phariseeitōk kebenetōnâwâ menequâchegun giya onâgun áqutcheiuhee ; beenjeiuhedush kemooshkenam miánátuk mázheninnewuggizzewin .
42011040	Kuhgebátizzeyag , kânuh ween gá ozhetōt áqutcheiuhee , giya beenjeiuhee oge ozhetoseen ?
42011041	Nowutch 'tow onissheshin ánint ayáyag menagwâ katemákizzidjig ; binnádush kokkinná iuheen tá benutōn .
42011042	Kitche sunnágut keenowâ , Phariseeitōk ! metoswa tepiegun bazhek kemegewam natáwiggetoeyag , kubbekosagdush tepákonegawin giya Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin : me o-o ga ge totumagobun ; anintdush kâ keta nuhgutunzeem bwâtotumag .
42011043	Sunnágut keenowâ , Phariseeitōk owushema kemeenwandám ishpemink námátábeyag uhnumeawegumigōnk , giya uhnumekowwintwâ átáwawinink .
42011044	Sunnágut keenowâ , oshebe-egaweninnewetōk giya Phariseeitōk kuhgianizzeyag ! jebagumigōnk ketenandágoozim kâ onágwutoseenáwân weowwewân , animewun obázhetáogowân kâdush okekanemigoosewân .
42011045	Bazhekdush gegetoweninne nuhquatum , otinnân , Neendogemám , o-o uzzhekettoeyun , kemutche ezhemin giya neenowint .
42011046	Ekettodush , sunnágut giya keenowa gegetoweninnewetōk ! ozâm kebwâwunneáwâg aninnewug , keenowâdush kâ ketángenuhzeenâwâ pemewunánun .
42011047	Sunnágut keenowâ ! wazhetoeyag mamándáwizzidjig ojebagumigowân , kōsewâgdush onisáwân .
42011048	Kagat kemizzhissheowwenágwitōm , onissheshin 'shenandumag kōsewâg gá izzhewabizzewât ; ogenesáwân , keenowâdush ketozhetōm ojebagumigowâg .
42011049	Me o-o Kitche Manito onebwâkâwin wanje ekettōt neenguh ezhenizzhuhummowâg mamándáwizzinidjin giya anoninjin ánintdush oguh nesáwán , ánintdush oguh nisshewunnázho máwân :
42011050	Kokkinná mamándáwizzidjig omisquemewâ , menik gá seegwabenumink gá áquo ozhetōng ake , tuh nundwawanjegâta uhgew anishanâban .
42011051	Abel omisqueem ōnje , nánázh Zacharias omisqueem , ween gá nesag nussowiuhe sáságewitchegun 'zhutag giya kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk . Kagat ketenenim , ga nundwawandumink uhnew anishanâban .
42011052	Sunnágut keenowâ gegetoweninnewetōk ! kege otâpenánâwâ abápegiegun kekandumowin ; kâ kegepeendegaseem tebinowa , uhgewedush wâpeendegajig kegenuhgânâwâg .
42011053	Magwouh 'zhiekettōt ono iuheen , oshebe-egaweninnewug giya Phariseeug omáje kuhgânjeáwân , nebewá uhnōch kago che iekettōt .
42011054	Ukkummowâwât beáwât owwe nuhquabetowâwât kago otonink owwe bátámáwât .
42012001	Shegwouh o-o ope kitche nebená mowōnjeittewât anishanâbag , azhe tuhtuhkokânittewât , omáje ienán otoskenegamun , netam , tuhtebábundumōk Phariseeug wanje ōmbishkânik opuhquazhegunewâ , me eu kuhgianizzewin .
42012002	Kâween kago tuh gátoseem , pichenuk tuhbákishkâ : kâween kago tuh gátoseem kokkinná tuh kekandágwuk .
42012003	Eu ōnje , owwagotogwan gá ekettowagwan , tuh nōndám wásayáng euedush gá gáskunnuzzotáteyâg ketowwugâwâng beendik kushkewuttag wegewâm anegōk tuh nōndágwut ogitcheiuhe wegewâmink .
42012004	Ketenenim , neendinowamágunetōk , kago gosá kago natojig weowwemán , náágutchdush kâween minowâ ningotōnō táge totunzewug .
42012005	Keguh weendumōnim koshá ga gōsag , gōsik Ween kashtetōt netōt weowwemá giya ochichâgomá mutche ishkotang uzzhoppuginnátdush , kagat ketenenim , me uhow ga gosag .
42012006	Kânuh nánun koskoskōncheug neesh shománekawug átándissenug ? kâweendush bazhek wunandágoozisse anosumeet Kitche Manito .
42012007	Kenesissewân kestegwânewâng kokkinná uhginjegâtawun . Kago sagizze kago , owushema ketuhpetandágoozim nebewâ koskoskōnacheug .
42012008	Ketenenim giya owwagwan ga águtchetowissegwan anosumewât aninnewug , ween Aninne Oguisun kâ tuh águtchisse anosumewât Kitche Manito omezhinowamun .
42012009	Owwagwandush ga águtchetowwegwan anosumewât aninnewug , oguh águtchetowwâ anosumewât Kitche Manito omezhinowamun .
42012010	Owwagwan ga mutchetuzzhemágwan Aninne Oguisun , tuh mennoweshâwandágooze ; weendush mutchetuzzhemát Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , kâ tuh mennoweshâwandágoozisse .
42012011	Ope peendegunigoeyag uhnumeawegumigōnk , opedush benigoeyag anosumewât tepákonega ogemág , giya wanjeta ogemág , kago náguttuhwandun kago ga ezhe nuhquatumag , ga ekettoeyag :
42012012	Kitche Manito ochichâgwun keguh kekinnoummágowa , eu tepiegun ga ekettoeyag .
42012013	Oweuhdush magwa anishanâbag otinnân , Neendogemám , guhnōzh nekânis , che nanáwenummowint nōsenábun otinotawizzewin .
42012014	Otinnândush , aninne , owwanan gá ozheit che tepákonumán , che nánáwinummonuhgook ?
42012015	Otinnân anishanâban , tuhtebábig , kago ozám sásagizze kago ; aninne owânuttizewin kâween tuh ōnje bemátizzisse .
42012016	Buhbawatágoozewindush oweendumowân , ekettodush , aninne wiánuttizzit nebewâ kago ōnje netáwigge ;
42012017	Enanindizzo , áneen o-o ga teyán ? kâ neendowegewâmese che átoeyán o-o natáwiggetoeyán ?
42012018	Ekettodush , me o-o ga teyán : neenguh nesákebetonun neendotossowezyumigōn , nowutchdush neengun mechâtōn : emádush che átoeyán netáwiggetoeyán giya neendunokâjegun .
42012019	Neenguh enándush neenchichâg , neenchichâg unwabin , wesenin , menequan , pâpenanemoon , kitche nebena ketunnokájegun , ni-isschichegâta nebená tusso kekenonowin che tabisag .
42012020	Kitche Manitodush otigōn , keguhgepátiz , nōngum dibbikut , kechichâg keguhotâpenumág ; owwanan ga iát ono iuheen gá unnokeyun ?
42012021	Me o-o izzhewabizzit nanuhmázit kago , kâdush wânu tizzetowwâseen Kitche Manito .
42012022	Otinnândush otoskenegamun , me wanje aninnuhgook , kago papámándunkago kebemátizzewinewân , ga mejeyag ; uhgamá ga pezikumag .
42012023	Bematizzewin owushema apetandágwut apetandágwuk agwewin .
42012024	Náguttuhwanim gâgâgewug ; kâween ketegasewug kâween mámásewug ; kâ giya ototossowegumik , kâ giya áwase wegumik otozhetōnâwâ , Kitche Manito koshá obemusshumán , Ahneen menik owushema apetandágoozeyag apetandágoozewât benaseug ?
42012025	Ahneen wuhow andussheyag otákushketōn onáguttuhwandumowinink ōnje , ningōt otōsqun che ge kenozhit ?
42012026	Kushketosewag eu che totumag nondás apetandágwukkin wagonan wanje náguttuhwandumag ánint ?
42012027	Náguttuhwanim mushkota opineeg , binná azhekewât ; kâ unnokesewug , kâ bemuttiegasewug , ketenenimdush , Solomon kokkinná ogitchetwáwizzewinink kâ ge ezhe mennokoniase bazhek uhgew azhe konigat .
42012028	Kishpin Kitche Manito eu ezhe uhgwittōt mezhuskeen , nōngum gezhigut ketegânink iát wâbunkdush ishkotang oppuggutchegâtag ; kânuh nowutch keenowâ keguh ágweiggoosewâ keenowâ tiabwatunzewag ?
42012029	Kago nundowâbundun kago ga mejeyag giya ga menequayag , kago giya gweenowe-enandun kago .
42012030	Kokkinná ono iuheen andánukkejig ákeeng onundowâbundánâwâ : Kōsewâ okekándán muhnazeyag kokkinná ono iuheen .
42012031	Nundowâbundumōk Kitche Manito otogemáwewin , kokkinnádush ono iuheen keguh menigōm .
42012032	Kago kotáje kago , ánuh âgâsenoyag ; Kōsewâ enandum che meninág , ogemáwewin .
42012033	Atáyag ayáyag , menikōg katemákizzidjig , wekoochetōk mashkemootun wekâ kekâmuggussinōk , otinotawizzewin attag gezhigōnk wekâ ga banátussinōk , wekâ gamotishkid uhtuhkoshink wekâ ogáwaseug che banájetosigwâ kago :
42012034	Ketinotawizzewin che áttag , me ketá giya keche áttag .
42012035	Keezhpezoon , kewâsokoninjegun che tunnáketag .
42012036	Aninneeng izzhewabizzig beáwât otogemámun tuhkoshininidjin , opedush buhtuhkoshink , bepuhpágáquo-ōnk , bákindanuhmowwint bâbega .
42012037	Shâwandágoosewug uhgew unnoketâgaweninnewug otogemámewân tuhkoshininidjin mikkowwintwâ ukkowâbewât kagat ketenenim , tuh gishpezo che onuhbeiggowât , che wesenewât oguh mátuhonán .
42012038	Kishpindush wiebuh ōshkedibbikutinik , giyadush náágutch ishpedibbikutinik , tuhkoshink , mikkowwintwâ ukkowâbewât , kagat ketenenim , tuh sháwandágoosewug uhgew unnoketâgaweninnewug .
42012039	Kekandumōk o-o , tebandunk wegewâm kekandungebun e-e tepiegun ope gamotishkid che tuhkoshink , tá ge ukkowâbe , kâ tá ge bogonaegâtasininne owegewâm .
42012040	Me e-e ga ōnje gezhetáyag : eu tepiegun ope enanduhzewag , Aninne Oguisun me ope che tuhkoshink .
42012041	Peterdush otinnân , Neendogemám , neenowind innuh bego atuh ketezhemin o-o buhbawatâgoozewin ? Kokkinná nuhigo aninnewug ketenág ?
42012042	Jesusdush eketto , owwanan 'ow nabwâkât quiuk mezhinowa otogemámun , oguh onuhgimmegon che ogemákundumágoot owegewam che bemusshumáwâtdush kokkinná andussotawizzit ?
42012043	Tuh shâwandagooze 'ow mezhinowa , otogemámun tuhkoshininit mikkowwint e-e enunokeet .
42012044	Kagat neendabwa aeninuhgook , oguh onuhgemán che tebandumágoot kokkinná azhe tebandunk .
42012045	'Owedush unnoketâgaweninne kishpin ekettōt otaink , Neendogemám kâ muhshe tuhkoshinze ; medush che máje buhbuhketawât unnoketâgaweninnewun , giya pemetágunequamun , che wesenitdush giya che menequat , giyadush che kewushquabeet ;
42012046	Otogemámun 'ow unnoketâgaweninne tuhtuhkoshin e-e gezhigut nundowanemásig , e-e tepiegundush uhnundowanemásig , tuh gishkishwâ , tuh ezhenázhowá uzzhiánit tiabwatunzikwâ .
42012047	'Owedush unnoketâpiweninne kakandunk otogemámun azhe nundowanduminit , kâdush gezhetáse , kâ getotunze otogemámun azhe nundowanemigoot , che totunk , tuhbuhshunzhiegâzōt kitche nebená .
42012048	Weendush kakanduhzik otogemámun azhe nundowwanduminit , gemutchetotunkdush , punge go guhtuhbuhshunzhiegâzo . Ween nebewá mánint , nebewa tuh nundowandumowá ; aninne menát nebewa , aninnewun nebewá oguh nundotumágōn minowâ .
42012049	Neembe-ezhá ishkota che buhgittenumán ákeeng , áneen ga sunnágandumán kishpin kezhá kiut baskunagwan ?
42012050	Baptizewawin neendián che baptizemigoeyán ; newe quiuk otōndush che kezhekumink !
42012051	Innuhwandewin inná neembe ōnje ezhá ákeeng ketenandám ? ketenenim , kâween ; neembetâshketōn koshá :
42012052	Náágutchdush tuh nánunewug bazhek wegewâm , tuhnanáwinittewugdush , niswa giya neezh , neezh giya niswa .
42012053	Osemá oguhnishkanemán oguisemá , oguisemá oguhnishkanemán osemá ; ogeemá oguhnishkanemán odânisemá , odânisemádush oguhnishkanemán ogeemá oziggozissemá oguhnishkanemán osimmemá ; osimmemádush ognhnishkaneman oziggozissemá .
42012054	Otinnândush anishanában , ope wiábundumágoon ánáq beōmbuhgotag engábeunōnk , bâbega kedikitōm , bekemewun kagatdush shiegwouh me ang .
42012055	Opedush wiabundumágoon shâwunne notininnik , kedik ittōm tuh be kezhâta ; shegwouhdush izzhewabut .
42012056	Kagianizzeyag , kewâbundám kekinnowâzenágwuk ga zhik , giya âke ; aneen azhe kekinowâtanduhzewag o-o gezh gut ?
42012057	Kagat , unishween tebábundizzissewag quiuk che izzh wabizzeyag ?
42012058	Ope unnewejewut mazenámowut shezháyun tábákonegat , magwouh unneuhpezekáyun , wekoochetōn anegōk che quiuk ozittoeyag ; konemá ketá ezhewinik tepákonegawinink , tepákonegatdush kepáquowaweninnewun , oguh buhgittinummowân e-e keow , kepáquowaweninnedush keguh kepáquoág .
42012059	Ketenin , kâ keguh ságáunze , bwâ tepáumun che tebishkosayun .
42013001	Ahnint anishanâbag emá eu ope , oweendummowwâwân Galileeunun gá izzhewabizzinit , Pilate azhe genigenunk omisquemene osáságewitchegunink .
42013002	Jesusdush nuhquatunk , otinnân , ketenandám innuh uhew Galileeanug owushema mutche izzhewabizzewug izzhewabizzewât ánint Galileeanug , ōnje o-o ezhe ieendotowwintwâ ?
42013003	Ketenenim , kâween ; meatuh ánwanindizzoyag , gwakandumag , kokkinná mego ga ezhe banátizzeyag .
42013004	Uhgewedush ashe neezhwâchejig , wegewâm Siloamink ge pongesink , gá tussozojig , owushema mutche izzhewabizzidjig ketenandám kokkinná aninnewug Jerusalemink ?
42013005	Ketenenim , kâween ; meatuh ánwanindizzoyag gwakandumag , mego ga ezhe banátizzeyag .
42013006	Iekettodush o-o buhbawatágoozewin : bazhek aninne kitche shomenâtigōn ogegittegânán ogittegânink ; obenundowâbundándush uhmenewinit kâdush kago omikkunzeen .
42013007	Otinnândush unnoketâgaweninnemun , binná , niswa kekenonowin neendábenundowâbundánun uhmenewit o-o kitche shomenâtik ; kâdush kago nemikkunzeen : guhwuh , áneen ga totowwint che buhtuhkizzōt omá ákeeng ?
42013008	Oguhnonándush , otinnân , neendogemám , bone máno o-o kekenonowin nōngum , neendá kumegáán , che netáwiggink
42013009	Kishpindush menewit , tuh onissheshin ; kishpindush menewissig neendáwâch keguh guhwâ .
42013010	Magwouhdush gá gegetōt uhnumeawegumigōnk iá , unwabewinnegezhiguk .
42013011	Binnádush , bazhek equa ákooze usshe neezhwâswa kekenonowin wâgishkâ kâdush kushketose we tuzzhotát .
42013012	Jesusdush wiábomát , onundomán , otinnándush , equa , ketákoozewin kenuhgunigōn .
42013013	Otângenándush : bâbegadush tuzzhoká quiuk ; kitchetwâweándush Kitche Manitōn .
42013014	Nâgânizzitdush uhnumeawegumigōnk nishkâcheguhnōnán anishanában , ōnje Jesus nojemoewat unwabewinnegezhigutinik , ekettodush ningōtwaswogwun aninnewug tá unnokewug : me ono gezhigutōn ope che be-ezhápun che nojemoint , kâweendush unwabewinnegezhiguk .
42013015	Kitche Manito ( Jesus ) nuhquatunk , otinnân , kagianizzeyun , kânuh kokkinná andussheyag ketábuhwâsewâg kebazhekokashemewâg giya kepezhekemewâg kemátásuggábegináwâg wemeniagwâ nebe unwabewinnegezhiguk ?
42013016	Kânuh wuhow equa , Abraham odânun , Mutche Monitōn awâkâningoot binná usshe neezhwâswa kekenonowin , otá gegishkeáse unwabewinnegezhigutinik ?
42013017	Opedush o-o aekettōt , kokkinná nashkanemigoojin águtchewun , kokkinnádush anishanâbag pâpenanemowug menik o-o kitchetwâunnokewinun aeendotunk .
42013018	Ekettodush , owwagonan Kitche Manito otogemáwewin azhenágwuk ?
42013019	Wesuggut menekânink ezhenágwut , aninne watâpenunk , ogittegátán ogittegânink , máje-egin , be kitche metigōn ; benaseugdush gezhigōnk bonewug otikwunnewuninik .
42013020	Minowâdush eketto , wagonan Kitche Manito otogemáwewin azhenágwuk ?
42013021	Wanje ōmbiskág puhquazhgun ezhenágwut , equa watâpenunk niswo tepiegun besebochegunun ( báság puhquazhegun ) ogegátōn , kokkinná che ōmbishkág che nángunk .
42013022	Májádush otunnne shábooshkánun kitche otanowun , giya otanowun , uhguhgequat , uhzhezhát Jerusalemink .
42013023	Oweuhdush otinnân , Neendoeemám babazhek innuhgo tuh gâgega bemátizzewug ? otinnândush anishanâban ,
42013024	Wekoochetōk anegōk che peendegayag wâbwâg squándem nebewá ketenenim , tuh wekoochetowug che beendegawât , kádush tuh kushketosewug .
42013025	Ningōtink ogemá pusegweet , kepáquounk squândem , kemáje nebowwimdush áqutchink , uhpapágáquhumag squândem ekettōnk , Neendogemám , pákindanummowweshinâng ; keguh guhnonigowâ , tuh eketto , kâ kekanemissenonim wanjeeyag :
42013026	Medush che máje iekettoeyag , neweseneminábunukko nemenequaminábunukko zhiáeyun , ke guhgequanábunukko nemikkunámáng .
42013027	Tuh ekettodush , ketenenim , kâ kekekanemissenonim wanje eyag ; ningooche ezhág , kokkinná mache izzhewabizzeyag .
42013028	Medush emá keche mowweyag , che muhmuhtwa-ábetashinag , ope che wâbomagwâ Abraham , Isaac , giya Jacob , kokkinná giya mamándáwizzidjig , Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink , keenowâdush keguh sâgitchewabinnegâzōm .
42013029	Wâbunōnk tuhōnjebáwug , giya engábeunōnk , giya kewatinōnk giya shâwunōnk , Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink , tuh námátábewugdush .
42013030	Binnádush , ánint uhgew nōngnm nâgânandágoozidjig nōndás ga apetandágoozewât ; giyadush uhgew nōndás apetandágoozidjig mewug uhgew ga negânandâgoozidjig .
42013031	Mego e-e gezhigut , ánint Phariseeun obeotissigōn , otinnáwân , ságáun , ningooche ezhán Herod keguh nesig .
42013032	Otinnândush , owwe weendummow 'ow wágoosh , binná nesâgitchenázhowâg Mutche Manitōg , giya nenojemoewa nōngum gezhiguk giya wâbunk , giya wâswâbunk neenguh eeshquâsa .
42013033	Anawak ōnjittá neenguh bamosa , nongum giya wábunk , wâswâbunk giya , minowâdush bazhek gezhigut neenguh eeshquâsa kâ máween tuh izzhewabusinōn , mamándawizzit che wunnisshingebun , aqutcheiuhe Jerusalemink .
42013034	Oh Jerusalem ! Jerusalem ! keneság manitowâzojig , kebe mosinuhág uhgew azhe nizzhuhummágoyunik ; nuhningim neendánuhwe mowōndonág kenejânisug , pekááquouh azhe mowōndonát onejânisun anámeningwegun , keenowâdush kâ kege-enanduhzeem !
42013035	Binná kewegewâm kenuhguhtumágōm banátuk . Kagatdush ketenenim , kâween minowâ keguh wâbomisseem chebwâ ochichesag o-o gezhigut ope keguh ekettōm , tuhshâwandágooze ween ga tuhkoshink Kitche Manito otonozowinink .
42014001	Gah izzhewabukdush ogemá Pharisee andánit peendega uhmejit puhquazhegun unwabewinnegezhigutinik , otukkowâbomáwândush .
42014002	Binnádush bazhek anione anosumábit , mesiche .
42014003	Jesusdush guhnoke , otinnân gegetoweninnewun giya Phariseeun , quiuk 'nuh tá izzhewabut nojemoittink unwabewinnegezhigutinik ?
42014004	Kâdush gegetosewug . Ototâpenán , nōjemoón , buhgitenándush :
42014005	Oguhnonán , otinnân , áneen wuhow andussheag kepeshekemewâ , giya kebazhekokazhemewâ , beendánekânasat unwabewinnegezhiguk ga wekobinnásewagobun unwabewinnegezhiguk ?
42014006	Kâdush kushketosewug we nuhquatowâwât ono iuheen .
42014007	Oweendummowândush buhbawatágoozewin uhgew gá nundominjig , ope wiábundunk onábundumowât , ogemá uzzhuhbit ; otinnândush ,
42014008	Oweuh aninne wekominág kago owushema apetandágwuk námátábewin námátábekago , konemá owushemá apetandágoozenidjin aninnewun apetandágoozeyun oguhnuhdomán ;
42014009	Weendush gá nundomik giya gá nundomát uhnew keguhbeik , meezh 'ow aninne onámátábewin , keendush keguh águtch nōndás apetandágwuk námátábewin che otâpenumun .
42014010	Opedush wekomigoeyun , nōndás apetandágwuk námátábewin , owwe námátábin , weendush gá nundomik , keguh beguhnonik , neendinowamágun nowutch ishpemink ezhan : medush kitche meenwâbomikwâ uhgew wâtopomudjig .
42014011	Owwagwan owushema ga apetandumogwan weow , nōndás tuh apetandágooze , owwagwandush nōndás ga apetandumogwan weow , owushema tuh apetandágooze .
42014012	Otigōndush uhnew gá wekomiggoojin , wâkoongayunin , kago wâsokowudjig nundomákan , kago giya kekânisug , nundomákan , giya anowamudjig kago giya , kekitchetwâwizzemug ; ânga giya weenowâ keguh wekomikōg chetepáumōkwâ .
42014013	Wâkoongayunun , katemákizzidjig nundōm , nanepinnegat , giya nanepenizzit , giya kagebeengwat :
42014014	Keguh shâwandagoozdush ; ōnje kâ keguh ge tepáumágooseeg ; ábejebáwinink keguh tepáumágoowiz .
42014015	Bazhekdush uhnew wâtopomigoojin n'wânduminit ono iuheen , otigōn , tuh shâwandágooze ween ga mejit puhquazhegun Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
42014016	Jesusdush otinnân , bazhek aninne kitche wekoonga , kitche nebenádush onundomán :
42014017	Otuhnonán otoskenegamun ope kowâsinink , uhnundomintwâ uhgew wâkominjig , ōnje kokkinná kago gezissin .
42014018	Kokkinnádush miáje ōnduhmetágoozewug . Bazhek eketto , áke neenge kishpinuttōn , newawâbundán : ápadush bakâ anandágoozeyán .
42014019	Minowâdush bazhek eketto , metoswa pezhekewug neengegishpenánág , newe owwe tebuhgemág ; ápadush bakâ anandágoozeyán .
42014020	Minowâ bazhek eketto , peengewe-ew ; me wanje ezhásewân .
42014021	Oskenegamemádush betuhkoshin , oweendumowât otogemámun ono iuheen . Wagemákundunkdush wegewâm nishkâtizze , otinnân otoskenegamun gazhetinna mikkunáng papáezhág , magwa otanuh , beezh katemákizzidjig , giya kagebeengwajig , giya miákinnekajig , nanepenizzidjig .
42014022	Otoskenegamundush eketto , Neendogemám , gegezhetáng gá ekettoeyun , kiábedush towwutta .
42014023	Ogemádush otinnân otoskenegamun , mikkunáng giya michikkuning papáezhág beendegush , menik che mooshkenag newegewâm .
42014024	Ketenenim , uhgew aninnewug wiánuhnundomugebuneeg , kâ oguh tângunduhzenâwâ newesenewin ,
42014025	Kitche nebewá anishanâban owejewegōn : gwaketádush , otinnân ,
42014026	Oweuh aninne beōtezhit , shinganemásig ōsun , giya ōgeen , giya wewun , giya onejânisun , giya wekânisun , giya otowwamán , giya obemátizzewin , kâ neendá otoskenegamemáse .
42014027	Owwagwandush ga guhgwadebanindizzosegwan , che be nopenuhzhit , kâ neendá otoskenegamemáse .
42014028	Owwanan wuhow andussheyag we ozhetōt wegewâm , ga námátábesigoon che onuhgindunk ga innuhgindanik che tebábundunk che tabisanik che gezhetōt ?
42014029	Konemá ope ozhissetōt kashketosig owwe gezhetōt , kokkinná wiábunduminit obápeigōn ,
42014030	Ekettōnk , wuhow aninne máje ozhega , kâdush kushketose we gezhegat .
42014031	Owwanandush wuhow ogemá , mowwinnawât bazhek ogemán , kânuh otánámátábisse , che tehuhgindâzōt che kushketogobunan , metoswâkoozit nuhgishkowât neezhtunuh anduswâkoozininjin ?
42014032	Uhgamá , magwouh wâsá 'zhiát , uhnōnát oweuh , che kuhquajemánit che innuhwandewât .
42014033	Me eu owwagwan magwaiuhe ga iâgwan kishpin wenuhguttunzig kokkinná azhetunnit , kâ neendá otoskenegamemáse .
