42014034	Shewetágun onissheshin ; shewetágundush kishpin banátuk , áneen ga shewetágunáumink ?
42014035	Kâ ningōt enábuhtusinōn , ákeeng che átōngebun , gamá ketegânink che átōngebun ; owabenán koshuh . Owwanan watowwugâgwan che nōndunk , máno tuh nōndum .
42015001	Kokkinnahdush mowōnjichegajig giya miázheninnewuggizzidjig be-ezháwug be-bezindowwâwât .
42015002	Phariseeug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug nuhnishkâzetágoozewug , ekettowug , wuhow aninne owetokowân mache izzhewabizzinidjin owetobemándush .
42015003	Oweendumowândush o-o buhbawatágoozewin , ekettōnk ,
42015004	Owwanan aninne andussheyag ningotwâk iáwât manishtânishun , bazhekdush wunneshink , kânuh otánuhguhnáseen shângussemetunnuh usshe shângusse buhgwuttuhkumigáng , che nundowâbomát uhnew wunneshininidjin che mikkowât ?
42015005	Mikkowâtdush , otinnemángunink otussan , uhpâpenanemoot .
42015006	Buhtuhkoshink andát , omowōndōnundomán owejetukke wamágunun giya wâsokowâjin , otinnândush , wejebápenane momeshig ; neenge mikkowwâ nemánishtânishim waneshinge bun .
42015007	Ketenenim , owushemá pâpenanemowinnewun gezhigōnk bazhek mache izzhewabizzit gwaketōt otenandumowin che men noizzhewabizzit , azhe pâpenanemōnk , shângusse metunnuh usshe shângusse , manoizzhewabizzidjig ánwanindizzowin munazesigwâjin .
42015008	Uhgamá oweuh equa metoswâk tuswa shoneá ayát , bazhekdush wunnetōt , kânuh otásukkáunzeen wâsâkoninjegun , che chaguhtiegat owegewam , nánázh che mikkowât ?
42015009	Ge mikkungdush , omōwōndonundomán owejetukkewamágunun giya wâsokowâjin , otinnândush , wejepâpenanemomeshig ; neengemikkowwâ neenshoneâm waneuggebun .
42015010	Me giya , aninnuhgook , pâpenanemowinnewun gezhigōnk magwaiuhe Kitche Manito omezhinowamun bazhek mache izzhewabizzit gwakandungin che mennoizzhewabizzit .
42015011	Ekettodush , bazhek aninne neezhewan oguisun :
42015012	Oshemaemádush otinnân ōsun , nōs , mezheshin otinotawizze menik watisekágoeyán : azhe nanáwenumowâtdush otinotawizzewin .
42015013	Náágutchdush punge anduswogwunniguk , oshemaemá omowōndōnán otinotawizzewin , májádush wâsâ zhezhát , obanájetōtdush kokkinná uhbisshegwâch uhbemátizzit .
42015014	Opedush kokkinná gá banájetōt otiemun , me azhe kitche buhkuttawinnewung emá otunnuhkewinink ; májedush katemákizze .
42015015	Owwe uhnonigoose bazhek aninnewun emá otunnuhkewinink ; otuhnōnándush cheweusshumát kōkáshun ketegânink .
42015016	Ogoochedush umwân shegooshkebichegunun kōkōshunumwâjin ; kâdush oweuh aninne otusshumegooseen .
42015017	Opedush aenandunk , ittizzo , bátienowun nōs anonájin kokkinnádush otiánâwâ puhquazhegun che mejewât giya che megewawât , neendush nenib neembuhkuttayán !
42015018	Neenguh pusegwe che ezháyán nōs , neenguh enán , nōs , neenge mutchetotowâ Kitche Manito giya anosumeun .
42015019	Kâ neendá apetandágoozisse keguis che egoeyámban minowâ ; bazhek ketunnoketâgawenineem ezheissin .
42015020	Pusegwedush , obeotisándush ōsun . Magwouhdush wâsâ betát , ōsun owâbomegōn , oshâwanemegōn , obegwáshkunnetágōn , oquagunánink , iojemegootdush .
42015021	Oguisemádush otigōn ōsun , nōs , neengemutchetotowâ Kitche Manito anosumeun kâween minowâ keguis neengiegoose .
42015022	Osemádush otinnán , unnoketâgaweninnemun , owushema onissheshink buhbeenzikowâgun betōk , beenzekonik : tuhtebeninjebezoon beenzekonik oninj , metikwukkizzenun beenzekonik ozitáng :
42015023	Owushema wânenoot pezhekeens benik , nesik ; wesenetá , pâpenanemotá :
42015024	Wuhow neenguis genebopun , minowâdush bemátizze ; gewunneshinobun , minowâdush mikkowâ , májedush pâpenanemowug .
42015025	Sazekizzinidjindush ketegânink iáwun ; bazhew wegewaminkdush buhtuhkoshink , onōndán nemeitting giyadush nagumōng .
42015026	Onundomándush bazhek unnoketâgaweninnemun otinnândush áneen o-o anuhkumiguk ?
42015027	Otinnândush , kekânis tuhkoshin ; kōsdush wânenonidjin pezhekeensun ogenetumowâwân , ōnje omikkowân wawane mennobemátizzinit .
42015028	Nishkâtizzedush , kâdush wepeendegase ; ōsundush beságáum beguhgâzomigoot .
42015029	Oguhnonándush , otinnân ōsun , binná kitche nebená tusso kekenōnōwinun ketunnoketōn , kâdush wekâ neengebogobetoseen kedikittowin ; kâ pâpish manishtânishans kegemezhesenun , che wejepâpenanemomugwâbun neendenowamágunug :
42015030	Bâbegadush ween 'ow keguis tuhkoshink , gá nisshewunnájetōt ketinotawizzewin bisshegwâch equawezhishun ōnje , kegenetumowâ wâninonidjin pezhekeensun .
42015031	Otinnândush , neenguis , gâgineek keweje-ew ; kokkinnádush tabandumán keen ketieem .
42015032	Enandâgwut che pâpenanemoeyunk ; kekânis genebopun , minowâdush bemátizze ; gewunneghinobun , minowâdush mikkowâ .
42016001	Otinnaundush otoskenegamun , bazhek wiánuttizzit aninne omezhinowame : oweuhdush beweendumagōn , kemezhinowam obanájetōn ketunnokájegun .
42016002	Onundomándush , otinnân , owwagonan o-o n'wândumán anájemigoeyun ? wâbundi-isshin ketinunnokewin ; kâween kiábe keguh mezhinowawisse .
42016003	Mezhinowadush ittezo , áneen o-o ge teyán ? Neendogemám neendotâpenumág nemezhinowaweyámbán ; kâ neen kushketose wewânekayán ; neendáguch che papánundotumágayán .
42016004	Neengezhandum ga izzhewabizzeyán sâgitchewabinnego yán nemezhinowâweyambán , che peendegunnigowât owegewâmewâng .
42016005	Kokkinná onundomán otogemámun mazenámowâjin , otinnândush natámubbinidjin , áneen menik mazenámewwut neendogemám ?
42016006	Ekettodush , ningōtwâk tepiegun pemeta : otinnândush , otâpenun kemazaniegun , námátábin , nánemetunnuh oshepeun .
42016007	Minowâdush bazhek otinnân , áneen menik mazenámowwut Neendogemám ? ekettodush , ningōtwâswâ tepiegun puhquazhegun . Otinnândush , otâpenun gazhetinna kemazaniegun , námátábin , nishwâswâ metunnuh oshepeun .
42016008	Otogemámemá niandum ōnje genebwâkâ totum : uhbesocheug o-o ákeeng anunnokewat nowutch nebwâkâwug uhbenocheug wâsayá nebwâkâwât .
42016009	Ketenenim , ketinotawizzewinewâ ōnje innuhwandâsōk ; pongesinag , keguh ōnje menigōm gâgega tawin .
42016010	Ween wawane kanowandunk agâsenuttinik , kunwandán wawane kache apetandágwutinik ; weendush kanowanduhzik agâsenutinik , kâ kunwânduhzeen kache apetandágwutinik .
42016011	Kishpin quiuk getotunzewag kitchetwâwizzewin o-o ákeeng , owwanan ga meninág quiuk kitchetwâwizzewin ?
42016012	Kishpin wawane kunwanduhzewag bakânizzit aninne otiemun , owwanan ga meninág tebinowa ketiemewân ?
42016013	Kâ oweuh otoskenegamemá otá unnoketowwâseen neezh otogemámemán , bazhek otá sheenganemán , bazhek otá sâgeán , bazhek etá wanjetōnán , bazhekdush otá banájeán : kâween ketá , kushketoseem che unnoketowwug Kitche Manito giya Mammon , ( kitchetwâwizzewin o-o ákeeng . )
42016014	Phariseeug , sásagizzidjig , onōndánâwân kokkinná ono iuheen , opâpeáwândush .
42016015	Otinnândush uhnew , keenowâ kequiukonágwitōnâwân keowwewân anosumewât aninnewug ; Kitche Manito koshá okekandánun ketaewân . Owushema apetandágwuk magwa aninne , Kitche Manito me shângandunk .
42016016	Tepákonegawin , giya mamándawizzidjig nánázh John : eu ope nánázhdush nōngum Kitche Manito otogemáwewin guhgequa kokkinnádush aninnewug oginjetáwenotánâwâ .
42016017	Nowutch wanepunut , gezhik giya áke che májámuguk , punge tepákonegawin che pongesink .
42016018	Owwagwan gawabenágwan wewun , minowâdush bâkânezinidjin wetegamát , bisshegwâtizze ; owwagwandush ga wetegamágwan gá wabinnegoot onâbamun , bisshegwâtizze .
42016019	Bazhek aninne wiánuttizzit , wanissheshininnik misquagin , giya wanissheshininnik bebuggewyánnegin otuggwin , wanissheshininnikdush mejim andusso gezhigutinnik :
42016020	Bazhekdush papánundotummágat , Lazarus ezhenekâzo otishquandamink shingeshin , mizzewa iyomege .
42016021	Nundotummága che usshummint bewebitchegunun kachetwâwizzit aninne otopowinnink wanje pongesink : anemōgdush betuhkoshinōg be-nōsquâtumágoot iyomegeet .
42016022	Gá izzhewabukdush nundotummágat azhe nebōt máchewitchegâzodush , Kitche Manito omezhinowamun omájewinniggōn Abraham okákegunnink ezhewinná ; kache-twâwizzit aninne giyadush ween onebo , ningwuhwâdush .
42016023	Mutche ishkotangdush , ishpemink enábe owesuggandunk ; wâsâdushowâbomán Abrahamun , Lazarusundush okákegunnink iáwun .
42016024	Ahzhequadush , eketto , Nōs Abraham , shâwanemisshin , Lazarusun nōzh , che tânguhgwinjetōt oninj che tukkábuhwuttōt neendanenew , newesugginnazh omá ishkotang .
42016025	Abrahamdush eketto , niaguttuhwandun neenguis , magwouh bemátizzeyun , uhgeiáeyun wanissheshink ketiemun , Lazarusdush mutche iewisshun ; nōngumdush mennōiá keendush kekuhgwâtuggitto .
42016026	Minowâdush kago , nussowwie keen neenowind giya , kitche wequayá , oweuhdush we ezhát ewada iezháeyun omá ōnje kâ tá kushketose kâ giya oweuh omá 'tá be-ezháse ewada che ōnjebât .
42016027	Ekettodush me wanje ketánummeattōn nōs Abraham , che ezhe anōnát Lazarusun , nōs owegewamink .
42016028	Nánunnewug nekânisug , che owwe guhgekemát che be-ezhásigwâ omá mutche ishkotang .
42016029	Abrahamdush otinnân , Mosesun otiáwân , giyadush mamándáwizzinidjin , mewun uhniew ga bezindowâwâjin .
42016030	Ekettodush , oh nōs Abraham ! kâween eu ; bazhek koshá gá nebōt nayáb ezhát otá ánwanemáwân .
42016031	Otinnândush , kispin tabwatowâsigwâ Mosesun giya mamándáwizzinidjin , kâ otá tabwatowâseen gá nebonidjin .
42017001	Otinnaundush otoskenegamun , mutche totátewin ōnjittá tuhtuhgomuggut ; kitche sunnágut koshá ween wanje izzhewabuk !
42017002	Nowutch 'tow onissheshin besebochegunábekōn napekonint , pukkobewabenintdush kitchegummeeng , che mutche totowâpun , bazhek uhnew babewizzheidjin .
42017003	Tuhtebábundizōk ! Kekânis ningōtono azhe mutche totokin , guhnōzh ; ánwanindizzōtdush , menowweshâwânim .
42017004	Kishpin mutchetotōk neezhwâchink ningo gezhik , ánwanindizzōt , neendosittáwandum ekettōt ; mennoweshâwanim .
42017005	Anoninjigdush otináwân Kitche Manitōn nowutch mechâtōn nemushkâwandumowinnewân .
42017006	Jesusdush eketto , wesuggut menekânink anegoquág kemushkâwandumowinnewâ , ketá enáwâ wuhuh metig keguh puhkwâkobinnego , kitche-gummeeng keguh ketegânigo , ketá tabwatágowâdush .
42017007	Owwanan o-o andussheyag otunnoketâgaweninemeyag , usshumát pezhekewun , giya bemebochegat , ga enápun , ketegânink beōnjebát , owwe námátábin wesenin ?
42017008	Kânuh ketá enásewâ , gezhesetōn wesenewin , kispizzoon , mezhinowakundowweshin , che eeshquâ weseneyán giya che eeshquâ menequayán ; panemádush giya keen keguh wesin giya ?
42017009	Megwetch 'nuh ketá enánemá ketunnoketâgawenineem ōnje uzzhie-endotunkigo aenut ? Kâween neendenandum .
42017010	Me giya keenowâ debishko , ope gá eeshquâtáeyag kokkinná ono iuheen azhe anoninuhgook , ekettoeyeuk , kâ quiuk neendunnoketâgaweninnewissemin ; neenge enunokemin azhe anōnigoyâng che unnokeyâng atuh .
42017011	Gá izzhewabukdush magwouh Jerusalemink 'zhezhát , otunne shábooshkán nowwiuhe Samaria giya Galilee .
42017012	Ane chagishkunk otanuh , metoswa aninnewun onuhgishkowân wamegejig , wâsâdush nebowwewug :
42017013	Anegōk ázhequawug ekettowugdush , Jesus , Neendogemám , shâwanemeshinâng .
42017014	Wiábomátdush , otinnân , májág , sáságewitchegaweninnewug owwe wâbundi-ik keowwewân : gá izzhewabukdush magwouh unnepezekáwât , nojemowug .
42017015	Bazhekdush , wiábundunk uhge nōjemōt , gwakegâbowe , uzzhakewa anegōk gegeto omámoyewumát Kitche Manitōn .
42017016	Pongeshin oskezhigōnk Jesus ozitánink , omámoyewumátdush ; Samaritanewedush .
42017017	Jesusdush eketto , kânuh metáchesewug gá nojemojig ? áneen uhgew shânguswe ?
42017018	Kânuh oweuh che gwaketásewug che mámoyewumát Kitche Manitōn meatuh wuhow miátáwizzit ?
42017019	Otinnândush , pusegween , máján , kemushkâwandumowin kenojemoigoon .
42017020	Ope Phariseeug kaquajemigoot , áneen ope Kitche Manito otogemáwewin ga tuhkoshinomuguk , otinnân , kâween ketá wâbunduhzeem ope Kitche Manito otogemáwewin takoshinomugguk .
42017021	Kâween tuh ekettoseem , binná , omá ! binná , emá ! ōnje binná Kitche Manito otogemáwewin keowwewâng iá .
42017022	Otinnândush , gezhigutōn tuh tuhkoshinomuggutōn , keguh wewâbundám Aninne Oguisun bazhek ogezhigutōmun , kâweendush ketá kushketoseem .
42017023	Keguh egowâg , omá enábig ! ewada enábig ! kago nopenuhnákagwânik .
42017024	Unnemeke wâsumowinink nuhbuhnie pezhigōnk ōndâtag , ázhowiuhedush gezhigōnk sukâtag ; me ga izzhewabuk Aninne Oguisun ogezhigutōmun .
42017025	Chebwâ ochichegag ono gezhigutōn kitche nebená tuhtuhgwatuggito , tuh wabinnegâzo uhgew anishanâbag ōnje .
42017026	Gá izzhewabuk Noe ogezhigutōmun , me ga izzhewabutinik Aninne Oguisun ogezhigutōmun .
42017027	Gewesenewug , gemenequawug , wewewug , wetegandeittewug , nánázh e-e gezhigut Noe uhbeendegat chemánink , mooshkuhundush áke , kokkinnádush banátizzewug .
42017028	Giyadush gá izzhewabuk Lot ogezhigutōmun ; wesenewug , menequawug , átátewug , ketegawug , ozhegawug ;
42017029	Me go e-e gezhigut Lot siáguhunk Sodomink , Kitche Manito ototán che pongesink gezhigōnk ōnje ishkotá giya ozhâwâshquâshkonag kokkinnadush obanájeigōnâwân :
42017030	Me gá izzhewabuk o-o gezhigut Aninne Oguisun ope nágoozit .
42017031	E-e gezhigut owwagwan gittegumik , ga iágwan , otiemundush beendik attanik , kâ tuh benesândewase che otâpenunk , ween giya ketegânink ga iát , kâ tuh uzzhakewase .
42017032	Náguhtuhwanemik Lot wewun .
42017033	Owwagwan ga wegooche bemajetogwan obemátizzewin oguh banájetōn , owwagwandush ga wewunnetōn obemátizzewin oguh bemájetōn .
42017034	Ketenenim , eu dibbikut tuh neezhoshinōg nebágunnink ; bazhek tuh otâpená bazhekdush tuh ishkoná .
42017035	Neezh equawug tuh nezhobesebochegawug bazhek tuh otâpená bazhekdush tuh ishkooná .
42017036	Neezh aninnewug ketegânink tuh iáwug ; bazhek tuh otâpená bazhekdush tuh ishkooná .
42017037	Oguhnonáwândush , otinnân , ánepe Neendogemám ? otinnân weowwemá che iatag me emá megizzewug che mowōnjeittewât .
42018001	Oweendumowaundush buhbawatágoozewin ; gâgineek aninne che ezhe uhnumeát .
42018002	Ekettōnk , otanonk bazhek tebákonegaweninne , kâ ogosáseen Kitche Manitōn , kâ giya aninnewun ogosáseen .
42018003	Bazhekdush shegá emá iá e-e otanuh ; tebákonegawanin newundush obe-ezhanun , ekettodush , quiuk osetōn 'ow aninne andotowwit .
42018004	Kaweendush we totunze wiazhkut ; náágutchdush ittizzo , ánuh kâ neengosáse Kitche Manito giya kâ oweuh aninne neengosáse ;
42018005	Unishá wuhow equa megooshkâcheit , neenguh quiuk osetowâ che megooshkâcheissig nuhningim che tuhkoshink .
42018006	Jesusdush eketto , bezindowwik mache tebákonegat aekettōt .
42018007	Kânuh Kitche Manito oguh quiuk osetowân tebinowa otuhnishanâbamun otizzhewabizzewininne ? ánuh konemá wekâ pánemá ?
42018008	Kagat ketenenim ōnjittá oguh quiuk osetowân bâbegá , anawak , Aninne Oguisun tuhkoshink , oguh mikkowán innuh mushkâwandumowin ákeeng ?
42018009	Otebátotán o-o guhgequawin , áhnint uhgew nenebwâkâmin anandugig , opâpeáwândush uhnew ánint .
42018010	Ekettodush neezh aninnewug kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk ezháwug owwe uhnumeáwât ; Pharisee bazhek bazhekdush mowōnjichegaweninne .
42018011	Phariseedush nebowwe o-o ezhe uhnumeá tebinowa weowwink , Kitche Manito , megwetch ketenin , izzhewabizzissewân ánint aninnewug azhewabizzewât , wiazhingat , mutche izzhewabizzit , bashegwâtizzit , uhgamá tebishko izzhewabizzit , wuhow mowōnjichegat .
42018012	Neezhink ningo uhnumeagezhiguk nemuhkutta ; metáchink neendiemun bazhek nemegewam kokkinná neendiemun .
42018013	Mowōnjichegaweninnedush wâsâ nebowwe , kâween ishpemink we-enábisse gezhigōnk : tânginittizzo okákegunink , ekettodush , shâwanemeshin , Kitche Manito shâwanemeshin , nemutcheizzhewabiz .
42018014	Ketenenim , wuhow mowōnjichegaweninne owushema mennoizzhewabizze anosumeet Kitche Manito o-o unnekewat andát bazhek 'ow azhe mennoizzhewabizzit , owwagwan ga gitche apetandumōgwan weow tuhtuhbusandágooze : weendush ga tuhbuhsandunk weow owushema tuh apetandágooze .
42018015	Obetowâwândush uhbenocheun che tângenat ; otoskenegamundush wiábunduminit onuhnibbekemáwân .
42018016	Jesusdush onundomán ekettodush , máno uhbenocheug neenguh benázekágōg , kago nuhgânisshowâkago , ōnje uhgew azhenágoozidjig Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink iáwug .
42018017	Kagat ketenenim , owwagwan uhbenocheink ga totunzegwan weow kâ tuhpeendegase Kitche Manito otogemáwewinnink .
42018018	Bazhek ogemá okuhquajemigōn , ekettodush , Mennoneendogemám , áneen ga izzhewabizzeán che gâgega bemátiz zeán ?
42018019	Jesusdush otinnân , wagonan menno-izzhewabizzeán wanje ezheun ? kâ oweuh menno-izzhewabizzisse , meatuh bazhek , me Kitche Manito .
42018020	Kekekandánun guhgequawinun , kago bisshegwâtizzekan , kago nisshewakan , kago kemotekan , kago guhgenowishkekan , kitchetwâwanim kōs keguh giya .
42018021	Ekettodush , kokkinná ono neenge kunwandánun aquo netáwiggeán .
42018022	Jesusdush n'wândunk ono iuheen otinnân ningōtwayug kiábe izzhewabizzewin ketá izzhewabiz ; átáwân kokkinná azhetunneun katemákizzidjig meezh , ketinotawizzewin tuhtuhgoo gezhigōnk ; benopenuhzheshindush .
42018023	Opedush o-o n'wândunk kitche kushkandum ; ōnje kitche wânutizze .
42018024	Jesusdush wiábomát kushkanduminit , otinnân , uhgew wiánutizzidjig tuh kitche sunnágizzewug che peendegawât Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink !
42018025	Nowutch tá wanepunut kitche áwase che shebáskunk shebákecheanik sháponegun , wiánutizzit aninne che beendegat Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
42018026	Uhgewedush , n'wândungig , ekettowug ówwanan ga kush ketopun che bemájeiggoot ?
42018027	Ekettodush , ono iuheen aninne kashketosig , Kitche Manito tá kushketōn .
42018028	Peterdush eketto , binná , kokkinná neengenuhguhtámen , che nopenuhnáng .
42018029	Otinnândush , kagat , ketenin , kâ oweuh aninne wekâ onuhguttunzeen wegewam , gamá ōsun , gamá ōgeen , gamá wekânisun , gamá wewun , gamá onejânisun , Kitche Manito otogemáwewin ōnje ,
42018030	Owushema keche iápun nōngum , giyadush che gâgega bemátizzippun minowâ che ákewung .
42018031	Ototâpenándush asheneezhinidjin , otinnândush , binná , Jerusalemink ketezhámen , kokkinnádush iuheen mamándáwizzidjig gá ezhebe-egawât Aninne Oguisun gá iezhebeoont kokkinná tuh izzhewabut .
42018032	Tuhbuhgittenumátinun , miátáwizzidjig tuhbuhgittenumowâwug , tuhpâpenotowwâ , tuh kitche mutchetotowâ tuh sikwânâwân :
42018033	Oguh buhshunzhawâwân , oguhnissáwân , niswogumigutinikdush ; minowâ tuh ábejebá .
42018034	Kádush onissetotunzeenâwân ono inheen , ekettowin gá-towâwug , kâ okekanduhzeenáwâ ono iuheen tebátotungin .
42018035	Gá izzhewabukdush , ope bazhew bowotittunk Jerichoink bazhek kagebeengwat aninne chegekunnuh námátábe , nundotumágadush .
42018036	N'wândowât anishanâban bamosanit , kuhgwatwa , wagonan eu ?
42018037	Oweendumowâwândush Jesus Nazarethink bamosa .
42018038	Ahzhequadush , ekettōnk , Jesus , David oguisun , shâwanemeshin .
42018039	Uhgewedush uhnegânejig onibbekeguhnonáwân , pezánábin otinnáwân ; owushemadush ázhequa , David oguisun , shâwanemeshin !
42018040	Jesusdush nebowwe , unnoke , che be-ezhewetáwint , opedush tuhkoshink okuhquajemán ,
42018041	Ekettōnk wagonan nandowwanemeun che totonán ? ekettodush , Neendogemám , ápadush wâbeán .
42018042	Jesusdush otinnân , keguhwâb ; kemushkâwandumōwin kebemájeiggoon .
42018043	Bâbegadush wâbe , uhnopenuhnigōn , ogitchetwâweát Kitche Manitōn : kokkinnádush anishanâbag wiábundumowât omá moyewumáwân Kitche Manitōn .
42019001	Jesusdush unnebeendega otunne shábooshkán Jerichoink .
42019002	Binnádush bazhek aninne Zaccheus ezhenekâzo nâgânizzit mowōnjichegaweninnewug , wânuttizze .
42019003	Owwe wâbomán Jesusun , owwagwan wiáwinnegwan , kâ tabábizze , ozám kippuhgegábowewât , agâshe-edush .
42019004	Negânebutto , sycamore metigōnk owwe wequândowa owwe wâbomát , emá ane ezhánit .
42019005	Jesusdush bowotittunk , enábe , owâboman otinnân , Zaccheus , gazhetinná benesândowân , newe nogishká andáyun , nōngum gezhiguk .
42019006	Gazhetinnadush , benesândewa , pápenanemo owâbomát .
42019007	Ope wiábundumowât , kokkinná guhguhnonittewug ekettowug , owwe beendega , owwe wetopomát aninnewun mache izzhewabizzinidjin .
42019008	Zaccheus nebowwe otinnân Jesusun , Neendogemám , binná ábetá neendunnokâjegun nemenág katemákizzidjig : kishpindush makummáwugan , oweuh aninne otieem , newink owushema nayáb nemená .
42019009	Jesusdush otinnân nōngum o-o gezhiguk kunwanjegawin takoshinnomuggut o-o wegewamink : me wuhow bazhek Abraham oguisun giya .
42019010	Aninne Oguisun obenundowâbundán owwe bemájeát wanisshinidjin .
42019011	N'wândumowât ono iuheen , oweendumowân buhbawatágoozewin ōnje chegeiuhe iáwug Jerusalemink ōnje enandumōg Kitche Manito otogemáwewin tuh nágwut bâbega .
42019012	Ekettodush bazhek kitchetwâwizzit aninne wâsâ ezhá , owwe otâpenunk ogemáwewin medush che bekewat .
42019013	Onundomándush matáchenidjin otunnnoketágaweninnewun uhmenát metoswa tebábishkojegunun otinnândush uhnew , iág nánázh che tuhkoshinán .
42019014	Otanishanâbamundush oshinganemiggōn , ononáwug oweuh onopenuhnit , ekettōnk , kâween keguh iáwâsemin wuhow aninne che ogemákundumung .
42019015	Gá izzhewabukdush , ope nayáb takoshink , gá otâpenunk ogemáwewin uhnōke chenundomemint uhnoketágaweninnemun uhnew gá menájin oshoneám ; owwe wâbundunk iámenik kashketonit uzhátáwawât .
42019016	Netam tuhkoshinkdush eketto , Neendogemám , ketebábishkojegun owushema metoswa tebábishkojegun tussin .
42019017	Otinnândush uhnew , me wawane manototunk neendunnoketâgaweninneem ozâm kege kitche kuskitchega kitche punge ; eu ōnje metoswa otanowun keguh debandánun ,
42019018	Minowâdush bazhek be-eketto , Neendogemam , ketebábishkojegun náno tebábishkojegun owushema tussin .
42019019	Otinnândush giya nánun otanowun keguh tebandánun .
42019020	Minowâdush bazhek be-eketto , Neendogemám , o-o biazhekwung ketebábishkojegun gá kunwanduman manitowaginōnk .
42019021	Kege gosin kegekekanemin sunnágizzeun kemámōn gá attosewun kepushgooshega uhgeketegasewun .
42019022	Otinnândush , tebinowa kegegetowin keguh tebákonegōn mutche izzhewabiz unnoketâgaweninne ! kegekekanim uhsunnágizzeán otâpinnegayán uhge buggittinnegasewân pushkooshegayándush uhge ketegasewân .
42019023	Uhnishwin uhge attosewun neenshoneám shoneá uzzhuttōng , takoshinán neendágeián neenshoneám giya menik ga ge unne bejenissag ?
42019024	Otinnândush uhnew niyánebowwinnidjin otâpenummowwik ningo tebábishkojegun , menik uhow metoswa tebábishkojegun ayát .
42019025	Otinnáwândush Neendogemám metoswa tebábishkojegun otián .
42019026	Ketenenim kokkinná ayájig tuh menáwug weendush ayásig , ayát kago tuh otâpenummowâ .
42019027	Uhgewedush nemiátáwizzemug , watâpenissigwa che ogemákundowwugwâ , benik , nesik omá anosummeyán .
42019028	Gá eeshquâ o-o iekettōtdush , negâne ezhá Jerusalemink shezhát .
42019029	Gá izzhewabuk bazhew bowotittunk Bethphageink giya Bethanyink wudjewink Olivet ezhenekâta , neezh otoskenegamun otuhnonan ,
42019030	Ekettōnk peendegayeuk eu otanuh , keguh mikkowâ emá mánezheens che tuhkobizzoot kâwekâ aninne otasubbissenun ; ábuhōk benik omá .
42019031	Oweuh aninne kuhquajeminág , wagonan wanje ábuhwag ? keguh enáwâ Neendogemámenán onundomán .
42019032	Uhgewedush anoninjig ezháwug omikkowâwân eu , gá enintwâ .
42019033	Magwouhdush ábuhwâwât mánezheensun otabanemánidjin otigowân ; owwagonan wanje ábuhwag mánezheens ?
42019034	Ekettowugdush Neendogemámenán onundomán .
42019035	Obetowâwândush Jesusun , obeenzikowâgunnewândush otattowâwân mánezheensun Jesusundush otasubbeáwân .
42019036	Otunne tuzhwagizzittonâwân okonâsewân ane ezhánit .
42019037	Bazhew bowotittumowât , che nesâkewawât wudjewink Olivet , kokkinná otoskenegamun máje pâpenanamowug anegōk ázhequawug kitche twâweáwât Kitche Manitōn kokinnná kitche unnokewinun ōnje menik wiábundumowát :
42019038	Ekettōnk , tuh shâwandágooze ogemá takoshink Kitche Manito otuhnozowinnink : innowandewin gezhigōnk , kitchetwâwizzewin owushemá apetandágwut .
42019039	Ahnint Phariseeug magwaiuhe anishanâban , otigōn , Neendogemám , pezân ábin , ezhe ketoskenegamug .
42019040	Oguhnonándush otinnân , uhgew pezân ábewât ásineeg bâbega tá ázhequawug .
42019041	Opedush bazhew buhtuhkoshink , ogunnowâbundán otanuh otázhequanotándush ,
42019042	Ekettōnk oh ápadush kekekandumumbun , nōngum kegezhiguttōm , iuheen wâjeendunk ketinnowandewin ! pichenukdush kegátágōg keskezhigōnk .
42019043	Gezhiguttōm keguh otissiggonun , kemiátáwizzemug keguh gewetáyánekânegōg , keguh mitchekunnegânegōg gewetáiuhe keguh ōnje kunwanemigōg ,
42019044	Keguh wabezhemegōg metukkummik , keguh oppugginnegōg keenjânisug che gegishkowâwâ kâ pâpish keguh ishkoonegooseeg bazhek ásin che uhgwetogink , ōnje kâ kekekanduhzeen ope mawuhtissiggoeyun .
42019045	Owwe beendegadush kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , májesâgitchewabenándush ayatándinidjin ,
42019046	Otinnândush , oshepe-egâta , newegewam , wegewam che tuzzhe uhnumea keenowâdush kewâzhekowâwug gamotishkidjig .
42019047	Guhgequadush andusso gezhiguttinnik kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk . Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , giya anishanâbag otogemámewân enandumōg wenissáwât ,
42019048	Kâdush omikkunzeenâwâ ga totummowât : ōnje kokkinná anishanâban meenwandumōg bezindágoot .
42020001	Gah izzhewabutdush , bazhek ono gezhiguttōn , magwouh guhgekemát anishanâban , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , guhgequat meenwâjemowin , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , obeotissegōn mámowy okewanzeug ,
42020002	Beguhnonigōn , ekettōnk , weendummowweshinâng , wagonan mushkâwizzewininnewinne , wanje totumun ono iuheen ; owwanandush gá menik o-o mushkâwizzewin ?
42020003	Oguhnonán , otinnândush uhnew , keguh kuhquajeminenim kago ningōtwayug ; guhnozheshig :
42020004	John obaptizewawin gezhigōnk nuh ōnjebámugguttininne ; aninneeng innuh ōnjebámuggutinne ?
42020005	I-ittewug , ekettowugdush , kishpin gezhigōnk ōnje ekettoyung ; unishwin ge tabwatowâsewag ? tuh eketto ,
42020006	Kishpindush aninneeng ōnjebámugguttinne ekettoyung ; kokkinná anishanâbag keguh bemosiniegonánig : enandumōg John mamándáwizze .
42020007	Nuhquatumōg , ekettowug , kâ nekushketosemin che ekettoyung .
42020008	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ giya neen , keguh weendumosenonim wagonan , o-o mushkâwizzewin wanje totumán ono iuheen .
42020009	Omájedush guhgekemán anishanâban o-o buhbawatágoozewin ; bazhek aninne ogittegâtán ketegân , otoweándush ketegaweninnewun , májádush wâsâ otunnuhkewinink keenwazh .
42020010	Opedush mámáng , otuhnonán unnoketâgaweninnewun , che ezhánit ketegaweninnewun , menint natáwegittowât ; ketegaweninnewugdush obuhshunzhawâwân , okewanizzhowâwândush bizzhishshik ,
42020011	Minowâ bazhek unnoketâgaweninnewun otuhnonán , buhbukkittawâwân giya ween , iyágutátuhkummik ototowâwân , okewanizzhowâwândush bizzhishshik .
42020012	Minowâ bazhek otuhnonán ; me niswa ; obemwâgunuháwândush , uhnew giya ween , osâgitchenázhowâwândush ketegânink .
42020013	Tabandunkdush ketegân eketto ; áneen o-o ga teyán ? neenguhuhnoná siágeug neenguis , konemá ween uhnew oguhmuhnájeáwân wabomáwât .
42020014	Opedush ketegaweninnewug wiábomáwât , i-ittewug , me wuhow oguisemá , umbasinno nesátá ketegândush keguh tebandámen .
42020015	Medush azhe sâgitchenázhowâwât ketegânink , azhe nesáwât . Unish o-o tabandunk ketegân gagetotowâgwan uhnew ?
42020016	Tuh be-ezhá , che nisshewunnájeát uhnew ketegaweninnewun , bakânizzinidjindush ketegaweninnewun , oguh menán ogittegân : n'wândumowâtdush , ekettowug , kâ pâpish tuh izzhewabut .
42020017	Ogunnowâbomándush eketto , owwagonandush o-o washebe-egâtag , ásin wazhegajig wiabenumowât , me nágânissink ishquaiuhe wegewamink ?
42020018	Owwagwan ga pungissinnōgwan eu ásineeng tuh begsoshin , owwagwandush ga tussozogwan tuh begebozo .
42020019	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug , me go e-e tepiegun anandumowât che tuhkonáwât ; ogosáwândush anishanâban : weenowâ ōnjittá we i-enáwug , enandumōg .
42020020	Otukkowâbomáwân , otuhnonándush ga ukkowâbománidjin , ápiche anowandingin ototowâwân we wiyazheáwât , ogegetowinun we ōnje ochicheáwât , mágizzhá otá mushkâwizzewug che bátámáwât , keche buggittinnummewâwât Kitche Ogemán oninjenink .
42020021	Okuhquaiemáwân , ekettōnk , Neendogemám , neenkekandámin quiuk tabwawin azhe kuggequayun , kâdush oweuh aninne pekenōnk ketuhpetanemase ; quiukigo Kitche Manito azhe tabwat ketizzhe kuggequa ;
42020022	Quiuk nuh tá izzhewabut , tepáummáwungid Caesar tepáummátewin ?
42020023	Okekanemán okuhgianizzewininne , otinnândush , wagonan wanje kuhgwadebanemeyag ?
42020024	Wâbundi-isshig punge shoneá . Owwanan oskezhik mazenichegâtag ? Oguhnonáwân ekettowugdush , Ceasar .
42020025	Otinnândush , menik Caesar otiemun tabandungin , menik Kitche Manito iuheen tabandungin .
42020026	Kâdush kushketosewug owwe otâpenummowâwât odikittowininne anosummewât anishanâban , mámukkâtenanemáwân aeketonit , pezân ábewugdush .
42020027	Ahnintdush Sadduceeun obeotissigōn , ( kâween kago ábe jebáwin , aketōjig , ) okuhquajemáwândush :
42020028	Ekettōnk , Neendogemám , Moses neenge-ezhebeummá gonán , oweuh aninne nebonit wewit bwâ onejânissit , wekânissun oguhotâpenáne wewun che netáwiggittummowât wekânissun uhbenocheun .
42020029	Ningoteyung ge neezhwâso owekánissindewug , netam wâwit nebo , bwâ onejânissit .
42020030	Wiáneka wewitedush nebo , bwâ onejânissit ,
42020031	Kokkinnádush owewenáwân , kokkinnádush nebowug bwâ onejânissewât .
42020032	Squâchdush , equa giya ween nebo .
42020033	Opedush ábejebáwinnink , áneen uhow wewun ga áwit ? neezhwâswa gewetegamáwât .
42020034	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnândush , obenocheug o-o ákeeng wetegandewât , giya weteganduháwug .
42020035	Uhgewedush , ga ta apetandágoozidjig gezhigōnk che ezháwât , giya che ábejebáwât , kâ tuh weteganduhzewug , kâ giya tuh wâweteganduhásewug .
42020036	Kâ giya minowâ tuh nebosewug ; tebishko Kitche Manito omezhinowamun tuh izzhewabizzewug , Kitche Manito onejânissun tebinowa tuh áwewug .
42020037	Ahbejebáwin tuh tuhgomuggut , Moses gewâbundiewâ metigōnsink , wiáwenát Kitche Manitōn Abraham Omanitomun , giya Isaac Omanitomun , giya Jacob Omanitomun .
42020038	Oanje kâween nabojig Ogitche Manitomewân , bamátizzidjig atuh Ogitche Manitomewân , weenkokkinná wanje bemátizzewât .
42020039	Ahnint oshebe-egaweninnewug ekettowug , Neendogemám , wawane aketoeyun .
42020040	Náágutchdush , kâ okuhquajemásewân kako .
42020041	Otinnândush uhnew , áneen wanje ekettowât , Christ , David oguisun , uzzheketowât ?
42020042	Ween David eketto , onuhgummowinink , Kitche Manito otinnân Nemanitomun , neengitchenikâng námátábin .
42020043	Nánázh kemiátáwizzemug che totowwugwâ che tukkokânutwâ .
42020044	Daviddush Neengitche Manitomun enát , áneen ga ge ezhe oguissit ?
42020045	Kokkinnádush anishanâban uhnōndágoot , otinnân otoskenegamun ,
42020046	Kuhgenábomik oshebe-gaweninnewug , meenwandumōg kitche beenzikowâgunun papámegoozhawât giya uhnummekowwintwâ átáwawinnink owushema apetandágwuk námátábewinun uhnumeawegumigōnk giya wekoondewinnink .
42020047	Ogittánâwân shegág owegewamewân owwewiyazhetáwât kuhgânwazh unnumeáwug , owushemadush guhtuh buhshunzhaōgowizzewug .
42021001	Enahbedush owâbomán wiánuttizzinnidjin aninnewun , beenjwabenumowât shoneá otossowinnink .
42021002	Owâbomándush katemákizzinidjin shegá , beenjwabeauminit neezh shománekanesun .
42021003	Ekettodush kagat ketenenim , 'ow katemákizzit shegá , owushema beenjwabenán , kokkinná menik bánjwabenummowât .
42021004	Kokkinná uhgew nebewá ayájig nebená obeenjwabenáwâ weendush kokkinná obeenjwabenán menik ayát .
42021005	Ahnintdush otuzzhindánâwân kitche uhnumeawegumik azhe monnochegâtag ásineeng , giya azhe ionissheshing bagittinnumingin : ekettodush ,
42021006	Ono iuheen wiábundungin , gezhiguttōn tuh ochichesawun , kâ bazhek ásin tuh iágwetosinzenōn kokkinná tuh tittebinnewabinnegâtawun .
42021007	Okuhquajemáwândush ekettōnk Neendogemám , áneen ope ōno iuheen che ochichesag ?
42021008	Ekettodush ; Tuttebábig , kago keguh wiyazhemiggoseem ; nebewa tuh tukoshinōg neenduhnozowinnink neen Christ che ekettowât ; kagâ shiegwuh ochichesa , kago nopenuhná kago .
42021009	Opedush nōndumag nundobunnewinun , giya sunnágut , kago sagizze kago , netam me ono iuheen ga chichesagin , kâweendush ween munshie waquiásenōn .
42021010	Otinnândush , aezheweenzojig tuh muhmowwinnaōtewug ogemág giya tuh muhmowwinnaōtewug .
42021011	Nebewá giya tussink áke tuh nuhningishkâ tuhbukkuttawinnewun , giya kitche ákoosewinnun , sagizzewinnun , che kitche kuhkekinnowâtuk gezhigōnk tá iōnje .
42021012	Chebwâ o-o i-izzhewabuk , keguh tukkonigowâ keguh we bátáegowâg che buggittinnummátink keowwewâng uhnumeawegumigōnk , keguh benegōm anosumewât ogemág giya nâgânizzidjig neenduhnozowinink ōnje .
42021013	Keche wetōkágoeyag .
42021014	Kago enandunkago , negân che náguttuhwandumag ga ezhe nuhquatumag .
42021015	Keguh meninim ketonewâng ga ekettoyag , giya nebwâkâwin , kokkinná kemiátáwizzemewâg kâ tá kushketosewug che nuhquatōnágwâ .
42021016	Kenegeiggowâg , giya kekânissewâg , giya ketinnowamágunnewâg , keguh buggittiniggowâg ; ánint , keguh nissiggōm .
42021017	Kokkinná aninnewug keguh nishkanemiggowâg , neenduhnozowin ōnje .
42021018	Kâ pâpish bazhek kenesissewâ tuh wunnissinzenōn .
42021019	Kunnowanemikkōg kechichâgowâg kebeowinnewâng .
42021020	Opedush wâbundumag Jerusalem onundobuneeg gewetáskumowât , mezun shiegwouh bazhewwuk che banájetōng , keguh enandám ,
42021021	Medush uhgew Judeaink ayájig , wudjewink tuh oppi-it tewug , nowwiedush ayájig tuh ságáumōg , uhgewedush uhnōch otunnukkewinnink ayájig kago oguh chakishkunzeenâwâ .
42021022	Me ono gezhiguttōn che buhshunzhaogowizzewât , kokinná iuheen wazhebe-egâtagin tuh tabwawinnewung .
42021023	Kitche sunnágut uhgew anjekoojig , giya uhgew n'wânnáwâsojig ono gezhiguttōn , ōnje tuh kitche sunnágut ákeeng kitche nishkâtizzewin oguh otissiggōnâwâ uhgew anishanâbag .
42021024	Anábuhtuhgág uzzhowweshk , tuh pongesinōg tuh májenáwug che iyowâkânewewât , kokkinná uhnōch azheweenzojig : miátáwizzidjig oguh buhtuhkooshkánâwâ Jerusalem , nánázh che kubbasanik miátáwizzidjig ogezhigutomewân .
42021025	Medush che kekinnowâtuk gezisōnk giya dibbike gezisōnk , giya uhnungōnk : ákeengdush ayájig tuh sunnágizzewug , kitchegumme giya otegowug muhtwaáshkáwug .
42021026	Aninnewug otaewân nebomugguttinnewun sagizzewât , kunowâbundumowât ono iuheen takoshinnomuggukkin ákeeng , mushkâwizzewinundush gezhigōnk tuh nuhningishkâwug .
42021027	Medush ope che wâbomáwât Aninne Oguisun anáquttōnk che be iát mámowy mushkâwizzewin giya kitche-twâwizzewin .
42021028	Opedush ono iuheen máje ochichesag , medush ishpenink enábig tátuggikquanik kekunwanemigowin bazhew tuhgoo .
42021029	Tepájemotowândush buhbawatágoozewin ; binná kitche homenâtik , kokkinná giya metigōg ;
42021030	Siágebuizzewâjin , kekekandánâwâ tebinowa keenowâ , nebin bazhewuk .
42021031	Me eu tebishko ope wâbundumag ono iuheen che be izzhewabuk , keguh kekandánâwâ Kitche Manito otogemáwewin bazhew uhbetuhgōg .
42021032	Kagat ketenenim , kokkinná uhgew anishanâbag nōngum bamátizzidjig kâween kokkinná tuhnebosewug che bwâ kubbasag .
42021033	Gezhik giya áke tuh májámuggut ; neendikittowin koshá kâtuh , májámugusinōn .
42021034	Tuttebábundummázōk ; kago weessinneyag , giya menequayag ozâm ishkonittezokago ; kago wunnandun kago kenáguttuhwandummowinewâ , e-e gezhigutdush buhguhmishkágoeyun bwâ nundowandumun .
42021035	Nuhgwâgwunnink tuh izzhewabuttinne ga otissiggowât kokkinná ákeeng , ayájig .
42021036	Ukkowâbig , uhnummeág mozhug , konemá ketá ta enandágoozim che ozhindumag kokkinná ono iuheen che nebowweyag anosumit Aninne Oguisun .
42021037	Gezhiguk magwouh , guhgequa kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk dabekutinikdush ságáum uzzhowwe iát wudjewink Olives ezhenekâta
42021038	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag , kekeshap kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk be-ezháwug , be-bezindowâwât .
42022001	Bazhewut che ochichesag wekoondewin wambishkâsinōk puhquazhegun , kubbekosa wekoondowin atumink ,
42022002	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush , giya oshebe-egaweninnewug owwenesáwât enandumōg ; ogosáwandush anishanâban .
42022003	Mutche Manitodush obeenjinnowân ashkowân Judasun , Iscariot ezhenekâzo , bazhek ashe neezhidjig .
42022004	Májádush , owwe guhnonát ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya shemágunisshe ogemág ga ezhe buhgittenumowât .
42022005	Pâpenanemowugdush wâweendummowwâwândush shoneá .
42022006	Giya weendush wâweendumowân chewe mikkunk ga ezhichegat che buggittinnát ope anishanâbag emá iásigwâ .
42022007	Opedush ochichesa e-e gezhigut wambishkâsinōk puhquazhegun kuhbekosawin che netōng ;
42022008	Otunnonán Peterun , giya Jonnun , ekettōnk , owwe kezesetōg kuhbekosa wekoondewin , mágizzhá ketáwesenemin ,
42022009	Otinnáwândush , áneende chewe gezissitoeyáng ?
42022010	Otinnándush , binná , unne chakishkumág otanuh , keguh nuhgishkowâwâ aninne , chebemetuhkonunk nebe menequâchegunink ; nopenuhnik che unnebeendegat wegewamink .
42022011	Aninne tabandunk wegewam keguh enáwâ , Neendogemámenán ketig , ánde o-o ga tuzzhe mejeán kuhbekosa wekoondewin mámowy neendoskenegamug ?
42022012	Munguttanik wegewam keguh tinnoummágowâ kezissetōg emá .
42022013	Majáwugdush , otizzhemikánâwâ bego o-o gá enát , emádush kuhbekosa wekoondewin uzzhozissittowât .
42022014	Opedush tepiegun tabishkosag , owwe wuhwanuhbe , mámowy asheneezhidjig anoninjig .
42022015	Otinnândush , ōnjittá neendenandanâbun , we wetopominnuhgook , o-o kuhbekosa wekoondewin chebwâ kuhgwâtuggittoeyán ;
42022016	Ketenenim , kâween minowâ o-o wekoondewin neenguh mejeseen , chebwâ tabwawinewun Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink .
42022017	Ototâpenán menequâchegun , azhe uhnumeát megwetchenát , otinnândush otâpenumōk o-o mátuhonittig .
42022018	Ketenenim , kaween minowâ neenguh minnequaseen shomenâbo , chebwâ takoshinnomuggut Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
42022019	Puhquazhegundush ototâpenán , megwetchenát obokobetōn , omámenán , ekettōnk , me o-o neow , keenowâ wanje menegoeyag ; me o-o ga ōnje wuhnanemesewag .
42022020	Me giya e-e andotunk wanákooshewesenink , ototâpenán menequâchegun ekettōnk , o-o menequâchegun , ōshke wáweendumágawin nemisquemink keenowâ kesiswawabenumágōm .
42022021	Binná , ween bagittinnit oninjeen newetobemik omá otopowinink .
42022022	Kagat Aninne oguisun májá gá ezhichegâtag , unishdush , tuh kitche sunnágizze 'ow aninne bagittinit !
42022023	Majedush kuhguhquajindewug , owwagwan o-o gatotumōgwan ?
42022024	Giya otuzzhindánâwâ owwagwan owushema apetandágoozewan , weenowago tebinowa .
42022025	Otinnándush , miátáwizzidjig otogemámewân ogitche ogemákundágowân , che mennoizzhewabizzewát uzzhenintwâ .
42022026	Kâween keenowâ keguh izzhewabizzisseem ; ween koshá wushemá apetandágoozit andussheyag , agâsheinnidjin tuh izhewabizze , weendush wagemáwit mezhinowang guhtuh enanlágooze ,
42022027	Owwanan owushema apetandágoozit , ween námátábit topowinink gamá ween mezhinowakundunk ? kánuh uhow nánátábit otopowinink ? neendush mezhinowangigo ketizzhe weeweninnim .
42022028	Keenowâ wâjeweyag neen kuhgwadebanemiggowinink .
42022029	Ketinnoumonenim ogemáwewin , nōs azhe innoumowit gemáwewin ;
42022030	Gomá ketáwesenim , giya ketámenequam , neenduhtoowinink neendogemáwewinink ketánámátábim námátábewinnink che tebuggemagwâ asheneezhwawânnuggizzidjig Israelitug .
42022031	Jesusdush eketto , Simon , Simon , Mutche Manito kegenundowwanemik puhquazhegunink che ezhe nōskâsik :
42022032	Kege uhnumeatumōn koshá , kemushkâwandumowin che pongesinzenōt ; opedush gwakandumun mushkâwandumeik kekânisug .
42022033	Otinnândush Jesusun , neengezhandum chewejewinán che owâkáneweyunk , giyadush cheneboyunk .
42022034	Ekettodush , ketenin , Peter , pekááquouh kâ támazittágoozisse chebwâ nissink , kâ neenkekanemáse che ekettoeyun .
42022035	Otinnândush anoninánin miahájetuhissenowânin otossowin , giya mukkizzenun , uhnōch kago kenundowandánâwânukko kago ? Ekettowugdush káween .
42022036	Otinnândush nōngum , ween iát otossowin , máno oguh májetōn , giya oguhskibbetágun , kishpindush otuzzhowweshkosig oguh átáwan obeenzikowâgun che kishpinuttōt bazhek .
42022037	Ketenenim , o-o wazhebe-egâtag tuhtabwawinnewun , neen ōnje , mache izzhewabizzidjig ge tuhgwuhginjegâzo , ōnje iuheen tagobe-egâzoeyánin ; tuh gezhekegâtawun .
42022038	Ekettowugdush , Neendogemám , binná , ono neezh uzzhoweshkōn ; otinnândush , metatssink ,
42022039	Beságáum , ukko andotungebun , wudjewink Olives ezhá ; otoskenegamundush onopenuhnigōn .
42022040	Opedush gá otittunk emá , otinnân , uhnumeág che kuhgwadebanemigoozewag .
42022041	Pemaiuhedush otizzhe bukkawinnán pungee ope ásin ga oppuggitōngebun , ochicheengwunittádush unnumeát ;
42022042	Ekettodush , nōs ápadush enandumun ningooche che-ezhe mewinnummoweyun o-o menequâchegun ; kâween neenigo anandumán , keenigo enandumowunan .
42022043	Kitche Manito omezhinowandush gezhigōnk owâbundiigōn weowwinne mushkâwizzewin uhmeniggoot .
42022044	Azhe wesuggandunk , ashkumigo kitche uhnumeá , otuhbwazowin misqueeng azhenágwuttinne puhpungegânik ákeeng .
42022045	Wanishkâtdush gá eeshquâ uhnumeát , bowotissát otoskenegamun , owâbomán nebánit , azhe kushkanduminit .
42022046	Otinnândush , wagonan wanje nebáyag ? onishkag uhnumeág , che kuggwadebanemegosewag .
42022047	Mâgwouhdush gá gegetōt , binná kitche nebená anishanâbag , weendush Judas ezhenekâzōt , bazhek ashe neezhidjig , benegâne , obenázekowân bazhew Jesusun owwe ojemát .
42022048	Jesusdush otinnân , me nuh azhe buhgittinut Aninne Oguisun uzzhojemut ?
42022049	Uhnewedush papáwejewegoojin wiábundumowât , wâinnuhkumiguttinnik , otinnáwân , Neendogemám , neenguh bukkittaegamin innuh uzzhoweshkōn ?
42022050	Bazhekdush obukkittawâninne ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otoskenegamun , kishketowwugagunámándush .
42022051	Jesusdush oguhnonán otinnân , máno tuh totumōg wâtotumowât , otângenumowân otowuggânne nojemōtowândush .
42022052	Jesusdush otinnân ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun , okewanzeun giya wagemákundungig kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , bowotissiggoojin , gamotishkid innuh , buhtukkoninjinigo kebetotám uzzhoweshkōn kebetukkonán giya shemágunun ?
42022053	Ono gezhiguttōm magwouh gewejewinnuhgook kitcheuhnumeawegumigōnk kâwekâ kegeshebinnekatowwisseemwâbun , chewetukkoneyag ; me o-o koshá ketepiegunewâ giya kushkedibbikut omushkâwizzewin .
42022054	Ototâpenáwândush , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne owegewamink otezhe suggábeginnáwân : Peterdush otunnenopenánán nága wâsâ .
42022055	Gábishkuhnanumowâtdush ishkota nowwiuhe wegewamink , wuhwanuhbewug , Peterdush mámowy .
42022056	Oskenegequandush ogunnowâbomiggōn emá námátábidjig cheegishkota , anegōk oguhnowâbomán Peterun , ekettodush , me wuhow aninne wâjewegoojin .
42022057	Ahgunwatunkdush otinnân equawun , kâween neenkekanemáse .
42022058	Náágutch minowâ bazhek owâbomegōn ekettodush , keen bazhek ketow , Peterdush otinnân , aninne , kâween neen neendowwisse .
42022059	Ningōtepiegun ope minowâ bazhek owâbomigōn anegōk gegetowun , me wuhow aninne bazhek wâjewegoojin , Galilee aninne áwe .
42022060	Peterdush eketto , aninne , kâ neenkekanduhzeen aketoeyun : bâbegadush magwouh uhgegetōt pekááquouh mazittágooze .
42022061	Jesusdush bemushkotá , begunnowâbomát Peterun ; Peterdush omikwandán e-e gáegopun , chebwâ mazittágoozit pekááquouh , kâ neenkekanemáse nissink keguh eket .
42022062	Peterdush ságáum , iázhequa anegōk uhmowwit .
42022063	Aninnewug manjimenájig Jesusun , azhe pâpenotowâwât , giya buhbuketawâwât .
42022064	Ogebeengwabenáwân ; medush azhe buketawâwât oskezhigōnink , okuhquajemáwândush , ekettowug owwanan o-o bakittaōk ?
42022065	Kitche nebená uhnōch mutche ekettowinun otienáwân .
42022066	Pichenukdush ane gezhiguk , okewanzeun , kitche ogemá sásápewitchegaweninnewun oshebe-egaweninnewun giya , mowōnjeittewug otebákonegawinnewâng otizzhesuggábeginnáwân , okuhquajemán ,
42022067	Keen innuh Christ ? Weendumoweshinnâng , otinnân , anuh weendumonán kâ ketá tabwatunzeem :
42022068	Giya neen ánuh , kuhquajeminnán , kâ ketá nuhquatowwisseem che buggittinneyag .
42022069	Náágutch pánemá Aninne Oguisun tuh námátábe kitche nikâng Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewinink .
42022070	Kokkinnádush ekettowug , keen innuh Kitche Manito Oguisun ? Otinnândush , kedikittōm , uzzhiáyán .
42022071	Ekettowugdush , wagonan kiábe manazyunk chewetōkágoeyunk ? Keenowindigo tebinowa kenōndumowânan otōn .
42023001	Kokkinnahdush anishanâbag , pusegwewug , Pilateun zhiánit otizzhe suggâbeginnáwân .
42023002	Omáje webátámáwân , ekettōnk , nemikkowânán 'ow aninne kuhgepázomát anishanâban , genáumowât che tepáumowâsigwâ tepaummátewin Caesarun , neen ogemá Christ , otittán weow .
42023003	Pilatedush okuhquajemán , keen nuh ketōgemákundowwâg Jewug ? Oguhnonândush , eketto , keen kedikit .
42023004	Pilatedush otinnân ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya anishanâban , kâ kago nemikkumowâse , che ge mutche izzhewabizzit wuhow aninne .
42023005	Ahwunjishdush ekettowug , otōmbwamán anishanâban , papáguggequat kokkinná Jewug andánuhkewât , Galileeink ōnje máje guggequá , nánázh omá .
42023006	Pilatedush n'wândunk e-e tuzzhundumink Galilee , kuhgwatwa , che Galilee eninnewit .
42023007	Bâbegadush kakanemát , Herod 'zho-wejetukkewamágunit otizzhenázhowân ; magwouh Jerusalemink zhiánit Herod .
42023008	Heroddush wiábomát Jesusun , kitche pâpenanemo , kitche maweshá ánuh ōnje enandum owwe wâbomát , ōnje kitche nebená uhnōch kago unnokewinun nánōndum ; konemá neendá wâbunduhán kitche unnokewin che totunk , enandum .
42023009	Okuhquajemándush kitche nebená ekettowinun ; kâdush guhnokese .
42023010	Kitche ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya oshebe-egaweninnewug nebowwewug , anegōk gegetowug , owwe bátámáwât .
42023011	Heroddush giya oshemágunisshe ogemág opâpenotowâ wân , giya opâpizzhemáwân , miskobeenzikowâgun obeenzikonáwân , nayábdush kewa nizzhowâwân , Pilateun uzzhiánit .
42023012	Mego e-e gezhiguk , Pilate giya Herod uzzhinnowandewât ; kiut gekekândebuneeg .
42023013	Pilatedush omowōndonundomán anishanâban nâgânizzidjig giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug ,
42023014	Otinnândush , uhnew , binná , kebetowwim uhow aninne anosumeán , kedikittōm opapáguhgepázomán anishanâban , neendánuhtebábumá anosumeyag , kâdush kago menikkumowâse chege mutcheizzhewabizzit .
42023015	Herod giya kâ kago omikkumowâseen ; kege-ezhenázho-onenim che-ezhewinnag ; kâdush ningōt ototowâseen ga ōnje nebonippun .
42023016	Neenguhbuhshunzhawâ , medush ga ezhe buggittinug .
42023017	( Bazhek tuh buggittinnegâzo e-e wekoondewin . )
42023018	Bebágewugdush , kokkinná anishanâbag bâbega , ningooch ezhewinnik wuhow aninne , Barabbas buggittinnummowweshináng :
42023019	( Owwe begobetōt otanuh , giyadush owwenisshewât , gá ōnje kepáquo-ōnt wuhow aninne . )
42023020	Pilatedush , enandum , owwe buggittinát Jesusun , minowâ oguhnonán anishanâban .
42023021	Ahzhequawug , ekettowug , suhsuhgáquo-ōk , susuhgáquoōk ;
42023022	Minowâdush oguhnonán , medush nissink , ánishwin ? áneen gá totunk ? kâ kago nemikkumowâse ga ōnje napun , neenguh buhshunzhawâ , medush ga ezhe buggittinug .
42023023	Ahbetwa wittumōg mozhug , suhsuhgáquo-ōk uzzhekettowât : odikittowinnewâ , giya kitche ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun odikittowinnewâ mushkâwizzemugguttinne .
42023024	Pilatedush eketto , aketowâtigo anishanâban , tuh izzhewabut .
42023025	Obuggittinumowân uhnew aninnewun uhnisshewat gá ōnje kepáquo-ōndebun , me uhnew nandomáwâjin obuggittinumowândush Jesusun wâieendotowâwât che totowáwât .
42023026	Anemáje suhgábegináwât , ototâpenáwân bazhek aninne , Simōn ezhenekâzo , Cyrenean , otanōnk magwouh biezhát obuggittinumowâwândush opikqunnánink metigōn wâtuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt , guhgâzomáwándush che bemewenánint .
42023027	Kitche nebenádush , anishanábag , giya equawug onopenánáwân , unnemechizzekowâwât , mowwemáwât .
42023028	Jesusdush ogwakegâbowittowân , ekettodush , Jerusalem odánisemág , kago neen mowwemisshekago ; mowwindumōk keowwewân giya kenejânissewâg .
42023029	Binná gezhiguttōn tuh ochichesawun ope che ekettoyag , tuh shâwandágoosewug equawug wekâ kâ onejânissigwâ .
42023030	Medush che máje i-ittummowât wudjewun ; tussōzoshinâng ; giya pegukkumigáng , uhgwunnuh ōshinâng .
42023031	Kishpin o-o totumōwât ōshke buggizzinit metigōn , áneen ga totumink básōt ?
42023032	Minowâdush neezh gá mutcheizzhewabizzidjig aninnewug unnewejesugguhbeginná che nissintwâ .
42023033	Bowotittumowâtdush , emá Calvary ezhenekâtag emá suhuhgáquowâwât , giya tagosuhsuhgáquo-ōnjindush , bazhek ogitchenikâng , bazhek onuhmunjenikang .
42023034	Jesusdush eketto , nōs mennowweshâwanim , kâ okekanduhzeenâwâ anunokewât . Ototâpenumowâwândush agwidjin uzzhuhtátewât .
42023035	Anishanâbag nebowewug gunnowâbomáwât : nâgânizzidjigdush obápeáwân , ekettōnk , obemájeán ween bakânizzinidjin ; tuhguh tuhbemájeittizzo , ween Christ Kitche Manito , gá onuhgemint wiáwegwan .
42023036	Shemágunisshugdush obápenōtowwâwân , be-ezháwug owwe menáwân shewâbo .
42023037	Ekettōnk , keen Jewug wagemákundowwâwutwâgwan bemájetōn keow .
42023038	Oshebe-egundush emá ishpemink uttowwâ , Greek inwawinnink , giya Latin , giya Hebrew inwawinnink , uzzhekettōnk , ME WUHOW JEWUG OTOGEMAHMEWAUN .
42023039	Bazhekdush uhnew wâjesuhsuhgáquiegâzonidjin obâpeiggōn , ekettōnk , Christ wiáwewunnan , bemájetōn keowwinnánin .
42023040	Bazhekdush 'ow oguhnonán , kânuh kegosáse Kitche Manito , ayeezh mámowv kekotuggittomin ?
42023041	Keenowintdush quiuk izzhewabuk o-o che izzhewabizzeyunk , kege mutche izzhewabizzemen ; uhowdush aninne kâningōtono ge mutche totunze .
42023042	Otinnândush Jesusun , Neendogemám mikkowwin neow ope peendegayun ketogemáwewinink .
42023043	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , ketenin , nōngum gezhiguk keguh weje-ew gezhigōnk .
42023044	Ningōtwâswa tepiegunak , ge kushkedibbikutdush kokkinná ákeeng nánázh shângusso tepiegun .
42023045	Gezis kushkedibbikkissa , wiáguhgotagdush kitche-uhnumeawegumigōnk nowwie tâshkissa .
42023046	Jesusdush anegōk iázhequat , eketto , nōs kebuggittinumōn neenjichâg keninjeeng : gá eeshquâ ekettōtdush , nebo .
42023047	Shemágunisshe ogemádush , wiábundunk o-o izzhewabuttinnik , ogitchetwâweán Kitche Manito ; ekettodush , kagat , wuhow quiuk aninne .
42023048	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag menik gá bewâbundumowât azhewabuttinnik , ope gá wabundumowât tânginittezowug okákegunewâng , unnekewawâtdush .
42023049	Kokkinná wâsokágoojin , giya equawun , Galileeink bow-ōnjewejewegoojin , wâsâ ōnjegâbowewug nánáguttuhwâbundumowât , ono iuheen .
42023050	Binnádush , bazhek aninne , Joseph ezhenekâzo nâgânizzit tabákonegat , manobemátizzit quiuk aninne :
42023051	( Kâween ween ogewetokowâseen uhnew gá tebákonánidjin Jesusun , ) emá tá Arimatheink , Jewug ototanowewán ; ween giya obetōn Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
42023052	Wuhow aninne Pilateun otezhánun , owwenundotumowât , Jesus weowwinne .
42023053	Obenáán , wâbiske bebuggewyán neginōnk , oweoquieginán jebágumikdush ásineeg geweembápegiegâtag otussán , kâwekâ oweuh aninne kiut ge ōnje uhsáse .
42023054	E-e she ozhetáng che unwabewinnegezhiguk .
42023055	Equawun giya Galileeink gá be ōnje wejewegoojin onopenuhkewug jebagumigōnk , shezháwât owâbundánâwâ azhissittōng weow .
42023056	Kewawugdush , owwe gezhetáwât ozhittáwât pemeta giya uhnōch manonágwuttinnik , pezândush iáwug , unwahewinnegezhiguttinnik , azhebe-egâtagigo mazeniegunnink .
42024001	Netam gezhigut , unnemájesag unwabewinnegezhigut ápiche kekeshap , obeotittánâwâ jebagumik obetowât uhmanomágwuttinik gá ozhittowâjin , ánint giya equawun owwejewiggowân .
42024002	Owâbundánâwân ásin , ningooche ge ezhetittebinnegâta gabissingebun jebágumigōnk .
42024003	Unnebeendegawugdush , kâ owâbunduhzeenâwâ Jesus weow .
42024004	Gá izzhewabukdush , magwouh kitche kushkandumōg binná , neezh aninnewun , emá nebowewun , wâkashkânewun obeenzikowâguninne .
42024005	Sagizzewugdush , shuggushkewug , oskezhigowâng cheguhkumik ; otigowândush uhnew aninnewun , wagonan wanje nanduhwâbomag bemâtizzit magwaiuhe gá nabojig ?
42024006	Kâ omá iáse , ge ábejebá ; náguttuhwandumōk , gá ininnág magwouh Galileeink uzzhiát .
42024007	Ekettōnk , Aninne Oguisun ōnjittá buhgittinnumowâwug miázheninnewuggizzidjig oninjewâng , che suhsuhgáquo-ōnt ; niswogwunnigutinikdush cheonishkât minowâ .
42024008	Omikwândánâwâdush gá ekettōt .
42024009	Unnekewawugdush jebágumigōnk ōnje , otowwe weendumowáwân ashe bazhekwunidjin , giya kokkinná , anishanâban oweendumowâwân .
42024010	Ween Mary Magdalene , giya Joanna , giya Mary , James ōgeen , giya bakânizzidjig equawun owejewegowân , uhgew wândumowâjig ono iuheen anoninjig .
42024011	Oguhgebázittowâwân , kâ otabwatowâsewân .
42024012	Peterdush pusegwe , jebágumigōnkdush uhputto , nowwugetá , beenjeiuhe uzzhenábit , owâbundánun wâbebebuggewyánnegin atuh , zhutanik , unnemájádush uhmámukkátandunk gá izzhewabuk .
42024013	Binnádush , neezh uhgew ezháwug otanong , mego e-e gezhigutinnik , Emmaus ezhenekâta , metoswa tepiegun ápechâne Jerusalemink .
42024014	Otuzzhindánâwâ ono iuheen , gá izzhewabutinik .
42024015	Gâ izzhewabuk , magwouh guhguhnonittewât ; Jesus betuhkoshin , bemewejewegowân .
42024016	Oskezhigowândush ningōtono innekânewun , che nissetowinnewâsigwâ .
42024017	Otinnândush , áneen o-o bemaiuhe ekettoyag bamosayag , kushkandumag ?
42024018	Bazhekdush , Cleophas ezhenekâzo , oguhnonán , otinnân , keen atuh kemiátáwiz Jerusalemink , kekanduhzewun gá izzhewabuk ono gezhigutōn ?
42024019	Otinnândush wagonan ono iuheen gá izzhewabuk ? otinnáwândush Jesus Nazarethink otinunnokewinun , ween mamándáwizzit kagat ápiche , anosumit Kitche Manito , giya kokkinná ánishanábag .
42024020	Neendogemá sáságewitchegaweninnemenánig , giya nâgânizzidjig oge buggittinánáwân kechenesint , suhsuhgáquowâdush .
42024021	Neenowindedush neendenandámen otáge bemájeán Israelun , me o-o nōngum niswokoniguk , gá áquo izzhewabuk ono iuheen .
42024022	Kagatdush , ánint neendequâmenánig , gá enájemotoweumintwâ , wanje mámukkâtandumáng , kekeshap ge ezháwug jebágumigōnk .
42024023	Quânuhwâbundumowât weow , mezhinowan , bemátizze be-ekettowug , kewa .
42024024	Ahnintdush , wâjewungidgidjig ge-ezháwug jebágumigōnk , equawugigo gá ekettowât mego gá ezhenumowât ; kâdush ogewâbomásewân .
42024025	Otinnândush , kagepátizzeyag , babakekâtuk ketaewân che tabwatumág , mamándáwizzidjig gá iekettowât !
42024026	Kânuh Christ tuh kuhgwâtuggittose , ono iuheen , che ezhát ogitche-twâwizzewinkik ?
42024027	Wiazhkut , miátájemōnk Moses , kokkinná ogeweendumowân ono iuheen , ga tunne i-izzhewabutinik .
42024028	Bazhew otunne otittánâwâ otanuh azháwât ; wâsâ azhánidjinigo unne ieendotum .
42024029	Onummetáwemáwândush , chewezingwâmegowât , kagâ onágooshe , opeendega wejewegowândush .
42024030	Gá izzhewabukdush , magwouh wetobemát otopowinink , ototâpenán puhquazhegun , uhnumeátdush , omámenát .
42024031	Oskezhikowândush bákishkânewun , medush azhe nissittowwenowâwât medush azheângwâbomiggoot .
42024032	I-ittewugdush mamashkōt , kânuh ketaenánin ge châgizzogosemen , magwouh bebamosayunk , uhge betepájemotonuk mamándáwizzewin ?
42024033	Pusegwewugdush , mego e-e tepiegun , Jerusalemink shezháwât omikkowâwânkush ashebazhekwunidjin , mowōnjeittinnit , uhnewedush wâjewegopuneen .
42024034	Ekettōnk , Neendogemámenán ge ábejebá gewâbunduhán , Simonun weow .
42024035	Tepájemowug gá izzhewabizzewât bamosawât gá azhe nissetowenáwâwât magwouh obekobetōt puhquazhegun .
42024036	Magwouh o-o zhiekettowât , Jesus tebinowâ nowwiuhe onebowwe ; otinnândush , menno innowandeyeuk .
42024037	Sagizzewugdush áwunjishdush sagizzewug , jebi-wiábomungid , enandumōg .
42024038	Otinnândush , wagonan wanie sunnágandumag ketenannumowinewân , ōnje ōmbwashkág ketaewâng ?
42024039	Binná ono neenninjeen , giya ono nezittun , neen tebinowa neendow , kuhquachechenisshig , wâbundumōk ; jebi kâween oweyâssisse , giya kâ okunnisse , azhe wâbomeyag azhenávooseyán .
42024040	Magwouhdush o-o zhiekettōt , owâbunduhán oninjeen giya ōzittun .
42024041	Ahwunjishdush otabwatunzikwâ giya mámukkâtandumowât ; otinnân uhnew , kânuh kago weyâs ketiáseenâwâ ?
42024042	Kegoiundush omenáwân uhge ábwaweengebun , giyadush imo seenzebáqut .
42024043	Ototâpenándush uhmejit anosumenit .
42024044	Otinnândush , ono ekettowinun gá iininnuhgook magwouh vejewinnuhgook , kokkinná ono iuheen tuh tabwawinnewunōn , gá ezhebe-egâtag Moses otebákonegawinnink , giya mamándávizzidjig , giya nuhgumowinink tepájemigoeyán .
42024045	Opákenumowândush otowwugâne che nissetotumowât tebájemowinun azhebe-egâtagin ,
42024046	Otinnândush , o-o azhebe-egâtag , ween Christ che kuhwâtuggittōt , che ábejebátdush niswogwunnigutinnik .
42024047	Ahnwanindizzowin , giya menoweshâwanindewin , tuh uhgekindim otuhnozowinink che guhgekemintwâ kokkinná zhe weenzojig , Jerusalemink tuh ōnje máje guhgequa .
42024048	Keenowâdush ga ōnje tabwatumink ono iuheen .
42024049	Binnádush , kemenenim nōs azhewâweendumonáng ; Jerusalemink keguhtiám , nánázh che be oeyag mushkâwizzewin shpemink che ōnjebámugguk .
42024050	Bethanyink otizzhewejewân , ōmbinnekanedush uhshâanemát .
42024051	Gá izzhewabukdush , magwouh uhshâwanemát , obukkaenán , gezhigōnk ezhe ōmbishkát .
42024052	Otuhnumeatowwâwândush unnegwaketáwug , unnekewaugdush Jerusalemink shezháwât unnepâpenanemowát .
42024053	Kitche uhnumeawegumigōnkdush , uhnumeáwug uzzhuhumeatowâwât Kitche Manitōn . Amen .
43001001	Wiazhkut miájetáng ekettowin , ekettowin Kitche Manito wejewegōn , ekettowindush Kitche Manito geáwe .
43001002	Wiazhkutdush miájetáng Kitche Manito wejewegōn .
43001003	Kokkinná kago , ween ge ōnje ozhichegâta , kâweendush ago ge ozhichegâtasenōn , ween bwâ ozhetōt .
43001004	Bemátizzewin ogegishkán ; bemátizzewindush aninnewug wâsayámewâ .
43001005	Wâsayá wâkashkâ kushkedibbikutōnk ; kushkedibbikutush kâ otákōshkunzeen .
43001006	Aninne ge ōnje májenizzhiegázo Kitche Manito uzzhiát , ohn ezhenekâzo .
43001007	Ge tuhkoshin keche ōnje quiukwandágwuk wásayá , kokkinná aninnewug ween ōnje che tabwa-andumowât .
43001008	Kâween áwisse eu wâsayá , gá ōnje májenizzhiegâzōt , keche ōnje kekandumowât eu wâsayá .
43001009	Me e-e kagat quiuk wâsayá , kokkinná aninne watitunk áke owâsashkágōn .
43001010	Ahkeeng geiá , ween gá ōnje gezhichegâtag áke , ákedush kâ okekanemigooseen .
43001011	Obeotissán tebinowa wanemájin , tebinowa wanemájindush kâ okekanemigooseen .
43001012	Menik kekanemigoot tiabwatágoot mushkâwizzewin omenán Kitche Manito che oguisit , kokkinná tiabwatuminit otuhnozowinink :
43001013	Kâ misque ge ōnje negesewug , kâ giya weyâs enandumowinink , kâ giya aninne otenandumowinink , meatuh Kitche Manito otenandumowinink .
43001014	Ekettowin weyâs ge ōnje ochichegâta , che wetegamigoyunk , ( neenge wâbundámindush ogitchetwâwizzewin , kitchetwâwizzewin meatuh gá ōnjeeg ōsemá ) mooshkena shâwandá goozewin giya tabwanin .
43001015	John tepájemōt , ekettōnk , me wuhow gá tepájemuk , ween buhnopenuhzhit , neennegánemink iá , ōnje neennegâneminkigo iábun .
43001016	Omooshkenawenink ōnje , kokkinná neenowint wanje iáyung giya shâwandágoozewin , shâwandágoozewin ōnje .
43001017	Tepákonegawin Moses gá ōnje menetink , shâwandágoozewin giya tabwawin Jesus Christ ge ōnjebámugut .
43001018	Kâwekâ oweuh aninne ogewâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn ; meatuh bazhekoot gánegeint oguisemá , beendákegun iá ōsemá , ween gá kekandumoninung .
43001019	Me o-o John odikittowin washebe-egâtag , ope Jewug wanje májenizzhowâwât sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya Leviteun Jerusalemink , che kuhquajemáwât , owwanan keen wiáweyun .
43001020	Tepájindizzo , kâween neen Christ neendowwisse ,
43001021	Okuhquajemáwândush , owwanan wiáweun , keen innuh Elias ? ekettodush kâween , keen innuh eu mamándáwizzit ? ekettodush kâween .
43001022	Otinnáwândush , owwanan keen ? newe weendumowânánik anozheuminjig áneen atumun keow ?
43001023	Ekettodush , oweuh otázhequawin , buhgwuttuhkumigáng neendow , quiuk wuhmotoeuk Kitche Manito , mamándáwizzit Esaias gá ekettōt .
43001024	Wanoninjigdush ánint Phariseeug .
43001025	Okuhquájemáwândush , otinnáwândush wagonan wanje baptizewayun kishpin Christ wiáwissewunnan , giya Elias , giya mamándáwizzit wiáwissewunan .
43001026	Johndush oguhnonán , ekettōnk , nebe nebaptizewa , owe uhdush kewejegâbowittágowâ , kâ kekanemásewâ .
43001027	Ween buhnopenuzzhit , owushema apetandágooze : kâ neenda apetandágoozisse kunága cheábuhumowugebun omuhkizzenun .
43001028	Ono iuheen , Bethabaraink , getuzzhe izzhewabutōn , áwâs ewada Jordan ; John gá tuzzhe baptizewat .
43001029	Wiábuninikdush , John owábundán Jesusun , obeotissigoot , ekettodush , binná Kitche Manito omanishtânishansemun , akoonunk mutche izzhewabizzewin ákeeng .
43001030	Me wuhow , gá enug , aninne buhnopenuzzhit , kitche wâsâ owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozeyán , ōnje gâgineek owushema apetandágooze .
43001031	Kâdush neenge kekanemáse ; keche kekanemigoot Israelun me wanje baptizewayán nebe .
43001032	Johndush gegeto eketto , neengewâbomá ochichâgomá , omemeeng ezhenágooze , ishpemink beōnjebá , gebebonenotágōt weowinkdush geiá .
43001033	Kádush neenge kekanemáse , weendush gagâzomit , nebe che baptizewayán neengeig , oweuh wâbomut ochichâgomán benázhukkeet bebonezindágōt , ween me ga baptizewat ochichâgomán .
43001034	Neengewâbundán , neenge oshebeándush , Kitche Manito she oguissit .
43001035	Wiábuninikdush , John ge nebowwe , neezh giya otoskenegamun ;
43001036	Oguhnowâbomán bamosanit Jesusun , ekettodush , binná , Kitche Manito omanishtânishansemun .
43001037	Neezh otoskenegamun onōndágōn gegetōt medush nopenuhnáwât Jesusun .
43001038	Jesusdush gwakegâbowe , owâbomán nopenuhnigoot , otinnândush , wagonan nanduhwâbundumag ! Otinnáwândush , Rabbi , ( me Neendogemám , uzzhekettōnk , ) ánde andáeyun ?
43001039	Otinnândush , ōndâshág , bewâbundumōk ; be-ezháwugdush , owâbundánâwân , andát , owetobemáwândush , e-e kopa kezhik ; metoswa tepiegunak eu ápe .
43001040	Bazhekdush uhgew názhidjig gá nōndowâjig Johnun geonit , giya onopenuhnán , Andrew , Simon Peter wekânisun .
43001041	Bâbega omikowân wekânisun Simonun , otinnândush , teengemikowânán Messiah , me eu Christ .
43001042	Obetowándush Jesusun , Jesusdush wiábomát , otinnân keen Simon , Jona oguisun , Cephas keguh ezhenekâzo me eu ásin uzhekettōnk .
43001043	Wiábuninikdush , Jesus we ságáum Galileeink omikowân Philipun , otinnândush ; nopenuhzheshin .
43001044	Philip Betsaidaink iá , Andrew giya Peter ototanoweâng .
43001045	Philip omikowân Nathanielun , otinnândush , neengemikwânán , ween áwit Moses tepákonegawinnink , mamándáwizewiningdush gá oshepe-egâzōt , Jesus Nazarethink , Joseph guisun .
43001046	Nathanieldush otinnân , kago nuh wanissheshink , beōnje gáumomugut Nazarethink ? Philipdush otinnân , bewâbundun .
43001047	Jesusun owâbomán Nathanielun , obenázekagoot , ekettodush , binná , Israeliteun ween kuhgianezewin gagishkunzik .
43001048	Nathanieldush otinnán , áneen azhekekanemeyun ? Jesus oguhnonán , otinnán , Philip bwâ guhnonik , kegewâbomin anámiuhe kitche shomenâtigōnk .
43001049	Nathanieldush nuhquatum , otinnân , Rabbi , keen Kitche Manito Oguisun , keen wagemákundumun Israelink .
43001050	Jesusdush nuhquatunk , otinnân eu uzzheninnán , uhgewâbominán anámiuhe kitche shomenâtigōnk , me nuh eu wanje tabwatumun ? keguh wâbundán owushemá ga apetandágwuk , eu apetandágwuk .
43001051	Otinnândush , kagat , kagat , ketenin , pánemá keguh wâbundán gezhik che bákishkág , giya omezhinowamun ōmbishkâwât giya benázhukewât bebonesindowâwât , Aninne Oguisun .
43002001	Naswokoniguk , gewetegandim , Canaink Galileeink , Jesusdush ōgeen emá ge iá .
43002002	Niyazh nundomáwug Jesus , giya otoskenegamug wetegandewinink .
43002003	Opedush manazewát shomenâbo , Jesus ōgeen otigōn , kâ otiáseenâwâ shomenâbo .
43002004	Jesusdush otinnân , equa , áneesh keenowint gatotumung ? neendebiegun kâ muhshe ochichesasinōn .
43002005	Ogeen otinnân otoskenegamun , ningōtono anikin , totumōk .
43002006	Ningōtwâswa ásineen nátobágunun , emá attawun ozhissittowâwât Jewug , ope beneittizzowât .
43002007	Jesusdush otinnân , mooshkenatōk uhnew nátobágunun nebe , omooshkenatōnâwândush ápiche ,
43002008	Otinnândush , segenun , umba ogemá májetowwik tabandunk wekoondewin , otizzhewetōnâwádush .
43002009	Nâgânizzitdush wekoondewin , gá gotundunk nebe shomenâbo gá ōnje ozhetōng , kâdush ogekekanduhzeen gá ōndinuming , unnoketâgaweninnewug atuh , ságenungig , kekandungig , wagemákundunk wekoondewin onundomán wâwenidjin :
43002010	Otinnândush , kokkinná aninnewug ōshke wekoondewinink , obetōnâwâ wanissheshink shomenâbo ; aninnewugdush tiamenequawâjin , medush miánátutinnik nowutch , obetōnâwâ : keendush kegekunwandán , wanissheshink shomenâbo , nánázh nōngum , pichenuk kebetōn .
43002011	Me wiazhkut máje uhnokeet , kitche unnokewin , Jesus Canaink Galileeink , owâbundiewatbush , ogitchetwâwizzewin ; giya otoskenegamun tabwa-anemigōn .
43002012	Gá eeshquâ tátdush , Capernaumink ezhá ween giya ōgeen , giya wekânisun , giya otoskenegamun , emádush iáwug gomá tussogwun .
43002013	Jewugdush kubbekosa oweekoongawinnewâ kagâ ochichesa , Jesusdush Jerusalemink ge ezhá .
43002014	Omikândush kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , atáwajig pezhekewun giya manishtânishun giya omemeeg giya mashkotōnumátejig shoneá námátábewug .
43002015	Opedush buhshunzhaegun otozhetōn , bemenuhquânasink ogesâgitchenázhowât kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , giya manishtânishun giya pezhekewun : geseegwabenán , wiyáyázhetōnnuming shoneá ogwanuhbewabenánun otopowinun :
43002016	Otinnândush átáwânidjin omemeen , ningooche ezhewetōn ono iuheen , kago ween nōs owegewam , átáwawegumigokakago .
43002017	Otoskenegamundush ogekunwandánâwâ uhge oshebeegâtag ; kâ kago neenge papámánduhzeen , meátuh kewegewam .
43002018	Medush nuhquatumōg Jewug , otinnáwândush , wagonan mamándágwuk , ga wâbundieyáng , uhtotumun ono iuheen ?
43002019	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnândush , banájetoeyeuk o-o kitche uhnumeawegumik , niswogwunigukdush neenguh gezhetōn minowâ .
43002020	Jewugdush ekettowug ; nemetunnuh usshe ningōtwâswa tussokekenonowin ge tuzzhekám , uhge ozhetōng , o-o kitche uhnumeawegummik ; niswogwuniguk innuh , keen ketá gezhetōn ?
43002021	Weendush , weenigo weow , gá tuhzhindunk .
43002022	Opedush wiábejebát gá nebōt , otoskenegamun omikkowinnáwâ o-o uhge enápun , ogetabwatánâwâdush , azhebe-egátag , giya ekettowin Jesus gá ekettōt .
43002023	Magwouhdush , uzzhiát Jerusalemink kubbekosa wekoondewinink , nebewá tabwatumōg otuhnozowinink , ope wiábundumowât , kitche uhnokewinun gá enunokeet .
43002024	Jesusdush kâ oge buhgittinnumowâseen weow oninjening , ōnje kokinná ogekekanemán aninne .
43002025	Kâdush onundowanduhzeen , oweuh ningōtono kecheegoot , keche tuzzhemint aninne ; ōnje ogekekanemán andinit aninnewun .
43003001	Bazhek aninne Pharisee , Nicodemus ezhenekâzo nágânizzekundowât Jewun .
43003002	Me wuhow obeotissán Jesusun dabekutinik , otinnândush , Rabbi , neenkekandámen , beguhgequayun Kitche Manito uzzhiát ketōnjebá ; kâ oweuh aninne otá kushketose chetotunk o-o andotumun meatuh Kitche Manitōn wejewigoot .
43003003	Oguhnonándush , otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenin meatuh aninne minowâ negit , chewâbundunk Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
43003004	Nicodemusdush otinnân , áneen aninne ga ge ezhe negit , ope kekât ? minowâ nuh otá peendega ōgeen omissuttánik che negit ?
43003005	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenin , oweuh aninne nebe ge ōnje negissig , giya ochichâgomá ká otá peendegase Kitche Manito otogemáwinnink .
43003006	Eu nágemugguk weyâs ōnje , weyâs ; euedush nágemugguk ochichâgomá ōnje , ochichâgomá .
43003007	Mámukkâtanduhzewun aninnán , minowâ ketáneeg ,
43003008	Wâienánemuk , ienánemut , kenōndán mutwawag , kâdush , kekekanduhzeen wanjebámugguk , gamá azhámugguk ; me giya debishko kokkinná , wanje negidjig ochichâgomá .
43003009	Nicodemus nuhquatum , eketto , áneen ono iuheen ga ge izzhewabuk ?
43003010	Jesus oguhnonán , otinnân , keen nuh ketogemákundán Israelink kakanduhzewun ono iuheen ?
43003011	Kagat , kagat , ketenin , azhe kekandumáng neendinnájemomen , neendikittomen azhe wâbundumáng , kâdush ketabwatowweseem .
43003012	Ono iuheen ákeeng weendumonán tabwatunzewun , áneen ga ge ezhe tabwatumun weendumonán iuheen gezhigōnk ?
43003013	Kâdush , oweuh aninne ishpemink gezhigōnk ge-ezháse ween atuhgo ishpemink wanjebát , Aninne Oguisun , ishpemink iát .
43003014	Moses gá ezhe ōmbinnát buhgwuttuhkumigáng ozâwâbeko genabekōn me giya ween Aninne Oguisun ga ezhe ōmbininit .
43003015	Owwagwan ga tabwatumōgwan tuh gâgega bemátizze .
43003016	Kitche Manito azhe sâgitōt áke , me wanje megewat onezheka oguisun , owwagwan ga tabwatumōgwan kâ tuh wunnisshinze , tuh gâgegâ bemátizze .
43003017	Kâween Kitche Manito otōnje ezhenázhowâseen oguisun , che banájetonit áke , ween koshá tuh ōnje bemátut áke .
43003018	Ween tiabwatágoojin , kâ banátizzissewun ; weendush tiabwatunzig ashia gebanátizze wanje tabwatunzig otuhnozowining Kitche Manito onezheka oguisun .
43003019	Me aninne wanje wunnisshink , wâsayá takoshinomuggut ákeeng , aninnewugdush nowutch ogemeenwandánâwâ kushkedibbikut , kâ wâsayá omeenwanduhzeenâwâ ; ōnje enandumōg we mutche izzhewabizzewât .
43003020	Kokkinná mache izzhewabizzidjig oshingandánâwâ wâsayá ; kâdush wâsayánik be-ezhásewun ōnje che kekandágoosininig andotumowât .
43003021	Weendush quiuk izhewabizzit , wâsayánik be-ezhá , aeendotunk che wâbundumowint keche , meenwandunk Kitche Manito .
43003022	Gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen , Jesus giya otoskenegamug be-ezháwug ákeeng Judea ukowadush emá iá uhbaptizewawât .
43003023	Johndush AEnonink , bazhew Salim , ge tuzzhe baptizewa ōnje bátienut nebe emá , be ezháwugdush be baptizeáwât .
43003024	John uhbwâ uhwâkânewit .
43003025	Johndush otoskenegamun , giya Jewug osittáguhnonittewug tuzzhindumink beneittezowin .
43003026	Johnundush obe-ezhánâwân , otináwândush , Rabbi , ween gá wejewik áwâs ewada Jordan , gá tuzzhemutdush ; binná me 'ow baptizewa , kokkinnádush aninnewug obeotissigōn .
43003027	Johndush guhnoke , ekettodush , aninne kâween kago otá otâpenuhzeen meatuh Kitche Manitōn gamenegoot .
43003028	Keenowâ kekandánâwâ , gá ekettoeyán kâ Christ neendowwisse ; onegânemink neennegâne názhuhogo .
43003029	Ween wâwit wewun wewe , aninne wawitdush anowamájin , nebowewun bezindágoot pâpenanemo , ōnje aninne wâwit ogegetowin . Me o-o nepâpenanemowin mooshkenag .
43003030	Ween tuh gitche netáwigge , neendush neenguhne âgâshe .
43003031	Ween ishpemink wanjebát , owushema apetandágooze kokkinná ; ween ákeeng wanjebát , ákeeng ezhenágoose , otuzzhindán áke , ween gezhigōnk wanjebát , owushema apetandá gooze kokkinná .
43003032	Gá wâbundunk , giya gá nōndunk , me anduhzhindunk , kâdush oweuh aninnewun otabwatágooseen .
43003033	Ween tiabwatágoojin otuggokewussán , Kitche Manito uhtabwat .
43003034	Ween Kitche Manito anonájin , eketto kitche Manito odikittowin , ōnje Kitche Manito omenán ochichâgwun uhtepáwâsig .
43003035	Osemá osâgeán oguisemá , ogemenándush kokkinná kago oninjeeng .
43003036	Ween tiabwatowât oguisemá tuh gâgega bemátizze ; ween tiabwatowâsig oguisemá kâ oguh wábunduhzeen bemátizzewin : Kitche Manitodush onishkâtizzewin obeotissigōn .
43004001	Ope Kitche Manito ( Jesus ) kakandunk , Phariseeug uhnōndumowât , Jesus owushema menik baptizeán anishanâban , menik John biáptizeát ;
43004002	( Anuh Jesus kâween ween tebinowa , baptizewa , otoskenegamun atuh , )
43004003	Onuhguhan Jedeaun , Galileeinkdush minowâ ge-ezhá .
43004004	Samariadush otunneshábooshkán .
43004005	Ototitándush , kitche otanuh , Samariaink , Sychar ezhenekâta , bazhew e-e áke Jacob gá menát , oguisun Josepun .
43004006	Jacobdush otōndiebán emá tuhgoo , Jasusdush iyakoozit bamosat , ukkowa námátábe ōndiebánink ; ningōtwâswa tepiegunak .
43004007	Samaria equadush otanōnk be-ōnjebá , benebenâtit : Jesusdush otinnân menieshin .
43004008	Otoskenegamun gemájábuneen kitche otanong , wekishpinátonit weyâs .
43004009	Uhowdush Samaria equa , otinnân Jesusun , wagonan o-o wanje kuhquajemeun Jeweweun , che menienán neen Samaritanequaweán ? ōnje Jewug kâween ningōt , totowâsewân Samariatanun .
43004010	Jesus guhnonándush , otinnân , kekandumumbun , Kitche Manito omegewawin , kekanemutebun wiáwit , nandotumōk che menuhut , ketá ge kuhquajemá , ketagemenikdush , bamátuk nebe .
43004011	Equadush otinnân , Neendogemám , kâ kago kegwâbiegaseen , ōndiebándush keenwânekâta ; ánde ga ōndinumumbun e-e bamátuk nebe ?
43004012	Owushema nuh ketuhpetandágooze , apetandágoozit nōsenán Jacob , gá mezheuminit o-o ōndiebán ; ogemenequatdush ween tebinowa , giya onejânisun , giya otáwase-emun ?
43004013	Jesus oguhnonán , otinnândush , owwagwan ga menequagwan , o-o nebe , minowâ tuh wemenequa .
43004014	Owwagwandush , ga menequagwan , nebe neen gamenug , kâwekâ tuhwemenequase , nebedush neen gamenug gegishkunk ōndiebánink nebe mokidjewung aquo bemátuk .
43004015	Equadush otinnân , Neendogemám mezheshin , e-e nebe , kâ neenguh wemenequase , kâdush emá neenguh be-ezháse che we nâteán .
43004016	Jesusdush otinnân , owwe nundōm kenâbam , be-ezhákan .
43004017	Equadush eketto , kâ neendonâbamese . Jesusdush otinnân , wawane kedikit , kâ neendonâbamese ekettoyun .
43004018	Nánunewug keenâbamug ; nōngumdush ayáwut aninne , kâween keen , ketonâbamissenun ; quiuk e-e kagat kedikit .
43004019	Equadush otinnân , Neendogemám , neenekandán mamándáwizzit ketow .
43004020	Nōsenánig ge uhnumeáwug o-o wudjewink ; keenowâdush kedikitōm , Jerusalemink ga tuzzhe uhnumeángebun .
43004021	Jesusdush otinnân ; equa , tabwatowweshin ; gezhigut tuh ochichesa , kâween o-o wudjewink , giya Jerusalemink , kâ oguh tuzzhe uhnumeatowâsewân ōsemá .
43004022	Kâ kekekanemásewâ uhnumeatowwag : neenowintdush , nekekandámen uhnumeatumáng , shâwandágoozewin Jewug odebandánâwâ .
43004023	Tebiegun tuh ochichesa , nōngumdush ochichesa ope quiuk uhnumeájig , oguh uhnumeatowâwân ōsemán , ochichâgōnk , quiuk tabwawinink , ōnje ōsemá onundowâbomán tinnowun che uhnumeatágoot .
43004024	Kitche Manito ochichâgomá , uhgewedush uhnumeatowâjig ōnjittá oguh uhnumeatowâwân ochichâgōnk che tabwawât .
43004025	Equadush otinnân , neenkekandán Messias takoshink , Christ azhenekânint , opedush ge takoshink kokkinná neenguh weendumágonán iuheen .
43004026	Jesusdush otinnân neen gaguhnoninán nōngum , neendow .
43004027	Medush eu ápe otoskenegamun takoshinōn mamukkâtandumōg uhguhnonát equawun ; kâdush oweuh aninne ekettose , wagonan wanje guhnonut ?
43004028	Equadush onuhgután onemebágun , kitche otanong ezhá , owwe weendumowât , ekettōnk ,
43004029	Umba owwe wâbomik aninne kokkinná gá be-iezhewabizzeyán neenge weendumág , kânuh Christ áwisse ?
43004030	Medush geságáumōg , e-e otanuh , názikowâwât .
43004031	Netá eu ápe otoskenegamun oguhnonigōn , Neendogemám weessinin .
43004032	Otinnândush , neendián weyâs ga mejeán uhkekanduhzewag .
43004033	Otoskenegamundush i-ittewug , oweuh nuh aninnewun ogebetágōn gamejit ?
43004034	Jesusdush otinnân , neweyâsim , neendotágoon chetotumán azhit uhnozhit , che gezhe táeyándush otunnokewin .
43004035	Kânuh kedikittoseem , neo geziswugguk che ochichesag mámáwin ? binná , ketenenim , ōmbinumōk keskezhikowân , ketegânink enábig , ázhia kokkinná wâbeta che mámáng .
43004036	Weendush pushkooshegat , tepáumowâ , mowōnjetōtdush natáwiggingin gâgega bemátizzewin , me wanje ween gá buggittinnegat , giya ween pashkooshegat , pâpenanemowug mámowy .
43004037	Me eu ekettowin uhtabwatōng ; bazhek buggittinega , bazhekdush , pushkooshega .
43004038	Ketuhnonenim che pushkooshegaeyag , uhgeketegasewag : bakânizzidjig aninnewug ge ketegawug keenowâdush keguh otâpenánâwâ natáwiggittowát .
43004039	Kitche nebenádush Samariatanug , eu otanong otabwatágōn , equa odikittowin ōnje ge-ekettopun ; kokkinná neenge weendumág gá be i-izzhewabizzeyán .
43004040	Opedush Samariatanug bowotissigoot , okuhquajemáwân che wetegamigowât , owetegamándush emá neezhogwun .
43004041	Kitche nebenádush ogetabwatágōn , ween tebinowa odikittowin ōnje .
43004042	Otinnáwândush equawun , nōngum neendabwatámen kâween keen kedikittowin ōnje , tebinowa neenowind neennōndowânán , neenkekandámen wuhow kagat Christ awit , Bamájetōt áke .
43004043	Gá neezhokoniguk , ōnje májá emá Galileeink che-ezhát .
43004044	Ween tebinowa Jesus eketto , mamándáwizzit kâ papámandágoozisse tebinowa andánukkeet .
43004045	Ope buhtukoshink Galileeink , Galileeanug obeendegunigōn , ōnje kokkinná ogewâbundánâwâ iuheen , gá ieendotunk , wekoondewinink Jerusalemink .
43004046	Jesusdush minowâ betukoshin Canaink Galileeink , gá tuzzhe ozhetōt shomenâbo nebe ōnje . Bazhekdush kache ne gânandágoozit , oguisun ákoosewun Capernaumink .
43004047	Opedush n'wândunk Jesus beōnje máját Judeaink obeezhát Galileeink otizzhánun , okuhquajemán che be-ezhát che nojemoát oguisun ōnje shegwouh wenebōt .
43004048	Jesusdush eketto , kâ kewetabwatunzeem meatuh wâbundumag kitche unnokewin .
43004049	Nâgânandágoozit aninne otinnân ; Neendogemám , beezhán , chebwâ nebōt neenejánis .
43004050	Jesusdush otinnân , kewan ; keguis bemátizze ; aninnedush tabwatum Jesusun agoot , májádush .
43004051	Magwouhdush unnemáját , otunnoketâgaweninnemun onuhgishkowân , otinnáwândush ; keguis bemátizze .
43004052	Okuhquajemándush , áneen ope uhnojemopun ? ekettowugdush , pichenágo , názhwâswa tepiegunak ákoosewin ogenuhunigōn .
43004053	Osemádush ogekekandán , mego e-e tepiegun Jesus uhge ekettopun , keguis bemátizze ; weendush tabwatum kokkinná giya andusshewât andát .
43004054	Me o-o neezhink kitche unnokewin Jesus otótunk ukko ságáunk Judeaink beotittunk Galileeink .
43005001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk o-o , ge kitche wekoondewug Jewug ; Jesusdush Jerusalemink ge-ezhá .
43005002	Jerusalemink betobeeg tuhgo , bazhew manishtânissheátáwawinink , Hebrew inwawinink , Bethesda ezhenekâta , nánink átáquiegâta .
43005003	Kitche nebenádush anishanâbag iáwug wiákoosidjig , kagebeengwajig , ácháwishkájig , biásojig , uhbetōng che mamájemugguk nebe .
43005004	Mezhinowa názhukke ningōtink , owwe megooshkâjetōt nebe , netamdush , bakobeet nebeeng , gá megooshkâjetōng , kokkinnâ ákoosewin ayát nojemoegoon .
43005005	Bazhekdush aninne , emá iá , neeswametunná , usshe neezhwâswa tusso pepōn áquo ákoozit .
43005006	Jesusdush wiábomát shingeshininnit , okekanemán maweshá ōnje izzhewabizzenit , otinnân , kenundowandán innuh , che nojemoeyun ?
43005007	Wiákoozitdush aninne , otinnân , Neendogemám , kâ oweuh aninne neembukkobewinnegoose ope nebe mamájemugguk ; magwouhdush be-ezhaeyán oweuh gepukkobetukkoke neennegânemink .
43005008	Jesusdush otinnân , onishkân , kenebágun mámōn , bamosan .
43005009	Bâbegadush , aninne nojemo , ototâpenándush onebágun , bamosadush ; me eu uzzhunwabewinnegezhiguk .
43005010	Eu ōnje , Jewug otinnáwân aninnewun n'wâjemonidjin , unwabewinnegezhigut o-o ; kâween quiuk izzhewabussinōn che bemewetoeyun kenebágun .
43005011	Onuhquatowândush , ween gá nojemōt , neendig , otâpenun kenebágun , bamosan .
43005012	Okuhquajemáwândush , owwanan aninnewenan wuhow , gá enik , otâpenun , kenebágun , bamosan ?
43005013	Uhow gá nojemoint , kâ okekanemáseen owwagwan gá nojemoágwan ; Jesus ningooche ge-ezhe májá , kitche nebená anishanâbag emá iáwug .
43005014	Náágutchdush , Jesus , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , omikkowân , otinnândush , binná , kenojim ; kago minowâ mázheninnewuggizzekan , bōch owushema minowâ keguh izzhewabiz .
43005015	Aninnedush májá , owwe weendumowât Jewun , Jesusun uhnojemoegōn .
43005016	Jewugdush , omegooshkâcheáwân Jesusun owwe nesáwât , ōnje uhge uhnokeet ono , unwabewinnegezhigutinik .
43005017	Jesusdush nuhquatowân , eketto , nōs uhnoke nánázh nōngum , neen giya neendunnoke .
43005018	Me ōnje , ánjigo wenesáwât , ōnje kâweenigo atuh begobetōt , unwabewinnegezhigut : eketto giya , Kitche Manito ōsun : mego debishko Kitche Manito , weōw , ototán .
43005019	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , oguisemá kâween otá kushketose ningōtono keche totunk ezheka ; meatuh wâbomát ōsemá uhtotunk ; kokkinná iuheen aeendotunk oguisemá aeendotum giya .
43005020	Osemá osâgeán oguisemá , okekinnoumowândush kokkinná aeendotunk ; oguhwâbunduhándush , owushema kitche unnokewinun apetandágwuk ono , che mámukkâtandumag .
43005021	Osemá azhe onishkât gánebonidjin bemájeátdush , me oguisemá bemájeát oweuh enandunk .
43005022	Osemá kâween oweuh aninnewun otebákonáseen , kokkinná omenán oguisun tepákonegawin :
43005023	Kokkinná aninnewug oguhgitchetwâwanemáwân oguisemá , azhe gitchetwâwânemáwât ōsemá ; weendush kache twâwanemásik oguisemá , kâ ogitche-twâwanemáseen ōsemá azhenázhuhogoojin .
43005024	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween bazindunk neen gegetowin , uhtabwatowât bi-ezhenázhuhonidjin , tuh gâgega bemátizze , kâtuh tuhgwâtuggittose , oguhbekán nebowin , ototitán bemátizzewin .
