43005025	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , tepiegun ochichesamuggut , shegwouh gá nebojig oguhnōndowâwân Kitche Manito Oguisun ogegetowin , kokkinnádush ga nōndungig tuh bemátizzewug .
43005026	Mego eu ōsemá azhe gegishkuuk bemátizzewin , mego azhe menát oguisemá che gagishkuminit bemátizzewin ;
43005027	Omenándush mushkâwizzewin che kezhetebákonegat ōnje ween Aninne Oguisemá .
43005028	Kago mámukkâtandun kago o-o ; tepiegun tuh ochichesa ope kokkinná jebágumigōnk ayájik , oguh nōndánâwân ogegetowin .
43005029	Tuhbeságáumōgdush , jebagumigōnk ; uhgew gá mennototungig , tuh gâgega bemátizzewug , uhgewedush gá mutche totungig , oguh otittánâwâ mutche ishkota otábejabáwinink .
43005030	Neen tebinowa neow , kâ ningōt neenguh getotunze ; anitumán neendizzhe tepákonega : neen depákonegawin quiukwut ; ōnje kâ neennundowâbunduhzeen neendenandumowin ; ōsemá koshá otenandumowin , ween bi-ezhenázho ōt .
43005031	Tebinowa neen ningōt ekettoeyán kâ tuh áwunzenōn .
43005032	Minowâ bazhek neenduzzhemik , neenkekandan kokkinná aezhit , tabwawinnewun .
43005033	Kege ezhenázhowâwâg John ; kokkinná tabwa gá ekettōt .
43005034	Kâ ningōt neen papámanduhzeen aninne aezhit ; ono iuheen aketoeyán , konemá keguh ōnje bemátizzim .
43005035	Ween bishkunna wâkashkâ wâsayá ; kegepâpenanemōmdush wanebek owâsayánik ,
43005036	Owushema apetandágwut newetokágowin John apetandágwutinik , uhnokewinun ōsemá mázhit che kezhetoeyán , ono uhnokewinun andotumán , me uhnew wátokágoeyán ōsemá azhenázho-ōt .
43005037	Osemádush , ween tebinowa , azhenázho-ōt , neenge wetokág . Kâwekâ kege nōndowâsewâ anwat , kâ kegewâbomásewâ azhenágoozit .
43005038	Kâween ogegetowin ketápiche iáseenâwâ ; ono azhenázhowâjin , kâ ketabwatowâsewâ .
43005039	Kunnowâbundumōk azhebe-egâtag , keguh wâbundánâwâ azhebe egâtag ga ezhe gâgega bemátizzeyag ; eu uhgew wâtokâwejig .
43005040	Kâween keguh webe otisshinseem che ōnje bemátizzeyag .
43005041	Kâ neendotissiggooseen aninne ogitche apetandágoozewin .
43005042	Kekekaneminenim , ságeásewag Kitche Manito .
43005043	Neendukoshin , nōs otonozowinink , kâdush ketabwayanemisseem , minowâ bazhek takoshink tebinowa otonozowinink , keguh tabwatowâwâ .
43005044	Ahneen o-o azhe tabwa-andumag mamashkōt innájemotáteag kitchetwâwizzewin , kâdush kenundowâbunduhzeenâwâ Kitche Manitōnigo atuh ōnjebámuggut ?
43005045	Kago enandun kago keche mutche tuzzhemenuhgook ōsemá zhiát ; bazhek kemutche tuzzhemigowâ , ween Moses , tiabwatowag .
43005046	Gá tabwatowâwagwan Moses , ketá ge tabwatowwim giya neen , ween gá i-oshebe-ōt .
43005047	Tabwatunzewag gá azhebe-egat , áneen ga ezhe tabwatumag neendikittowin ?
43006001	Gah eeshquâ ono iuheen , Jesus ázhuho kitchegumink Galileeink , me eu Tiberias kitchegumme .
43006002	Kitche nebenádush anishanâbag , onopenuhnáwân , ōnje uhgewâbundumowât kitche uhnokewinun , ákoosewin gá nojemoát .
43006003	Jesusdush wudjewink ezhá , mámowy otoskenegamun owwe námátábewugdush .
43006004	Jewugdush okubbekosa wekoondewinewâ , kagâ ochichesa .
43006005	Jesusdush enábit wiábomát , kitche nebená anishanâban uhbeotissiggoot , otinnândush Philipun , ánde che kishpin uttoeyung puhquazhegun , che wesinnewât ?
43006006	( Uhnishigo 'we kekanemât , wanje enát Philipun , ween tebinowa okekandán ga totuminit . )
43006007	Philipdush , oguhnonigōn , neezhwâk tuswa shománeka kâ tá tatussinzinzenōn , puhquazhegun , kokkinná papunge mejewât .
43006008	Bazhek otoskenegamun Andrew , Simon Peter wekânisun , otinnân ,
43006009	Bazhek quewezans omá , nánwâtik otián puhquazhegun , neezhdush kegoizansun : wagonan eu uzzhezhenowât ?
43006010	Jesus eketto , chenámátábeintwâ aninnewug , okitche mushkoosewekâ emá : medush aninnewug azhe námátábewât nánink metoswâk tusshewug .
43006011	Jesusdush ototâpenán puhquazhegun ; gá eeshquâ uhnumeát , omenân otoskenegamun , medush azhemenáwât aninnewun námátábenidjin ; giya kegoizansun , menikigo che tawesinnewât .
43006012	Gá tabissinnewâtdush , otinnân otoskenegamun , mowōnjittòk báwishkág , kago che wuneshizenōk .
43006013	Gá mozhugginumowât , metoswa usshe neezh okokobenágunun mooshkenawun ; nánwâtik puhquazhegun menik ashqundumowât menik gewesinnewât .
43006014	Uhgewedush aninnewug , wiábundumowât kitche uhnokewin Jesus andotunk , ekettowug , me o-o kagat , mamándágwuk takoshinomuggut ákeeng .
43006015	Opedush Jesus wiábundunk ketwan we beotâpenint , owwe ogemáweint unne ezhe ningooche ezhá wudjewink .
43006016	Wanákooshigdush , otoskenegamun kitchegumeeng ezháwug .
43006017	Nábequáninkdush pozewug , ázho-owât Capernaumink ; shiegwouhdush dibbikut , Jesusundush kâ obeotssiggoosewân .
43006018	Kitchegummedush kitche mámángâshkâ ōnjè kitche notink .
43006019	Wâsâ gâne takoshinowât uzzhabwo-eyawât , owâbomá wân Jesusun , ogittebeeg bamosanit betakoshink bazhew nábequânink , sagizzewugdush .
43006020	Otinnândush , neen koshá ; kago sagizze kago .
43006021	Bâbegadush opozeáwân , bâbegadush nábequân chegebeeg iá emá ezháwât .
43006022	Wiábunk , anishanábag chegebeeg kitchegumeeng nábowidjig wiábundumowât bakáunk chemán iásinōk , mego atuh eu otoskenegamun uzzhiánit . Jesusdush owejewâsig otoskenegamun , otoskenegamundush ezheke eemájáwun ;
43006023	( Minowâ anint chemánun Tiberias beōnjebámugguttōn bazhew emá gátuzzhemejewât puhquazhegun , Kitche Manito ( Jesus ) ge uhnumeatowât ; )
43006024	Anishanâbag wiábundumowât , Jesus emá 'zhiásig , giya otoskenegamun giya iásinnig , weenowá giya ototâpenánâwâ nábequân , be-ezháwât Capernaumink , Jesusun benundowâbo máwât .
43006025	Makowâwâtdush , agâmank kitchegumink , otinnáwân , Rabbi , ánápe omá takoshinnun ?
43006026	Jesus oguhnonán , ekettodush kagat , kagat , ketenenim , me buh ōnje nundowâbummeyag , kâween eu gewâbundumag kitche uhnokewinnun , unish eu ōnje kemejeyag puhquazhegun , ge tabissinneyag .
43006027	Kago eu ōnje uhnokekago gabánátuk , eu atuh wanje gâgega bemátizzink , eu Aninne Oguisun ga menik , ween Kitche Manito ōsemá gá ukkokewuswâjin .
43006028	Otinnáwândush , áneen o-o ga totumáng , che uhnoketowwungid Kitche Manito ?
43006029	Jesus oguhnonân , otinnândush , me o-o Kitche Manito otunnekewin che tabwatowwag biezhenázho-ōnt .
43006030	Me wanje enáwât , wagonan kakinnowâtuk wâbundiewayun ? neenguh wâbundámen medush che tabwatonáng ; áneen azhe anuhnokeyun ?
43006031	Nōsenánik ogemejinâwâ buhgwuttuhkumigáng Manna , azhebe-egâtag , ogemenán chemejenit , puhquazhegun , ishpemink gezhgōnk ōnje .
43006032	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , kâween Moses kegemenigoosewâ , e-e puhquazhegun gezhigōnk ōnje : nōs koshá quiuk puhquazhegun kemenigowâ gezhigōnk ōnje .
43006033	Kitche Manito opuhquazhegunim , ween gezhigōnk wanjebát , megewa bemátizzewin ákeeng .
43006034	Otinnáwândush , Neendogemám , ápadush gâgineek mezheâng o-o puhquazhegun .
43006035	Jesusdush otinnân , neen puhquazhegun e-e ōnje bemátizzink ; ween ga be otezhit , kâwekâ tuh buhkuttase , ween ga tabwatowwit , kâwekâ tuh gâskuhnábágunse ( we menequase . )
43006036	Kege-eninim koshá , keenowâ giya gá wâbomeyag kádush kegetabwatunzeem .
43006037	Kokkinná , ōsemá mázhit neenguh otissigōn ; weendush gabe otezhit kâwekâ neenguh wabenáse .
43006038	Ishpemink gezhigōnk neendōnjebá , kâween anandumán che izzhewabizzeyán anandunkigo koshá ween biezhenázho-ōt .
43006039	Me o-o ōsemá otenandumowin , ween biezhenázho-ōt , kokkinná mázhit , kâ kago neenguh wunnittoseen , minowâdush neenguh onishkânán isquâch che gezhiguk .
43006040	Me o-o giya otenandumowin , biezhenázho-ōt , kokkinná uhgew wiábomájig oguisemán , tiabwatowâjigdush tuh gâgega bemátizzewug ; neenguh onishkâbenádush ishquâch e-e gezhiguk .
43006041	Jewugdush onishkâzomáwân , ōnje uzzhekettōt , neen puhquazhegun gezhigōnk beōnjebámuggut .
43006042	Ekettowugdush , kânuh wuhow áwisse , Jesus , Joseph oguisun , ōsun , ōgeen giya kekekanememánán ? áneen e-e ga ge izzhewabuk ekettōt ishpemink gezhigōnk neendōnjebá ?
43006043	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , kago tuzzhindizzo kago .
43006044	Kâ oweuh aninne neendá beotissigoose meatuh ōsemá biezhenázho-ōt , wekotanemát ; neenguh onishkâbenádush ishquâch e-e gezhiguk .
43006045	Oshebe-egâta mamândáwizzewinning , kokkinná Kitche Manito oguhgekemán kokkinná aninnewug , gá nōndungig wanje kekandungig neembe otissiggōg .
43006046	Kâ oweuh aninne gá wâbomát ōsemán ween atuh Kitche Manitōng wanjebát , ween gá wâbomát ōsemán .
43006047	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwatowwit tuh gâgega bemátizze .
43006048	Neen puhquazhegun wanje bemátizzink .
43006049	Kōsewâg gá mejidjig manna buhgwuttuhkumigáng genebowugdush .
43006050	Me o-o puhquazhegun gezhigōnk beōnjebámugguk , aninne mejit kâwekâ tá nebose ;
43006051	Neen puhquazhegun bemátizzemugguk , ween ishpemink wanjebámugguk ; oweuh aninne mejit o-o puhquazhegun , tuh gâgega bemátizze ; puhquazhegundush ga megewayán , neen neweyâs che bamátuk âke ga ōnje megewayán .
43006052	Jewugdush wanje guhguhnonittewât , ekettōnk , áneen wuhow aninne ge ge-ezhe meninnunk oweyâs che mejeunk ?
43006053	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , mejeissewag Aninne Oguisun oweyâs , giya menequasewag omisqueem kâ keguh obemátizzewinisseem .
43006054	Owwagwan ga meiegwan neweyâs , ga menequatdush nemisqueem tuh gâgega bemátizze : neenguh onishkâbenádush squâch che gezhiguk .
43006055	Neweyâs , kagat , mejim , nemisqueem kagat minneqawin .
43006056	Ween májit neweyâs , giya manequat nemisqueem , iá neowwink , neendiádush weowwink .
43006057	Me e-e bamátizzit ōsemá azhenázho-ōt , ōsemádush wanje bemátizzeyán , ween ga ummōt , neen ga ōnje bemátizzit .
43006058	Me o-o eu puhquazhegun gezhigōnk wanjebámugguk : kâween eu kōsewâg ga ezhe mejewât manna , gá nebowedush ; ween koshá ga mejit o-o puhquazhegun tuh gâgega bemátizze .
43006059	I-ekettōnk ono iuheen , uhnumeawegumigōnk , magwouh guhgequat Capernaumink .
43006060	Nebewadush otoskenegamun , nōndumowât eu ekettowin , ekettowug , kitche sunnágut eu ekettowin ; owwanan ga ge nōndunk .
43006061	Jesusdush kakandunk otoskenegamun osittáwanduminit , oguhnonán , menuh o-o wanje nishkâtizzeyag ?
43006062	Ahneen ga enandumag wâbomag Aninne Oguisun gezhigōnk ezhát kiut uzzhiápun ?
43006063	Ochichâgomá wanje bemátizzink ; weyâsemá kâ ningōt nâbuhtissinōn : ekettowinun aninnán ; me ochichâgomá giya bemátizzewin .
43006064	Ahnint keenowâ , kâ ketabwatunzeem . Oanje Jesus ogeekandán wiazhkut miájetáng uhgew tabwatumikwâ , giya ga uggittinumáganidjin .
43006065	Ekettodush , me wanje eninnuhgook : kâ oweuh aninne , neendá beotissiggoose ōsemá chebwâ menigoot che beotezhit .
43006066	Me ope ánint nebewá otoskenegamun , uzzhakewanit , kâdush minowâ owejewegooseen .
43006067	Opedush Jesus otinnân , usshe neezhinidjin , giya keenowâ nuh ningooche keguh ezhám ?
43006068	Simon Peterdush , otinnân , Neendogemám , owwanan ga ezhángebun , keen ketián eketowin che ōnje gâgega bemátizzink .
43006069	Neendenandámin , neenkekandámin , keen eu Christ , Kitche Manito Bamátizzit Oguisun .
43006070	Jesusdush otinnân , kânuh kege onanemissenonenim , keenowâ ashe neezheyag ? bazhekdush o-o andussheyag Mutche Manitowe .
43006071	Judasun Iscariotun , Simon oguisun otuzzhemájin , ween me uhow ga buggittinnuhmágat , bazhek asheneezhidjig .
43007001	Ono iuheen gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk , babámosat Galileeink : kâ wepeendegase Jewug andánuhkewât , ōnje Jewun owwe nesigōn .
43007002	Jewugdush , omutche-eginnowekoondewinewâ kagâ ochichesa .
43007003	Wekânisundush otigōn , nuhguhtun o-o omá , Judeaink ezhán , ketoskenegamug oguhwâbundánâwâ ga enunnokeyun .
43007004	Kâ oweuh aninne , gremōch enunnokese omezhisshowwinnágwittōn enunnokeet , wâkekandágoozit ; kishpin totumun ono iuheen , wâbundiewan keow anegoquág áke .
43007005	Wekânisun giya , kâ ogetabwayanemigooseen .
43007006	Jesusdush otinnân , neendepiegun , kâ muhshe ochichesasenōn keenowâdush ketepiegunewâ gâgineek kezhá gezisin .
43007007	Ahke kâween keenowâ kesheenganemigooseenâwâ ; neendush nesheenganemigo , ōnje o-o uhguhgequayán azhe mutche izzhewabuk .
43007008	Ezháeyeuk o-o wekoondewinnink , kâ neen neenguh ezháse o-o wekoondewinnink ; ōnje kâ muhshe ochichesasenōn neendepiegun , che be mooshkenag .
43007009	Ope gá ienát ono ekettowinun , áwunjish emá iá Galileeink ,
43007010	Opedush wekânisun gá májánit , ween giya ge-ezhá wekoondewinnink ; kâween mizzhishshuh ; nowutchigo gemōch .
43007011	Jewugdush onundowâbomáwân wekoondewinnink , ekettowugdush ánde zhiát ?
43007012	Kuhgissheguhnonittewug anishanâbag tuzzhemint ; ánint ekettowug , quiuk izzhewabizzit aninne , ánintdush ekettowug , kâween ; owiyazhemán anishanâban .
43007013	Kâ oweuh aninne mizzhishshuh otuzzhemigooseen , ōnje ogosáwât Jewun .
43007014	Wiábetawekoondink , Jesus kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk owwe beendega , kuggekemátdush ,
43007015	Jewugdush mámukkâtandumōg , ekettowugdush , áneen wuhow aninne azhekekandunk oshebe-egun , wekâ ge kekinnoumowâsewint ?
43007016	Jesus oguhnonân , ekettodush , neenguhgequawin kâween neen tebinowawizzisse , weendush biezhenázho-ōt odebandán .
43007017	Oweuh aninne azhe anozhit andotunk , oguhkekandán guhgequawin , Kitche Manito wanjebámugut , uhgamá neen tebinowa neendenandumowin .
43007018	Ween tebinowa aekettōtigo anandunk ; ween tebinowa ogitchetwâwizzewin onundowâbundán ; ween nandowâbundunk ogitchetwâwizzewininne azhenázhuhōgoojin , ween tabwa , quiuk mázheninnewuggizzewin ga gishkunzik .
43007019	Kânuh Moses kegemenigoosewâ tepákonegawin ; kâdush oweuh andussheyag kekunwanduhzeem tepákonegawin ? áneen papáenuhnokeyag che we nissheyag ?
43007020	Anishanâban oguhnonigōn , ekettowug Mutche Manito ketiáwâ ; owwanan papánundonissik ?
43007021	Jesusdush oguhnonán , otinnân , bazhek uhnokewin neenge eeshquâ unnoke kokkinnádush kemámukkât andumōg .
43007022	Moses kegemenigowâ gewetázhowin ( kâween wenigo Moses : ōsemág koshá ) keenowâdush unwabewinnegezhiguk kegewetázhwâwâ aninne .
43007023	Kishpin quiuk izzhewabuk unwabewinnegezhiguk che gewetáhzho-ōnt aninne , Moses otepákonegawin che begobetoseeng , keenishkâtizzim innuh ōnje nojemōug aninne unwabewinnegezhiguk ?
43007024	Kago tepákonunkago wiábundumag : quiuk tepákonegawin keguh ezhe tepákoneyag .
43007025	Ahnintdush Jerusalemink andájig , ekettowug kânuh wuhowisse aninne wânissint ?
43007026	Binná omisshisshowwetōn ogegetowin , kâdush ningōt otinnásewân ; nâgânizzidjig innuh okekanemáwân ōnjittá wiáwit Christ .
43007027	Neen kekanemánán wuhow aninne , wanjebát ; ope Christ takoshink kâ oweuh aninne okekanemáseen wanjebát .
43007028	Jesusdush ázhequa , anegōk kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , magwouh guhgequat , ekettōnk , kekekanemim , kekekanedám , wanjebáeyán , kâween neen tebinowa neendenandumowin neembe ōnje ezháse , ween biezhenázho-ōt tiabwat kâ kekanemásewâ .
43007029	Weendush neen nekekanemá , ween biezhenázho-ōt neembe ōnjebá uzzhiát .
43007030	Opedush enandumōg , wetuhkonáwât , kâ oweuh aninnewun otânginnegooseen , ōnje kâ muhshe otepiegun ochichesasininne .
43007031	Nebewádush anishanâban , otabwatágōn , ekettowugdush ope Christ takoshink , owushema nuh tuhtotum , andotunk wuhow aninne ?
43007032	Phariseeugdush nōndumōg anishanâbag tuzzhemáwât , Phariseeugdush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug otuhnonáwân giya shemágunisshe ogemán , che otápenáwât .
43007033	Jesusdush otinnân , wanebeek kiábe chebwâ nnhguninnuhgook , medush ezháeyán uhbe-ezhenázho-ōt uzzhiát .
43007034	Keguh nundowâbomin , kâdush keguh mikkowwisseem , keche iáyán , kâ keguhkushketoseem chebe-ezháeyag .
43007035	Jewugdush i-ittewug , ánde ga ezhát che mikowâsewungwan ? ono innuh oguhtezhanun pabásigwashkájig chewe guhgekemát ?
43007036	Wagonan ekettowinenandush eu aketōt keguh nundowâbomin , kâdush keguh mikowwisseem ; keche iáeyándush kâ keguh kushketoseem che be-ezháeyag ?
43007037	Squâch gezhigut wekoondewinne gezhiguttōn , Jesus nebowwe ázhequat ekettodush , oweuh aninne gâshkunábágwat neenguh beotissik , tuh minnequa .
43007038	Ween ga tabwayanemit aketomugguk , azhebe-egâtag , omissutáng oguh ōnje sâgitchewabenánun sebewun bamátak nebe .
43007039	Ochichâgomán gá enájin , ono tiabwatágoojin keche otissiggowât , Kitche Manito ochichâgwun kâ muhshe menittisseem ; ōnje kâ muhshie Jesus ishpemink gezhigōnk ezháse .
43007040	Nebenádush anishanâbag n'wáudumowât o-o ekettowin , ekettowug kagat me wuhow mamándáwizzit .
43007041	Ahnintdush ekettowug , me wuhow Christ , ánintdush ekettowug Christ , nuh Galileeink tuh beōnje ságáum ?
43007042	Kânuh oshebe-egâtasenōn Christ beōnjebá , David onejánisun , otanong giya Bethlehem David uhgeiát ?
43007043	Me papukkân wiuggeittewât tuzzhemáwât .
43007044	Ahnint otánuhweotâpenáwân , kâdush oweuh aninne otângenáseen .
43007045	Shemágunisshe ogemádush obepeendegawug sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya Phariseeug otinnáwândush áneeshween benásewag ?
43007046	Shemágunisshe ogemágdush otinnáwân , kâwekâ oweuh aninne , ezhegágegetose azhe gágegetōt wuhow aninne .
43007047	Phariseeugdush otinnáwân , giya keenowâ nuh kewiyazhemigōm ?
43007048	Oweuh nuh nâgánizzidjig Phariseeugdush tabwatowâwân ?
43007049	Uhgewedush anishanâbag kakandunzikwâ tepákonegawin , nanibbekinjegâzowât .
43007050	Nicodemusdush otinnân ( ween gá be otissát Jesusun nebádibbik , me 'ow bazhek wiáwut . )
43007051	Neen debákonegawinnenánin innuh tebákonán oweuh aninnewun , bwâ nōndowwint che kekanemint andotunk ?
43007052	Oguh nōnáwândush , otinnáwân , giya keen nuh Galileeink ketōnjebá , nundowâbig , ienábig , kâween kago , mamándáwizzewin Galileeink ōnje ságáumomuggussinōn .
43007053	Kokkinná aninnewugdush , kewawug aeendáwât .
43008001	Jesusdush wudjewink Olivet ge-ezhá .
43008002	Kekeshapdush , minowâ ge peendega kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk kokkinnádush anishanâban obebeendegágōn námátábedush guhgekemát .
43008003	Oshebe egaweninnewug giya Phariseeug obetowâwân equawun bisshegwâtizzewinnink gá ōnje otâpenint , námátábeintdush nowwiuhe .
43008004	Otinnáwândush , Neendogemám , wuhow equa bisshegwâtizzewinink gá ōnje otâpenat magwouh bisshegwâtizzit .
43008005	Moses tepákonegawinink neengeigonán , e-e tenowuh tuh bemosinuttōm : áneendush keen aketoeyun ?
43008006	Me o-o guhgwadebanemint , konemá kago tá ezhe mutchetotowâ ; Jesus nowwiggittá , oninj oshebe egat ákeeng .
43008007	Medush e-e ázhe kuhquajemint pusságittádush , otinnân ; keenowâ andussheyag owwagwan mázneninnewuggizzewin ayásigwan ween netam oguh bemosinuhán .
43008008	Minowâdush nowwuggittá oshebe-egat ákeeng :
43008009	Uhgewedush n'wândungig , oweuh ishkokegishkunzig mázheninnewuggizzewin , babazhek uhne ságáumōg , netam sazezekizzit nánázh agâsheit : Jesusdush ezheke nuggunná equadush nebowwe wegewamink .
43008010	Jesusdush wambetát , meatuh equawun wiábomájin , otinnândush ; equa unish uhgew biátámikkig ? kânuh oweuh aninné ketá bátámigoose ?
43008011	Ekettodush , kâ oweuh aninne , Neendogemám , Jesusdush otinnân , neen giya kâ ketá bátámissinōn ; máján , kago minowâ mutche izzhewabizzekan .
43008012	Opedush Jesus otinnân , neen wâsayá áke : ween ga nopenuhzhit kâween kushkedibbikutōnk , tuh bamosase ; wâsayá bemátizzewin oguhtián .
43008013	Phariseeugdush otinnáwân ketuzzhindiz aketoeyun ; kâ tabwawinnewunzinōn aketoeyun .
43008014	Jesus oguhnonán otinnândush , anawak tuhzhindizzoeyán neendabwa , neen kekandán wanjebáeyán giya azháeyán , keenowâdush kâ kekekanduhzeem wanjebáeyán , giya ezháeyán .
43008015	Keenowâ mozhuk keweyâsink ketizzhe tepákonegam , kâween neen oweuh aninne neendebákonáseen .
43008016	Tepákonegayán , neendebákonegawin tuh tabwawinnewun : ōnje kâ neen ezhekawizzisse neendush giya ōsemá biezheaázho-ōt .
43008017	Keenowâ giya ketepákonegawinnewâng oshebe-egâta ; Neezh aninnewug odikittowinnewâ tabwawinnewun .
43008018	Neembazhek neendow wetokotátizzoeyán , ōsemá giya newetokág .
43008019	Otinnáwândush , ánde 'zhiát ? kōs Jesus oguhnonán , kâ kekekanemisseem , kekekanemásewâ giya nōs ; kekekanemevagobun ketáge kekanemáwâ giya nōs .
43008020	Ono ekettowinun eketto , Jesus uhguhgequat kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , kâdush oweuh aninnewun otânginniggooseen ōnje otepiegun kâ muhshe ochichesasininne .
43008021	Minowâdush Jesus otinnân , neenguh májá ezháeyán , keguh nundowâbomim kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm ; azháeyándush kâ keguh be-ezháseem .
43008022	Ekettowugdush Jewug , tuh nissittizzo nuh ? wanje ekettōt , kâ keguh be-ezháseem ga ezháeyán .
43008023	Otinnândush keenowâ tuhbuhzheesh ketōnjeem ishpemink neendōnjebá , keenowâ o-o ákeeng ketandánukkeem , kâween neen omá ákeeng neendinduhnukkese .
43008024	Me wanje eninnuhgook , kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm . Oanje tabwatunzewag neen áweyán kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm .
43008025	Otinnáwândush , owwanan keen ? Jesusdush otinnân mego dibbishko gá aninnán wiazhkut miájetáng .
43008026	Bátienut wâ ekettoeyán , che tebákoninnuhgook ; ween biezhenázho-ōt tabwa ; neenguhnotán andittán o-o áke anittowwug .
43008027	Kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ anát tuzzhemát ōsemán .
43008028	Jesusdush otinnân ope ge ōmbinnág Aninne Oguisun keguh kekandánâwâ neen áweán , kâween giya neen tebinowa neendotunze : nōsigodush azhe guhgekemit neendiket ono iuheen .
43008029	Ween biezhenazho-ōt newejewik : ōsemá kâween ezheke neennuhgunigoose kokkinná o-o aeendotumán ono iuheen ezhemeenwandum .
43008030	Ope o-o aketōt nebená otabwa-anemigōn .
43008031	Jesusdus otinnân Jewun tabwa-anemigoojin , nuhguttunzewag neendikittowin keenowâ neendoskenegamug iáwim kagat .
43008032	Keguh kekandánâwâ tabwawinnewung tabwawindush keguh ōnje wânukke .
43008033	Otinnáwândush , neenowind Abraham onejânisun , kâween wekâ neenge owwâkânewissemin ; áneen wanje ekettoeyun che wânuhkeyâng .
43008034	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , owwagwan miázheninnewuggizzegwan ween mázheninnewuggizzewin oguhowwâkâniggōn .
43008035	Owwâkân kâween gâgineek wegewamink táse , oguisemádush gâgineek .
43008036	Oguisemádush wânukke-enág keguh wânukkeem kagat .
43008037	Kekekaneminenim Abraham onejânisun áweyag , kewenisshim , ōnje kâ ningooche attasenōn keowwink neendikittowin .
43008038	Wiábundumánigo nōs uzzhiát neendikit , keenowâdush ketotám azhe wâbundumag kōsewâ uzzhiát .
43008039	Oguh guhnonán , otinnáwândush Abraham nōsenán . Jesusdush otinán , kishpin keenowâ Abraham onejânisun áweyag , Abraham otunnokewin ketá unnokeem .
43008040	Nōngumdush kewegooje nisshim , aninne quiuk tabwawin anik , anittowwug Kitche Manito : Abraham kâween o-o getotunze .
43008041	Kōsewâ otinunokewinun ketinunnokeem . Otinnáwândush kâween bisshegwâtizzewinink , neenge negissemen ; bazhek onōsenán , Kitche Manito .
43008042	Jesusdush otinnân , Kitche Manito ōseyag , ketá sâgeim ; Kitche Manito uzzhiát ōnjebáeyán ; kâween neen tebinowa nembe ezháse , ween neembe ezhenázho-ōk .
43008043	Ahneen o-o azhe nissetotunzewag o-o neendikittowin .
43008044	Keenowâ Mutche Manito kōsewâ , kōsewâ aenanemenag che totumag ketotám , Genisshewa wiazhkut miájetáng , kâ tabwawin otiáseen ; kagenowishkidjin ween tebinowa ogegetowin , ween ōsemáwe kungenowishkewin .
43008045	Oanje neendabwa-aninán , wanje tabwatowwissewun .
43008046	Oweuh nuh andussheyag kekekandánâwâ nuh mutchetotumán ? quiuk ánuh tabwayán , áneen azhe tabwatowwissewag ?
43008047	Ween Kitche Manito wanjebát , Kitche Manito odikittowin otabwatán , wanje tabwatowwâsewag , kâween Kitche Manito uzzhiát ketōnjebáseem .
43008048	Jewugdush ekettowug , otinnáwân , kânuh quiuk neendikittosemin , keen Samariatanun wiáweun , giya Mutche Manito ketiáwâ ?
43008049	Jesusdush , oguhnonán , káween neendiáwâse Mutche Manito ; neengitchetwâwanemá nōs ; keenowâdush kâween kekitchetwâwanemisseem .
43008050	Kâ neen nundowâbunduhzeen tebinowa neengitchetwáwizzewin ; bazhek nandowâbundunk giya tabákonunk .
43008051	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , oweuh aninne , kunwandunk aketoeyán kâwekâ oguh wâbunduhzeen nebowin .
43008052	Jewugdush , otinnáwân , nōngum neen kekandámin Mutche Manito 'zhiáwut ; Abraham genebo , mamándáwizzidjig giya ; kedikitdush , aninne ga kunwandunk neendikittowin , kâwekâ oguh kekanduhzeen nebowin .
43008053	Owushema nuh ketuhpetandágooze , apetandágoozebun nōsenán Abraham , gá nebōt , mamándáwizzidjig giya genebowug ; owwanan wiáwekâzoeyun ?
43008054	Jesusdush otinnân , kitchetwâwindizzoyán , kâ ningōt inâbuhtussinōn , nōs kitchetwâwanemit , kedikittōmdush , Kekitche Manitōmewâ .
43008055	Kâ muhshe kekanemásewâ : neen nekanemá , kishpin kâ neenkekanemáse ekettoeyán neendá kuhgenowishke azhe kuhkenowishkeyag ; neendush nekekanemán neenkunwandumowâ odikittowin .
43008056	Kōsewâ Abraham pâpenanemo , che wâbundunk neen gezhigutōn , owâbundán , pâpenanemodush .
43008057	Jewugdush , otinnáwân , kâ muhshe nánemetunnuh ketusso kekenonowuggizzisse , kegewâbománuh Abraham ?
43008058	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , ketenenim , Abraham chebwâ , geiát neendiá .
43008059	Medush azhe muhmowât ásineen we bemosinnuháwat ; Jesusdush gázo , ságáumdush , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , nowwiuhe uhne ezhá uhne guhbikowât .
43009001	Jesusdush magwouh bamosat , ogewâbomán aninnewun kuhgebeengwanit , áquo negenit .
43009002	Otoskenegamundush okuhquajemigōn , ekettōnk , Neendogemám , owwanan gá mutche totunk , wuhow aninne , gamá onegeigōn , o-o wanje kuhgebeengwat .
43009003	Jesusdush oguhnonân , kâ wuhow aninne , gemutche totunze giya onegeigōn : Kitche Manito koshá otunnokewin tuh wâbundi-ittim .
43009004	Neen neenguh unnoke ween biezhenázho-ōt otunnokewin magwouh gezhigut , ogezhiguttōn , dabekukkin kâ oweuh tá unnokese .
43009005	Ga ápeech che iáyán ákeeng , newâsashkán áke .
43009006	Ope o-o aekettōt , ákeeng ezhe sukko , uzzhishke otōnje ōzhetōn , azhe sinnegwâbenát kagebeengwanidjin aninnewun .
43009007	Otinnândush owwe kesepekeen betobegōnk Siloam , ( azhe ánekuhnotumink , azhenázho-ōnt . ) Gemájádush owwe kesebegeet , medush azhewâbit .
43009008	Wâjetukewamájindush uhgew ukko wiábomápuneeg , kakebeengwanidjin , ekettowug kânuh wuhow áwisse námátábepun ukko uhbuhgoshewat ?
43009009	Ahnint ekettowug , me 'ow : ánintdush ekettowug , me azhenágoozit ; weendush eketto , neen neendow .
43009010	Me wanje otinnáwân , áneen gá ezhetoskâbeyun ?
43009011	Ekettodush , aninne , Jesus ezhenekâzo , uzzhishke oge ozhetōn , medush gásinnegwâbinit , neendig edush Siloam betobeegōnk , ezhán kesebegeen ; neenge-eznádush neengesebegedush , azhewâbeándush .
43009012	Otinnáwândush , ánde zhiát ? eketto , andogwan .
43009013	Phariseeugdush , betowâwug uhnew kagebeengwanepun .
43009014	Unwabewinnegezhigutopun ope Jesus ge ozheát uzzhishke , gewâbeát .
43009015	Phariseeugdush , okuhquajemigon minowâ áneen gá ezhewâbeun ? otinnândush uzzhishke otattōn neskezhigōnk , neengesebekedush , medush azhewâbeán ,
43009016	Oanjedush ánint Phariseeug ekettowug , kâ wuhow aninne Kitche Manito 'zhiát ōnjebáse , ōnje kâ okunwanduhzeen unwabewinnegezhigut : ánint ekettowug áneen mutcheizzhewabizzit aninne gage ezhe kitche uhnokeet ? nanáwenittezowugdush .
43009017	Otinnáwândush minowâ kagebeengwanepun , áneen keen anut ween nuh ketōshkâbeik ? eketto mamándáwizze .
43009018	Jewugdush , kâ tabwatunzewug , che ge kuhgebeengwat , minowâdush wâbit , chebwâ nundomáwât onegeiggōn .
43009019	Kuhquajemintwâdush , menuh wuhow keguis ; gá enut , ge kuhgebeengwa negit ? áneen nōngum azhe wâbit ?
43009020	Onegeiggōndush , ekettowug , neenkekanemánán , me wuhow neenguisenán , ge kuhgebeenwaneegdush .
43009021	Kâ neenkekandunzeemindush wanje wâbit , kâ neenkekanemásenán owwagwanun twâskâbinnegogwan ; netáwigge kuhquajemik ; tuh guhnotumázo .
43009022	Onegeiggōndush , ekettowug ono ekettowinun ōnje ogosáwât Jewun , Jewugdush gegezhowâwug oweuh aninne Christ ezhe wenint tuh sâgitchewabenán uhnumeawegumigōnk .
43009023	Onegeiggōn me wanje ekettonit , netáwigge , kuhquajemik .
43009024	Minowâdush , onundomáwân aninnewun kagebeengwanepun , otinnáwândush , mámoyewum Kitche Manito : neenkekanemánán wuhow aninne mázheninnewuggizzit .
43009025	Otinnândush endogwan miázheninnewuggizzegwan ; bazhakwun kakandumán neen kuhgebeenwanámbán nōngumdush , newâb .
43009026	Otinnáwândush minowâ , áneen gá totōk ? áneen gá ezhe tōskábenik ?
43009027	Otinnândush , kegeweendumonim ázhia , kâdush kenōnduhzeem ; wagonan minowâ wâōnje nōndumag , kenundowandám innuh che we otoskenegameminnag ?
43009028	Onishkâzomáwândush , ekettowugdush , keen ketoskenegamenik ; neenowintdush Moses otoskenegamun .
43009029	Neen kekandámen Kitche Manitōn guhnonigoot Moses ; uhowedush aninne , kâween neen kekanemásenán tibbe wanjebágwan .
43009030	Aninnedush , otinnân , kitche mámukkâtandágwut , o-o kâ kekanemásewâ , tibbe wanjebágwan , neengetōshkâbenikdush .
43009031	Neen kekandámen Kitche Manitōn nōndowâsig miázheninnewuggizzinidjin ; oweuhdush aninne uhnumeatowwâjin Kitche Manitōn , azhindowwanemigoot ototunk , onōndowwân .
43009032	Ahquo ákewung kâwekâ nōnduhzeem che tōshkâbenit aninne kagebeengwa negit .
43009033	Kitche Manito 'zhiát ōnjebásik , wuhow aninne kâ tá kushketose ningōtono che totunk .
43009034	Otinnáwândush kege ōnje neeg mázheninnewuggizzewinnink , keweguhgekememin innuh ? osâgitchewabenáwândush .
43009035	Jesusdush nōndum uhge sâgitchewabenáwât : gá mikowâtdush , otinnân , ketabwa-andum innuh Kitche Manito Oguisun ?
43009036	Otinnândush , owwanan , 'ow Neendogemâm , che tabwaandomán ?
43009037	Jesusdush otinnân , kegewâbomá , weendush giya guhnonik ,
43009038	Ekettodush , Kitche Manito , neendabwa-andum , oshuhgushketowándush .
43009039	Jesusdush eketto , tepákonegawin buh ōnje ezháeyán ákeeng ; wiábissigōg konemá che wâbewât ; wiábidjigdush konemá che kagebeengwawât .
43009040	Ahnint Phariseeun wâjewegoojin onōndánáwâ ono ekettowinun , otinnáwândush , neenowindinnuh giya neenguhgebeengwamin ?
43009041	Jesusdush otinnân kuhgebeengwayag , kâ ketá mázhe ninnewuggizzisseem ; nōngum newâbomin kedikittōm , me wanje iáyag mázheninnewuggizzewin .
43010001	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween squandamink wanje peendegasig manishtânishun owegewamink , bázhittota ningooche , me gamotishkidjin giya nashewashkidjin .
43010002	Weendush ishquandang wanje peendegat me uhkanowanemát manishtânishun .
43010003	Aninne kanowandunk squandem , biákindanumowât ; manishtânishundush onōndágōn otinwawin , owâwenán tebinowa omanishtânishemun azhenekâzonit , uhsâgizzeátdush .
43010004	Siágizzeát tebinowa omanishtânishemun , onegânetumowân , manishtânishundush onopenuhnigōn , onissetotágōn anwat .
43010005	Miátáwizzinidjindush , kâ otá nopenuhniggooseen oguh oshemigōn : kâ okekanemásewâ miátáwizzinidjin etinwawininne .
43010006	O-o buhbawatágoozewin Jesus otinnân , kâ onissetotowwâsewân iuheen anduhzhindungin .
43010007	Jesusdush otinnân minowâ , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , neen manishtânishhe squandem .
43010008	Kokkinná gá benegánetumowwidjig gamotishkewug giya nisshewashkewug ; manishtânishundush kâ onōndágoosewân .
43010009	Neen ishquandam ; oweuh aninne shábooshkowwit , ween tuh bemátizze , tuh peendega giya ságáum oguh mikân ga tuzzhe wesenint .
43010010	Gamotishkid unishigo wanje takoshink , owwe nisshewunnájetát : me wanje takoshinnán bemátizzewin che iámowât , konemá owushema nebewá oguhtiánâwâ .
43010011	Neen nemennokunowanemág manishtânishug : menno kunnowanemát manishtânishun omenán obemátizzewin owwe bemájeát manishtânishun .
43010012	Ween koshá anonint , kâ odebanemáseen , manishtânishun , wiábomát mieengunun takoshininit , onuhgonándush manishtânishun , oshemōt ; mieengundush onowutumán , osiswanázhowândush manishtânishun .
43010013	Ween anonint oshemo , ōnje uzzhuhnonint , kâ giya opapámanemáseen manishtânishun .
43010014	Neen nemenno kunowânemág manishtânishug , nekekanemág nemanishtânishemug , neen kekanemigōgdush .
43010015	Osemá azhe kekanemit me giya neen azhe kekanemug ōsema : newabenándush neembemátizzewin manishtânishug ōnje .
43010016	Ahnintdush manishtânishug ayáwug , kâween ono ningōtwawân ; giya ween uhgew neenguh binnág ; giya weenowá anwayán neenguh nōndágōg ; medush che ningōtwawânuggizzewât bazhekdush 'ow kanowanemát .
43010017	Osemá me wanje sâgeit , neembuggittinán neembemátizzewin , che otâpenumán minowâ .
43010018	Kâ oweuh aninne nemukwniggoose , tebinowa neembuggittinán neow , neengushketōn buggittinumán , neenguthketōn gjya minowâ otâpenuman . O-o guhgequawin nōs neenge ondinán .
43010019	Jewugdush getâshkeittewug , minowâ ono ekettowinun ōnje .
43010020	Nebewádush ekettowug , Mutche Manitōn otiáwân , kawuhnátizze ; wagonan wanje bezindowag ?
43010021	Ahnintdush ekettowug , kâween ono ekettowinun áwunzenōn , ga gishkowâjig , Mutche Manitōn ; Mutche Manito nuh otátōshkâbenán kagebeengwanidjin ?
43010022	Jerusalemink ōshke wekoondewinnegezhiguk , magwouh bebōng .
43010023	Jesusdush bamosat Solomon obabámosawinink .
43010024	Jewundush , obegewetáskágōn , otigōn , áneen menik ga totowweyâng che gweenowe enandumáng ? keen Christ wiáwewunan , wawane weendummowweshinâng .
43010025	Jesusdush otinnân , kegeweendumonim , kâdush kegetabwatowwisseem ; uhnokewinun anunnokeyán nōs otonozowinink , newetokágonán .
43010026	Kâdush ketabwatowwisseem , ōnje kâween keenowâ nemanitânishemug ketáwisseem , gá eninnuhgook kiut .
43010027	Nemanishtânishemug neenōndágōg anwayán neenkekanemág nenopenuhnigōgdush :
43010028	Nemenágdush gâgega bemátizzewin ; káwekâ tuh wunneshinzewug , kâdush oweuh neenguh gitcheninjebinnegoose .
43010029	Nōs mázhit ono owushema apetandágoozit kokkinná , kâdush oweuh tá gitcheninjebinnáseen nōsun oninjenink .
43010030	Neen giya nōs neembazhekomin .
43010031	Jewugdush minowâ omámonâwâ ásineen we beosináwât .
43010032	Jesusdush otinnân , kitche nebewá wanissheshink uhnokewinun kewâbundieneninnim nōs ōnje : áneen uhnew uhnokewinun wanje bemosin ieyag ?
43010033	Jewundush otigowân , kâween wanissheshingin uhnokewinun ketōnje bemosinnuhissenonim ; mutche gegetowin ōnje , koshá , ōnje keteninne-ewdush Kitche Manitowe áwakâzoeyun .
43010034	Jesusdush otinnân , kânuh oshebe-egâtasenōn ketepákonegawinink , neenge eket , keenowâ ke Manitowim ?
43010035	Kishpin Manitōg enát , Kitche Manito odikittowin wâshebe-egâtadush , kâ tá bekooshkâsenōn ;
43010036	Ketuzzhemáwânuh ōsemá biezhenázho-ōt ákeeng , kemutche geezhwam ; ōnje uhge-ekettoeyán , neen Kitche Manito Oguisun ?
43010037	I-innunnokesewân nōs otunnokewinun , kago tabwatowwisshe kago .
43010038	Kishpin enunnokeyán , uhnokewinun , tabwatowwissewag , tabwa-andumōk uhnokewinun , ketá kekendánâwâ ketá tabwaandám ōsemá weowwink neendiá .
43010039	Eu ōnje owwe otâpenáwân minowâ oge me-egowândush ,
43010040	Ahwâs ewadadush Jordan , ezhá emá John netam gebaptizewat emádush aeendát .
43010041	Nebewádush , obeotissiggōn ekettowugdush , John kâ ningōt ge uhnunokese kitche uhnokewinun ; kokkinnádush ono , John gá ienát ono aninnewun , tabwawinnewun .
43010042	Kitche nebewádush otabwatágōn emá .
43011001	Binnahdush bazhek aninne , Bethanyink , Martha giya owetiggikoon Mary ototanowewâ Lazarus ezhenekâzo wiákoozit .
43011002	( Me 'ow Mary , gá gesezittawât wenesisun Jesusun , otowamán Lazarusun wiákoozinit . )
43011003	Eu ōnje otowamán ezhenázho-omán uzzhiat , ekettōnk , Neendogemám , binná , ween siágeut ákoose .
43011004	Jesusdush n'wândunk o-o , eketto , o-o ákoosewin kâween nebowinnewunzenōn uneshâ Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin , Kitche Manito Oguisun che ōnje kitchetwâwizze .
43011005	Jesus oságeán Marthaun , giya owetiggikoon , giya Laza rusun .
43011006	Opedush n'wândunk ákoozinit , neezhogwun owushema keenwazh , emá 'zhiát .
43011007	Gá eeshquâ iát , otinnân otoskenegamun , Judeaink umbasinno ezhátá minowâ .
43011008	Otoskenegamundush otigōn , Neendogemám , Jewug pichenuk kewebemosiniegōg , minowâ nuh ewada keguh ezhá ?
43011009	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ nuh usshe neezho-tepiegun asenōa gezhiguk ? Aninne bamosat gezhiguk , kâween bezogashinze , ōnje owâbundán o-o wâsayánik o-o áke .
43011010	Aninne nebá dibbik bamosat , bezogashin , ōnje kâ wâsayá ogegishkunzeen .
43011011	Ono iuheen eketto ; náágutchdush , otinnân , Lazarus neendinowamáguninán nebá ; neenguh we omuttinná .
43011012	Otoskenegamundush , ekettowug , Neendogemám , nebát tuh menno-izzhewabizze .
43011013	Jesus euedush onebowininne gá etunk : unishigo ukkowa unwashemono nebát , enandumōg .
43011014	Jesusdush wawane weendumowân , Lazarus ge nebo .
43011015	Neembápenanim keenowâ ōnje emá uhgeiasewân , che ōnje tabwatumag : umbasuh ezhátá .
43011016	Weendush Thomas , Didymus azhenekânint , otinnán weje oskenegeshun , umbasinno ezhátá giya keenowind konemá ketá , weje nebománán .
43011017	Jesusdush bowotissát , omikowân neogwunigutinik aquo shingeshink jebágumigōnk ázhiá .
43011018	( Bethany bazhew tuhgoo , emá Jerusalemink metoswa usshenánun furlongs apecháne .
43011019	Nebenádush Jewug , obe-ezhánâwân Maryun giya Marthaun , uhbepuhpugwuhzikowâwât , otowamáwân genebonit .
43011020	Marthadush pichenukigo n'wândunk , Jesusun takoshinnit , ezhá owwe nuhgishkowât , Marydush pezân námátábe wegewamink .
43011021	Marthadush otinnân Jesusun , Neendogemám omá ayáyumbun , kâ neendowwamá tá ge nebose .
43011022	Neenkekandán mego dibbishko nōngum kago nundotumowut Kitche Manito , ketá menik .
43011023	Jesusdush otinnân , ketowwamá tuh onishkâ minowá .
43011024	Marthadush otinnân , neenkekandán , ábejebáwinink squâch e-e gezhigut , cheonishkât .
43011025	Jesusdush otinnân , neen ábejebáwin , giya bemátizzewin , ween tiabwa-anemit kishpin ge nebōt , minowâ tuh bemátizze :
43011026	Owwagwan bamátizzit ga tabwayanemegwan , kâwekâ tuh nebose , ketabwatum nuh o-o ?
43011027	Otinnândush , neendabwatum , Neendogemám , keen Christ , Kitche Manito Oguisun , neendenandum , wâtakoshingebun ákeeng .
43011028	Ope gá ekettot , unnekewa , oguhnonân wetiggikoon Maryun gemōch , ekettōnk , ketogemámenán takoshin , kenundwawamikdush .
43011029	Bâbega nōndunk eu , pusegwe gazhetinna uhbeotissátdush .
43011030	Kâ muhshe Jesus betakoshinze otanong , emá kiábe 'zhiát , Martha uhge nuhgishkowâpun .
43011031	Jewugdush , beendik ayájig , uzzhiát , puhpugwuhzikowáwât , wiábomáwát Maryun gazhetinna pusegweet , giya ságáunk onopenuhnáwân , ekettowug jebagumigōnk ezhá , owwe mowit emá .
43011032	Marydush bowotissát Jesusun uzzhiánit , wiábomát , pongesin ozittánik , otinnân , Neendogemám , omá iyáyumbun , kâ neendowwamá tá ge nebose .
43011033	Jesusdush wiábomát azhequat , giya Jewun wâjewegoojin ázhequawât , kitche ishkunámo weowwink , osittawandum .
43011034	Ekettodush ánde ge ussag ; otinnáwândush , Neendoge nám , owwe wâbundun .
43011035	Jesus mowwe .
43011036	Jewugdush , ekettowug , binná azhe sâgeát .
43011037	Ahnintdush ekettowug , kânuh wuhow aninne twâskâbenát , kagebeengwanidjin , otáge bemájeáseen ono aninnewun , che ge nebosinipun ?
43011038	Jesusdush minowá ishkunámo , watittunk jebagumik Weembápeká , ásindush ogitcheiuhe atta .
43011039	Jesus eketto , otâpenumōk eu ásin : Martha otowwamán uhgá nebōt , otinnân Neendogemám , menágoozitōk o-o ápe ; neogwuniguttinne gá áquo nebōt .
43011040	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ nuh kege innissenōn , kishpin tabwatumun , keguh wâbundán Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin ?
43011041	Ningoochedush otatōnâwâ e-e ásin ogitcheiuhe attanik gá nebōt unshingeshink ; Jesusdush ishpemink enábe , eketto , nōs , megwetch neendenandum nōndowweun :
43011042	Neen kekandándush gâgineek nōndowweun ; uhgew anishanâbag bamegâbowidjig wanje ekettoeyán , che tabwatumowât uhbe-ezhenázhoeyun .
43011043	Ope gá eeshquâ iekettōt , ázhequa anegōk , Lazarus beságáun , eketto .
43011044	Weendush uhgá nebōt beságáum , jebagumigokonâsemán otugwinun , oskezhigōnkdush wâbegin buttugweengwabezo : Jesusdush eketto , ábuhōk , tuh májá .
43011045	Nebewádush uhgew Jewug biezhájig Maryun , wiábundumowât iuheen Jesus andotunk , tabwa-andumōg .
43011046	Ahnintdush , Phariseeun otezhánun oweendumowândush iuheen Jesus gá totunk .
43011047	Mowōnjeittewugdush , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug , giya Phariseeug , uhgegetowât ekettowugdush , áneen anunnokeyâng ? wuhow aninne kitche nebená andotum .
43011048	Papámanemásewunk , kokkinná aninnewun oguh tabwayanemigōn ; Romanugdush tuh be-ezháwug che be otâpenumowât andánuhkeunk , giya kejetukewamáguninánin .
43011049	Bazhekdush andusshewât , Caiphas ezhenekâzo , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewe e-e kekenonowin ; otinnân , kâween kago kekekanduhzeem .
43011050	Kâ ke náguttuhwanduhzeem tuh mennoizzhewabut , bazhek nebōt keowwinnánin ōnje , kokkinnádush che nebosewung .
43011051	Kâweendush tebinowa ween ōnje , ekettose , kitche ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewe e-e kekenonowin kezhá eketto ga izzhewabuk , Jesus keche ōnjenat , ono anishanában .
43011052	Káweenigodush , ono anishanâban atuh , kokkinná giya keche mowōnjeát Kitche Manito onejânisun saswashkâjig ákeeng .
43011053	Oppinnago ōnje eu gezhigut otonuggimáwân che nesáwât .
43011054	Me eu ōnje , Jesus kâwekâ mizzhishuh bamosase , magwaiuhe Jewun , cheegiuhe buhgwuttuhkumigáng ezhá otanong , Ephraim ezhenekâta , otuzzhe wetegamán emá otoskenegamun .
43011055	Jewugdush okubbekosa wekoondewinewâ , kagâ ochichesa , nebewádush májáwug otunnuhkewinink , che beneittezowât shezháwát Jerusalemink .
43011056	Onundowâbomáwân Jesusun , guhguhnonittewug nebowwewât kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , áneen enandumag ? kânuh tuh be-ezháse wekoondewinink ?
43011057	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya Phariseeug ge enákonegawug , oweuh aninnewun kekanemigoot uzzhiát , tuh tebájemo , che otápenint .
43012001	Jesusdush ningōtwâsogwun , bwâ ochiohesag kubbekosa wekoondewin , Bethanyink betakoshin Lazarus uzzhiát uhow gá nebopun ween gá ábejebáát .
43012002	Ojebákonáwândush , Marthadush uhnoke otopowinink , Lazarusdush owetopomán otopowinink .
43012003	Marydush ningo tebabishkojegun ototâpenán , kachesunnáguggindag pemeta , osinnegenumowândush ozittáning Jesusun ; kesezittawândush wenesissun ; omooshkenamágootdush wegewamink .
43012004	Bazhekdush otoskenegamun , Judasun Iscariotun , Simon oguisun ; wâbuhgitenumágat , eketto .
43012005	Unishwin o-o pemeta che ge átándiseeng niswâk tuswa shoneá , katemákizzidjigdush che gemenitwâ ?
43012006	Kâween ween buhbámanemát katemákizzinidjin wanje ekettose , ōnjedush gamotishkid , mashkemoot otián , uhbemewetōtdush bánuhummowint .
43012007	Jesusdush eketto , bone uhow ; neembugitanemigowin o-o wanje kunwandunk .
43012008	Katemákizzidjig gâgineek kewejewegoog ; kâween neen gâgineek kewejewissinōn .
43012009	Nebewádush Jewun , okekanemigōn emá uzzhiát ; kâween atuh Jesusun beōnje ezhásewug , Lazarusun giya , owwe wâbomáwât uhge ábejebát .
43012010	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug wuhnuhshowawug owwe nesáwât giya Lazarusun :
43012011	Aunga ween ōnje nebewâ Jewug ge-ezháwug uhtabwaanemáwât Jesusun .
43012012	Wiábuninik , nebená anishanâbag iáwug owwekoondink n'wândumowât Jesus takoshink Jerusalemink .
43012013	Otikwunun palm metigōn , ototâpenánâwân owwe nuh gishkowâwât , ázhequawugdush Hosanna ; kitche shâwandágooze otogemámun Israel , buhtuhkoshink Kitche Manito otuhnozowinnink .
43012014	Jesusdush gá mikowât bazhekokazheensun otasubenun azhebe-ekâtag ,
43012015	Kago sagizzekan , Zion odânisun ; binná , ketogemám takoshin , tasubbe bazhekokazheensun .
43012016	Ono iuheen otoskenegamun kâ onissetotunzeenâwâ netam ; opedush Jesus gá ábejebát , omikwandánâwân ono iuheen oshebe-egâtanik , uhge ieendotumowâtdush ono iuheen .
43012017	Anishanában wâjewegoojin ope nandumát Lazarusun jebagumigōnk onishkâwintdush nebowinink , omikwandánâwâ .
43012018	Me o-o wanje nuhgishkágoot anishanâban , nōndumōg o-o gá uhnokeet kitche uhnokewin .
43012019	Phariseeugdush i-ittewug , kekekandám innuh neen kushketosewung ningōtono che totowwung ? binná anegoquág áke nopenuhná .
43012020	Ahnint Greekun owejewâwân takoshingig obeuhnumeatowâwât wekoondewinink .
43012021	Philipundush obe ezhánâwân , ween Bethsaidaink andát , Galileeink , okuhquajemáwândush , ekettowug , Neendogemâm , Jesus newewâbománán .
43012022	Philip obeweendumowân Andrewun : Andrew giyadush Philip oweendumowâwân Jesusun .
43012023	Jesus oguhnonán , ekettodush , tepiegun ochichesa , Aninne Oguisun che kitchetwâweint .
43012024	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , meatuh bazhekomenuk puhquazhegun pongesin ákeeng giya nebomuggut , ezhekâwissink ; kishpin nebomuggut , kitchemenewun .
43012025	Ween siágetōt obemátizzewin oguh wunnetōn : weendush shângandunk obemátizzewin o-o ákeeng , oguh kunwandán nánázh che gâgega bemátizzewinnewung .
43012026	Aninne enandunk che otoskenegamug , neendá nopenuhnink , keche iáeyán me giya neendoskenegam keche iát : oweuhdush aninne otoskenegamemug , nōsun oguhgitchetwâwanemigōn .
43012027	Nōngum neenjichâg sunnuhgizze , áneen ga ekettoeyán ? Nōs bemáje-eshin o-o nōngum tepiegun , o-odush ōnje neembeotittán o-o tepiegun
43012028	Nōs , kitchetwâwandun ketuhnozowin , medush gezhigōnk gegetowin beōnjesa , ekettōnk , neengegitchetwâwandán , minowâdush neenguh gitchetwâwandán .
43012029	Anishanâbag emá nebowidjig , uhnimekeeg ekettowug , ánintdush ekettowug , mezhinowa guhnonigōn .
43012030	Jesusdush eketto , o-o gegetowin kâween neen beōnje takoshinomugusenōn , keenowâdush ōnje takoshinomugut .
43012031	Nōngum tebákonegâta o-o áke : nōngum uzzhogemáwunk o-o áke sâgitchewabinnegâta ,
43012032	Giya neen kishpin ákeeng ōnje ōmbinnegoeyán , kokkinná aninnewug neenguh wekobinnag .
43012033	( Ga inápinat e-e anduzzhindunk . )
43012034	Anishanâban oguhnonigōn , neengenōndámen tebákonegawinink Christ che gâgega bemátizzit áneen wanje ekettoeyun . Aninne Oguisun tuh ōmbinná uzzheketoeyun . Owwanan uhow Aninne Oguisun ?
43012035	Jesusdush otinnân , náágutch wanebak wâsayá keguhwe jewiggoon . Bamosayeuk magwouh wâsayá zhiyáyag ween kushkedibbikutōnk bamosat , kâ okekanduhzeen azhát .
43012036	Magwouh zhiáeyag wâsayá , tabwa-andumōk wâsay konemá wâsayá onejánisun keguh áwim . Jesusdush gá eesh quâ ekettōt ono iuheen ningooche ezhá owwe gázotowât .
43012037	Ahnowy kitche nebená kitche uhnokewinun ge ieendotun uhnoch e-e tabwayanemásigwâ .
43012038	Keche tabwawinnewung Esaias mamándáwizzit gá eke tōt , Kitche Manito , owwanan tiabwatunk neendikittowinenán ? Owwanan gá wâbundi-int Kitche Manito onik ?
43012039	Me wanje tabwayandunzikwá , ōnje Esaias ekettōt minowâ ,
43012040	Oge guhkebeengwayán oskezhigonink , giya oge mushkâwittowân otaewân che wâbissigwâ oskezhigowâng , giya che nissetotunzigwâ otaewâng che gwaketáwât , neendá nojemoâgdush .
43012041	Ono iuheen Esaias ge-eketto , wiábundunk ogitchetwâwizzewin , otuzzhemándush .
43012042	Nebenádush kitche ogemág otabwayanemáwân , ōnje Phariseeug kâ mozhe otinnosewug e-e tabwayandumowât , bōch tá sâgitchewabenáwug uhnumeawegumigōnk :
43012043	Nowutch opapámanemáwân aninnewun azhe papámanemáwât Kitche Manitōn .
43012044	Jesusdush ázhequa eketto , ween tiabwayanemit kâween neen tabwayanemigoose , biezhenázho-ōnidjin otabwayanemán .
43012045	Ween wiábomit , owâbomán biezhenázho-ōnidjin .
43012046	Neen takoshin wâsayá ákeeng , ween tiebwayanemit , kâween kushkedibbikutōnk tuh táse .
43012047	Oweuh aninne nōndunk neengegetowin , tiabwatunzikdush , kâ neen tepákonegase ; kâween neembe tepákonuhzeen áke , neembebemájetōn áke ,
43012048	Ween wiyabenit , giya tiabwayanduhzik neendikittowinun , bazhekowun tepákonegoojin : gegetowin gá ekettoeyán me eu ga tepákonigoot , squâch che gezhiguk .
43012049	Kâween neen tebinowa neendikittose , ōsemá biezhenázho-ōt neenge guhgekemik , ga iekettoeyán , giya ga ieendotumán .
43012050	Neen kekandán oguhgequawin gâgega bemátizzewinnewun : kokkinná o-o aketoeyán , ōsemá gá aezhit , me go aekettoeyán .
43013001	Bwaw kubbekosa wekoondewinink , ope Jesus kakandunk otepiegun ochichesanik , che máját , che nuhguttunk áke , che ezhát ōsemán ōnje tebinowa otánishanâbamun oge ságeán ; oge sâgeán nánázh che waquâsag .
43013002	Gá eeshquâdush weesenewât ( Mutche Manitōn obenuhumowân otaink Judas Iscariot , Simon oguisun , che bugittinnegoot . )
43013003	Jesus kakandunk , ōsemán kokkinná kago menigoot oninjeeng , Kitche Manitōndush ōnjebá , giya Kitche Manitōn otezhánun ;
43013004	Pusegwe owesenewinink , ningoochedush obugittinnán obeenzikowâgun ; geseengwâoon omámōn , uhgitchepinnittizzootdush ,
43013005	Náágutchdush , nebe ōsegenán kesebegewinágunink , omáje kesebegenumowân otoskenegamun ozitáne , ogegewândush seengwaoon e-e takobezōt .
43013006	Obeotissán Simon Peterun , Peterdush otinnân , Neendogemám , kesebegenánun innuh nezittun ?
43013007	Jesusdush otinnân , kâ kekekanduhzeen andotumán nōngum ; náágutch keguh kekandán .
43013008	Peterdush otinnân , kâwekâ keguh kesepekenuhzenun nezittun : Jesus otinnân kesepekenuhzewân kâ ketá tebanemissinnōn .
43013009	Simon Peter otinnân , Neendogemám , kâween nezittun atuh , giyadush neninjeen giya nestegwân .
43013010	Jesusdush otinnân , ween gasepeginnegâzōt , meatuh ozittun kesebeginumowint kokkinná beneze aneginnit , keenowâ giya kebenezim , kâweendush kokkinná .
43013011	Ween okekanemán ga bugittinnegoojin : me wanje ekettōt kâween kokkinná kebenezisseem .
43013012	Gá eeshquâ gesepegezitanát , ototâpenán obeenzikowâgun námátábedush : otinnândush , kekekandám innuh , andotonuh gook ?
43013013	Neendogemám ketizzhim , neen Kitche Manitōm giya ketizzhim , wawanedush aketoeyag ; kagat neendow .
43013014	Kishpin ketogemámewâ Kekitche Manitomewâ wiáwewânan kegesepegezitanenimdush , ketá gesepegezitanitim mamashkōt ,
43013015	Kege kekinnoumonim , me ga ieendotumagobun gá ieendotonuhgook .
43013016	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , uhnoketâgaweninne kâween owushema apetandágozisse , otogemámun apetandágoozinnit , giya ween biezhenázho-ōnt , kâ owushema apetandágoozisse biezhenázho-ogoojin .
43013017	Kishpin kekekandumag ono iuheen keguh mennowânegoozim totumag .
43013018	Kâween kokkinná keguh guhnonissinnonim , neenkekanemág gá onanemugguk euedush che quiuk osink âzhebe-egâtag che tabwawinnewunk , ween wâtopomint mejeâng puhquazhegun otōmbinán otōndun tungishkowwit .
43013019	Kegeweendumonim , bwâ ochichesag , konemá ope ochichesag me 'ow che enandumag .
43013020	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwanemát biezhenázho-ōnidjin neen tabwayanemik weendush tiabwayanemit otabwayanemán biezhenázho-ōnidjin .
43013021	Ope Jesus gá eeshquâ ekettōt ono iuheen , kitche osittáwandum ochichâgōnk ekettodush , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , bazhek andussheag oguh buggittiunumágan neow .
43013022	Otoskenegamundush , wâbundi-ittewug mamashkōt , kâdush okekanemásewân anájin ,
43013023	Bazhek otoskenegamun siágeájin , okákegunink ashotik quashemōn .
43013024	Simon Peterdush , ochebeengwatowwân , owwe kekanemát uhnew anánidjin .
43013025	Weendush wiásuttequashink Jesus okákegunink , otinnân , Neendogemám , áneen uhow ?
43013026	Jesusdush otinnân , me 'ow ga menik puhquazhegun , ge uhgwinjetowweyán ; gá uhgwinjetōtdush , omenán Judasun Iscariotun , Simon oguisun .
43013027	Puhquazhegundush , gá beenzikkágoot Mutche Manitōn obeenzikkágōn , Jesusdush otinnân nuhmunj wâ totumowânan , gazhetinná totun .
43013028	Kâ oweuh aninne , emá ayájig otopowinink okekanduhzeen wanje enát .
43013029	Ahnint enandumōg , ōnje Judas mashkemoot otián , Jesus wanje oge-enágobun , kishpinattōn ono iuheen keweiámen wekoondink , gamá oguhmenán kago katemákizzinidjin ,
43013030	Ween gá iát puhquazhegun bâbega geságáum , tabekuk eu ope .
43013031	Gá ságáunkdush , Jesus eketto , nōngum Aninne Oguisun kitche twâweá , Kitche Manito giya kitchetwâweán , ween ōnje .
43013032	Kishpin Kitche Manitōn gachetwâwegogwan , Kitche Manito oguhtotowân kitche kitchetwâweittezoot tebinowa weow bábega .
43013033	Neenduhbenoche-emetōk , wanebak kiábe kewejewenim , keguh nundowabomim : mego gá enugwâ Jewug , ga ezháeyán kâ keguh gebe-ezháseem ; nōngum me giya keenowâ aninnuhgook .
43013034	Oshke kuggequawin kemeninnim ; sâgeittig azhe sâgeinnuhgook ; me giya keenowâ ga ezhe sâgeitteyag .
43013035	Me o-o kokkinná aninnewug ga ōnje kekandumowât , neendoskenegam un kishpin sâgitteyag .
43013036	Simon Peterdush otinnân , Neendogemám , ánde azháeyun ? Jesusdush otinnân azháeyán kâween nōngum keguh ge nopenuhzhisseem pánemádush keguh nopenuhzhim .
43013037	Peterdush otinnân , Neendogemám , áneen ga ezhe kushketosewânan che nopenuhnisinán nōngum ? neenguh buggitinán neembemátizzewin keen ōnje .
43013038	Jesusdush otinnân , kagat innuh , keguh bugittinán kebemátizzewin neen ōnje ? kagat , kagat , ketenin , pekááquouh kâ tuh mázetâgoozisse chebwâ nissink ekettoeyun kâ kekekanemissenōn .
43014001	Kago ketaewân tuh ishkissinzenōn ketabwayanemáwâ Kitche Manito , tabwayanemisshig giya neen .
43014002	Nōs andát kitche nebewá bábetōchegâta : bwâ izzhewabukebun , ketágeweendummonim ; neendowe ozhissetōn che iyáeyag .
43014003	Kishpin azháeyán owwe ozhissetoeyán che iyáeyag , neenguh be-ezhá minowâ che ezhewininnuhgook , neen tebinowa che iyáeyán ; me giya keenowâ che iyáeyag .
43014004	Kekekandánâwâ , azháeyán , kekekandánâwâ anumōk .
43014005	Thomasdush otinnân , Neendogemám , kâ neenkekanduhzemin azháeyun , áneen ga ezhe kekandumáng anumōk ?
43014006	Jesusdush otinnân , nemikunnow , neen tabwawinnewun , neen bemátizzewin kâ oweuh aninne obeotissán ōsemá meatuh neen ōnje .
43014007	Kishpin kekanemeyagobun , ketáge kekanemáwâ giya ōsemá , nōngumdush kekekanemáwâ kegewâbomáwâ .
43014008	Philip otinnân , Neendogemám , wâbundi-isshinnâng ōsema , me e-e memenik che totowweyâng .
43014009	Jesusdush otinnân , kitche keenwazh ketá nuh gewejewinninnim , kâ muhshe , kekekanemisseem innuh Philip ? ween gá wâbomit , ogewâbomán ōsemá , áneen o-o wanje ekettoeyun , wâbundi-isshinnâng ōsemá ?
43014010	Kânuh ketabwayanduhze , neen ōsemá weowwink neendiá , ōsemádush neowwink iá ? ekettowinun aeninnuhgook , kâ tebinowa neendikettose , ōsemádush neowwink ayát ween uhmoke uhnokewinun .
43014011	Tabwa-andumōk ōsemá , weowwink neendiá uhgamá tabwa-anemisshig uhnokewinun ōnje .
43014012	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwayanemit , uhnokewinun , anunnokeyán me giya ween ga innunnokeet , owushemadush kitche uhnokewinun tuhtotum ōnje nōs eendizzhánun .
43014013	Owwagotogwan ga ezhenundotumowagwan neenduhnozowinink , kegun totonim , ōsemá tuh kitchetwâwizze oguisemá weowwink .
43014014	Kishpin kago nundotumag neenduhnozowinink , neenguh totum .
43014015	Kishpin sâgeyag , kunwandumōk neeenguggequawin .
43014016	Neenguh uhnumeatowâ ōsemá , keguh menikdush minowâ bazhek ganiandumeik gâgineek che wejewik .
43014017	Tabwawinne ochichâgomán , áke kâ otá otâpinnegooseen , ōnje kâ owâbomigooseen , kâ giya okekânemigooseen ; keenowâ koshá kekekanemáwâ ; wawane tá keowwewâng , guhtuh iádush keowwewâng .
43014018	Kâ keguh nuhgunissinnōnim , chebwâ nuhniandumag keguh beotissininim .
43014019	Wiebuh , áke kâ minowâ neenguh wâbomigooseen ; keenowâdush kewâbomim ; giyadush , ōnje neembemátiz , keenowâ keguh bemátizzim .
43014020	Eu gezhigut , keguh kekandám beenjinnuh nōs keche iyáeyán , keenowâ giya neembeenjinnuhwânik keguh iám neen giya kebeenjinnuhwánewâng neenguh tiá .
43014021	Ween ayát neenguggequawin , giyadush kunwandunk , ween neensâgeik weendush siágeit nōsun oguh sâgeigōn , neen giya neenguh sâgeá , neenguh wâbunduhándush neow .
43014022	Judasdush otinnân , ( kâween ween Iscariot , ) Neendogemám , áneen o-o ga ezhe wâbundieyâng keow , ákedush wâbomigoosewun ?
43014023	Jesusdush otinnân , aninne sâgeát , oguh , kunwandánum neendikitowinun ; nōsundush oguh sâgeigōn , neenguh be otissánán , neenguh wetegamánándush .
43014024	Weendush siágeissig , kâ okunwanduhzenun neendikitowinun ; ekettowinun n'wândumag kâween neen tebinowawizzissenun , ōsemádush biezhenázho-ōt otebandánun .
43014025	Ono iuheen wândumonuhgook , magwouh wejewinnuhgook .
43014026	Ween niandumeik , Kitche Manito ochichâgomán , ōsemá oguh ezhenázhowân neenduhnozowinink , ween keguh kuhgekemik kokkinná iuheen , keche kunwandumag kokkinná iuheen aeninnuhgook .
43014027	Innuhwandewin kenuhguttuhmonim , neendinowandâsowin kemeninim , kâween áke azhe megewat , ketizzhe menisinonim .
43014028	Kago ketaewân tuh osittáwissinzenōn , kago giya tuh kotájemuggussenōn , kegenōndám gá aninnuhgook neenguh májá minowâdush keguh beotissinim ; kishpin sâgeyag ketá pâpenanemōm , ōnje uhge ekettoeyán ōsemá neendizzhánun ; ōnje owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozeyán .
43014029	Kege-enenim uhbwâ ochichesag , opedush izzhewabuk , che tabwa-andumag .
43014030	Náágutch kâween gwetch minowâ keguh guguhnonissinonim , wagemákundunk o-o áke tuhkoshin , neowwink kâ kago otiáseen .
43014031	Ake neenguh kekanemigoon , sâgeug ōsemá : ōsemá go azhit , che izzhewabizzeyán , mego azhewabizzeyán . Pusegweeg , májátá .
43015001	Neendabwa bemáqutto , nōs ketegeweninnewe .
43015002	Kokkinná otikqunun mánewunzenōk , ototápenán ; kokkinnádush otikqunun mánewungin , obenitonun minowâ owushema che menewung .
43015003	Nōngum keenowâ kebenezim , gegetowinun aninnuhgook ōnje .
43015004	Neowwink iág , keowwewâng giya neendiá , otikqun kâ tá menewunzenōn ezheke , meatuh mejemeking bemáqutōnk , me giya keenowâ andeyag meatuh uhgogeyag neowink .
43015005	Neen neembemáquto , keenowâdush ketotikqunewim : ween neowink ayát , neowink giya neendiá kitche nebewá menewun , neen iásewân kâ ningōt keguh totunzeem .
43015006	Aninne neowink agogisik , wabinnegâzo , otikqun wiabinnegâtagin , nabobutagin , wiabinnegâtagin , aninne omowōnjeittonun 'skotang otuhpuggittonun , chágetawun .
43015007	Kishpin neowink iyáeyag , neengegetowinun giya keowwewâng iag , azhe nundowandumag , mego che menigoeyag .
43015008	O-o nōs ogitchetwâwizze wanje meneweyag me ga ezhe otoskenegameminuhgook .
43015009	Osemá azhe sâgeit , me azhe sâgeinnuhgook ; iág neságewawinink .
43015010	Kishpin kunwandumag neenguggequawin keguh iám nesâgewawinink : azhe kunwandumowug nōs oguggequawinun i-iádush sâgewawinink .
43015011	Ono iuheen , aninnuhgook , neenpápenanemowin keowwewâng tuh iá , kepâpenanemowindush tuh mooshkena .
43015012	O-o neenguggequawin ; sâgeittig , azhe sâgeinnuhgook .
43015013	Kâ oweuh aninne , owushema otáiáseen sâgeittewin , aninne buhgittinnunk obemátizzewin otinowamágunun ōnje .
43015014	Keenowâ neendinowamágunun kishpin izzhewabizzeyag , azhe guhgekeminuhgook .
43015015	Náágutch , kâ neendoskenegamug keguhenissenonim ; oskenegamemá kâ okekanduhzeen otogemámun anuhnokenit ; kokkinná iuheen nōs wanje nōndumánin kekekandummonenim eu ōnje neendinowamágunun kege-enissenonim .
43015016	Kâween kegeonábomisseem , neendush kegeonábominenim , ketánoneninim che meneweyag , euedush meneweyag gâgineek tuh atta ; owwagotogwan ga nundotumowagwan ōsemá , neenduhnozowinink , keguh menigowâ .
43015017	Me ono iuheen azhe guhkekeminuhgook , che sáságeitteyag .
43015018	Ake shinganemigoeyag , keguh kekandánâwâ , neen gá shinganemigoeyán chebwâ shinganemigoeyag .
43015019	Wejeendumag áke , áke ketá sâgeigōnâwâ : ōnjedush kewejeenduhzeenâwâ áke kege onábominenim ákeeng , me áke wanje shinganemigoeyag .
43015020	Kunwandumōk ekettowin aninnuhgook ; otoskenegamemá , kâ owushemá apetandágoozisse otogemámun apetandágoozenit ? kishpin gegooche bátáewât , keguhgooche bátáiggowâg , kishpindush gekunwandumowât neendikittowin , oguh kunwandánâwá kedikittowinewâ .
43015021	Kokkinná , ono iuheen keguh ieendotágowâg neenduhnozowinink ōnja kâ okekanemásewân biezhenázho-onidjin .
43015022	Bwâ takoshinámbán , bwâ guhguhnonugwâbun , kâ mázheninewugizzewin , tágeiáseenâwâ , nōngumdush kâ kago otuggwunuhunzeenâwâ omázheninnewuggizzewinnewâ .
43015023	Ween shânganemit , oshinganemán giya nōsun ,
43015024	Kishpin , totunzewâmbán ono uhnokewinun uzzhiáwât wekâ aninne enuhnokesig , kâ mázheninnewugizzewin otáge iáseenâwâ : nóngumdush nayazh neengewâbomigonánig neengeshinganemigonánigdush neen giya nōs .
43015025	O-oedush izzhewabut ekettowin che tabwawinnewung azhebe-egâtag otepákonegawinnewâng , unishego neenge shinganemigōg .
43015026	Niandumewatdush takoshink , ween ga biezhenázhuhumonuhgook , tabwawinne-ochichâgomán , ōsemán wanjebát , ween neenguh tuhtepájemik .
43015027	Keenowâ-giya keguh tuhtepájemin , ōnje wiazhkut miájetáng ketōnje wejewenin .
43016001	Ono iuheen gá tuhtepájemotonuhgook , che ōnje nishkâtizzetowwissewag .
43016002	Keguh sâgitchewabinnegowâg uhnumeawegumigōnk : kagat , tuh ochichesa pichenuk cheizzhewabuk , oweuh nesik , neenniandumeá Kitche Manito guhtuh enandum .
43016003	Ono iuheen gatotonágwâ ōnje kâ okekanemásewân ōsemán giya neen kâ neenkekanemigoseeg .
43016004	Ono iuheen , gá tepájemotonuhgook , ope ochichesag keguh kunwandánâwâ uhge aninnuhgook ; kâween kegeweendumosenonim ono iuheen wiazhkut miájetáng ōnje magwouh uhwejewinnuhgook .
43016005	Nōngumdush nemájá neendizzhánun gá biezhenázho-ōt , kâdush oweuh andussheyag kekuhquajemisseem azháeyán .
43016006	Oanjedush kege tepájemotonim , ono iuheen , kushkandumowin mooshkena ketaewâng .
43016007	Mozhuk tabwawinnewun aninnnuhgook ; mennoizzhewabut keenowâ uhmájáeyán : kishpin májásewân ; niandumewat , kâ ketá otissiggoosewâ , kishpindush májáeyán keguh biezhenázhuhumonim .
43016008	Opedush takoshink , oguh tebuggindán áke mázheninnewuggizzewin , giya quiuk izzhewabizzewin , giya tepákonegawin ōnje :
43016009	Mázheninnewuggizzewin , ōnje kâ neendabwayanemigooseeg :
43016010	Quiuk izzhewabizzewin , ōnje nōs neendizzhánun , kâween wekâdush keguh wâbomisseem ;
43016011	Tepákonegawin ; ōnje wagemákundunk áke tepákonegâzo ,
43016012	Kiábe kitche nebewá iuheen kewe-enenim ; kâdush ketáge bezindunzeem nōngum ,
43016013	Anawak ope tabwawinne ochichâgomán takoshink keguh kekinnoumágowá kokkinná tabwawin ; kâween ween tebinowa tuh gegetose ; ga nōndunk , me eu ga gegetōt , keguh wâbundiigowâ iuheen ga takoshinomugukin .
43016014	Ween neenguh kitchetwâweik , oguh otâpenán neendiemun , keguh wâbundi-igowâdush .
43016015	Kokkinná iuheen ōsemá ayát neendiemun : me wanje ekettoeyán , oguh otápenán neendiemun , keguh wâbundi-igowâdush .
43016016	Wiebuh náágutch , kâ keguh wâbomisseem ; náágutchdush , minowâ keguh wâbomin , ōnje ōsemá neendizzhánun .
43016017	Ahnintdush otoskenegaman , i-ittewug , wagonan o-o aninnung , náágutch kâ keguh wâbomisseem , náágutchdush minowâ keguh wâbomin ; ōnje giya ōsemá neendizzhánun ?
43016018	Me wanje ekettowât , áneen o-o wanje aketōt , náágutch ? kâ neenkekanduhzemin aketōt ,
43016019	Jesusdush okekandán owwe kuhquajemáwât otinnândush , kagat , innuh keguhguhnonittim , kuhquajindeyag wanje ge-ekettoeyán náágutch , kâ keguh wâbomiseeem , minowâdush náágutch keguh wábomim ?
43016020	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , keguh mowwim , keguh kushkandám : ákedush tuh pâpenanemomuggut , keenowâdush keguh kushkandám , kekushkandumowinewâdush che pâpenanemowinnewunk .
43016021	Equa ope webenenekat , kushkandumowin otián , ōnje otepiegun ochichesa , bâbegadush genegeát uhbenocheun , kâ kiábe okekanduhzeen , kushkandumowin ōnje pâpenanemo aninne uhnegit ákeeng .
43016022	Keenowâdush kushkandumowin ketiánâwâ nōngum ; minowâ keguh wâbominenim ketaewân tuh pâpenanemomuggutōn , kepâpenanemowindush kâ oweuh aninne keguhmukkumigoose .
43016023	E-e gezhigut kâween kago keguh kuhquajemisseem . — Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , wagotogwan ga nundotumowâwagwan ōsemá neenduhnozowinink , keguh menigowâ .
43016024	Kiut kâwekâ , kago kegenundotunzeem neenduhnozowinink ; nundotumōk keguhtiánâwâ , kepâpenanemowinnewâ che mooshkenat .
43016025	Ono iuheen kegeweendumonim kekinowâchegeezhwawinink , opedush guhtuh ochichesa , kâ keguh gnhguhnonissinnonim kekinowâchegeezhwawinink keguh wábundi-innim mezhishuh ōsemá .
43016026	Eu gezhigut , keguh kuhquajemáwâ neenduhnozowinink ; kâ ketenissenonim , che uhnumeatumonigook che uhnumeatowwug ōsemá :
43016027	Onje ōsemá ween tebinowa kesâgeiggowâ ōnje uhsâgeyag , kegetabwayanemimdush she ōnjebáeyán Kitche Manito .
43016028	Osemá uzzhiát neembeōnje ságáum , neen takoshin ákeeng : minowâ nenuggután áke , che ezháeyán ōsemá .
43016029	Otoskenegamundush otigōn , binná , nōngum kemisshisshowwetágoose , kâween kekinnowâchegeezhwawinink ketezhegegetōse .
43016030	Kagat neenkekandámen , kekandumun kokkinná , kâdush oweuh aninne ketá kuhquajemigoose kago : me o-o wanje tabwayandumáng Kitche Manito uzzhiát she ōnjebáeyun .
43016031	Jesusdush otinnân , nōngum ketabwatám innuh ?
43016032	Binná , tepiegun ochichesa shiegwouh ge ochichesa , ope keguh siswashkám papukkân tebinowa aeendáyag ezheke keguh nuhguhzhim ; kâween koshá neen ezhekawizzisse , ōnje kiábe ōsemá newejewik .
43016033	Ono iuheen gá weendumonuhgook neowwink keche innuhwandeyag , ákeeeng , keguh kotuggitōm : kago osittáwandun kago , neengeunnewishkán áke .
43017001	Ono ekettowinun , magwouh Jesus zhiekettōt , ishpemink inábe , ekettodush , nōs , tepiegun ochichesa ; kitchetwâweik keguis giya ween keguis keguh kitchetwâweik .
43017002	Gá ezhemenut mushkâwizzewin che uhnewishkunk kokkinná weyâsemâ , chemenát gâgega bemátizzewin menik ga nundotumowât .
43017003	Me o-o gâgega bemátizzewin , che kekanemikwâ , keen atuh quiuk Manito áweun , giya Jesus Christ , ween gá ezhenázhowut .
43017004	Kege kitchetwâwein ákeeng ; neenge gezhetá uhnokewin gá mezheun che enunokeyán .
43017005	Binná , nōs , kitchetwâweishshin keow ōnje tebinowa kitchetwáwizzewin ayáyungobun áke uhbwâ ozhetōng .
43017006	Neenge kekandumonág , ketuhnozowin uhgew aninnewug gá mezheun ákeeng ; ōnje keen kedebanemápuneeg kegemezheundush ; ogekunwandánáwâ kedikittowinun .
43017007	Onje kekekandánâwâ kokkinná iuheen gá menutwâ ketiemun .
43017008	Neengemenág ekettowinun gá mezheumbun ; oge iánâwândush , ogekekandánâwâ uhge ōnjebáeyán keowwink ogetabwatumōgdush uhbe ezhenázhoeyun .
43017009	Neenduhnumeatumowâg : kâween áke neenduhnumeatunzeen , uhgew atuhgo gá mezheunik ; keen kedebanemág .
43017010	Kokkinná tabanemugik , keen ketebanemág , kokkinnádush tabanemudjig ; neen neentabanemág , neengitchetwâwizzedush weenowâ ōnje .
43017011	Kâ kiábe neendiáse ákeeng uhgew ákeeng iáwug ; kebeotissin . Quiuk nōs , kunwanim uhgew , ketuhnozowinink gá mezheunnik , che bazhekowât keenowind azhe bazhekoyung .
43017012	Menik gá wejewugwâ ákeeng , neengekunwanemág ketuhnozowinink : uhgew gá mezheunik neengekunwanemág , kâ oweuh wunnisshinze , meatuh nisshewunnátizzewin oguisemá ; me ashebe-egâtag , che tabwawinnewung .
43017013	Nōngum kebe otissin , ono iuheen iekettoeyán ákeeng , neempâpenanemowin che mooshkenát weowwewâng .
43017014	Neengemenág kedikittowinun , ákedush ogesheenganemigonáwâ ōnje kâ áke áwissewug azhe iáyán áke áwissewân .
43017015	Kâ ketuhnumeatosenōn che otâpenutwá ákeeng meatuh che kunwanemutwâ wawane .
43017016	Kâ áke áwissewug , azhe áwissewân áke .
43017017	Quiuk ezhe che mennoizzhewabizzewât , ketabwawin ōnje ; kedikittowin tabwawinnewun .
43017018	Biezhenázo-oeyun ákeeng me giya neen azhe ezhenázhowugwâ ákeeng .
43017019	Weenowâ ōnje menno izzhewabizzeán neow , giya weenowâ che mennoizzhewabizzewât tabwawin ōnje .
43017020	Kâween atuh uhgew neenduhnumeatumowâseeg , giyadush weenowâ uhgew ga tabwatungig odikittowinnewân ōnje .
43017021	Kokkinná che bazhekowât , keen , nōs , neowwink azhe iáeyun , me giya neen keowwink azhe iáeyán , weenowâ tuh bazhekowug keowwinnáng áke tuh tabwatumomuggut uhge biezhenázhoeyun .
43017022	Kitchetwâwizzewin gá mezheun , neengemenág ; tuh bazhekowug azhe bazhekoeyunk .
43017023	Bazhekwun neowwinnánink giya bazhekwun keowwinnánin tuh ápiche bazhekowug , ákedush che kekandunk uhbeezhenázhoeyun uhgesâgeutwâdush azhe ságe-eun .
43017024	Nōs ápadush uhgew gá mezheunik che wejewewât uzzhiáyân , oguhwâbundánâwâ neengitchetwâwizzewin gá mezheun ; ōnje kesâgenábun bwâ ozhetōng áke .
43017025	Quiuk nōs , áke kâ kegekekanemiggooseen neendush kegekekanemin uhgewedush ogekekandánâwâ uhgebiezhenázhoeyun .
43017026	Neengetuzzhemág uhgew ketuhnozowin , ōnjittá neenguh tuzzhemág ; sâgeittewin gá sâgeun weowwewâng tuhiáne , giyadush weowwewâng neendiá .
43018001	Jesus gá eeshquâ iekettōt ono ekettowinun , geságáum mámowy otoskenegamun agâmank sebeensink Cedron , ketegânink emá ayág unnebeendega , giya otoskenegamun unnebeendegawug .
43018002	Judasundush ween gá buggittinnegoojin , okekandán emá : Jesus gâgineek ukko iezhápun emá mámowy otoskenegamun .
43018003	Judasdush ogeiáwân ningōtwawân aninnewun giya shemágunisshe ogemán , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya Phariseeun ōnje , betakoshinōgdush emá wâsâkoninjegunne tebinoegunun giya wâswâgunun , giya ushwewinun , obetukkonánâwân .
43018004	Jesusdush okekandánun kokkinná iuheen ga beotissiggoojin , unne ságáum otinnândush , uhnew owwanan nandowâbomag ?
43018005	Oguhnonáwân , Jesus Nazarethink , Jesusdush otinnân , neen neendow , Judasdush ween bagittinnát owejegâbowittowwân .
43018006	Pichenukigo neen neendow ekettōt , uzzhagâbowwewug pongesinōgdush ákeeng .
43018007	Okuhquajemándush minowâ , owwanan nandowâbomag ? Ekettowugdush , Jesus Nazarethink .
43018008	Jesusdush otinnán , neen neendow kege-enenim , nandowâbomewunan , máno uhgew tuh májáwug .
43018009	Ekettowin gá ekettōt che tabwawinnewunk , uhgew gá mezheunik , kâween oweuh newunneáseeg .
43018010	Simon Peterdush uzzhoweshk ogitche gobetōn , obukketawân ogemá sáságewitchegawenine otoskenegamun , okishkuhgunándumowândush ogitchetowwugâne . Malchus ezhenekâzo oskenegis .
43018011	Jesusdush otinnân Peterun , benáun ketuzzhoweshk : menequâchegun nōs gá mezhit kânuh neenguh menequase ?
43018012	Ningōtwawân giya shemágunisshe ogemán , giya Jewun , otogemámewân , ototâpenáwân , Jesusun otuhkobenáwândush .
43018013	Omájenáwândush Annasun otizzhewetowâwán netam , ( ōnje ween Caiphas ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun e-e kenonowin ozhinissun áwewun . )
43018014	Caiphas ween áwe gá enápun tuzzhemát Jewun tá onissheshin ; bazhek aninne che ōnjenat kokkinná anishanâban .
43018015	Simon Peterdush onepenáná Jesusun minowâdush bazhek otoskenegamun , wuhow otoskenegamun ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun okekanemán , unnebeendega mámowy Jesus ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne owegewamink .
43018016	Peterdush áqutchink squândang nebowwe ; 'owedush bazhek otoskenegamun , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne okekanemájin unneságáum oguhnonándush oskenegequan kanowandunk squândem , obeendegunándush Peterun .
43018017	Oskenegequadush kunwandunk ishquandam , otinnân Peterun , kânuh keen ketáwisse , wuhow aninne bazhek otoskenegamun ? ekettodush kâween neendowwisse .
43018018	Oskenegeshug giya shemágunisshe ogemág nebowwewug emá , gepotiwawug kuhkuhzhan gá potiwawât ( kissenánink ) owwuzzowugdush ; Peterdush owejegâbowittowân owwuzzōt .
43018019	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne okuhquajemán Jesusun , otoskenegamene , giyadush oguggequawinne .
43018020	Jesusdush otinnân , neengebugguketágoos ákeeng ; gâgineek neengeguggequa uhnumeawegumigōnk giya kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , gâgineek Jewug unnuhgishkotátewât , kâwekâ gemōch ningōt ono neenge-ekettose .
43018021	Wagonan wanje kuhquajemeun ? kuhquajim uhgew gá nōndowwidjig , gá enugwâ : binná okekandánâwâ gá ekettoeyán .
43018022	Gá eeshquâdush iekettōt , bazhek shemágunisshe ogemá emá , nábowwit onubbuggooshkeninjetowwân Jesusun , ekettodush , me nuh eu azhe guhnonut kitche ogemá sâságewitchegaweninne ?
43018023	Jesusdush otinnân , kishpin gá mutche gegetowânan tebátotun , gá mutche ekettowânan ; kishpindush gá mennogegetowânan ; wagonan wanje bukkittaoeyun ?
43018024	( Annas oge-ezhenázhowân tuhkobenint Caiaphas ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne zhiánit . )
43018025	Simon Peterdush , nebowwe owwuzzōt , otinnáwândush kânuh keen bazhek ketáwisse otoskenegamun ? ekettodush kâween neendowwisse .
43018026	Bazhekdush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otoskenegamun ( anowamájin uhnew Peter gá kishketowwuggawâjin ) eketto , kânuh kegewabomissenōn ketegânink wejewut ?
43018027	Peterdush minowâ eketto , kâween ; bâbegadush pekááquouh nōndágoose .
43018028	Otunnemájesuggábegináwân Jesusun , Caiaphasun zhiánit otizzhewináwân tepákonegawegumigōnk kekeshapáwugguk , kâween ge unnebeendegasewug tepákonegawegumigōnk , bōch tá wenizzewug , ōnje kâ otáge kunwanduhzeenâwâ kubbekosa wekoondewin .
43018029	Pilatedush ságáum otinnân , wagonan buh tepájemut wuhow aninne ?
43018030	Oguhguhnonáwân otinnáwândush , kishpin gemutche totunzikobun kâ ketá , ge betosenonim .
43018031	Pilatedush otinnân uhnew , otâpenik tebákonik , ketebákonegawinnewâng . Jewugdush otinnáwân , kâ ezhe tebákonegawinnewunzenōn che nissint aninne ?
43018032	Che tabwawinnewunk gá ekettōt Jesus , ga inápenat uzzhekettōt .
43018033	Pilatedush minowâ beendegâ tebákonegawegumik onundomándush Jesusun , otinnândush , keen nuh ketogemákundowwâg Jewug ?
43018034	Jesusdush otinnân , keen nuh tebinowa kedikit : bakânizzidjig innuh kegeweendumágōg ?
43018035	Pilatedush eketto , neen innuh neen Jewew ? tebinowa anowamudjig , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug neembe buggittinumágōg keow , áneen gá totumun ?
43018036	Jesusdush otinnân , neendogemáwewin kâ omá ákeeng , iángebun , neendoskenegamug táge megâzowug , kâ táge buggittinumowâsewug , Jewug , nōngumdush neendogemáwewin kâ omá ákeeng iásenōn .
43018037	Pilatedush otinnân keetogemáwenuh ? Jesusdush otinnân , keen kedikit ogemáweyán . Me o-o waquiyag , gá ōnje negeán , me o-o giya buhōnje ezháeyán ákeeng , neendá tabwa akettoeyán , kokkinná tiabwajig onōndánâwâ neendinnawin .
43018038	Pilatedush otinnân , wagonan tabwawin ? gá eeshquâ ekettōtdush , unneságáum Jewun zhiánit otinnândush kâ kago mutche izzhewabizzewin nemikumowâse che gegishkunk .
43018039	Ketizzhetwâm , bazhek neenguh buggittiná kubbekosa wekoondewinink , enandumag Jewug otogemámewân keguh minenim ?
43018040	Azhequawugdush minowâ kokkinná ekettōnk kâween wuhow aninne , Barrabbas koshá . Barrabbas gamotishkid .
43019001	Medush Pilate , azhe otâpenát Jesusun uhbuhshunzháwât .
43019002	Shemágunishugdush menasagâwunzhe owawoqun otozhetōnâwâ uhbezikkōnáwân ōshtegwâninik , miskobeenzikowâgundush obeenzikonáwân .
43019003	Ekettowugdush pâpenanin , Jewug otogemamewân ! obukkittawâwândush oninjewân .
43019004	Pilate minowâ ságáum , otinnândush uhnew , binná kebesâgizzittōn , che kekanemag kago mikumowâsewag , ningōt ono chege mutche izzhewabizzit .
43019005	Jesusdush beságáum menasagâwunzhe owawoqun otiōn mishkobeenzikowâgun giya Pilatedush otinnân , binná aninne !
43019006	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya shemágunisshe ogemág ope wiábomáwât , ázhequawug ekettowug suhsuhgáquoōk . Pilatedush otinnân , keenowá otâpenik , suhsuhgáquo ōk kâ kago neen neengemikumowâse chegemutche izzhewabizzit .
43019007	Jewundush otigōn , tepákonegawin neendiámen , neentepâkonegawinináng tá nebo , ōnje Kitche Manito Oguisun inn'wânittizzo .
43019008	Pilate ope n'wânduuk , eu ekettowin , owushema sagizze ;
43019009	Minowâ unnebeendega , tepákonegawegumigōnk otinnândush Jesusun , ánde wanjebáeyun ? kâweendush Jesus onuhquatowâseen .
43019010	Pilatedush otinnân , kánuh keguhnozhisse ; kânuh kekekanduhzeen keche suhsuhgáquoinnámbán giya ketá buggittinnin anandumán ?
43019011	Jesusdush otinnân kâween ketá kushketoseen mushkâwizzewin ga totowweyumbun meatuh ishpemink ōnje menegoeyun ; me ōnje ween bagittinnumōk , neow mámowy mázheninnewuggizzit .
43019012	Eu ápe Pilate neendáwâch che bugittinnát anandum . — Jewugdush ázhequawug , ekettowug , bugittinnut wuhow aninne , kâween Caesar keguh anowamáse . Oweuh wagemákâzojin , mutche totowân Caesarun .
43019013	Pilatedush n'wândunk eu ekettowin , beságizzeán Jesusun , námátábedush tebákonegawinink , emá Pavement ezhenekâtag , Hebrew unwawindush Gabbatha .
43019014	Ozhetáwug kubbekosa wekoondewin ; ningōtwâswâ tepiegunak Jewundush otinnân , binná ketogemámewâ .
43019015	Azhequawug , ningooche ezhewish , ezhewish , suhsuhgáquo-ōk , Pilatedush otinnân , neenguhsuhsuhgáquowâ nuh ketogemámewâ ? Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush ekettowug , kâ oweuh neendogemámenán meatuh Caesar .
43019016	Medush azhe bugittinnumowât che suhsuhgâquo-ōnt , ototâpenánâwân ningooche otizzhewinnáwân .
43019017	Weendush otunne májenán metigōn wâtuzzhesuhguhgáquo-ōnt ezhádush ewâda aninne weendibbegagunink ezhenekâtag ; Hebrewdush inwawin Golgotha ezhenekâtag .
43019018	Me emá suhsuhgáquowâwât , ánintdush neezh mámowy babazhek etowinnuh , Jesusdush nowwiuhe .
43019019	Pilatedush otoshebeán tepájemowin metigōnkdush otatōn , oshebe-egun ezhebe-egâta JESUS NAZARETHINK JEWUG OTOGEMAHMEWAUN .
43019020	O-o oshebe egun nebewá Jewug ogewâbundánâwâ : emá esus gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt bazhew kitche otanonk ; ge shebe-egâtadush Hebrew inwawinink , giyadush Greek , giya atin .
43019021	Jewugdush oságágewitchegaweninnemewâ otinnáwân Pilateun , kago ween Jewug otogemámewân ezhebegakan meatuh neen Jewug otogemámewân eketto , ezhebekan .
43019022	Pilatedush eketto , gá ozhebeumán , neenge ozhebeán .
43019023	Shemágunishug gá suhsuhgáquowâwât Jesusun ototâpenánáwân agwidjin , onewyuggittōtōnâwân babazhek shemágunishug naningōtink zhuttag obeenzikowâgun giya . Obeenzikowâgun mizze wieguttinne ishpemink giya tubbuhzheesh .
43019024	I-ittewugdush , kago begobetosetá , uhtuhtetá owagwan ga iágwan : azhebe-egâtag che tabwawinnewunk ; ágweyánin nanáwinnuhmátewug , neembeenzikowâgundush uhtátewug . Shemágunishug me o-o andotumowât .
43019025	Jesusdush gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt cheegeiuhe nebowwewug Jesus ōgeen , ōgeendush wetiggikkoone giya Mary Cleophas wewun giya Mary Magdalene .
43019026	Jesusdush ope wiábomát ōgeen , siágeájindush otoskenegamun nebowwinit , otinnán ōgeen , equa , binná keguis !
43019027	Otinnândush otoskenegamun binná keguh ! Euedush ope wuhow otoskenegamun omájenán tebinowa andát .
43019028	Gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk , me Jesus kekandunk ishquákumink , kokkinná iuheen azhebe-egâtag che tabwawinewunk , eketto , neweminnequa .
43019029	Otossowin atta mooshkena shewâbo ; omooshkenabunáwândush skiebánun shewâbo ōnje , hyssopinkdush otussáwân skiebánun , otonininkdush otattowâwân .
43019030	Jesusdush ope nasetopetunk shewâbo , mesuh gegezhetáng eketto ; shuggushkequane bugittinátdush ochichâgwun .
43019031	Jewugdush ōnje magwouh ozhetáwât kubbekosa wekoondewin , kâ oweuh tuhge ogotasininne unwabewinnegezhigut , ( e-e unwabewinnegezhigut kitche gezhigut , ) okuhquajemáwán Pilateun , okâtun cheboquowunnaowint , ningoochedush keche ezhewenint .
43019032	Shemagunishug be-ezháwug , obokogâtawâwân netam uggoojininidjin giya unne bazhek ayeesh suhsuhgáquiegâzowâjin .
43019033	Watissáwât Jesusun , wiábomáwât ázhia genebonit , kâdush obokogâtawâsewân :
43019034	Bazhekdush shemágunish , oshemágun obuhzhebowân Jesusun weowwinink , bâbegadush , misque ōnjegâne , giyadush nebe .
43019035	Ween wiábundunk , oge oshebeán , gá oshebeunkush tabwawinnewun , okekandándush uhtabwat , che ōnje tabwa-andumag .
43019036	Ono iuheen gá izzhewabuk , azhebe-egâtag che tabwawinnewunk , okunun kâ tuh bokoegâtaseninnewun .
43019037	Minowâdush bazhek azhebe-egâtag , oguh gunowâbomá wân uhnew gá buhzhebuhwâwâjin .
43019038	Gá eeshquâ izzhewâbuk o-o , Joseph Arimatheaink , ( Jesus otoskenegamun gemōch koshá enandum ozâm uhgosát Jewun , ) Pilateun okuhquajemán ningooche che ezhewetōt Jesus weowinne : Pilatedush obugittinumowân . Obe-ezhándush emá etotâpenan Jesus weow .
43019039	Nicodemus giya be-ezhá ( 'ow netam gá beotissát Jesusun nebádibbik , ) muskeke obetōn ningōtwâk uhpetinnegwuttinnik , weow che banátusinnenik .
43019040	Ototâpenánâwâ Jesus weow , bebuhgewyán neginōnkdush owweoqui-eginánâwâ mámowy e-e mushkeke , andotátewât Jewug uhni-isshemáwât .
43019041	Gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt emá , ketegânink ; ketegâninkdush , ōshke jebágumik tuhgoo , kâ oweuh aninne muhshe ussáse .
43019042	Me emá buggittanemáwât Jesusun , ōnje Jewug otozhetáwinnegezhigutōmewâ ; jebagumikdush bazhew tuhgoo .
43020001	Netam gezhigut unwabewinnegezhigut májesag , Mary Magdalene , be-ezhá emá , kekeshap bwâ puhguhkábunk , owâbundándush ásin ge konegâtag jebagumigōnk .
43020002	Májebutto , uhbe-ezhát Simon Peterun , giya unne bazhek otoskenegamun Jesus siágeájin , otinnândush , ogetâpenawân ketogemámenánin jebágumigōnk , kâdush kekanemásenám tibbe gá ezhewinnáwâgwan .
43020003	Peterdush unneságáum , giyadush uhgew bazhek otoskenegamun , obeotittánâwândush jebagumik .
43020004	Unne neezhobi-ittewug uhow bazhek otoskenegamundush onuhgunnán Peterun , netamdush betukoshin jebágumigōnk .
43020005	Nowwuggegâbowwe , beenjeiuhedush 'zhenábit , owâbundánun , bebuhgewyán neginōn uzzhuttanik , kâweendush peendegase .
43020006	Simon Peterdush , betukoshin , benopenuhnigoot , unnepeendegadush , jebagumigōnk , owâbundánun bebuhgewyánun neginōn uzzhuttanik ;
43020007	Giyadush bebuhgewyán negin , wâweendibbabizzopun kâ mámowy agwippuneen attasenōn , ningoochedush pukkân ezheka atta , tittebuhpeta .
43020008	Giya weendush otoskenegamun netam gá betukoshink unnebeendega , owâbundán , tabwa-andum .
43020009	Kiut kâ okekanduhzeenâwâpun azhebe-gâtanik uhge ábejebât .
43020010	Otoskenegamundush unnekewawug , tebinowâ andáwât .
