43020011	Marydush , áqutcheiuhe jebágumigōnk onebowwe uhmowwit : magwouhdush uhmowwit nowwuggetá beenjeiuhe uzzhenábit jebagumigōnk .
43020012	Owâbomándush neezh mezhinowan námátábenit , wuhwâbishkizzewug , bazhek oshtegwanewung , bazhekdush ozittáwung , Jesus uhge shingeshink .
43020013	Otinnáwândush ; equa , wagonan wanduhtamoeyun ? otinnândush , ogetâpenáwân Neendogemámun , kâdush neen kekanemáse tibbe ge ussáwâgwan .
43020014	Magwouh 'zheketōtdush bemuskogâbowwe owâbomándush Jesusun nebowwinit , kâdush okekanemáseen Jesusun áwenit .
43020015	Jesusdush otinnân , equa wagonan wanduhtamoeyun ? owwanan nandowâbomut ? metōk ketegaweninne ga nozhit enandum , otinnândush Neendogemám , keen gá otâpenáwuttan weendumowweshin tibbe ge ussut , neenguh otápená .
43020016	Jesusdush otinnân , Mary , obemuskogâbowwittowân otinnândush , Rabboni , Neendogemám , uzzhekettōt .
43020017	Jesusdush otinnân , kago tânginisshekan , kâ muhshe nōs uzzhiát neendizzhe ōmbishkâse : nekânisug ezhán owwe ezhe , nōs neendizzhánun , giya keenowâ kosewâ , Memanitōm giya keenowâ kemanitomewâ ishpemink ayát .
43020018	Mary Magdalenedush obeweendumowân unne otoskenegamun , neengewâbomá Jesus , me o-o gá iezhit .
43020019	Mego e-e gezhigut wanákooshik , netam gezhiguk unwabewinnnegezhiguk májesag squandámun kepáqui-egâtawun otoskenegamun námátábenit ; ōnje ogosáwân Jewun ; Jesus betukoshin , nowwiedush nebowwe ; otinnândush , mennoinnowandeyeuk .
43020020	Opedush eu aketōt , wâbundiewa oninjeen , giya weow , otoskenegamundush pâpenanemowug wiábomáwât Jesusun .
43020021	Jesusdush minowâ otinnân , mennoinnowandeyeuk ; nōs biezhenázho-ōt , me giya neen azhe ezhenázho-onuhgook .
43020022	Magwouh uzzhekettōt , obugittinnámonuttowân , otinnândush , otâpenik Kitche Manito ochichâgwun .
43020023	Uhgew anishanâbag mázheninnewuggizzidjig mánuhwe shâwanemagook , mennowwe shâwandágoosewug , uhgewedush mánuhwe shâwanemasewagook kâ mennowwe shâwandágoozissewug .
43020024	Thomasdush Dydimus azhenekâzōt , bazhek usshenezhidjig , kâ emá iásebun , ope Jesus pándegat .
43020025	Ahnintdush otoskenegamun , otigōn neengewâbománán ketogemámenán , otinnândush meatuh wâbundumowug oninjeen , beenjeninjenán ayazissink suggiegunun , beenjeneninjeneyán giya weowwink kâ neendá tabwatunze .
43020026	Gá niswâswogwunigukdush , minowâ otoskenegamun , magwouh beendik iánik , Thomasdush mámowy ; Jesus beendega , squandamun kepáqui-egâtag nowwiuhedush onebowwe , otinnândush mennoinnowandeyeuk .
43020027	Jesusdush otinnân Thomasun , beshebeninjenin , beenjeninjin eowwink , kago ágōnwatunkan , tabwatun .
43020028	Thomasdush otinnân , Neendogemám , Nemanitōm ;
43020029	Jesusdush otinnân , Thomasun , kewâbum ketabwa-andumdush ; tuh shâwandágoosewug uhgew wiábomisiggook medush tabwa-andumowât .
43020030	Kitche nebená kitche uhnokewinun ánint gá ieendotunk Jesus magwouh wejewegoot otoskenegamun kâ oshebe-egâtasenōn o-o mazeniegunink .
43020031	O-o oshebe-egâta che tabwayandumag , Jesus veen Christ , gâgega bemátizzit Kitche Manito Oguisun ; uhgewedush tiabwa-andungig , gâgineek tuh bemátizzewug otuhnozowin ōnje .
43021001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen , Jesus owâbunduhán weow otoskenegamun , kitche gummink Tiberiasink ; me o-o andotunk wâbundiewât weow .
43021002	Mámowy iáwug Simon Peter , giya Thomas , Didymus ezhenekâzo , Nathanieldush Canaink Galileeink , giya Zebedee oguisun , ánintdush neezh otoskenegamun .
43021003	Simon Peterdush otionân uhnew , neendowwe nojekegoewa ; otinnáwândush , keguhwejeweninneme . Unneságáumōg , owwe bozewug nábequânink , bâbega ; e-e dabekukdush kâ oweuh obeenduhuhnásewân .
43021004	Kekeshapáwugguk , Jesus chegebeeg nebowwe : otoskenegamundush , kâ okekanemáseen Jesus áwit .
43021005	Jesusdush otinnân , uhbenoche-ittōk , weyâs innuh ketiánâwâ ? oguhnonáwân , kâween .
43021006	Otinnândush kitchenikâng , enuhkuhkákayá nábequânink puggish ussub ; keguh mikám : otuhpugginnáwândush , kâdush okushkeásewân wewekobinnáwât , azhe bátieninnit kegoiun .
43021007	Eu ōnje , uhow Jesus siágeájin otoskenegamun otinnân , Peterun , ketogemámenán ; Simon Peterdush n'wândundnk , otogemámewân áwinnit otittebuppinittizzo nojekego obeenzikowâgun , ( pingwoshshâgittebun ) pukkobegwâshkunnedush kitchegummik .
43021008	Ahnintdush otoskenegamun , nábequânasink be-ezháwug ( kâwâsá iásewug ákeeng , neezhwâk tusso tōshqun atuh , ) bemetábánâwân ussubeen mooshkenanit kegoiun .
43021009	Bâbegadush , buhtukkoshinnowât ákeeng owâbundánâwâ ishkota okuhkunzhan , kegoiugdush ábewugdush emá giya puhquazhegun .
43021010	Jesusdush otinnân benik kegoiug nōngum gá nissagwâ .
43021011	Simon Peterdush , otowwe ungwâtábánán ussubbeen kitche nebewá kegoiun mooshkenawun , ningōtwâk usshe nánemetunnuh usshe niswa , ánuh tusshewât kâ ningooche ussub pekooshkâse .
43021012	Jesusdush otinnân , bewesinig , kâdush oweuh otoskenegamun okuhquajemigooseen owwagwan wiáwegwan ? ozâm shágwanemowug okekanemáwân Kitche Manito áwinnit .
43021013	Jesusdush obeotâpenán puhquazhegun , omámenán , giya kegoiun .
43021014	Me o-o nissink , Jesus owâbunduhát weow , otoskenegamug gá áquo ájebebát .
43021015	Gá eeshquâdush weessinnewât , Jesus otinnân Simon Peterun , Simon , Jona oguisun , nowutch innuh kesâge azhe ságeutwâ uhgew ? Otinnândush , á , Neendogemám , kekekandán sâgeinnán . Otinnândush usshum nemanishtânisanshemug .
43021016	Minowâdush , otinnân , Simon , Jona oguisun , kesâge innuh ? Otinnándush , á , Neendogemám , kekekandán , sâgeináu . Otinnândush , usshum nemanishtânisshemug .
43021017	Otinnândush minowâ , me nissink , Simon , Jona oguisun , kesâge innuh ? Peterdush osittáwandum ōnje otinnân nissink , kesâge innuh ? Otinnândush , Neendogemám , kokkinná kago kekekandán , kekekandán sâgeinnán . Otinnândush , usshum nemanishtânisshemug .
43021018	Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , magwouh oskenegeun , kekitchepinnittizonábunukko anandumunigodush , kege-ezhá , opedush kekáeyun , keguh shebinnekan oweuhdush , keguh tuhkobnik , che iezhewinik , uhmeenwanduhzewun keche ezháeyun .
43021019	O-o aketōt , me kekinnowâzetágoozit ga inápenat che kitchetwâweát Kitche Manitōn . Gá eeshquâ o-o iekettōtdush , otinnân , nopenuhzheshin .
43021020	Peterdush gwakegâbowit ienábit , owâbomán otoskenegamun Jesus siágeájin , onopenuhnigoot , ( mego uhnew magwouh wesinnewât anákooshik , gá iásotikquashinit Jesus okakegunink , ekettodush , owwanan uhow buhgittinumagat keow neendogemám ?
43021021	Peterdush , owâbomán , 'zhenánit Jesusun , Neendogemám , áneen uhow aninne wâieendit ?
43021022	Jesusdush otinnân , anandumán , che beit che takoshinán , ningōt ono nuh keen ketáint ? nopenuhzheshin .
43021023	O-oedush ekettowin , ogepapámowwuttissáwân wejekewaewân uhnew otoskenegamun cne nebosig : kâween Jesus koshá oge-enán , kâ oguh nebose , meatuhgo gá ekettōt , anandumán , che beit , che takoshinán , ningōt ono nuh ketáint ?
43021024	Me uhnew otoskenegamun , gá tebátotunk ono iuheen , giya gá oshebeunk ono iuheen ; neenkekandámendush aekettōt tabwawinnewun .
43021025	Nebená giya pukkân iuheen Jesus ge ieendotum , kishpin kokkinná ezhebe-egâtag , kâ áke anegoquág tuh tabishkenasenōn mazeniegun , menik ga ozhebe-egâtagebun . Amen .
44001001	Neenge oshebeán e-e mazeniegun natumissink , oh Theophilus , kokkinná gá i-izzhewabizzit , Jesus gá ieendotunk giya i-izzhe guggequat ,
44001002	Nánázh e-e gezhigut , ishpemink ezhe ōmbishkât , gá eeshquâ tát uhgeguhgekemát otoskenegamun , gá guhgegenájin Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ōnje :
44001003	Ogewâbunduhán otoskenegamun eu weow ope gá eeshquâ kuggwâtuggeint uhge nissint , nebewá quiuk tabwawin , nemetunnuh tussogwun ge wâwâbomá uhge tebátotunk iuheen Kitche Manito otogemáwewin :
44001004	Ope mámowy nuhquashkotátewât oguhgekemán , che nuhguttunzikwâ Jerusalem che beáwât Kitche Manitōn gá ezhe wâweendumágowât , gá ezhe weendumonuhgook .
44001005	John kagat , nebe ge ōnje baptizewa ; keenowâdush Kitche Manito ochichâgwun keguh ōnje baptizeágowizzim wiebuh , chebwâ nebewâ tussogwuniguk .
44001006	Minowâ ningōtink , nuhquashkotátewât okuhquaiemáwân ekettōnk , Neendogemám , nōngum innuh nayáb keguh mezhemin tebinowa neendogemámenán che ogemákundowweyumint ?
44001007	Otinnândush , kâween keenowâ keguhgeweendumágoseem ga izzhewabuk ōsemá ween omushkâwizzewin .
44001008	Keguhtiánâwâ mushkâwizzewin ope ochichâgomá ga otissinág ; keguh wetokowwim Jerusalemink , giya Judeaink , giya Samariaink , giya uhnōch pukkân ánint ákeeng .
44001009	Magwouhdush zhiekettōt ono iuheen , magwouhdush uzzhenábewât , ishpemink ezhe otâpinegowizze ; ánáqutōnkdush oningwâbomáwân .
44001010	Magwouhdush , ishpemink kuhgân uzzhenábewât , gá ezhe ōmbishkât , binná neezh aninnewun , owejegâbowittâgowân , wâbishkekoniawun ;
44001011	Ekettowugdush , Galilee aninnewetōk , áneen azhe gâboweyag ishpemink kuhgân 'zhenábeyag ? Mego uhow Jesus watâpenumágoyag , ishpemink gezhigōnk ōnje , minowâ násáb ga ezhenágoozit azhinnowag gezhigōnk ezhe ōmbishkât .
44001012	Jerusaleminkdush ezháwug , wudjewink Olivet ōnje májáwug , neezho tepiegun apeechá , ( unwabewinnegezhigut bamosang . )
44001013	Takoshinnowâtdush wegewamink beendegawug , ishpemink ágwetochegâtanik ezháwug uzzhowwe beowât Peter , James , John , Andrew , Philip , Thomas , Bartholomew , Matthew , James , Alpheus oguisun , Simon Zelotes , giya Judas , James wekânisun :
44001014	Kokkinná uhgew , mámowy mozhug uhnumeáwug , mámowy equawun giya Mary , Jesus ōgeen , giya wekânisun .
44001015	Ono gezhigutōn Peter nebowwe , nowwiuhe Jesus otoskenegamun , unnewâjewâjin , ekettodush , ( andusshewât uhgew otuhnozowinnewân , ningōtwâk usshe neezhtunnuh , )
44001016	Aninnewetōk , wekânissetōk , kiut David odikittowin gá iekettōt , Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ōnje ōnjittá tuh mooshkena tabwawinnewun tuzzhemint Judas , ween gá kekinnowizzhewat uhge otâpenint Jesusun .
44001017	Gewejewegominábun , punge otōnje tebandánábun o-o ezhetwâwin .
44001018	Wuhow aninne , ketegân oge kishpinuttōn , omutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje pongesinkdush getátocheshin nowwemissud , kokkinnádush onuggizzheen segesanewun .
44001019	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag Jerusalemink andánukkejig , okekandánâwâ , euedush ketegân tebinowa otinwawinnewâ , Aceldama , otitánâwâ , me eu misque ketegân uzzhekettōnk .
44001020	Nagumone mazeniegunink ozhebe-egâta , owegewam tuh bizzhishshegwuttane , kâ oweuh aninne tuh tásewun ; bakânizzinidjin aninnewun nábishkágōn .
44001021	Me ōnje , bazhek wuhow aninne , gá wejewinunk mozhuk , gá ápeech wejewinunk Jesus ,
44001022	Ope wiazhkut John biáptizewat Jesusun nánázh e-e gezhigut , ishpemink gezhigōnk ge ōnje otâpenumágoeynnk , guhtuh onákona bazhek che nábishkowât che kekandágoozit che ábejebát .
44001023	Neezhdush otonuhgimáwân Joseph Barsabas ezhenekâzo , giya Justus ezhenekâzo , Matthiasdush bazhek .
44001024	Uhnumeáwugdush , ekettowug , keen , Kitche Manito , kokkinná kakanemutwâ aninnewug azhetahawât , áneen uhow uhgew neezhewât , kekinnoummowweshinâng ga onuggimut ,
44001025	Otá otâpenán ánint o-o ezhetwâwin , Judas omutche izzhewabizzewin gá ōnje pongesink , tebinowa otizzháwinink che ezhát .
44001026	Tátewugdush , Matthiasdush bukkenága , weendush owejewân , asshe bazhekwunidjin anoninjin .
44002001	Ope gezhigut Pentecost wekoondewin wachichesag , mámowy iáwug bazhekwunōnk .
44002002	Ningōtinkigo kago betwawane gezhigōnk ōnje bátánemukkin , inwawane mooshkena , wawane e-e wegewamink uhnámátábewât .
44002003	Owâbundánáwâ kago nasowwâkootanuhnewangin ezhenágwuttinne , babazhek andusshewât weowwewâng attane .
44002004	Kokkinnádush mooshkenashkágowân Kitche Manito ochichâgwun : medush májemiugwawât , pukkân inwawin ochichâgwun azhe menigowât inwawin .
44002005	Ieendáwugdush , emá Jerusalemink , Jewug mennoizzhewabizzidjig aninnewug , uhnōch papukkân azheweenzojig .
44002006	Opedush o-o nánōch anenōndumink kitche nebená anishanâbag bemowōnjeittewug mámukkâtandumōg , ōnje uhnōndowâwât uhnew aninnewun , kokkinná aeenwawât uzzhinwanit .
44002007	Kokkinná mámukkâtandumōg ekettowugdush mámukkâttuhkumik uhgew aninnewug : kânuh ween uhgew giágegetojig kokkinná Galileeweninnewissewug ?
44002008	Ahneen o-o azhenōndumunk , kokkinná o-o papukkân ketinwawininnánin , gá ōnje negeunk ?
44002009	Parthianug , Medug , Elamitug , Mesopotamiaink andánukkejig , Judeaink , Cappadociaink , Pontusink , Asiaink ,
44002010	Phrygiaink , Pamphyliaink , Egyptink , Cyreneink , Romedush , uhgew wanjebájig , Jewug giya proselytug ,
44002011	Creteug , giya Arabianug , kenōndowânánig kokkinná gá gegetowât tebinowa ketinwawinináng otebátotumink Kitche Manito otunnokewin .
44002012	Kokkinnádush mámukkâtandumōg , gweenowe-enandumōgdush , i-ittewug , áneen o-o azhewabuk ?
44002013	Ahnintdush uhgew biápishemajig , ekettowug uhgew aninnewug mooshkenashkágoonâwa ōshke shomenâbo .
44002014	Peterdush pusegwe ashe bazhekwunidjin mámowy , anegōk gegetodush otinnân uhnew , keenowâ Judeaweninnewetōk , keenowâ giya Jerusalemink andánukkeyag , kekandumōk o-o wâeninnuhgook , bezindumōk neendikittowinun :
44002015	Kâween uhgew kewushquabe-ishkissewug o-o aketoeyag nágwut , niswotepiegunat aquo gezhiguk .
44002016	Me o-o atumink kiut mamándáwizzit Joel ōnje :
44002017	Ga izzhewabuk squâch gezhigutōn , ( eketto Kitche Manito , ) neenguh seegwebenán neenchichâg che seguhundumán kokkinná weyâs , keguissugdush , giya kedânisug tuh mamándáwizzewug ketoskenegamug tuh kosâbundumōg , ketokewanze-emug tuh ienábundumōg :
44002018	Ono gezhiguttōn neenchichâgwun ōnje neenguh seguhundowâg , neendoskenegamug giya neembemetágunequamug tuh mamándáwizzewugdush :
44002019	Neenguh wâbundiewa mámukkátandumowin gezhigōnk ishpemink , giya kekinowâtuk ákeeng tuhbuhzheesh , misque giya ishkota giya kitche pukquane .
44002020	Gezis tuh kushke dibbikkissa , dibbikke gezis giya misqueeng tuh ezhenágooze , chebwâ ochichesag e-e gitche ezhe gezhigut , Kitche Manito ogitche gezhigutōm :
44002021	Guhtuh izzhewabutdush , owwagwan ga ezhe nuhnândumōgwan Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , tuh bemátizze .
44002022	Israeleweninnewetōk , bezindumōk , ono ekettowinun ; Jesus Nazarethink , uhnew wanje kekandágoozit Kitche Manito kitche uhnokewinun mámukkâtandágwuk azhe kuhgekinowâtuk Kitche Manito ween gá ōnje ieendotumink magwaiuhe keenowâ tebinowa go kekekandánâwâ :
44002023	Ween gá otâpenint kiut , Kitche Manito ge onuggindán che izzhewabuk , kege otâpináwâ miázheninnewuggizzidjig ōnje kesuhsuhgâquowâwâ giya kegenesáwâ :
44002024	Ween Kitche Manito nayáb gá onishkât , gá ábishkotát weessuggandumowin nebowin ōnjittá kâ pâpish otá meenjimmeniggooseen .
44002025	David koshá tuhtepájemá , neengewâbomá Kitche Manito , gâgineek anosummeskezhik ; neengitchenikkâng iá , kâween pâpish neendá beenjinnetáse :
44002026	Me neendá wanje onánegoosink , neendanenew pâpenanemomuggut , giyadush neweyâs tuh inwashemomuggut buhgoosanemowinink .
44002027	Oanje kâween keguh nuhguhnáseen neenchichâg mutche ishkotang , kâween keguh enanemáse che otissiggoot nebowin siágeut .
44002028	Kegekekandumōzh bemátizzewin , ga ezhe bemátizzeyán keen ga onje mooshkena pâpenanemoeyán keskezhigōnk ōnje .
44002029	Aninnewetōk , wekânissetōk , máno wawane keguh guhguhnonenim gata ōsemá David , ge nebo , giya geningwawâ , ojebagumikdush kewejewegonán nōngo gezhiguk .
44002030	Uhge mamándáwizzit , ogekekandán Kitche Manitōn uhge guggatinnámemigoot magwaiuhe onejânisun che pusegweendinát Christ che námátábenit onámátábewinink ;
44002031	Ween uhgewâbundunk kiut uhgetebátotunk Christ otábejebáwin ochichâgwun kâ mutche ishkotang ogenuhguhnáseen , kâ giya weyâs tuh nebomuggussinne .
44002032	Kitche Manito oge onishkânán uhnew Jesusun , kokkinná o-o kewetokámen .
44002033	Me ōnje ween Kitche Manito ogitche nikkânink gá ōnje ōnishkât ōsemádush gewâweendumágōn , che ezhenizzhuhumágoot ochichâgwun me o-o biezhenázhuhunk o-o wiábundumag omá .
44002034	David kâween ishpemink gezhigōnk , ge-ezháse , ween tebinowa eketto , Kitche Manito otinnân Neengitche Manitomun , neengitchenikkâng námátábin ,
44002035	Nánázh kemiátáwizzemug che totowwugwâ , che tukkokânutwâ .
44002036	Me ōnje kokkinna Israel owejewam otá kekandánâwâ Kitche Manito ogeozheán Jesusun , uhowigo gá suhsuhgáquowag , niyazh Kitche Manito giya Christ .
44002037	Opedush n'wândumowât o-o , checheessumundumōg otaewâng , otinnáwândush Peterun , ánintdush uhgew anoninjig , aninnewetōk , wekânissetōk , áneen ga teyung ?
44002038	Peterdush otinnân uhnew , anwanindizzōk keguh baptizeág kokkinná andussheyag , Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , che mennoweshâwandágooseyag keguhtianâwâ Kitche Manito ochichágwun .
44002039	Wâweendumátewin keenowâ keguhtiánâwâ giya kenejânissewâ oguhtiánâwâ kokkinná giya wâsâ ayájig , menik neengitche Manitomenán ga onanemát .
44002040	Nebewá giya ekettowinun ieketto , ekettōnk , bemájeittizzook pukkawinikkook uhgew mache izzhewabizzidjig anishanâbag .
44002041	Menikdush piápenanemonit uhbebezindágoot odikittowinun baptizeáwug , mego e-e gezhiguk nissink metoswâk tusshewun wâtōkagowâjin .
44002042	Ahwunjishdush anegōk mushkâwetágoosewug anoninjig kuhgequawât , otuhpeechigo bobokobetōnâwâ puhquazhegun , giya uzzhuhnumeáwât .
44002043	Sagizzewin ototissiggōn kokkinná anishanâbag , kitche nebewá mámukkâtandumowin ge ieendotumōg anoninjig .
44002044	Kokkinnádush tiábwatungig , mámowy i-ittewug kokkinnádush , otebinowizzewinnewâ omámowy tebandánâwâ .
44002045	Otátáwanâwâ otunnokâjegunewâ omátáonáwân , kokkinná aninnewun menikigo kago azhemanazewât .
44002046	Andusso gezhigutinik , uhnumeawegumigōnk iáwug , obokobetōnâwâ puhquazhegun uhnōchigo wegewamink , unmámejewât weyâs pâpenanemowát mennotáhawât .
44002047	Megwetchenáwât Kitche Manitōn , mennowânegoozeittowát kokkinná anishanâban . Kitche Manito otuhpeech buggittinnán andussogezhiguk uhgew wâbemájeinjig .
44003001	Peter giyadush John mámowy , unnebeendegawug kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , eu tepiegun uzzhuhnumeáwât ; me shângusso tepiegunak .
44003002	Bazhekdush aninne , nágitigo ōnje , mámánjegoose , ezhewinná andussogezhigutinik owwe ussá , squandamink , eu wanissheshink squandam kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , owwe nundotumágat .
44003003	Wiábomát Peterun , giya Johnun owwe beendeganit kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , onundotumowân shoneán .
44003004	Peterdush anegōk ogunnowâbomán mámowy Johnun , otinnândush , kunnowâbomisshinâng .
44003005	Nánáguttuhwâbomándush , uhbogosanemát kago che menigoot ,
44003006	Peterdush eketto , shoneá giya ozâwâ shoneá kâ kago neendiáse : azhetunnneyánigo , kemenin , Jesus Christ Nazarethink , otuhnozowinink , pusegween , bamosan .
44003007	Osugginnekanándush , ogitchenikâng pusegweendenát , bâbegadush ozittun giya okâtun mushkâwizzemuggutinnewun .
44003008	Pusegwedush , nebowwe giya bamosa , otunne beendega weewân kitche uhnumeawegumink , bamosat , unne gwâshgwâshonit , megwetchenát Kitche Manitōn .
44003009	Kokkinnádush anishanâbag , owâbomáwân bamosanit mewetch uzzhenánit Kitche Manitōn .
44003010	Okekanemáwândush wuhow áwit ukko námátábepun anissheshink squandámink kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk : máukkâtandumóg mámukkâttuhkumik azhe shâwandágoozit .
44003011	Mamánjegoosepun aninne , gá nojemoint , meenjimenát Peterun giya Johnun , kokkinná anishanâbag mámowy uppi-ittewug squandamink Solomon otishquandam ezhenekâta , kitche mámukkâtandumōgdush .
44003012	Peterdush wiábomát oguhnonán anishanâban ekettōnk , Israel aninnewetōk , áneen azhe mámukkâtandumag o-o ? áneen o-o azhe mámukkâzâbumeyâng , neenowindigo tebinowa , nemushkâwizzewininnáng giya nemennoizzhewabizzewininnáng wanje bamosat uhow aninne ketenandámwâtōk ?
44003013	Abraham Ogitche Manitomun , Isaac Ogitche Manitomun , giya Jacob Ogitche Manitomun , nōsenánig Ogitche Manitomewân oeegitchetwâweán Oguisun Jesusun ; keenowâ kege buggittinnáwâ , kâ neenkekanemásenán kedikittōm , anosumeet Pilate ope ánuhwebuggittinnát .
44003014	Kâ kewetabwatowâsewâ quiuk manoizzhewabizzit ; nashewashkiddush kegenundomáwâ che buggittinint ;
44003015	Kegenetōnâwâ ogemá bemátizzewin , Kitche Manitodush oge ábejebáán ; neenowind neenkekandámin ,
44003016	Kagat , mushkâwandumowin , otuhnozowinink , me wuhow aninne wanje mashkawizzit , kewâbundán giya kekekandán , kagat mushkâwandumowin otuhnozowinink , me wuhow aninne wânje mushkâwizzit uhbamosat wawane anosumeyag kokkinná .
44003017	Nekânisetōk , neenkekandán , ōnje kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ , gá ōnje totumag , giya kenegânizzemewâg .
44003018	Ono iuheen , kiut Kitche Manito gá tebátotungin , omámándáwizzemun otonink ōnje ; me e-e che tabwawinnewunk , Jesus Christ che kuhgwâtugittōt .
44003019	Me ga ōnje osittáwandumagobun , nánáguttuhwandumōk , kemutche izzhewabizzewinnewâ konemá tuh ikkowabinnegâta , magwouh uzzhōshkenágwittōng pichenuk she ōnjebámugguk Kitche Manito uzzhiát ;
44003020	Keguh beizzhenizzhuhumōg Jesus Christ ween gá kuhgekemeninág kiut :
44003021	Gezhik oguh kunwanemigōn , nánázh che ábwashkág kokkinná kago , Kitche Manito gá iekettōt omamándáwizzemun otoninning ōnje , oppinná biukko ákewung .
44003022	Moses , giya oge-enán nōsenánin , Kitche Manito Kemanitomewâ , keguh pusegweendenumágowâ bazhek ga mamándáwizzit kitchekewaewâ , azhewabizzeyán , me ga izzhewabizzit ; keguh bezindowâwâ , kokkinná ga i-innenág .
44003023	Tuh izzhewabut , kokkinná ga bezinduhwâsigwâ uhnew gá mamándáwizzinidjin tuh banátizzewug magwa anishanábag ōnje .
44003024	Binná , kokkinná mamándáwizzidjig , Samuelun ōnje , uhgew ane iyáne kashkotátejig menik aneguggequawât , kokkinná ogetebát otánâwân ono gezhigutōn .
44003025	Keenowâ mamándáwizzidjig onejânisewâ , wâweendumátewin , Kitche Manito gá wâweendumowât kōsenánin , ketonejânissimegonáwâ gá anát Abrahamun kenejânissug ōnje , kokkinná anishanâbag ákeeng tuh ōnje shâwandágoozewug .
44003026	Keenowâ netam , Kitche Manito oge pusegwindenán Oguisun Jesusun , otezhenázhowân che be owwe shâwanemenág keche ukkowabenumonág kokkinná kemutche izzhewabizzewinnewâ .
44004001	Magwouhdush guhguhnonát anishanâban , sáságewitchegaweninnewag giya wagemákundunk kitche uhnumeawegumik , giya Sadduceeug , obeotissigowân ,
44004002	Uhbe mowwenaogowât , ōnje e-e guhgekemâwât anishanâban ábejebáwindush tuhgomuggut uzzhekettowât Jesusun ōnje .
44004003	Otukkonáwândush , okepáquowâwân uhbetowât chewâbuninik , wanákoshininink eu ope .
44004004	Nebewádush uhgew n'wândungig ekettowin tabwa-andumōg , nánun metoswâk kōsewug uhgew tiabwatungig .
44004005	Gá izzhewabukdush wiábunk , nâgânizzidjig , giya okewanzeug , giya oshebe-egaweninewug ,
44004006	Giya Annas , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne giya Caiphas , giya John , giya Alexander , giya kokkinná anowamájin , omow ōnjeittewug Jerusalemink .
44004007	Nowwiuhedush gá námátábeáwát , okuhquajemáwândush , wagonan mushkâwizzewinnenan , wagonan onozowinnewenan wanje totumag o-o ?
44004008	Peterdush mooshkena , Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , otinnân , keenowâ nâgânizzekundowwagwâ anishanâbag , okewanzeug Israelitug ,
44004009	Kekuhquajeminim innuh gá totowwungid uhow nanepinizzit aninne , gá ōnje nojemōt ?
44004010	Máno kokkinná keguh kekandánâwâ giya kokkinná anishanâbag Israelink , ween Jesus Christ Nazarethink , otuhnozowinink , ween gá suhsuhgáquowag , ween Kitche Manito gá ábejebát , ween ōnje wuhow aninne wanje nebowit anosumeyag , gá nojemōint .
44004011	Me o-o e-e ásin , gá wabinumagobun , keenowâ wazhegajig nōngumdush nâgânissink ishquaiuhe wegewamink .
44004012	Kâween kago bakâunk onozowin , anámiuhe gezhigōnk menáse aninne che ōnje kunwandágoozit .
44004013	Opedush wiábundumowât mushkâwetahawât Peterun , giya Johnun , opedush wiábundumowât kâween gá negânizzidjig áwissebuneeg , mámukkâtandumōg ; onánáguttuhwanemálush , uhge wejewânit Jesusun .
44004014	Uhnew aninnewun gá nojemoiminjin wejegâbowwittowârât , kâ kushketosewug ningōtono we enáwât .
44004015	Opedush siágitchenáznowâwât Peterun giya Johnun , otuz hindánâwân ,
44004016	Ekettōnk , áneen o-o ga ge totowwungwâ uhgew aninnewug ? kitche uhnokewinun o-o aeendotumowât kokkinná kekanjegâtawun , emá , andánukkejig Jerusalemink kâ ketá kushketosemin che ágoonwatumunk .
44004017	Ketá kuhgwasageánanig keche kuggequasigwâ minowâ eu nozowinnink ashkum wâsâ che kekandágoosinōk .
44004018	Onundomáwân ogenuhumowâwândush wekâ che kuhgequasigwâ Jesus otuhnozowinink ,
44004019	Peterdush giya John oguhnonáwân otinnáwân , keenowâ tebákonumōk nowutch innuh tá onissheshin keenowâ che tabwatágoeyag ga ezhe tabwatowwungid Kitche Manito .
44004020	Onjitta neenguh iekettomen ono iuheen gá wâbundumáng giya gá nōndumáng , kâ neenkushketosemen che iekettosewâng .
44004021	Opedush minowâ gá eeshquâ nánebekimáwât obuggittenáwán kâ mikkunzenâwâ ga ōnje mutchetotowâwât , anishanâbag ōnje kokkinná aninnewug okitchetwâweáwân Kitche Manitōn , o-o gá totumink ōnje .
44004022	Nemetunnuh tusso peponuggizze uhow aninne gá nojemoint .
44004023	Gá buggittinninjig otizzhánâwân wâjewâjin , otebetotánâwâ kokkinná ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne giya okewanzeun gá i-igowât .
44004024	N'wândumowâtdush , anegōk oguhnonáwân Kitche Manito mámowy ekettowugdush , Kitche Manito , Nemanitomenán keen kege ozhetōn gezhik , giya áke , giya kitchegumme kokkinná giya ayág ;
44004025	Keen kege eket ketoskenegam David otonink ōnje , wagonan wanje nishkâtizzewât miátáwizzidjig anishanâbag , wagonan anishanâbag wanje kuhgepát andumowât ?
44004026	Wagemakundungig áke pusegwewug , nâgânizzidjg mowōnjeittewug nishkanemáwât Kitche Manitōn , giya nishkanemáwât Christun .
44004027	Kagat tabwawin ōnje , onishkanemáwân kenejânisum Jesusun , gá onábomut Herod giya Pontius Pilate , giya miátáwizzidjig mowōnjeittewug ,
44004028	Owwetotumowât gá enandumun che totumowât .
44004029	Binná , Kitche Manito , náguttuhwandun gá ezhe nanibbekimeumitwâ , meezh ketoskenegamug , che mushkâwetahayâng che gegetoeyâng ,
44004030	Uzzhebinnekaneyun , nojemoeyun , kekinnowâtut mámukkâtandágwut , keguis Jesus otuhnozowinink ga ōnje totumink .
44004031	Opedush gá uhnumeáwât , áke nuhningishkâ emá mámowy zhiáwât ; kokkinnádush mooshkenawug Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , mushkâwetahawug zhiekettowât Kitche Manito odikittowinun .
44004032	Kokkinná anishanâbag tiabwatungig , bazhekwuninne otaewân giya bazhekowun ochichâgowán ; kokkinná aninnewug otebinowawizzewinnewâ , kâweendush meatuh neendebanduhzeen ekettowug , kokkinná otiemewân mámowy tebanjegâtawun .
44004033	Kitche mushkâwizzewinink , anoninjig , oge ezhetebátotánâwâ Jesus otábejebáwin ; Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin kokkinná ototissigonâwâ .
44004034	Kâween oweuh andusshewât , kago onundowanduhzeenâwâ ; kokkinná menik wawejewamejig , giya watukkemejig , otátáwanâwân , obetōnâwâdush shoneá gá innuhgindag iuheen .
44004035	Uhbe buhgittinumowât anoninjig ozittáwâng , omámenáwugdush kokkinná kago nundowandungig .
44004036	Joses , anoninjig Barnabas azheweenâwât , ( azhe ánekunotumink omeenwandumink oguisun , ) Leviteun Cyprusink andánukkeet .
44004037	Ake otián otátáwan , obetōndush shoneá , anoninjig ozittáwâng obebuhgittinnán .
44005001	Bazhekdush aninne Ananias ezhenekâzo , mámowy Sapphira wewun , otátáwanâwâ otinotawizzewinnewâ ,
44005002	Otishkonánándush ánint e-e shoneá ( wewun giya okekanduminne , ) obetōn ánint e-e shoneá , obebuhgittinán anoninjig ozittáwâng .
44005003	Peterdush eketto , Ananias , wagonan wanje ezhetahayun uhgenowishkemut Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , uhzhishkoonumun ánint o-o gá innuhgindag âke ?
44005004	Magwouh uzzhuttag , kânuh ketotiemeseenábun ? gá atándinkdush kânuh tebinowa kemushkâwizzewinink iát ? wagonan wanje o-o enandumun ketaink ? kâween aninne keguhgenowishkemáse , Kitche Manito 'ow kakenowishkemut .
44005005	Ananiasdush , n'wândunk ono gegetowinun , pongeshin buhgittinát ochichágwun , kitche sagizzewugdush kokkinná uhgew n'wândungig ono iuheen .
44005006	Oskenowagdush pusegwewug , ogushkewaginán osâgizzeáwât , owwe ningwuhwâwât .
44005007	Naswotepiegunakdush , náágutch , wewun , beendegawun , kâ okekanduhzeen , azhewabutinik .
44005008	Peterdush otinnân , weendumoweshin , menuhgo o-o gá innuggindag áke ? ekettodush , á , mego e-e gá innuggindag .
44005009	Peterdush otinnân , áneen o-o azhe wetokotáteyag kuhgwadebanemeyag Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ? binná ozittáwân uhgew gá ningwuhwâjig keenâbamun squandang iáwug giya keen keguh sâgizzeiggōg .
44005010	Bâbegadush gepongeshin ozittánink , buggittinátdush ochichâgwun ; oskenowagdush beendegawug omikowâwân uhgenebonit , osâgizzeáwân otowwe ningwuhwâwân ayeezh onâbabamun ?
44005011	Kitche sagizzewugdush kokkinná tabwa-andungig menik giya nōndumowât ono iuheen .
44005012	Anoninjigdush oninjewâng kitche nebewá mámukkâtandumowin kuggekinowâjetotumowin ieendotumōg , magwaiuhe anishanâbag ; ( kokkinná mámowy iáwug Solomon otishquandamink .
44005013	Kâween oweuh bakânizzinidjin anishanâban owetokágosewân : anishanâbandush omámukkâtanemiggowân .
44005014	Tiabwatungigdush owushema otabwatowâwân , Kitche Manitōn , kitche nebewâdush aninnewug giya equawug ; )
44005015	Obenáwândush wiákoozenidjin mikunâng , nebáguning obemeiussáwân Peter uhgowâtashink che bemeuhgowâtashkánâwân ánint .
44005016	Kitche nebená anishanábagdush uhnōchigo otanowun gewetáiuhe Jerusalemink obábenáwân wiákoozenidjin , giya uhnew Mutche Manitōn ga gishkowânidjin kokkinnádush nojemowug .
44005017	Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne , pusegwe kokkinná giya wâtokágoojin ( uhnew Sadduceeug , ) kitche nishkâtizzewug ,
44005018	Otuhkonáwândush anoninjig okepáquowâwândush kepáquotewegumigōnk .
44005019	Kitche Manito omezhinowamundush nebádibbik otowwe bákindanán kepáquotewegumik ; osâgizzeándush , ekettodush ,
44005020	Owwe nebowwik kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , guhnonik anishanâbag kokkinná ekettowinun o-o bemátizzewin .
44005021	N'wândumowâtdush eu , owwe beendegawug kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk kekeshap , uhguhgequawât : ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnedush takoshin , ono giya wâjewegoojin mowōndonundōndewug kokkinná okewanzeug Israel onejânisun uhnokewug che nánintwâ anoninjig kepáquotewegumigōnk .
44005022	Shemágunisshe ogemágdush watittumowât kepáquotewegumik kâ omikowâsewân kepáquo-ominjin , kewawugdush uzzhowwetepájemowât .
44005023	Ekettōnk kepáquotewegumik nemikámen wawane kepáquiegâtag , akowâbidjig giya nebowwewug ishquandang , piákindanumángdush , kâ oweuh aninne nemikowâsenán beendik che iát .
44005024	Sáságewitchegaweninne , giyadush wagemákundunk kitche uhnumeawegumik giya ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug n'wândumowât ono iuheen , gweenowe enandumōg nuhmunj azhewabuttogwan .
44005025	Oweuhdush bazhek betukoshin otigowândush binná uhgew aninnewug gá kepáquowagobuneeg , nebowwewug kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk tuzzhe guhgekemáwât anishanâban .
44005026	Ogemádush giyâ shemágunisshe ogemá , ezháwug onánáwân bakágo obenáwân , ( ōnje ogosáwân anishanâban che bemosiniegowât .
44005027	Opedush bánáwât onámátábeáwân anosumubewât tebákonegajig : ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnedush okuhquajemán ,
44005028	Kânuh kege ginnuhumosenoneme che guggequasewag o-o nozowinink ? binnádush kege mooshkenatōnâwâ Jerusalem o-o guhgequawin , kewebetowwemindush , wuhow aninne omisqueem ketenandámwâtook .
44005029	Peterdush , giya ánint anoninjig , nuhquatumōg , ekettowug , owushemá neendá tabwatowânán Kitche Manito , ga ezhe tabwatowwungid aninne .
44005030	Kōsenánig Ogitche Manitomewân , ge pusegweendenán Jesusun , ween gá nesag , gá uhgonintdush metigōnk :
44005031	Ween Kitche Manito gá pusegweendenát , ogitche nikkâng ōnje che ogemáwit che bemáje-ewat che menát Israelun mashkōtandumowin , giya menowwe shâwanindewin , mutche izzhewabizzewin .
44005032	Neenowinddush newetokámen , neenkekandumozhewamin uhge izzhewabuk ono iuheen giya ochichâgomá kekandumozhewa , ween Kitche Manito mánát tabwatuminidjin .
44005033	Opedush n'wândumowât eu , weessuggandumōg otaewâng , onuggindâssowugdush owwenesáwât ,
44005034	Bazhekdush Pharisee , pusegwe tepákonegawinink , Gamaliel ezhenekâzo , kagequat ukko tebákonegawinink kokkinna anishanâban onáguttuhwanemiggōn , uhnoke che ságizzeintwâ wanebak anoninjig .
44005035	Ekettodush , Israel aninnewetōk , tuttebábig wâieendotowagwâ uhgew aninnewug ,
44005036	Kâgwetch mawesha bwâ o-o gezhiguk , Theudas pusegwe , oweuh áwâkânittizzo : ween newâk aninnewug wekototátewug ; genesá kokkinnádush menik gá bezindágoot , siswashkâwug , kâdush ningōtono inábuhtizzissewug .
44005037	Náágutchdush Judas Galileeink , pusegwe , e-e gezhigut tepáumátink tepáumátewin , nebewádush anishanâban onopenuhnigōn ; ween giya genesá , kokkinnádush , menik , gá bezindágoot siswashkâwug .
44005038	Nōngumdush ketenenim , kago ningōt totowâ kago uhgew aninnewug ; boneik , o-o ezhittwâwin eninuhnokewin aninne ōnje bámugguk , kâ ningōt tuh inâbuhtussinnōn :
44005039	Kishpindush ween Kitche Manito otisshichegawinnit kâ ketá guhwewabenuhzeenâwâ : tuttebábig che megânásewag Kitche Manito .
44005040	Otabwatowâwândush , gá nundomáwâtdush anoninjig , uhbuhbuketawâwân ogenuhumowâwândush , che guggequasigwâ Jesus otuhnozowinnink , medush azhe buggittináwât .
44005041	Májáwugdush nuggutumowât tepákonegawinink , uhpâpenenemowât , ōnje nowutch meenwandumōn Kitche Manitōn ōnje kuggwâtuggittowât Jesus otonozowinnink .
44005042	Andusso gezhiguttinnikdush kâ ōnje kishkōasewug uhbabáguhgequawât Jesus otuhnozowinnink kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , giya andussokumikguk wegewamink .
44006001	Ono gezhiguttōn , ope anebátienowât tabwatungig , ningōtinkigo kekândewug Greekug giya Hebrewug ōnje oshegámewân uhgeinneintwâ e-e gezhiguk uhgemátuhonittink .
44006002	Ashe neezhinidjindush onundomáwân kokkinná otoskenegamewân , ekettōnk , kâween quiuk izzhewabussinōn , che nuhguttuhmung Kitche Manito odikittowin , unnoketuhmungdush otopowinun .
44006003	Me eu ōnje nekânissetōk , neezhwâswa aninnewug onábomik quiuk bamátizzidjig , mooshkenajig ochichâgwun giya nebwâkâwin ; onákoonikōg , che nâgânizzekundumowât o-o ezhetwâwin .
44006004	Neenowintdush gâgineek neenguh uhnumeámen , che guggequayâng kuggequawin .
44006005	Eu ekettowin kokkinná azhemeenwandumōg , Stephenundush otonákonáwân m'washkenat ochichâgomán giya mushkâwandumowin ; giyadush Philip , giya Procorus , giya Nicanor , giya Timon , giya Parmenas , giya Nicolas , Antioch andánukkeet , gá otâpenunk izzhetwâwin .
44006006	Anosumewât anoninjig námátábeáwug gá eeshquâ uhnumeáwât otângenáwân oshtegwâninne .
44006007	Kitche Manito odikittowin ashkum watâpenungig uhnumeawin Jerusalemink ; kitche nebewâ giya sáságewitchegaweninnewug tabwa-andumōg .
44006008	Stepnendush mooshkena mushkâwandumowin giya kitche mushkâwizzewin kitche mámukkâtandágwukkumik ieendotum magwa anishanâbag .
44006009	Ahnintdush pusegwewug tabandungig uhnumeawin Libertinug , giya Cyrenianug , giya Alexandrianug giyadush uhgew Ciliciaink , giya Asiaink , andánukkejig 'zhosittáwanemint Stephen .
44006010	Bōch kâ kushketosewug owwe guggânumowât oguggequawininne .
44006011	Otowwe anonáwândush aninnewun che ekettonit neengenōndowânán wuhow mutche gegetōt mutche enát Mosesun giya Kitche Manitōn .
44006012	Otōmbwamáwândush anishanâban , giya okewanzeun , giya oshebe-egaweninnewun obeotâpenáwândush tepákonegawinninkdush obe-ezhewináwân .
44006013	Otozhetōnâwâ wâezhekuhgenowiskewât owwe bátámáwât , ekettowug mozhug wuhow aninne mutche eketto , etunk o-o uhnumeawegumik giya tebákonegawin .
44006014	Neengenōndowánán wuhow aninne 'zhekettōt Jesus Nazarethink , oguh banájetōn o-o otanuh oguh iánjetōn ezhetwâwin , omá giya oguh iánjetōn tepákonegawin Moses gá meninunk .
44006015	Kokkinnádush námátábidjig , tepákonegawinink , anegōk gunnowâbomáwât owâbomáwân oskezhigōnk mezhinowa oskezhigōnk ezhenágooze .
44007001	Ekettodush ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun kagat innuh , me izzhewabuk ono iuheen ?
44007002	Ekettodush , aninnewetōk , nekânissetōk , nōsetōk , bezindumōk , Kitche Manito gache apetandágoozit owâbunduhán weow Abrahamun , magwouh 'zhiát Mesopotamiaink , uhbwâ tunnuhkeet Charranink .
44007003	Otinnândush nugguttun andánukkeyun , nuggush anowamudjig , be-ezhán o-o áke gakekinnoumonán .
44007004	Medush azhe nuhguttunk e-e tunuhkewin , Chaldeanug andánukewât , owwe tunnuhkeet Charranink , euedush tunnuhkewin ōnje , ope ōsun gá nebonit omá betunuhke tunnuhkewinink andánuhkeyag nōngum .
44007005	Kâdush kago , Kitche Manito omenáseen tebinowawizzewin , kâ pâpish menik knhnága chetukokeet , owâweendumowân ánowy che menát tebinowawizzewin , giya onejânisun che bemátizzinit , kâdush muhshe onejânississe .
44007006	Kitche Manitodush eketto , onejânisun miátáwuhkumigōnk tuh tunnuhkewug tiyuhowwâkânewewug tuh kotuggeáwug newâk tusse kekenonowin .
44007007	Kitche Manitodush eketto , neenguh tebákonág uhgew ga owwâkánnájig , náágutchdush neenguh beuhnoketágōg omá otunuhkewin .
44007008	Owwâweendumowândush gewetázhegâzowin ; Abrahamdush otiáwân Isaacun ogewetázhowândush nashwâswogwunnuhgizzinit , Isaacdush otiáwân Jacobun , Jacobdush me neezhwâchewun iáneka gata ōsun .
44007009	Gata ōsamágdush goosewug uhguhgâwandumowât oge átáwanâwân Josephun Egyptink , Kitche Manitodush ogewejewiggōn Joseph .
44007010	Ogetuhkonándush e-e kuggwâtugittōnit , ototowândush che mennowandágoozit anosumit Pharaoh , omenándush che ogemákunduminit Egyptink , giya kokkinná owegewâm .
44007011	Kitche buhkuttawindush , ototissiggōnâwâ Egyptink , giya Canaanink , giya kitche kotugittowin , nōsenánigdush kâ kago omikunzeenâwâ ga mejewát .
44007012	Jacobdush n'wândunk mandáminun uzzhiánit Egyptink , otuhnonán nōsenánin netam .
44007013	Neezhink azháwâtdush Joseph nissetowwenátewug wekânisun Joseph anowamájindush weendumowâ Pharaoh che kekanemát .
44007014	Josephdush uhnoke , onundomán ōsun Jacobun , kokkinná giya anowamájin ; neezhwâswa metunuh usshenánun tusshewug .
44007015	Jacobdush Egyptink ezhá , nebodush , giya nōsenánig nebowug ,
44007016	Sycheminkdush otizzhewináwân owwe ussáwât emá jebagumik Abram gá gishpinuttōt shoneá , uhgeátáwat , Emmor oguisun , Sychem ōsun , ogegishpinuttowân .
44007017	Opedush kagâ wachichesag , wâweendumátewin Kitche Manito gá ezhe wâweendumowât Abrahamun , anishanâbag netáwiggewug , bátienowug Egyptink .
44007018	Minowâdush , bazhek ogemá pusegwe kâ okekanemáseen Josephun .
44007019	Oguggiazhebumeándush neendinowamáguninánin giya omázhebumeán nōsenánin , me gá ōnje sâgitchewabinnáwât , otōshke uhbenoche-emewân , nánázh che bemátizzissigwâ .
44007020	Opedush , Moses nágit , ápiche ge onisshisshe , niswogezisdush ge netáwiggeá , ōsun owegewamink ,
44007021	Opedush siágitchewabinát , Pharaoh odânisun omikowân ototâpenándush , medush azhe netáwijggeát uzzhoguisekát .
44007022	Mosesdush kokkinná Egyptianug onebwâkâwininne okekandán , kitche mushkâwizze kitche nebwâkâ keezhwa ápiche .
44007023	Opedush nemetunnuh anduswo kekenonowuggizit ototissigōn , otaink mámenonandum , owwemowwuttissat wekânisun Israel otuhbenoche-emun .
44007024	Owâbomándush bazhek mutche totowwemint , otowwe wejegâbowittowân wâtokowwájin , onesándush uhnew Egyptianun .
44007025	Enandum wekânisun che kekanduminit Kitche Manitōn keche buggittinnegowât , ween ōnje ; kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ .
44007026	Wiábuninikdush , owâbunduhán weow , magwouh uhkekândewât otanuhwenuggánán minowâ , ekettodush binná keenowâ wekânissindeyag , wagonan o-o wanje mutchetotáteyag ?
44007027	Weendush machetotowât otinnowamágunun ningooche otizzhegânduhogōn ekettodush owwanan gá ezheik che tebákoneyâng ?
44007028	Ketánish innuh giya neen , gá ezhe nesut Egyptian pichenágo ?
44007029	Mosesdush oshemo , n'wândunk o-o ekettowin , miátáwizzedush e-e ákeeng Midian , andusshe iáwât neezh oguisun .
44007030	Nemetunná andusso kekenowugguk minowâ , Kitche Manito omezhinowamun owâbundi-iggōn weowwinne buggwuttuhkumigáng Sinaiink magwa ishkota uhbishkunag kebeensink .
44007031	Mosesdush wiábundunk mámukkâtandum otunnenázekándush bazhew owwegunowâbundunk , Kitche Manitodush ogegetowin oguhnonigōn ,
44007032	Ekettōnk Neen Kōsug Omanitomewân , Abraham Omanitomun , giya Isaac Omanitomun , giya Jacob Omanitomun , Mosesdush kitche nuhningishkâ sagizzedush che kunowâbundunk .
44007033	Kitche Manitodush otigōn , kezekun kemukkizzenun kezittáng , Kitche Manito otukkeem , emá nebowweyun .
44007034	Neengewâbomág , neengewâbomág , neenduhnishanâbag Egyptink sunnágizzewât , neengenōndowwâgdush mámátwawât , neembenese ōnjittá webemájeugwâ , umba Egyptink keguh ezhe anonin .
44007035	Me wuhow Moses , ono gá mutche guhnonáwâjin , ekettōnk , owwanan gá ezheik che tabanemeyâng , che tebákoneyâng ? mego uhnew , Kitche Manito anonájin , keche tebandunk che bemájewat omezhinowamun oninjenink ōnje , gá wâbomájin kebeensink .
44007036	Obeságizzeándush , ope gá eeshquâ wâbundiewât mámukkáttuhkumik , giya kakekinnowâtuk , uhge ieendotunk Egyptink , giya misko kitchegumink , giya buggwuttuhkumigáng nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin .
44007037	Me wuhow Moses gá ienát Israel otuhbenoche-emun , Kitche Manito Kemanitomewâ oguh pusegweendenán bazhek ga mamándáwizzinidjin kekânissewán magwaiuhe azhewabizzeyán , che izzhewabizzit , ween keguh nōndowâwâ .
44007038	Me 'ow gá wejewâjin uhnumeánidjin buggwuttuhkumigáng , mámowy mezhinowan uhnew gá guhnonigoojin Sinaiink , giya mámowy nōsenánig , gá iájig gegetowin , che meninnungwâ :
44007039	Ween kōsenánig kâ tabwatowâsigwâ , ogemewinnázhowâwân , otaewângdush nayáb Egyptink uzzhekewawug .
44007040	Otinnáwândush , Aaron , ozhetowweshinâng Manitōg ga negânetumowweumintwâ ; wuhow Moses gá ságizzeinnung Egyptink , kâ neenkekanemásenán tibbe anekágwan .
44007041	Pezhekeensundush , otozheáwân ono gezhiguttōn , osáságewináwândush uhnew muzzenitchegunun , pâpenanemowugdush , gá totumowât tebinowa oninjewâng .
44007042	Kitche Manitodush , onuggunán che uhnumeatumowât ohnungwun gezhigōnk ; azhebe-egâtag mamándáwizzidjig mazaniegunewâng , keenowâ Israelitōk , kegewâweendumowim innuh gá negint áwase , buggwuttuhkumigáng nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin ?
44007043	Kagat , kege otâpenánâwâ Moloch omutche-egin , giya kemanitomewâ Remphan otuhnungomun ; mazanichegunun , gá ozhetoeyag che uhnumeatumag : áwâs ewada Babylonink keguh ezhewinnenimdush .
44007044	Kōsenánig wetokâzowin mutche-egin , oge iánâwâ buggwuttuhkumigáng , ween gá ezhe kekinnoumowât Mosesun , gá ezhetōt ga ezhenágwuttinne .
44007045	Eu kōsenánig náágutch gá bemátizzidjig , gá beendegutojig mámowy Jesusun , miátáwizzidjig andánukkewât , uhnew Kitche Manito gá sâgitchenázhowâjin anosummeskezhik kōsenánig , nánázh David ogezhiguttomun .
44007046	Ween Kitche Manitōn oshâwanemigōn owemikân mutche-egin Kitche Manito Jacob Omanitomun che ábetunk .
44007047	Solomondush wegewam otozhetowân .
44007048	Bōch , kâween Kitche Mânito wegewamink oninjemá wanje geschichegâtag táse , me aketōt mamándáwizzit .
44007049	Gezhik neenduhpubbewin , ákedush apizzit abeyán , áneen tinnouh wegewam ga ozhetoeyun ? Eketto Kitche Manito ; ánde neendunwabewin anduhgoog ?
44007050	Kânuh neenninjeen kokkinná ono iuheen ge ōnje ge schichegâtasenōn ?
44007051	Keenowâ chábuhchegwiyuhwaeyag , gáwetázhegâzosewag , mushkâwetahayag , gágineek kenânânduhquoáwâ Kitche Manito ochichâgwun : kōsewâgigo gá izzhewabizzewât mego giya keenowâ azhewabizzeyag .
44007052	Ahneen o-o mamándáwizzit kōsewâg kâ wegooche nissáwâpun ? ogenesáwândush uhnew negân gá tepájemonidjin , takoshin 'ow Quiuk Bazhek , Kitche Manito Oguisun , ween gá buggittenumátink , gá nesint :
44007053	Kitche Manito ochichâgwun ketánuhbetágowâg Kitche Manito otebákonegawin , kâdush kekundowanduhzeenâwâ .
44007054	N'wândumowâtdush ono iuheen , oweessuggetahawug , omuhmutwa ábeta towâwândush .
44007055	Weendush m'wâshkenat Kitche Manito ochichâgwun anegōk enâbe gezhigōnk , owâbomándush Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewininne , giyadush Jesus nebowwe Kitche Manito ogitche nikkânink ,
44007056	Ekettodush , binná , newâbundán gezhik bákishkâ , giya Aninne Oguisun Kitche Manito ogitchenikkânink nebowwe .
44007057	Anegōkdush gegetowug ogebáánâwândush otowwugâwân , omowwinnánáwândush mámowy .
44007058	Osâgitchewabenáwândush otanong , obuhbemosinnááwândush ; wâtokâzojigdush ogezekánâwân obeenzikkowâgunewân Saul ezhenekâzo oshkenowa ozittánink obuggittinánâwân .
44007059	Obemosinnuháwân Stephenun , Stephendush onanábomán Kitche Manito , ekettodush , Kitche Manito Jesus otâpin neenjechâg .
44007060	Ochicheengwunnittá anegōkdush gegeto , uzzhuhnumeát , Kitche Manito , kago ningōtono enanemákan azhewabizzewát , opedush eu aketōt me azhe gowwinggooshe .
44008001	Sauldush meenwandum Stephenun uhnebonit . Eu opedush kitche mutche enanemáwug uhnumeájig Jerusalemink , kokkinnádush siswashkâwug kokkinná anegoquág Judea giya Samaria ; meatuh uhgew anoninjig .
44008002	Manobemátizzidjigdush aninnewun uhnumeájig omájeinnuhwân Stephenun , owwe ni-isshemáwât ogitche mowwemándush .
44008003	Sauldush omutchetotowân uhnumeánidjin , bábeendegadush andussogumiguk wegewamink , sâgitche tábánát aninnewun giya equawun owwe kepáquowát .
44008004	Me wanje siswashkâwât papáguhgequawât kuhgequawin .
44008005	Philipdush ezhá otanonk Samariaink , uhguhgequat Christ oguhgequawin .
44008006	Anishanâbag mámowy tabwatumōg Philip azhe kuhgequat , bezindumowât giya wâbundumowât uhnokewinun ieendotunk .
44008007	Wânizzinidjin Manitōn gagishkowânidjin anegōk uhguhnonáwât , mego sâgizzenotágowát ; nebewâ giya nabowidjig giya mamánjegoozidjig nojemowug .
44008008	Kitche pâpenanemowinnewundush eu otanonk .
44008009	Bazhekdush aninne , Simon ezhenekâzo , kiut cheessukkeegobun ukko eu otanonk , anishanâbandush Samariaink , keche izzhewabizze che enanemigoot .
44008010	Owwedush aninne kitche izzhewabizze , Kitche Manitōn Ogitche Sháwanemigōn enandumōg kokkinná aninnewug .
44008011	Kokkinná otâsumábomáwân ânga kitche maweshá ōnje chácheessukke .
44008012	Opedush tiabwatumowât Philip guhgequat iuheen Kitche Manito 'zhiât wanjemuggukkin giya Jesus Christ onozowin baptizeáwug kokkinná aninnewug giya equawug .
44008013	Simondush ween tebinowa tabwatum giya ; gá baptizeintdush owetegamán Philipun mámukkâtandumdush , ono iuheen kuhgekinowâchetotumowinun aeendotumink .
44008014	Uhgewedush anoninjig , Jerusalemink ayájig , n'wândumowât Samariaink tabwatumowât Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , otuhnonán Peterun giya Johnun , Samariaink che ezháwât .
44008015	Buhtukkoshinowâtdush otuhnumeatumowâwân che otissigowât ochichâgomá .
44008016	( Ká muhshe oweuh pongeshinotágoosewân : meatuh baptizeintwâ Kitche Manito Jesus otuhnozowinink . )
44008017	Otângenáwândush , medush azhe otissigowât ochichâgwun .
44008018	Simondush wiábundunk , anoninjig tiângenáwât ochichâgwun otissigoot owâweendumowân shoneá .
44008019	Ekettodush giya neen mezheshin , o-o mushkâwizzewin , giya neen oweuh tângenug che otissigoot ochichâgwun .
44008020	Peterdush otinnân máno keshoneám mámowy keguh genisshewunátizzin , ōnje ketenandám , Kitche Manito omegewawin , shoneá che ōnje kishpinuttōn .
44008021	Kâween keen kedebanduhzeen punge o-o uhnokewin ; kâween quiuk keta attasenōn , anosumit Kitche Manito .
44008022	Anwanindizzoon kemutche izzhewabizzewin , uhnumeatow Kitche Manito , konemá ketenandumowin ketaink keguh ōnje menowweshâwandágoos .
44008023	Newâbundán ketá , weezobeeng ezhewesuggun , ketowwâkânigoon mutche izzhewabizzewin .
44008024	Simondush nuhquatum , uhnumeatumowweshin che uhnumeatowwut Kitche Manito , kâ kago ono ekettowinun menik aketoeyun neendotissigoosenun .
44008025	Opedush anegōk miáje guhgequawât , Kitche Manito oguhgequawin Jerusalemink ezhekewawug upapáguhgequawâtdush Samariaink .
44008026	Kitche Manito ochichâgwundush oguhnonan Philipun , ekettodush , pusegween , shâwunōnk ezhán , e-e mikkun Jerusalemink wanjemátumōg Gazaink anumōk eu buggwuttuhkumigáng .
44008027	Pusegwedush 'shezhát , binnádush , bazhek aninne Ethiopiaink gewetazhegâzōt , kitche apetandágooze kitche negânandágooze 'ow aninne akowishkowât Candaceun gache ogemákundowât Ethiopianug , okunwandumowân kokkinná oshonéamene , Jerusalemink be-ezhá owwe uhnumeát .
44008028	Magwouhdush unnekewat , námátábit otábánink , ogunnowâbundán Esaias mamándawizzit omazanieguninne .
44008029	Ochichâgomádush otinnân Philipun , bazhew ezhán owwe wetokâzōn e-e otâbánink .
44008030	Philipdush omowwinnuhnán , onōndowân guhguhnotuminit Esaias mamándáwizzit omazaniegun , otinnândush kenissetotán innuh gaguhnotumun ?
44008031	Ekettodush , áneen ga ezhe nissetotumán oweuh atuh aninne , kekinnoumowwit ? Okuhquajemándush Philipun che wetobemigoot .
44008032	Emá uhguhguhnotunk e-e mazeniegun azhebe-egâtag ; manishtânish azhe suggábeginninjin wâtuzzhe nesint ezhenágoose , manistânishans natágegetosig anosuminit bashkooshogoojin ezhenagoose , kâ pâpish ōnje báketōnanisse .
44008033	Opedush gá tubbusse buggittinint otepákonegawin otâpenumowâ , owwanan me uhnew onegeiggōn , ga iggoojin ? obemátizzewin ge otâpinnegâtane ákeeng .
44008034	Oguhnonándush Philipun , ekettodush , kehuhquajemin , ápadush weendumoweyun owwananun ono gá enájin mamándáwizzit , ween nuh go tebinowa weow , oweuh nuh bakánnizzinidjin ?
44008035	Philipdush bákittonane , omáje guhgequa euigo kuhgequawin uhguhgekemát Jesusun oguhgequawininne .
44008036	Magwouhdush unne uhpezekáwât ototittánâwâ ningooche nebe 'owedush gewetázhegâzōt eketto , binná o-o nebe , unishweenetōk uhga ezhe baptizeiggosewâmbánan ?
44008037	Philipdush eketto , kokkinná tabwatumun ketaink , keta kushketo , che baptizeigoyun nuhquatumdush eketto , neendabwa-andum Jesus Christ , Kitche Manito Oguisun .
44008038	Onegegâboweándush ototâbánun , nayazhdush unnemátábewug unne bukkobewug nebeeng Philip giyadush 'ow aninne , obaptizeándush .
44008039	Gá buhuhgwatáwândush Kitche Manitōn ochichâgwun obeotâpenán Philipun , 'owedush aninne , kâ minowâ wâbomáse unnemájádush unnepápenanemōt .
44008040	Philipdush Azotusink mikkowâ , aneshábooshkunkdush Azotus , unneguhgequa kokkinná otanowun nánázh unne otittunk Caesareaun .
44009001	Sauldush mozhuk mutche gegeto , mutche enanemát uhnumeájig , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otizzhánun .
44009002	Onundotumowândush mazeniegunun Jewug otuhnumeawegumigowâng Damascusink che ezhewetōt kishpin mikowât ningooche oweuh aninnewun , giya equawun , azhe uhnumeánidjin , Jerusalemink owwe be-ezhewinnát .
44009003	Magwouhdush unne uhpezekát bazhew Damascusink betakoshin , bâbega gezhigōnk beōnje wâsokonasane gewetáwiuhe weowwink .
44009004	Pongesindush ákeeng , onōndándush gegetowin guhnonigoot , Saul , Saul , wagonan wâōnje mutche totowweyun ?
44009005	Ekettodush , owwanan keen Kitche Manito ? Kitche Manitodush eketto , neen Jesus mache totowweyun ; kitche sunnágut , keen che tungishkumun gánágin .
44009006	Sauldush nuhningishkâ mámukkâtandunk eketto , Kitche Manito , áneen o-o che totumán anandumun ? Kitche Manitodush otinnân , onishkân otanong ezhán keguhweendumágo ga izzhewabizzeyun .
44009007	Aninnewundush wâjewegoojin pezân nebowewug uhnondá nâwâ gegetowin , kâdush oweuh aninnewun owâbomásewân .
44009008	Sauldush onishkâ ákeeng , gá pusegweet , kâ oweuh aninnewun owâbomáseen , osuggábeginnáwândush unnemájenáwât uhbenáwât Damascusink .
44009009	Niswogwun kâ wâbisse , kâ giya minnequase , kâdush wesenese .
44009010	Bazhek uhnumeátdush , Damascusink , Ananias ezhenekâzo ; Kitche Manitodush otinnân inabunduminit , Ananias , ekettodush binná omá neendiá Kitche Manito .
44009011	Kitche Manitodush otinnân , onishkân pusegween , mikunâng ezhán quiuk atumink , kuhgwatwan Judas owegewamink uzzhiát , Saul Tarsusink , andánukkeet , binná magwouh uhnumeá .
44009012	Ogewâbomándush aninnewun inábundum , Ananias ezhenekâzowun , betângenegōn , chewâbit .
44009013	Ananiasdush eketto , Kitche Manito kitche nebewá nenōndowâg anishenâbag tuzzhemint wuhow aninne menik gá ezhe mámutchetotowát ketuhnumeánidjin Jerusalemink .
44009014	Me bowōnje ezhát kokkinná wetuhkobenát uhnumeánidjin , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug otuhnonáwân :
44009015	Kitche Manitodush , otinnân , máján , ween otossowin gá onâbomuk , che bemewetowât neenduhnozowin , anosumewât miátáwizzidjig giya ogemág giya Israel onejânisun .
44009016	Neenguhwábunduhán kuhgwâtugittowin ga izzhewabizzit neenduhnozowin ōnje .
44009017	Ananiasdush , unnemájá , unnebeendegadush wegewamink , otunnetângenándush , eketto , nekânis Sual , Kitche Manito ( Jesus , gáwâbundi-ik weow , magwouh bamosaeyun , ) neenduhnonik , keche ōnje wâbeyun , che mooshkenayundush ochichâgomá .
44009018	Bâbegadush , ōnje pongesininnewun oskezhigōnk uhbenuhgishkânik , bâbegadush wâbe ; pusegwedush , medush azhe baptizeint .
44009019	Opedush gá weesenit kesisshowwegunna ; Sauldush iá emá gomá tussogwun , mámowy uhnumeájig Damascusink andánukkejig .
44009020	Bâbegadush kuggequa Christ oguhgequawin uhnumeawegumigōnk , ekettōnk , ween kagat Kitche Manito Oguisun .
44009021	Kokkinnádush nōndowâjig , mámukkâtandumōg , ekettowugdush , kânuh wuhow iáwisse gá banájeát uhnumeánidjin o-o nozowinink Jerusalemink ? Me eu ōnjittâ bowōnje ezhápun omá owwe tuhkonát owwe ezhewittowât ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne ?
44009022	Sauldush , owushema unne mushkâwizze mámukkâtandumowin Jewun Damascusink andánukkejig , ōnjittá kuggatenámegeezhwat me 'ow ōnjittá kagat Christ .
44009023	Nebewá anduswogwunniguk Jewug otonuggimmáwân wenissáwât ;
44009024	Saulun okekandán otukkowâbundanâwândush ishquandamun , kopa kezhik giya kopa dibbik , owwenesáwât .
44009025	Uhnumeájigdush ototâpenáwân nebádibbik uhnesábegenáwat wâkiegunink , kokobenágunink .
44009026	Sauldush , ope buhtuhkoshink Jerusalemink , owwe wetokowân uhnumeánidjin ; ogosáwândush kâdush tabwa-anduhzewug uzzhuhnumeánit .
44009027	Barnabasdush , ototâpenán , obe-ezhewetowân anoninjig , oweendumowândush , gá ezhewâbomát , Kitche Manitōn magwouh bamosat , uhge guhnonigoot gá ezhe mushkâwetágoozit , uhge uhnumeát Jesus otuhnozowinink , Damascusink .
44009028	Owejewândush Jerusalemink , sáságuhumowât , uhbábeendegawâtdush .
44009029	Mushkâwetágoose uhguhgequat , Jesus otuhnozowinink , owâwekoocheát Grecianun ozhetáwugdush , owwenesáwât .
44009030	Wekânissemágdush , ope kakandumowât Caesareaink , obeezhewináwân Tarsusinkdush otizzhenázhowâwân .
44009031	Uhnumeájigdush unwabewug , kokkinná Judeaink , giya Galileeink , giya Samariaink ; ashkum sōngizzewug , bamosawâtdush tepiegawât Kitche Manitōn ochichâgomá oshâwanemigowân che mennowânegoozewât ashkum sōngizzewug .
44009032	Gá izzhewabukdush , ope Peter papáiezhát kokkinná otunnuhkewinun , obeotissán uhnumeánidjin Lyddaink andánukkejig .
44009033	Omikowândush emá , bazhek aninnewun AEneas ezhenekazo , neezhwâswo kekenowin , uhshingeshin nebágunink , ákoozit nebowe .
44009034	Peterdush otinnân , AEneas , Jesus Christ kenojemoig ; onishkân , uzzhishsittōn kenebágun , bâbegadush onishkâ .
44009035	Kokkinnádush Lyddaink giya Saronink andánukkojig , owâbomán , Kitche Manitōn otuhgwetowâwândush .
44009036	Joppainkdush , iá bazhek uhnumeát , Tabitha ezhenekâzo ( me ánekuhnotumink , Dorcas uzzhekettōnk , ) kitche nebewá omennototowân 'ow equa katemákizzinidjin .
44009037	Gá izzhewabukdush , ningōtink ogezhiguk ákooze azhe nebōt ; gá kesebegináwâtdush ishpemink zhuhbechegâtag wegewâmink otussáwân .
44009038	Lyddadush bazhew Joppaink tuhgoo , uhnumeájigdush , nōndumowât Peter emá 'zhiát neezh aninnewun otuhnonáwân che nundomáwât bâbega che názekowât .
44009039	Peterdush pusegwe , uzzhunnewejewât ; takoshinkdush uzzhuhpechegâtanik wegewamink , otizzhewináwân , kokkinnádush shegág equawug owejegâbowittowâwân mowwemát owâwâbunduháwât beenzikowâgunun , giya okonâsemán Dorcas , gá iyozhetojirt magwouh wejewâwât .
44009040	Peterdush , kokkinná osâgitchenázhowân , medush azhe uhchicheengwunittá , medush uhnumeát , medush azhe gwaketōt , uzzhuttanig weowwinne , ekettodush , Tabitha , onishkân . Medush azhe tōskâbit 'ow equa gá nebopun , opedush wiábomát Peterun námátábe .
44009041	Oshebinnekatowândush , azhe onishkâbenát opedush gá nundomát uhnumeánidjin giya shegán owâbunduhán uhbemátizzinnit .
44009042	Kokkinná anegoquág Judeaink , kekanjegâta nebewâdush tabwa-andumōg Kitche Manitōn .
44009043	Gá izzhewabukdush Joppaink iá nebená tussogwun Simonun asakaweninne owetegamán .
44010001	Caesareaink , bazhek aninne Cornelius ezhenekâzo , kitche shemágunisshe ogemá , ningōtwawân Italianun azhe weeninjig .
44010002	Uhnumeát , me bazhek gwasát Kitche Manitōn kokkinná , andussogat ; nebewá oshawanemán katemákizzinidjin otuhnumeatowwân Kitche Manitōn mozhuk .
44010003	Kitche Manito omezhinowamun owâbunduhán inâbundum , shiângusso tepiegunat gezhigut obeotissegoot , otigōndush , Cornelius ,
44010004	Opedush kanowâbomát , sagizze , ekettodush , wagonan Kitche Manito ? Otigōndush , ketuhnumeawin , giya keshâwanjegawin , ototissiggōn Kitche Manito .
44010005	Uhnōzh aninne , che ezhát Joppaink , owwe nundomint Simonun , Peter ezhenekâzo .
44010006	Simon asakaweninnewun owetegamán , chegebeeg kitchegumink attane owegewam , ween keguh weendumág gá izzhewabizzeyun .
44010007	'Owedush mezhinowa gá eeshquâ guhnonát Corneliusun , gá bukkawinán onundomán neezh otoskenegamun giya uhnumeánidjin shemágunisshemun , ōnjittá mozhuk uhnoketágoojin .
44010008	Opedush gá weendumowât kokkinná ono iuheen , Joppaink otizzhe uhnōnán .
44010009	Wiábuninikdush , magwouh uzzhunne uhpezekáwât bazhew watittumowât otanuh Peter ogittegumig ezhá owwe uhnumeát ningōtwâsso tepiegunatinne .
44010010	Opedush kitche bukkutta owwe wesenit , magwouh ozhe táwât pongesin uhnikkábundunk .
44010011	Owâbundándush , gezhik bákishkânik , kitche otossowindush benesábeginumowâ gezhigōnk ōnje .
44010012	Kokkinnádush nowogâtajig áwasseug giya buggwutch áwasseug giya babámotajig giya babámissajig benasseug kok kinná beenzowug .
44010013	Onōndowândush oweuh gegetonit , pusegween Peter , netágan wesenin .
44010014	Peterdush eketto kâween eu Kitche Manito , kâween wekâ neengemejiseen miánátuk , giya wânuk .
44010015	Onōndowándush , oweuh gegetonit minowâ , kokkinná kago Kitche Manito bánetōt kago ween wenut etungan .
44010016	Nissink o-o getotám ; otossowindush nayáb gezhigōnk ezhe ōmbishkâ .
44010017	Magwouhdush Peter gweenowe-enandunk nuhmunjetōk o-o gá ōnje ezhenumōgwun uhgew aninnewug Cornelius anonájin omikánâwâ Simon owegewam onebowewugdush emá kebishquânt ,
44010018	Kuhgwatwawugdush , menuh Simon Peter andát ?
44010019	Magwouhdush Peter náguttuhwandunk gá ezhenunk ochichâgomá oguhnonigōn , binná niswa aninnewug keweguhnonigōg otigōn .
44010020	Pusegween benesândowan , unneweje-ew , kago gweenowe enandunkan , neen neenge uhnonág .
44010021	Peterdush otunne názekowân uhnew aninnewun Cornelius gá anonájin eketto , binná , neendow nandowâbomag ; wagonan bowōnje nandowâbomeyag ?
44010022	Ekettowugdush , Cornelius shemágunisshe ogemá , quiuk aninne bazhekdush gwasát Kitche Manitōn , kokkinná Jewug quiuk otenanemáwân Kitche Manito oge guhnonán mezhinowamun ōnje chenundomik che bábeendegayun owegewamink owwe bezindōk ga ekettoeyun .
44010023	Obeendeganundomándush , beendik che uhbenit . Wiábuninikdush , Peter májá ánintdush wekânisemág Joppaink otunnewejewigōn .
44010024	Wiábuninikdush , peendegawug Caesareaink ; Corneliusdush obeán , gá mowōndonundomát anowamájin giya wâsoko wâjin .
44010025	Peterdush buhpeendegat , Cornelius onuhgishkowân ozittánikdush oppuggizzo uhnumeatowwâtdush .
44010026	Peterdush ototâpenán , ekettodush , pusegween giya neen aninne neendow tebinowa .
44010027	Magwouhdush guhguhnonát unnebeendega , nebewádush omikowân mowōnjeittenit .
44010028	Otinnândush , kekekandánâwâ , kâ onissheshinzenōn aninne Jewew che wetōkowât aninnewun pukkân azhe weenzonidjin ; Kitche Manito koshá neengeik , wekâ che enásewug uhnōch aninne wewenizze , che enásewug .
44010029	Me bâbega , bowōnje otissenán ope buhnundomigoeyán , kekuhquajemindush nōngum , wagonan bowōnje nundomeyun ?
44010030	Corneliusdush eketto , neogwunigut aquo , wesenissewân , nánázh o-o tepiegun ; shânguswo tepiegunak neenduhnumeánábun wegewamink ; binnádush aninne , anosumegâboweyán nebowwe wâbishkekonia ,
44010031	Ekettodush , Cornelius , ketuhnumeawin nōnjegâta , giya gá ieendotumun kekanjegâta anosumit Kitche Manito .
44010032	Uhnōzh aninne , che ezhât Joppaink , owwe nundomint Simonun , Peter ezhenekâzo : Simon asakaweninnewun owetetegamán chegebeeg kitchegumink attane owegewam , ween keguh be weendumág ga izzhewabizzeyun .
44010033	Bâbegadush , neenge uhnoke nundominán ; kitche wawanedush , takoshinun , binná mámowy neendiámen owwe bezindágoeyun ga ekettoeyun , neengezhetámen we bezindumáng Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
44010034	Peterdush báketonane , eketto , kagat neenkekandán Kitche Manito kâween oweuh aninnewun owushema otuhpetanemáse bazhek apetanemát :
44010035	Kokkinná azheweenzojig ween gwasegoojin quiuk uhnunokejin , mewun uhnew watâpenájin .
44010036	Ekettowin Kitche Manito gá ezhenázhuhumowât Israel onejánissun wawane guhgekindink Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink ; ( ween mámowy Kitche Manito ; )
44010037	Eu kekekandánâwâ , kokkinná guhgekindim anegoquág Judeaink , Galileeink ōnje máje kuhgekindim gá eeshquâ guhgekindink John obaptizewawin .
44010038	Kitche Manito gá ezhe menát Jesusun Nazarethink Ochichâgwun giya mushkâwizzewin ; ween gá babámennototunk onojemoát Mutche Manitōn gagishkowânidjin ; Kitche Manito owejewegōn .
44010039	Neenowinddush newetokámen kokkinná ono iuheen gá ieendotunk Jewug otuhkemewâng giya Jerusalemink ; ween gá nesint ge uhgoojindush metigōnk .
44010040	Ween Kitche Manito nayáb ge ábejebát naswogwunigutinik ogewâbundiewanundush wawane ;
44010041	Kâween kokkinná anishanâban owâbunduháse , uhnewigo atuh Kitche Manito gá onábomájin , neenowint neengewetoponánán , giya neenge wejemenequamánán ope gá ábejebát uhge nesint .
44010042	Neenge guhgâzomigonán che kuggequayâng che kuggeemungidwâ anishanâbag che tabwatumowât , ween Kitche tanitōn uhge onákonigoot , che tebákonát bamátizzinidjin giya abonidjin .
44010043	Kokkinná mamándáwizzidjig owetokágōn otuhnozowinink ōnje owwagwanun ga tabwatágōgwan tuh menowwe sháwandágooze omutche izzhewabizzewin .
44010044	Magwouhdush Peter 'zhiekettōt ono iuheen , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun pongeshinotágowân , kokkinná uhnew nōndungig ekettowin .
44010045	Uhgewdush gá gewetázhegâzojig tiabwatungig , mámuhkátandumōgdush menik Peter , buhwejewât ōnje miátáwizzidjig giya pongeshinotágowân Ochichágomán ;
44010046	Onundowândush uhmiugwât kitchetwâweáwât Kitche Manitōn . Peterdush onuhquatowân ,
44010047	Oweuh nuh aninne kâ tá megewase nebe che baptizeintwâ uhgew anishanâbag , ototissigowân Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun giya keenowint azheotisenunk ?
44010048	Oguhgâzomán che baptizeintwâ Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , okuhquajemáwândush ukkowa gomá tussogwun emá che iát .
44011001	Anoninjig giya wekânissemág Judeaink andánukkejig nōndumōg miátáwizzidjig tabwatumowât Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
44011002	Ope Peter buhtuhkoshink Jerusalemink uhgew gewetázhegâzojig onishkâ che guhnonáwân ,
44011003	Ekettowugdush , kegebeendigowâ aninne miátáwizzit kegewetopomándush .
44011004	Peterdush wawane tepájemotowân kokkinná o-o gá izzhewabuk , ekettōnk ,
44011005	Magwouh Joppa otanonk neendiánábun , magwouh neenduhnumeánábun , medush azhe nikábundumán , kago neengewâbundán neendinâbundum otossowin kitchewâbewyán , azhenágwut , gezhigōnk beōnje nesenegâta ishquaiuhe meenjimenegâta , neembe otissigōndush :
44011006	Enábeándush , neengewâbomá , nowōgâtajig áwaseug ákeeng , buggwutch áwaseug giya , babámotajig giya , benásewug babámissajig giya .
44011007	Neengenōndowâdush , oweuh gegetōt guhnozhit , Peter , pusegween , netágan , wesenin .
44011008	Neenge eketdush , kâween eu Kitche Manito ; kâwekâ neengemejisseen kago miánátuk , giya wânuk .
44011009	Minowâdush , oweuh gezhigōnk neendōnje guhnonik ; Kitche Manito bánetōt , kágo ween wenut etungan .
44011010	Nissinkigo e-e ge izzhewabut , nayábdush kokkinná ge zhigōnk ge ezhe ōmbishkâwug .
44011011	Binnádush , bâbega , niswa aninnewug takoshinōg owegewam uzzhiáeyán , Caesareaink ōnje anonáwug uhbenundome wât .
44011012	Ochichâgomádush neenguhgâzonik che unnewejewugwâ , che nuhkowa gweenowe-enanduhzewân , uhgewedush ningōtwâswa wekânissemág neendunnewejewegōg neendunnepeendegamindush aninne owegewamink :
44011013	Neengeweendumágonándush , gá ezhewâbomát mezhinowamun beendik owegewam nebowewun , otigōndush , uhnōzh aninnewug Joppaink che ezháwât , che nundomáwât Simonum , Peter ezhenekâzo ;
44011014	Ween keguh weendumág ga ōnje bemátizzeyun kokkinná giya anegōk kewegewam ga ōnje bemâtizzewât .
44011015	Pichenukigo miáje gegetoeyán Ochichágwun opongesinnotágowân , gá ezhe pongesinotowweumintebun kiut .
44011016	Opedush nemikquandán Kitche Manito odikittowin gá ekettopun , John nebe otiōn uhbaptizewat keenowâdush Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ga ōnje baptizeigoyag .
44011017	Eu ōnje Kitche Manito ogemenán tibbishko gá ezhe mezheumint uhnew tiabwatuminidjin Jesus Christun wagonan gá ōnje kushketoeyámbán ánowy mutchetotowwug Kitche Manito ?
44011018	Opedush n'wândumowât ono iuheen , pezân ábewug kitchetwâweáwân Kitche Manitōn , ekettōnk , Kitche Manito ween omenán miátáwizzinidjin ánwanindizzowin che bemátizzewât .
44011019	Uhgewedush sashwashkájig , ope nasint Stephen , Pheniceink ezháwug , giya Cyprusink , giya Antiochink , meatuhgo Jewun gagekemáwâjin kâweendush oweuh bakânizzinidjin .
44011020	Ahnintdush Cyreneanug , giya Cypriotug uhgewedush ope Antiochink takoshinowât oguhnonáwân Grecianun , Kitche Manito , Jesus oguhgequawin unguhgequawât .
44011021	Kitche Manitodush oninj owejewegōnâwân kitche nebewádush tabwatumōg , Kitche Manitōndush uhbezindowâwât .
44011022	Anuhkumigukdush ono iuheen , onōndánâwâ uhnumeájig Jerusalemink , Barnabasundush otuhnonáwân Antiochink cheezháwât .
44011023	Opedush watittunk , opedush gá wâbundunk Kitche Manito azhe shâwanjegat , pâpenanemo , oguhgâzomándush kokkinná che mushkâwandumowât , che bazhewzikowâwât Kitche Manitōn .
44011024	Onje mennobemátizze aninne , mooshkená Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun giya mushkâwandumowin , kitche nebewádush anishanâbag tuhgwewug Kitche Manitōn ,
44011025	Barnabasdush májá Tarsusink ezhá , Saulun onundowâbomán :
44011026	Opedush makowât , Antiochink obe ezhewinán , gá izzhewabukdush , kokkinná kekenonowin mowonjeittewug mámowy uhnumeájig nebewádush anishanâban oguhgekemáwân , uhnumeájigdush Christianug enáwug netam Antiochink .
44011027	Ono gezhigutōn mamándáwizzidjig Jerusalemink ōnjebáwug Antiochink betakoshinōg .
44011028	Bazhekdush , Agabus ezhenekázo , pusegwe , Ochichâgomá ōnje otebátotán che kitche buhkuttawinnewung kokkinna anegoquág ákeeng , medush shegwouh gá izzhewabuk Claudias Caesar ogezhiguttomun .
44011029	Opedush uhnumeájig mámowandumōg owwe náneenduháwât wekânissemán Judeaink andánuhkejig andusshewât aninnewug menik azhekushketowât .
44011030	Medush eu kagat eá totumowât onáneendááwât okewanzeun Barnabas giya Saul oninjenink .
44012001	Nongumdush o-o ápe , Herod ogemá , shebinnekane , owwe mutchetotowât ánint uhnumeánidjin .
44012002	Jamesundush ogenesán John wekânisun uzzhowweshk ōnje .
44012003	Wiábundunkdush Jewug niandumowát enandum owwe otâpenát Peterun giya , eu ope gezhiguttōn wambishkâsinōk puhquazhegun uzzhozhetōng .
44012004	Opedush watâpenát okepáquowân ; naneogâbowewug ayetowiuhe kepáquotewegumigōnk shemágunishug akowâbidjig uzzhenandunk eeshquâ wekoondink Easterink , che be-ezhewenint anosumewât anisbanâbag .
44012005	Peterdush kepáquowâ ; uhnumeájigdush otánumeatumowân Peterun , uhnumeatowât Kitche Manitōn mozhuk
44012006	Opedush Herod wâ sâgizzeát , mego e-e dabekuk Peter magwouh nebá , nussowwiuhe neezh shemágunishun , neezhdush pewâbekōn tuhkobizzo akowâbidjigdush otuhkowâbundánâwá ishquandam .
44012007	Binná Kitche Manito omezhinowamun obeotissigōn wâsayádush wâsasá kepáquotewegumigōnk mezhinowadush obuhketaán Peterun weowwinink otonishkâbenándush , ekettōnk , onishkân waweep , pewâbeekdush takobizzōt oninjeen pongesininne .
44012008	Mezhinowandush otigōn wapinittizzoon , betuhkizzenan , medush shegwouh andotunk , otinnândush uhnew peechwabenun kebeenzikowâgun nopenuzzheshin .
44012009	Ságáumdush , unnenopenánát , kâdush okekanduhzeen mezhinowan totuminit ; uneshâgo neendinâbundum enandum .
44012010	Opedush watissáwât netam akowâbinidjin minowâ ane áneka otisáwâjin opedush ototittánâwâ pewâbeko ishquandam otononk anumōk , ishquandamdush tebinowa bákishkâmuggut unneságáumōgdush otunnekuhbikkátánâwâ bazhek mikun ; bâbegadush mezhinowa obukkawinnegōn .
44012011	Opedush Peter nabwâkât , eketto , nōngum neenkekandán , kagat Kitche Manito omezhinowamun otuhnonán , ogittiskeninjebinán Herodun neow , kokkinná giya wâtokâzojig Jewug .
44012012	Opedush niánáguttuhwandunk iuhee , ototittán Mary owegewam , John ōgeen , Mark ezhenekâzo ; andusshe mowōnjeittewât uzzhuhnumeáwât ,
44012013	Opedush Peter watittunk ishquandam , opápágáquoán , oskenegequadush Rhoda ezhenekâzo ishquânding ezhá owwe nōndunk pápágáquoumowint .
44012014	Opedush nasetotowât Peterun gegetonit , kâ opákindánuhzeen azhe pâpenanemōt opeendegabuttodush owwe tepájemōt , Peter emá nebowit ishquandang .
44012015	Otinnáwândush kekewunnátiz innuh ? áwunjishdushigo wetabwa , ekettowugdush omezhinowamun suhetook ,
44012016	Peterdush áwunjish pápágiega , opedush piákindánumowât wiábomáwât mámukkâtandumōg .
44012017	Owâtuhumowândush , che ábewât oweendumowândush Kitche Manito gá ezhe sâgizzeiggoot kepáquotewegumigōnk ; ekettodush , owwe weendumowik James ono iuheen , giya kekánissenánik . Bukkadush ningooche minowâ ezhá .
44012018	Pichenukdush wásayábunk , muhmutwa ōmbegizzewug shemágunishug , ekettowugdush áneen andit Peter ?
44012019	Opedush Herod gwânuhwâbowát Peterun , otebákonán akowâbinidjin , ekettodush keche nesintwâ májádush Judeaink Caesareaink ezhá medush emá uzzhiát .
44012020	Heroddush onishkâtizzetowân uhnew Tyreink , giya Zidonink , aeendánidjin , obeotissiggoondush mámowy , owângoweáwândush Blastus , Herod omezhinowamun okuhquajemáwândush che innowandewât ; ōnje e-e andánuhkewât mego wanje bemátuttinik ogemán andánuhkenit .
44012021	Opedush gegetowe gezhigut wachichesag Herod opezikkánun okonâsun námátábewininkdush owwe námátábe oguhnonándush .
44012022	Anishanâbagdush azhe pâpenanemowât eketowug , Manito uhgágegetōt , kâween aninne .
44012023	Babegadush Kitche Manito omezhinowamun obuhkittawân ōnje , kâ okitchetwâweáseen Kitche Manitōn . Mosandush ogittumogōn nebodush .
44012024	Kitche Manito odikittowindush mechâ ashkum ápiche .
44012025	Barnabas giyadush Saul , Jerusalemink ōnje , májáwug ope gá eeshquâ uhnumeáwât , Johnun Mark ezhenekâzōt otunnemájenáwân .
44013001	Uhnumeawegumigonkdush iáwug Antiochink ánint mamándáwizzidjig kagequajig , Barnabas , Simeon , Niger ezhenekâzo , Lucius Cyreneink , giya Manaen , Herodun giya Saulun mámowy ge wejenetáwiggeendewug .
44013002	Magwouhdush uzzhuhnoketowât Kitche Manitōn mukkuttakawât Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun eketto , pukkanik Barnabasun giya Saulun , keche uhnokewât ga enugwâ che enuhnokewât .
44013003	Gá eeshquâ mukkuttakawât giya uhnumeáwât otângenáwân oshtegwâninik omájenázhowâwândush .
44013004	Kitche Manito Ochichâgwundush omájenizzho-ogowân Seluciaink ezháwug emádush ōnje Cyprusink anáshewug .
44013005	Salamisinkdush magwouh 'zhiáwât , Kitche Manito oguhgequawin kuhgequawug Jewug otuhnumeawegumigowâng , Johnundush otuhnoketágowân .
44013006	Opedush gá neshábooshkumowât minis Paphosink , cheessukkeweninnewun emá omikkowâwân kagenowishke mamándáwizze , Jewun , Bar-jesus ezhenekâzo :
44013007	Ogemán owetokowân , Sergius Paulus , nabwâkât aninne ; ogemádush onundomán Barnabasun , giya Saulun , okuhquajemán owwe nōndunk Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
44013008	Elymasdush cheessukkeweninne , ( me azhenekâzōt ánekuhnotumink , ) onuhgânán nandomininjin owekooche kushkeán ogemán che tabwatunzinit .
44013009	Sauldush ( ween Pâul ezhenekâzōt , ) mooshkena Ochichâgomán gunnowâbomát ,
44013010	Ekettodush , binná kemooshkena kuhgianizzewin kokkinná giya shingandágoosewin Mutche Manito otuhbenoche-emun ketow , kemiátáwizzetán kokkinná quiuk izzhewabizzewin ; kânuh keguhbonetoseen mutche totumun Kitche Manito oguhgequawin ?
44013011	Binná Kitche Manito oninj kebuhtuhgonigōn keguh kuhgebeengwadush , kâ gezis keguh wâbomáse keenwazh . Bâbegadush áwun giya kushkedibbikut opongesinotágōn ; opapánundojenegadush owwe mikowât oweuh che suhgábeginnegoot .
44013012	Ogemádush ope wiábundunk andotumowint , tabwa-andum , omámukkâtandum Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
44013013	Pauldush uhnew giya wâjewâjin ōnje máieásewug Paphosink , Pergaink , Pamphyliainkdush puhguhmáshewug , Johnundush obukkawinnegowán Jerusalemink ezhá .
44013014	Opedush bakawât Pergaink , Antiochink , Pisidiaink , takoshinōg uhnumeawegumigōnkdush peendegawug unwabewinnezhigutinik owwe námátábewug .
44013015	Gá eeshquâ wâbundumowâtdush mazaniegun tebátotumowâtdush Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , nâgânizzidjig uhnumeawegwmigōnk oguhnonáwân , ekettowug , keenowâ , aninnewetōk , wekânissetōk , ningōtono wâekettowagwan ekettoeyeuk .
44013016	Pauldush pusegwe , taseninjene , ekettodush Israel aninnewetōk , keenowâdush menik gwasag Kitche Manito bezindumōk .
44013017	Uhgew anishanábag Israelug Omanitomewân oge onábomán , kōsenánin opusegweendenán magwouh miátáwizzeáng uhtuhnuhkewât Egyptink uhsōnginekanit oge ōnje sâgizzeán .
44013018	Nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin , ogunnowâbomán ga izzhewabizzinit buhgwuttuhkumigáng .
44013019	Opedush gá banájeát neezhwâswawân ákeeng Canaan , omátáonán eu áke uzzhuhtátewât .
44013020	Náágutchdush omenáwân tepákonegaweninnewun newâk usshenánemetunnuh kekenonowin , nánázh Samuel mámándáwizzit .
44013021	Náágutchdush , kitche ogemá onundomáwân ; Kitche Manitodush Saulun , omenán , Cis oguisun , aninne Benjamin azheweenzojig , nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin .
44013022	Opedush wiánjeát opusegweendenán Davidun che otogemámewât Kitche Manitodush eketto newetokowâ David , Jesue oguisun , aninne tebinowa neenda watahat , tuh mooshkena kokkinná neendenandumowin .
44013023	Wuhow aninne onejânisun Kitche Manito gá ezhe wâweendumágat opusegweendenát bazhek che bemájeáwât Israelun , me eu Jesus :
44013024	Magwouh John guhgequat chebwâ takoshink baptizewawin , ánwanindizzowin anegoquág Israel .
44013025	John ope gázhetát otenunokewin eketto , owwanan wiyáweyán ketenandám ? kâween ween neendowwisse ; binná ween ga nopenuhzhit omukkizzenun ozittáng , kâ kunága , neenda apetandágoozisse che ábuhumowuggebun .
44013026	Aninnewetōk , wekânissetōk , Abraham otuhbenoche-emun , owwagwan andussheyag ga goságwan Kitche Manito , o-o ekettowin ketizzhe názhunuhmágōn che bemájeiggoyag .
44013027	Uhgew andájig Jerusalemink , giya onegânizemewân , ōnje kâ okekanemásewân kâ onissetotunzeenâwâ mamándáwizzidjig oguhgequawinnewâ , wiánuh tebátotumink andusso unwabewinnegezhiguk kagat ogetabwatōnâwâ mamándáwizzidjig oguhgequawinnewâ uhgenesáwât .
44013028	Kâ kago omikumowâsewân ga ōnje hapun okuhquajemáwân koshá Pilateun keche nesit .
44013029	Opedush kuhbasag kokkinná menik wazhebe-egâtag obenuhwâwân metigōnk otowwebuggittináwân jebagumigōnk .
44013030	Kitche Manitodush otonishkânán ánuh ge nebonit .
44013031	Nebenádush tussogwun ge wâwâbomá uhgew Galileeink ōnje wejewegoojin Jerusalemink , me uhgew wâtokâzojig .
44013032	Quiuk keweendumoneme pâpenanemowin , wâweendumátewin gá ezhe wâweendumowintwâ kōsenánig ,
44013033	Kitche Manito ogemooshkena tabwatágowân otuhbenoche-emewân keenowint , eu uhge onishkânat Jesusun nayáb azhebe-egâtag wiyánuhkasink nuhgumōn , keen neenguis , nōngum ogezhigut ketiáwin .
44013034	Onjittá oge onishkânán ge nebonit , kâwekâ tuhbegishkuhnuhnese , o-o gá ekettōt , keguh menin David quiuk oshâwanjegawin .
44013035	Me wanje ekettōt minowâ bazhek nagumonink , siágeut kâween keguh buggittenáse chewâbundunk begishkuhninnit .
44013036	Daviddush , gá eeshquâ uhnoketowât otuhnishanâbamun Kitche Manito otenandumowin oppugguttingwâm wepandáádush ōsun , ge begishkunuhnedush :
44013037	Weendush , Kitche Manito nayáb gá onishkânájin , kâ begishkuhnut ogewâbunduhzeen .
44013038	Me wanje kekandumonigoeyag aninnewetōk wekânisseōk , menowweshâwandágoosewin mutche izzhewabizzewin ōne , 'ow aninne kagekimegoeyag ;
44013039	Weendush ōnje , kokkinná tiabwatungig otebáánáwâ gá izhewabizzewât ga ge kushkeásigwâbun wekâ che tebáunzikká Moses otebákonegawin ōnje .
44013040	Tuttebábig , konemá keguh otiságōnâwâ mamándáwizidjig gá tebátotumowât ,
44013041	Binná kenisshewunázoondánâwâ , kemámukkâtandám , kenisshewunátizzim , neenduhnoke uhnokewin kegezhiguttomewâng , anuhnokewin pâpish ga tabwa-anduhzewag aninne ánuh weendumonág .
44013042	Jewugdush unneságáumowât uhnumeawegumigōnk , miátáwizzidjig kuhgwatwawug che we guhgekemintwâ ono ekettowinun minowâ unwabewinnegezhigutinik .
44013043	Opedush ashquâkumiguk uhge uhnumeáng , nebewá Jewug giya uhnumeájig , onopenáwân Paulun giya Barnabasun ; uhnew ga guhnonigowâjin tiângwâmemáwân che iyângwâmeninit Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
44013044	Minowâdush unwabewinnegezhiguk , kagâ kokkinná otanuh bemowōnjeittewug owwe bezindumowât Kitche Manito odikittowin .
44013045	Opedush Jewug wiábomáwât kitche nebená anishanâban , keshâwandumōg , opâpezhindánâwâdush Paul oguhgequawin , uhmutchegegetowât .
44013046	Paul giya Barnabas ashkum mushkâwetahawug , ekettowugdush , me ōnjittá azhe onissheshink Kitche Manito odikittowin netam ketá weendumágōm ; ningoochedush ketizzhewabenánâwâ , kâ kepapámanduhzeenâwâ che we gâgega bemátizzeyag , binná miátáwizzidjig neengwaketowânánig :
44013047	E-e go azhe guhgekimeumint Kitche Manito ekettōnk , kege onuhbe eninnim che wâsashkumowagwâ miátáwizzidjig che ōnje bemátizzewât anishanâbag ga áquo ákewung .
44013048	Miátáwizzidjigdush , ope o-o nōndumowât pâpenanemowug okitchetwâwetōnâwâdush Kitche Manito odikittowin menikdush gá guhgegininjig che gâgega bemátizzewât tabwatumōg .
44013049	Kitche Manito odikittowin tatakosana kokinná e-e tuhnuhkewin anegoquág .
44013050	Jewugdush otōmbwamáwân manobemátizzinidjin equawun , nâgânizzidjig giya eu otanuh , ogezhetōnáwâdush che mewenázho-ōntwâ Paulun giya Barnabasun andánuhkewât .
44013051	Obowwissetatowâwândush weágusseun , Iconiuminkdush be-ezháwug .
44013052	Uhnumeájigdush kitche pâpenanemowug mooshkenawug Ochichâgomán .
44014001	Gah izzhewabukdush , Iconiumink niyazh uhnebeendegawug Jewug otuhnumeawegumigowâng , nebewâ Jewug giya Greekug gá ezhe tabwatumowât otizzheguhnonáwân .
44014002	Wiágunwatungigdush Jewug , otōmbwamáwân miátáwizzinidjin , che mutche-enanemánit wekânissemán .
44014003	Me keenwazh wanje iáwât mushkâwetágoozewât Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , Kitche Manitodush owetokân odikittowin , oshâwanjegawin omenándush kuhgekinowâchetotumowin , che ieendotuminit giya mámukkâtandumowin .
44014004	Anishanâbagdush eu otanuh nanáweittewug : ánint owetokowâwân Jewun , ánintdush anoninjig owetokowâwân .
44014005	Miátáwizzidjig giya Jewug giya onegânezemewân ope gá 'zhetáwât we mowwenaegawât owwe bemosinnuháwát ,
44014006	Pauldush giya Barnabas , okekandánâwâ , oshemowugdush Lystraink , giya Derbeink , otanowun Lycaoniaink , eninneshemowug , otunnuhkewinundush gewetáiuhe anduhgōg :
44014007	Medush emá anduhshe guhgequawât meenwâjemowin .
44014008	Bazhekdush aninne emá Lystraink námátábe nanepenizze ozittáng , nágitigo be nanepenizze kâdush wekâ bamosase .
44014009	Onōndowân Paulun gegetonit , weendush anegōk ogunowâbomán owâbomándush mushkâwanduminit owwe nojemoigoozit ,
44014010	Anegōk ekettodush , nebowin quiuk kezitáng ; pusegweenjesadush , bamosa .
44014011	Opedush anishanâbag wiábundumowât Paul andotunk , anegōk gegetowug , ekettowug , Lycaonia inwawinink ; Kitche Manitōg kebenázhuhkenotágōnánig aninneeng be-ezhenágoozewug .
44014012	Barnabasundush , Jupiter oteshenekânáwân , Paulundush Mercurius , oteshenekânáwân , ōnje ween negânizzit uhgegetōt .
44014013	Jupiterdush osáságewitchegaweninnemun ween anosumeet iá e-e otanuh pezhekewun giyadush wâwâsokonan ishquandamink e-e otanuh obe-ezhe sâgizzeán owwe sáságewitchegaát , anishanâban mámowy .
44014014	Opedush Barnabas giya Paul n'wândumowât o-o obego betōnâwâ agwewâjin , magwa anishanâbagdush uhpi-ittewug ázhequawât , ekettowugdush ,
44014015	Aninnewetōk ánishewin o-o wanje totumag ? giya neenowint aninnewug neendowwemin anandágooseyagigo neendenandágoosemin , keguhgekemineme che bonetoeyag uhnōch ono ezhetwâwinun che ezhe gwaketowwag giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito : ween gá ozhetōt gezhik giya áke , giya kitchegumme , kokkinná giya anduhgoog :
44014016	Ween kiut maweshá obuggittenán kokkinná azheweenzojig aenandumowât che izzhewabizzewât .
44014017	Kâwekâ kege ezhe nuhgunnegoosenán gâgineek kekekandumonigonán kunowaneminunk , eu keche mennototum kegemenigonán kemewun gezhigōnk ōnje , netáwiggingin kekenonowinink , omooshkenatōndush ketaenánin netáwiggingin giya pâpenanemowin ,
