45002018	Kekekanemá anandunk kemeenwandánun mennoizzhewabizzewin tepákonegawinink gá ōndinumun .
45002019	Ketenandum keenigo tebinowa che suhgábeginutwâbun kagebeengwajig keche wâsashkumowutwâ kushkedibbikutōnk ayájig ,
45002020	Keguhgekemág kagebátizzidjig , giya uhbenocheug , che náguttuhwandumowât tepákonegawin , che nissetotumowât :
45002021	Kuhgekemutwâ bakânizzidjig , kâween nuhgwuhnuh keguhgekindizzose ? Kagekemut , aninne kago kemotekan , keen innuh ketá kemōt ?
45002022	Keen ezhe guhgekemut aninne keche bisshegwâtizzissig keen innádush ketá bisshegwâtiz ? Keen shânganemutwâ muzzenineeg , ketá pâpenotowân innuh Kitche Manito ?
45002023	Keen uhkitchetwâwandumun tepákonegawin ketá bokobetōn innuh tepákonegawin che nishkeut Kitche Manito ?
45002024	Kitche Manito otuhnozowin pâpenochegâtane magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig keen ōnje , eu azhebe-egâtag .
45002025	Gewetázho-onk quiuk izzhewabut kunwandumink tepákonegawin kishpindush bokobetoeyunk tepákonegawin gewetázhowin kâ ningōt inábuhtusenōn .
45002026	Me eu ōnje , uhgew gáwetázhosigook kunwandumowât tepákonegawin , kânuh tibbishko tá ezhe mennoizzhewabizzissewug azhe mennoizzhewabizzewât gáwetázhegâzojig .
45002027	Kânuh ween gáwetázhosig tebinowa otenandumowin kunwandunk tepákonegawin , kânuh ween ketá tebákonigoose kishpin bokobetoeyun tepákonegawin uhgewetázhegâzoeyun giya uhkekandumun tebákonegawin ?
45002028	Kâween ween kagat Uhjewese ween anwânittizzōt ; kâween giya gewetázhegâzowin áwunzenōn ween áqutche anduhgoog weowinink .
45002029	Weendush gagishkunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin , ween Jew áwe , gewetázhegâzowin , me e-e , 'zhotaewunk , kâween ween mazaniegunink kâween ween aninnewun che ōnje mennotuzzhemint Kitche Manitōn keche ōnje menno enanemigoot .
45003001	Ahneen owushema Jew ga ezhe menno enandágoozit , anandágoozewât bakânizzidjig ? Ahneen anábuhtuk gewetázhegâzowin ?
45003002	Kitche nebená ; giya uhnánōch izzhewabizzewinun ; weenowâ netam wanepuzh ge menáwug Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
45003003	Kishpin ánint tabwatunzigwâ eu tabwa-anduhzeeng me uhbanájeintwâ ánint ánuh uhtabwa-andumowât Kitche Manitōn ?
45003004	Kitche Manito kâ meenwanduhze che izzhewabuk , ( kâween pâpish , ) Kitche Manito tuh tabwa máno kokkinná aninnewug tuh kuhgenowishkewug , azhebe-egâtag , kedikittowinun tuh tabwa anjegâtawun , kokkinná keguh unnewishkágo , ope tepá konigoeyun .
45003005	Kishpin kemutche izzhewabizzewininánin ōnje kekandágwuk , Kitche Manito omennoizzhewabizzewin ōnje , áneen ga ekettoeyungobun ? Kitche Manito innuh mutchetotum , bashunzhaonungoon ? ( aninneeng neendizzhe gágegit . )
45003006	Kâween tuh izzhewabussinnōn ; áneen Kitche Manito ga ge ezhe tepákonunk áke ?
45003007	Kishpin Kitche Manito otabwawin owushema apetandágwuttinnik neen guhgenowishkewin ōnje , che ōnje kitchetwâwandágoozit , wagonan wanje tepákonigoyán tebishko mache izzhewabizzinidjin ?
45003008	Ahnishween uhmámutchetunzewunk mennoizzhewabizzewin che takoshinnomuhgukkebun ? ( me o-o guhgequawin agoeyunk , ánint ekettowug , me o-o azhe guhgequaeyunk , obuhshunzhaogowinnewân quiuk izzhewabutinne . )
45003009	Wagonandush , owushema nuh kemennoizzhewabizzemin azhewabizzewât ? kâween ; kâ ningooche kegewâbundi-innenim kokkinná Jewug giya miátáwizzidjig mutche izzhewabizzewug .
45003010	Azhebe egâtag kâ oweuh mennoizzhewabizzisse , kâ pâpish bazhek .
45003011	Kâ oweuh nissetotunze , kâ onundowâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn .
45003012	Kokkinná puhkaiuhe ezháwug kâ ningōt inábuhtissewug nisshewuhnátizzewug ; kâ oweuh mennoizzhewabizzisse , kâ pâpish bazhek .
45003013	Ogōndágunewân bákissinōn jebágumigōn ; otanuhnewewân wiazhingamuhguttinnewun .
45003014	Otōnewân mooshkenawun nanibbekinjegawin giya wesuhgun :
45003015	Ozittáwân kezhesanewun uhsegissetowât misque :
45003016	Banájeiggowint ezhissininne azháwât nisshewuhnátizzewât :
45003017	Innuhwandewin mekun , kâwekâ okekanduhzeenâwâ :
45003018	Kâ oweuh Kitche Manitōn ogosáseen andusshewât .
45003019	Neenkekandámin kishpin tepakonegawin ningōtono akettomuggukin , tabiegajig mewug uhgew aninjig konemá kokkinná otōnemán tuh getiegâtawun , kokkinná áke tuh ánwanindizzowug anosumeet Kitche Manito .
45003020	Eu ōnje , oweuh aninne ánuh kunwandunk tepákonegawin , kâ tá ōnje mennoizzhewabizzisse , anosumeet Kitche Mánito , tepakonegawin ōnje , me wanje kekandágwuk mutche izzhewabizzewin .
45003021	Quiuk otizzhewabizzewin Kitche Manito ozhichegâta tepákonegawin uzzhioseeng tepákonegawin , giya mamándáwizzidjig wanje kekandágwuk :
45003022	Kitche Manito quiuk otizzhewabizzewin Jesus Christ ōnje , kokkinná tiabwatungig otebandánâwâ kâ oweuh pukkân enandágoozisse :
45003023	Kokkinná gá mutche izzhewabizzidjig , kâ menásewug Kitche Manitōn kitchetwâwizzewininne ;
45003024	Mennoweshâwandágoozewug , wâwânuk Jesus Christ uhtebiegat ōnje :
45003025	Uhnew Kitche Manito gá ezhenázhowâjin , che sáságewitchegat mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje , che kekandágwuttinnik quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , uhgew mutche izzhewabizzewinun gá gegishkungig che mennoweshâwandágoozewât Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje ;
45003026	Chewâbundiewat nōngum , quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , Kitche Manito konemá quiuk tá totum mánoweshâwanemájin oweuh tabwatowânidjin Jesusun .
45003027	Ande anduhgonik muhmequâzowin ? Ahqutchink átáquiegâta ; tepákonegawin uhnokewin innuh eu ? kâween ; tepákonegawin mushkâwandumowin koshá ōnje .
45003028	Me eu ōnje neenkekandámin omushkâwandumowininne wanje mennoweshâwandágoozit , ánuh quiuk kunwanduhzik tepákonegawin .
45003029	Weenowâ nuh atuh Jewug Omanitomewâ ? kâween innuh weenowâ giya miátáwizzidjig Omanitomisseenáwân ? Kagat giya weenowâ miátáwizzidjig Omanitomewân .
45003030	Mego uhbazhekoot , Kitche Manito sháwanemát gáwetázhegâzonidjin giya gáwetázhegâzosiggook , kishpin mashkâwandungin quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
45003031	Neembanájetomin innuh tepakonegawin , nemushkâwandumowinán ōnje ? kâween pâpish ; kagat , neendozhissittomin tepákonegawin .
45004001	Ahneen ga ekettoeyunk , kōsenán Abraham uhgemikunk ?
45004002	Kishpin Abraham gemennoweshâwandágoozit otuhnokewin ōnje , ga ōnje kitchetwâwâtungebun weow ; kâweendush ween anosumeet Kitche Manito .
45004003	Ahneen akettomugguk mazaniegun azhebe-egâtag ? Abraham otabwatowân Kitche Manitōn , uhgindumowâdush mennoizzhewabizzewin ōnje .
45004004	Ween anokeet otebáumágowin máninjin , kâween unishâ menage , weenigo otieme .
45004005	Weendush anokesig , tabwatowât mánoweshâwanjeganidjin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , omushkâwandumowin uhginjegâta quiuk izzhewabizzewin ōnje .
45004006	Tibbishko David azhe tuzzhindunk , uhow aninne oshâwandágoozewin , ween Kitche Manitōn tagogimigoot quiuk izzhewabizzewinink ánuh uhnokesig .
45004007	Ekettōnk , shâwandágoozewug , uhgew mánoweshâwandágoozidjig , omázheninnewugizzewinewâ giya uhgew omutcheizzhewabizzewinnewá kiátuttinik .
45004008	Shâwandágooze 'ow aninne , omutcheizzhewâbizzewin Kitche Manitōn aginduhzinit .
45004009	Uhgew atuh gáwetazhegâzojig innuh ototisigoonâwâ o-o shâwandágoozewin ? kânuh uhgew giya ototisigooseenâwâ gáwetázhegâzosigook ? neendikittomin Abraham omushkâwandumowin wanje uhginjegâtag quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
45004010	Ahneen azhe uhginjegâtag ? ope gáwetázhegâzōt gamá gewetázhegâzosig ? kâween ope gáwetázho-ōnt , chebwâ gewetázhoōntigo .
45004011	Ogeotisigōn izzhewabizzewin , gewetázhowin kekinowâtizzewin omushkâwandumowin chebwâ gáwetázhoōnt , kokkinná tiabwatumitudjin táōsemigōn ánuh gáwetázhegâzosigook quiuk izzhewabizzewin , konemá giya weenowâ tuh tuhgwuhgindumowâwug :
45004012	Ga ōsemint o-o gewetázhowin uhgew gáwetázhegâzosigook , uhgew quiuk bamosajig Abraham omushkâwandumowinink , chebwâ gewetâzhoōnt .
45004013	Ge wâweendumowâ Abraham keche tebandunk ákee giya onejânisun , kâween tepákonegawin ōnje , koshá quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
45004014	Onje kishpin tabiegajig tepákonegawin sazekizzidjig mushkâwandumowin kâ ningōt inâbuhtussinōn , wâweendumáewin , giya kâ ningōt inábuhtussinōn .
45004015	Onje tepákonegawin , enishkâche uhnokewinun : tepákotegawin uhtuhgoosinōk , kâ kago mutche izzhewabizzewin .
45004016	Me eu ōnje mushkâwandumowinnewun , konemá shâwantágoozewin ōnje , wâweendumátewin keche sōngum , kokkinná ehbenocheug ōnje , kâween ween atuh tepiegat tepákonegawin , keen giya tabwatunk tibbishko Abraham mámowy kōsinán ezhe tabwatunk ;
45004017	( Azhebe-egâtag , kege ezhein kitche nebená tuswawân ezhe weenzojig , ) keche ō-ōsemikwâ anosuminit uhnew tiabatágoojin , ween Kitche Manito , ween n'wâjemotōt nebowin weendunk ono iuheen anduhgoosinōk tibbishko anduhgoojin :
45004018	Tabwa-andum o-o tiabwa-anduhzeeng , nebená azheweenjig che ōsemigoot , tibbishkogo gá ekettōnk , me o-o ga tuzewât kenejânissug .
45004019	Gâgineek uhmushkâwandunk kâween opapámanduhzeen ánuh ápiche kekât , kagâ ningōtwâk anuh tusso kekenonowuggizzit , kâdush opapámanduhzeen kekâwik ánuh ápiche kekânit Sarahun ;
45004020	Kâ oge ágoonwatuhzeen , gá ezhe wâweendumágoot Kitche Manito , ápichego mushkâwandum , uhkitchetwâweát Kitche Manitōn ;
45004021	Okekandán Kitche Manito wiáweendumágajin kago , keche kushketōt keche totunk .
45004022	Me eu ōnje wanje tuhgwuhgindumowint quiuk izzhewabizzewin ōnje .
45004023	Kâween ween atuh ōnje oshebe-egâtagenōn , wanuhgindumowint ;
45004024	Giya keenowint koshá , giya keenowint ga ōnje uhginjegâtag kishpin tabwatumag ween gá ábejebát Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus ánuh genebonit ;
45004025	Ween gá buhgittinnát nemutcheizzhewabizzewininánin ōnje minowâdush ge ábejebá keenowint che ōnje mennoweshâwandágoozeyunk .
45005001	Me eu ōnje mennoweshâwandágoozeyunk kemushkáwandumowininánin ōnje , nemennoenanemánán Kitche Manito , Jesus Christ Neenkitche Manitomenán ōnje ;
45005002	Ween ōnje , me wanje kushketoeyáng uhbeotittumáng o-o quiuk izzhewabizzewin wanje nebowweyáng nemojegandámin Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewinink .
45005003	Kâween atuh o-o , nemojegandámin koshá , neen kotuhgittowininánin giya neenkekandámin o-o kotuhgittowin wanje mushkâwandumáng , keche mámázhetoeyáng ;
45005004	Ope gá nuhgutandumáng kotuhgittowin neenkekandámin ga buhgoosanemoyáng ;
45005005	Buhgoosanemowin wanje águtchissewung , ōnje Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin siswashkâne mizzewa ketaenáng Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje gá menigoeyunk .
45005006	Onje magwouh nenunmizzeyâng , ope wachichesanik me ge ōnjenat Christ mache izzhewabizzinidjin .
45005007	Onje quiuk izzhewabizzit aninne kâween oweuh gwetch tá ōnje nasewun weow , konemá mennoizzhewabizzit aninne oweuh tá ōnjenat .
45005008	Kitche Manito kegewâbundi-iggonán , oshâwanjegawin , ōnje magwouh kemutcheizzhewabizzeyunk , Christ ge ōnjena keowinánin .
45005009	Owushema , minowâ , kemennoweshâwandágoozemin , omisqueem ōnje , ga ōnje buhshunzhaogowizzissewung ween ōnje .
45005010	Kishpin magwouh sheenganemunk Kitche Manito Oguisun onebowininne kege ōnje ságeánán , owushema minowâ aquoinnowamunk obemátizzewin me ga ōnje bemátizzeyunk .
45005011	Kâween atuh eu , nemojegandámin Kitche Manito Jesus Christ Neenkitche Manitomenán ōnje nemennoweshâwandágoozemin nōngum ween ōnje .
45005012	Onje bazhekigo ōnje mutche izzhewabizzewin gá ōnje takoshinomuguk ákeeng , nebowin giya , mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje , me nebowin kokkinná bamátizzidjig wanje otissigowât ōnje kokkinná mutcheizzhewabizzewug :
45005013	( Onje nánázh tepákonegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin tuhgoog ákeeng ; mutcheizzhewabizzewin kâ onuhginjegâtasenōn tepákonegawin uhtuhgosenōk .
45005014	Kâween nōndás nebowin , otogemákundágōn , Adam ná názh giya Moses , mego debishko uhgew mutcheizzhewabizzissiggook Adam omutcheizzhewabizzewinink , ween wâje-ezhenágoozemájin ga takoshinidjin .
45005015	Wanepuzh mánitink , kâween ayeezh mutcheizzhewabizzewinink ezhenágoosinōn , bazhek aninne omutche izzhewabizzewin kitche nebewá ōnje nawug , owushema Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin giya menittewin shâwanjegawin ōnje , bazhek aninne Jesus Christ ōnje , kitche bátienutinne kitche nebená anishanâbag che iámowât .
45005016	Wanepuzh mánittink , ká izzhewabussinōn azhewabuk mutche izzhewabizzewin bazhek aninne wanje-emuhguk . Bazhek o-o wanje tuhgook tepákonegawin che bátáumink , wanepuzh mánittink kitche nebená mutcheizzhewabizzewin che mennoweshâwandágwuk .
45005017	Bazhek aninne omutcheizzhewabizzewin ogemákundágamuhgut , bazhek ōnje owushema uhgew nebewá , mánegowizzidjig shâwandágoozewin giya quiuk izzhewabizzewin tuh ogemáwewug bemátizzewinink , bazhek ōnje Jesus Christ .
45005018	Eu ōnje bazhek aninne omutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje wanje otissigowát tepákonegawin kokkinná bátándewin me debishko bazhek omennoizzhewabizzewin ōnje wanepuzh menittink ototissigōnâwâ kokkinná bamátizzidjig che ōnje bemátizzewât .
45005019	Bazhek aninne iágoonwatunk , gá ezhe ozhittowât nebená mutche izzhewabizzewin ; me bazhek aninne uhtabwatunk me wanje ozhetowât kitche nebená mennoizzhewabizzewin .
45005020	Minowâ tepákonegawin takoshinomuhgut che bátienuk mutcheizzhewabizzewin , owushema bátienuk mutcheizzhewabizzewin , me emá owushema bátienuk shâwanjegawin .
45005021	Eu mutcheizzhewabizzewin ogemákundunk nebowinink , me debishko shâwandágoozewin , azhe ogemákundunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin che gâgega bemátizzink Jesus Christ Neenkitche Manitomenán ōnje .
45006001	Ahneendush ga ekettoeyáng ? mozhuk innuh keguh mutcheizzhewabizzemin che bátienuk shâwandágoozewin ?
45006002	Kâween pâpish ketá izzhewabizzissemin . Ahneen ga ge teyung , kegebonetomin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , áneen gayábe ga ge-ezhe kegebemátizzeyunk ?
45006003	Kâween innuh kekekanduhzeenâwá menik biáptizemigoeyunk Jesus Christ ōnje biáptizemigoeyunk onebowinink ?
45006004	Me eu ōnje kemámuhōshinōmin baptizewawinink uhwejenebomunk ; me Christ azhe ábejebát nebowinink ōsemá ogitchetwâwizzewinink giya keenowint giya ōshke bemátizzewinink keguh bamosamin .
45006005	Kishpin gá ketegánegowungwan mámowy onebowinink giya keenowint ga izzhewabizzeyunk gá izzhewabizzit uhge ábejebát :
45006006	O-o kekandumink kegata keowinánin ge tuhgoo suhsuh gáquowâ weowemá mutcheizzhewabizzewin che bánáchichegâtag , náagutchdush ketáuhnoketunzemin mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
45006007	Ween gá nabōt kâ gayábe mutche izzhewabizzisse .
45006008	Kishpin wejenebomunk Jesus Christ gâgineek keguh wetegamánán keguh enandámin .
45006009	Kekekandámin Jesus Christ uhge ábejebát nebowinink kâ minowâ che nebosig kâ minowâ nebowin oguh unnewishkágōn .
45006010	Ope nabōt uhge nebōt mutcheizzhewabizzewin gá ōnje na uhbemátizzit Kitche Manitōn wáje bemátizzemájin .
45006011	Me giya keenowâ ga izzhewabizzeyag , kishpin kegenayag mutcheizzhewabizzewin , kishpin Kitche Manito apanemoeyag che bemátizzeyag Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
45006012	Kago mutcheizzhewabizzewin keguh ogemá kundágooseen keowink keguh wemámázhetōn che mutcheizzhewabizzissewun .
45006013	Kago bazhek kebuhkazewin uhnoketunkan mutcheizzhewabizzewin : buhgittinumowik Kitche Manito keowewân , tibbishko gá nebōngin gá ábejewâtdush kokkinná giya kebuhkazewinnewân menik Kitche Manito quiuk izzhewabizzewin che uhnoketowint .
45006014	Mutcheizzhewabizzewin kago keguh ogemákundágooseenâwâ , kâween tepákonegawin ketebanemigooseenâwâ sháwanjegawin keguh tebanemigonáwâ .
45006015	Ahneendush gáteyunk ? keguh mutcheizzhewabizzemin innuh ōnje tepákonegawin tebanemigoosewunk shâwanjegawin koshá uhtebanemigoeyunk ? Kâween pâpish .
45006016	Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ oweuh tiabwatowagoon , ketuhnoketowâwâ ? mutcheizzhewabizzewin nebowinink , uhga má che tabwatumink quiuk izzhewabizzewin ?
45006017	Megwach neendinná Kitche Manito , uhge uhnoketumagobun mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; kegetabwatám koshá oguhgequawin mánigoeyag nuhnánduhweowin ketaewâng .
45006018	Uhgenuhguttumag kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ , quiuk izzhewabizzewin uzzhotâpenumag .
45006019	Aninneeng neendizzhegegit , ōnje uhneennuhmuk keowe wân mutche izzhewabizzewininink weenizzewinink ; nōngumdush me ga ezhe buhgittinumag keowewân che uhnoketumag mennoizzhewabizzewin , mennobemátizzewin .
45006020	Magwouh uzzhunnoketumag mutcheizzhewabizzewin , kâween bazhek ketiáseem mennoizzhewabizzewinink .
45006021	Wagonan gá meesandumag ono izzhewabizzewinun nōngum agutchetumag ? uhkuhbasag o-o mutcheizzhewâbizzewin , me e-e nebowin .
45006022	Nōngumdush ono kewânuhkeiggōn mutche izzhewabizzewinik , Kitche Manito ketuhnoketowâwâ , ketotâpenánâwámennoizzhewabizzewin , che gâgega bemátizzeyag .
45006023	Tebáumátewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin nebowin ; Kitche Manitodush omegewawin gâgega bemátizzewinnewun Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
45007001	Kawnuh kekekanduhzeenâwá nekânissetōk ( kakandungig tepákonegawin neenguhnonág , ) aquo bemátizzit aninne otebanemigōn tepákonegawin ?
45007002	Equa wanâbamit , otebanemigōn onâbamun ga áko bemátizzinit , kishpindush onâbamun genebonit otebandán weow tepákonegawinink .
45007003	Magwouh onâbamun bemátizzinit , onâbamit bakânizzinidjin , bashegwâtizzit guhtuh ená ; kishpindush onâbamun genebonit otebandán weow otebákonegawinink kâweendush tuh bisshegwâtizzisse wetegamát bakânizzinidjin aninnewun .
45007004	Me eu ōnje , nekânissetōk , kenebōm tepákonegawinink Jesus Christ oweow ōnje , konema bakânizzit ketá wetegamáwâ , ween gá ábejebát nebowinink , konemá ketá menekânewimin Kitche Manito .
45007005	Magwouh uhge mutcheizzhewabizzeyunk mushkâwizzewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin tepákonegawinink uhnokemuhgut keowewáng owwe kushketomuhguk nebowin .
45007006	Nōngumdush kenuhguttámin tepákonegawin eu manjiminigoeyungobun , nebomuhgut ; konemá ketá uhnoketowânán Kitche Manito ōshke ota , che otáeyunk , kâween ween gata mazaniegunink .
45007007	Ahneendush ga ekettoeyunk ? Tepákonegawin nuh mutche izzhewabizzewin ! Kâween pâpish . Kagat , kâ neendá gekekanduhzeen mutcheizzhewabizzewin tepákonegawin tuhgoosinnōgebun : kishpin tepákonegawin ekettosigobun kago we otâpenumowâkan kewejetuhkewamágun otiemun , kâ neendá gekekanduhzeen muhkundewin .
45007008	Mutcheizzhewabizzewin , kokkinná uhnōch mutche enandumowin ge uhnokemuhgut neowwink tepákonegawinink ōnje . Tepákonegawin tuhgoosinōk , mutcheizzhewabizzewin nebomuhgut .
45007009	Neengebemátiz ningōtink tepákonegawin uhtuhgoosinōk , opedush tepákonegawin takoshinomuhgut mutcheizzhewabizzewin bemátut minowâ , medusa azhe neboeyán .
45007010	Tepákonegawin mánittink che ōnje bemátizzink , nemikán uhnebowinewunk .
45007011	Mutcheizzhewabizzewin tepákonegawinink , neenge wiazhemigōn , neenge nissigōn .
45007012	Me eu ōnje tepákonegawin quiuk izzhewabut , guhgequawin quiuk izzhewabut , mennoizzhewabut .
45007013	Eu innuh wanissheshink neenneboigōn ? Kâween pâpish . Mutcheizzhewabizzewin koshá , che nágwuk mutcheizzhewabizzewin , uhnokemuhguk neowink nánázh nebowin ōnje mennoizzhewabizzewin ; mutche izzhewabizzewinink tepákonegawinink kitche mutcheizzhewabizzewinnewun .
45007014	Kekekandámin tepákonegawin ochichâgōnk uzzhenandágwuk ; neen koshá weyâsemá neendow , neendowâkânigōn mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
45007015	Aeendotumán kâ nemeenwanduhze che izzhewabuk : wiánuhwe izzhewabizzeyán , kâ neendizzhewabizzisse ; shângandumán me izzhewabizzeyán .
45007016	Kishpin eu izzhewabizzeyán anandumán che izzhewabizzissewân neendebátotan tepákonegawin she onissheshink .
45007017	Kâween neen tebinowa neendotunze , mutche izzhewabizzewin koshâ gagishkumán neendotágōn .
45007018	Neenkekandán kâ kago mennoizzhewabizzewin neengegishkunzeen ( omá neowink , ) gâgineek neendánuh enandum quiuk keche izzhewabizzeyán , kâdush neenkekanduhzeen ga izzhewabizzeyán .
45007019	Mennoizzhewabizzewin ánuh we izzhewabizzeyán , kâ neendizzhewabizzisse , mutcheizzhewabizzewin ananduhzewân che totumán me aeendotumán .
45007020	Eu ieendotumán ananduhzewân che totumán , kâween neen neentotuuze , mutcheizzhewabizzewin gagishkumán andotunk .
45007021	Nemikándush tepákonegawin andotágoeyán che mutche totumán magwouh ánuh we mennototumán .
45007022	Neendaink nemeenwandum Kitche Manito otepákonegawin .
45007023	Neowinkdush nemikán minowâ bazhek tepákonegawin uhmegâtemuhguk tepákonegawin ayáyán neendaink owâkânegoeyán tepákonegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ayáyán neowink .
45007024	Tiá mutche aninnewish wiáweyán ! owwanan ga bemájeit , omá nebowinik ?
45007025	Nemegwacheweá Kitche Manito , Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , ōnje neen náguttuhwandumowinink neenduhnoketán Kitche Manito otepákonegawin , neowinkdush neenduhnoketán mutche izzhewabizzewin tepákogawin .
45008001	Kaw kago bátázewin ogegishkunzeenâwâ uhgew , nopenuhjig Jesus Christun , kâ weyâsemá onopenuttunzeenâwâ , meatuh Uhchichâgomá .
45008002	Tepákonegawin Uhchichâgomá bemátizzewin gá bemájeigoeyán tepakonegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , nebowinink .
45008003	Tepákonekawin gashketosig nánumuk ōnje go atuh weyâsemá , Kitche Manito uhbe-ezhenázhowât onezheka Oguisun , anineeng uhbe-ezhenágoozit uhbeōnje na mutche izzhewabizzewin che banájetōt mutcheizzhewabizzewin oweyâsemáng .
45008004	Quiuk izzhewabizzewin tepákonegawin , konemá ketá ge-gishkámin , ope n'wâpenuhnungoon Uhchichâg , kâween weyâsemá .
45008005	Uhgew n'wâpenuttungig weyâsemá mego azhewabizzewât , azhewabuk weyâsemá , uhgewedush n'wâpenánájig Uhchichâgomán mego azhewabizzewât azhewabizzit Uhchichâgomá .
45008006	Uhnáguttuhwandumink weowemán nebowin , uhnáguttuhwanemint Uhchichâgomá , bemátizzewinnewun innuhwandewinnewun .
45008007	Onje mutche náguttuhwandumowin , osheengandán Kitche Manito , kâ tuhbusse buhgittinnegâtasenōn Kitche Manito otepákonegawin , kâ giya tá izzhewabussinōn .
45008008	Giya uhgew weyâsemáng ayájig kâ tá niandumeásewân Kitche Manitōn .
45008009	Keenowâ kâ weyâsemáng ketiáseem ; Uhchichâgománg ketiám kishpin eu izzhewabizzeyag , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun kegegishkowâwâ . Kishpin oweuh aninne , gegishkowâsig Jesus Christ ochichâgwun kâ odebanemigooseen .
45008010	Kishpin Christ kegishkowag ; weowemá nebomuhgut mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje Uhchichâgomá bemátizze , ōnje quiuk izzhewabizzawin .
45008011	Uhchichâgomán wuhow , gá ábejebáát Jesusun nebowiniuk , gegishkowag , ween gá ábejebáát Christun nebowinink , giya keenowâ keguh ábejebáigowâ , gá nebomuhguk keowewân ochichâgwun ōnje gagishkowag .
45008012	Me ōnje , nekânissetōk , kemazaniegamin , kâween ween oweyâsemá bemátizzewin che nopenutumink .
45008013	Kishpin weyâsemá bemátizzewin kenopenutumag keguh nebōm ; kishpindush Uhchichâgomá onje banájetoyag oweyâsemá bemátizzewin keguh bemátizzim .
45008014	Menik Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun sagábeginnegajig , Kitche Manito otōnejânissenun .
45008015	Kâ kege otâpenásewâ owwâkâne Uhchichâgomá che ge agizzeyagobun minowâ onejânissekáwin Uhchichâgomá kege tâpenáwâ wanje ázhequayunk , ekettoeyunk , Abba Nōs , eketbeyunk .
45008016	Uhchichâgomá ween tebinowa wetokâzo kechichâgonánin Kitche Manito uzzhojânisseminunk .
45008017	Kishpin onejânisseminunk , sazekizzidjig Kitche Manito onejânisun áweyunk , wejewunk mámowy Christ , kishpin wejekuhgwâtuhgitomin , konemá keguh wejekitchetwâwizzemánan .
45008018	Neendenandum o-o kuhgwâtuhgittowin , o-o bemátizzewin kâ tá apetandágoosinōn che tuzzhindumingebun anduhzhindumungoon kitchetwâwizzewin che nágwuk keowinnáng .
45008019	Aninne otenandumowin obetōn che nágweintwâ Kitche Manito onejânisun .
45008020	Aninne ge buhgittená anámiuhe ningōt anábuhtussenōk , kâween ween tebinowa otenandumowin , weendush ōnje gá ezhe buhgitenunk che ápanemoeyunk .
45008021	Onjittá , ween tebinowa , oguh debandán weow uzzhowâkânegopun banátizzewin che kitchetwâwandunk ween Kitche Manitōn che onejánissemigoot .
45008022	Kekekandámin kokkinná kago bamátuk mámátwamuhgut kuhgwâtuhgitomuhgut weessuhgandumomuhgut , nánázh nōngum .
45008023	Kâween atuh tebinowago , giya keowinánin : keenowint netam uhmenewit Uhchichâgomá ketiáwânán kemámátwamin giya keenowint , keowináng , uhbeoeyunk , che onejânissemigoeyunk , me eu bemátizzewin keowenánin .
45008024	Buhgoosanemowin keguh ōnje bemátizzemin azhindumink wiábundumingin , kâween kiábe nundowanduhzeen : aninne wiábundunk wagonan wanje nundowandunk ?
45008025	Kishpin nundowandumunk wiábunduhzewunk kâ keguh zhegutanduhzemin che betoeyunk .
45008026	Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun kenezhokomágonán keneennuhmizzewininnán : kâ kekekanduhzemin ga ōnje uhnumeáyungobun , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ketozhetágomin uhnumeáwin mámátwawin ga tebátotunzeengebun .
45008027	Ween shiabwâbundunk otaun okekandán ananduminit Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje otōzhetowân uhnumeáwin uhnumeánidjin anandunkigo Kitche Manito .
45008028	Kekekandámin , kokkinná iuheen mámowy uhnokemuhgut , che ōnje mennoizzhewabizzewât siágeájig Kitche Manitōn ; uhgew ōnje Kitche Manito ga meenwandunk .
45008029	Onje , ween kekanemát negân ge wuhwanandum Kitche Manito azhenágoozit , keche ezhenágoozit ween che negân negit magwaiuhe nebewá wekânissemág .
45008030	Minowâdush ono kakanemát negân : onundomán uhnew nandomájin omennoweshâwanemán onodush mánoweshâwanemájin ogitchetwâweán .
45008031	Ahneen ga ekettoeyâng tuzzhundumink ono iuheen ? Kitche Manito apanemoeyunk , owwanan ga gemutchetotonunk ?
45008032	Ween gá muhmanowanemásig onezheka Oguisun uhge buhgittenát , uhge ōnje nanit kokkinná keowinnánin áneen ga ge ezhe menissinowunk unishá kokkinná iuheen ?
45008033	Owwanan ga mikumowânan mutche kago , Kitche Manito otuhnishanâbamun ? ween Kitche Manito , mánowesháwanjegat ;
45008034	Owwanan wuhow , banáje-ewat ? ween Christ nabōt , kagatdush minowâ ge ábejebá , nōngumdush , Kitche Manito ogitchenikâng iá , ween giya ketuhnumeatumágonán .
45008035	Owwanan ga puhkawininunk , Jesus Christ osâge-ewawin ? kushkandumowin innuh ? nuhnezânizzewin innuh ? kushkandumowin innuh ? pingwoshâgittewin innuh ? nuhnezânizzewin innuh ? uzzhoweshk innuh ?
45008036	Azhebe-egâtagigo , keen ōnje mozhuk neendōnje namin , kokkinná gezhigutōn , tábishko mánishtánish netágawegumigōnk anuhginjegâzōt neendinnuhginjegâzomin .
45008037	Kagat nemushkâwizzemin kokkinná ono ween siágeinunk ōnje .
45008038	Neenkekandán koshá , kâween nebowin , kâ giya bemátizzewin , kâ giya Kitche Manito omezhinowamun , giya nâgânizzidjig mushkâwizzewin , giya iuheen nōngum , giya iuheen takoshinomuhgukin ,
45008039	Giya ishpáwin , giya keenweendumáwin , giya kago wazhichegâtag , kâ keguh kushkeigoosemin che buhkawinnegoeyunk Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
45009001	Quiuk neendabwa Jesus Christ ōnje , kâween neenguhgenowishkese , neennáguttuhwandumowinun newetokágonun Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje .
45009002	Kitche kosegwun kushkandumowin neendaink .
45009003	Neendá enandum keche nuhnibbekinjegâtagebun , neow Jesus Christ ōnje , nekânissemág ōnje neendinowamágunuk , mámowy biazhekwunk neowinánin :
45009004	Ween uhgew Israeliteug , uhgew onejânissekáwinnemág uhgew kitchetwâwizzewin ayájig , giya wâweendumátewin ayajig , giya uhmenitink tepákonegawin , Kitche Manito otuhnokewin ;
45009005	Uhgew waōsidjig , me wanjebát Jesus e-e weow , ween anewishkunk kokkinná áke , shâwandágoose ween Kitche Manito gâgineek . Amen .
45009006	Kago enandun kago , Kitche Manito odikittowin ningōt che inábuhtussinōk : kâween kokkinná Israeliteug , magwaiuhe Israel .
45009007	Kâ eu ōnje Abraham uzzhōnjebáwât kâween kokkinná otonejânississenun , ōnje , ekettōm , Isaac onejânissun tuh enáwug ;
45009008	Me eu atumink , uhgew onejânissemág , oweowemá ōnje , kâween Kitche Manito otonejânississenun onejânissemág wâweendumátewin me Kitche Manito onejânissun tuh enáwug .
45009009	Me o-o ekettowin wâweendumátewin ; nōngum neenguh takoshin , Saradush guhtuh oguisse .
45009010	Kâweendush o-o atuh , ope Rebecca wanejânissit , bazhek uzzhōndozhat , kōsinnán Isaac ,
45009011	( Uhbenocheug , chebwâ negewât , kâdush muhshe ningōtono izzhewabizzissewug , wanissheshink giya miánátuk , ween Kitche Manito gá onuhgindunk , gâgineek tuh ezhissininne , kâween uhnokewinun ōnje , weenigo nandominunk ōnje , )
45009012	Ge ená sazekizzit oguh uhnoketowân agâshenidjin .
45009013	Azhebe-egâtagigo , Jacob neengesâgeá , Esaudush neengesheenganemá .
45009014	Anneen ga ekettoeyunk ? Kitche Manito nuh mutchetotum ? Kâween pâpish .
45009015	Otinnân koshá Mosesun , anandumáninigo oweuh we shâwanemuk neenguh sháwanemá .
45009016	Me e-e kâween ween nanduhwandunk kago , kâween ween giya pamabuttōt , ween koshá Kitche Manitōn owâbundi-iggoot shâwanjegawin .
45009017	Azhebe-egâtanik , otinnân Pharaohun , me o-o wanje netáweginnán kechewâbundiewayán , nemushkâwizzewin keowwink , neenduhnozowin tuh wâwanjegâta anegoquág áke .
45009018	Me eu shâwanjega ukko oweuhgo wâshâwanemájin oshowanemán , anandunkinigo oweuh we mushkâwâtōt otaene , omushkâwâtowât .
45009019	Keguh ish , wagonan wanje osittáwandunk ? owwanan mache enandumágoot otenandumowin ?
45009020	Kâween eu , owwanan koshá keen aninnewiáweyun wiázhetamut Kitche Manito ? Iuhe gá oshichegâtagin otákuhquajemigōn innuh , wuhow gá ozhetōt , unishween o-o ge ezheeun ?
45009021	'Ow aninne wazheát ákekōn , kânuh odebanduhzeen eu uhzhishke , ayōt 'zhozheát ? kânuh bazhek otá ozheáseen che mennoizzhewabizzinit , bazhekdush che mutcheizzhewabizinit ?
45009022	Eu , Kitche Manito anandunk , che wâbundiewat onishkâtizzewin , giya che wâbundiewat omushkâwizzewin , uhkunwandunk keenwazh otossowinun pánemá ga banátuhkin ;
45009023	Tibbishko ga ezhe wâbundiewat kitchetwâwizzewin otogemáwewin , otossowin ogeshâtizzewin ōnje , kiut gezhá gá ozhissetōt che kitchetwâwuk ,
45009024	Ono keowenanin kegenundomigonán kâween atuh magwaiuhe Jewug , giyadush magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig ?
45009025	Tibbishko aketōt , Osee omazaniegunink , neenduhnishanâbamug neenguh enág uhgew watuhnishanâbamissewân ; weendush siágeut , siágeásewintebun .
45009026	Guhtuh izzhewabut ; emá uhge enintwâ , kâ ketotuhnishanâbamissinnonim : Kitche Manito giágega bemátizzit , onejânisun tuh enáwug .
45009027	Esaias giya ween iekettōt uhtuzzhemát Israelun ; Israel onejânisun ánuh nagowwizzhenug tuttebao kitchegumink , me ga ezhenowat ; pungedush tuh bemátizzewug .
45009028	Oguh gezhetōn uhnokewin , oguh tuhquâtōn quiuk izzhewabizzewinink : ōnje Kitche Manito oguh tuhquâtōn uhnokewin ákeeng .
45009029	Esaias gá ekettōt kiut , kishpin Kitche Manito Sabaoth , ge ishkoonissenonungwâbun punge , Sodomink ketá geizzhewabizzemin Gomorrhainkdush ketágeizzhenágoozemin .
45009030	Ahneen ga ekettoeyunk ? miátáwizzidjig uhge nopenuttunzikwâ quiuk izzhewapizzewin , uhge otittánâwâ nuh quiuk izzhewabizzewin , eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ;
45009031	Weenowâdush Israeliteug n'wâpenuttungig tepákonegawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin kâ ototitunzeenâwâ quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
45009032	Ahneezhween ? ōnje kâ mushkâwandumowinink ogenundowâbunduhzeenâwâ , tepákonegawe uhnokewinink koshá oge ezhe nundowâbundánâwâ . Bezogashinōg eu bezogashinink ásin ;
45009033	Azhebe-gâtagigo , binná , Sionink , neendátōn ásin che bezogashinink , giya azhebeek che ōnje nishkâtizzink ; owwagwandush ga tabwa anemágwan kâ tá águtchisse .
45010001	Nekawnissetoak , neendenandum neendaink , neenduhnumeatowâ Kitche Manito , Israeliteug che ōnje bemátizzewât .
45010002	Neenkekanemág uzzhenandumowât we uhnoketowât Kitche Manito , kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ ga ezhe uhnoketowâwât .
45010003	Kâ kekekanduhzigwâ Kitche Manito quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , tebinowa otizzhewabizzewinewâ quiuk izzhewabizzewin owwe ōnje ozhetōnâwâ , kâween tuhbusse buhgittenuhzeenâwâ weowewân che otâpenumowâpun Kitche Manito quiuk otizzhewabizzewin .
45010004	Ween Christ waquâsink tepákonegawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin kokkinná tiabwatungig .
45010005	Moses otuzzhindán quiuk izzhewabizzewin tepákoneganinink , ekettōnk , aninne kishpin andotunk ono iuheen , guhtuh ōnje bemátizze .
45010006	Quiuk azhewabizzidjig nebwâkâwin , me o-o azhe gegeowât ; kago anámeta eketto kago , owwanan gezhigōnk ga ezháwan che ekettoeyag ? ( che be-ezhewinit Christ ishpemink ōnje ; )
45010007	Uhgamá owwanan keenweendumáng ga ezhágwan ? ( che e-ezhewinit Christ nebowinink ōnje . )
45010008	Ahneendush akettowinnewung ? ekettowin bazhew tuhgoo ketonink áta , giya ketaink , ekettowin mushkâwandumowin gagequayáng ;
45010009	Me o-o ekettowin , kishpin ekettoeyun ketonink , ween Jesus Kitche Manito Oguisun , kishpindush tabwa-andumun ketaink , Kitche Manito uhge ábejebáát ánuh genebonit , keguh bemátiz .
45010010	Aninne tabwa-andunk otaink ōnje , quiuk izzhewabizzewinink ; otoninkdush ōnje quiuk ekettōt Jesus Christ Kitche Manito , tuh ōnje bemátizze .
45010011	Mazaniegun azhebe-egâtag akettomuhgut , owwagwan ga tabwa-anemágwan kâ tuh áqutchisse .
45010012	Kâween pekinōnk enandágoozissewug Jewug giya Greekug ; mego uhow Kitche Manito kokkinná tabanemát , oshâwanemándush oweuh nanândomigoojin .
45010013	Owwagwan nuhnândomágwan Kitche Manitōn onozowinink tuh bemátizze .
45010014	Ahneen ga ge ezhe nuhnândowâwât uhgew tiabwa-anduhzigoog ? áneen ga ge tabwa-anemáwât uhgew n'wánduhzigoog ? áneen ga ge-ezhe nōndumowât kagequat iásinit ?
45010015	Ahneen ga ge owwe ezhe guhgequawât azhenázhowâsewintwá ? azhebe-egâtagigo , binná azhe bisshegandágwuk uhgew gagequajig ozittáwân uhbetowât wanissheshink meenwâjemowin !
45010016	Kâween koshá kokkinná ōge tabwatuhzeenâwâ guhgequawin , Esaias eketto , Kitche Manito , owwanan tiabwatunk neendikittowininán ?
45010017	Uhnōndumink me wanjebámuhgut , mushkâwandumowin , uhnōndumink Kitche Manito odikittowin ōnjebámuhgut .
45010018	Neendikit , kânuh genōndowâsewug ? á , kagat , nōndowâwug kokkinná ákeeng ogegetowinewâ ezhámuhguttinne uhwaquiág áke .
45010019	Neendush neendikit , kânuh Israeliteug okekanduhzeenâwâ ? netam Moses eketto , keguh totonim che guhgâwanemagwâ uhgew anishanâbawissigwâ kagebátizzidjigdush keguh ōnje nishkâtizzim .
45010020	Esaias kitche sōngetaha , ekettodush , nandowâbomissigook neengemikágōg neengewábundi-igōg uhgew kaquajemesiggook .
45010021	Otinnândush Israelun , kopa gezhik neengeshebinnekato wâg uhgew tiabwatunzigook miázheninnewuggizzidjig anishanâbag .
45011001	Neendikitdush Kitche Manito nuh ogewabenán otuhnishanâbamun ? kâween pâpish . Neen Israelitun neendow , Abraham onejânisun , bazhek Benjaminitug .
45011002	Kâ Kitche Manito owabenáseen otuhnishanâbamun , kint kakanemájin . Kânuh kekekanouhzeem mazeniegun aketomuhguk uhtuzzhemint Elias azhe uhnumeatowât Kitche Manitōn Israelun ekettōnk ,
45011003	Kitche Manito , ogenissáwân kemamándáwizzemun , ogewânekâtánâwân kesáságewitchegun ukko uzzhuttag , ezhekadush neennuhguhnigo , onundowâbundánâwâdush neembemátizzewin .
45011004	Ahneen Kitche Manitōn agoot naquatágoot ? neengekuhnowandumázonug , neezhwâswa tusso metaswâk aninnewug kâwekâ ogeshuhgushketowâsewân Baal oezhenágoozewin .
45011005	Mego azhewabuk nōngum , ánint ge onábomáwug shâwandágoozewinink ōnje .
45011006	Kishpin shâwandágoozewinink ōnje kâween gayábe uhnokewinink , kishpindush izzhewabussinōk shâwanjegawin kâ shâwanjegawinewunzenōn . Kishpin anokewinewunōgwan , kâ sháwandágoozewinewunzenōn , kishpin izzhewabussinōk uhnoke win kâween gayábe uhnokewinewunzenōn .
45011007	Wagonandush ? Israel kâ otiáseen e-e nandowâbundunk , gá onábominjig otiánâwâdush ánintdush kuhgebeenewawug .
45011008	( Azhebe egâtag Kitche Manito ogemenán ochichâgwun nabáshkinit oskezhigōn ga wâbissigwânin , otowuhgundush ga aōnduhzigwânin ) nánázh o-o gezhigut .
45011009	Daviddush eketto , otuhtopowinewâ tuh nuhgwâgunewuninne , tuh tussonágunewuninne , tuh bezogashinewunnewun , che tepáumágowizzewât :
45011010	Oskezhigowân tuh dibbikuttinnewun , kâ tá wâbissewug mozhuk tuh wâgishkâwug .
45011011	Neendikitdush bezogashinowât nuh tuh buhgittashinōg ; kâween pâpish ; obuhgittashinowân ōnje wanje otissigowât shâwandagoozewin miátáwizzidjig che ōnje keshâwandumowât .
45011012	Kishpin eu obuhgittashinowinnewân kitchetwâwizzewin ákeeng áwung kishpin otuhbusandágoozewinewâ me miátáwizzidjig ogitchetwâwizzewinewâ binná owushema menik uzzhuhpetandágwutinik .
45011013	Keguhnonenim miátáwizzeyag neen miátáwizzidjig neen neenduhnōnigo che ezháeyán miátáwizzidjig , neen kitche apetandán neendinuhnokewin .
45011014	Newekooche ōmbwaág nekánisug keche ásheintwâ konemá ánint neendá bemájeág .
45011015	Kishpin wabenintwâ ōnje mennoizzhewabuk áke , kishpin minowâ otâpenintwâ , áneen ga izzhewabuk bemátizzewin nebowinik ōnje !
45011016	Kishpin netam menekân , onissheshink , kokkinná andusink onissheshin , ojebekâwunk onissheshink wuhnuhkowunk giya onissheshin .
45011017	Kishpin ánint otikqunun ge bokooshkág , keendush buhgwutche metigoeyun ge tuhgoogeigoeyun magwaiuhe ketotâpenándush ánint uhjebekâwewât oweninnowât wanisshezhit mano menekânewit metig ;
45011018	Kágo kitchetwâwizzekâzokan magwaiuhe , kishpin kitchetwâwizzekâzoeyun , kâween kenetáwigittoseen ojebeek , ojebeek koshá keen kenetáwiggeigōn .
45011019	Keguh eketdush , me wanje bokooshkág , ōnjittá keche uhgogeigoeyán .
45011020	Kishpin izzhewabuk , otikqunun bokooshkâwun ōnje uhtabwa-anduhzeeng ; keendush kenebow mushkâwandumowinink ōnje , kago kitchetwâwanemōkan , sagizzin .
45011021	Kishpin ween Kitche Manito gá bokobetogwan otikqunun , tuhtebábin konemá giya keen keguh bokobenik .
45011022	Náguttuhwandun , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin , giya quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , nágwuttinne , uhgew bangeshingig buhshunzhaogowizzewin , keendush enuhkuhkayá shâwandágoozewin kishpin mozhuk meenjimenumowut oshâwanjegawin , kishpindush meenjimenuhzewun keguh buhkawabinnego .
45011023	Giya weenowâdush kishpin mozhuk ágoonwatunzigwâ tuh uhgogeáwug ; Kitche Manito okushketōn keche uhgwuhgeát minowâ .
45011024	Kishpin keen buhgwutche metigōnk ge ōndizzhogoeyun owwe uhgoogeigoeyundush wanisshezhit metig , kânuh nowutch wanepunussinōn nayáb che uhgogittōng ono otikqunun , gá ōnje bokooshkágebun ?
45011025	Kâ ketenanemissenonim nekânissetōk keche kekanduhzewag o-o suhnágizzewin ápadush kekekandumowât ketenaneminenim , ( konemá ketâ we nebwâkâwandám keowewâng ) ketá we kekandánâwâ ánint Israelitug kagebeengwawât , nánázh che kuhbasanik miátáwizzidjig che peendegawât .
45011026	Me kokkinná Israelitug guhtuh bemátizzewug azhebeegâtagigo ; Zionink tuh ōnjebá Gabemáje-ewat , ween oguh ikkoonunmowân miázheninnewugizzewin Jacobink .
45011027	Me o-o azhe wâweendumowugwâ ope ikonumowugwâ omutche izzhewabizzewinewân .
45011028	Uhtuzzhindumink meenwâjemowinink miátáwizzewug keenowâ ōnje , uhtuzzhemintwâ wanábominjig sâgeáwug ōsewân ōnje .
45011029	Kitche Manito omegewawin giya onundōngawin uzzhánwanindizzoseeng .
45011030	Ge kuhbekosag kiut tabwa-anemásewag Kitche Manito nōngumdush keshâwandágoozim uhge tabwa-anduhzigwâ ōnje ;
45011031	Giya weenowâ nōngum kâ tabwa-anduhzewug keenowâ uhmennoweshâwandágoozeyag me ga ōnje mennoweshâwandágoozewât .
45011032	Kitche Manito omowōndonán menik tiabwatunzinit , kokkinná keche sháwanemát .
45011033	Tiá kitche mámuhkâtuhkumik , azhe kitche apetandágwuk , Kitche Manito onebwâkâwin giya onáguttuhwandumowin , otepákonegawin kâ kushketoseem che nissetotumink , kâ tá mikunzeem azhetwât !
45011034	Owwanan kakandunk Kitche Manito otenandumowin , owwananun gá guhgekemigoojin ?
45011035	Owwanan netam gá menát Kitche Manitōn kago , nayábdush che uzzhamegewat ?
45011036	Onje ween ōnjebámuhguk weowink ōnje , emá weowink kokkinná kago ween guhtuh kitchetwâwizze gâgineek . — Amen .
45012001	Me ōnje nekânissetōk , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje keguhgâzominenim che buhgittinumag keowewân , bamátuk sáságewitchegun benuttōn onissheshinōn , ta apetandágwut Kitche Manito che otâpenungebun , me o-o ga izzhewabizzeyagobun .
45012002	Kago azhewabuk o-o áke izzhewabizzekago : gwakandumōk kenáguttuhwandumowinewân konemá ketá kekandám wanissheshink mánoizzhewabuk Kitche Manitá otenandumowin .
45012003	Onje neendikit , shâwanjegawin mánigoeyán ōnje , kokkinná aninnewug andussheyag neendinág , kago kitche apetandumokago keowewân , tuhbusanemoyeuk Kitche Manito azhe mámenigoeyag , che mushkâwandumag .
45012004	Azhe bátienuk kebuhkazewinenánin keowináng , kokkinnádush buhkazewinun tebishko azhe uhnokâtunzeeng .
45012005	Me debishko ga ezhe bazhekwunk keowinánin Jesus Christ mámowy , kokkinnágo mámowy keowinânin che ápiche bazhekwunk ;
45012006	Papuhkân kege ezhe mámenigomin menittewin , shâwanindewin kishpin we tebátotumunk , umbasinno tebátotuntá , mushkâwandumowin gá menigoeyunk :
45012007	Uhgamá uhnokewin , umbasino uhnoketá , ketuhnokewininánin , weendush guhgequat , máno oguh tuzzhekân oguhgequawin :
45012008	Ween kashketōt owwe guhgequat máno tuhguhgequa : ween mágewat , wawane , tuhmegewago che enandunk , ween nâgânizzit , máno oguh tuzzhekán : weendush shâwanjegat , máno tuh shâwanjega wawane che enandunk .
45012009	Kesâge-ewawin , kago kuhgianizzewin guhtuh tuhgoosinōn . Sheengandun miánátuk , meenjimenun wanissheshink .
45012010	Mennoweshâwanindig mamáshkōt , kitchetwâweittig mamáshkōt .
45012011	Kago ketimishke kago uhnokewin , tuh gezheshawâtizzewug kechichâgowâng , uhnoketowag Kitche Manito .
45012012	Keguh pâpenanemōm che enandumunk mushkâwandumōk kekotuhgetowinewâng mozhuk uhnumeág .
45012013	Mámenik uhnumeajig azhe muhmunazewât : keshawâtizenotowik oweuh .
45012014	Shâwanemuk uhgew kemutchetotonágook , shâwanjegag , ago kekâwetunkago .
45012015	Weje mennowânegoozemikōg , manowânegoozidjig , wege mowemikōg mawidjig .
45012016	Tebishko ienandumōnk mámowy kago kache apetandágwukin papámandun kago , tuhbusandumōk keowewán tebishko uhgew tabusandágoozidjig , kago nebwâkâwandun kago keowwewân .
45012017	Kago ázhetowâákan aninne ningōtono ezhe mutchetotōk , quiuk izzhewabizzin che kushketoeyun kago anosumewât kokkinná aninnewug .
45012018	Kishpin kushketoeyag mennoinnuhwandeyeuk kokkinná anishanâbag .
45012019	Siágeinnuhgook , kago wekâ tebinowa oweuh mutchetotowâ kago , oweuh enishkâtizzetonag kago keenowâ ázhetá nishkâtizzetowâ kago , oshebe-egâta neendebandán buhshunzhaogowizzewin , neen neenguh tebáán , eketto Kitche Manito .
45012020	Eu ōnje , keshânganeminág , buhkuttat , usshumik , gâshkunábágwat , menihik che minnequat , eu totumag uhkuhkuhzhan keguh oguisetowâwâ ōshtegwânink .
45012021	Kago mutche izzhewabizzewin keguh uhnewishkágooseenâwâ , uhnewishkumōk mutche izzhewabizzewin che mennoizzhewabizzeyag .
45013001	Kokkinna oguhtepieganâwâ nâgânizzinidjin ; kâ kago negânizzewin , meatuh Kitche Manito mágewat : negânizzewin anduhgōg me Kitche Manito ogemegewan .
45013002	Eu ōnje , ween anákonunk nâgânizzewin onánákonán Kitche Manito otepákonegawin , uhgewedush nánákonungig oguh otâpenumázoonâwâ kotuhgittowin .
45013003	Nâgânizzidjig , kâween oguh gwasageásewân mennoizzhewabizzinidjin meatuh macheizzhewabizzinidjin gagwasageáwâjin , kâween innuh keguh gosásewân nâgânizzit ? mennoizzhewabizzeyag , nâgânizzit keguh mámowyewumik .
45013004	Ween Kitche Manitōn otuhnonigōn keche mennototōk . Kishpindush mutche totumun , sagizzin ; kâween unishâ oguhguhbikunzeen uzzhoweshk ; Kitche Manitōn otuhnonigōn keche buhshunzhawât mutcheizzhewabizzinidjin .
45013005	Me eu onje , ōnjittá ga ōnje tabwatowag , kâween atuh nishkâtizzewin ōnje , tebinowadush ketenandumowinewâ ōnje .
45013006	Me o-o wanje tepáumag tepáumátewin ; Kitche Manito otoskenegamemigowân che uhnoketowâwât uzzhuhnoketumowât o-o uhnokewin .
45013007	Kokkinná azhe guhgekimigoeyag , izzhewabizzig tepáumowik , ween watâpenunk tepáumátewin ; gosik uhow anandágoozeyag che gosag ; kitchetwâwanemik uhow anandágoozeyag che kitchetwâwanemag .
45013008	Kago oweuh aninne mazenumowâ kago , kago , meatuh , che sáságeitteyag , weenowâ siágeittidjig etabwatánâwâ tepákonegawin .
45013009	Onje o-o , kago bisshegwâtizze kago , kago nisshewa kago , kago kemote kago , kago guhnowishke kago , kago we otâpenumowâ kago kewejetuhkewamágun otieem ; kishpin giya minowâ anduhgogwan guhgequawin , mego o-o mámowy , sâgeikōg kewejetuhkewamágunewâg azhe ságeittizzoeyag .
45013010	Sâge-ewawin izzhawabizzewin kâ ezhe mutchetotowâsewut kewejetuhkewamágunun ; sâgeittink me tabwatumink tepákonegawin .
45013011	Binná me shegwouh chewe gooshkoozingebun nōngum ; bazhew nowutch tuhgomuhgut che bemájeiggoeyag ope anduhgogebun wiazhkut tiabwatumáng .
45013012	Dibbikut kagâ eeshquâsa , gezhigut bazhew tuhgoo ; umbasinno wabenuntá kushkedibbikut uhnokewin , pezekundámin wâsayá ushwewenun .
45013013	Wawane bamosatá , tibbishko gázheguhkin , kâween ween kewushquabe wekoondewinink , kâween bisshegwâtizzewinink , kâween kekândewinink :
45013014	Pezekonittizzōk Jesus Christ , Neenkitche Manitomenán , kago nianemowinekakago mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
45014001	Ween nánuhmutinik omushkâwandumowin , otâpenik , kago guhgânjetowâ kago che tabwatunk .
45014002	Bazhek aninne tabwatunk , kokkinná kágo otá mejin , bazhekdush nánuhmutinik otenandumowin natáwegininidjin omejenáwân .
45014003	Wuhow májit , kago oguh pâpizhemáseen uhow májissinit , weendush májesig , kago oguh tebugemáseen , uhnew májinit ; ōnje Kitche Manito , oge otâpinegōn .
45014004	Owwanan keen wiáweyun , tabákonut , bakânizzit aninne , otuhnoketâgaweninnemun ? anosumuhbenit tebinowa tabanemigoojin onebowit gamá pongesin , kagat ōnjittá tuh nebowwe , Kitche Manito okushketōn che nebowinit .
45014005	Bazhek aninne enandum , bazhek gezhigut owushema apetandágwut bazhek apetandágwuk ; bazhekdush aninne enandum kokkinná gezhigutōn , tibbishko apetandágwutōn enandum . Anduhzhit aninne , máno tuh mushkâwandum anandunk .
45014006	Ween kanowandunk gezhigut okunwandumowân Kitche Manitōn , ween kanowandumowâsig , Kitche Manitōn gezhigut ká okunwanduhzeen ; ween wâsinit oweesenetowân Kitche Manitōn ōnje megwach otinnân Kitche Manitōn , weendush wâsinissig owesenetowâsig Kitche Manitōn megwachenát Kitche Manitōn .
45014007	Kâ oweuh andussheyunk tebinowa weow ōnje bemátizzisse , kâdush oweuh aninne tebinowa weow oneboittizzose .
45014008	Bemátizzeyunk , Kitche Manito ketōnje bemátizzemin , kishpin neboeyunk nenebotowânán Kitche Manito ; kishpin neboyáng , giya kishpin bemátizzeyáng , bōchigo Kitche Manito ketebanemigonán .
45014009	Me gá izzhewabizzit Christ uhgenebōt , minowâdush ge onishkât , ge bemátizzit , keche Omanitomewât nabojig giya bemátizzidjig .
45014010	Wagonan wanje tebákonut kekânis ? wagonan kakooshishink wanje enanenemut kekânis ? ōnje kokkinná keguh nebowwemin anosumuhbit Christ otepákonegawinink .
45014011	Azhebe-egâtagigo mazaniegunink , ezhe bemátizzeyán eketto Kitche Manito , andusshewât kokkinná neenguh shuhgushketágōg kokkinnádush andusshewât neen Kitche Manitōm oguh enáwân Kitche Manitōn .
45014012	Kokkinná andussheyáng keguh buhgittenumowânán Kitche Manito keowinánin .
45014013	Umbasinno , kago tepákonittesetá minowâ , náguttuhwandumōk , koshá o-o kago oweuh aninne oguh uttowâwân wekánisun kago che bezogashinit .
45014014	Neenkekandán Jesus Kitche Manito neengeguhgâzomik kâween kago benezik , kâween ussinōn oweuh atuh wenut enandungin kago , wenuttinne .
45014015	Kishpin kekânis ánwandumōk májeun , kâ quiuk ketotunze kago oweseneyun ōnje , banájeákan uhow Christ ga ōnje najin .
45014016	Kemennoizzhewabizzewin kago tuh mámutche tuhzhinjegâtasenōn .
45014017	Onje Kitche Manito otogemáwewin kâween mejimewunzenōn kâ giya menequawinewunzenōn , quiuk izzhewabizzewinewun , mennoinnowandewin , mojegandumowin Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje .
45014018	Oweuh aninne uhnoketowât , ono iuheen , oniandumeán Kitche Manitōn , oniandumeán giya aninnewun .
45014019	Umbasinno , nopenuhtunta ono iuheen che mennoinnowandunk ga ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeeng .
45014020	Kago banájetokan Kitche Manito otuhnokewin wesenewin ōnje . Kokkinná iuheen bánuk , mutcheizzhewabut koshá 'ow aninne ketwan májit ánuh kekandunk mutche izzhewabutinik .
45014021	Tá onissheshin che mejeseeng weyâs , giya che menequaseeng shomenâbo , uhnōch giya kago ga ōnje ositáwandunk nekânis , gamá ga ōnje nenuhmizzit .
45014022	Kemushkâwandum innuh ? kunwandum tebinowa anosumeet Kitche Manito , shâwandágooze 'ow aninne wekâ machetotunzik kekandunk mutcheizzhewabutinik .
45014023	Weendush wiágoonwatunk ketwan májejin buhnátizze ; ween mushkâwanduhzik mutcheizzhewabizze .
45015001	Neenowint menik muskâwizzeyáng , ketá nezhokomowwânánig nanuhmizzidjig , kâween weenigo chewe niandumeittizzoeyunk .
45015002	Máno kokkinná andussheyunk ketá niandumeánán kewejetuhkewamáguninán mennoizzhewabizzewin ōnje .
45015003	Tebishko Christ , kâ ezhe niandumeittizosig , azhebe-egâtagigo , ketozomigowin neendotissigōn .
45015004	Kishpin kago gá ozhebe-egâtag kiut keguhgekimegowininánin gá ōnje ozhebe-egâtag o-o uhbeoyunk ápadush keche ōnje niandumink mazaniegunink .
45015005	Nōngum Kitche Manito ween mágewat mennowânegwandumowin ápadush meninunk kokkinná tebishko keche enandumag Jesus Christ ga ezhe meenwandunk .
45015006	Konemá tá bazhekwun ketenandumowinewâ , giya tuh bazhekwun ketonewâ megwetch keche enug Kitche Manito ōsun , ween Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
45015007	Eu ōnje shuhshâwanindig eu ōnje tebishko Christ gá ezhe shâwaneminunk Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewinink ōnje .
45015008	Neendikit ween Jesus Christ sáságewitchegaweninnewe uhnoketunk gewetázhowin Kitche Manito otabwawin ōnje , keche sōngetōng o-o wâweendumátewin gá ezhe wâweendumowintwâ osemág .
45015009	Giya miátáwizzidjig megwetch oguh enáwân Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje azhebe-egâtagigo , o-o keguh nuhguhmōtōn ketuhnozowinink magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig Nemanitōn gâgineek keguh enin .
45015010	Minowâdush eketto , pâpenanemoyeuk miátáwizzeyag mámowy otuhnishanâbamun .
45015011	Minowâdush , uhnumeatowik Kitche Manito kokkinná andussheyag miátáwizzeyag , megwetch enik Kitche Manito kokkinná anishanâbatook .
45015012	Minowâ Esaias eketto , Jesse ojebekâwit tuh mokishkâ ween oguh ogemákundowan miátáwizzinidjin .
45015013	Nōngum Kitche Manito ween mágewat buhgoosanemowin máno keguh totonim che mennowânegwandumag che innuhwandeyag uhtabwatumag , che buhgoosanemoeyag Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
45015014	Neen tebinowa neenkekandán nekânissetōk uhmooshkenayag nebwâkâwin , kekushketōm che kuhgekindeyag mamashkōt .
45015015	Kâween nōndás , nekânissetōk , kege oshebeumonim nowatch kesheguhnoninuhgook , owwe ōmbwa-andumonuhgook kenáguttuhwandumowinewâ e-e shâwandágoozewin ōnje Kitche Manito gá mezhit .
45015016	Onje neendá guhgequa che guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidig Jesus Christ ōnje , unnoketowwint Kitche Manito omeenwâemowin ; konemá Kitche Manito otá otâpenán miátáwizzidjig sáságewitchegawinewâ , ge benechegâzowug Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje .
45015017	Kago neendián ga ōnje , kitchetwâwanemoyámbán Jesus Christ ōnje magwa ono iuheen Kitche Manito tiabwa-andunin .
45015018	Neenguh shâgwanim che tuhzhindumán ono iuheen Christ kâ neenge ōnje enuhnokese quiuk keche ōnje izzhewabizzeât miátáwizzidjig .
45015019	Kitche uhnokewinun kitche mámuhkâtuhkumik ōnje Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun omushkâwizzewin ōnje , me eu Jerusalemink gewetáiuhedush nánázh Illyricumink , wawane membabáguhgequa Christ omeenwâjemowin .
45015020	Kagat neenge wekoocheton che guhgequayán meenwâjemowin kâween emá Christ otuhnozowin uzzhuttanik ōnje kâween neendá ágweto-ozhegase bakânizzit aninne ozhegat .
45015021	Azhebe-egâtagigo , uhgewedush gá nonduhzigook oguh nissetotumōg .
45015022	Me o-o ōnje kâ ōnje otissinonuhgook kiut .
45015023	Nōngumdush kâ minowâ ningōtono neenguh enuhnokese emá o-o tuhnuhkewinink , kitche nebewa tusso kekenonowin aquo enandumán we be otissinnuhgook ,
45015024	Kishpin Spainink ezhe babámátizzeán keguh beotisinim , ápadush wâbomugwâ papámátizzeyán ketenaneminenim , che nezhokomoweyag papámátizzeyán kishpinigo nowutch meenwanduman wejewinuhgook .
45015025	Nōngum Jerusalemink neendezhá , che uhnoketowagwâ uhnumeájig .
45015026	Enandumōg : andánuhkejig Macedoniaink giya Achaiaink che mámenáwât kago katemákizzinidjin Jerusalemink .
45015027	Kagat niandumeáwug uhgew , omazenumowâwândush uhnew kishpin miátáwizzidjig ge ezheintwâ ánint otezhetwâwinewâ oguhgequawinewâ nayáb tá menáwug ánint omá akeeng otinnotawizzewin .
45015028	Ope kezhetáyán o-o , ope kezhekumán o-o enuhnokewin keguh beotissinim Spainink keche ezháeyán .
45015029	Neenkekandán ope we be otissinnungook neenguh mooshkenan Christ omeenwâjemowin oshâwanjegawin .
45015030	Kekuhquajeminenim nekânissetōk Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje giyadush Uhchichâgemá osâge-ewawin ōnje uhnumeatumoweshig , uhnumeatowik Kitche Manito .
45015031	Konemá neendá ōnje getishkeág uhgew tiabwatunzigook Judeaink ; neenduhnokewindush ga enuhnokean Jerusalemink , konemá tá ōnje mennoizzhewabizzewug uhnumeájig .
45015032	Konemá ketá beotissinim mennowânegoozewinink , Kitche Manito otenandumowinik , ga ápiche chewejewinuhgook keguh mennowânegwandámin .
45015033	Kitche Manito ween mágewat innuhwandewin máno keguh mennoinuhwamigowâ kokkinná . Amen .
45016001	Keguh innuhwanduhininim Phebeun neendowamánán uhnoketunk uhnumeawin Cenchreaink ;
45016002	Mennototowik Kitche Manito otuhnōzōwinink uhnumeáji ga izzhewabizzewâpun , kishpin kago nundowandunk che nezhokomowag , nezhokomowik , nebewá ween obenánezhokomo wân neengenezhokomág giya neen .
45016003	Uhnumekowwik Priscilla , giya Aquila , neen názhokomowwidjig Jesus Christ ōnje ;
45016004	( Obuhgittenánâwân ōshtegwánewân neen che ōnje bemátizzeyán ; megwatch neendenág , kâweendush atuh weenowâ , giya miátáwizzidjig uhnumeájig neendenág ; )
45016005	Uhnumekowwikōg uhnumeájig andáwât abinidjin : siágeug Epenetus , me 'ow netam menekânewit Jesus Christ Achaiink .
45016006	Uhnumekowwik Mary , kitche nebewá neengenezhokomágonán .
45016007	Uhnumekowwik Andronicus , giya Junia , neendinowamágunug , neejowwâkânug apetandágoozewug magwaiuhe kagequanidjin Christun wâjewâjig negân chebwâ wejewug .
45016008	Uhnumekowwik Amplias , ween siágeug Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink .
45016009	Uhnumekowwik Urbane , názhokomowweyumint Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink giya Stachys siágeug .
45016010	Uhnumekowwik Appelles , kakandágoozit uhwejewât Chrisum . Uhnumekowwik Aristobulus kokkinná giya andusotawizzit Kitche Manitōn wâjewâjig .
45016011	Uhnumekowwik Herodian neendinowamágun giya Narcissus andussotawizzidjig .
45016012	Uhnumekowwik Triphena , giya Triphosa , uhnokewâjig Kitche Manitōn . Uhnumekowwik Persis siágeug nebewá otuhnoketowân Kitche Manitōn .
45016013	Uhnumekowwik Rufus , Kitche Manitōn gá onákonigoojin , ōgeen giya neen neenguh .
45016014	Uhnumekowwik Asyncritus , giya Phlegon , giya Hermas , giya Patrobas , giya Hermes , wekânissun wâjewigowâjin .
45016015	Uhnumekowwik Philologus , Julia , giya Nereus , giya otowamán , giya Olympas , kokkinná giya uhnumeájig wâjewigoojin .
45016016	Iyuhnumikotátig wawane che ojeendeyag . Christ otuhnumeájin ketánumekagōnâwâ .
45016017	Binná nekânissetōk ketenenim , náguttuhwanemik uhgew amemegonátizzidjig bapámanduhzigook o-o ezhetwâwin anduhzhekumunk metágwaetowikōg .
45016018	Kâween otuhnoketowâsewâ Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christun , meatuh tebinowa omisutáwâ ; menno ekettowinun nennogegetowinun ōnje owiazhemigōnáwân kagebátizzidjig etaewân .
45016019	Kemennoizzhewabizzewin kokkinná kekanjegâta , neenitche pâpenanim keenowâ ōnje , umbadush ōnjittá kekandumag wanissheshink kekáduhzewagdush mánátuk .
45016020	Kitche Manito gezhawâtizzit keguh tuhtuhkokâttumoigowâ Mutche Manito wiebuh . Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ uhshâwanjegawin keguh wejewigōnâwâ . Amen .
45016021	Timotheus ween wâjuhnokenit , giya Lucius , giya Jason , ya Sosipater , neendinnowamágun ketuhnemikágowâg .
45016022	Neen Tertius , gá ozhebeumán o-o mazeniegun ketunneikonim Kitche Manito ōnje .
45016023	Gaius usshungaweninne ween wâtuhgamug kokkinná giya uhnumeajig ketunnemikágowag . Erastus nâgânizzit otanonk ketunnemikag , giya Quartus wekânissemá .
45016024	Máno Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ keguh shâwanemigowâg kokkinná andussheyag . Amen .
45016025	Nōngum Ween kashketōt che sōngeinág neenguhgequawinink uhguhgekindink Jesus Christ , ( azhe wâbundi-itink kiátuhkin ápinna aquo ákewung gátōngin ,
45016026	Nōngumdush nágwitchegâta giya mamándáwizzidjig otoshebe-egunnewân ōnje , azhe guhgequat giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito kokkinná azheweenzojig kekandumonáwug , keche tabwatumowât mushkâwandumowin ; )
45016027	Ween Kitche Manito ween atuh nabwâkât tuh kitchetwâwizze Jesus Christ ōnje , gâgineek . Amen .
46001001	Paul , uhnew Jesus Christ anonájin , ween Kitche Manito gá onuhgemájin , giya Sosthenes nekânissenán ,
46001002	Kitche Manito otuhnumeawinink Corinthink atag , neendoshebeumonánig , uhgew tiabwatungig Jesus Christun , anumeájig aninjig , kokkinná giya uhnōch ayiájig anumeatowâjig Jesus Christun Kekitche Manitomenán kokkinná Okitche Manitomewân :
46001003	Keguh shâwandâgoozim , keguh mennoinnowamáwâ Kitche Manito Kōsinán , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ .
46001004	Gâgineek megwatch neendenanemá Neenkitche Manitōm keenowâ ōnje , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje kemenigōm Jesus Christ ōnje :
46001005	Kokkinná kago kekitchetwâweigowâ kokkinná gegetowinink kokkinná , giya kekandumowinik ;
46001006	Jesus Christ ogegetowin azhe mushkâwissink keowwevâng .
46001007	Kokkinná tatussin azhe menigoeyag uhbeoeyag che tuhko think Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ :
46001008	Ween ga sōngeinnag nánázh ga áquo bemátizzeyag , kago che ánwanindágoozisseyag , ope gezhigut tepákonegat Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
46001009	Onjittá Kitche Manito tuhtabwa , enik aketōt , ween gá undominag che wejeweag Oguisun Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christun .
46001010	Ketuhnumeatōn , nekánisstōk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink ōnje , kokkinná andussheyag mámowy tibbishko mego ga ekettoeyag , wekâ che buhkawenittissewag : awane mozhuk keguh mámowy ittim tebishko che enandumag che bazhekwunk ketebákonegawinewâ .
46001011	Neongeweendumágo , nekânissetōk , azhewabizzeyag Chloe adát andájig , neengeweendumágōg , uhkekândeyag .
46001012	O-o neendikit , andussheyag keti-ekettōm , Paul neendinowâ bazhek eketto ; minowâ bazhek , neen Apollos neendinowâ eketto , minowâ bazhek , Cephas neendinotowâ ; minowâ bazhek , neen Christ neendinotowâ , eketto .
46001013	Ween nuh Christ ge onuhoke ? Paul nuh gá ōnjenat keowwewân ? Paul nuh otuhnozowinink kege baptizemigōm ?
46001014	Megwetch neendená Kitche Manito neen oweuh uhge baptizemissenenuhgook meatuh Crispus giya Gáius ;
46001015	Oweuh andussheyag keche ekettosig keche baptizeug tebinowa neenduhnozowinink .
46001016	Giya uhge baptizeug Stephanas andussogat ; kâween neenkekanduhzeen oweuh minowâ keche ge baptizeug .
46001017	Kâween neenduhnonigose che baptizewayán keche guhgequayán atuh , kâween ween nebwâkâgegetowinink konemá Jesus Christ oguhgequawin tábanáchichegâta .
46001018	Jesus Christ oguhgequawin , kuhgepátandágwut enandumōg mache izzhewabizzidjig : keenowintdush enik bemátizzeyunk , Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ketenandámin .
46001019	Ezhebe-egâta , neenguh banájetowâg nabwâkâjig onebwâkâwinewâ , neenguhtotán ningōt che inâbuhtussinōk anishanâbag onebwâkâwinewâ .
46001020	Ahneesh uhgew nabwâkâjig ? áneesh 'ow wazhebe-egat ? áneesh 'ow natágágetōt omá ákeeng ? Kânuh Kitche Manito oge nisshewuhnájetoseen onebwâkâwin o-o ákeeng ?
46001021	Onje Kitche Manito onebwâkâwinink , ákeeng nebwâkâwin , kâ okekanemáseen Kitche Manitōn , Kitche Manito niandum guhgepách oguhgequawin , keche ōnje bemátizzewât tiabwatungig .
46001022	Jewug onundowandánáwâ mamándátotumowin , Greekugdush nebwâkâwin , onundowandánâwâ :
46001023	Christ uhgesussuhgáquo-ōnt , neenowint neenguhgequamin , Jewug keche ōnje betákoozetashinowât , Greekugdush okuhgepátizzewinewâ .
46001024	Uhgewedush nandominjig , niyazh Jewug giyâ Greekug Christ Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin giya onebwâkâwin .
46001025	Onje Kitche Manito okuhgebátizzewin , owushema nebwâkâ , aninne azhe nebwákât giya Kitche Manito oneennuhmizzewin owushema mushkâwizze aninne apecheweet .
46001026	Binná azhe nundomigoeyag , nekânissetōk , kâween gwetch bátienissewug nabwâkâjig , magwaiuhe ákeeng andánuhkejig , kâ bátienissewug kache apetandágoozidjig :
46001027	Kitche Manito ogeonuhgindán kuhgebátizzewin ákeeng che mámuhkâtandumowât nabwâkâjig , Kitche Manito oge onuhgindán nánuhmukkin ákeeng , che mámuhkâtandumowât kache apetandágoozidjig ;
46001028	Mache andágwukkin ákeeng , giya iuheen shângandumingin Kitche Manito ogeonuhgindánun , iuheen giya anduhgoosinōk keche ōnje banájetōng iuheen anduhgoojin ningoot che inábuhtussinnōk :
46001029	Kâ oweuh aninne oguh kitche twâwanduhzeen weow an osumeet Kitche Manito .
46001030	Keenowâ ketebanemigowâ , ween Jesus Christun , ween Christun , ween Kitche Manito gá ozhittonunk nebwâkâwin , giya quiuk izzhewabizzewin , giya beneittizzowin , giya ápanemowin :
46001031	Azhebe-egâtagigo , ween gachetwâwizzit , oguh kitchetwâwizze Kitche Manitōn ōnje .
46002001	Neendush nekânissetōk , ope watissinnuhgook , kâ menno gegetowin neembegegizzisse , kâ giya gwetch nebwâkâwin , uhweendumonuhgook , Kitche Manito ogegetowin :
46002002	Neengewuhwanandum kiut , kago bakânuk keche we kekanduhzewân uzzhiáeyag , meatuh Jesus Christ uhge sussuhgáquo-ōnt .
46002003	Magwouhdush wejewinnuhgook neenge gitche neennuhmiz , neengitche kotáj ; neenge gitche nuhningishkâ .
46002004	Neengegetowin neenguhgequawin kâ mennotágoosinnōn aninne onebwâkâwinink , meatuh uhmizzhisshowwenágwittōng Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin giya Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun omushkwizzewin ;
46002005	Kemushkâwandumowinewâ , kago guhtuh tuhgoosinōn aninne onebwâkâwinink , meatuh Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewinink .
46002006	Anawak neenebwâkâ gegetomin mámowy uhgew quiuk azhewabizzidjig ; kâ omá ákeeng nebwâkâwin áwunzenōn , kâween nâgânizzit omá ákeeng onebwâkâwin áwunzenōn , nisshewunátizzewug .
46002007	Neenōndágonámin uhtuhzhindumáng Kitche Manito onebwâkâwin kiátuk nebwâkâwin , Kitche Manito ogeonuhgindán anosumissink áke keche ōnje kitchetwâwizzeyunk :
46002008	Eu nâgânizzidjig omá ákeeng kakanduhzigwâ : kishpin kekandumowâpun kâ tá ge sussuhgáquowâsewân Kitche Manitōn kitchetwâwizzinidjin .
46002009	Azhebe-egâtag koshá skezhigomá kâ wâbemuhgussinōn , otowwugámá kâ nōndumomuhgussinōn , aninne ota kâ onáguttuhwanduhzenun ono iuheen Kitche Manito gá ozhetowât uhnew siágeigoojin .
46002010	Kitche Manito ogewâbunduhán Ochichâgwun ; Uhchichâgomá kakandunk kokkinná iuheen , kagat Kitche Manito kiátojin .
46002011	Owwanan aninne kakandunk aninne tabandunk , meatuh wachichâgonit aninnewun gagishkowâjin ? me tibbishko Kitche Manito iuheen ká oweuh aninne okekanduhzenun meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun kakandunk .
46002012	Kâween neenge otissigoosemin Ochichâgomá omá ákeeng meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ; keche ōnje kekandumunk iuheen wanepuzh Kitche Manitōm máninunk .
46002013	Ono iuheen atumunk kâween o-o gegetowin aninnewun nebewâkâwin guhgequat , meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun gagequat ; tebuhgindumink Ochichâgomá iuheen ochichâgōnk .
46002014	Uhnōch azhewabizzit aninne kâween ototissigooseen iuheen Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun , kuhgebátizzewinun otenandánun , kâ otá kekanduhzenun ōnje Ochichâgomá wanje kekandumink .
46002015	Ween Ochichâgomán gagishkowâjin kokkinná iuheen otebákonánun ween tebinowa kâ oweuh aninnewun otebákonigooseen .
46002016	Owwanan kakandunk Kitche Manito onáguttuhwandumowin keche kushketopun keche guhgekemát ; Christ onáguttuhwandumowin neendiámin .
46003001	Binna neen nekânissetōk kâ neendá kushketose , keche guhnoninuhgook , azhe guhguhnoninágwâ ochichâgwun gagishkowâjig o-o atuh ochichâgwun gagishkowâsigook gegishkowât tibishko uhgew uhbenocheewidjig Jesus Christun .
46003002	Totoshâbo kegeusshuminim , kâween weyâs : kiábe kâween ketá kushketoseem keche nōndumag , nōngum giya kâween kekushketoseem che nōndumag .
46003003	Kiábe kemutcheizzhewabizzim , kiábe keguhgâwanindim , kekekândim , kewemuhmutchetotátim , kâween nuh , kemutche izzhewabizzisseem ? kânuh aninneeng ketizzhebamosaseem ?
46003004	Magwouh bazhek Paul , neendinotowâ eketto , minowâ bazhek neen Apollos neendinotowâ eketto ; kânuh kemutche izzhewabizzisseem ?
46003005	Owwanan 'ow Paul ? owwanan 'ow Apollos ? kâween nuh kagequajig áwissewug , weenowâ wanje tabwatumag , tebishko Kitche Manito azhe menát kokkinná aninnewun ?
46003006	Neengeketega , Apollos oseguhundán ; Kitche Manitodush megewa menekân .
46003007	Mego eu , ween kategat , kâween ningōt inábuhtizzisse , ween giya ságáunjegat , kâ ningōt inábuhtizzisse , Kitche Manito koshá megewa menekân
46003008	Ween kategat giya ságáundunk bazhekowug , kokkinná aninnewug oguh otissigōnâwâ otebáumágawinewâ enik aenuhnokewât .
46003009	Kemámowy uhnoketowânán Kitche Manito ; keenowâ Kitche Manito kategâtunk ; keenowâ Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt .
46003010	Menik Kitche Manito gá ezheit tibishko , nabwâkât taban dunk ozhegawin , neen neenge ozhissittōn ozhegawin , bakânizzitdush aninne otozhegâtán . Kokkinná aninnewug tuh tuttebábewug ga ezhichegawát .
46003011	Kâ oweuh aninne otá ozhissittoseen bakânuk ezhetwâwin , meatuh nōngum ázhiá gá ozhissittōng , ween Jesus Christ .
46003012	Kishpin oweuh aninne ogitcheiuhe ozhissittōt o-o azhesininik , ozâwâ shoneá , giya shoneá , giya sunáguk ásin , giya metig , giya mezhushkeen , shegooshkishegunun ;
46003013	Kokkinná aninnewug otuhnokewinewâ tuh nágwutchgâta gezhigut guhtuh ōnje bákissin ; ishkota oguh kuhquadebandánun kokkinná aninnewug otuhnokewinewâ , owagotogwanewunōgwan .
46003014	Oweuh aninne otuhnokewin banátussinōk , ogitcheiuhe wazhissetōt , tebáumátewin oguhtián .
46003015	Oweuh aninne otuhnokewin châgetanik guttuhwunetázo , weendush ween weow tuh bemátizze , tibbishko ishkota che ōnje bemátizzit .
46003016	Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik , áweyag ? Kitche Manito Ochichâgwundush kegegishkowag ?
46003017	Kishpin oweuh aninne we bánájetōt Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik Kitche Manitōn oguh banájeigōn : Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik kitchetwâwandágwutinne , keenowâ eu uhnumeawegumik ketáwim .
46003018	Kago oweuh aninne tuh wiazhindizzose , kishpin oweuh aninne andussheyag nabwâkânidjin enandágoozit omá , ákeeng máno tuh kuhgebátizze che ōnje nebwâkât .
46003019	Nebwâkâwin omá ákeeng kuhgebátizzewin otenandán Kitche Manito ozhebe-egâta , otuhkonán nabwâkânidjin tebinowa okuhgianizzewinewâ ōnje .
46003020	Minowâdush Kitche Manito okekandán nabwâkâjig otenandumowinewân , uhkuhgebátizzewât .
46003021	Eu ōnje kago oweuh aninne oguh kitchetwâwanemáseen aninnewun ; kokkinná iuheen keenowâ ketiemewâ ;
46003022	Kishpin Paul , giya Apollos , giya Cephas , giya áke , giya bemátizzewin , giya nebowin , giya iuheen pichenuk anduhgogin ; kokkinná keenowâ ketiemewâ ;
46003023	Christdush ketebanemigowâ Christdush Kitche Manitōn otebanemigōn .
46004001	Mahno aninne keguh enanemigonán , Christ oguhgequaweninnemun áweyunk , kanowandungig gámotuttinik Kitche Manito otiemun .
46004002	Minowâ giya enandágoozewug keche nebwâkâwât , kanowandungig iuheen .
46004003	Neen ween kâween gwetch neembabámanduhzeen che tebákoneyag gamá oweuh aninne che tepákonit , kagat , kâween neendepakonittizzose ;
46004004	Kâween kago neenkekanduhzeen ezheka ; kâ koshá quiuk neendōnje izzhewabizzisse : ween tepákonega , Kitche Manito .
46004005	Kago ween kago tepákonung kago chebwâ ochichesag , nánázh Kitche Manito che tuhkoshink , ween ga betōt iuheen wâsayáng , iuheen giya chesingin kushkedibbikuttōnk keche nágwuk náguttuhwandumowinun otaemáng ; kokinná aninnewug oguh menno tuzzhemigōn Kitche Manitōn .
46004006	Ono iuheen , nekânissetōk , neenge tuzzhindánun neen tebinowa giya Apollos , keenowâ ōnje ; che ōnje kekandumag kago neenowint ōnje , kâ owushema oweuh aninne ketá apetanemásewâ enik azhebe-egâtag , kago oweuh andussheyag tuh kitche apetanemáse keche nuhnishkanindeyag .
46004007	Owwanan antotonág keche muhmiuhgizzetáteyag ? wagonan ayáeyag eu gá menigosewag ? kishpin gá menigowagwan , wagonan wanje kitchetwâwanemoeyag tebishko gá menittissingin ?
46004008	Binná nōngum ketabissinneem , kewânuttizzim , ketogemákundám tábishko kitche ogemáng uhbwâ wetokonung ; ápadush neendenandum Kitche Manito ōnje , ogemáweyag giya neenowint konemá neendá ogemáwemin .
46004009	Neendenandum Kitche Manito neenge ishquaiuhe onákonegonán , ope wanákonát anonájin , neenge enuhgemigomin keche neboeyáng : neenkekinowâchichegâzomin che kekinnowâtandágoozeyáng ákeeng , giya che kekinnowâtanemeumintwâ Kitche Manito omezhinowamun , giya aninnewug .
46004010	Neenguhgebátizzemin Christ ōnje , keenowâdush kenebwâkâm Christ ōnje ; neen neenuhmizzemin , keenowâdush kemushkâwizzim , keenowâ kekitche apetandágoozim , neenowintdush neennisshewuhnátizzemin .
46004011	Kagat nánázh nōngum , neembukkuttamin newemenequamin , peengwoshshâgittemin , neembuhkittaegâzomin , kâ ningooche neendásemin ;
46004012	Neenduhnokemin , uhnokeyáng tebinowa neenninjenáng ; uhnanebekinjegâzoyáng neen shâwandágoozemin , muhmutchetotágoyáng , neen kushketomin mámázhetoeyáng .
46004013	Muhmutche tuzzhemigoyáng neenduhnumeámin ; weágusseink neendotágomin ákeeng châshuttáumink nánázh nōngo gezhigut .
46004014	Kâween che águtcheinnuhgook ketōnje oshebeumosinonim ono iuheen ; keguhgâzomininim tebishko waguisingin siágeinjig .
46004015	Konemá metáchink metoswâk tuzzhetoganug gagekeminnágook Christ ōnje , kâweendush ween bátienissewug ōsewân . neen kōsewá meenwâjemowin ōnje .
46004016	Eu ōnje ketuhnumeatonim keche kekinnowanemeyag .
46004017	O-o ōnje kegeizzhenizzhuhumonim , siágeug neenguis Timotheus , nebwâkâ Kitche Manitōn ōnje , keguh kekandumonigowâ neendizzhewabizzewin , Christ otezhetwâwin azhe guh gequayán mizze kokkinná uhnumeawegumigōnk .
46004018	Ahnint ōmbáshewug , ōnje enandumōg che beotissinuhgook .
46004019	Wiebuh keguh beotissinim kishpin Kitche Manito enandunk ; neenguh kekandán , kâween ween ogegetowinewâ gá ōmbáshejig , omushkâwizzewinewâ koshá .
46004020	Kitche Manito ogemáwewin kâween gegetowin áwunzenōn ; mushkâwizzewin áwun .
46004021	Wagonan nandowandumag ? buhshunzhaegun innuh keguh beotissininim , uhgamá sâgeittewin , giya ochichágomá bakâdizzewin
46005001	Tebahtochegawta , bisshegwâtizzewin uhtuhgook , magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag ; kâwekâ e-e tinnouh bisshegwâtizzewin tuhgoosinnōn miátáwizzidjig , bazhek kechewewit ōsun wewinne .
46005002	Keenowâdush kege ōmbáshim , kâ kege osittáwanduhzeem , ween wuhow gátotunk o-o tá ge ikkoonegâzo magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag .
46005003	Uhpuhkawininnuhgook o-o neow owejewinnuhgook neenchichâg neengetebákoná ázhiá o-o gátotunk ono iuheen .
46005004	Miáōnjeitteyagoon , quiuk totumōk Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , mámowy neenchichâg , Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , omushkâwizzewinink ,
46005005	Uhow tebinowa Mutche Manito che menint , che banájetowint weow , ochichâgwundush konemá che bemátizzinnipun Kitche Manito Jesus Christ ogezhiguttōmink .
46005006	Kekitchetwâwanemowinewâ , kâ onissheshinzenōn kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ punge e-e wanje ōmbishkág me kokkinná wanje ōmbishkág puhquazhegun ?
46005007	Kokkinná sâgitche wabenumōk gata iuhe , konemá kokkinná tá ōshkeiewunk keche ápiche puhkánink . Kagat Christ ge sáságewitchegatumágonán kuhbekosa wekoongawin :
46005008	Eu ōnje umbasinno , izzhewabizzetá , kâween mutche enandumowin , mázheninnewuggizzewin ; meatuh quiuk izzhewabizzewin tabwawin .
46005009	Kege oshebeumonim mazaniegunink , che wetokowâsewagwâ bisshegwâtizzidjig :
46005010	Kâweenigo kokkinná bisshegwâtizzidjig omá ákeeng , giya sáságizzidjig , giya wiazhingashkidjig , giya uhnōch kago manitokajig , kishpin e-e totumag ketá ságuhám ákeeng .
46005011	Nōngum ketoshebeumonim keche wetokowwâsewag , kishpin oweuh aninne wekánissemá , enângomint , bisshegwâtizzitdush , saságizzit giya uhnōch kago manitokat ozâmetōng , kewushquabeshkid , giya wiazhingashkid ; eu azhewabizzit kago wetopomâ kago .
46005012	Ahneen ga innuhnokeyán ga tepákonugwâ , uhgew áqutcheiuhe ayájig ? kânuh ketepákonásewâg uhgew beendik ayájig ?
46005013	Uhgewedush ween áqutcheiuhe ayájig , Kitche Manito otepákonán . Me eu ōnje puhkawabinik uhow mache izzhewabizzit .
46006001	Kishpin oweuh andussheyag ningōtono iezhindeyag tepákonegajig ; innuh ketá ezhám anosumewât miázheninnewuggizzidjig , kâweendush anosumewât uhnumeájig ?
46006002	Kânuh kekekanduhzeem , uhnumeájig che tebákonumowât áke ? kishpin keenowâ tebákonumag áke , kânuh ketá kushketoseem che tebákonumag agâsink ?
46006003	Kâween nuh kekekanduhzeem che tebákonungidwâ Kitche Manito omezhinowamun ? áneen enik owushema iuheen anduhgōg omá ákeeng ?
46006004	Kishpin kago iyáeyag ga tebákonumink omá ákeeng , uhnonik uhgew owushema nōndás apetandágoozidjig uhnumeawinink che tebákonumowât .
46006005	Owwe uhguhgâzominuhgook wanje eninnuhgook , menuh azhewabuk ? kânuh pâpish bazhek nebewâkât aninne iáse uzzhiáeyag ? kânuh oweuh táse ga tebákonápun wekânissemán ?
46006006	Bazhek wekânissemá otebákonán wekânissun anosumewât tiabwatunzigook .
46006007	Me eu kekitche mutche izzhewabizzewinewâ , ōnje ketebákonittim mamashkōt , ánishween bwâ otâpenumag mutchetotágowin ? uhnishween máno keche wiazhemigoeyag ?
46006008	Kâween , binná kemutchetotátim , kewiazhindim , kewiazhemáwâg kekânissewâg .
46006009	Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ mache izzhewabizzidjig che peendegasigwâ , Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink ? Kago wuhnisshin kago ; kâ bashegwâtizzidjig , giya uhnōch kago manitokajig , ka giyâ wiyayaquawidjig ,
46006010	Kâ giya gamotishkidjig , kâ giya saságizzidjig , kâ giya kewushquabeeshkidjig , giya wazâmetōngig , giya wiyazhichegashkidjig , kâ oweuh bazhek tuh peendegase Kitche Manito otogemáwinink .
46006011	Ahnint me azhewabizzeyagobun , kege gesebeginegâzōmdush , kege benechegâzōmdush , quiuk kege izzhewabeigōm , Jesus Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Ochichâgwun ōnje .
46006012	Kokkinná iuheen nemenigo che totumán , kâdush nemeenwanduhze kokkinná iuheen che totumán , kokkinná iuheen nemenigo che totumán , kâweendush ween kago neenguhwe uhnewishkágooseen .
46006013	Mejim omissutámá ōnje , omissutámádush mejim ōnje ; Kitche Manito oguhbanájetonun niyazh ; weowwemán kâween bisshegwâtizzewin ōnje ; Kitche Manito koshá ōnje ; Kitche Manitodush weowwemá ōnje .
46006014	Kitche Manito oge ábejebáán Neendogemámenán , giya neenowint oguh ábejebááigomin tebinowa omushkâwizzewinink .
46006015	Kâween nuh kekekanduhzeem kebuhkazewinnewân Christ obuhkazewinit ? neenguh otâpenánán innuh Christ obuhkazewinun che ozhetoeyán bashegwâtizzit obuhkazewinun ? kâween buhpâpish .
46006016	Wagonan ! kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ eu tagoging bashegwâtizzit bazhekwun weowwemá ? neezh ( eketto ) tuh bazhekwuninne oweyasewân .
46006017	Weendush tagweet Kitche Manito , bazhekwun ochichâgwun .
46006018	Ozhindumōk bisshegwâtizzewin . Kokkinná kago aninne aeendotunk , áqutcheiuhe weowwinink ; weendush bashegwâtizzit , tebinowa weow omutchetotán .
46006019	Wagonan ! kâween nuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ keowwewân Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun otuhnumeawegumik áwunk , ween gagishkowwag uhnew Kitche Manito gá meninnág ? kâween ketebanindizzoseem .
46006020	Kege gishpinuhnigōm enuhgindâsowinink ; eu ōnje kitchetwâweik Kitche Manito keowwewâng , giya kechichâgowâng , ween tabandunk .
46007001	Nōngumdush che tuzzhindumink ono iuheen gá oshebeumowweyagoon : mennoizzhewabut , aninne che tângishkowâsig equawun .
46007002	Onjittá quiuk izzhewabut oweuh aninne wekâ che bisshegwâtizzissik bakânizzinidjin equawun , meatuh tebinowa wewun , che wewit ; kokkinná giya equawug tebinowa atuh onâbamewân tá onâbamenáwân .
46007003	Onâbamemá máno oguh menno shâwanemán wewun ; giya ween wewemá onâbamun .
46007004	Kâween ween wewemá otebanduhzeen weow ; onâbamun otebanemigōn , me giya ween onâbamemá kâween otebanduhzeen weow , wewun otebanemigōn .
46007005	Kago sáságittáte kago keowwewân meatuh ayeezh enandumag náningōtink , keche buhgittinumag keowwewân che muhkuttakayag uhnumeáeyag minowâdush che názekotáteyag wawane Mutche Manito che kuhgwadebanemissinnowag .
46007006	Neendenandágooz o-o keche ekettoeyán , kâ neen guhgâzomigooze che ekettoeyán .
46007007	Apadush kokkinná aninnewug izzhewabizzewât azhewabizzeyán , kokkinná aninnewug tebinowa ayát oge menán Kitche Manitōn bazhek o-o tinnouh , minowâ bazhek , e-e tinnouh .
46007008	Tá mennoizzhewabizzewug ningooche wâtigoosigook giya shágáwidjig bizzhisshig , keche ezhe uhbewât tábishko bizzhisshik azhe uhbeyán .
46007009	Kishpin kushketosigwâ bizzhisshig che uhbewât , máno quiuk tuh wetegawug : nowutch menno izzhewabut quiuk che wetegawât gamá che châgizzowât .
46007010	Wâtegandidjig neenguhgâzomág kâweendush neen Kitche Manito , kago wewemá oguh buhkawinnáseen onâbamun .
46007011	Kishpin ketwan puhkawenát , bizzhisshig , gâgineek , tá uhbe wekâ che onâbamissig uhgamá násáb otánázekowân onâbamun , kago onâbamemá oguh wabenáseen wewun .
46007012	Ahnintdush , neen , neenguhnonág kâween Kitche Manito oweuh wekânissemá wewun tabwatunzinit kishpin enandunk wewetegamát onâbamun , kago ween oguh wabenáseen .
46007013	Equa giya onâbamun tabwatunzinnit kishpin enanduminit che wetegamigoot , kago oguh wabenáseen .
46007014	Tiabwatunzik onâbamun benizze wewun ōnje , tiabwatunzikdush wewemá benizze onâbamun ōnje , kishpin izzhewabusinōk onejânissewân , kâ tá benizzissewun ; nōngumdush benizzewug .
46007015	Kishpin tiabwatunzik , we buhkat máno tuh buhka : wekânissemá otowamámá kâ owwâkânewissewug eu izzhewabizze : Kitche Manito ketigonán keche mennoinnowandeyunk .
46007016	Ahneen oh wewemá , azhe kekandumun che bemájeásewint kenâbam ? áneen azhe kekandumun keen oh aninne , che bemájeásewut kewish ?
46007017	Kitche Manito go gá ezhe guhgekemát kokkinná aninnewun me ga izzhewabizzit : me anákonegayán kokkinná uhnumeawinink .
46007018	Kishpin oweuh aninne gegewetázhegâzo nundōmint ? kago gáwetázhegâzosig guhtuh we áwe : kishpin oweuh gáwetázhegâzosig nundōmint ? kago tuh gewetázhwase .
46007019	Gewetázhegâzowin , kâ ningōt inâbuhtussenōn gewetázhegâzoseengdush kâ ningōt inâbuhtussenōn , meatuh kunwandumink Kitche Manito otebákonegawin .
46007020	Mano kokkinná aninnewug aenuhnokewât gâgineekigo tuh enuhnokewug .
46007021	Binná keen uhnoketweâganinne , nundōmigoeyun ? kago papámandunkan ; kishpin kushketoeyun we getishkekun .
46007022	Ween uhnoketâgaweninnewit kishpin Kitche Manitōn nundomigoot wânuhke Kitche Manitōn ōnje ; giyadush oweuh wiánuhkeet aninjin me Christ otoskenegamun .
46007023	Keenowâ kege kishpinnuhnigōm enik gá nuhginjegâ zoeyag , kago ween aninne otuhnoketâgaweninnemun áwe kago .
46007024	Nekânissetōk , máno kokkinná aninnewug nandominjig , máno oguh uhnoketowâwân Kitche Manito anuhnokewât .
46007025	Binná tuzzhemintwâ bizzhisshig abidjig ; kâween Kitche Manitōn neenguhgâzomigoose , neendizzhenáguttuhwandum , oweuh nabwâkát Kitche Manito oguhgequawinink .
46007026	Konemâ me o-o mennoizzhewabuttōgwan omá o-o wanebek o-o kotuhgitowinink , neendikit mennoizzhewabut , aninne keche izzhewabizzit .
46007027	Ketuhkobiz innuh wewemáng ? kago wekoochetokan keche we getishkeut , kâween nuh ketuhkobizzosenun weowwemáng ? kago nundowâbomákan keche weweweyun .
46007028	Kispin quiuk wetegayun , kâ kemutcheizzhewabizzisse ; kishpindush oskenegequa quiuk wetegat , kâ mutcheizzhewabizzisse , e-e tinnouhdush , tuh kuhgwâtuhgitto weyâsink kâweendush minowâ ningōtono ketinissenonim .
46007029	O-odush neendikit nekânissetōk , beowin tuhquâ ; máno go guttuh ezhe iáwug uhgew wâwidjig giya uhgew wâwissiggook ;
46007030	Uhgew giya mawidjig giya mawissiggook giya uhgew manowânegoozidjig giya uhgew manowânegoozissiggook , uhgewdush gâshpinnuttâzojig tibbishko kago iasigōk .
46007031	Uhgew anokâtunkigo o-o áke , uhmutchetotunzikwâ , izzhewabizzewin o-o áke májámuhgut .
46007032	Ketenaneminenim ápiche che suhnáganduhzewag , ween ningooche wâtegasig onáguttuhwandán Kitche Manito otiemun owwe niandumeát Kitche Manitōn .
46007033	Ween ningooche wâtegat onáguttuhwandánun ono iuheen ákeeng , owwe niandumeát wewun .
46007034	Papuhkân izzhewabut nussowwiuhe wewemá giya wanâbamissig equa . Wanâbamissig equa onáguttuhwandán Kitche Manito otiemun konemá tábenizze , weowwink giya ochichâgōnk , weendush wanâbamit onáguttuhwandánun ono iuheen omá ákeeng che nianduminit onâbamun .
46007035	Keche ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeyag , o-o wanje ekettoeyán ; kâween ween owwe nuhgwâninnuhgook keche ōnje bakâtizzeyag ápiche , konemá ketánáguttuhwanemáwâ Kitche Manito keche kuhgepáchanduhzewag .
46007036	Kishpin oweuh aninne enandunk weow , quiuk izzhewabizzissik ōshkenequan ōnje , kishpin ta ápeettizzit , kishpin ōnjittá we izzhewabuk anandunkigo máno tuhtotum , kâween mutche izzhewabizzisse , máno tuh wetegandewug .
46007037	Weendush mashkâwandunk otaink , mamázheittezoot kishpin wuhwanandunk otoskenegequawin che onâbamissit quiuk izzhewabizze .
46007038	Ween wâteganduhát mennototum weendush wâteganduhásig owushema mennototum .
