46007039	Wewemá onâbamun otebanemigōn , tebákonegawin ōnje ga áquo uhbemátizzit kishpindush onâbamun ge nebonit quiuk izzhewabut che wetegamát minowá oweuh , kishpin anandunk , meatuh Kitche Manito otebákonegawinink .
46007040	Nowutch tá mennowânegooze kishpin onâbamissik , neen ween neendenandum , neendenandumdush neengegishkowâ Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun .
46008001	Nōngumdush , tuzzhindumink sáságewinnintwâ muzzeninneeng , ketenandámin kekekandámin kekandumowin . Kekandumowin ōmbásin , sâgeittewin ōnje mushkâwizzin .
46008002	Kishpin oweuh aninne enandunk kekandunk kago , kâween okekandunzeen eu ga we kekandungebun .
46008003	Oweuhdush aninne sâgeát Kitche Manitōn , Kitche Manitōn okekanemigōn .
46008004	Uhtuzzhindumink uhmejink ono iuheen siáságewint muzzeninneeng , kekekandámin , muzzeninne kâween kago áwunzenōn ákeeng , kâdush oweuh Bakânizzit Manito , meatuh bazhekoot .
46008005	Ahnuh iáwug ánint manitōg aninjig gezhigōnk giya áke , ( bátienowug uhgew towug , manitōg , batienowug ogemág ,
46008006	Neenowintdush , bazhek wiátuh manito ; ween kokkinna kago gá ozhetōt , kege gegishkágonán , bazhek o-o Kitche Manito Jesus Christ , ween kokkinná kago wanje bemátuk , keenowint giya ween ōnje .
46008007	Kaweendush kokkinná aninnewug okekanduhzeenâwâ eu , kekandumink , uhsáságewinnint muzzeninne omejináwâ eu siáságewinint muzzeninne uhneennuhmuttinik onáguttuhwandumowinewâ banátuttinne .
46008008	Weyâs kâween ningōt ketizzhemennototágoosemin keche ōnje kekânemunk Kitche Manito , kâ owushema mennoizzhewabizzissemin , ánuh weseneyunk giya wesenissewunk .
46008009	Tuttebábig , kago eu , kewânuhkewinewâ guhtuh ōnje bezogashinzewug uhgew nánuhmizzidjig .
46008010	Kishpin aninne wâbomik keen uhkekandumun námátábeyun emá mejeyun muzzeninne wegewâmink , kânuh giya ween nánuhmizzit guhtuh enanduhze keche mejit eu siáságewinint muzzeninneeg ?
46008011	Kekekandumowin ōnje , nánuhmizzit wekânissemá ween Christ gá ōnje najin , guhtuh banátizzit innuh ?
46008012	Kishpin eu azhe mutchetotowagwânin wekânissemág uhbem 'wâgunitumowagwâ oneennuhmandumowinewâ , kemutchetotowâ Jesus Christun .
46008013	Eu ōnje , kishpin weyâs nekânis ōnje mutchetotunk , kâ minowâ weyâs neenguh mejisseen enik áke ga bemátuk , ōnje kâween newe totowâse nekânis keche mutchetotunk .
46009001	Kawnuh anonint neendowwisse ? kânuh neendebanindizzose ? kânuh neengewâbomáse Jesus Christ , Neenkitche Manitomenán ? kâween neenduhnokewin Kitche Manito ōnje ketáwisseem ?
46009002	Kishpin anonint wiáwissewânan ánint ōnje , keenowâ ween ōnje neendow uhgokewussegun , neenduhnonigowin ketáwim , Kitche Manito ōnje .
46009003	O-o azhe nuhquatowwugwâ kaquajemidjig ;
46009004	Kâween nuh neendá âpetandágoozissemin che weseneyáng giya che minequayáng ?
46009005	Kânuh neendá mushkâwizzissemin che papásuhgábeginungidwâ wewemá giya otowwamámá tibishko ánint anoninjig andotumowât Nekitche Manitomenán wekânissun giya Cephas .
46009006	Menuh atuh Bapabas , giya neen , kashketosewâng che bonetoeyáng uhnokewin ?
46009007	Owwanan wekâ nandobunint tebinowago oshoneám keche banájetōt ? owwanan kategat , májesigdush natáwigittōt ? owwanan bamushumát áwaseun uhmejesigdush ototoshâbomene ?
46009008	Aninnewug innuh neenduzzhindánun ono iuheen ? kânuh tepákonegawin tibbishko ekettosewug .
46009009	Moses otepákonegawinink oshebe-egâta kâween keguh ágobetowâse pezheke otōn shiáshábooshkowât mandáminun . Kitche Manito nuh okuhnowanemán pezhekewun ?
46009010	Uhgamá keenowintigo atuh wanje ekettōt ? kagat keenowint ōnje oshebe-egâta o-o , ween bágwuhkumikgebichegat tuh begwuhkumikgebichega buhgoosanemowinink weendush buhgoosanemowinink bagundowwât che otâpenát ánint obuhgoosanemowinink .
46009011	Kishpin ge ketegâttumonáng ochichâgo iuheen , kânuh neendá otâpenuhzemin kago omá akeeng tabanjegâtagin ?
46009012	Kishpin ánint tebanemenágwâ kânuh giya neenowint ketá tebanemissinnoneme ? Kâween newe iosemin o-o mushkâwizzewin , máno neendenandámin che kuhgwâtuhgittoeyáng , ánga che banájetosewung Jesus Christ oguhgequawin .
46009013	Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ uhgew uhnoketungig uhnumeawin ōnje bemátizzewug ono iuheen uhnumeawegumigōnk ayágin ? uhgewedush uhnoketungig sáságewitchegun uzzhuhtag ototâpenánâwâ ánint atōng sáságewitchegawin ?
46009014	Me tebishko Kitche Manito gá enákonegat uhgew gagequajig tá ōnje bemátizzewug guhgequawin .
46009015	Kâween neen neendiosemin kago ono iuheen , kâween neenge oshebeunzenun ono iuheen keche totágoeyag , onushema tá onissheshin che neboeyámbán uhgamá oweuh aninne mutche izzhewabizze keche ananemippun .
46009016	Kishpin guhgequayán guhgequawin , kâween neenkitche izzhewabiz neendá ekettose kâ neen kushketose che bonetoeyámbán guhgequayán , neendá innegáittiz , bonetoeyán guhgequawin !
46009017	Kishpin ōnjittá tebinowa enandumán che guhgequayán neenguh tebáumágowiz ; kishpindush mutchetotumán neendenandumowin me che nágwuk Kitche Manito guhgâzomit che guhgequayán .
46009018	Wagonandush e-e ga ondizzeyán ? gagequayán guhgequawin neendotán Christ oguhgequawin chetebi-egâtasinōk me e-e ga ōnje banájetōsewân nemushkâwizzewin uhnumeawinink .
46009019	Ahnuh neendebanindiz , kâ oweuh aninne neendebanemigoose kokkinná che otuhnoketâgaweninnemewât neow neendotáz konemá áshkum minowâ neendá unne kushketōn .
46009020	Jewug ōnje , Jewink neendenandágooz , konemá neendá tabwatágōg Jewug ; magwouh wejewungwâ uhgew tabaneminjig tebákonegawinink neengetotán neow bazhek tabanemint tebákonegawinink , konemá neendá kushkeá che tabwatowewât tebákonegawinink tabaneminjig ;
46009021	Uhgew tabanemásewinjig tebákonegawinink bazhek tabanemásewint tebákonegawinink neenge enandágooz , ( kâween Kitche Manito otebákonegawinink gâgineek neendebanemigo Christ otebákonegawin , ) konemá neendá kushkeág che tabwatowwewât uhgew tabanemásewinjig tebákonegawinink .
46009022	Nánnuhmizzidjig magwa , bazhek neenge izzhewabiz konemá neendá tabwatágōg nánuhmizzidjig , kokkinná iuheen kokkinná aninnewug neenge ozhittowâg , konemá neendá kunwandán ánint .
46009023	Kuhgequawin ōnje , o-o wanje totumán konemá ánint neendá otâpenán keenowâ mámowy .
46009024	Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ uhgew kaquajekunittidjig , kokkinná pemebi-ittewug , bazhek mámowy buhkinnága ? me totumōg pemebi ittig konemá ketá buhkinnága .
46009025	Kokkinná aninnewug wâgoochetojig che buhkinnágawât okotuhgittōnâwâ weowwewân , me wanje totunk owwe buhkinnágat banátuttinik kekinowâcheowin , neenowintdush wekâ banátussinōk .
46009026	Me neen azhe kuhquajekuzzhewayán káween ween anandumowin , azhe megâzoeyán , kâween ween 'ow mágâtunk notin andotunk .
46009027	Neenkunwandán neow neentuhbusse buhgittenán , konemá kâ ningōtono tá ezhe banátussinnōn neow ge guhgekemugwa ánint .
46010001	Minowaw nekânissetōk kekekaneminenim che kekandumag kokkinná kosenánig anámiuhe ánuhquuttōnk uzzhiáwât kokkinnádush shábooshkumowât kitchegumme ;
46010002	Kokkinná Mosesun , gebaptizeáwug ánáquttōnk kitchegummink ;
46010003	Kokkinnádush tibbishko ochichâgomá mejim omejináwâ ;
46010004	Kokkinná mámowy ominnequanâwâ ochichâgomá minnequawin : ( oge minnequanáwâ kokkinná eu ochichâgomá Azhebeek e-e n'wâpenuhnigowât eu Azhebeek me Christ : )
46010005	Nebewá uhgew kâ oniandumeásewân Kitche Manitōn ; buhgwuttuhkumigáng oppuhgináwug .
46010006	Binná ono iuheen me o-o iásheiggoeyunk keche kekandumunk , keche nundowânduhzewunk o-o tinnowun mutche iuheen , gá nundowandumowâjin .
46010007	Giya keche muzzeninnekasewag , ánint uhgew gá totumowât ; azhebe-egâtag , anishanâbag wuhwanuhbewug wesenewât giya menequawât , giya pusegwewât otuhmennowât .
46010008	Kago giya bisshegwâtizzissetá , ánint uhgew gá ezhe bisshegwâtizzewât , neezhtunnuh usshe niswa tasso metoswâk pongesinōg ningo geshik nebowât .
46010009	Kago giya kuhgwadebanemásetá Christ , ánint uhgew gá azhe kuhgwadebanemáwât , uhge banátizzewâtdush , mutche kenabegōn ōnje .
46010010	Kago nanáwudjemo kago , ánint uhgew gá azhe nanáwudjemowât , uhge banátizzewât bánáje-ewanidjin ōnje .
46010011	Binná , kokkinná ono iuheen gá izzhewabizzewât , uhgew che ásheigoeyunk , ozhebe-egâtawun che guhgekimigoeyunk ōnje , bemátizzeyunk ope kagâ eeshqua ákewunk .
46010012	Eu ōnje ween enandunk mushkâwegâbowit , máno tuh iyângwâmandum keche we pongeshinzik .
46010013	Kâween kago kuhgwadebanindewin ketotissigoseenâwâ , meatuh azhe iyotissigowât uhnochigo aninnewun ; Kitche Manito quiukkooze , kâween enanduhze owushema enik keche guhgwadebanemigooseyag keguhtenanemigoosewâ enikigo azhe kushketoeyag ; mámowy kubgwadebanemigowin oguh ezhissetōn ga ezne wemáshkumag , konemá me ga ōnje kushketoeyag che guhbikkumag .
46010014	Me eu ōnje , siágeinnuhgook , ozhindumōk sáságewenintwâ muzzeninneeng .
46010015	Nabwâkâjig aninnewug neendizzhegegit ; tebákonumōk o-o , aketoeyán .
46010016	Menequâchegun o-o anumeatumáng , kânuh Christ otizzhetwâwin omisqueem áwunzenōn ? puhquazhegun bwâkobetoeyáng , kânuh Christ otizzhetwâwin weow gá inwâtunk áwunzenōn ?
46010017	Anuh bátienenemin , bazhekwunk puhquazhegun bazhekwunōn keowwinánin kokkinná ketotapenámin eu bazhek puhquazhegun .
46010018	Kunowâbomikōg Israelitug azhewabizzewât : kânuh uhgew májejig ságewitchegun , kânuh áwissewug watâpenungig sáságewitchegawin ?
46010019	Ahneen aketoeyán ? muzzinneen innuh ningōt inábuhtizze , eudush siáságewinintwâ muzzinnineeng ningōtono innuh inábuhtut ?
46010020	Neendikitdush uhgew miátáwizzidjig ono iuheen siáságewinnáwâjin Mutche Manito siáságewinnáwâjin , kâween ween Kitche Manitōn ; kâween kenundowanemissenonim keche owekâneyag Mutche Manitōg .
46010021	Kâween ketá kushketoseem che menequâchegayag Kitche Manito omenequâchegun , giya Mutche Manito omenequâchegun , káween ketá kushketoseem che weseneyag Kitche Manito otuhtopowinink , giya Mutche Manito otuhtopowinink .
46010022	Onjittá nuh kewe nishkeánán Kitche Manito che guhgâwandunk , owushema nuh kemushkâwizzemin , apeechewit ?
46010023	Kokkinná iuheen nendenandágooz che totumán ; kâweendush ezhe onissheshinzenōn keche totumán ; kokkinná iuheen neendenandágooz che totumán , kâ neendá ōnje mennoizzhewabizzisse .
46010024	Kago oweuh aninne tebinowa weow atuh oguh mennototunzeen , kokkinná aninnewug bakânizzinidjin giya oguh we mennototowâwân .
46010025	Menik ayátándink átáwawinink , mejig , kago kuhgwatwa kago tebinowa kenáguttuhwandumowinewâ ōnje :
46010026	Kokkinná áke Kitche Manito otebandán , kokkinnádush owwânuhtuk .
46010027	Kishpin uhgew tiabwatunzigook wekominágwa , enanlumag kewe ezháeyag ; kago bego anosumuhbeyag buhgitteumágoeyag mejig , kago kuhgwatwa kago , kenáguttuhwanumowinewâ ōnje .
46010028	Kishpindush oweuh aninne eninnág me o-o siáságewinntwâ muzzeninneeg ekettōt , kago meje kago , ween ōnje 'ow wândumōk giya tebinowa ketenandumowinewâ ōnje ; kokkinná áke Kitche Manito otebandán kokkinná giya owwânuhtuk .
46010029	Enandumowin , neendikit , kâween keen tebinowa , bakânizzidjig otenandumowinewân : neendenandágoozewin wagonan bakânizzit aninne wanje tebuhgindunk ?
46010030	Kishpin shâwanjegawin ōnje , anandágoozeyán ánint che otâpenumán , wagonan wanje mutche tuzzhemegoeyán , eu ōnje megwach wanje ekettoeyán ?
46010031	Eu ōnje , kokkinná májeyag kokkinná kago giya manequayag kokkinná giya anuhnokeyag kokkinná totumōg ga ezhe kitchetwâweyag Kitche Manito .
46010032	Kago oweuh miátáwanemá kago Jewug giya miátawizzidjig giya uhnumeájig :
46010033	Tebishko andotumán niandumeugwâ kokkinná aninnewug kokkinná kago kâween tebinowa che beenjenizzeyán neennundowâbunduhzeen , che beenjinnizzewâtdush nebewá neentotum konemá tá ōnje bemátizzewug .
46011001	Nopenuzzheshig , tebishko azhe nopenuhnug Jesus Christ .
46011002	Kemenno tuzzhememin nekânissetōk , ōnje kenáguttuhwanemin kokkinná kago , kekunwandánâwâ tebákonogawin gá ezhe meninnuhgook .
46011003	Apadush kekandumoninnuhgook Christ uhnegânezekundowât kokkinná aninnewun , aninnedush onegânizzekundowân equawun , Kitche Manito onegânizzekundowân Christun .
46011004	Oweuh aninne wuhweoquōt , uhnumeát omutchetotán ōshtegwân .
46011005	Oweuh equa wuhwewuhquaosig guhgequat uhnumeát omutchetotán ōshtegwân , gâgâshkebázinginigo apetandágwuttinne .
46011006	Kishpin equa wuhwewuhquaosig guhtuh mozho , kishpin equa uhgutandunk keche mozhoot guhtuh wuhwewuhquao .
46011007	Aninne kâween tá wuhwewuhquaose , ōnje Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin ezhenágooze ; equadush aninne ogitchetwâwizzewin .
46011008	Kâween equa odebanemáseen aninnewun ; aninne otebanemán equawun .
46011009	Kâween aninne equawun ge ōnje ozheáse , equa aninnewun gá ōnje ozheint .
46011010	Eu ōnje equa ga ōnje wuhwewuhquaopun Kitche Manito omezhinowamun ōnje .
46011011	Kâween aninne ezheka tá iáse : equawun oguh wejewân giya equa kâween ezheka , tá iáse , aninnewun oguh wejewân Kitche Manito ōnje .
46011012	Aninne azhe tebanemát , equawun enandágwut giya ween equa keche tebanemát aninnewun , kokkinnádush ween kago Kitche Manito otebandán .
46011013	Tebákonumōk tebinowa , meenwâbomenágwut innuh equa che uhnumeatowât Kitche Manitōn wuhwewuhquaosig .
46011014	Kâ kekekanduhzeenâwâ tebinowa nánáguttuhwandumag kishpin aninne guhgânwânequat águttandágwuttinne ;
46011015	Kishpin equa guhgánwânequat okitchetwâweiggoon wenenissun ; ge mená keche ágwit .
46011016	Kishpin oweuh aninne we netákekâwetunk , kâween o-o neendizzhetwâsemin , giya anumeájig kâ azhetwâsewug .
46011017	Binná o-o aninnuhgook , kâween kemenno tuzzhemissenonim , kâween keche mennoizzhewabizzeyag ketōnje mowunjeitteseem , meatuh owushema che mutcheizzhewabizzeyag .
46011018	Wiazhkut miáwunjeitteyagoon uhnumeawegumigōnk neen nōndum uhnanáwinitteyag ánintdush neendabwatán .
46011019	Onjittá tuh izzhewabut che nanáwinitteyag uhgew quiuk azhewabizzidjig kemizzhisshowinágwittágowâg .
46011020	Ope mowōnjeitteyag bazhekwunōnk kâween che mejeyag Kitche Manito owesenewin .
46011021	Wâsinneyagoon papuhkân ototâpenánâwâ aenunjegaawât , bazhekdush buhkutta , bazhek kewushquabe .
46011022	Ahnishween , kâween nuh ketōwegewâmisseem che tuzzhe weseneyag , che tuzzhe menequayag , kewe banájetōm innuh Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik ? ketá weázutcheáwâg uhgew wawegewâmissigook ? áneen ga eninnuhgook ? kemennotuzzheminenim innuh o-o ? kâween kemennotuzzhemissinonim .
46011023	Kitche Manito neengeenik o-o nōngum aninnuhgook ; Kitche Manito Jesus eu igo dibbikut uhge buhgittenumátink ; puhquazhegun uhge otâpenán .
46011024	Opedush gá uhnumeát obokobetōn ekettodush , otâpenumōk mejig , me o-o neow , bwâkobetágoyag ; o-o ga ōnje totumag keche mikwanemeyag .
46011025	Me giya go gátotunk gá ashquâ wesenit ; ototâpenunk menequâchegun , eketto , o-o minequâchegun , ōshke wâweendumágawin nemisquemink ; suhsuhgwonuh , o-o totumag , menequayag keche ōnje , kunwanemeyag .
46011026	Aquoche mejeyag o-o puhquazhegun , giya menequayag o-o menequâchegunink kewâbundiewanâwâ Kitche Manito onebowin nánázh keche tuhkoshink .
46011027	Eu ōnje owwagwan ga mejegwan o-o puhquazhegun giya ga menequagwan Kitche Manito omenequâchegun , anandágoozissig ; omutchetotágoon Jesus Christ weowinne , giya omisquemene .
46011028	Tuhguh , aninne tuh náguttuhwanindizzo , chebwâ mejit e-e puhquazhegun giya chebwâ menequat , e-e menequâchegun .
46011029	Ween májit giya menequat anandágoozissig mutcheiewish omejin giya ominnequan ga banájeiggoot , kâween owâbunduhzeeng Kitche Manito oweow .
46011030	O-o ōnje nebewá neennuhmizzewug , ákoozewug , uzzhiáeyag , nebewádush nebáwug .
46011031	Kishpin tebákonittizzoeyung , kâ keguh tebákoniggoosemin .
46011032	Ope tabákonegoeyungoon ketiyângwâmegomin Kitche Manito ōnje , keche ōnje nisshewunnátizzissewung ákeeng bemátizzidjig .
46011033	Me eu ōnje nekânissetōk , miáwunjeitteyungoon che weessinneyung bábeittetá .
46011034	Oweuh aninne buhkutat , andát tuh wesene , keche ōnje mowōnjeittissewag keche mutche totumag . Ahnint iuheen pánemá takoshinán neenguh ezhichega .
46012001	Nōngumdush , nekânissetōk , tuzzhindumink ochichágomegewawin kenundowaneminenim che nissetotumag .
46012002	Kekekandánâwâ , miátáwizzidjig uhgeáweyag , uhnopenuhnagwâ uhgew natágegetosigwâ muzzineneeg sagábeginitingin 'zhizhewabizzeyag .
46012003	Me e-e ōnje kenissetotumonenim , kâ oweuh aninne Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje gegetōt , tá ekettose Jesus nuhnebekinjegâzo , kâdush oweuh Jesus Kitche Manito tá ekettose meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje ekettōt .
46012004	Papuhkânuttōn menittewinun , bazhekgodush ween uhchi châg .
46012005	Papuhkânuttōn uhnokewinun , bazhekgo Manito .
46012006	Papuhkânuttōn uhnokewinun , bazhek 'ow Manito anokeet kokkinná aninnewun weowwinne .
46012007	Uhchichâgomá omezhishowwenágwetonun kokkinná iuheen , kokkinná aninnewug ōnje che mennoizzhewabizzewât .
46012008	Uhchichâg omenán bazhek aninnewun nebwâkâgegetowin , bazhekdush Uhchichâg omenán , kekandumowin .
46012009	Bazhekdush Uhchichâg omenán che nojemoewanit ákoozewin ; minowâdush bazhek , mushkâwandumowin .
46012010	Bazhekdush omenán che muhmándátotuminit , bazhekdush keche kekanemát quiuk azhe guhgequanegwan ; bazhekdush Uhchichâgomá omenán , uhnōch inwawinun che inwanit , bazhek dush keche ánekuhnotunk puhkân inwawinun :
46012011	Bazhek Uhchichâg kokkinná iuheen andotunk , anandunkigo otezhemámenán kokkinná aninnewun .
46012012	Tebishko weowwemá azhe bazhekwunk , bátienukdush óbuhkazewinemán bazhkwun weowwemán me tebishko Christ andit .
46012013	Bazhekgo Uhchichâgomá kokkinná wanje baptizemigoeyunk , che bazhekwunk weowwemá , kishpin Jewug áweyunk , giya miátáwizzidjig áweyunk , awâkânewungwan giya tabanin dizzowungwan , kokkinnádush kege ezheigomin che menequayunkigo uhow bazhek Uhchichâgomá .
46012014	Weowwemá kâween atuh bazhekwunzenōn buhkazewin bátienuttōn buhkazewinun .
46012015	Kishpin ozit ekettomuhgut , ōnje kâ oninj neendowwisse , kâ weowwemá neendebanemigooseen , menuh e-e kagat weowwemá azhe tebanemigoosi ?
46012016	Kishpin otowwugámá , ekettomuhgut , ōnje kâ oskezhik neendowwisse kâ weowwemá neendebanemigooseen , menuh e-e kagat weowwemá azhe tebanemigoosig ?
46012017	Kishpin kokkinná weowwemá oskezhik áwung áneende ga ōnje nōndunk ? kishpindush kokkinná , weowwemá otowwugámá áwunk , áneende ga ōnje menánjegang ?
46012018	Ween Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunkigo oge i-izzhissetonun buhkazewinun weowwemáng .
46012019	Kishpin kokkinná bazhekwunk buhkazewin , uneezh e-e weow ?
46012020	Nōngumdush bátienuttōn buhkazewinun , bazhekdush weow ?
46012021	Oskezhikomá kâwéen otá ittunzeen oninjemá , kâween kepapámanemisinōn , giya ōshtegwânemá kâ ōtâ ittunzeen ozittámá ; kâ kepapámanemisenōn .
46012022	Kagat giyadush owushema ono buhkazewinemán , kâ gwetch ningōt inábuhtussinōn anandumung , kâ ketábemábizzissemin , iásewunk .
46012023	Onoedush kebuhkazewinenánin agutchetoeyungoon , me owushema apetandumunk , onedush miánábomenágwuk keowwenánin owushema apetandágwuk .
46012024	Ono manwâbomenágwukin kebuhkazewinenánin , kâ apetandágoosenōn , weendush Kitche Manito kokkinná buhkazewinua oge mámuhozitonun owushemadush keche apetandágwuk eu owushema nōndás apetandágwuk .
46012025	Me eu kâween kago tuh buhquabichegâtasenōn weowwemáng , me eu ōnje kokkinná buhkazewinun , tuh nánezhokomátemuhgutōn .
46012026	Bazhek buhkazewin mámetáwandumomuhgukin , kokkinná buhkazewinun , mámetáwandumomuhguttōn , bazhekdush buhkazewin , manowânegwandumomuhgukin kokkinná buhkazewin manowânegwandum .
46012027	Binná keenowâ Christ weow babazhek andussheyag obuhkazewinun .
46012028	Kitche Manito ánint uhnumeawinink otussán , netam , anoninjig , minowâ mamándáwizzidjig , minowâdush gagequajig , minowâdush mamándototungig , minowâdush nojemōtōng ákoozewin , nezhokomátewin , minowâ , ogemákundumowin , papuhkân inwawin .
46012029	Kokkinná anoninjig innuh áwewug ? kokkinná nuh mamándáwizzidjig áwewug ? kokkinná nuh gagequajig áwewug ? kokkinná mamándátotungig áwewug ?
46012030	Kokkinná nuh n'wâjemoewajig ákoozewin áwewung ? kokkinná nuh uhnōch anwajig áwewung ? kokkinná nuh wiáneguhnotungig áwewung ?
46012031	Nundowandumōk owushema apetandágwuk menittewin , owushemia azhe wanissheshink kekekinnoumonim .
46013001	Kishpin kushketoeyán , che inwayán , kokkinná anishanâbag anwawât , giya Kitche Manito omezhinowamun otinwawinewâ , kishpin gezhawâtizzissewân ; tebishko shiáwâbekuhumingin miskobewâbeek neenduhpetandágooze .
46013002	Kishpin kushketoeyán , che ōnwâchegayán , kishpin kekandumán kokkinná kiátuhkin , kokkinná giya nebwâkâ wandumowin kishpin ayáán kokkinná mushkâwandumowin che bejenissetoeyán wudjewun kishpin gezhawâtizzissewân , kâ ningōt neendinâbuhtuhgandágoozisse .
46013003	Kishpin kokkinná neenduhnokâjegun , megewayán keche usshumugwâ katemákizzidjig ; kishpin megewayán neow che châgitag geshawâtizzissewândush , kâ ningōt neendá enábuhchetoseen .
46013004	Keshawâtizzewin beomuhgut keenwazh , mennoizzhewabut kâ guhgâwanindewin áwunzenōn , kâ ōmbásinzenōn ,
46013005	Kâ mutcheizzhewabussinōn , kâween tebinowa atuh kunowâbundizzemuhgussenōn , kâ wanuhpuhusinōn che nishkâtizzink ; kâ mutche enanduhze ;
46013006	Kâ mennowânegwanduhze mutche izzhewabizzewinink , mennowânegwandum quiuk izzhewabizzewinink ;
46013007	Kokkinná kago oguhbikán kotuhgittowin , kokkinná kago tabwatum , kokkinná kago onundowandán .
46013008	Keshawâtizzewin kâweká ánissussenōn : ánwâchegawin koshá tuh banátut otanuhnewun tuh pezán ábemuhguttōn , kekandumowin tuh bánátut .
46013009	Kekekandámin ánint ketōnwâchegamin ánint .
46013010	Ope gá geschichegâtag tuhkoshinomuhgut , eu gá geschichegâtasinōk tuh wabinnegâta .
46013011	Magwouh uhbenoche-eweyán obenocheink neenge ezhegegit , uhbenocheink neendizzhe nissetotum , obenocheink neenge ezhe náguttuhwandum ; opedush buh keche eninneweyán , ningooche neembuhgittenán neenduhbenoche izzhewabizzewin .
46013012	Nōngumdush shábwâbingin wâsáchegunábeekōnk , neendizzhenámin , pánemádush keguh ásumeengwândemin : nōngum ánint neenkekandán azhekekanemigoeyán .
46013013	Binná onoedush niswa ono iuheen , mushkâwandumowin , buhgoosanemowin , keshawâtizzewin , owushemá apetandágwuk ono keshawâtizzewin .
46014001	Nopenuttumōk keshawâtizzewin , nundowandumōk ochichâgomá shâwandágoozewin , owushema apetandumōk che guhgequayag .
46014002	Ween anwat inwawin oweuh nasetotunzig , kâween aninnewun oguhnonáseen , Kitche Manitōn ganonájin ; kâ oweuh aninnewun onissetotágoseen , ochichâgōnk kiátutinegin otuzzhindánun .
46014003	Ween gagequat aninnewun oguhnonán uhguhgâzomát che mushkâwandunk che mennowânegoozenit .
46014004	Ween nasetotunzeeng inwawin anwat , mushkâwandumeittizzo , weendush gagequat onezhokumowân anumeánidjin che mushkâwanduminit .
46014005	Apadush kokkinná miugwawinun anwayag neendenandum , owushemá onissheshin kokkinná che guhgequayag , ween gagequat , owushema aptandágooze , apetandágoozit ween miugwa win anwat , meatuh ánekuhnotunk , anumeawin che sōngunk .
46014006	Binná , nekânissetōk , kishpin beotissinnuhgook miugwawin , be inwayán , áneen ga inábuhtuhkebun meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje guhnoninnuhgook ; uhgamá kekandumowinink uhgamá ánwâchegawinink uhgamá giya guhgequawinink ?
46014007	Giyadush uhnōch iuheen bamátussinōk , gamá pepegwun , gamá nōndágomutchegun , kishpin kekenowâch inwasigwâ , áneen ga ezhe kekandumingebun pepegwunnewung gamá nōndágomutchegunewung ?
46014008	Kishpin nōndágomutchegun uhnōchigo inwag owwanan ga gezhetápun che megâzōt ?
46014009	Me debishko , keenowâ , kishpin nissetotágoozissewag azhe gegetoeyag , áneen ga ezhe kekandumingebun aketōnk ? notinigo keguh guhguhnotánâwâ .
46014010	Konemá azhe bátienuk inwawinun ákeeng kokkinnádush go kekinowâch ekettowinun .
46014011	Kishpin nissetotunzewân inwawin , buhgwutch anishanâba neenguh 'ow , ween giya ganozhit tuh buhgwutch anishanâbawe .
46014012	Me debishko giya kenowâ azhe nundowâbundumag uhchichâgomá megewawin wekoochetōg owushema keche ōnje sōngunk uhnumeawin .
46014013	Eu ōnje kishpin oweuh aninne kushketōt miugwawin che inwat , tuh uhnumeá che we kushketōt keche ánekuhnotunk .
46014014	Kishpin uhnumeáyân miugwawinink , neenchichâg uhnumeá , neennissetotumowin kâ ningōt inábuhtussinōn .
46014015	Owwagonandush eu ? neenguhuhnumeá neenchichâgōnk , neenguh uhnumeá neennissetotumowinink , giya ; neenguhnuhgum neenchichâgōnk neenguhnuhgum neennissetotumowinink giya .
46014016	Kishpin izzhewabussinōk , ope shâwanjegayun kechichâgōnk áneen ga ezhe kekandunk ween mazaniegun kakanduhzik ope otittunk , Amen che ekettōnk anumeáeyunin , ōnje kâ onisetotunze aketoeyun ?
46014017	Keen ween kagat quiuk ketuhnumeá , ween bakânizzitush kâ sōngitchegâzōse .
46014018	Megwetch neendená neen Kitche Manitōm owushema enik inwawinun uzzhinwayán enik keenowâ kokkinná inayag .
46014019	Uhnumeawegumigōnkdush owushema neendá meenwandum náninkigo che gegetoeyán neennissetotumowinink e-e keche kuhgekemugwâ ánint , gamá nánink metoswâk tussink keche gegetoeyán , oweuh che nissetotunzigdush .
46014020	Nekânissetōk kago uhbenocheing izzhewabizzekago , kenissetotumowinewâng ; kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâng uhbenocheing izzhewabizzik , kenissetotumowinewângdush eninneeng izzhewabizzik .
46014021	Azhebe-egâta tepákonegawinink , aninnewug ōnje puhkân otonemáng uhgew anishanâbag kiábe kokkinnâ o-o ánuhwe kâween neenguh bezindágooseeg eketto Kitche Manito .
46014022	Eu ōnje inwawinun miugwawinun kekinowâchichegawingun , kâween uhgew tiabwatungig uhgew atuh tiabwatunzigook guhgequawin onissheshininne uhgew tiabwatunzigook kâween ween uhgew tiabwatungig .
46014023	Kishpin kokkinná anumeájig mowōnjeittewât bazhekwunōnk , kokkinnádush miugwawin inwawât , ánintdush peendegawug nasetowinungig mazaniegun , ánintdush tiabwatunzigook , kâween kewuhnátizzewug kegi-iggoosewâ ?
46014024	Kishpin kokkinná guhgequawât , bazhekdush peendega tiabwatunzig , nasetowinunzig mazaniegun , kokkinná okushkeáwân uhtabwatuminit kokkinná otebákonáwân .
46014025	Me o-o wanje bákissininik otáink , kiátuttinegin ; o-oedush pungisshink oskezhigōnk ōnjittá oguh uhnumeatowân Kitche Manitōn , Kitche Manito quiuk kegegishkowâwâ guttuh eketto .
46014026	Ahneen azhewabuk nekânissetōk ? mowōnjeitteyagoon , ketoguhgequawinim , ketotinwawinim , keguhnonáwizzim , ketánekunotágowizzim , máno kokkinná iuheen tuh geschichegâta wun che sásōngeitteyag .
46014027	Kishpin aninne miugwawin inwat , kâ owushema neezh niswa tuh tuzzheshewug eudush mamashquut ; bazhekdush oguh ánekuhnotága .
46014028	Kishpin oweuh ánekuhnotágasig tuh pezân áta uhnumeawegumigōnk , tuh guhguhnonittizzo che guhnōnát Kitche Manitōn .
46014029	Gagequajig neezh niswa tuh gegetowug ánintdush oguh , tebákonánâwâ .
46014030	Kishpin kago otissigōt 'ow bazhek námátábit , 'ow mag wouh gágetōt tuh pezân ábe .
46014031	Kokkinná keguh gegetōm mamashqutigo che gegetoeyag me kokkinná konemá tá nissetotumōg , konemá kokkinná ketá mennowánegoozim .
46014032	Ochichâgwun 'ow gagequat aenát tuh izzhewabizzewun .
46014033	Kitche Manito kâween ween otozhetoseen ōmbegizzewin , osâgetōn mennoinnowandewin , azhewabuk kokkinná anumeájig .
46014034	Máno keteqamewâg tuh pezân ábewug , uhnumeawegumigōnk ; kâween enandágoozissewug uhgew che gegeeshwât ezhe guhgekemáwug keche bezindumowât , tepákonegawin ekettomuhgut giya .
46014035	Kishpin kago we kekandumowât , onâbamewân oguh kuhquajemáwân andáwât ; águhtandágwut equa che gegetōt uhnumeawegumigōnk .
46014036	Wagonan ? Kitche Manito ogegetowin keenowâ innuh ōnjebámuhgut ? keenowâ nuh atuh ototissigōnâwâ ?
46014037	Kishpin oweuh aninne , neenguhgequaweninew enandunk ; gamá uhchichâgomáwit , máno tuh tabwatum ono iuheen wazhebeumonuhgook Kitche Manito oguhgequawinun .
46014038	Kishpin oweuh aninne kago kekanduhzik máno kâ kago oguh kekanduhzeen .
46014039	Eu ōnje nekânissetōk , wekoochetōk che guhgequayag , kago genuhumowâg kago , ánint miugwawin che inwawát .
46014040	Máno kokkinná iuheen wawane tuh mennoizzhewabutōn .
46015001	Minowawdush , nekânissetōk , kenissetotumonenim guhgequawin , gá guhgekeminuhgook eu gá bezindumag , nōngumdush mashkâwemeenjimenumag
46015002	Eu wanje bemátizzeyag , kishpin kunwandumag eu gagekeminuhgook , meatuh ningōtono inábuhtuhganduhzewag keche wuneshinag .
46015003	Kege weendumonenim , netam eu gá kekandumán , Jesus Christ ezhe ōnjenat kemutcheizzhewabizzewinenánin , azhebe-egâtagigo mazaniegunink .
46015004	Uhge ni-isshichegâzōt , uhge ábejebátdush minowâ naswogwunigutinik azhebe-egâtagigo mazaniegunink .
46015005	Cephasundush , ogewâbomigōn , minowâ giya ashe neezhinidjin .
46015006	Náágutchdush owushema nánwâk wekânissemág , ogewâbomáwân ningōtink , kagâ kokkinná uhgew bemátizzewug gayábe , ánintdush genebowug .
46015007	Náágutchdush Jamesun ogewâbomigōn , giyadush kokkinná anoninjig .
46015008	Squâchdush neen neengewâbomá , neen bazhek kâ quiuk ope neengenegese .
46015009	Neen nōndás neenduhpetandágooz anoninjig kâ neendá apetandágoozisse anonint che agoyámbán , ōnje uhge mutchetoumán Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin .
46015010	Kitche Manito osháwanjegawin neendezheigoon wanje apetandágoozeyán , oshâwanjegawin gá menigoeyán kâween mishá neengemenigoseen , owushema nebewá neenduhnoke menik anokewât kokkinná , kâween neenigo tebinowa , Kitche Manito koshá oshâwanjegawin gá wejewegoyán .
46015011	Eu ōnje , kishpin neen , kishpin weenowâ , me azhe guhequayáng medush gá ezhe tabwatumag .
46015012	Kishpin gá ezhe guhgequaweengan , Christ gá ábejebát , wagonan ánint wanje ekettoeyag , kâ kago ábejebáwin uzzheketoyag ?
46015013	Kishpin tuhgosinōk ábejebáwin , Christ kâ ge ábejebáse .
46015014	Kishpin Christ ká ábejebásegwan , neenguhgequawinenán kâ ningōt inábuhtussinōn .
46015015	Kagat keguhgenowishkenotowânán Kitche Manito ōnje neenge-ekettomen Kitche Manito oge ábejebáán Christun , kâ ábejebásegwan gá nabojig kishpin ábejebásigwâ .
46015016	Kishpin gá nabojig ábejebásigwâ kâ giya ween Christ ábejebáse .
46015017	Kishpin Christ , kâ ábejebásegwan , ketabwatumowin kâ ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn , gayábe kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân kegegishkánâwâ .
46015018	Giya weenowâ gagenajig tiabwatowâjig Christun banátizzewug .
46015019	Kishpin enandumunk Christ o-o atuh nōngum bemátizzeyunk che bemájeinunk owushema ketá katemágezissemin kokkinná aninnewug andusshewât .
46015020	Nōngumdush ōnjittá Christ geábejebá , ween netam gá ábejebá menik nabojig .
46015021	Nebowin aninneeng azhe ōnjemuhguk , me giya ábejebáwin aninneeng azhe ōnjemuhguk .
46015022	Kokkinná azhegegenang Adam , me e-e ga ezhe ōnje bemátizzeeng Christ .
46015023	Kokkinná aninnewug tebinowa otizzhewabizzewinewâ ōnje : Christ netam , medush kokkinná tabanemájin ope tuhkoshink .
46015024	Opedush tuh ishquâsa ope bagittenumowât Kitche Manitōn ogemáwewin ōsemán ope kokkinná buhgittenunk ogemákundumowin kitchetwâwizzewin giya mushkâwizzewin .
46015025	Onjittá tuh ogemákundum , nánázh kokkinná omiátáwizzemun keche tuhkokânát anámiuhe ozitáng .
46015026	Eeshquâch miátáwizzit gabanájeint , me nebowin .
46015027	Kokkinná kago anámiuhe ozitáng oge átōn ; opedush aketojin kokkinná iuheen anámiuhe , ozitáng uhchegâtanik , ná gwut ween kokkinná kago anámiuhe ge átōt , kâween ween anámiuhe ge uhsáse .
46015028	Opedush kokkinná iuheen , anámiuhe ge uhtowwint , opedush oguisemá ween tebinowa anámiuhe guhtuh uhsá uhnew kokkinná iuheen anámiuhe gá buhgittenumágoojin , medush Kitche Manito ga ezhe ápiche negánizzekundunk kokkinná .
46015029	Kishpin izzhewabussinōk áneen ga izzhewabizzewât uhgew baptizeinjig nabojin ōnje ? kishpin nabojig ábejebásigwá pápish ? wagonan wanje baptizemigowât nabojin ōnje ?
46015030	Owwagonan wanje eznegâboweyâng nuhnezânizzewinink andusso tepiegunak ?
46015031	Keguhgatinamowittonim kepâpenanemowinnewâng ōnje , eu ayáyán Jesus Christ ōnje , nenib andussogezhiguk .
46015032	Kishpin aninnewâzoeyán , neengemegânâ buhgwutch áwase Ephesusink ekettoeyán , áneen ga enábuchetoeyámbán kishpin nabojig ábejebásigwâ ? máno wesenetá , minequatá wâbunk keguh nebomin .
46015033	Kago oweuh keguh wiazhemigoseen , wetokowwintwâ mache izzhewabizzidjig , me wanje banátizzit mennoizzhewabizzewin .
46015034	Kooshkoozetumōk quiuk izzhewabizzewin , kago mutcheizzhewabizzekago , ōnje , ánint kâ okekanemásewân Kitche Manitōn : keche ōnje águtcheyag o-o wanje aninnuhgook .
46015035	Oweuh aninne guhtuh eketto , áneen azhe ábejebáwât nabojig ? áneen azhenágwutinik weowwewân ?
46015036	Keguhgebátiz , menekânun kategâtumun , kishpin nebomuhgusinōk kâ saguhkesinōn .
46015037	Euedush kategâtumun , kâ eu keketegâtunzenun eu keche weowwewunk , menekânun atuh , konemá puhquazhegun menekân konemá ánint puhkân .
46015038	Kitche Manitodush ween aenandunk tuh ezhetonun , weowemán , kokkinnádush menekânun tebinowa weowweâng .
46015039	Kokkinná weyâsemán kâween bazhekwunzenōn ; bazhek oweyâsemá , anishanâba weyâs , minowâ bazhek weyâsemá áwase weyâs , minowâ bazhek weyâsemá kago weyâs , minowâ weyâsemá benase weyâs .
46015040	Anint weowwemán gezhigōnk tebanjegâtawun , ánint ákeeng tebanjegâtawun ; kitchetwâwizzewin gezhigōnk bazhekwunk , kitchetwâwizzewin giya ákeeng bazhekwunk .
46015041	Bazhek kitchetwâwizzewin gezhikegezis , minowâ bazhek dibbekegezis , minowâ bazhek uhnungwug , bazhekdush uhnung owushema apetandágooze , minowâ bazhek uhnung apetandágoozit .
46015042	Me tebishko ga izzhewabuk ábejebáwinink nabojig ; ketegâtumink begishkunutōnk , tuh ōnje netáwigin wekâ ga begishkunusinōk .
46015043	Ketegâta águtchewinink , netáwigin kitchetwâwizzewinink ; ketegâta neenuhmizzewinink , netáwigin mushkâwizzewinink .
46015044	Ketegâta oweyâse weowwemá , netáwigin ochichâgo weowwemá . Tuhgomuhgut weyâse weowwemá , tuhgomuhgut giya ochichâgo weowwemá .
46015045	Ezhebe-egâta , netam aninne Adam uhchichâgōm keche bemátizzit ge ezhe áwintebun , ishquiách Adam tatátuhbeet uhchichâgomá ge ezhichegâzo .
46015046	Anawak , 'ow netam uhchichâgowissig , oweyâse weowwemá áwe , náágutchdush , uhow wachichâgowit .
46015047	Netam aninne , áke ge ōnje ozheá ákeeng ezhenágooze , wiánekasinkdush aninne , Kitche Manito gezhigōnk ōnje .
46015048	Ahkeeng wanjeet aninne me azhenágōozewât , ákeeng wanje netáwigidjig , 'owdush gezhigōnk wanjeet , me azhenágozewât gezhigōnk ayájig .
46015049	Azhe innowunk ákeeng ayát ; me ga ezhe innowunk gezhigōnk ayát .
46015050	Binná , nōngum o-o neendikit nekânissetōk , weyâs giya misque kâ Kitche Manito otegemáwewinink tá peendegamuhgusinōn ; bagishkunuk kâ tá benojemomuhgusinōn .
46015051	Binná , kewâbundimnim miámuhkátandágwuk ; kâween kokkinná keguh nebásemin , kokkinná koshá keguh gwakenágoozemin .
46015052	Kitche wiebuh , buhsungábewinink menik , squâch che mutwawag mutwawachegun ; ( mutwawachegun tuh mutwawa ; ) nabojig guhtuh onishkáwug wekâ che begishkuhnunisigwâ , keguh gwakenágoozemindush .
46015053	O-o bagishkunuk weowwemá , wekâ che begishkunusinōk guhtuh uhchegâta .
46015054	Me o-o bagishkunut weowwemá ope utōng e-e ga begishkunusinōk o-o nabomuhgut weowwemá , ope guhtuh utōng ga nebomuhgusinōk medush keche tebishkosag azhebe-egatag mazaniegunink , nebowin , goonjegáta shágocheittewinink .
46015055	Oh nebowin , áneezh e-e kemázánuhowawin ? Oh jebagumink , áneezh keshagooche-ewawin ?
46015056	Mázánowawin nebowin , mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; mushkâwizzewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , tepákonegawin .
46015057	Megwach neendenánán Kitche Manito ween máninunk shágooche ewawin Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
46015058	Me eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook nekânissetōk , iyângwâmezik , mushkâwandumōk , kago keguh jebinnegoseem , gâgineek uhnoketumōk Kitche Manito otuhnokewin , ōnje kekekandánâwâ ketuhnokewinewâ kâween unishá ketuhnokeseem Kitche Manito ōnje .
46016001	Nōngumdush neentuhzhindán o-o , anumeájig mowōnjeittewât shoneá gá ezhe menugwâ anumeájig Galatiaink che totumowât , me giya keenowâ aninnuhgook .
46016002	Máno andussheyag ningooche keguh átōnâwâ kago , andussō uhnumeagezhigut kokkinná aninnewug iyámenik oguh ni-issetōnâwâ , Kitche Manitōn azhe mámenigowât , che mowōnjichegasewag ope tuhkoshinán .
46016003	Opedush tuhkoshinán owwagwanug ga innowâwagwan , kemazaniegunnewâng mewug uhgew ga uhnonuhgik kechebeezhewenint kemegewawinewâ Jerusalemink .
46016004	Kispin kushketoeyán keche ezháeyán , neenguh wejewegōg .
46016005	Binná keguh beotisenim , ope bemeshábooshkumán Macedoniaink ; ( ōnjittá neenguhunneshábooshkán Macedonia : )
46016006	Konemá nuhkowa neenguh iá uzzhiáeyag , konemá kopa pepōn neenguh iá uzzhiáeyag ; keche nezhokomowweyag keche ezháeyán , wâ ezháeyán .
46016007	Nōngum ween , kâween keguh wâbomisenonim , ningooche nōmuk nuhkowa neenguh iá uzzhiáeyag kishpin Kitche Manito anandunk .
46016008	Ephesusink neenguh iá nánázh che ochichesag Pentecost wekoondewin .
46016009	Kitche ishquândám neenbákindánuhmágo ; batienowugdush nashkanjegajig .
46016010	Kishpin Timotheus tuhkoshink , máno keguh wejewegowâ , kago chegotunzik , Kitche Manito otuhnokewin enuhnoke , azhe enuhnokeyán giya neen .
46016011	Kago oweuh aninnewun oguh pâpenanemigooseen , baká ságitchesuhginekanit keche be otezhit ; neembeá che tuhkoshink mámowe wekânissemág .
46016012	Uhtuhzhemint nekânisenán Apollos , ápadush beotisinág mámowy wekânissemág , neendánuhwe enandum , kâweendush enanduhzee che be-ezhát nōngum : ōnjittá tuh tuhkoshin ope kushketōt che tuhkoshink .
46016013	Uhkowâbig , mushkâwegâbowig mushkâwandumowinink , aninneeng izzhewabizzig , sōngizzig .
46016014	Kokkiná kago keshawâtizzewinink guhtuh izzhewabut .
46016015	Ketenenim nekânissetōk , ( kekekanemáwâg Stephanas otinotawizzewin , mewug uhgew gá netáme sháwandágoozidjig Achaiaink , ge izzhewabizzewugdush che nezhokomowât anuhmeánidjin . )
46016016	Tuhbuhzheezh buhgitinumōk keowwewân uhgew towug anishanâbag , giyadush , kokkinná uhgew wâtokonungoog uhnokewin .
46016017	Neempâpenanim Stephanas uhbe-ezhát , giya Fortunatus , giya Achaicus , eu azhe nundowandumag keenowâ kokkinná ge megewawug .
46016018	Neenchichâgōnk , giya kechichâgowâng , ge ōnje niandumōg , me eu ōnje keguh tabwa-andum , e-e tinouh iáwewât .
46016019	Anumeájig Asiaink ketuhnemekágowâg . Aquila giya Priscilla ketuhnemekágowâg nebená Kitche Manitōn ōnje , giya anumeánidjin owegewâmewâng .
46016020	Kokkinná wekânissemág kesuhgeninjenegōg . Uhnuhmekotátig mamashkōt iojeendeyag .
46016021	Neen Paul neendoshebeán o-o suhgeninjenittewin tebinowa neninj ōnje .
46016022	Kishpin oweuh aninne siágeásig Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christun máno tuh Anathema Maran-atha .
46016023	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin , máno keguh wejewegōnâwâ .
46016024	Neensâge ewawin keguh wejewegōnâwâ Kitche Manito Jesus Christ ōnje . Amen .
47001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kitche Manito otenandumowinink ōnje , giya Timotheus kekânisenán otoshebeumowân anumeánidjin Corinthink , kokkinná giya anumeánidjin mizze Achaiaink ayájig .
47001002	Máno keguh shâwandágoozim innowandewinink , Kitche Manito Kōsenán ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
47001003	Megwach ketenáná Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun , ōsemá o-o shâwanjegawin , ōsemá kokkiná mennowânegoozewin .
47001004	Ween niandumeinunk kokkinná kesuhnágizzewinenánin me giya keenowint ga ezhe niandumeungwâbun wasitáwandungig .
47001005	Onje Jesus Christ okotuhgitowin nebewá kegegishkámin me eu niandumowin azhe ōndinuhmunk giya keenowint Jesus Christ ōnje .
47001006	Kishpin neenowint suhnágizzeyâng , me keenowâ keche ōnje mennowânegwandumag , keche ōnje bemátizzeyag kekotuhgitowinewâ ōnje ; me giya neenowint wanje kotuhgitoeyáng kishpindush mennowânegoozeyâng , me e-e keche ōnje mennowánegoozeyag , keche ōnje bemátizzeyag .
47001007	Nemushkâwandámin uhnáguhtuhwanemenáng me ga ezhe iyiáeyag kotuhgitowin , me ga ezhe iyiáeyag mennowânegoozewin .
47001008	Nekânissetōk ketenanemineme che kekandumag neenkotuhgitowinenán , gá otisigoeyáng Asiaink ge gache kuhgwâtuhgitomin bázhichiuhe nemushkâwizzewinenáng neengebuhbuhnát andamin neembemátizzewinenánin .
47001009	Nebowin neenge tuhnandámin neowwenáng , kâ pâpish mushkâwizzewin neenge tuhnandumázosemin , meatuh Kitche Manito ween wiábejebat nabonidjin .
47001010	Ween gá bemájeinunk kitche nebowinink , nōngumdush bamájeinunk , ketenandámindush ōnjittá che bemájeinunk .
47001011	Keenowâ nezhokomáteyag ketuhnumeawinewâng , uhnumeatumowweyâng eu megewawin ōnje gá menigoeyunk , nebená anishanâbag ōnje .
47001012	Me o-o nemennowânegoozewinenán , ōnje neenkekandámin mennoizzhewabizzewin uhgosunk Kitche Manito , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje , o-o ketizzhewabizzewinenán ákeeng keenowâdush ōnje .
47001013	Kâwekâ bakânuk ketoshebeumosenoneme meatuh menik wiábundumag mazaniegunink , giya tiabwatumag , neendenandumdush gâgineek keguh tabwa-andám .
47001014	Tebishko gá azhe tabwatowweyáng ánint , keenowâ kemenowânegoozim neenowint ōnje , tebishko neenowint giya azhe mennowânegoozeyâng keenowâ ōnje Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ogezhigutōmink .
47001015	Uhtabwatumán o-o ōnje ketánuhwe beotissinimwâbun , konemá minowâ ketáge ōnje mennotolágōm .
47001016	Ketánuhwe unnewâbominenimwâbun , Macedoniaink uhge ezháeyán minowâ ketánuhwe beotisinim Macedoniaink webeōnjebáeyán Judeaink kechegebe izzhewabizzeyagobun .
47001017	O-o ge enandumán , neenge guhgebátandum innuh ? eu wâ totumán , oweyásemá nuh eu wanje totumán ? menuh o-o azhewabizzeyán , kagat , kágat , kâween , kâween , che ekettoyán ?
47001018	Kitche Manito azhetabwat neendikittowinenán anináng kâween ween , kagat , kâween , giya .
47001019	Onje ween Kitche Manito Oguisun , Jesus Christ , uhow wânduhmonuhgook Timotheus giya Silvanus wândumonágwâ , kâween , kagat , kâween giya azhewabusinōn , weendush kagat .
47001020	Ween kokkinná Kitche Manito owâweendumágawinun , kagat giyadush , Amen , Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin keenowint ōnje .
47001021	Ween máninung mushkâwandumowin , keche ōnje mushkâwegâboweyung , che tabwatowwung Christ , ween gá onuhgeminunk , me uhow Kitche Manito .
47001022	Ween gá uhgokewusonunk , meninunkdush uhchichâgomá ketaenáng .
47001023	Minowâdush , Kitche Manito okekandán ōnjittá kâween kewe ositáwandumeisenonim me gá be ōnje ezhásewân Corinthink .
47001024	Kâween eu ōnje , uhtebandumán , kemushkâwandumowinewâ , ōnjedush kenezhokumoneme , che mennowânegoozeyag : mushkâwandumowin ōnje , ketōnje nebowwim .
47002001	Neengewuhwanandum , minowâ che beotisinonuhgook ope che kushkandumán .
47002002	Kishpin kushkandumeinnuhgook , owwanan neen , ga mennowânegwandumeit ; meatuh uhgew kashkandumeinjig neen ōnje ?
47002003	Mego o-o oshebeumonuhgook ope beotissinuhgook , kâ neenguh ōnje kushkanduhze uhgew ga ge ōnje mennowânegoozeyámbán , ōnje , me ono , ananeminuhgook nemennowânegoozewin , me giya keenowâ kemennowânegoozewinewâ .
47002004	Magwouh kushkandumisink , neendáge oshebeumonim gegizzebeeng , kâween ween che onje osittáwandumag , che kekandumung koshá azhe sâgeinuhgook .
47002005	Kishpin oweuh kushkandumeint , kâween neen neengekushkandumeiggoose , ánint atuh ōnje megooshkâcheisinonuhgook ozâm .
47002006	Wuhow towuh aninne , enandágwuttinne keche ōnje kotuhgeint nebewá ōnje .
47002007	Neendáwâch ketámenowweshâwanemáwâ , ketá niandumeáwâ , keche ōnje goonjegâzosig , nebewá kushkandumowin .
47002008	Ketenenim keche mushkâwandumag che sâgeitteyag .
47002009	Me o-o wanje oshebeumonuhgook nōngum keche kekanememinuhgook kishpin ga tabwatowwewagwan kokkinná kago .
47002010	Kishpin mennoweshâwanemag oweuh , kago , giya neen neenguh mennoweshâwanemá ; kishpin mennowweshâwanjegayán kago , keenowâ ōnje Jesus Christ oskezhigōnk .
47002011	Mutche Manito keche ōnje kushkeisinowung , neenkekandámin okuhgianizzewin .
47002012	Minowâdush , ope buhtuhkoshinán Troasink , owwe guhgequayán Christ omeenwâjemowin , Kitche Manito neembákindanumag ishquândan .
47002013	Kâ nánázh neendunwashemonose neenchichâgōnk ōnje kâ neenge mikowâse Titus nekânis ; neengenuhguhnág emá Macedoniaink neendezhá .
47002014	Nōngum megwach ketenánán Kitche Manito , ween mozhuk meninunk shágooche-ewawin , Jesus Christ ōnje ; owâbundiewandush onebwâkâwin , mizzewa , keenowint ōnje .
47002015	Kago wâshkobemágwukin ketenanimigonán Kitche Manito Jesus Christ ōnje , uhgew ōnje bamájeinjig giya uhgew banátizzidjig .
47002016	Uhgew banátizzidjig uhtabwatunzikwâ , me owushema wanje izzhewabizzewât , ungewedush tiabwatungig , me owushema wanje gâgega bemátizzewât : owwanan kashketōt che nissetotunk ono iuheen ?
47002017	Kâween e-e ketezhewabizzisseem azhewabizzewât banajetojig Kitche Manito oguhgequawin ; quiuk tabwáwin ketezhegegetomin , Kitche Manito apetanemungid , anosumeet Kitche Manito neengegetomin Jesus Christ ōnje neendōnje gegetonim .
47003001	Nemahjetahmin innuh , minowâ uhmennotuzzhindumáng neowwenánin ? neennundowandámin innuh oshebe-egunun , keche egoeyag che muhmequânegoeyáng ? nenundowandámin innuh che oshebeummowweyung mazaniegun ?
47003002	Keenowâ keowwewân me nemazaniegunenánin wazhebeegâtag needaináng , kekekanemigōm kokkinna aninnewug kewâbomigowâg .
47003003	Wawane mezhishshowwenágwitōng Christ che omazaniegunit anoketumung ; kâween ween oshebe-egunâbōng ōnje oshebe-egâtasinōn ; meatuh Kitche Manito giágega bemátizzit Ochichâgwun ōnje ; kâween uhsine otopowinábekōnk ; meatuh weyâse otopowinink otaemáng .
47003004	Me azhe tabwatowwungid Kitche Manito Jesus Christ ōnje .
47003005	Kâween ween neendenanduhzemin , nemennoizzhewabizzewin Kitche Manito otebandán .
47003006	Ween gá ezheinunk , che kushketoeyunk che guhgequayunk ōshke wâweendumágawin , kâween ween oshebe-egun , me atuh uhchichâgomá : oshebe-egun nishewamuhgut , uhchichâgomá megewa bemátizzewin .
47003007	Ezhetwâwin nebowin , eu wazhebe-egâtag , giya mazenichegâtag uhsineeng , kishpin ezhe kitchetwâwuk , Israel onejânisun kâ kushketosewug we gunnowâbomáwât Mosesun oskezhigōnk , azhe wâkashkât , eu kitchetwâwizzewin ga ungomuhguk :
47003008	Ahneen o-o Uhchichâgomá ezhetwâwin , owushema ga ezhe kitchetwâwusinōk ?
47003009	Ezhetwâwin bátándewin , kishpin kitchetwâwuk ; owushema quiuk izzhewabizzewin ezhetwâwin tuh kitchetwâwuk .
47003010	Onje eu kachetwâwichegâtag , kâ kitchetwâwusinōn o-o ōnje , eu kitchetwâwizzewin ōnje , miámowy kitchetwâwuk .
47003011	Eu gá banátuk , kishpin kitchetwâwuk , owushema kachetwâwut eu banátusinōk .
47003012	Onje eu uzhenandumung , ápiche kebuhguhketágoozemin .
47003013	Kâween ween Moses andotunk , uhgwuhningwaoon , uhgwuhningwaotizzōt , ōnje Israel onejânisun kâ kushketosewug che guhnowâbundumowât , eu gá ungomuhguk ;
47003014	Onáguhtuhwandumowinewân kuhgebeengwamuhgutinnewun ; nánázh nōngum o-o gezhigut , o-o uhgwuhningwaoon gayábe ezheshin ; kâ ikkoonegâtasenōn ope kanowâbundumowâjin gata wâweendumágawin ; eu uhgwuhningwaoon gá ungomuhguk Christ ōnje .
47003015	Nánázh nōngum o-o gezhiguk , ope Moses tepájeminjin , uhgwuhningwaoon otaewâng átane .
47003016	Kâween nōndás , ope otaewân Kitche Manitōn , ezhe mikkowwewât uhgwuhningwaoon tuh ekoonegâta .
47003017	Nōngum Kitche Manito ween 'ow Uhchichâg , Kitche Manitodush Ochichâgwun uzzhiánit me emá wânuhkewin .
47003018	Kokkinnádush keenowint mizzhishuh keskezhigonáng , kewâbundámin Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin , tebishko wâbomochichâgwunink , me e-e tebishko azhe gwakenágoozeyunk kitchetwâwizzewinink giya minowâ kitchetwâwizzewinink , tebishko Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun andinit .
47004001	Eu ōnje , ōnje uzzhiáyung o-o ezhetwâwin , azhe otissigoeyâng shâwandágoozewin kâ newuhnemikkowwissemin .
47004002	Kokkinná neengewabenámin gámotukin mutcheizzhewabizzewinun , kâween uhbamosang Kuhgianizzewinink , kâ newiazhemásenán oweuh , Kitche Manito odikitowinink , uhmizzhishshowwenágwitoeyáng quiuk tabwawin neenkekandumonánánig kokkinná azhewabizzeyung , anosumeet Kitche Manito .
47004003	Kishpin nemeenwâjemowin gátōng , gátowâwug uhgew waneshingig :
47004004	Manito omá ákeeng ogebeengwanegowân onáguhtuhwanemowinewâng , uhgew tiabwatunzigook ; wâsayá , uhkitchetwâwuk wâweendumágawin kâ tá sâgâtasininne Christ Kitche Manito otezhenágoozewin ogitchetwâwizzewin .
47004005	Kâween neenowint tebinowa neenguhgequasemin , Jesus Christ Kitche Manito atuh neenowint ketobemetágunenáwân neowwenánin Jesus Christ ōnje .
47004006	Onje Kitche Manito ween gá totunk che wâsáyág , ween wâsayá kemenigonán ketaináng owwe kekandumoninunk Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewin anosume skezhik Jesus Christ .
47004007	Ahkeeng otosowinink ketiámin o-o kitchetwâwizzewin ; mushkáwizzewin Kitche Manito che tebandunk , kâween keenowint ketebanduhzemin .
47004008	Neenkotuhgitomin aetowwiuhe , kâweendush neenkushkanduhzemin , newuhwanandámin , kâweendush neembuhbuhnátanduhzemin .
47004009	Neembátáigomin , kâweendush neennuhgunnegoozemin , neen neeswabinnegázomin , kâdush neembanájeiggoozissemin .
47004010	Mozhuk neembabámewetonun neowwenáng Kitche Manito Jesus Christ onebowin , Jesus Christ , obemátizzewin konemá neenguh gegishkámin neowwenáng .
47004011	Neenowint magwouh bemátizzeyáng , mozhuk kekezhandámin keche neboeyunk , ween Jesus ōnje , konemá Jesus obemátizzewin , tá mizzhishshowwenágwut keowwenáng .
47004012	Nebowindush uhnokemuhgut neowwenáng , bemátizzewindush keowwewâng .
47004013	Me debishko azhe iáwungid uhchichâgomá mushkâwandumowin , azhebe-egâtagigo , neengetabwa-andum me wanje gegetoeyán ; neenowint giya neentabwatámin , me wanje gegetoeyáng .
47004014	Onje neenkekandámin , ween gá ábejebáát Kitche Manito Jesusun , me ga ábejebáinunk giya keenowint Jesus ōnje , me ga ōnje wejegâbowitonáng .
47004015	Kokkinná iuheen keenowâ ōnje , me eu kitche nebewâ shâwandágoozewin , nebewá megwach uzzhekettowât , che ōnje kitchetwâweint Kitche Manito .
47004016	Me eu ōnje , wanje wunemikowwisewunk ánuh áqutcheiuhe aninne weow banátut , anámiuhe aninne ashkum ōshkenágweá andussogezhigut .
47004017	Punge neenkotuhgitowinenán ningo buhsungábewin ketuhnoketágomin che menigoeyunk kitchetwâwizzewin ga gâgegasink gâgineek .
47004018	Kâween neenkunowâbunduhzemin ono iuheen wiábundumingin , uhnew atuh wiábunduhzeeng ; iuheen wiábundumingin májámuhgutōn , iuheendush , wiábunduhzeeng gâgegasenōn .
47005001	Onje kekekandámin , omá ákeeng kewegewâmenán , kishpin pekooshkág , ketiámen Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt , wegewâm oninjemá gá ōnje ozhetoseeng , ga gâgegasink gezhigōnk .
47005002	Onje omá kemánátwamin , ōnje kenundowandámin , keche uhgwuhniegâzoyung kewegewâmenáng gezhigōnk ōnje .
47005003	Kishpin ezhe uhgwuhniegâzoyunk , kâ keguh peengwoshâgittesemin .
47005004	Keenowint abeyunk omá owegewâm , kemámátwamin bwâwuhnayunk , kâween ween ōnjittá , we peengwoshshâgitteyunk ōnje , che uhgweigoeyángdush , nebowin che goonjegâtag bemátizzewinink .
47005005	Ween Kitche Manito kege gezhetáigonán o-o iuhe ōnje , giya kegemenigonán ánint Ochichâgwun .
47005006	Eu ōnje gâgineek kemushkáwandámin , ōnje kekekandámin magwouh omá uzzhiáeyunk keowwenáng wâsâ ketōnduhbetowwânán Kitche Manito .
47005007	( Uhtabwa'andumunk o-o wanje kushketoeyunk bamosayunk , kâween ween 'ow wâbeyunk . )
47005008	Kemushkâwandámin , neendikit , ketenandámin che buhkawittoeyunk kebikokeowwenánin konemá che ōnje wejewunk Kitche Manito .
47005009	Eu ōnje ketuhnokemin , owwe niandumeyunk kishpin wejewunk gamá ningooche iyáyunk .
47005010	Kokkinná keguh nebowwemin anosumeet Jesus Christ otepákonegawinink , kokkinná gá ïizzhewabizzewât oweowwewâng guhtuh uhginjegâtane , wanissheshin giya miánátink .
47005011	Onje kekekandámin menik ga ezhe gosittowungebun Kitche Manito keguhgâzománánig aninnewug , mizzhishuh kewâbunduhánáwâ Kitche Manito keowwenánin ; neendenandumdush qundigo kewábundiïgōm neowwenánin .
47005012	Kâween minowâ neenkitchetwâwanduhzemin neowwenánin kemeninemin , keche ōnje mennotuzzhemeyâng , konemá ketá ōnje iánâwâ kago , enutwâ uhgew kachetwâwandungig weowwewân kâween ween otâewâng .
47005013	Kishpin kawuhnátizzingin izzhewabizzeyunk Kitche Manito wanjitteyunk : kishpindush nebwâkâyunk , keenowâ wanje nebwâkâyunk .
47005014	Christ osâge-ewawin keguhgânjenázhuhogomin ōnje o-o anandumunk , bazhek nebotumowat kokkinná ōnje ; kokkinná ge nebowug ;
47005015	Kokkinná e-e ge nebotumowat , uhgew bamátizzidjig kâween tebinowa weowwewân ezheka tuh ōnje bemátizzissewug , uhnew tá ōnje bemátizzenáwân gá nebotumágowâjin , ween ga ábejebáát minowâ .
47005016	Eu ōnje eeshquâch nōngum , kâ oweuh aninne kekekanemánán aninneeng che enandágoozit ; ánuhdush kegekekanemánán , anineeng uhge enandágoozit , nōngumdush kâwekâ minowâ keguh kekanemásenán .
47005017	Eu ōnje kishpin oweuh aninne Christun gegishkágoot , ōshke bemátizze ; gata iuheen ungowun , binná kokkinná iuheen ōshkeiewunōn .
47005018	Kokkinná iuheen Kitche Manito tebandánun , ween gá totonunk che mennoinnowamunk Jesus Christ ōnje , ween gá meninunk , uhnokewin mennoinnowandewin .
47005019	Che ekettōnk , Kitche Manito Christun ogegishkágon , uzzhozhetōt áke che mennoinnowamigoot , uhgindumowâsig omutcheizzhewabizzewin kemenigonándush , gegetowin mennoinnowandewin .
47005020	Nōngumdush Christ ketuhnonigonán tebishko Kitche Manito azhewâwekozominág kewâwekozominineme Jesus Christ ōnje mennoinnowamik Kitche Manito .
47005021	Oge ezheán kemutcheizzhewâbizzetumōnunk ween kakanduhzig mutche izzhewabizzewin , konemá ketá ezheigomia quiuk izzhewabizzewin Kitche Manito gagishkunk .
47006001	Neenowint tebishko mámowy newejuhnokemánán , keguhgâzominenim wawane che otâpenumag Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin .
47006002	Onje eketto , kenōndōn e-e ope gezhigut shâwandágozink kegenezhokumōndush ; binná nōngum menno gezhigut , binna nōngum o-o gezhigut shâwandágoozewin .
47006003	Kago ōnduhmáqua kago guhgequajin anuhmeájig keche ozomásewintwâ .
47006004	Kokkinná kago wâbundiewag keowwewân uzzhuhnoketowwag Kitche Manito , nebewâ beowinink , gwatuhgeigoeyunin , katemágizzyunin , kashkandumunin ,
47006005	Buhshunzhaogoyunin , kepáquiegâzoeyunin , wambegime goyunin , anokeyunin , akowâbeyunin , muhkuttakayunin ;
47006006	Benizzewin ōnje , kekandumowin ōnje , keenwazh kotuhgitowin ōnje , keshawâtizzewin ōnje , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje , quiuk sâge-ewawin ōnje ,
47006007	Gegetowin tabwawin ōnje , Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ōnje , mennoizzhewabizzewin ushwewin ōnje , kitchenikamáng giya nuhminjenikámáng .
47006008	Ahgutanduhzeeng , giya águtandumink , mennotuzzhemigoeyunin , mutchetuzzhemigoeyunin , tebishko kagianizzidjig , giya quiuk azhewabizzidjig .
47006009	Uhgew kakanemásewinjig giya quiuk kekaneminjig , nábojig , binnádush kebemátizzemin , buhshunzhōnjig kâdush kenissegoosemin .
47006010	Kushkandumink giya kemonnowânegoozemin , katemákizzeyunk , nebewádush ōnje wânuttizzewug , kago iáseeng , kokkinnádush kago uzzhiáng .
47006011	Keenowâ Corinthianewetōk ! neendoninán bákissinōn keenowâ ōnje ; neendainán mechâchegâta .
47006012	Kâween kebabewewichegâzoseem neenowint ōnje , kebabewezhim tebinowa keowwewâng .
47006013	Nōngum che ōnje tepáumágowizzeyag tebishko ( neenejânisug ganonugwânin neendezhegegit ; ) mamánditōk binná .
47006014	Kago mamowy ittekago tiabwatunzigook ; wagonan ga ōnje wejeendewât quiuk azhewabizzidjig giya mache izzhewabizzidjig ? áneen ga ge ezhe mámowittemuhguk wâsayá giya kushkedibbikut ?
47006015	Ahneen ga ge ezhe wejeendewât Christ giya Belial ? áneen ga ge ezhe mennowejeendewât ween tiabwatunk giya tiabwatunzig ?
47006016	Wagonan ga ōnje wetokotátemuhguk Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik giya muzineneeg ? keenowâ keowwewân me Kitche Manito gâgega bemátizzit otuhnumeawegumik ; Kitche Manito gá ekettōt , weowwewâng neenguh iá neenguhwetosanág , neen oguh Omanitomewâ neow , neenduhnishanâbamug uh áwewug .
47006017	Eu ōnje sâgizzeikōg uzzhiáwât , puhkawinikōg , eketto Kitche Manito : kago tângenunkago eu wânuk , keguh otisinimlush .
47006018	Keguh ōosemáwâ neow keguh oguiseminenim giya keguh odâniseminenim , eketto mámowy mushkâwizzit Kitche Manito .
47007001	Azhe iáeyunk ono wâweendumátewinun , siágeinnuhgook , ebenittotámin kokkinná keowwenánin , giya kechichâgonánin ; mbasino quiuk izzhewabizzetá , che gosunk Kitche Manito .
47007002	Otapenishenâng ; kâ oweuh aninne neengemutchetotowâenán , kâ oweuh neengebanájeásenán , kâ oweuh neengewianemásenán .
47007003	Kâween che bátámenán o-o ketōnje enisinōn , kiut neenge tettonábun neendenandámin che wejenebománán gamá che ejebemátizzemánán .
47007004	Neengitche sōnganim o-o azhe guhnoninuhgook , neenkitetwâwanindiz , keenowâ ōnje , nemooshkenashkágōn mennoânegwandumowin , neengitchemennowânegwandámin kokkinná neenkotuhgittowinenánin ōnje .
47007005	Onje Macedoniaink buhtuhkoshináng kâ neenge kushketosemin newe unwashemonoyáng , nemegooshkâcheigomin gewetáiuhe ; áqutcheiuhe megâtim ; beenjeiuhe kotájim .
47007006	Kitche Manitodush ween oniandum uhgew nâswabinegâzojig , ke niandumeigonán , ōnje Titus uhtuhkoshink .
47007007	Kâweendush eu atuh uhtuhkoshink , euedush ōnje mennoenuhkumigut bienájemináng ope wândumowweyumint ashe mushkâwandumag , giya kemowwewinewân , giya azhe mennoenanemeyâng me owushema wanje mennowânegwandumán .
47007008	Eu uhge kushkandumeinuhgook , nemazaniegun ōnje , neendositáwandánábun , nōngumdush , kâ neendositáwanduhze , ōnje neenkekandán e-e mazaniegun uhge ōnje ositáwandumag wanebak .
47007009	Nōngumdush nemennowânegwandum , kâween eu ōnje uhge kushkandumeigoyag , ōnje iánwanindizzoyag wanje kushkandumag , me wanje kushkandumeigoyag Kitche Manito ōnje konemá kâween ningōtono ketá ezhe bátázisseem neenowint ōnje .
47007010	Kushkandumowin Kitche Manito wanjeeg uhnokemuhgut keche ánwanindizzōk , wekâ che ōnje kushkanduhzeeng , keche ōnje bemátizzeyunk ; kushkandumowin ákeeng uhnokemuhgut nebowin , che ōnjisseeng .
47007011	Binná o-o mego tebishko kekushkandumowinewân Kitche Manito wanjeeg , azhe iyângwâmeiggoyag azhe sâgeiggoeyag , azhe mushkâwandumag , azhe ōmbwaigoyag ! kokkiná kago kenagwitōnâwân keowwewân , quiuk gá totumag .
47007012	Eu ōnje , ope wazhebeumonuhgook , kâween neenge ōnje totunze , ween 'ow gá mutchetotunk ōnje , kâween giya ween ōnje , gá mutchetotowint ; keche ōnje kekandumag azhe iyângwâmenáguttuhwanemináng anosumeet Kitche Manito .
47007013	Eu ōnje nemenowânegwandámin keenowâ kemennowânegwandumowinewâng ōnje , kagat , owushema neengemennowânegwandámin Titus omennowânegwandumowin ōnje ; ōnje ochichâgwun keenowâ kokkinná wanje ōshkenágoozinit .
47007014	Kishpin ningōtono gá iïnáwugan uhtuzzneminungook kâ neendágutchisse , quiuk gá azhe weendumonáng me giya ween menik gá enug Titus me giya ween azhe mikumink , quiuk tabwayung .
47007015	Owushemadush keshawânotágowâ ōnje , okunwandánum azhe tabwatumag azhe sagizzeyag , nuhningishkâyag ope watâpenag .
47007016	Nemojegandum eu ōnje uhtabwa-aneminuhgook kokkinná kago .
47008001	Minowaw , nekânissetōk , náguttuhwandumōk Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin , mánintwâ anumeájig Macedoniaink .
47008002	Ope kache suhnágizzewât , bátienuttinne omenoowâne goozewinewâ ápiche ketemágizzewinink kitche nebewâ wanj megewawât .
47008003	Neenkekandán , menik azhe kushketowât , owushema menik azhe kushketowât enandumōg che buhgittenumowât weowwewân ;
47008004	Kuhquajeminungwâ che otâpenumung mágewawât , kuhquajeminungwâ che uhnoketowwungwâ anumeájig .
47008005	O-o getotumōg kâween anandumungobun totunzewug , Kitche Manito obuhgittenumowâwân netam opedush kebuhgittinumágonánig weowwewân Kitche Manito otenandumowin ōnje :
47008006	Me eu wanje kuhquajemungid Titus , che gezhetáumág eu , tibbishko shâwanjegawin gá azhe májetát .
47008007	Eu ōnje azhe iyáeyag kokkinná kago , mushkâwandumowin ekettowinun , kekandumowin meenwawizzewin , giya kesâgewawinnewâ sâeyáng , me tábishko eu nebewá ga ōnje iyáeyag shâwanjegawin .
47008008	Kâween neenguhgâzomigōse o-o keche ekettoeyán , ánint uhgetowât me wanje gegetoeyán , keche quiuk quandumink kishpin quiuk siáge-ewawagwan .
47008009	Onje neenkekandámin Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin ánuh ápiche wânuttizzebun , keenowâ gá ōnje ketemágizzit , ōnje uhketemágizzit mashkōt keenowâ ketá ōnje wânuttizzim .
47008010	Nōngum ketenenim o-o keguh ōnje mennoizzhewabizzim , keenowâ netam kege májetám kiut aquo ningo kekenonowuhguk ketōnje enandám ningōtono owwe totumag .
47008011	Binná ōnje gezhetáeyunk anuhnokeyag gazhetinna magwouh enandumag ketámegewam ánint azhetuhneyag .
47008012	Kishpin enandumowin enandumomuhgut , me eu nágwuk aninne azhetunit meatuh o-o Kitche Manito azhe niandunk .
47008013	Kâween ezheka keenowâ atuh ketábemōndi-iggoseen bakânizzitdush aninne kago che bemewetosig ;
47008014	Me che tebishkosag nōngum tatussin ayáyag e-e che menagwá ánint manazidjig , ningooting giya keenowâ manazeyag giya weenowâ keguhmenigowâg , me keche tebishkosag :
47008015	Azhebe egâtagigo , ween nebewá miáwunjetōt , ká owushema kago otiáseen , weendush punge miáwunjetōt mego tatusininik menik wâiát .
47008016	Megwach Kitche Manito uhge uhtowât Titusun otaene keche kunwanemik .
47008017	Ototisigōn guhgâzomigowin , azhe gwâshquazit weenigo enandum uhge ezhát uzzhiáeyag .
47008018	Nemájenizzhuhmowânán wekânissemá chewejewegoot , ween manotuzzhemint kokinná anumeawinink ;
47008019	Kâweendush atuh eu ; ge onuhginjegâzo anumeájig ōnje che wejeweyumint , konemá che nezhokomágat , che kitche twâweint Kitche Manito :
47008020	Kâ neendenanduhzemin oweuh aninne ōnzomeyumint , o-o tebinowa mágewayáng .
47008021	Umbasino , quiuk izzhewabizzetá , che kushketoeyung kago , anosumeet Kitche Manito , giyadush anosumewât aninnewug .
47008022	Nekânissenán wejeenduháwug , neenge ezhe mikowânán , kezhizhowwizeet o-o enuhnokewin wâjuhnokemigoyun .
47008023	Kishpin oweuh guhgwatwat Titusun , neennezhokomág uzhuhnoketonán ; kishpin oweuh kuhgwatwat nekânisenánig , weenowâ me uhgew anoninjig anumeánidjin uzhuhnonigowát , giyadush Christ ogitchetwâwizzewin .
47008024	Eu ōnje , wâbundi-ik uhgew anosumewâtdush anumeájig che kekandágwuk kesâge-ewawinewâ keche menno tuzzhemenáng quiuk .
47009001	Tuzzhindumink uzhuhnoketowwintwâ anumeájig , kâween keguh oshebeumosenōnim :
47009002	Neenkekandámin azhe gezhandumag , kegekitchetuzzhemineme , guhguhnonungidwâ anishanâbag Macedoniaink , neenge eketomen anishanábâg Achaiaink ningo kekenonowuhgutinne ako kezhandumowât , kegezhandumowinewâ otōmbwaigōnâwâ nebená anishanábag .
47009003	Neenge ezhenázhowâg wekânissemág gá ezhe tuzzhemenáng , keche tabwawinewung gá ekettoyán che gezhetáyag :
47009004	Onje Macedonia anishanâbag kishpin bewejewewât , mekōgdush gezhetásewag neendá águtchemin , ( konemá giya keenowâ keguh águtchim ) ōnje ozâm uhge kitche tuzzhemináng .
47009005	Me ōnje wanje enandumán che ezhenázhowugwâ wekânissemág gezhá che gezhetáyag e-e wamegewayag , e-e gá weendumonág kiut , gezhá che gezháchesink , che kekandágwuk unishâ che megewayag .
47009006	O-o neendikit , ween punge kategat , punge tuh mámá weendush nebewá kategat , nebewá tuh mámá .
47009007	Kokkinná aninnewug aenandumowâtigo otaewâng me ga ezhe megewawât , kâween che saságizzeeng , kâween giya che guhgâzōndink : Kitche Manito osâgeán wanepuzh mágewanidjin .
47009008	Kitche Manito okushketōn aenandunk ezhe mennototonáng gâgineek keche mennotuhneyag kokkinná kago keche uhnokeyag menno uhnokewin :
47009009	( Azhebe-egâtagigo , siswasininne mizzewâ ogemenán katemákizzinidjin omennoizzhewabizzewin gâgegasininne .
47009010	Ween mámát menekân keteganidjin , máno ween tuh megewa puhquazhegun che omejemimeyag oguh bátienutonun menekánun gá ketegâtumowinjin oguh batienutōn kemennoizzhewabizzewin : )
47009011	Me konemá ga ōnje wânuhtizzeyag mozhuk mámegewayag eu wanje megwach enungid Kitche Manito .
47009012	Uzhuhnokeeng o-o uhnokewin uhgatishkenintwâ anumeájig bátienutdush nebená tussink megwach uzzhenint Kitche Manito ;
47009013	( Magwouh enuhnokewât o-o enuhnokewin okitchetwâweáwan Kitche Manitōn uhtabwa-andumag Christ otuhnumeawin uhmenagwâ uhgew giya kokkinná anishanâbag uhmenagwâ ; )
47009014	Otuhnumeawinewadush uzhuhnumeatumonágwâ ōnje enandumōg Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin che gegishkumag .
47009015	Megwach ketenaná Kitche Manito ogitche megewawin ōnje .
47010001	Neew Paul tebinowa , magwouh wejewinuhgook , neendâgâshee , wâjewesinonuhgogoondush , neensōnganim , keguhgâzominenim Christ obakâdizzewin , ogeshawâtizzewin ōnje ;
47010002	Konemá kâ neendá sōnganemose wâjewinuhgogoon azhe sōnganemoyán ánint wâjewugwânin uhgew ananemeuminjig uhmutcheizzhewabizzeyung .
47010003	Ahneen uhnōch izzhewabizzeyáng kâween nemutcheizzhewabizzissemin :
47010004	( Neendushwewinenánin omá ákeeng kâween ōshkenágoozenōn , kitche apetandágwutōn ween Kitche Manito ōnje , uhguhwabetōng sásōngitchegâtagin : )
47010005	Neswabenumink náguhtuhwandumowinun , kokkinná giya kago kache apetandágwuk , otuhsumetowân Kitche Manito okekandumowinun uhbetōng kokkinná náguhtuhwandumowinun Christ che owwâkâtunk .
47010006	Gezhetánin che buhshunzhaōntwâ kokkinná tiabwatunzigook keenowâ ketabwa-andumowinewâ ope mooshkena tabwawinewun .
47010007	Kegunowabundánâwâ innuh iuheen anábomenágwuk ? Kishpin oweuh aninne enandunk Christun tabanemigoot , o-o guhtuh enandum ; tebishko , azhe tebanemigoot Christun , me giya neenowint Christ azhe tebanemeyumint .
47010008	Kishpin kitche tuzzhindumán o-o mushkâwizzewin , Kitche Manito gá mezheumint che ōnje sōngizzeyag , kâween che banájeigoyag , kâween neendágutchese :
47010009	Kâween neendenanduhze keche sageinnuhgook nemazaniegunun ōnje .
47010010	Onje ( ekettowug , ) omazaniegunun kosegwuninewun , kotámegwutinnewun ; wejewinungoondush weow neenuhmutinne , ogegetowindush neenuhmutinne .
47010011	Wuhow towuh aninne o-o guhtuh enandum , azhebe-egayán giya nemazaniegunináng , me go ga izzhewabizzeyáug ope ewada tuhkoshináng .
47010012	Neenshâgwanemomin wewejewuneidwâ , manotuhzhindungig weowwewân , uhgewedush , waonuhgindejig mamáshkōt , azhewabizzewât kâween nebwâkâsewug .
47010013	Kâween neenowint newe kitche tuhzhinduhzemin ono iuheen , áwâs ewada nemushkâwizzewinenáng , uhtebábundumink mushkâwizzewin , Kitche Manito gá mezheumint , mushkâwizzewin tabishkágoeyag .
47010014	Kâween neshebetásemin che we tabishkágoyag , uzzhiá yag neembe-ezhámin uhguhgequayáng Christ omeenwájemowin :
47010015	Kâween neenkitchetwâwanemosemin , che we uhnewázoyán , nemushkâwizzewinenán che uhnoketumáng bakânizzit aninne otuhnokewin , neendenandámin ope kemushkáwandumowinewân anesōngungin neenguh sōngandágoozemin keenowâ ōnje ,
47010016	Konemá neendá guhgequamin meenwâjemowin , áwâs ewadá uzzhiáeyag , kâween newe ōnje sásōnganemosemin bakânizzit aninne otuhnokewin gezhá bázhigoyáng .
47010017	Ween kachetwâweittezoot , máno oguh kitchetwâweittezo Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink .
47010018	Kâween ween wuhow quiuk anandunk weow , ween koshá Kitche Manitōn quiuk ananemigoot , quiukquandágooze .
47011001	Kago nishkâtizzhetowwishe kago , neenkuhgepátizzewin ōnje , kago nishkâtizzetowwishe kago .
47011002	Ketuhkowâbundumonim Kitche Manito otuhkowâbewin ōnje kegewetegandeminenim bazhek onâbamemá , konemá ketá meninim , Christ tebishko ōshkenegequa mánetingin .
47011003	Unishâdush neenshâgwanim konemá che izzhewabizzeyag Eve gá izzhewabizzit , genabeek okuhgianizzewin keche ezhe kooshquaitumag .
47011004	Oweuh otisinág ezhe guhgekeminág bakânizzinidjin Jesusun , neenowint azhe guhgequasewâng , kishpin otâpenag bakânizzit uhchichâgomá , wekâ watâpenásewagobun , puhkân giya meenwâjemowin wekâ n'wánduhzewagobun , tuh mennoizzhebut nishkâtizzetowwâsewag .
47011005	Neendenandum kâween ishquiáng neendiáse , kitche apetandágoozit anonint .
47011006	Ahnuh neenketemágiz gegetowinink , kâween náguhtuhwandumowinink ; wawane neenkekinnoumágomin kokkinná iuheen magwaiuhe keenowâ .
47011007	Ningōtono innuh neenge ezhe mutchetotum , keche tuhbusebuhgittenumán neow keenowâdush keche ōnje kitche apetandágoozeyag ? ōnje keguhgekeminenim unishâ Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowin ?
47011008	Neengekemotemág ánint anumeájig , otâpenumowugwa tepáumátewinun , keenowâ che uhnoketonuhgook .
47011009	Magwouh wejewinuhgook , kago nanduhwandumánin , ká oweuh aninne neenge otâpenumowâse ; kago nanduhwandumánin wâiáyán , wekânisemag Macedoniaink beōnjewug ukko uhmezhewât ; kokkinná kago neenge kunwanindiz , kago keche tebanduhzewag ; gâgineek go neenguh ezhe kunwanindiz .
47011010	Christ otabwawin quiuk neowwink azhe iát , kâ oweuh aninne neenguh nuhgânegoose o-o suhsōnganemoyán Achaiaink .
47011011	Wagonan ōnje ? Menuh e-e uhsâgeisinonuhgook ? Kitche Manito okekandán .
47011012	O-o watotumán , ōnjittágo neenguhtotum , konemá neendá buhkezhán enandumowin weepowâ uhnewishkonungwâ ; konemá tá ezhe mikowâwug azhewabizzeyunk che izzhewabizzewât .
47011013	Kagianizzidjig towug , kagiazhe uhnokejig , Christ otoskenegamun azhenágoozinit ezhenágwitojig weowwewân .
47011014	Kâween mámuhkâtandágoosinōn ; Mutche Manito ween tebinowa Kitche Manito omezhinowamun otezhenágwetōn weow .
47011015	Eu ōnje kâ mámuhkâtandágoosinōn otoskenegamun gwakenágwetōt weowwewân ope eeshquâ bemátizzewât gutuh uhginjegâtane menik andotumowât .
47011016	Minowâ neendikit , kago oweuh aninne neenguh guhgebátanemiggose , kishpin oweuh we guhgebátanemint kagebátizzingin neenguh ezhe otâpenik konemá neendá kitchetwâwanindiz punge .
47011017	Eu aketoeyán kâween Kitche Manito neendōnje ekettose neenguhgepáche geezhwa uzzhekettoyán o-o kitchetwâwanemowinink .
47011018	Onje nebewá kitchetwâwanemowug , omá ákeeng , medush giya neen wanje kitchetwâwanemoyán .
47011019	Kemenno wânegwandumeáwâg kagebátizzidjig ōnje keenowâ uhnebwâkaeyag .
47011020	Kekotugitōm , kishpin oweuh aninne muhkuminág kago , kishpin oweuh aninne apetandunk weow , kishpin oweuh aninne buhseengwaonág .
47011021	Neenduhzhindán águtchewin tebishko gá neennuhmizzeyángin neendezhegegit . Kishpin oweuh aninne kitche sōngandunk weow kago ōnje ( neenguhgebázetágooz , ) neensōnganim me giya neen .
47011022	Hebrewug innuh ? me giya neen . Israeliteug innuh áwewug ? me giya neen . Abraham onejânissun áwewug ? me giya neen .
47011023	Christ innuh otoskenegamun áwewug ? ( neenguhgebázetágooz , ) neen owushema ; owushemá nebewá neenduhnoke ; buhshunzhaotewin owushema menik apetandágwuk , owwâkâneweyán naningim , nebowinun naningim .
47011024	Jewug ōnje nánink tussink , nissemetunnuh usshe shângusse tussink neenge buhkitaogo .
47011025	Nisink metig neengebuhketaogo , ningōtink neengebemosiniego , nisink nábequânink neengenuhnezânigo , ningo gezhik , ningo dibbik neengebemátuhgá kitchegumeeng .
47011026	Neengebuhbámátiz naningim , nuhnezânizzewinink nebeeng , nuhnezânizzewinink magwa gamotishkidjig , nuhnezânizzewinink magwa tebinowa wâjetuhkewamugig , nuhnezânizzewinink magwa miátáwizzidjig , nuhnezânizzewinink otanowink , nuhnezânizzewinink buhgwuttuhkumigáng , nuhnezânizzewinink kitchegumeeng , nuhnezânizzewinink magwa kagianizzidjig wekânissemág ;
47011027	Iakoozewinink , wesuhgandumowinink , uhkowâbeeng nuhningim , buhkutang , gâshkunábágwang , muhkutakang naningim , uhgakutcheeng , peengwoshshâgiteeng .
47011028	Puhkân giya iuheen áqutcheiuhe ayágin , eu waotisigoyán andusso gezhiguk che kunwanemugwâ kokkinná anumeájig .
47011029	Owwanan nánuhmizzit , neendush , kâ neen neenuhmizzisse ? owwanan nashkeint , neendush kâween neenchâgizzose ?
47011030	Kishpin ōnjittá sōnganemoyán , me ga ōnje sōnganemoyán , ono iuheen neennuhnuzzewinink ayágin .
47011031	Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun Omanitomenán , ween shâwandágoozit gâgineek okekandán uhguhgenowwishkesewân .
47011032	Damascusink , ogemá wiánekashkowât kitche ogemán Aretasun okunwandán Damascenug ototanuhwewâ shemágunishun , enandum owwe otâpenit .
47011033	Wâsáchegunink neenge ōnje nesábeginego , kokobenágunink medush azhe oshemoyán .
47012001	Kawween neendōnje mennoizzhewabizzisse kitchetwâwanemoyán ; neenguh be-ezhánun mamándáezhenuhmowin Kitche Manito azhewâbundiewat .
47012002	Neengekekanemá aninne Christun tabanemigoot usshe neokekenonowuhgut shegwouh , ( kishpin beenjinná ayágobunan , kâ neenkekanemáse kishpin giya áqutcheiuhe ayágobunan , kâ neenkekanemáse : Kitche Manito okekandán ; ) wuhow towuh aninne oweuh beōmbewinegoot gezhigōnk .
47012003	Neenkekanemá wuhow towuh aninne , ( kishpin beenjinná ayágobunan , kâ neenkekanemáse giya áqutcheiuhe ayágobunan , kâ neenkekanemáse , Kitche Manito okekandán . )
47012004	Uhge ezhe ōmbewenint mennowânegoozewin tuhnuhkewinink ogenōndánun miugwawin gegetowinun , wekâ aninne anandágoozissig keche ezhe gegetetōt .
47012005	Wuhow towuh ōnjittá neenguh kitchetwâwetuzzhemá , neenowint tebinowa kâween neenguh kitchetwâtuhzhinduhzeen neow , meatuh neen neenuhmizzewinun .
47012006	Ahnuh neenguh enandum che sōnganemoyán , kâween neenguh guhgebátizzisse quiuk tabwawin neenguh eket , neenguh bōnetá nōngum oweuh aninne owushema che uhpetanemissig meatuhgo menik azhewâbomit , menik giya azhenōndunk .
47012007	Owushema ozâm che kitchetwâwanemosewân ono kitche mamándáezhenumowinun ōnje , menasegâwunj neengemigonun neowwink , Mutche Manito azhe uhnokeet che kotuhgitoeyán ozâm ashkum che ishpebuhgittinnegosewân .
47012008	Nisink neenge uhnumeatowâ Kitche Manito ono iuhe che nuhgunigoeyán .
47012009	Neengeigdush , neenshâwanjegawin tatussin che iáyun ; nemushkâwizzewin neenuhmizzewinink ge ōnje ozhichegâta . Pâpenanemowinink ōnje neenguh ōnje mushkâwiz , neennuhmizzewinink Christ omushkâwizzewin , konemá neenguh bonesundágoon .
47012010	Me eu ōnje nemenowânegwandum neenuhmizzewinink , papápeigowinink , katemákizzewinink Jesus Christ ōnje , nánuhmizzeyánin me 'ow uhmushkáwizzeyán .
47012011	Neenguhgebátiz sōnganemowinink ; keenowâ kegegetowim ketágemennotuzzhemin , kâween ishquiáng neendiáse oweuh kache apetandágoozidjig anoninjig , ánuh kâween neen ningōt neendinábuhtuhganduhze .
47012012	Kagat iuheen wanje kekandágoozit anonint magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , gezhichegâtag , kekinowâchichegawinun mámuhkâtandumowinun .
47012013	Wagonan minowâ ishquiyáng ayáyag ánint anumeájig bazhek atuh o-o kâ kege buhmeisseem , mennowweshâwanemeshig o-o gá azhe mutchetotumán .
47012014	Binná me o-o nisink shiegwuh gezhetáeyán owwe beotisinnuhgook , kâween kago keguh banájeisinonim , kâween ketotawizzewinewâ neennundowâbundám , ōnje uhbenocheug kâ tá ni-issetōnâwâ onegeigowân ōnje .
47012015	Neendenandum keche banájetoyán neendotawizzewin che ketemágizzeyán keenowâ ōnje ; owushema ánuh sâgeinnuhgook , owushemadush punge neensâgeigo .
47012016	Máno tuh izzhewabut , kâ kago kege banájeisenonim , nebwâkâwandumán gá ōnje tuhkoninnuhgook .
47012017	Kago nuh neenge ōndizzin uhgew anishanâbag gá ezhenázhuhumonuhgook ?
47012018	Titus neengekuhquajemá , bazhekdush wekânissemán neengewejeenduhá ; Titus nuh kago ge ōndizze keowwewân ? kâ tuh tebishko neendizzhewabizzisse bazhek uhchichâgománg ? tânuh quiuk neenge ezhe bamosasemin ?
47012019	Minowâ nuh ningōtono neendezhe gweenowe ekettomen ketenandám ? anosumeet Kitche Manito neengegetomin Christ ; neowwink kokkinná iuheen neendieendotámin siágeinnuhgook , keenowâ che ōnje mushkâwizzeyag .
47012020	Neenshâgwanim ope otisinnuhgook , keche ezhe mikomonuhgook ananeminuhgook keche izzhewabizzeyag , konemá ká giya neen keguh ezhe mikowwiseem ananemeyag che izzhewabizzeyán konemá kekândeittewin tuhtuhgo , guhgâwanindein , nishkâtizzewin , kekândewin , buhguhnoondewin , kâskunsowin , pákishewinun , ōmbegizzewin .
47012021	Konemá takoshinán minowâ , Nemanitōm neenguh tuhbuhbuhgittenik magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , konemá emá neenguh ositáwandum menik ga mutcheizzhewabizzeyag chebwâ tuhkoshinán emá , muhshe che ánwanindizzosigwâ owenizzewinewâ , obeshegwâtizzewinewâ eu gá totumowât .
47013001	Me o-o nisink shiegwouh beotisinnuhgook . Otonemáng neezh , niswa , wâtokâzojig kokkinná gegetowinun , tuh sōngitchegâtawun .
47013002	Kege eninimwâbun kiut , nōngumdush keguh weendumonim negân minowâ tebishkogo wejewinuhgook , kâween nōngum kewejewisenonim , ketoshebeumonimdush , kokkinná neweendumowâgdush ween kokkinná uhgew mutcheizzhewabizzidjig , kokkinná giya ánint andussheyag , kishpin minowâ takoshinán kâween neenguh bonanemáse .
47013003	Onje uhnundowâbundumag quiuk che tabwawinewunk Christ uhgegetōt neowwing , o-o tabwawin kekandumag kâween neenuhmusinōn , kitche apetandágwut keowwewâng .
47013004	Onje neenuhmizzewinink ge ōnje suhsuhgáquiegâzo , Kitche Manitodush omushkâwizzewin ōnje bemátizzit ; keenowint giya keneenuhmizzewin weowwink , keguh wejebemátizzemánándush Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ōnje keenowâ enuhkuhkayá .
47013005	Náguhtuhwanindizōk , che kekandumag quiuk che mushkâwandumag , quiukquandumōk keowwewân ; kánuh kekekanduhzeenâwân keowwewân , Jesus Christ keowwewâng che iát meatuh uhzhashkáeyag ?
47013006	Neendenandum keguh kekandánâwâ neenowint uzzhashkásewâng .
47013007	Neenduhnuweatowwâ Kitche Manito ningōtono che ezhe mutche totunzewag kâween ween neenowint keche ōnje mennotuzzhemigoeyáng ; , keenowâ keche izzhewabizzeyag , ánuh neenowint azhashkáwângan .
47013008	Kâween neenowint ningōtono neendá ezhe mutche totunzemin ; tabwawin atuh ōnje .
47013009	Neempâpenanemomin nánuhmizzeyángin , keenowâdush mushkâwizzeyag , me o-o azhe nundowwandumáng keenowá quiuk keche ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeyag .
47013010	Eu ōnje neendōnje oshebeánun ningooche magwouh uzzhiáeyán , konemá ope takoshinán , kâ áquatisewin neenguhioseen , Kitche Manito azhe mezhit mushkâwizzewin , keche ozhetōng , kâween ween chebanájetōng .
47013011	Me eeshquâch nekânissetōk , ketuhnemikonim , quiuk izzhewabizzig , nuhniandumōk , bazhekotōg kenágutuhwandumowinewân , mennoinnowandeyeuk ; Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin otinowandâsowin keguh wejewegōnâwâ .
47013012	Uhnumekotátig mamashqut che ojeendeyag .
47013013	Kokkinná anumeájig kesuhgeninjenigowâg .
47013014	Kitche Manito Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin , Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin onuhniandumowin , Kitche Manito Ochichá gwun keguhwejewegōnâwâ kokkinná . Amen .
48001001	Paul , anonint , ( kâween ween aninnewun ōnje , kâween ween aninne otenandumowin ; Jesus Christ ōnje , giya Kitche Manito ōsemá ōnje , ween gá onishkânigoojin uhge nebōt , )
48001002	Kokkinná giya wekânissemág wâjewidjig , neendoshebeumowânánig , anumeájig Galatiaink :
48001003	Keguh shâwandágoozim mennoinnowandewin giya Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , giyadush Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ,
48001004	Ween gá buhgitinunk weow kemutcheizzhewabizzewininánin ōnje , konemá ketábemájeigonán omá o-o mutche ákeeng Kitche Manito Kōsenán otenandumowin :
48001005	Ween gachetwâwizzit gâgineek . Amen .
48001006	Nemámuhkâtandum , kitche wiebuh puhkawinag , ween gá nundominág Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawinink bakânuk meenwâjemowin uhnázekumag :
48001007	Kâween quiuk puhkânussinōn , oweuhdush kewemegooshkâcheigowâ , owwe banájetōnâwâ Christ omeenwâjemowin .
48001008	Kishpin neenowint gamá giya Kitche Manito omezhinowamun gezhigōnk ōnje , weendumonág bakânuk meenwâjemowin o-o gá weendumonágebun , tuh nuhnibekinjegâzo .
48001009	Gá ekettoeyángebun kiut , me go nōngum minowâ go aketoeyán , kishpin oweuh aninne bakânuk meenwâjemowin weendumonág , eu ánuh ge tabwatumag tuh nuhnibbekinjegâzo .
48001010	Neenguhgâzomág innuh nōngum aninnewug uhgamá Kitche Manito ? newekoochetonuh che niandumeugwâ aninnewug ? kishpin niandumeugwâ aninnewug , kâween Christ neenguh otoskenegamemigoose .
48001011	Keweendumonim nekânissetōk o-o meenwâjemowin gá weendumonuhgook , kâween aninne ototizzhetwâwenisseen .
48001012	Onje kâween aninne neengemenigoose , kâween aninne neenguhgekimigoose , Jesus Christ koshá neengewâbundi-ik .
48001013	Kege nōndám , gá ezhe bemátizzeyán Jewug otizzhetwâwinewâ , apiche neengemutchetotán Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin , neengenisshewuhnájetōn .
48001014	Neengesōngandágooz Jewug otizzhetwâwinewâ , owushema uhgew anandágoozidjig anandágoozeyán tebinowa anowamugik , owushema neenge iyângwâmiz azhe guhgekemáwât nōsug .
48001015	Ope Kitche Manito anandunk , ween gá puhkat neenguh omisutáng uhnundomit oshâwanjegawin ōnje .
48001016	Owwe kekandumozhit Oguisun neowwink , keche babákuhgekemugwâ che tebájemug magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig ; bâbega kâween neenge kugwatwase che kuhquajemugwâ aninnewun .
48001017	Kâweendush Jerusalemink neenge ezháse che wâbomugwâ anoninjig uhgew netam gá ōnje uhnoninjig , Arabiaink neenge-ezhá , Damascusinkdush nayáb neenge be-ezhekewa .
48001018	Gá nisso kekenonowugguk , Jerusalemink neenge-ezhá , chewâbomug Peter usshe nánogwundush emá neenge iá .
48001019	Kâweendush oweuh anoninjig neengewâbomáseeg meatuh James , Kekitche Manitomenán wekânisun .
48001020	Binná ono iuheen wazhebeumonuhgook , kâween pâpish neenguhgenowishkese .
48001021	Náágutchdush Syriaink , giya Ciliciaink , neenge betuhkoshin ;
48001022	Kâ neenkekanemigooseeg neenskezhigōnk ōnje anumeájig Judeaink tiabwatowâjig Christun .
48001023	Genōndumōg atuh ween kiut ukko machetotowweyumintebun nōngum babáezheguhgequa mushkâwandumowin banájetopun ukko .
48001024	Okitchetwâweáwân Kitche Manitōn neen ōnje .
48002001	Ashe neo kekinonowuguk , Jerusalemink neendezhá , mámowy Barnabas , Titus giya neengewejewâ .
