48002002	Kitche Manito odikittowin gá ōnje ezháeyán , neweendumowâg meenwâjemowin eu gá weendumowugwâ miátáwizzidjig babazhek neenge babákuhgekemág uhgew kakandágoozidjig , konemá kâ unishâ neendáuhnokese .
48002003	Titusdush owwâjewit , ánuh Greek áwe , kâ ge innuhgemáse che gewetázhegâzoot .
48002004	Kagianizzidjig wekânissemág ōnje , uhgew bándegajig ge-mōch , owwe wâbundumowât wânuhkewin eu ayáyáng Jesus Christ ōnje , owwe bezheumintwâ che owwâkâneweyâng .
48002005	Uhgew kâween neengemenásenánig che gooshquawabin neumintwâ ningo tebiegun , konemá quiuk meenwâjemowin , gâgineek keguh gegishkánâwâ .
48002006	Uhgewedush ningōtono anandungig weowwewân owagwanewewâgwanigo , kâween neen ningootinzenōn , kâ Kitche Manito oweuh pekinōnk otenanemáseen , uhgew ningōtono anandungig weowwewân ga guhnonugwânin kâ ningōt neendinábuhtuhganduhzeen :
48002007	Opedush wiábundumowât meenwâjemowin uhgewetázhoseeng uhmenigoeyán tibishko eu meenwâjemowin gewetázhegâzowin gá menint Peter ;
48002008	( Ween gá ozheát Peterun anonint gewetázhegâzowin , me 'ow giya neen gá sōngeit che guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidjig : )
48002009	Opedush James , Cephas giya John uhgew wiyâswanemōngig ope wiabundunk shâwanjegawin mánigoeyán , nemenigōg mámowy giya Barnabas , che mámowyitteyáng che we guhgekemungidwâ miátáwizzidjig uhgewedush che ezháwât gewetázhowawinink .
48002010	Meatuh keche kunwanemungwâ katemákizzidjig , anandumámbán owwe totumán kiut .
48002011	Opedush Peter takoshink Antiochink , neengemegáná ōsumeskezhik , ōnje uzzhosittá totunk .
48002012	Onje chebwâ eu ope , ope anishanâbag takoshinowât James uzzhiát ōnjebájig , ogewetopomán miátáwizzinidjin , opedush takoshinowât ometágwaetowân ânga ogosán uhnew gáwetázhegâzonidjin .
48002013	Ahnintdush Jewug owetokowâwân , Barnabasdush giya ween ge wiazheá .
48002014	Opedush wiábundumán quiuk izzhewabizzissigwâ azhetwâwizewung uhnumeawin neenge-ená Peter anosumeskezhik kokkinná , kishpin keen Jeweun miátáwizzidjig azhewabizzewât azhewabizzeyun kâween ween Jewug azhewabizzewât , wagonan wanje totowwutwâ miátáwizzidjig Jewug azhewabizzewât keche izzhewabizzewât ?
48002015	Keenowint Jewug kege ōnje negemin kâween ween che mutche izzhewabizzing miátáwizzidjig azhewabizzewât ,
48002016	Kekekandámin aninne ōnje , bemátizzissig tebákonega uhnokewinun ween atuh Jesus Christ mushkâwandumowin ōnje tebishko azhe tabwatowwung Jesug Christ , konemá ketá ōnje bemátizzemin uhtabwatowwung Jesus Christ kâween ween tebákonega uhnokewinink ; tebákonega uhnokewinink kâween oweuh tá ōnje bemátizzisse .
48002017	Eu ōnje magwouh uhwekoochetoeyáng Christ che ōnje bemátizzeyáng kishpin mikágoeyunk gegishkumunk mutche izzhewabizzewin , menuh e-e Christ otizzhetwâwin ga ōnje mutcheizzhewabuk ? Kâween pâpish .
48002018	Kishpin minowâ ozhissittoeyán gá begobetoeyámbán neendá kitche mutcheizzhewabetōn neow .
48002019	Neen , tebákonegawin ōnje , neennib tebákonegawinink kokemá Kitche Manito che ōnje bemátizzeyán .
48002020	Neengewejesuhsuhgáquoiggonun , Jesus Christ neembemátizzedush ; kâween koshá neen Christ neowwink bemátizze , bemátizzewin wanje bemátizzeyán neowwink uhtabwatowwug Jesus Christ Kitche Manito Oguisun wanje bemátizzeyán , ween siágeit gá nebotumowwit .
48002021	Kâween neembánájetōseen Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin , ōnje kishpin mennoizzhewabizzewin tebákonegawin ōnjemuhguk , Jesus Christ ween unishâ ge nebo .
48003001	Keenowaw kagebátizzidjig Galatianewetōk , owwanan gá wakebetonág ketenandumowinewân keche tabwa-anduhzewag tabwawin Jesus kesuhsuhgáquiegâzo wawane kegewâbundigōn ?
48003002	Meatuh o-o nandowandumán che kekinoumowweyag tebákonega uhnokewin kege ōnje meniggowizzim Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun , uhgamá uhnōndumink mushkâwandumowin ?
48003003	Menuh ápeeche kuhgebátizzeyag ? Ochichâgomá kegemájetám kegezhetám innuh weyâsemá ōnje ?
48003004	Kege kuhgwâtuhgittōm innuh menik unishâ ? kishpin kagat unishâ .
48003005	Ween anoketowât Ochichâgomá magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , tebákonega uhnokewin innuh e-e wanje ieendotum uhgamá uhnōndunk mushkâwandumowin ?
48003006	Tibishko Abraham azhe tabwa-anemát Kitche Manitōn , uhginjegâtanedush quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
48003007	Eu ōnje kekandumōk , weenowâ uhgew mashkâwandungig me Abraham onejânisun .
48003008	Mazaniegundush negân uhwiábundumink Kitche Manito otá bemájeán miátáwizzinidjin mushkáwandumowin ōnje gá weendumowât Abraham kiut Jesus Christ otuhnumeawin ( ekettōnk ) keen ōnje kokkinná bamátizzidjig ga ōnje shâwandágoozewât .
48003009	Uhgewedush mashkáwandungig Abraham mushkâwandunk mámowy tuh shâwandágoosewug .
48003010	Menikigo anuhnokewât tabwa-andumowât tebákonega uhnokewin nuhnibbekimegowizzewug ; ōnje ozhebe-egáta ; kokkinná tuh nuhnibbekinjegâzowug uhgew kanowanduhzigook wazhebe-egátagin tebákonegawinink , keche enuhnokewát .
48003011	Mizzhisshowwenágwut oweuh aninne ōnje bemátizzissig tebákonega uhnokewin : onje quiuk azhewabizzidjig mushkáwandumowin tuh ōnje bemátizzewug .
48003012	Tebákonegawin kâween mushkâwandumowinewunzenōn aninnedush andotunk eu guhtuh ōnje bemátizze .
48003013	Christ ogetebáogonán uhnanibbekinjegâzoeyunk tebákonegawinink , uhge nuhnibbekinjegâzōt keenowint ōnje ; ezhebe egáta , tuh nuhnibbekinjegâzowug kokkinná metigōnk ga uhgoninjig .
48003014	Abraham oshâwandágoozewan konemá otá otissiggōnáwâ miátáwizzidjig Jesus Christ ōnje ; konemá neendá ōnje iámin Ochichâgwun owâweendumágawin mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
48003015	Nekânissetōk aninneeng neendizzhegegit , kishpin aninne owâweendumágawin áwunk kishpin gá sōngitchegâtagwan . ká oweuh aninne otá bogobetoseen kâween kago owushema otá attōseen .
48003016	Nōngum Abraham onejânissun gá ezhe wâweendumowintwâ uhgew . Kâween nebewá ganonintwânin obenocheng ekettose biázhekwunginigo keenejânis 'uhow Christ .
48003017	O-odush neendikit , eu gá takoshinomuhguk newâk usshe nissemetunnuh andusso kekenonowuhguk gá takoshinomuhgut kâ ge kushketomuhgusinōn we bokobetōng tepákonegawin ningōt che inábuhtussinnogebun .
48003018	Kishpin tebákonegawin wanje bemátizzewungwan kâween wâweendumátewin ketōnje bemátizzissemin : Kitche Manito oge-ezhemenán Abrahamun che ōnje bemátizzit wâweendumátewin .
48003019	Ahneen anábuhtukdush tebákonegawin ? mutcheizzhewabizzewin gá ōnje menittink , nánázh uhbenoche che tuhkoshink 'uhow gá ezhichegâtag wâweendumátewin ; Kitche Manito ga innuhgindâzōt uhge ezhe uhnonát omezhinowamun , wiánekashkowât Kitche Manito oninjeen ōnje .
48003020	Binná 'ow wiánekashkowât kâween weenigo bazhekoose Kitche Manitodush ween bazhekgo .
48003021	Tebákonegawin innuh obanájetōn Kitche Manito owâweendumágawin ; Kâween pâpish : kishpin gemenitingebun tebákonegawin e-e ga ōnje bemátizzink quiuk izzhewabizzewin tebákonegawinink tá ge ōnjemuhgut .
48003022	Mazaniegundush azhebe-egâta ōnje , kekandágwut , kokkinná bamátizzidjig uhmutcheizzhewabizzewât e-e wâweendumátewin mushkâwandumowin Jesus Christ ōnje tá menáwug uhgew tiabwatungig .
48003023	Chebwâ tuhkoshinomuhguk mushkâwandumowin , anámiuhe tebákonegawinink neenguhnowanemigominábun neenge kepáquiegâzomin mushkâwandumowin nánázh che tuhkoshinomuhguk .
48003024	Eu ōnje tebákonegawin , me kakenoumowweyumint Christ uzzhiát che ezhe wizzheyumint konemá neendá ōnje bemátizzemin mushkâwandumowinink .
48003025	Opedush mushkâwandumowin gá takoshinomuhguk , kâween kiábe ketebanemigosenán kekinoumágat .
48003026	Kokkinná Kitche Manito ketōnejânissemigowâ Jesus Christ omushkâwandumowin ōnje .
48003027	Menik andussheyag gá baptizemigoeyag Jesus Christ ōnje Christ kege bezikonigōm .
48003028	Kâ oweuh Jew , kâ oweuh giya Greek , kâ oweuh owwâkânewisse , kâ giya oweuh tebanindizzose , kâ oweuh giya aninne , kâ giya oweuh equa , ōnje kokkinná kebazhekōm Christ Jesus owewwink .
48003029	Kishpin Christ tebaneminág Abraham ketōnejânissemigonán wâweendumátewin keenowâ ketebandánâwâ .
48004001	Nōngum neendikit , sazekizzit menik abenoche-ewit tebishko uhnoketâgaweninneeng anandágooze , ánuh weenigo tebanemán kokkinná .
48004002	Otebanemigōn ogemán giya gagequanidjin , nánázh ope 'zhonuhginjegâtag ōsemá ōnje .
48004003	Tibishko azhewabizzeyunk magwouh uzzhobenoche-eweyunk kegeowwâkânewimin omá ákeeng .
48004004	Opedush tabishkosag , Kitche Manito obe-ezhenázhowân Oguisun , equawun gá ōnje negit , tebákonegawin anoketunk .
48004005	Che ōnje bemátizzewât uhgew tebákonegawin tabanemigoojig , konemá che otissinungwâ oguisekáwinink .
48004006	Onje ketogisemáwim , Kitche Manito oge-ezhenázhowân Oguisun Ochichâgwun ketaewâng keche ōnje ekettoeyag , Abba , Nōs .
48004007	Eu ōnje kâween kiábe ketuhnoketâgaweninnewisse , ketoguisemigo , kishpin ogisemáweyun ketián Kitche Manito owáweendumágawin Christ ōnje .
48004008	Magwouhdush chebwâ kakanemut Kitche Manito kege uhnoketowág uhgew manitowissigook .
48004009	Nōngumdush gá kekanemag Kitche Manito , Kitche Manitodush kekekanemigowâ áneen ga ge ezbe uzzhakewayag che owwâkâneweyag ono mutche iewishun , wâ ezbe uzzhakewanotumag ?
48004010	Kekunwandánâwân gezhgutōn , giya gezissōg , ezhichegawinun , kekenonowinun .
48004011	Kegosittonim ; konemá kokkinná neenduhnokewin , menik anoketonuhgook kâ ningōt tá inâbuhtussinōn .
48004012	Nekânissetōk ketuhnumeatonim azhewabizzeyán izzhewabizzik , ōnje azhewabizzeyag neendizzhewabiz , kâween kegewesuhgandumeisseem pápish .
48004013	Kekekandánâwâ azhe neennuhmukebun neow , wiazhkut gagekeminnuhgook meenwâjemowin .
48004014	Neenkubquadebanemigowindush neweyâsink ayág , kâween kege pâpenōtunzeenâwâ kâ kege gooshquawabenuhzeenâwâ Kitche Manito omezhinowamun tebishko kege ezhe otâpenim tebishko Jesus Christink .
48004015	Ahneendush eu shâwanindewin gá tuzzhindumag ? ketenenim , kishpin kushketoeyagobun ketage muhmebetōnáwân keskezhikowân che ge mezheyagobun .
48004016	Menuh o-o wanje omiátáwizzemeyag neow ōnje quiuk tabwawin uhweendumonuhgook ?
48004017	Mushkâwandumōg owwe kubbekōshkonágwâ , kâween o-o ezhe mennoizzbewabusinōn : kewekooche átáquo-ogowâg keche ōnje wekoochetoeyag giya keenowâ keche kuhbekōshkowwagwâ .
48004018	Onissheshin uhkoochetōng che kuhbekōshkotáting uhmenototuming ; kâween ween atuh magwouh wejewinuhgook .
48004019	Neenejânissetōk , kekitche kushkandumisitumonim , nánázh Christ keche gegishkowag .
48004020	Ahpadush wejewinnuhgook nōngum neendenandum che ánjetoeyán neendinwawin kegweenowe-enaneminenim .
48004021	Weendumoweshig , keenowâ nandowandumag tebákonegawin ?
48004022	Ezhebe-egâta Abraham ge neezhewun oguisun ; bazhek awâkânewit equa ōnje , bazhek tabandunk weow equa ōnje ,
48004023	Weendush awâkânewinidjin equawun wanje negit , weâsemá wanje negit , weendush tabandunk weow equawun wanje negit , wâweendumátewin wanje negit .
48004024	Ono iuheen buhbawatágoozewin : me ono neezh wâweendumágawinun ; bazhek wudjew Sinaiink ōnje owâkânewinink wanjeeg , ween uhow Agar .
48004025	Wuhow Agar , me wudjew Sinai , Arabiaink , me tebishko Jerusalemink nōngum ayág , owâkânewe mámowy onejânisun .
48004026	Jerusalemdush ishpemink ayág tebanindizzomuhgut ween kokkinná ketogemánán .
48004027	Ezhebe-egâta mennowânegoozin , wanejânisissewun , sásáquan , uzzhonejânisissewun ; shegá owushema tusshewun onejânisun ween wanâbamit andusshinit onejânisun .
48004028	Keenowint nekânissetōk Isaac gá izzhewabizzit , wâweendumátewin uhbenocheag ketáwimin .
48004029	Azhewabukkebun eu ápe , ween weyásemá gá ōnje negit , omutchetotowân uhnew Ochichâgomá gá ōnje neginidjin : me nōngum azhewabuk .
48004030	Ahneen o-o aketomuhguk mazaniegun ? sâgitchewabenik awâkânewit equa mámowy oguisun ; awâkânewit equa oguisun , kâween oguhtiáseen otawizzewin mámowy tabandunk weow equa oguisun .
48004031	Me eu nekânissetōk , kâween awâkânewit equa ketōnejânisemigoosenán , tabandunk weow ketōnejânissemigonán .
48005001	Mushkauwegawbowik wânuhkewinink Christ gá ezhe wânuhkeinunk ; kago minowá bezokun kago owâkânewin .
48005002	Binná neen Paul ketenenim , kishpin gewetázhegâzoyag , Christ kâween e-e keguh mennototágoosewâ .
48005003	Onje neendenág kokkinná aninnewug , gáwetázhegâzojig ōnjittá oguh kunwandánâwâ kokkinná tebákonegawin .
48005004	Kâween Christ keguh mennototágosewâ , owwagwanigo ga awewagwan keenowâ tebákonegawin wanje bemátizzeyag ; shâwanjegawinink ketōnje pongeshinōm .
48005005	Neembeomin Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje neembetomin quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
48005006	Jesus Christ ōnje gewetázhegâzowin kâ ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn , giya gewetázhegâzoseeng kâ giya ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn , meatuh mushkâwandumowin , unnokemuhgut sâgittewinink .
48005007	Kege gitche mennobemebuttōm , owwanan gá onushquanág che tabwatunzewag quiuk tabwawin ?
48005008	Kâween o-o guhgânzōndewin ōnjemuhgusinōn ween nandomenág .
48005009	Punge wânje ōmbishkág , me kokkinná wanje ōmbishkág .
48005010	Nemushkâwandum uhnáguttuhwaneminuhgook Kitche Manito ōnje káween keguh mashkōtanduhzeem , weendush ga megooshkâcheinnág ogun kushketōn obuhshunzhaogowizzewin owwagwanigo ga áwegwan .
48005011	Neendush , nekânissetōk , kishpin kiábe ezhe guhgequarán o-o gewetázhegâzowin , wagonan wanje mutchetotágoeyán tiábe ? medush osittáwandumowin ázheta ágobetag metig eeshhuâsag .
48005012	Ahpadush puhkawinintwâ uhgew mágooshkâcheinnágwâ .
48005013	Nekánissetōk , kegenundomigōm che wânuhkeyag ; kago weenigo kago e-e wânuhkewin weyâsemá ōnje iyuhnoketátig ságeittewinink .
48005014	Kokkinná tebákonegawin mooshkena bazhek gegetowinink , keguh sâgeáwâg kejetuhkewamágunewâg azhe sâgeittizzoyag .
48005015	Kishpindush nekemotáteyag tuhtuhkoondeyag mamashkōt tuttebábig keche buhbanájeittissewag mamashkōt .
48005016	Me o-o akettoeyán , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun weowwink bamosag , kago mooshkena tabwatokago weyâsemá izzhewabizzewin .
48005017	Oweyâsemá giya Ochichâgomá nishkanindewug , kâ kekushketoseem owwe totumag ono iuheen anandumag owwe totumag .
48005018	Kishpin Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun suhgábeginág kâween tebákonegawin ketebanemigooseenâwâ .
48005019	Weyâsemá uhnokewin nágwitchegâta , me ono , bisshegwâtizzewin , wenizzewin .
48005020	Sáságewinint muzzinneneen , kozâbundumowin , sheenganindewin , kekândewin , bukkittaotewin , nishkâtizzewin , guhgâwanindewin ,
48005021	Nissittewin , kewushquabewin , megooshkâtuhkumegizzewin , uhnōch mutche izzhewabizzewin ; ono iuheen keweendumonim maweshádush gá ezhe weendumonuhgogobun ; uhgew aeendotungig ono iuheen kâ pâpish tá beendegasewug Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
48005022	Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun uhmenewit sâgeittewin , mennowânegoozewin , innuhwandewin , keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgitowin , bakâtizzewin , mennoizzhewabizzewin , mushkâwandumowin ,
48005023	Nokâtizzewin , mennokunwanindizzōnk , kâ kago tebákonegawin tebákonuhzeen ono tinowun .
48005024	Uhgew Christun tabanemigoojig oge suhsuhgáquoánâwâ weyâs , mámowy enandumowinink .
48005025	Kishpin Ochichâgomá ōnje bemátizzeyunk , Ochichágomá azhewabizzit , azhewabizzetá .
48005026	Kago nundowanduhzetá kuhgepách sōnganemowin , kago nuhnishkeittissetá kago guhgâwanindissetá .
48006001	Nekawnissetōk , kishpin oweuh aninne osittá izzhewabizzit , keenowâ ochichâgomá gagishkowwag , nayáb gwakebinik bakâtizzewinink ; náguttunwandun keow , konemá giya keen keguh guhgwadebanemigowiz ningōtink .
48006002	Buhbemewetátig mámáshqut kebemewunánewân ; me o-o ga izzhewabizzeyag che tabwatumag Christ otebákonegawin .
48006003	Kishpin oweuh aninne kache apetandungin weow , ningōt inábuhtuhgandágoozissig me e-e wiazhindizzōt .
48006004	Máno kokkinná aninne , oguh wekekekandánâwâ otinuhnokewinewân , medush e-e che mennowânegoozit tebinowa weowwink , ezheka kâween ween bakânizzit ōnje .
48006005	Kokkinná aninne oguh bemewittōnâwân obemewunánewân .
48006006	Ween gagekemint , ekettowinink oguh nezhokumowân gagequanidjin , kokkinná mennoizzhewabizzewinun .
48006007	Kago keguh wiazhemigoseem ; Kitche Manito kâween pâpenotowâse , aninne kategâtunk , me e-e minowâ ga mámōt .
48006008	Ween kategâtumowât oweyâs , oweyâs ōnje oguhmámōn begishkuhnut ; ween kategâtumowât ochichâgwun , ochichâgomá oguhtotágōn che mámát gâgega bemátizzewin .
48006009	Kago iakoozissetá che mennototumunk , wiábetagin ketegân , keguh mámámin kishpin wuhnemikowwissewung .
48006010	Eu ōnje magwouh uhkushketoeyáng che izzhewabizzeyunk ketá wekooche mennototowânánig kokkinná bamátizzidjig ângwâm uhgew tiabwa-andungig .
48006011	Kewâbundánâwâ azhe mechág o-o mazaniegun wazhebeumonuhgook tebinowa neninjeen ōnje .
48006012	Menik wâkoochetojig che mennonáguttuhwandágoozewât weyâsink , owekoochetōnâwâ owwe kushkeinnágwâ che we gewetázhegâzoeyag ; ōnje sagizzewug konemá che kotuhgeintwâ Christ ōnje .
48006013	Ahnuh gewetázhowug kâweendush okunwanduhzeenâwâ tepákonegawin , keenowâdush kenundowanemigowâg che gewetázhegâzoeyag uhkeche ōnje kitche apetaneminágwâ keweyâs ōnje .
48006014	Kâ pâpish neendá sōnganduhzeen neow , kago ōnje , meatuh Christ gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt metig ōnje , ween ōnje gá ōnjenat ákeeng , neendush neennib ákeeng .
48006015	Jesus Christ ōnje gewetázhegâzowin kâ ningōt inâbuhtuhsinōn , giya gewetázhegâzoseeng , kâ ningōt inâbuhtuhsinōn , neatuh washke ōndátizzingin izzhewabizzeeng .
48006016	Menik tiabwatungig o-o guhgequawin tuhmennoinnowanlewug , tuhshâwandágoosewug , giyadush Kitche Manito otuhnishanâbamun tuhshâwandágoosewug .
48006017	Náágutchdush , kago oweuh aninne neenguh megooshkârheiggoose , ōnje neenkushketōn neowwink Kekitche Manitomeán Jesus otisshichegawinun .
48006018	Nekânissetōk , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâranjegawin keguh wejewegōnâwâ kechichâgowâng . Amen .
49001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kitche Manito otenandumowin ōnje , neendoshebeumowâg , anumeájig Ephesusink , uhgewedush mashkâwandungig Jesus Christun ōnje :
49001002	Keguhshâwandágoozim mennoinnowandewin Kitche Manito Kōsenán ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
49001003	Nemegwetcheweá Kitche Manito Kōsenán , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun , ween gá shâwaneminunk kokkinná Ochichâgomá shâwanjegawin gezhigōnk tuhnuhkewinink Christ ōnje ;
49001004	Tebishko gá ezhe onuhgimint weowwink , chebwá ozhichegâtag áke , keche mennoizzhewabizzeyunk che nuhnibbekimegowizzissewunk anosumeet sâgeittewinink .
49001005	Gá onuhgiminunk kiut Jesus Christ che ōnejânissekát keowwenánin , azhe meenwandunk ,
49001006	Che kitchetwâwittowint oshâwanjegawin , eu ōnje wanje bemájeinunk siágeint ōnje :
49001007	Ween weowwink ketōnje shâwandágoozemin omisqueem ōnje , mennoweshâwanjegat mutcheizzhewabizzewinun , azhe kitchetwâwutinik oshâwanjegawin ;
49001008	Eu ōnje , kegegitche sháwanemigonán kokkinná nebwâkáwin , mennoizzhewabizzewin ;
49001009	Uhge kekandumowinunk , azhe meenwandunkigo , ōnjitta ayát ween tebinowa :
49001010	Eu ope tebishkosag , konemá otá mowōnjetonun kokkinna kago Christ weowwink , ono iuheen gezhigōnk ayágin , giya ákeeng , kagat weowwink .
49001011	Ween weowwink ōnje ketiámin ánint otawizzewin , kege onuhgimigomin weenigo anandunk kokkinná kago anandunk aeendotunk ;
49001012	Me e-e kcenowint netam tiabwatowwunk Christ uhgitchetwâwittowint ogitchetwâwizzewin .
49001013	Keenowâ giya kegetabwatowâwâ gá nōndumag ekettowin tabwawin , meenwájemowin wanje bemátizzeyag , gá eeshquâdush tabwatowag ketuhkokewissigōm Kitche Manito Ochichágwun ōnje gá wâweendumátink ,
49001014	O-o gezhá menittewin eu ga otissigoeyunk gá kishpinut ágoeyunk uhgitchetwâwittowint ogitchetwâwizzewin .
49001015	Eu ōnje neen giya ope gá nōndumán kemushkâwandumowinewân Jesus weowwink ayág , giya kesâgewaninnewâ kokkinná uhnumeájig ságeagwâ ,
49001016	Megwatch neendiná Kitche Manito gâgineek keenowâ ōnje , uhtuzzheminuhgook gâgineek neendunnumeawinink ;
49001017	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun , ōsun ogitchetwâwizzewin , konemá ketámenigowâ Uhchichâgomá nebwâkâwin keche ōnje kekanemag :
49001018	Oskezhikomán kenáguttuhwandumowinewâng uhwâsayág che kekandumag apetandágwutinik onundōngawin gitchewânuttizzewin ogitchetwâwizzewinink anumeájig ōnje .
49001019	Ahpiche kitche apetandágwutinik omushkâwizzewin , keenowint ōnje menik tiabwatumunk azhe uhnokemuhgutinik ogitche mushkâwizzewin ,
49001020	Ween anokeet Christ weowwink ope wanishkânát uhgenebonit uhnámátábeát ogitche nikâng gezhigōnk .
49001021	Wâsâ ishpemink kokkinná ogemáwewin , owushema kokkinná mushkâwizzewinink owushema kokkinná wiáweendágin kâween atuh omá o-o ákeeng eu giya ga ochichesamuhgut ;
49001022	Kokkinná kago uttowâ anámiuhe ozittáng , menádush ween kokkinná kago che negânizzekundunk anumeawinink ,
49001023	Eu waweowwit , omooshkenawin ween mooshkenatōt kokkinná kago .
49002001	Keenowawdush gá neboeyag kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewá kegebemájeigowâ .
49002002	Kebemuhuttōnâwâbun izzhewabizzewin omá ákeeng , uhnopenuttumink 'zhogemáwunk notin ochichâgomá anokeet uhbenocheug omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâng .
49002003	Magwaiuhe ketiáminábun giya keenowint kiut , magwouh 'zhizhewabizzeyunk mutcheizzhewabizewinink magwouh 'zhonejânissemigoeyunk nishkâtizzewin tebishkogo ánint bakânizzidjig .
49002004	Kitche Manitodush ween kachetwâwizzit shâwanjegawinink ogitche sâge-ewawin wanje sâgeinunk ,
49002005	Magwouh neboeyunk mutcheizzhewabizzewinink kegetuhtátuhbeigonán mámowy Christ ; ( shâwanjegawin ketōnje bemátizzim ; )
49002006	Kege pusegweendenán mámowy genámátábeigonán gezhigōnk uhbewinink Christ Jesus ōnje ;
49002007	Uhnew kekenonowinun ga ochichesagin che wâbundiewat kitche twâwutinik oshâwanjegawin azhe keshawânuttōnunk Jesus Christ ōnje .
49002008	Onje shâwanjegawinink ketōnje bemátizzim mushkâwizzewinink ōnje kâween ween eu keenowâ tebinowa , Kitche Manito omegewawin :
49002009	Káween ween uhnokewinun ōnje , oweuh aninne che sōnganemosig .
49002010	Ween kege ozheigonán Christ ōnje mennouhnokewinink eu Kitche Manito , gá inounk kiut gá izzhewabizzeyunk .
49002011	Eu ōnje kunwandumōk keenowâ kemiátáwizzimwâbun gáwetázhegâzosiggook kege ezhe wenegōm uhgew ōnje gáwetazhegâzojig oweyâsewâng oninjemáng gá ōnje ozhichegâtag ;
49002012	Eu ápe kâween Christ kegegishkowâsewâ kemiátáwizzim Israelug anisbanâbag , kâ kegekekanduhzeem wâweendumátewin , kâ kago kegekekanduhzeenâwâ nezhokomátewin , kâ kege Omanitomisseem ákeeng ;
49002013	Nōngumdush Christ Jesus ōnje kiut wâsâ ketiámwâbun nōngumdush bazhew ketiám Christ omisqueem ōnje .
49002014	Ween me neendinowandewininán , me niyazh oge bazhekoán oge nesákobetōn michikkun nussowwiuhe keenowint ayágebun ;
49002015	Uhge ungwotōt shinganindewin oweyâs ōnje , me e-e tebákonegawin guhgequawinun , atag ezhichegawinun che tofunk weowwink neezh aninnewun , baznek ōshke aninnewun , che ōnje ozheát me azhe ozhetōt innuhwandewin .
49002016	Niyazh che innowamáwât Kitche Manitōn bazhek weowwemá onebowin ōnje uhnetōng sheenganindewin ;
49002017	Ge be-ezhá uhguhgekeminág che mennoinnowandeyag wâsá uzzhiáeyag giyadusn uhgew bazhew iáyag .
49002018	Ween ōnje niyazh keenowint tuhgomuhgut ga ōnje otissinunk ōsemá bazhek Ochichâgwun ōnje .
49002019	Nōngumdush kâween kiábe kemiátáwizzisseem , kâween wâsâ ketiáseem , kemámowizzimdush anumeájig , kemámowizzim Kitche Manito otuhnishanâbamun ;
49002020	Kege onuhbeiggōm anoninjig giya mamándáwizzidjig otuhnuhkewinewâng ; Jesus Christ ween tebinowa ishquaiuhe abit ásin áwit .
49002021	Ween weowwink kokkinná gá mámuhobeinjig me wanje geschichegâtag Kitche Manito otumnumeawegumink ;
49002022	Weowwink giya keenowâ azhe mámuhobeyag Kitche Manito keche owegewâmit Ochichâgwun ōnje .
49003001	O-o ōnje , neen Paul , Jesus Christ otowwâkânewin keenowâ miátáwizzeyag che ōnje sháwandágoozeyag ,
49003002	( Kishpin gá nōndumowagwan Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin eu gá menigoeyán keenowâ che ōnje sháwandágoozeyag :
49003003	Uhmizzhishowwenágwitōng me wanje kekandumonigoeyán kiátukkin iuheen , ga ezhebeumonán kiut punge ekettowinun ,
49003004	Eu ōnje ope kunowâbundumag , konemá keguh nissetotánâwâ anandumán kiátukkin iuheen Christ oguhgequawinun ,
49003005	Eu kiut gá 'ko weendumowâsebuneeg aninnewug oguisewân , nōngumdush Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun onágwittōn uhwâbunduhât anoninjig giya mamándáwizzidjig ;
49003006	Uhgew miátáwizzidjig che wejesazekizzemáwât , keche bazhekwuninik weowwewân ánint ayájig Christ gá wâweendumágat , meenwâjemowin ōnje :
49003007	Che guhgequayán o-o meenwâjemowin , neenge ezheiggo Kitche Manito azhe mezhit osháwanjegawin otuhnokewin omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
49003008	Neen owushema nōndás neendenandágooz , kokkinná anumeájig ; o-oedush shâwandágoozewin neen neengemenigo keche guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidjig eu kakandágoosinōk azhe kitche apetandágwuk Jesus Christ ogitchetwâwizzewin ;
49003009	Kokkinna aninnewug keche ōnje wábewât che mámowy wetokotátink kiátukkin iuheen , eu wiazhkut wazhetōng áke gá gátukkin Kitche Manito oweowwink , ween gá ozhetōt kokkinná kago Christun ōnje .
49003010	Me eu uhnumeawin ōnje okitche nebwâkâwin Kitche Manito konemá tá ge kekandumonitim ogemáwewinink mushkâwizzewinink gezhigōnk che kekanjegâtag ,
49003011	Eu anandunzik wâtotunk , chebwâ ozhichegâtag áke eu ōnjittá Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje :
49003012	Ween ōnje kemushkâweta-amin Kitche Manito che ezháeyunk ōnje uhtabwa-anemunk .
49003013	Eu ōnje ketenaneminenim che nōndáshâgwanemosewag neenkotuhgitowinun ōnje neenkotuhgitowinun keenowâ ōnje .
49003014	Me o-o ōnje wanje ochicheengwunittowwug Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun ,
49003015	Ween andussogawât kokkinná gezhigōnk giya ákeeng otuhnozowinewân ,
49003016	Neenduhnumeatowâ che meninág mushkâwizzewin wânuttizzewin ogitchetwâwizzewinink , konemá keguh ōnje mushkâweta-am Ochichâgwun ōnje ;
49003017	Christ konemá tá iá ketaewâng mushkâwandumowin ōnje , konemá ketá monuhogōm che mushkâwegâboigoeyag ságeitewinink ,
49003018	Konemá ketá kushketōm , mámowy kokkinná anumeájig , ehe kekandumag anegōkotayág , aquâg , apetág , anishpág ;
49003019	Che kekandumag Christ osâge-ewawin azhe kitche apeandágwuk kâ kushketoseem che kekandumink , konemá ketá kooshkenam Kitche Manito omooshkenawin .
49003020	Nōngum ween gashketōt keche ezhe shâwaneminunk wushema menik azhe nundotumowunk menik anandumunk nje omushkâwizzewin anokemuhguk keowwenáng ,
49003021	Ween ga gitchetwâweint anumeawinink Jesus Christ ōnje âgineek . Amen .
49004001	Eo ōnje neen Kitche Manito otowwâkânun , keguhgâzomin , miuk che ezhe bamosayagigo , agoeyag keche izzbewabizeyag ,
49004002	Kokkinná tuhbuhsanemowin , bakâdizzewin , keenwazh kuhvâtuhgitōng , uhguskittōng , uhsáságeittink ;
49004003	Wekoochetōk che kunwandumag ochichâgomá obazhekowin , tuhkobizzowinink innowandewinink .
49004004	Bazhekwun weow bazheko giya Ochichâg tibishko azhe nundomigoeyag kemámowandumowinewâng uhnundomigoeyag ;
49004005	Bazheko Kitche Manito , bazhekwun mushkâwandumowin , bazhekwun baptizewawin ,
49004006	Bazheko Kitche Manito kokkinná waōsemint , ween owushema apetandágoozit , kokkinná kago anewishkunk keowwewáng kokkinná iá .
49004007	Kokkinná andussheyunk kemenigomin shâwanjegawin Jesus Christigo ananeminunk .
49004008	Eu ōnje eketto , ope wambishkât ishpemink , owwâkânewin otowwâkâtán menáwug aninnewug menittewinun .
49004009	( Ombishkâ , wagonan eu atumink , meatuh uhge ezhát netam tubbuhzheesh ákeeng ?
49004010	Ween gá názhuhkeet , mego 'uhow gá ōmbishkât áwâs owushema ishpemink kokkinná gezhigōnk keche we gezhetát kokkinná kago . )
49004011	Omenán ánint che anonint , ánint mamándáwizzewât , ánint che guhgequawât , ánint che guhgequaweninnemewât ;
49004012	Che ōnje quiuk izzhewabuk uhnumeawin , keche enuhnokeeng guhgequawin , uzzhozhetōng Christ weow :
49004013	Nánázh kokkinná quiuk keche izzhewabizzeyunk , bazhekowin mushkâwandumowin , giya Kitche Manito Oguisun , okekandumowinink , quiuk aninne che áweyunk Christ azhewabizzit che izzhewabizzeyunk :
49004014	Eu keche ōnje uhbenoche-ewissewunk iázhuh che ezhe uzzhawabinegōsewunk , che bábámewinegosewung uhnōch guhgequawinun aninne oguhgianizzewin ōnje , uhgácheshinowât we wiazheinungwâ ;
49004015	Umbasinno , tabwatá sâgeittewinink , konemá ween Christ nâgânizzit izzhewabizzit ketá izzhewabizzim :
49004016	Ween ōnje kokkinná andusso anekogink azhe uhnokewinnewunk anduswauhguk , weowwemá che sōngegink , sâgeittewinink .
49004017	Me o-o wanje ekettoeyán , nemushkâwetōn neendikittowin kago ezhe bamosakago ánint miátáwizzidjig azhe bamosawât okuhgebátizzewinewâng onáguttuhwandumowinewâng ;
49004018	Onáguttuhwandumowinewân kushkedibbik-kitchegâtane wun gemiátáwitchegâzowug Kitche Manito beemátizzewinink , kushkedibbikut gagishkumowât ōnje , ōnje uhguhgebeengwa muhguttinik otaewân :
49004019	Uhgew gá guhbikungig innuhmunjeowin uhbuhgitinumowât weowwewân bisshegwâtizzewinink , kokkinná weenize win che innuhnokeeng ápiche .
49004020	Kâween keenowâ Christ o-o kege ezhe kekinoumágosevi .
49004021	Kishpin genōndowag geguhgekimenág tabwawin Jesus azhe tabwat :
49004022	Che gezekowag gata aninne ween banátizzit mutche esandumowin ōnje ;
49004023	Onjittá ōshke náguttuhwandumowinun keguhmenigōm ;
49004024	Keguh bezikowâ ōshke aninne uhnew Kitche Manito gá ozheájin quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
49004025	Eu ōnje ningooche buhgittinumōk kuhgenowishkewin , quiuk tabwawin ezheguhnonik kejetuhkewamágunewâg : babazhek buhkazewinun ketáwemin .
49004026	Nishkâtizzig , kago mutcheizzhewabizzig kago : kago gezis tuh pongeshimose kenishkâtizzewinewâng ;
49004027	Kago menákago Mutche Manito che ábit .
49004028	Ween gamotitukko , kago minowâ tuh gemotisse , tuh uhnoke menik kashketōt oninjeeng wanissheshink uhnokewin , konemá tá kushketōm kago keche menint katemágizzit .
49004029	Kago , ween kago mutchegegetowin tá ōnjesasinōn ketonewâng meatuh go eu wanissheshink che ōnje mushkâwandumowât anumeájig keche ōnje mennototowintwâ n'wândungig .
49004030	Kago osittáwanemá kago Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun , ween ōnje ketuhkokewussiggōm che betōng gezhigut kunwandágoozewin .
49004031	Máno kokkinná weesuhgizzewin , nishkâtizzewin , sheenganindewin , ōmbegizzewin , mutchegegetowin ningooche tuhbuhgittinegâta , kokkinná mutche enandumowin giya .
49004032	Kuhkeshawânotátig mamashkōt che nokung ketaewân , uhmennowweshâwaninding mamashkōt tebishko Kitche Manito zhemennowweshâwaneminág Christun ōnje .
49005001	Quiuk Kitche Manito nopenuhnik , siágeinjig uhbenocheug zhewabizzewât ;
49005002	Che sáságeitteyag Jesus Christ ságeinunk , uhge buhgittenunk weow keenowint ōnje , uhsáságewinint Kitche Manito uhanomágwukkin iuheen .
49005003	Bisshegwâtizzewindush , giya wenizzewin , suhságizzewin ago eu keguh ezhe tuzzhemigoweem andussheyag , menik ga numeáyag ;
49005004	Giyadush mutche andágoozewin , kuhgepáchegegetowin , ya bisinnáchegeezhwawin , kâween o-o onissheshinzenōn ; owushema onissheshin , megwetch che enint Kitche Manito .
49005005	Kekekandánâwâ o-o , kâ oweuh bashegwâtizzit , kâ giya keuh wânizzit , kâ giya oweuh suhságizzit aninne wuhow uhnōch azhetwât , e-e anduhgosinōk Kitche Manito giya Jesus rist otogemáwewinink .
49005006	Kago oweuh aninne keguh wiyazhemigoose omutche geowin ōnje , ânga , ono iuheen ōnje Kitche Manito onishkâgewin ototissigōnâwâ uhgew tiabwatunzigook .
49005007	Kago ween azhewabizzewât izzhewabizzekago .
49005008	Kushkedibikutōnk ketiáminábun , nōngumdush Kitche Manito owâsayázewinink ketiámin ;
49005009	( Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun uhmenewit mennoizzhewabizzewin quiuk izzhewabizzewin , tabwawin kokkinná izzhewabizzewinink ; )
49005010	Uhkekandumonetink Kitche Manito manwandungin .
49005011	Kago ningōtono inâbuhchetokago ono ningōt inâbuhtusinōk kushkedibikutōnk izzhewabizzewinun tiágwuchigo ketá muhmikuhwâmáwâg .
49005012	Ahgutandágwut che tebátotumink iuheen andotumowâjin kemōch .
49005013	Kokkinná iuheen menik makowâmungwâ wâsayáng bechegâtawun , kokkinná iuheen menik niágwuk kago wâsayá .
49005014	Eu ōnje eketto , kooskoozin nabáyun , ábejebán nebowinink , Christdush keguh menik wâsayá .
49005015	Iyângwâmizzig quiuk che ezhe bamosayag ; kago ween kagepátizzidjig azhewabizzewât , nabwâkâjigigo azhewabizzewât ;
49005016	Nayáb che gishpinutōng gezhigut , che ōnje pezân ábisseeng ōnje gezhigutōn mánátutōn .
49005017	Eu ōnje kago kuhgebátizzig kago , nissetotumōg Kitche Manito otenandumowin .
49005018	Kago kewushquabe kago shomenâbo ōnje , mutcheizzhewabut o-o ; mooshkenag koshuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ;
49005019	Uhguhguhnonittizzoeyag nuhgumōng nuhgumonun Kitche Manito onuhgumonun keche mennotágwitoeyag ketaewâng ;
49005020	Megwach ekettoeyag gâgineek kokkinná iuheen ōnje , uhnew mánigoeyag Kitche Manito ōnje Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink ;
49005021	Buhgitinumátig mamashqut keowwewânche gosag Kitche Manito .
49005022	Wewemág , buhgitinumowik kenâbamewág keowwewân tibishko azhe buhgitinumowag Kitche Manito .
49005023	Onâbamemá onegânizzekundowân wewun , tibishko Christ azhe negânizzekundunk uhnumeawin , weendush obemájetōn weowwemá .
49005024	Eu ōnje tibishko Christ azhe tebandunk uhnumeawin , me me tibishko wewemâ ga ezhe tebanemigoot onâbamun , uhnōchigo kokkinná kago .
49005025	Onâbamemág , ságeikōg kewewâg tibishko Christ azhe ságitōt uhnumeawin , uhge ōnje buhgitinunk weow ;
49005026	Keche ōnje mennoizzhewabuk , keche ōnje benuk , uhgesebeginumink nebe ekettowin ōnje ;
49005027	Keche menittezoot kache apetandágwuk uhnumeawin ningooche chegittuhgâsinōk che iyusegiskâsinōk uhnōch e-e tinnouh kago , keche mennoizzhewabut ningooche ossittáwinagwusinōk .
49005028	Aninnewug otá ságeáwán wewewân tibishko azhe sâgitowât weowwewân , ween siágeát wewun osâgitōn weow .
49005029	Kâ oweuh aninne wekâ osheenganduhzeen tebinowa oweyás otusshundán okunwandán tebishko Kitche Manito anumeájig .
49005030	Keenowint obuhkazewinun ketáwimin giya oweyás giya okunun .
49005031	O-o ōnje aninne oguh nuhgunán ōsun giya ōgeen che názekowât wewun uhgewedush neezhewât tuhbuhzhekwuninne oweyâsewâ .
49005032	Me o-o gache gátuk , Christ neenduzzhemá giya anumeájig .
49005033	Mánodush kokkinná andussheyag keguh sâgeáwâg tebishkogo azhesâgeittizzoeyag kokkinná giya wewemág oguh tabwatowâwân onâbamewân .
49006001	Uhbenocheittōk , tabwatowikōg kenegeigowâg , Kitche Manito ōnje , me o-o quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
49006002	Kitchetwâwanemikōg kōsewâg giya kegewâg , me o-o netamissink guhgequawin wâweendumátewin ,
49006003	Ketá ōnje mennoizzhewabizzim keenwazh che bemátizzeyag ákeeng .
49006004	Keenowâdush oōsemátōk , kago guhgânjeketaokago keenejânissewâg , ezhe netáwiginikōg keche ságeáwât che gosáwât Kitche Manito .
49006005	Uhnoketâgaweninewetōk , tabwatowikōg tabaneminágook weyâs ōnje , che sagizzeyag che nuhningishkâyag , che bazhekwunk ketaewân Christ ōnje ;
49006006	Kâween atuh uhwâbomigoeynn che uhnokeyun , andotumowât uhgew niandumeájig aninnewun , tibishko azheuhnoketowut Christ ketá izzhewabizzim , Kitche Manito ga ezhe meenwandunk izzhewabizzig ketaewâng ;
49006007	Quiuk che menno enandumag uhnokeeg tibishko Kitche Manito uhnoketowag , kâween ween aninne :
49006008	Kekekandám menik aninne azhe mennototunk Kitche Manito oguhtebáumágōn , kishpin owwâkânewit giya kishpin tebandunk weow .
49006009	Keenowâdush wagemákundumag , me go e-e giya totowwikōg , kago kuhgwasageákagwânik , ōnje kekekanemáwâ ketogemánewâ gezhigōnk uzzhiat , weendush kâween oweuh pekinōnk otuhpetanemáseen .
49006010	Eeshquâch akettoeyán nekânissetōk mushkâwandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje giya omushkâwizzewinink .
49006011	Pezekumōk kokkinná Kitche Manito otushwewin , konemá eh me ga ōnje shágozekumag Mutche Manito okuhgianizzewin .
49006012	Kâween ketizzhe kuhgwajewâzhewasemin weyâsemá giya nisque , ogemáwewindush ketizzhe kuhgwajewâzhewamin , gia mushkâwizzewinun uhgewedush tabandungig kushkedibbiut omá ákeeng , giya ochichâgomá mázheninnewugizzewin shpágin .
49006013	Eu ōnje kokkinná otâpenumōk Kitche Manito otushweinun , konemá ketákushketōm che nebowweyag mutcheizzheabuk gezhigut , kokkinnádush gegezhetáeyag , nebowwig .
49006014	Eu ōnje nebowwig , tabwawin kechepinitizook , kekákemewâng átōng quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
49006015	Kezitáwân tuh mukezinekâtawun meenwâjemowin innowandewin .
49006016	Owushema kokkinná , andussink kokkinná kago , otâpenik buhkááquân mushkâwandumowin , e-e ōnje keguh kushketōm che nuhgânumag kokkinná miázheninnewizzidjig webewân .
49006017	Otâpenumōk wewoquân shâwandágoozewin , Ochichâgomá otuzzhowweshk eu Kitche Manito odikittowin :
49006018	Mozhuk uhnumeáng kokkinná uhnumeawinun kechichâgowâng mozhuk uhkowâbeeng uhnumeáng , uhnumeatumowik kokkinná uhnumeájig :
49006019	Uhnumeatumoweshig , konemá neendá ōnje mushkâwetágooze che guhgequayán kiátukin meenwâjemowinink .
49006020	Neendowwâkânewun uhnumeawin neenduhkobiz , konemá neendá mushkâwetágooz anandágoozeyán che ezhe gegetoeyán .
49006021	Tychicusdush siágeug , nekânis , quiuk gagequat Kitche Manitōn ōnje ween keguh kekandumonigowâ azhewabizzeyán .
49006022	Me o-o ōnjittá gá ōnje ezhenázhuhumonuhgook che kekandumag azhewabizzeyâng konemâ oguh niandumittonun ketaewân .
49006023	Tuh mennoinnowandewug wekânissemág , Kitche Manito Kōsenán giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ máno keguh menik mushkâwandumowin .
49006024	Tuhshâwandágoozewug kokkinná uhgew siágeájig Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ quiuk . Amen .
50001001	Paul , giya Timotheus , Jesus Christ otoskenegamun , otoshebeumowâwân anumeájig Jesus Christun ōnje , Phillippiink andánuhkejig mámowy nâgânizzidjig uhnumeawinink :
50001002	Keguh shâwandágoozim innowandewin Kitche Manito Kōsenán giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
50001003	Megwach neendená Neenkitche Manitōm , tussink maquaneminuhgogoon ,
50001004	Gâgineek uhnumeatumágoeyag mennowânegoozewinink , tussink anumeáeyánin .
50001005	Onje kewejewemin gâgineek meenwâjemowinink , netam e-e gezhigut , nánázh nōngum .
50001006	Neendabwatámin o-o ween miáje menno uhnokeet ketaewâng guttuh ezhe uhnoke nánázh Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ogezhiguttōm :
50001007	Quiuk izzhewabut che náguttuhwaneminuhgook o-o kokkinná ōnje neendaink ketuhbim , me e-e magwouh uzzhowwâkâneweyán ; magwouhdush guhgequayán meenwâjemowin ketotâpenánâwâ ánint neenshâwandágoozewin .
50001008	Kitche Manito okekandán anandumán owwewâbominuhgook Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin ōnje .
50001009	O-o neendizzhe uhnumeá , kesâgewawinewâ owushema tá sōngun nebwâkâwinink giya tebákonegawinink .
50001010	Konemá ketá sâgetōnâwân ono iuheen wanissheshink , quiuk che izzhewabizzeyag kago che gebishkágoozewag nánázh Christ ogezhiguttōm .
50001011	Uhmooshkenayag uhmenewung quiuk izzhewabizzewin Jesus Christ tabandungin konemá Kitche Manito che kitchetwâweint .
50001012	Kenundowanemenim che nissetotumag nekânissetōk ; iuheen watissigoeyánin gemennototumōg uhnezhokomágawât uhsiswawetōng meenwâjemowin ;
50001013	Onje neendowâkânewin Christink wawane kekanjegâtawun , kokkinná kitche ogemá owegewâmink , kokkinná giya uhnōch wegewâmink ;
50001014	Nebewádush wekânissemág Kitche Manito ōnje sōngetaajig neendowâkânewinink owushema sōngeta-awug kâ kotájissewug uhguhgequawât uhnumeawin .
50001015	Ahnint ezhe guhgequawug Christun guhgâwanindewinink , giya sheenganindewinink ; ánintdush quiuk enandumowinink ;
50001016	Ahnint kekândewinink ezhe guhgequawug Christun kuhgianizzewinink , che ōnje megonátuk neendowâkânewin :
50001017	Ahnintdush ságeittewinink , uhkekandumink , neen uhmeenjiminumán meenwâjemowin .
50001018	Wagonandush ? uhnōchigo azhe guhgekindink Jesus Christ kuhgianizzewinink uhgamádush tabwawinink , neendush nemojegandum ōnjiftá giya neenguh mojegandum .
50001019	Neenkekandán che nezbokomágoyán , che ōnje bemátizzeyán ketuhnumeawinewân ōnje giya megewawin Jesus Christ Ochichâgwun ōnje ,
50001020	Anandumánigo azhe nundowandumán e-e che águtchetunzewán kago , kokkinná sōnganemowinink tebisko o-o nōngum gâgineek giya Christ che kitchetwâweint neowwink kishpin bemátizzeyan kishpin giya neboeyán .
50001021	Kishpin bemátizzeyán , Christ ōnje , kispin neboeyán owushema nemennoizzhewabiz .
50001022	Kishpin bemátizzeyán neweyásink me o-o azhe tebáumágowizzeyán neenduhnokewin , nuhmunjigo ga ezhe wuhwanandumowânan kâ neenkekanduhzeen .
50001023	Nussowwiuhego neendiá , ápadush májáyán neendenandum , wejewug Christ , nowutch tá onissheshin :
50001024	Nowutch onissheshin keenowâ , weyâsink kiábe iáeyán .
50001025	Azhe tabwa-andumán o-o neenkekandán keche wejewinnuhgook keche ōnje mennowânegoozeyag mushkâwandumowinink .
50001026	Owushema keche mennowânegwandumag Jesus Christink neen ōnje ope otissinnuhgook minowâ .
50001027	Máno tuh izzhewabut ketizzhewabizzewinewâ Christ omeenwâjemowin azhe guhgequat , kishpin bewâbominuhgook kishpin giya bewâbomissinonuhgook neenguh nōndága azhewabizzeyag keche mushkâwegâboweyag bazhek ochichâgomá bazhek enandumowin keche mámowandumink meenwâjemowin ;
50001028	Kago ween kago keguh sageiggooseenawâ kemiátáwizzemewâg ōnje , weenowâ uhgew keche ōnje kekandumonintwâ che banátizzewât keenowâ weendush ween che ōnje bemátizzeyag , Kitche Manito ōnje .
50001029	Keenowâ kemenigōm Christ ōnje , kâween atuh che tabwa-anemint , keche guhgwâtuhgittōng e-e giya ween ōnje .
50001030	Me o-o eu megâzowin ga megâzoyag eu wiábundumowweyag tebishko e-e n'wândumag nōngum azhe megâzoyán .
50002001	Eu ōnje kishpin mennowânegozewin anduhgogwan Christink , kishpin kago mennowânegoozewin sâgeittewin , kishpin wejeendewin anduhgogwan Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun , kishpin kago shâwanjegawin anduhgogwan ,
50002002	Mooshkenatōg nemennowânegoozewin ayeezh che enandumag che sâgeitteyag che bazhekwunk ketenandumowinewâ .
50002003	Kago tuh izzhewabussinōn che we guhgwauhnewishkotáteyag kuhgenowishke kitchetwâwanemowinink , kokkinná andussheyag mennonáguttuhwanemik bakânizzit azhe náguttuhwandumag keowwewân .
50002004	Kago oweuh aninne tebinowa iuheen oguh kunowâbunduhzenun ; kokkinná aninnewug bakânizzinidjin otiemene oguh kunowâbundanâwâ .
50002005	Máno o-o náguttuhwandumowin gegishkumōg , tibbishko Christ Jesus azhe gegishkunk .
50002006	Ween tibishko Kitche Manitōng azhenágoozit enandum kâween kago kemotewin áwunzenōn weenigo Kitche Manito che áwit .
50002007	Ototándush weow nowutch che tuhbusandágoozit otoskenegamun anandágoozinit .
50002008	Ototâpenán obuhgittenán weow wawane keche nebōt , metigōnkdush ge tuzzhe nebo .
50002009	Eu ōnje , Kitche Manitōn kitche ishpemink oge ezhe ōmbinegōn ogemenigōn onozowin owushema apetandágwut kokkinná onozowinun .
50002010	Jesus otuhnozowinink kokkinná ogittegomág tuh ochicheengwunittáwug , kokkinná gezhigōnk ayájig giya ákeeng ayájig , giya anámuhkumik ayájig .
50002011	Kokkinná otanuhnewun tá ekettowug Jesus Christ Kitche Manito che kitchetwâweint Kitche Manito ōsemá .
50002012	Eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook , gâgineek azhe tabwatumag , kâween atuh magwouh uhgewejewinnuhgook , owushema minowâdush wâjewissinnonuhgogoon , uhnoketumōk tebinowa keshâwandágoozewinewâ sagizzewinink , nuhningishkâwinink .
50002013	Onje Kitche Manito ween anokeet keowwewâng che enandumag che izzhewabizzeyag ga ezhe meenwandunk .
50002014	Kokkinná kago totumōk wawane che nánáwutchemosewag .
50002015	Keche áwanemigosewag che bakâtizzeyag Kitche Manito che oguiseminág nowwiuhe mázheninewugizzidjig anishanâbag magwaiuhe uhgew kewâkashkám , tibishko azhe ságátag ákeeng .
50002016	Uhneminumink gegetowin bemátizzewin neen keche ōnje nennowânegoozeyán e-e gezhigut Christ ogezhiguttōm ōnje kâween unishâ neembemebuttose ; kâween uneshâ neenduhnokese .
50002017	Kagat , kishpin sáságewitchegang neow kemushkâwanumowinewâng ōnje nemojegandum kewejemojegizzemininim .
50002018	Eu ōnje keguh wejemojegizzemin giya .
50002019	Kishpin Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus enandunk Timotheus keguh ezhe názhuhumonim wiebuh konemá neenguh meennandum nōndumán azhewabizzeyag .
50002020	Onje kâ oweuh aninne ezhe náguttuhwanduhze azhe náuttuhwandunk che nánáguttuhwaneminág .
50002021	Kokkinná onundowâbundánâwâ tebinowa otiemene , kâweendush Jesus Christ otiemun .
50002022	Kekekandánâwâ azhe kuhgwadebanemug neenge uhnoetág meenwâjemowinink oguisemá azhe uhnoketowât ōsun .
50002023	Wiebuh kewe ezhenázhuhumonim ope wâbundumán ga zhewabizzeyán .
50002024	Wiebuhdush neen tebinowa neenguh be-ezhá kishpin Kitche Manito enandunk .
50002025	Neenge enandum Epaphroditus che ezhenázhuhumonuhgook , nekânis , wâjuhnokemuk , neejeshemágunish keenowâdush anonag , anoketowwit aezhenundowandumán .
50002026	Ahpiche kewewâbomigowâ kitche kushkandum ōnje kege nōndám uzzhákoozit .
50002027	Kagatdush ákoozebun , kagâ nebo , Kitche Manitodush ogeshâwanemán kâween atuh ween , neen giya neen , keche ōnje ozâm kushkanduhzewân .
50002028	Eu ōnje me wanje ezhenázbowug , ope minowâ wâbomag ketá mojegandám neendush nōndás neendá ezhe kushkandum .
50002029	Wawane mennowâbomik mennowânegoozewinink Kitche Manito ōnje mennonáguttuhwanemikōg uhgew azhewabizzit azhewabizzidjig .
50002030	Onje Christ otuhnokewin kagâ geōnjena , kâ opapámanduhzeen obemátizzewin , konemá guhtuh uhnoke ketuhnokewinewâ wâ ezhe uhnoketowweyagobun .
50003001	Squawchdush , nekânissetōk , mojegandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje , kâween gwach suhnágusinōn che oshebeumonuhgook násáb eu , káweendush ningōt keguhtotágoseenáwâ .
50003002	Tuttebábumikōg anemōg , tuttebábumikōg mache uhnokejig , tuttebabumikōg concisianug .
50003003	Keenowint gáwetázhegâzojig ketáwemin ketuhnumeatowânán Kitche Manito Kechichâgonáng kemojegandámin Jesus Christ ōnje kâween ketuhpanemosemin weyâsemá .
50003004	Neendá apanemoon weyâsemá kishpin oweuh aninne anandunk keche uhpanemoot weyâs owushema neendá apanemo .
50003005	Neezhwâswogwunigizzeyán neenge gewetázhogo , Israelug neenge ōnjeneeg , Benjaminitug 'zhinowandewât , ne Hebrewew Hebrewug ōnje , uhtuzzhindumink tebákonegawin ne Phariseew ;
50003006	Tuzzhindumink ochânemandumowin , nemutchetotowâbuneeg ukko anumeájig , uhtuzzhindumink tebákonegawinne quiuk izzhewabizzewin kâwekâ neengemutchetotunze .
50003007	Iuheen kashketoeyámbánan ukko neendenandum che wunnetoeyán Christ ōnje .
50003008	Kagat ōnjittá neendenandum keche wunnittoeyán kokkiana kago uhkekandunk Christ Jesus Neenkitche Manitōm , ween ōnje wanje enandumán kokkinná kago che wunnittoeyán weágusseeng neendenandánun kispin kushkeug Christ .
50003009	Konemá neendá mikágo weowwink quiuk neendizzhewabizzewin tebákonegawinink che gegishkunzewân , eu atuh mushkâwandumowinink Christ ōnje , quiuk izzhewabizzewin Kitche Manito mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
50003010	Konemá neendá kekanemá , giya mushkâwizzewin otábejebáwin , mámoweittewin okotuhgitowinink , onebowin azbeasgwutinik keche ezhenágwuk neenebowin .
50003011	Kishpin ningooche ezhe kushketoeyán neendá otittán ábejebáwin nebowin .
50003012	Kâween ázhuh watittumingin ( neendizzhegegetose ) giya wawane keche gezhetáyámbán neennopenuhkedush ishquiyáng unish , kispin konemá otâpenumán eu watâpenigoyán Christ ōnje .
50003013	Nekânissetōk , qundigo kâ neenge otâpenuhzeen anandumán , ningōtoyug tuhgo andotumán ; wuhnandumink iuheen squiáng anduhgogin ezhe wequeyán iuheen neennegânemink ayágin .
50003014	Negân neendizzhegânje owwe otittumán kekinnowáchichegun che kushketoeyán atátink Kitche Manito aninunk ween Jesus Christ ōnje .
50003015	Umbasino , me o-o enanduntá , menik manoizzhewabizzeyunk , kishpin puhkân we enandumag Kitche Manito keguh kekandumonigowâ o-o giya .
50003016	Menik takoshinunk ázhiá umbasino euigo ezhetwâwin izzhewabizzetá , máno euigo enanduntá .
50003017	Nekânissetōk nopenuzzheshig , mámowy kekinowâbomikōg uhgew wiábomeuminjig anosayáng .
50003018	( Nebená enosewug , gá ezhe weendumonuhgook kiut , nōngum nemow owwe weendumonuhgook , osheengandánâwâ Christ gátuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt :
50003019	Tuh banátizzewug ope waquiág ; Omanitomewân me omissuttáwân , ogitchetwâwinewâ me otágutchewinewâng , ákeeng iuheen onáguttuhwandánâwân . )
50003020	Neendizzhewabizzewininán gezhigōnk áta , emá azhe nundowâbeyán , nundowâbomungid gá bemájeinunk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ keche tuhkoshink .
50003021	Ween oguh ánjetonun kemutche keowwenánin azhe nágwutinik kitchetwâwutinik weow oguh ezhetonun .
50004001	Eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook nekânissetōk , nemojegandumowin newewoquân , mushkâwegábowik Kitche Manito ōnje siágeinnuhgook .
50004002	Neendená Euodias , neendená Syntiche , tebishko che enanandumowât Kitche Manitōn ōnje .
50004003	Me giya keen aninnán , quiuk neendinowamágun , nezhokomow uhgew equawug wâtokowwidjig meenwâjemowinink , Clement , uhgew giya ayeezh anokeyâng , otuhnozowinewân mazaniegun obemátizzewinink átanewun .
50004004	Mojegandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje , gâgineek , minowâ giya ketinnenim , mojegandumōk .
50004005	Kebakâtizzewinewâ máno kokkinná aninnewug oguh kekandánâwâ ; Kitche Manito bazhew já .
50004006	Kago ween kago sunnuhgeno kago , máno kokkinná uhnumeawinink uhmegwachuhweint Kitche Manito weendumowik Kitche Manito azhenundowandumag .
50004007	Kitche Manito otinowandâsowin , eu kashketosink keche kekandumink , me ga ōnje kunwandumink ketaewân giya kenáguttuhwandumowinewân Christ Jesus ōnje .
50004008	Squâch , nekânissetōk , kishpin kago tabwawinewung , kishpin kago quiuk izzhewabuk , kishpin kago mennoizzhewabuk , kishpin kago benuk , kishpin kago uhsâgitchegâtag , kispin kago menno tuzzhindumink , kishpin kago mennoizzhewabizzewin , kishpin kago bisshegandágwuk ; náguttuhwandumōk ono iuheen .
50004009	Ono iuheen neen wanje kekandumag azhewâbomeyag , uhtotumán me o-o totumōg Kitche Manito otinnuhwandewin máno keguh wejewigōnâwâ .
50004010	Neengitche mojegandum ápiche Kitche Manito ōnje , o-o minowâ uhnánáguttuhwanemeyag , kenánáguttuhwanemimwâbun ukko , kâdush kege kushketoseem ningōtono che getotumag .
50004011	Kâween kago nundowandumán neendōnje ekettose , ânga neenge ezhe nuhguttiz nuhmunjigo ga ezhewabizzewânánigo keche ezhe meenwandumán .
50004012	Neenkekandán ga ezhe ketemágizzeyán , neenkekandán giya ga ezhe wânuttizzeyán , mizzewa kokkinná kago , neenguhgekemigo che tabissineyán , giya che buhkuttayán , che wânuttizzeyán giya che ketemágizzeyán .
50004013	Kokkinná kago neendá totum Christ ōnje , ween sōngeit .
50004014	Kegemennototám uhge be-ezhe názhuhumag , magwouh kotuhgitoyán .
50004015	Binná keenowâ Phillippianewetōk , kekandumōk o-o , ope Macedoniaink wanje májáyán owwe guhgequayán meenwâjemowin , kâ oweuh anumeájig kago neengemenigooseeg keenowâ atuh .
50004016	Magwouh Thessalonicaink iáyán neezhink kege be-ezhenázhuhumowint magwouh uhmuhnazeyán .
50004017	Kâween ween eu ōnje ōnjittágo nundowandumán kago che menigoyán , neennundowandán , natáwigink keenowâ che ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeyag .
50004018	Nebewá ween neendián , nemooshkena , Epaphroditus neenge menik ono iuheen gá be-ezhenázhuhumag , wâshkobemágwukin , sáságewitchegun , niandumeigoot ukko Kitche Manito .
50004019	Neenkitche Manitōmdush ween keguh tabuhonigowâ kokkinná azhe nundowandumag azhewânuttizzit kitchetwâwizzewinink Jesus Christ .
50004020	Nōngumdush Kitche Manito Kosenán tuh gitchetwâweá gâgineek . Amen .
50004021	Uhnummekowwik kokkinná anumeájig Jesus Christ ōnje . Wekânissemág wâjewidjig ketuhnemikágowâg .
50004022	Kokkinná anumeájig ketuhnemikágowâg , kekinnowâch uhgew Caesar andussogat .
50004023	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin kokkinná keguh wejewigōnâwâ . Amen .
51001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kitche Manito otenandumowin ōnje , Timotheus giya nekânissenán ,
51001002	Otoshebeumowâwân anumeánidjin mashkâwandungig wekânissemág Jesus Christ ōnje Colosseink andánuhkejig : keguh shâwandágoozim innuhwandewin Kitche Manito ōsemá máno keguh shâwanemigowâ Kekitche Manitomenán giya Jesus Christ .
51001003	Megwach neendenáná Kitche Manito , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun , mozhuk uhnumeatumágoyag .
51001004	Ako nōndumáng kemushkâwandumowinewá Christ Jesus ōnje ságeittewindush ayáyag kokkinná mámowy anumeájig .
51001005	Buhgoosanenmowin onje keenowâ atágoeyag gezhigōnk , eu gá nōndumag kiut quiuk tabwawin guhgequawinink .
51001006	Eu watissigoyag , azhewabuk keowwewâng e-e gezhigut gá áko nōndumag áko kekandumag Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin tabwawinink .
51001007	Gá ezhe kekandumag Epaphras ōnje neejuhnoketâgaweninnemenán ween quiuk gagekiminág Christ oguhgequawin .
51001008	Ween quiukwândumowweumint kesâge-ewawinewâ azhe sâgeyâng Ochichâgomá ōnje .
51001009	Eu ōnje neenowint giya , gá áquo nōndumáng mozhuk ketuhnumeatumoneme konemá ketámooshkenashkágōm kekandumowin otenandumowin kokkinná nebwâkâwinink ochichâgomá nissetotumowinink :
51001010	Konemá ga ezhe niandumeag , Kitche Manito ketá enosam netáwigitōg kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewin ashkum mushkâwandumag Kitche Manito otenandumowinink .
51001011	Mushkâwizzig kokkinná mushkâwizzewinink azhe mushkâwizzeet omushkâwizzewinink beoeyunk , keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgitōng mennowânegoozewinink .
51001012	Mámoyewumik oōsemá ween gá ezheinunk che ta apetandágoozeyunk che otâpenumunk ánint tebáumatewin mámowy anumeájig wâsayázewinink .
51001013	Ween gá bemájeinunk mushkâwizzewin kushkedibbikut che ge banájeigoeyungobun , kegebenigonán otogemáwewinink siágeájin Oguisun :
51001014	Ween gá bemájeinunk omisqueem ōnje , uhmennoweshâwanjegat mutche izzhewabizzewinun :
51001015	Ween azhenágoozit Kitche Manito wiábomásewint azhenágoozit , netam gá negit kokkinná bamátizzidjig .
51001016	Ween kokkinná kago gá ozhetōt gezhigōnk ayágin , giya ákeeng ayágin ; ono iuheen kashketōng che wâbundumink , giya kashketoseeng che wâbundumink , námátábewinun , ogemáwewinun , mushkâwizzewinun ; kokkinná kago iuheen ween gá ozhetōt weenigo gá ozhetázoot ;
51001017	Ween negânizze kokkinná kago , ween manjimenunk kokkinná kago :
51001018	Ween oshtegwánewit weow , weowdush me uhnumeawin ; ween wiazhkut miájetáng , ween netam gá negit gá nabojig : me e-e kokkinnágo kago iuheen ween netam ;
51001019	Ge ezhe niandum oōsemá kokkinná kago ween oguh tebandán ;
51001020	Innuhwandewin uhge ozhetöt , omisqueem giya uhge suhsuhgáquo-ōnt ōnje , che niandumonittizzōt kokkinná kago ween ōnje , iuheen gezhigōnk ayágin giya iuheen ákeeng ayágin .
51001021	Keenowâdush ningōtink gá miátáwizzeyag kemutche uhnokewinewán ōnje nōngumdush kegetotágowâ che innowamag .
51001022	Oweow giya oweyâs ōnje , nebowinink , che ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeyag , ningōt che anandágoozissewag anosumeet .
51001023	Kishpin mozhuk mushkâwandumag , mushkâwegábowweyag che nundowandumag meenwâjemowin eu gá nōndumag eu kokkinná gagekemintwá anámiuhe gezhigōnk ayájig , neen Paul gá ezhe guhgequayán .
51001024	Nōngumdush nemennowânegooz neenkotuhgitowin keenowâ ōnje , nemooshkenatōn e-e pichenuk ga izzhewabuk Christ oguhgwátuhgitowin e-e neweyâsink uhnumeawin ōnje me eu Christ weow .
51001025	Neenge ezhichegâz che uhnoketumán meenwâjemowin , Kitche Manito otinuhnokewin gá menigoyán keenowâ ōnje che tabwatoyán Kitche Manito odikittōwin .
51001026	Kiátukin iuheen wiazhkut wazhetōnk áke wanje gátōngin , nōngumdush wâbunduháwug anumeájig .
51001027	Kitche Manito oguh kekandumonán uhwânutuk o-o gitchetwâwizzewin o-o giátuk magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig eu Christ ayát keowwewâng buhgoosanemowin kitchetwâwizzewin .
51001028	Ween tapájemungid , guhgâzomintwâ kokkinná aninnewug kuhgekemintwâ kokkinná aninnewug kokkinná nebwâkâwin konemá kokkinná aninnewug tá benáwug Christ uzzhiát .
51001029	Me o-o wanje uhnokeyán omushkâwizzewin ōnje eu anokemuhguk ápiche neowwink .
51002001	Keguh kekandumonenim azhe kitche megâzoyán keenowá ōnje uhgewedush ōnje Laodiceaink ayájig kokkinná giya wekâ wiábomissigook neskezhigōnk .
51002002	Konemá ta mennowânegwandumōg otaewâng , konemá tá mámowy sâgeittewug , konemá otá kekandánâwân kiátukin , Kitche Manito Oōsemá , giya Jesus Christ kiátojin .
51002003	Weenowâ weowwewâng kokkinná wânuttizzewin nebwâkâwin , kekandumowin gáchegâtawun .
51002004	O-o neendikit kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoose kuhgianizzewinink .
51002005	Ahnuh kewejewisinonim neowwink kewejewinimdush ween ochichâgomá nemeenwandum uhwâbominuhgook azhe mennoizzhewabizzeyag azbe mushkâwandumag nebwâkâwin Christink .
51002006	Gá ezhe otâpinagigo Jesus Christ Kitche Manito azhewabizzitigo izzhewabizzig .
51002007	Keguh monoōgōm keguh ozheigōm ween ōnje , mushkâwizzeeg mushkâwandumowinink ga ezhe guhgekimigoeyag mozhuk megwach che ekettōnk .
51002008	Tuttebábig kago oweuh aninne keguh banájeigoosewâ kuhgianizzewinink ōnje , ono gata gegetowinun ōnje , ákeeng ezhetwâwin ōnje , kâween Jesus Christ ōnje .
51002009	Ween weow me kokkinná Kitche Manito omooshkenawin .
51002010	Keenowâdush kege ozheigōm kemennoizzhewabizzim ween ōnje , ween onegânizzekundán kokkinná mushkâwizzewin .
51002011	Ween gá ōnje gewetázhegâzoeyag gewetázhowin oninjemá gá ōnje oschichegâtasinōk , uhgesekumink weow mutcheizzhewabizzewin weyâsemá Christ ogewetázhowin ōnje .
51002012	Kemámowy ningwuhogōm baptizewawinink , giva kewejeabejebánáwâ uhtabwatumink Kitche Manito otuhnokewin ōnje ween gá ábejebáigoojin nebowinink ōnje .
51002013	Keenowâdush gá neboyagobun kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâng uhgewetázhegâzosewag keweyâsewâng ōnje ween kege benigowâ bemátizzewinink mámowy , kegemennoweshâwanemigowâ kokkinná kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ .
51002014	Uhgeseumink ozhebe-egun machetotágoyângebun waomátáwizzemeyungobun , ningooche otininán osuhgáquoán ometigōmink .
51002015	Ope banájetōt ogemáwewinun mushkâwizzewinun , owâbunduhán mizznisshuh shágōchittewinink .
51002016	Kago oweuh aninne keguh tebákonigoose , weseneyun giya minnequayun , gamá kewekoongawegezhigutomewân , giya otōshkegezisomewân , giya ketunwabegezhigutomewân .
51002017	Ono iuheen kekinowâchichegawinun pichenuk ga tuhkoshinomuhgukin , weowwemádush me Jesus Christ ōnje .
51002018	Kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazheiggoose ketepáumágowin tuhbusanemowin ōnje uzzhuhnumeatowwintwâ Kitche Manito omezhinowamun , kago oweuh aninne ketwan guhtuh ezhe gânjeisse ono iuheen wiábundunzig kuhgepátizzewin ōmbásin oweyâse nágutuhwandumowin ōnje .
51002019	Uhmejiminuhzeeng ōshtegwânewunk , eu ōnje kokkinná weowemá iánekowwikkeeng , tákobizowinun azhe buhmichegâtag uhmámowichegâtag májegin , Kitche Manito azhe máje-egit .
51002020	Eu ōnje kishpin keweje nebomag Christ ezhetwâwin omá ákeeng ōnje , wagonan wanje o-o ezhe bemátizzeyag ákeeng owwâkánewinink .
51002021	( Kago tângenun kago , kago tângundun kago , kago tuhkonun kago ,
51002022	Ono kokkinná ga nebomuhgukin ayōngin , ) aninne azhe guhgándwat , azhe guhgequat ?
51002023	Ono iuheen nebwákâwinink azhenágwuk enandumowin anumeawinink , tuhbusanemowinink , uhpapámanduhzeeng weow kâween kago uhtuhgoosinōk quiuk izzhewabizzewin che niandumitōng weyâs .
51003001	Kishpindush weje ábejebámag Christ , nundowâbundumōk ono iuheen ishpemink ayágin Christ uhnámátábit Kitche Manito ogitchenikâng .
51003002	Attōg ketenandumowinewân iuheen ishpemink atágin kâween ween iuheen ákeeng atagin .
51003003	Onje kegenebōm kebemátizzewinewâ gáchegâta mámowy Christ , Kitche Manito uzzhiát .
51003004	Ope Christ ween kebemátizzewininán nâgoozit ; medush giya keenowâ , mámowy keguh mokeem ogitchetwâwizzewinink .
51003005	Eu ōnje banájetōg kebuhkazewinewân , uhnew ákeeng ayágin ; bisshegwâtizzewin , wenizzewin , mutche enandumowin , sáságizzewin , me eu sáságewinint muzzineneen .
51003006	Ono iuheen ōnje Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin ototissi gōnâwâ mache izzhewabizzidjig uhbenocheug .
51003007	Ono iuheen ukko azhewabizzeyagobun , magwouh kegebemátizzeyag .
51003008	Nōngumdush kokkinná ono kegegezekánâwân , nishkâtizzewin , mázheninewugizzewin , sheenganindewin , mutche geezhwawin , bisshegwâzetágoozewin , ketōnewâng ōnje .
51003009	Kago guhgenowishkindig kago , ōnje kegisikowâ gata aninne , otinuhnokewinun giya ;
51003010	Oshke aninnedush , kegebezikowâwâ , ween gá ōshkenánágwitchegâzōt kekandumowinink tábishko azhenágoozit gá ozheigoojin .
51003011	Kâ oweuh Greek , giya Jew uzzhiásig , gewetázhegâzowin , giya uhgewetázhegâzoseeng , kâ oweuh buhgwutch anishanâbag , kâ oweuh Scythian , kâ oweuh owwâkânewissewug , kâ giya oweuh tebanindizzosewug , Christdush kokkinná giya weowwinink uhbe .
51003012	Pezekumōk eu ōnje , Kitche Manito uhge onuhgiminág , manoizzhewabizzeyag , giya siágeigoeyag , keshâwâtizzewinun mennoizzhewabizzewm , tuhbusanemowin , nokâtizzewin , keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgitōng .
51003013	Che mennowweshâwanindink mamashkōt ; kishpin oweuh aninne kekândewât bazhek , tebishko Christ gá ezhe mennoweshâwaneminág ; me giya keenowâ ga izzhewabizzeyag .
51003014	Owushemadush kokkinná iuheen , bezekumōk keshawâtizzewin , me e-e tákobizzoon quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
51003015	Máno Kitche Manito otinowandewin keguh ogemákundágōnâwâ ketaewáng , eu azhe nundomigoeyag bazhekwunk weowwemá , megwech enandumōkdush .
51003016	Máno Christ odikitowin keguhgegishkánâwâ kokkinná nebwâkâwinink , kuhgekindink guhgânzōndink mamashkōt , nuhgumowinun ochichâgo nuhgumowinun uhnuhgumoyag sâgeag Kitche Manito ketaewâng .
51003017	Kokkinná menik aeendotumag , aekettoeyag , Kitche Manito Jesus otuhnozowinink guhtuh tuhgo , megwach uzzhenint Kitche Manito giya Oōsemá ween ōnje .
51003018	Wewemátook , buhgitinumowik keowwewân tebinowa kenâbamewâg quiuk azhe izzhewabuk Kitche Manitōng .
51003019	Onâbamemátook , sâgeikkōg kewewâg , kago nishkenuhwâ kagwânik .
51003020	Uhbenocheittōk tabwatowikōg kenegeigowâg , kokkinná kago , me o-o niandumeint Kitche Manito .
51003021	Oōsemátōk , kago nanibbekimákagwânik keenejânissewâg , che ōnje nishkâtizzewât keche ōnje shâgwanemosigwâ .
51003022	Uhnoketâgaweninnewetōk , tabwatowwikōk ketogemámewâg weyâsink , kokkinná kago , kâween ween oskezhikomá uhnokewin uhniandumeint aninne , meatuh ezheka otaemán uhgosint Kitche Manito .
51003023	Menik andotumag , quiukigo che enandumag totumōk , Kitche Manito ōnje , kâween ween aninne ōnje .
51003024	Onje kekekandánâwâ Kitche Manito ōnje keguhtebáumágowizzim : ōnje Kitche Manito Christ ketuhnoketowâwâ .
51003025	Weendush machetotunk , tuh tebáumágowizze , azhe mutchetotunk , kâ Kitche Manito oweuh pekinōnk otuhpetanemáseen .
51004001	Wagemahkundumag menikōg ketuhnoketâgaweninnemewâ , quiuk tebáumátewin , ōnje kekekandánâwâ uzzhogemámeyag gezhigōnk .
51004002	Mozhuk uhnumeág , ukkowâbig , keche uhnumeáeyag megwetch che ekettoeyag .
51004003	Uhnumeatumoweshinâng giya , konemá Kitche Manito neendá bákindanumágonán ishquandem , konemá neendá tebátotámin , iuheen Christ giátojin , eu ōnje me wanje owâkâneweyán :
51004004	Konemá neendá wâbundiewan ga ezhe gegetoeyámbán .
51004005	Nebwâkâkundow uhgew áqutchink ayájig , mozhuk che ōndumetáeyag .
51004006	Kokkinná kegegetowinewân quiuk ezhe mennogegetōk uhshewetáguniegâtag , keche ōnje kekandumag ga ezhe nuhquatowagwâ kokkinná aninnewug .
51004007	Kokkinná azhewabizzeyán , Tychicus keguhweendumágowâ , ween siágeint wekânissemá , nabwâkât gagequat , wejuhnoketágaweninnememá ōnje Kitche Manitōn :
51004008	Ketizzhenázhuhumonim o-o ōnje ketá kekanemigowâ azhewabizzeyag keche ōnje ni-issink ketaewân ;
51004009	Onesimusun newejeendáá , ween nabwâkât siágeint wekâ nissemá , bazhek keenowâ áwe , weenowâ keguh weendumágowâ kokkinná azhewabuk iuheen omá .
51004010	Aristarchus neejowâkân , ketuhnemikágowâ , giya Marcus , Barnabas ototowwamán oguisinne ; ( ween ōnje kege otissigōnâwâ dikittowinun kishpin beotissinág , beendegunik ; )
51004011	Jesus giya , ween Justus azhe wenint , weenowâ gáwetázhegâzojig . Meatuh uhgew ayeezh uhnokeyâng uzzhuhnoketumink Kitche Manito otogemáwewin , neenge niandummeiggōgdush .
51004012	Epaphras keenowâ bazhek áwe Christ otoskenegamun keguhgeninjenigowâ , mozhuk ketuhnumeatumágowâ ápiche otuhnumeawinink , konemá keche ōnje mushkâwegâbowweyag , Kitche Manito ga ezhe meenwandunk .
51004013	Neenkekanemá ápiche kenánáguttuhwaneminág uhgew giya Laodiceaink ayájig , uhgewedush Hierapolisink ayájig .
51004014	Luke siágeint mushkeweninne , giya Demas ketuhnemikágowâ .
51004015	Uhnumekowwikōg wekânissemág Laodiceaink ayájig giya Nymphas , anumeájig giya , owegewamink abidjig .
51004016	Ope o-o mazaniegun kanowâbunjegâtag magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , Laodiceaink anumeájig wâbunki-ikōg ; keenowâdush keguh wâbundánâwâ che weendumowwagwâ mazaniegun Laodiceaink andánuhkejig .
51004017	Enik Archippus , iyângwânmandun o-o uhnokewin Kitche Manitōng gá ōnje menigoeyun konemá ketá tabwatán .
51004018	Ketuhnemikágowin neen Paul tebinowa neninj ōnje : kunwandumōk neendowâkânewin , shâwandágoozewin keguh wejewigōnâwâ . Amen .
52001001	Paul , giya Silvanus , giya Timotheus , otozhebeumowâwân anumeánidjin Thessaloniaink , Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , keguhshâwandágoozim innuhwandewinink Kitche Manito Kōsenán ōnje giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ .
52001002	Megwach neendenáná Kitche Manito gâgineek keenowâ ōnje ;
52001003	Neenkunwandámin gâgineek ketuhnokewinewâ kemushkâwandumowinewâ , ketuhnokewinewâ kesâgewawinewâ , kebuhgoosanemowinewâ Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje anosumeet Kitche Manito giya Kōsenán ;
52001004	Neenkekandámin nekânissenátōk Kitche Manito uhge onuhgeminág .
52001005	Nemeenwâjemowinenán kâween atuh gegetowinink kege ezhe otissigoseenâwâ , mushkâwizzewinink atuh giya Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun nebená sōngeta-awinink giya ; azhe neenkekekandámin tinnouh aninnewug wiáweyáng magwouh uhgewejewináng keenowâ ōnje .
52001006	Medush kebe nopenuzzhemin Kitche Manitodush kege nopenánáwâ uhge otâpenumag guhgequawin kotuhgitowinink mennowânegoozewinink Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje :
52001007	Me o-o azhe kekinoumágayag che nopenuhnigoyag kokkinná tiabwatungig Macedoniaink giya Achaiaink .
52001008	Keenowâ ōnje Kitche Manito odikittowin ketwan nōndágwut , kâween atuh Macedoniaink , giva Achaiaink , kokkinná tuhnuhkewinun siswashkág kemushkâwandumowinewâ Kitche Manitōng , eu ōnje kâween ningōtono ketá ekettosemin .
52001009	Onje weenowâ tebinowa owâbundiewanâwâ azhewabizzeyáng , gá ezhe otissináng , gá ezhe ezháeyag Kitche Manito uhnuhgutumag kemuzzeninnemewân che uhnoketowag giágega bemátizzit quiuk Kitche Manito ,
52001010	Keche beimint Oguisun che tuhkoshinint gezhigōnk keche ōnjebánit ween gá onishkánájin ánuh ge nebonit me 'ow Jesus ween gá bemájeinunk nishkâtizzewin ga takoshinomuhguk .
52002001	Keenowaw tebinowa nekânissetōk , kekekandánâwâ gá ezhe beotisinág , kâween unishâ :
52002002	Gá eeshquâ kuhgwâtuhgitoeyâng kiut águtátuhkumik neengetotágomin , azhe kekandumag , Philippiink , neenge sōngeta-amin Neenkitche Manitomenán ōnie , owwe guhgekiminág Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowin nebená kekândewinink .
52002003	Neenguhgequawininán , kâween kuhgianizzewinewunzenōn , kâ giya weenizzewinewunzenōn :
52002004	Azheumintigo Kitche Manito keche ezhe buhgitinumáng neowwenánin meenwâjemowinink , me azhe gegetoeyáng , káween ween uhniandumeint aninne , aniandumeint , Kitche Manito ween kagwadebandunk otaemán .
52002005	Kâween kuhgiazhetágoozewin neengeiosemin azhe kekandumag , kâ neenge iásemin uhgwewin suhságizzewin Kitche Manito okekandán .
52002006	Kâ giya neengenundowâbunduhzemin aninne ogitchetwâwizzewin , kâ giya keenowâ ōnje , kâ giya oweuh ánint , ope ga ge bwâwuhnanángebun Christ anonájin uhzháweyáng .
52002007	Neembakâtizzemindush ween , magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag uzzhiáeyáng tibishko ogemá azhe kunwanemát onejânisun .
52002008	Onjedush uhságeinunk ápiche , neenge enandámin che menináng kâween atuh Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowin , tebinowa neenchichâgonánig , giya ōnje e-e gitche sâgeinemin .
52002009	Kekunwandánâwâ nekânissetōk neenduhnokewininán giya neembabámátizzewininán , uhnokeeng tibbikuk , gezhiguk , ōnje , keguhgekimineme Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowin :
52002010	Keenowâ kekekandanâwâ , Kitche Manito giya okekandán , quiuk azhe mennoizzhewabizzeyâng , ningōtono che ezhe mutche igoosewâng azhe kunwanindizzoyâng magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag .
52002011	Azhe kekandumag azhewâweendumonáng keche ōnje nuhniandumag , ( oōsemá andotowât onejânisun , )
52002012	Keche ōnje enosayag Kitche Manito ga ezhe niandunk , ween gá nundominág , otogemáwinink , ogitchetwâwizzewinink .
52002013	O-o ōnje megwech neendenánán Kitche Manito gâgineek , ōnje me Kitche Manito odikittowin , gá ezhe nōndowweyáng ; kâween aninne odikittowin , ketizzhe otâpenuhzeenâwâ , ketizzhe otâpenánâwâgo Kitche Manito azhe odikittowinit , eu ano kemuhguk keowwewâng , menik tiabwatumag .
52002014	Keenowâ , nekânissetōk , kege nopenutánâwâ Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin , Judeaink ayágin , Christ Jesus weowwink ōnje kege ōnje kuhgwâtuhgitōm , tebinowa wâjetuhkewamag ōnje , tábishko gá izzhewabizzewât Jewun ōnje ;
52002015	Niyazh ogenesáwân Kitche Manitōn Jesusun , giya omamándáwizzemewân , giya neengemutchetotágonánig ; kâ oniandumeásewân Kitche Manitōn onishkanemáwân kokkinná aninnewun :
52002016	Uhgenáumowweumintwâ che guhnonungidwâ miátáwizzidjig keche ōnje bemátizzewâpun , omooshkenatōnâwâ omutcheizzhewabizzewinewân , gâgineek , nishkâtizzewin ototissigōnâwâ ápiche .
52002017	Neenowintdush nekânissenátōk , azhe otâpenumágoeyag , neowwenánin wiebuh , kâween ween neendainánin , ashkum neenundowandamin , che wâbominág keskezhikowâng .
52002018	Ahpiche neenge enandámin owwe beotisináng , ( neen Paul ) nuhningim , Mutche Manito neennuhgânigonán .
52002019	Owwagonan apanemoeyâng , nemojegandumowininán , wagonan neweoquâninán mennowânegoozewin ? Kânuh ween keenowâ , anosumeet Jesus Christ ope tuhkoshin ?
52002020	Keenowâ neengitchetwâwizzewininán nemojegandumowininán .
52003001	Eu ōnje ope kashketōsewâng che beoeyâng owushema , neendenándámin nowutch tá onissheshin che nuhgunigoeyáng Athensink ezheka ,
52003002	Timotheusdush nekânissenán neenge ezhenázhowâ uzzhiá eyag , Kitche Manitōn anoketowwât neejuhnoketâgaweninnemenán , Christ omeenwâjemowinink , konemá ketá sōngeigowâ , keche mushkâwandumag keche niandumag ketátotágowâ ;
52003003	Ká oweuh aninne tá ōnje bejenittáse , o-o suhnágizzewinun ōnje , keenowâ tebinowa kekekandánâwâ quiuk keche iyáeyunk ono .
52003004	Onjittá magwouh uhwejewinág , kege-eninnemin kiut , keche iyáeyag ono suhnágizzewinun ; tebishko gá izzhewabuk azhe kekandumag .
52003005	O-o ōnje , ope kashketōsewân kiábe keenwazh che beoeyán , neenge uhnoke owwe kekandumán kemushkâwandumowinewâ , neennuhnezânandánábun kagwadebaningat , che guhgwadebaneminág neenduhnokewininán tá banátuk .
52003006	Timotheusdush uhge ōnjebát uzzhiáyag , uhge beotissheumint neenge betágonán mennoinnuhkumigut keenowâ ōnje , kemushkâwandumowinewâ kegeshawâtizzewinewâ , gâgineekdush kemennonáguttuhwanememin kewewâbomindush , giya neenowint azhewâbominág ;
52003007	Eu ōnje , nekânissetōk , kegenánáguttuhwane ineme kokkinná neensuhnágizzewinenán neenkushkandumowinenán , kemushkâwandumowinewâ ōnje ;
52003008	Nōngumdush neembemátizzemin uhmushkâwegâboweyag Kitche Manitōng ōnje .
52003009	Ahneen minowâ ga ge ezhe megwacheweungid Kitche Manito keenowâ ōnje kokkinná mennowânegoozewin keenowâ wanje mennowânegoozeyâng anosumeet Kitche Manito ;
52003010	Dibbikuk , gezhiguk giya , neenduhnumeamin owwewâbomináng keskezhigōnk , konemá tá ōnje gezhetám , eu nandowandumink kemushkâwandumowinewân ?
52003011	Binná ween Kitche Manito tebinowa Kōsenán giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , máno neenguh wâbundiegonán ga ezhe otissináng .
52003012	Máno Kitche Manito keguh totágowâ ashkum che sáságeitteyag giya kokkinná aninnewug , che sâgeagwâigo , azhe sâgeináng ;
52003013	Keche mushkâwissetōt ketaewân , konemá kâween oweuh ningōt kegiegoosewâ kemennoizzhewabizzewinewâ ōnje anosumeet Kitche Manito , ween 'ow Nōsenán , ope Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ takoshink mámowy kokkinná anumeánidjin .
52004001	Owushema minowâ keguhgâzominenim , nekânissetōk , Kitche Manito Jesus ōnje , azhe nōndowweyâng azhewabizzeyag che niandumeyag Kitche Manito ketá tabwatám owushema che we totumag .
52004002	Kekekandám guhgequawinun mânináng Kitche Manito Jesus ōnje .
52004003	Me 'ow Kitche Manito otenandumowin ketá mennoizzhewabizzim , keche bonetoeyag bisshegwâtizzewin :
52004004	Kokkinná andussheyag keche kekandumag , keche kunwanindizzoyag mennoizzhewabizzewinink , giya kitchetwâwizzewinink :
52004005	Kâween ween kuhgebátizzewinink tibishko miátáwizzidjig kakanemásigook Kitche Manitōn :
52004006	Kago oweuh aninne ogùh ezhe wiazheáseen wekânisun kago ; ōnje Kitche Manito oguh buhshunzhawân kokkinná andotuminidjin , gá ezhe weendumonángebunigo kiut .
52004007	Kâween Kitche Manito kegeigoosenán che wenisseyunk , meatuh che mennoizzhewabizzeyunk .
52004008	Eu ōnje , ween biábápetōt ; kâween aninnewun obábápeáseen , Kitche Manitōn obábápeán , ween máninunk omenno Ochichâgwun .
52004009	Tuzzhinduminkdush wekânissemá-sâgeittewin , kâween ketenanduhzeem che oshebeumonuhgook ; Kitche Manito kege guhgekemigowâ keche sáságeitteyag .
52004010	Kagatdush kesâgeáwâg kokkinná wekânissemág Macedoniaink ayájig : ketinneminemin nekânissenátōk che sáságeitteyag owushema ;
52004011	Wekoochetōk pezân keche iáeyag ketinuhnokewinewâg enuhnokeeg , tebinowa keninjewâng uzzhuhnokeyag , azhe guhgâzomináng ;
52004012	Konemá quiuk ketá izzhebemosam , anosumewât uhgew áquutchink ayájig , konemá kago keche nundowanduhzewag .
52004013	Kenundowaneminenim che kekanemagwâ uhgew nabájig , keche ositáwanduhzewag ánint azhe ositáwandumowât uhgew buhgoosanemowin ayásigwâ .
52004014	Kishpin tabwa andumunk Jesus uhgenebōt minowâ giya uhge onishkát , ketá ezhe tabwa-andámin uhgew wâzeengwâmájig Jesusun , Kitche Manito onishkât minowâ .
52004015	O-oedush keteninemin Kitche Manito odikittowin ōnje , neenowint menik bemátizzeyáng uhbeoyáng Kitche Manito ope tuhkoshink , kâween keguh nuhgânáwân uhgew nebájig .
52004016	Onje , Kitche Manito ween tebinowa , gezhigōnk tuh be ōnje názhuhke , sásáquawinink , ogegetowindush kitche mezhinowa , mámowy Kitche Manito onōndágomutchegun , gáwejenebomájig Christun netam tuh onishkâwug :
52004017	Opedush keenowint , menik bemátizzeyunk kiábe mámowy keguh ōmbishkámin ánáqutōnk che nuhquashkowwunk Kitche Manito ishpemink ; medush gâgineek ga ezhe wejewunk Kitche Manito .
52004018	Eu ōnje niandumeittig mamáshqut ono ekettowinun .
52005001	Tuzzhinduminkdush ope gezhigutōn giya kekenonowinun , nekânissetōk , kâ anandágoosinōn keche oshebeumonuhgook .
52005002	Onje keenowâ tebinowa , kekekandánâwâ Kitche Manito ogezhigutōm keche tuhkoshinomuhguk , tábishko gamotishkid uhtuhkoshin nebádibbik .
52005003	Ope guhtuh ekettowât , innuhwandewin , wânuhkewin ; opedush gazhetiná banátizzewin oguh otissigōnáwâ tibishko izzhewabizzit equa bánenekajin , kâ tuh kushketōsewug che oshemowât .
52005004	Keenowâdush nekânissetōk , kâween kushkedibbikutōnk ketiáseem , e-e gezhigut keche uttimegoeyag tábishko gamotishkid .
52005005	Keenowâ wâsayá onejánisun , giya gezhigut onejânissun : keenowint kâween dibbikut giya kushkedibbikut ketáwissemin .
52005006	Eu ōnje kago nebásetá , ánint azhe nebáwât , uhkowâbetá uhnesátizzetá .
52005007	Onje uhgew nabájig , nebáwug dabekutinigin , uhgew gáwushquabejig dabekutinigin kewushquabewug .
52005008	Máno keenowint , gezhigutōnk ayáyunk , uhnesátizzetá , uhbezekumink uhgoōwin mushkâwandumowin uhságeittink giya ágōshtegwânaowin , buhgoosanemowin uhbemátizzeyunk :
52005009	Onje Kitche Manito kegeinoumágonán kâween ween nishkâtizzewinink , meatuh keche bemátizzeyunk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje ,
52005010	Ween gá ōnjenat keowwenánin , che ōnje , kishpin kooshkooseyunk kishpin giya nebáeyunk , ketá wetegamánán .
52005011	Eu ōnje , mámowy nuhniandumōk , uhmushkâwandumeittig tebishko andotumag .
52005012	Kenundowaneminenim , nekânissetōk , ketá kekanemáwâg uhgew wâjeuhnokeminágook anewishkonágook Kitche Manitōn ōnje , guhgekeminágwâ ;
52005013	Keguhsâgeáwâg ápiche otuhnokewinewâ ōnje . Mennoinnowandik .
52005014	Binná keguhgâzomineme , nekânissenátōk , quiukquanemikōk uhgew quiuk izzhewâbizzisigook , niandumeikōg uhgew nánuhmandungig , neezhokomowwikōg nánuhmizzidjig ; kago oweuh ositáwanemá kago .
52005015	Tuttebábig , kago oweuh mamáshkwut tuh totátissewug , nopenutumōk eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin , mennototowikōg kokkinná aninnewun .
52005016	Gâgineek mennowânegwandumōk .
52005017	Uhnumeág mozhuk .
52005018	Kokkinná kago megwechitumōk , me o-o Kitche Manito azhe nundowaneminág , che izzhewabizzeyag Jesus Christ ōnje .
52005019	Kago ikkoonázhowâ kago Ochichâgwun .
52005020	Kago pâpenotunkago ánwâchegawinun .
52005021	Kuhgwadebandumōk kokkinná kago ; mushkâwe meenjimenumōk eu wanissheshink .
52005022	Metágwietumōk kokkinná kago miánábomenágwuk .
52005023	Kitche Manito otinowandewin keguh ōnje mennoizzhewabizzim , neenduhnumeatowâ Kitche Manito che kunwandumonág kechichâgowân , giva keowwewân nánázh che tuhkoshink Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
52005024	Ween nandominág quiuk tabwa , ōnjittá bego tuhtotum .
52005025	Nekânissenátōk , uhnumeatumoweshináng .
52005026	Ubnumekowwik kokkinná wekânissemág ojeendewinink .
52005027	Keguhgâzominenim Kitche Manito ōnje o-o mazaniegun kokkinná anumeájig tuh weendumowâwug .
52005028	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin keguh wejewegōnâwâ . Amen .
53001001	Paul , giya Silvanus , giya Timotheus , otoshebeumowâwân anumeánidjin Thessalonianink , Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje ;
53001002	Keguh shâwandágoozim innowandewinink , Kitche Manito ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
53001003	Onjittá enandágwut nekânissetōk , megwach che enungid Kitche Manito , keenowâ ōnje ; ōnje kemushkâwandumowinewâ ashkum ápiche netáwigge , keshawâtizzewinewâdush kokkinná kitche bátienut , uhgeshawâtizzenotáteyag ;
53001004	Me e-e giya azhe sōnganemoeyâng keenowâ ōnje Kitche Manito otuhnumeawinink , ketenandumowinewân giya kemushkâwandumowinewân , kokkinná kemutchetotágowinewân kekotuhgittowinewân ;
53001005	Me o-o mizzhishshowenágwuk Kitche Manito otebákonegawin , konemá me o-o che nánáguttuhwandágoozeyag Kitche Manito otogemáwinink eu 'zhōnie kuhgwâtuhgittoeyag :
53001006	Quiuk izzhewabut ween Kitche Manito keche kotuhgeát uhnew gwatuhgeinágook ;
53001007	Che meninágdush unwashemonowin mámowy neenowint keenowâ gwatuhgitoeyag , ope Kitche Manito Jesus gezhigōnk benázhuhkeet mamowy okitche omezhinowamun ,
53001008	Magwa misquhkona ishkotang , uhkotuhgeintwâ uhgew kakanemásigwâ Kitche Manito uhtabwatunzikwâ Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ omeenwâjemowin .
53001009	Guhtuh guhgwâtuhgeáwug gâgineek Kitche Manito uzzhiát ōnje , giva ogitchetwâwizzewinink omushkâwizzewinink .
53001010	Ope tuhkoshink keche kitchetwâweigoot anumeánidjin , che mâmuhkâtandumowint kokkinná ono tiabwatuminidjin , ( ōnje neguhgequawininán gakekimigoeyag tabwatáchegâta ) eu gezhiguk .
53001011	Eu ōnje gâgineek ketuhnumeatoneme Kitche Manito , konemá keguh enanemigowâ che tá apetandágoozeyag o-o nundōndewin konemá oguhmooshkenatōn mennowánegoozewin omennoizzhewabizzewinink giya mushkáwandumowin uhnokewin mushkâwizzewinink ;
53001012	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowin konemá tuh kitchetwâwitchegâtag keowwewâng , keenowâdush giya ween weowwink , azhe shâwanjegat Kekitche Manitomenán giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ .
53002001	Binnah ketineninemin , nekánissenátōk , e-e keche tuhkoshink Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , keche mowōnjeittink keche iát ,
53002002	Kago ween wiebuh nuhningishkâ kago kenáguttuhwandumowinewâg , kago suhnágandun kago , kâween ochichâgománg ōnje , kâ giya gegetowinink ōnje , kâ giya mazaniegunink ōnje azhe , neenowint wanjemuhguk che enandumag Christ ogezhiguttōm bazhew uhtuhgomuhgut .
53002003	Kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoosewâ pâpish ; ōnje kâ e-e gezhigut tuh tuhkoshinomuhgusinōn meatuh uhpongeshinink netam tuhtuhkoshinomuhgut , 'owdush aninne mache izzhewabizzit , tuhnágoose , banáje-ewawin oguisemá .
53002004	Ween gagânjeát Kitche Manitōn owushema negânandunk weow kokkinná kago Kitche Manito atumink , kokkinná anumeatumink , ween Kitche Manitōng anuhbit Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumigōnk owâbundiewan weow , ween Kitche Manito uzzhiáwit .
53002005	Kâween nuh kekunwanduhzeenâwâ magwouh uhwejewimuhgook , kegeweendumonim , ono iuheen ?
53002006	Nōngumdush kekekandánâwâ eu nâgânigoot konemá tá ágooze , ope enandágwutinik che tuhkoshink .
53002007	Onje kiátōng mutche izzhewabizzewin ázhia uhnokemuhgut , weendush nōngum nâgânát ōnjittá oguh nuhgânán , nánázh e-e keche ikkoonint .
53002008	Opedush 'ow mache izzhewabizzit , tuh nágoose , 'ow Kitche Manito ga châgizzewâjin , ochichâgwun otonink ōnje , owâsazewindush uhtuhkoshink ōnje :
53002009	Ween tuhkoshink Mutche Manito otuhnokewinink , kokkinná mushkâwizzewinink , kokkinná azhe guhgekinowâtuk , kokkinná kuhgenowishkewinun mámuhkâtandumowinun ,
53002010	Mámowy kokkinná kuhgepázoondewin , mutcheizzhewabizzewin , weowwewâng uhgew banátizzidjig , ōnje kâ ototâpenuhzeenâwâ , sâgewawin tabwawin , che ōnje bemátizzewug .
53002011	O-o ōnje Kitche Manitōn oguh ezhenázhuhogowân kache sōngunk wuhnisshinowin keche ōnje tabwatumowât kuhgenowishkewin .
53002012	Kokkinná keche banájeintwâ menik tiabwatunzikōg quiuk tabwawin , uhmennowânegoozewug mutcheizzhewinink .
