53002013	Neendenandágoozemin megwach che enungid Kitche Manito keenowâ ōnje , nekânissetōk , Kitche Manito siágeinág , ōnje wiazhkut miájetáng Kitche Manito kegeonuhgimigowâ che bemátizzeyag , Ochichâgwun uhbeneinág ōnje , ōnjedush uhtabwatumag tabwawin :
53002014	Ketigowâ che tabwatumag tabwawin neenguhgequawinináng ōnje , me Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ che kitche kitchetwâweint .
53002015	Eu ōnje nekânissetōk , mushkâwegâbowik mushkâwe meenjimenumōk kokkinná gá guhgekimigoeyag , neengegetowininán ōnje giya nemuzzenieguninán ōnje .
53002016	Binná Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ween tebinowa giya Kitche Manito Kōsenán ween gáságeinunk , ween gá meninunk gâgega mennowânegoozewin mennomushkâwandumowin oshâwanjegawin ōnje .
53002017	Uhmennowânegotōt ketaewân uhtotonág che mushkâwandumag ketaewâng kokkinná mennouhnokewinun mennogegetowinun .
53003001	Squawchdush , nekânissetōk , uhnumeatumowweshináng , Kitche Manito odikittowin uhwânuhkemuhgut keche kitchetwâwitchegâtag azhewabuk keenowâ :
53003002	Konemá neendá ōnje bemátizzemin mázheninnewugizzidjig omutche enandumowinewâng , kâween kokkinná aninnewug mushkâwanduhzewug .
53003003	Kitche Manitodush quiuk tabwa , ween keguh mushkâwandumeigowâ keguh kunwanemigowâ che mutchetotunzewag .
53003004	Nemushkâwandámin Kitche Manito ōnje uhnáguttuhwanemigoeyag , eu andotumag giya ōnjittá gatotumag iuheen azhe guhgekiminág .
53003005	Kitche Manito máno quiuk oguh ezhissitonun ketaewân che sâgeag Kitche Manito , giya che 'zhegutanduhzewag che beyag Christ .
53003006	Binná keguhgâzomineme , nekânissenátōk , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , keche metágwaetowagwâ kokkinná wekânissemág mache enosajig ; káween ween azhe guhgekiminág .
53003007	Keenowâ tebinowâ kekekandánâwâ ga ezhe nopenuzzheyângebun , kâween neenowint neenge mutcheizzhewabizzissemin magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag .
53003008	Kâweuh aninne opuhquazhegunim uneshâ negemejissemin ; neenge uhnokemin suhnágizzewinink , tibbikuk , giya gezhiguk , che banájeissinowâng kago .
53003009	Kâween ween e-e ōnje mushkâwizzewin uzzhiásewâng ; ōnjedush kewewâbundiewamin neowwenánin keche kekinowâbomeyâng .
53003010	Magwouhdush uhge wejewináng uhge ekettoeyáng oweuh uhnokesig , kâ tá wesenese .
53003011	Onje neendenetágamin , ánint wâjewinágook , kâ quiuk enosasewug bápish uhnokesigwâ , uhmegooshkâchetáwât weowwewâng .
53003012	Uhgew towug anishanâbag , neenguhgâzománánig Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje , quiuk wawane keche uhnokewât , che mejewât tebinowa opuhquazhegunemewâ .
53003013	Keenowádush nekânissetōk kago iakoozik kago , quiuk keche izzhewabizzeyag .
53003014	Kishpin oweuh aninne tabwatunzik neendikittowininán azhenázhuhumáng o-o mazaniegunink , nánáguttuhwanemik 'ow aninne , kago wejewâ kago , konemá tá águtche .
53003015	Kago ween miátáwizzingin totowâ kago mikowwâmik , wawekânisingin totowik .
53003016	Ween tebinowa Kitche Manito keguh menigowá innuhwandewin , gâgineek , Kitche Manito wejewigowâ kokkinná .
53003017	Uhsuhgeninjenewat Paul tebinowa oninj , azhebe-egâtaggo kokkinná mazaniegunun , neendizzhebeán .
53003018	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin keuh wejewigōnâwâ kokkinná . Amen .
54001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kekitche Manitomenán gá Bemáje-ewat otenandumowin ōnje , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ apanemoeyunk ;
54001002	Neendozhebeumowâ Timothy , tebinowa neenguis , mushkâwandumowinink ; shâwanjegawin , keshawâtizzewin , mennoinnowandewin , Kitche Manito Kōsenán giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
54001003	Gá ezhe kuhquajemeyán keche uhbeun Ephesusink , ope Macedoniaink azháeyán , keche genuhumowutwâ , ánint keche guhgequasigwâ puhkán ezhetwâwinun ,
54001004	Keche enintwâ che bezindunzikwâ ádisokânun giya kuhgepáchegeezhwawinun , unishigo ōnje ōmbegizzeeng , kâweendush oweuh ōnje mushkâwizzisse mushkâwandumowinink ; eu totun .
54001005	Uhwaquiág guhgequawin keshawâtizzewin beneta-awinink quiuk enandumowinink , quiuk mushkâwandumowinink :
54001006	Ahnint ogegooshquaetánâwâ o-o , ningooche ge-ezháwug uhpapáguhgebázetágoozewát ;
54001007	Uzzhenandumowât owwe guhgequawât tebákonegawinink ; kâ okekanduhzeenâwâ aketowât giya anduhzhindumowât .
54001008	Neenowintdush neenkekandámin tebákonegawin 'zhonissheshink , kishpin aninne quiuk ezhe uhnokâtunk .
54001009	Kekekandámin tebákonegawin kâween quiuk izzhewabizzit aninne ge ozhitowâse , meatuh miázheninnewugizzidjig , mache izzhewabizzidjig , uhgew kakanemásigook Kitche Manitōn mache bemátizzidjig uhgew báneta-asigook , mache gegetōshkidjig , nasájig ōsewân , nasájig ogewân , nasájig aninnewun .
54001010	Bashequâtizzidjig , uhgew ayaquawidjig , uhgew gamotidjig aninnewnn , kagenowishkidjig , kagenowishke mushkâwegeezhwajig , kishpin giya bakânuk kago tuhgoog , bánátuk ;
54001011	Azhewabuk Kitche Manito kitche apetandágwuk meenwâjemowin , eu gá kunwandumonigoeyán .
54001012	Megwach neendená Jesus Christ Kekitche Manitomenán ween gá mezhit mushkâwizzewin , ōnje quiuk izzhewabizze uzzhenanemit , uzzhozheit che guhgequayán ;
54001013	Kagebáchegeeshwashkidjig , neendáwinábun , machetotágashkid , neengeshâwandágoozdush , ōnje uhtabwatunzewân , uhkekanduhzewân gá ōnje totumán .
54001014	Kekitche Manitomenán oshâwanjegawin kitche bátienutobun mushkâwandumowinink sâge-ewawinink Jesus Christ ga gishkunk .
54001015	Me o-o quiuk tabwa ekettowin , mozhuk tá tabwachegâta , Christ Jesus uhgetuhkoshink ákeeng , owwe bemájeát mache izzhewabizzinidjin ; neen bazhek owushema mache izzhewabizzeyán .
54001016	Me o-o wanje shâwandágoozeyán neen netam neendá 'ow , Jesus Christ keche wâbundiewat keenwazh okuhgwâtuhgitowin , obeowin , keche kekinowâbomewât uhgew ga tabwatowwâjig che gâgega bemátizzewât .
54001017	Nōngumdush Kitche Ogemá , giágega bemátizzit , kashketoseeng keche wâbomint , ween atuh nabwâkât Kitche Mánito , máno kitchetwâwizzewin tuh menittim , gâgineek . Amen .
54001018	O-o guhgequawin kemenin , neenguis Timothy , gá azhe ōnwâtumink kiut konemá uhgew ōnje , me ga ōnje mennomegâzoeyun kitche megâzowin .
54001019	Mushkâwinumink mushkâwandumowin , mennota-awin , ánint opemaiuhe gá buhgitinumowât uhge banájeittezowât omushkâwandumowinewân .
54001020	Weenowâ ánint , Hymeneus giya Alexander ; neengebuhgitenág Mutche Manito neengebuhgitenumowâ konemá che kekandumowât che mutche geezhwasigwâ .
54002001	Keguhgawzomin e-e ōnje , netam , uhnumeawinun , uhmegwacheweint , kokkinná aninnewug keche ozhetowwintwâ ;
54002002	Ogemág guhtuh ozhetowâwug , kokkinná giya nâgânizzidjig , konemá ketá bemátizzim menno keshawâtizzewinink , quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
54002003	Me o-o niandumeint Kitche Manito gá bemajeinunk ;
54002004	Ween anandunk kokkinná aninnewug che bemátizzewât , keche kekandumowât tabwawin .
54002005	Onje bazhek o-o atuh Manito , bazheko nowwiuhe ayát nussowiuhe Kitche Manito giya aninnewug , aninne Jesus Christ ;
54002006	Ween gá buhgittinunk weow , kokkinná keche ōnje bemátizzinit keche kekandágoozit ope ochichesag .
54002007	O-o guhgequawin neenduhnonigo che guhgequayán ( quiuk neendabwa Christ ōnje , kâ neenguhgenowishkese , ) keche guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidjig mushkâwandumowinink tabwawinink .
54002008	Eu ōnje ápadush aninnewug uhnumeáwât mizzewa , ōmbinumowât manoizzhewabuk oninjeen uhnishkâtizzisissikwâ giya ágoonwatunzikwâ .
54002009	Me giya tibishko equawug ga izzhewabizzewât , tibishko che ezhenágwutinik ga uhguewâjin , keche iyuhgutcheengwânewât , ozâm keche onánegoozissigwâ , kago keche kegishkunzikwâ wenesisewâng giya ozâwâ shoneá che uttosigwâ , giya megissun , che muttemásigwá , giya kache innuhgindag uhguewin ;
54002010	( Oweuhdush equa mushkâwitōt odikitowinun che sâgeát Kitche Manitōn ) menno uhnokewinun guhtuh uhnoke .
54002011	Máno equa oguh we kekandán keche pezân uhbit kokkinná tuhbusanemowinink .
54002012	Kâween oweuh equa neenguh enanemáse che guhgequat , giya keche weuhnewishkowâsigwá aninnewun meatuh keche pezân uhbewât .
54002013	Adam netam gá ozheint opedush Eve .
54002014	Adamdush kâween ge wiazhemáse , equadush uhge wiazhemint , mutche izzhewabizze .
54002015	Anewakdush , guhtuh bemátizze buhbenenekat , kishpin mushkâwandumowât keshawátizzewât , mennoizzhewabizzewât beneta-awinink .
54003001	Me o-o quiuk tabwawin , kishpin oweuh aninne enandunk che kitche guhgequaweninnewit keche mennouhnokeet enandum .
54003002	Kitche guhgequaweninnedush tuhwe kitche mennoizzhewabizze , tuh onábamemáwe bazhek atuh wewemá , tuh iyângwâme ukkowâbe , che bakâtizzit , tuh mennoizzhewabizze , oguh keshawânotowân miátáwizzinidjin , che menno kuhgequat ;
54003003	Kâ tá minnequase shomenâbo , kâ tá buketaegase ; kago tuh saságizzisse , kago tuh ōmbwatáse .
54003004	Wawane oguh kuhnowanemán andussotawizzit , kokkinná onejânisun oguh tuhbusse buhgitinán :
54003005	( Kishpin aninne kekanduhzik , ga ezhe kunwandunk tebinowa owegewâm , áneen ga ezhe kushketōt , keche kunwandunk Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin . )
54003006	Kago bâbega tuh we izzhewabizzisse ; konemá bâbega we kitche apetandunk weow , guhtuh pongeshin Mutche Manito obanáje-ewawinink .
54003007	Minowâ giya , mozhuk keche mennotuzzhemint guhtuh izzhewabizze , ono áqutchink ayánidjin , e-e keche pongeshinzik uhguttátuhkumik Mutche Manito onuhgwâgunink .
54003008	Giya weenowâ nâgânizzidjig uhnumeawinink kago tuh bizenách e-e izzhewabizzissewug : kâ oguh nezhotoseenâwân otanuhnewewân , kâween ozâm nebewá shomenâbo oguh minnequaseenâwâ , kago giya tuh saságizzissewug ;
54003009	Uhmejimenumink kiátukin mushkâwandumowinink , beneta-awin .
54003010	Binná uhgew netam guhtuh ezhe kuhgwadebanemáwug kishpin ge kekanemintwâ quiuk izzhewabizzewât máno tuh negânizzewug uhnumeawinink .
54003011	Giya owewewân , me go ga izzhewabizzinit , che bakâtizzewât , kago tuh netá tuzzhemásewân oweuh , che unisátizzewât , nabwâkâjig kokkinná kago .
54003012	Nâgânizzidjig anumeawinink , tuh onâbamemáwe bazhek atuh wewemá , che bumeáwât onejânissewân giya owegewâmewân wawane .
54003013	Uhgew gá negânizzidjig uhnumeawinink , gá mennoizzhewabizzidjig okushketázoonâwâ menno tebáumátewin , kitche sōngeta awin mushkâwandumowinink Jesue Christink .
54003014	Ono iuheen wazhebeumonánin uzzhenandumán wiebuh keche tuhkoshinán ;
54003015	Kishpindush keenwazh beoeyán , me che kekandumun , ga izzhewabizzeyun Kitche Manito owegewamink , e-e gâgega bemátizzit Kitche Manito otuhnumeawinink suhkáágun , áke , tabwawinink .
54003016	Ningōtono nuhkowa keche gweenowe eketoseeng , kitche apetandágwut Kitche Manitowewin , Kitche Manito weyâsink genágooze , quiuk ge ezhichegâzo Ochichágománg , mezhinowan ogewâbomigōn , tabwa-anemá ákeeng , ishpemink ge ōnje otápenegâzo kitchetwâwizzewinink .
54004001	Binnah Ochichâgomá gegeto , buhguhketágooze , eu opedush náágutch chegiuhe ánint tuh buhkawug mushkâwandumowinink uhwiazhemigowât kagianizzinidjin ochichâgomán Mutche Manitōgdush otisschichegawinewân ;
54004002	Kuhgenowishkeeng kuhgianizzewinink quiuk otenandumowinewân uhchâgizzegâtanik misquâbiketa ōnje ;
54004003	Uhgenuhumátink cheweweseeng , uhgenuhumátink che mejisseeng weyâs , eu Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt keche otâpenumink megwach keche ekettōnk , kokkinná uhgew tiabwatungig kakandungig tabwawin .
54004004	Kokkinná kago Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt onissheshin , kâween kago tá goosquanegâtasinōn kishpin otâpenumink megwach che ekettōnk :
54004005	Onje mennoizzhewabut Kitche Manito odikittowin , giya uhnumeawin ōnje .
54004006	Kishpin totowutwâ wekânissemág che kunwandumowât ono iuheen , quiuk keguh uhnoketowâ , Christ , uhsōngitchegâzoeyun ekettowinun mushkâwandumowin , quiuk guhgequawinink eu gá kekandumun .
54004007	Uhsheengandumun che nōndumun meendemoyá gegetowinun , iyângwâmandun keow , Kitche Manito otuhnokewinink .
54004008	Weowwemá uhnokewin kitche punge apetandágwut ; Kitche Manito otuhnokewindush kokkinná kago kitche apetandágwut , gewâweendumátim o-o , giya bemátizzewin ga takoshinomuhgut .
54004009	Me o-o quiuk tabwawin ekettowin , enandágwut kokkinná keche tabwatumink .
54004010	Eu me wanje uhnokeyâng uhmutche tuzzhemigoeyâng , ōnje neendabwatámen giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito ween Bamájeát kokkinná aninnewun , maminduhga tiabwatungig .
54004011	Ono iuheen guhgâzōn , guhgekin .
54004012	Kago oweuh aninne keguh pâpenotágose ōnje ketoskeneeg , máno keguh kekinowâbomigōg tiabwatungig gegetowinink , izzhewabizzewinink , keshawâtizzewinink , ochichâgōnk , mushkâwandumowinink , benizzewinink .
54004013	Nánázh che takoshinán , mozhuk kunowâbundun mazaniegunun , che guhgequayun guhgequawin .
54004014	Kago buhtubbenungan megewawin gagishkumun , eu gá menigoeyun ōnwâchegawinink ōnje , giya okewanzeug oninjewân uhbuhgitinumōkwâ .
54004015	Wawane nánáguttuhwandun ono iuheen , wawane kokkinná keow buhgitinumow , kebeejenizzewin konemá kokkinná otáwâbundánâwâ .
54004016	Tuttebábundumázo , iyángwâmandun keguhgequawin , o-o uhtotumun keguh ōnje bemájetōn keow giya uhgew bazindōkwâ .
54005001	Kago nuhnibbekimákan okewanze , menno guhguhnōzh tábishko waōsingin , ōshke aninnewugdush wawekânisingin .
54005002	Meendemoyáyugdush wageenginigo , oshkenegequagdush watowamáweengin , kokkinná benizzewinink .
54005003	Kitchetwâwanim shegág quiuk shágâwidjig .
54005004	Kishpin oweuh shegá onejánisit , giya oningwunisit , ozhimisit , netam tuh quiuk we izzhewabizzewug andáwât che mennototowâwât onegeigowân , me o-o azhe mennoizzhewabut kache apetandágwut anosumeet Kitche Manito .
54005005	Weendush quiuk shágâwit ketemágizzit buhgitinumowât Kitche Manitōn weow mozhuk uhnumeát nebádibbik giya gezhiguk .
54005006	Weendush omennowânegoozewinink azhe bemátizzit , ne bo magwouh uhbemátizzit .
54005007	Ono iuheen ezhe guhgekim konemá kâgwetch ningōt tuh enandágoozissewug .
54005008	Kishpin oweuh we bumeásig tebinowa tabanemájin , kekinowâch , ono tebinowa owegewâmink , otágoonwatán mushkâwandumowin , owushema mutcheizzhewabizze , azhewabizzit 'ow tiabwatunzik .
54005009	Kago oweuh shegá tuh otâpinegâzose chebwâ ningōtwâso metunnuh tusso kekenonowuhgizzit , bazhek atuh aninne keche gewewit ,
54005010	Wawane mennotuzzhemint mozhuk mennouhnokewinun , kishpin ge netáwigeát uhbenocheun , kishpin ge geshawânotowât ozittáne anumeájig , kishpin ge nezhokumowât gwatuhgitonidjin , kishpin ge ōnwâjeet uhnopenuttunk kokkinná menno uhnowinun .
54005011	Nowutchdush waskenegidjig , kooshquanikōk : ope go májetáwât che mutche enanemáwât Christun ōnjittá guttuh onâbamewug .
54005012	Onjittágo che banátizzewât ōnje owabinánáwâ netam omushkâwandumowinewâ .
54005013	Guhtuh enáshissewug ningōt che enábuhtizzissigwâ , uhpapámebi-ittewât mamashqut wegewamink , kâdush atuh ningōt anábuhtussinōk , giya 'zhozâmetonowát chánemutinig weowwewân uhtuzzhindumowât iuheen anandágoozisigwâ che tuzzhindumowât .
54005014	Neendenanemág eu ōnje waskenegidjig equawug keche onâbamewât , che netáwigeáwâtuhbenocheun , che kunwandumowât wegewam , keche menásigwâ miátáwizzininit ningōtono keche mutche gegetonit .
54005015	Ahnint ázhuh gezhá ge ezhegwaketáwug Mutche Manitōn uhnopenánáwât .
54005016	Oweuh aninne giya equa tiabwatungig , iáwâwât shegán oguh bumeáwân , kago anumeájig kago oguh tebáunzeenâwâ , konemá guhtuh kushketowug che bumeáwât quiuk shágáwinidjin .
54005017	Máno okewanzeug quiuk wagemákundungig , neezhink menik tuh kitchetwâwanemáwug , maminduhga uhgew anokejig uhnokewinink guhgequawinink .
54005018	Onje mazaniegun ekettomuhgut , kâween keguh gibbetonasewâ pezheke giákishkâwât mándáminun , giyadush , ween anokeet otáián otebáumágowin .
54005019	Kishpin ningōtono enint okewanze tuh neezhewug nissewug ga wetokâzojig che bezindowwintwâ .
54005020	Uhgew machetotungig genuhumow anosumewât kokkinná ánint konemádush tá kotájewug .
54005021	Ketizzhe guhgâzomin anosumeet Kitche Manito , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ giya gá onuhgiminjig mezhinowag che tabwatumun che kunwandumun ono iuheen , kago owushemá apetanemákan bazhek aninne bazkek apetanemut , kago o-o aeendotunkan .
54005022	Kago oweuh aninne kuhgatin ezhinekatowâkan , kago otâpenunkan ánint bakânizzit aninne omutcheizzhewabizzewinun : kunwandun keow , che benizzeyun .
54005023	Kago minowâ ween nebe minnequakan kiábe , punge go shomenâbo iōn , kemissut ōnje , ōnje nuhningim ketákooz .
54005024	Ahnint aninnewug omutche izzhewabizzewinewân negân nágwutinewun onegânemuhgutinnewun 'zhezhámuhgutinig tebákonegawinink , ánintdush aninnewug onopenánigōnâwân .
54005025	Me debishko azhewabuk giya ánint omennouhnokewinewán negân nágwutinnewun , uhgewdush ánint azhewabizzissigook , ká kushketosewug keche gátowât .
54006001	Mahno kokkinná uhnoketâgaweninnewug , menik anoketágawât oguh gitchetwâwanemáwân otogemámewân konemá Kitche Manito otuhnozowin giya otizzhetwâwin ningōtono che ittunzeeng .
54006002	Uhgew giya tiabwatuminit otogemámewân , kago oguh bâpizzhemásewân ōnje wekânisemáwewug ; máno tuh uhnoketágawug ōnje nebwâkâwug sâgeáwug ánintdush otián kashketōt . Ono iuheen guhgequan , guhgâzōn .
54006003	Kishpin oweuh aninne puhkân ezhe guhgequat , uhtabwaanduhzik wanissheshingin ekettowinun , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ odikittowinun ezhetwâwin azhe guhgekindink Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
54006004	Kitchetwâwanemo , kâ kago okekanduhzeen uhbábápezhindink ekettowinun eu ōnje me wanje keshâwanindink , nuhnânduhkoondewin , kekândewin mutche enandumowinun .
54006005	Mutche bápápezhindewin magwa anione mache enandungig , kago tabwawin uhtuhgosinōk , enandumōg bejenizzewin me Manito otenandumowin : metágwaetow uhgew towug .
54006006	Kitche Manito otizzhewabizzewin ezhe niándumink , kitche apetandágwut .
54006007	Onje kâween kago kebetosemin omá ákeeng kagat kaween giya kago keta májetosemin .
54006008	Kishpin tuhneyung ga mejeyunk , giya uhgweyunk , me go ga ezhe nuhnáandumink .
54006009	Uhgew ōnjittá ga wewánuttizzidjig kuhgwadebanindewinink nuhgwâgunink pongeshinōg , nebená bátáizzhewabizzewinun , kuhgebátandumowinun , uhnew banátizzewât aninnewun .
54006010	Uhsâgetōng shoneá me zhojebekâwung kokkinná mutche izzhewabizzewin ; magwouh ánint nundowandumowât , wunisshinōg omushkâwandumowinewâng shábobuttukuhotizzowug nebewá kushkandumowinun .
54006011	Keendush Kitche Manito oteninnemun , ozhindun ono iuheen ; nopenutun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , Kitche Manito otizzhetwâwin mushkâwandumowin sâge-ewawin , beowin , bakâtizzewin .
54006012	Megâzoon mushkâwandumowine megâzowin , meenjimenun gâgega bemátizzewin , eu wanje nundomigoeyun , kegemushkâwitōn kegegetowin mennogegetowin anosumewât nebená nōndōnungidjig .
54006013	Keguhgâzomin anosumewât Kitche Manito ween tatátubetōt kokkinná kago , giya Jesus Christ , ween gá gegetōt menno gegetowin Pontius Pilate ,
54006014	Che kunwandumun o-o guhgequawin , pâpish che ge tuhgásinōk oweuh che kushketōng ningōtono che enik nátázh Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ che nágoozit .
54006015	Ope ochichesanik , tuh nágooze , ween atuh sháwandá gooze , ween atuh mushkâwizze , kitche ogemág ogitche otogemámewân , Manitōg Okitche Omanitomewân .
54006016	Ween atuh otián gâgega bemátizzewin ieendát wâsayáng oweuh aninne keche kushketoseeng keche be-ezhát , kâ oweuh aninnewun wekâ owâbomigooseen ween tuh ōnje mennoizzhewabizzewinewun , tuh ōnje mushkâwizzewinun gâgineek . — Amen .
54006017	Kuhgekim uhgew wiánuttizzidjig omá ákeeng , kago guhtuh kitche apetanemosewug kago oguh ezhe buhgitinuhzeenâwân weowwewân o-o quiukquandágwusinōk wânuttizzewin meatuh giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito ween máninunk kokkinná kago ga ōnje mennewánegoozeyunk .
54006018	Keche mennototumowát che wânutizzewât , mennouhnokewinink che washowandumowát che megewawât .
54006019	Che nissetawizzewât otossowegumigōnk wanissheshink kago , keche uhtwâgunik kotátizzewât keche ochichesag ga tuhkoshinomuhgut konemá otá otâpenánâwâ gâgega bemátizzewin .
54006020	Keen Timothy kunwan bagitenumágoeyun che kunwandumun , metágwietun kuhgepáche nuhnândokoondewinun .
54006021	Ahnint mushkâwegeezhwang uhwunisshinowât mushkâwandumowinink . Shâwanjegawin keguh wejewigōn . Amen .
55001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kitche Manito otenandumowin ōnje azhewâweendumágoyunk , bemátizzewin Christ Jesus ōnje ,
55001002	Neendoshebeumowâ Timothy siágeinán neenguis , shâwanjegawin , shâwanindewin innuhwandewin Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
55001003	Megwach neendená Kitche Manito ween anoketowug gata nōsug , ōnje bánuk enandumowin ōnje gâgineek kekunwanemin anumeáyánin tibikuk giya gezhiguk .
55001004	Ahpiche kewewâbomin , neenkunwandánun kesebeengōn , konemá neenguh kitche mojegandum .
55001005	Ope maquandumánin quiuk mushkâwandumowin gagishkumun , me go eu gagishkunk kokomis Lois , giya keguh Eunice , giya keen giya kegegishkán neendenandum .
55001006	Eu ōnje kekunwandumonim che ōmbwatoeyun Kitche Manito gá menik gagishkumun eu gá menigoeyun uhbuhgitinumonán neeninj .
55001007	Kâween Kitche Manito kegemenigoosenán ochichâgomá gwasint meatuh mushkâwizzewin ságeittewin giya ápiche mushkâwâg náguttuhwandumowin .
55001008	Kago águtchekan Kitche Manito odikitowinink , kago águtanemisshekan Kitche Manito otowwâkânun aweyán , ánint otâpenun kotuhgitowin Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowinink , Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
55001009	Ween gá bemájeinunk uhgenundominunk menno nundōndewinink , kâween ween menik anuhnokeyung ōnje meatuh weenigo tebinowa otenandumowin oshâwanjegawin ōnje eu gá meninunk Christ Jesus ōnje chebwâ ozhetōng áke .
55001010	Nōngumdush mizzhisshowwenágwichegâta , uhgetuhkoshink gá bemájeinunk Jesus Christ ōnje , ween gá banájetōt nebowin , ogebetōn wâsayá bemátizzewin giya gâgega bemátizzewin omeenwâjemowin ōnje .
55001011	Eu guhgequawin neengeonuhgimigo che guhgequayán uzzhuhnonigoeyōn che guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidjig .
55001012	Eu ōnje máno neendenandánun ono iuheen , kâweendush neendágutchese , ōnje neenkekanemá ween uhtiabwatowug , neenkekanemá uhkushketōt che kunwandunk e-e gá menug , nánázh e-e gezhigut che ochichesag .
55001013	Mushkâwe meenjimenun menno ekettowinun , eu n'wândumowweyun , mushkâwandumowinink sâge-ewawinink eu Christ Jesus ōnje .
55001014	Eu wanissheshink gá menigoeyun kunwandun Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje eu gagishkumunk .
55001015	O-o kekekandán kokkinná uhgew Asiaink ayájig , neengooshquaetágōg uhgew wiáwidjig Phygellus giya Hermogenes .
55001016	Kitche Manito oguh megewan oshâwanjegawin Onesipho rus owegewamink , nuhningim neendunwashemonoik ká águtchese uhtákobizzoyán .
55001017	Magwouhdush ween Romeink uzzhiát , ge iyângwâmandum owwe mikowwit .
55001018	Kitche Manitōn máno oguhmenigōn che mikunk shâwandágoozewin Kitche Manito ōnje e-e gezhiguk , keendush kekekandán wawane menik gá uhnoketowit Ephesusink .
55002001	Eu ōnje neenguis , mushkâwandum shâwandágoozewinink , Christ Jesus weowwink .
55002002	Iuheen n'wândumun , neen ōnje magwaiuhe nebewá wâtokâzojig , me go eu ezhe guhgekim , mashkáwandungig aninnewug , uhgew ga kushketojig che guhgekemáwât ánint .
55002003	Eu ōnje kotuhge uhnokeen , wanissheshin Christ oshemágunisshemun che izzhewabizzeyun .
55002004	Kâ oweuh aninne nandobunidjin peendáunittizzose iuheen o-o bemátizzewin keche ōnje niandumeát uhnew gá onuhgemigoojin che shemágunisshewit .
55002005	Kishpin aninne mushkâwandunk che buhkinágat , kâ otáiá owwewoquân meatuh quiuk totunk .
55002006	Ketegaweninne anokeet netam natáwigingin oguhtiánun .
55002007	Náguttuhwandun aketoeyán Kitche Manito máno keguh menik che nissetotumun kokkinná kago .
55002008	Kunwandun Jesus Christ , David onejânisun , uhgeábejebáint nebowinink o-o nemeenwâjemowinink gagequayán ōnje :
55002009	Eu wanje kuhgwâtuhgitoeyán tibishko mache izzhewabizzit , 'zhōnje owâkâneweyán , Kitche Manito odikittowindush ween kâween tákobetasinōn .
55002010	Eu ōnje máno neendenandum kokkinná kago uhgew ōnje gá onuhgiminjig konemá giya weenowâ che iámowât shâwandágoozewin eu Christ Jesus weowwink mámowy gâgega kitchetwâwizzewin .
55002011	Kitche quiuk ekettowin , kishpin wejenebomunk giya keguhwejebemátizzemánán .
55002012	Kishpin weje guhgwâtuhgitomunk giya keguhweje ogemákundámin : kishpin ágoonwatumunk , giya ween tuh ágoonwatum :
55002013	Kishpin tabwatunzewunk , bōchigo ween tabwa : kâween ween tá ágoonwatunze .
55002014	Totow che kunwandumowât ono iuheen , guhgâzōm anosumeet Kitche Manito kago oguh tuhzhinduhzeenâwân guhgepáchegeezhwawinun , kâween ningōt tá ōnje mennoizzhewabusinōn uhnishigo che banájeintwâ uhgew n'wândungig .
55002015	Wekooche wâbundiewan keow che keshizzowwe uhnoketowwint Kitche Manito unoketâgaweninne uzzhuhgutchissik , quiuk onuhonittink uhnokewin tabwawin .
55002016	Metágwietun kuhgepáche ieendotumowinun , bōchigo owushemá guhtuh uhnemutche izzhewabizzewug ;
55002017	Odikitowinewâ guhtuh wesinemuhgutinnewun tibishko oweuh m'wâsakâjin ; uhgew ōnje , Hymeneus giya Philetus ;
55002018	Uhgew gá wuhnisshingig tabwawinink , ekettōnk ábejebáwin ázhia ge kuhbekosa ; ogwanuhbewabinánâwâ ánint omushkâwandumowinewân .
55002019	Kitche Manitodush ween oteshichegawin quiuk mushkâwegâbowemuhgut uhkekinowâch ekewussumink Kitche Manito okekanemán ween tabanemájin . Mánodush kokkinná wânzojig Christ otuhnozowin oguh buhkawinánâwâ mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
55002020	Kitche wegewamink kâween atuh ozâwâ shoneá giya shoneá otossowinun , ánint giya otossowinun metig , giya áke ; ánint che mennoizzhewabuk , ánint giya che mutche izzhewabuk .
55002021	Kishpin aninne metágwietunk ono kunwandunk weow che benuttinik , me 'ow ga áwit otossowin mennoizzhewabizzewin , onuhgemint tabandungig che uhnokânâwât , uzzhozhetát kokkinná kago mennouhnokewin .
55002022	Ozhindun oshkenowa náguttuhwandumowin ; nopenuttun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , mushkâwandumowin keshawâtizzewin , innuhwandewin , mámowy uhgew wiáweninjig Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , beneta-awinink .
55002023	Kuhgepáche guhgwatwawinun metágwietun , kekandumink uzzhozhetowât kekândewinun .
55002024	Kitche Manito otoskenegamun kâ tá kekâwetunze , oguh bakátizzetowân kokkinná aninnewun , mennoguhgequaweninne , bakâtizze ;
55002025	Oguh guhgekemán ono miátáwizzetágoojin , Kitche Manito konemá oguhmenowwesháwanemán konemá otá kekandánâwâ quiuk tabwawin .
55002026	Konemá tá ōnje bemájetōnâwân Mutche Manito onuhgwâgunink uhgew awâkânewidjig ween ōnje opego anandungin .
55003001	Kekandun o-o giya , squâch gezhiguttōn nuhnezânizzewin tuh tuhkoshinomuhgut :
55003002	Onje aninnewug oguh sâgetōnâwân tebinowá weowwewân , tuh suhságizzewug , tuh sōnganemowug , tuh kitchetwâwanemowug , tuh mutchegegetowug , kâ oguh tabwatowwâsewân onegeigowân , kâ megwach tuh ekettosewug , kâ tuh mennoizzhewabizzissewug .
55003003	Kâ oguh sâgeásewân otinnowamágunewân ; guhtuh muhmutchetotátewug unishâ , tuh bisshegwâtizzewug tuh mutchetaawug , oguh shinganemáwân ono manoizzhewabizzinidjin .
55003004	Tuhbuhbuhgitinumágawug , tuh gewushquawug , tuh kitche apetanemowug , oguh sâgittōnâwâ mennowânegoozewin , owushema ga ezhe sâgeáwât Kitche Manitōn .
55003005	Tuh anumeakâzowug , kâween quiuk tuh uhnumeásewug ; metágwietun e-e tinnouh .
55003006	O-o tinnouh biábeendega otamuhguk kemōch wegewamink kuhgepách equawizzhishug uzzhowâkânekang uhbwâwuhnawât mutcheizzhewabizzewinun ningooche 'znezhewinegowât omutche náguttuhwandumowinewân .
55003007	Mozhuk guhgekemáwug , kâweendush wekâ okekanduhzeenâwâ quiuk tabwawin .
55003008	Nōngum tibishko Jannes giya Jambres , gá ezhe nuhmuhchetowâwât Mosesun , me uhgew giya weenowá azhe nuhmuhchetumowât tabwawin , aninnewug bagishkunutinik onáguttuhwandumowinewâng , uzzhakewajig mushkâwandumowinink .
55003009	Kâween owushemadush guhtuh ezhásewug : okuhgebátizzewinewâ guhtuh mizzhishshowenágwitōm anosumewât kokkinná aninnewug tibishko uhgew gá izzhewabizzewât .
55003010	Keendush wawane kegekandán neembemátizzewin neenguhgequawin azhewabizzeyán anandumán , nemushkâwandumowin , keenwazh neenguhgwâtuhgitowin , neenkeshawâtizzewin , neembeowin .
55003011	Azhe mutchetotágoeyán , azhe kotuhgeigoeyán , Antiochink , Iconiumink , Lystraink ; menik kuhgwátuhgitowinun gá iáyán ; Kitche Manitodush neengebemájeik kokkinná .
55003012	Kagat , kokkinná menik Kitche Manitōn ga ōnje bemátizzewât Christ Jesus ōnje , me ga ezhe guhgwâtuhgitowât che nuhnândokointwâ .
55003013	Mutcheizzhewabizzitdush aninne , wiazhingashkidjig aninnewug , owushema ashkum tuh mutche izzhewabizzewug , uhwiazhemintwâ , giya uhwiazhindizzowât .
55003014	Iângwâmenun , ono iuheen gá kekandumunin quiuk quandumunin kekekanemá gá kekinoumōk .
55003015	Aquo uhbenoche-eweyun , kekekandánun azhebe-egâtag , eu kashkeigoeyun che nebwâkundumun ga ōnje bemátizzeyun mushkâwandumowinink Jesus Christ ōnje .
55003016	Kokkinná Kitche Manito omazaniegun , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun gá megewat kitche apetandágwut che guhgekindink quiuk che ōnje izzhewabizzink , che ōnje mushkâwizzink quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
55003017	Kitche Manito otuhnoketágaweninnemun , quiuk keche ōnje izzhewabizzit , wawane che gezhetát kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewinun .
55004001	Keguhgawzomin anosumeet Kitche Manito giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ , ween ga tebákonát bamátizzinidjin giya gá nebonidjin ope nágoozit otogomáwewinink :
55004002	Guhgequan , guhgequawin gágineek kuhgezhetá , mikowâm kesheguhnōzh , nebwâkâm , kokkinná keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgitowin giya guhgequawinink .
55004003	Guhtuh ochichesa , ope ōnjittá keche wenōnduhzikwâ quiuk guhgequawin ; tebinowa otenandumowinewân ōnje oguh otâpenumázōnâwân ga guhgekimigowâjin , che ge muhgizzewât otowugáwâng .
55004004	Ningooche oguh ezhe gooshquanánâwân otowugáwân tabwawinink , ádissokânun oguh otâpenánâwân .
55004005	Ukkowâbin kokkinná kago , wemámázhetōn kotuhgitowin , gagequat meenwâjemowin otuhnokewin enuhnokeen ; quiuk izzhewabizzin ketizzhetwâwin .
55004006	Onje neen gezhetá che sáságewitchegang neow , bazhew tuhgoo che buhkayán .
55004007	Kitche wawane neenge megâz menno megâzowin , neenge gezhetá azháeyán neenge kunwandán mushkâwandumowin .
55004008	Nōngum ōnje neendátwâgunikágo quiuk izzhewabizzewinne wewoquân , eu Kitche Manito quiuk tabákonegat neenguh menik e-e gezhiguk , kâween atuh neen , kokkinná giyago siágetojig otizzhenágoozewin .
55004009	Menik ga ezhe kushketoeyun wekoochetōn wiebuh che we' beotissheyun .
55004010	Onje Demas neengegooshquaetág , osâgetōn o-o áke Thessalonicaink ezhá ; Crescens Galatiaink ezhá , Titus Dalmatiaink ezhá .
55004011	Luke atuh newejewik . Otâpin Mark beweje-ew , neendábuhcheá ezhetwâwinink .
55004012	Tychicus Ephesusink neenge ezhenázhowâ .
55004013	Kitche beenzikowâgun gá nuhgutumán Troasink , Carpus gá nuhguttumowik , betōn , giya mazaniegunun , giya ângwâm uhnew koskeginōn betōn .
55004014	Alexander akeekwâbekokat neenge kitche mutchetotág , Kitche Manitōn oguh tebáumágōn gá izzhewabizzit :
55004015	Tuttebábum giya keen , ogitche nishkandánun kedikitowinánin .
55004016	Netam naquatumán , kâ oweuh aninne newetokágoose , kokkinná aninnewug neenge puhkawinegōg : neenduhnumeatowâ Kitche Manito ningōtono che enanemásik .
55004017	Kitche Manitodush ween neengewejegâbowitág neengetotágdush che mushkâweta-ayán , neen ōnje guhgequawin kokkinná tá ōnje kekanjegâta , kokkinná miátáwizzidjigdush keche nōndumowât : neenge ōnje bemájeigo , misshe bezhe otonink .
55004018	Kitche Manito neenguh bemájeik kokkinná mutche uhnokewinun neenguh buhgumewinink ishpemink gezhigōnk otogemáwewinink ; ween ga kitchetwáwizzit gâgineek . Amen .
55004019	Uhnumekow Prisca , giya Aquila , giya Onesiphorus andussotawizzit .
55004020	Erastus Corinthink geiá , Trophimus neengenuhguhná Miletumink ákooze .
55004021	Wekooche beotisshisshin chebwâ bebōng . Eubulus kesuhgeninjenik , giya Pudens , giya Linus , giya Claudia , kokkinná giya wekânissemág .
55004022	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ keguhwejewik kechichâgōnk , shâwanjegawin keguh wejewegōn . Amen .
56001001	Paul , Kitche Manito otuhnoketâgaweninnemun , Jesus Christ anonájin , azhe mushkâwandumowât Kitche Manito gá onuhgemájin , uhtabwa-andumán Kitche Manito otabwawin :
56001002	Uhnundowandumán gâgega bemátizzewin e-e Kitche Manito gagenowishkesig uhgewâweendumágat chebwâ ozhichegátag áke :
56001003	Opego gázhetát ge kekandumozhewa odikitowin guhgequang ōnje eu gá weendumágoeyán Kitche Manito gá bemájemunk gá ezhe guhgândwat ;
56001004	Neendozhebeumowâ Titus tebinowa neenguis mushkâwandumowinink , shâwanjegawin shâwandágoozewin , innuhwandewin Kitche Manito Oōsemá ōnje giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ gá bemájeinunk ōnje keguh otissigōn .
56001005	Me o-o gá ōnje nuhguninán Creteink ozhissitoeyun iuheen nandowandumingin che guhgegenutwâ okewanzeug kokkinná otanowun gá ezhenoumonán .
56001006	Kishpin oweuh ningōtono enásewint onâbamemáwit bazhek go wewemá , nabwâkânit onejánisun kakandágoozissig che ōmbegizzewât .
56001007	Nâgânizzit guhgequaweninne kâwekâ ningōt tuhenáse , tibishko Kitche Manito otoskenegamun kâween tebinowa anandunk , kâween agâch tuh nishkâtizzisse che meenwanduhzik shomenâbo , kâ tuhbuhketaegase , kâ tuhsubságizzisse ;
56001008	Oguh keshawânotowân miátáwizzinidjin oguh sâgeán quiuk izzhewabizzinjinidjin , tuh uhnesátizze , quiuk mozhuk tuh totum , tuh benizze , oguh tebáogandán weow ;
56001009	Oguh meenjimenán quiuk tabwáwin ekettowin gá ezhe guhgekemint , konemá oguhkushketōn swângunk guhgequawin ōnje che guhgemát che tabwatuminit ono uhnōch aetuminidjin .
56001010	Onje batienowug kagepájegágegetojig wiazhingashkidjig , mamwach uhgew gáwetázhegâzojig ;
56001011	Otonewân otá ge báánâwân owiazhemáwán ayándussotawizzinit guhgequawát iuheen anandágoozissigwâ che guhgequawât shoneá ōnje .
56001012	Bazhekigo weenowâ tebinowa omamándáwizzemewâ eketto , Cretianug gâgineek guhgenowishkewug , mutche áwaseug , babakekâtutinik omissutáwâg .
56001013	Quiuk tabwa wuhow : eu ōnje kesheguhnōzh uhgew anegōk che sōnguninik omushkâwandumowinewâ ;
56001014	Kago oguh bezinduhzeenâwâ Jewug otádissokânewân giya aninnewug oguhgequawinewán uhgooshquaetumowât quiuk tabwawin .
56001015	Uhgew bánizzidjig kokkinná iuheen weenowâ ōnje benuttinnewun : uhgewdush wânizzidjig , tiabwatunzigook , kâ kago benussinnewun onágutuhwandumowinewân wânutinnewun .
56001016	Omushkâwetōnâwân odikitowinewân neenkekanemánán Kitche Manito uzzheketowât , otuhnokewinewângdush otágoonwatowâwân , mázheninnewugizzewug , kâ tabwatunzewug , ogooshquaetánâwâ kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewin .
56002001	Guhgequan swângunk guhgequawin :
56002002	Guhgekim kakâjig aninewug , che uhnissátizzewât , che pezânizzewât , che tebuhmanemowât , che sōnguninik omushkâwandumowinewân , keshawâtizzewinink , beowinink ;
56002003	Meendemoeyayug giya guhgekim , tuh wemenowizzhewabizzewug ; kago unishâ oguhwe mutchetotowâsewân oweuh ; kago oguh minnequaseenáwâ shomenâbo , wanissheshink mozhuk tuh ezhe guhgequawug .
56002004	Oguhguhgekemáwân ōshkenegequan keche uhnesátizzinit , che sâgeáwât onábamewân , che sâgeáwât onejânissewân .
56002005	Che nebwâkâwât , che bisshegwâtizzissikwâ , keche uhbewât mozhuk andáwât , che mennoizzhewabizzewât che tabwatowâwât tebinowa onâbamewân ; Kitche Manito odikitowin keche mutche etunzeeng .
56002006	Guhgekim ōshkenowag che nebwâkâwât .
56002007	Wâbundiewan keow kokkinná wanissheshin uhnokewinun che kekinowâbomigoeyun , keguhgequawinink wâbundiewan mushkâwandumowin , mennonáguttuhwandumowin , tabwawin ,
56002008	Mushkâwegegetowin ningōtono keche etunzeeng , ween mache enanemit keche águtchit , ningōtono keche enissenōk .
56002009	Kuhgekim uhnoketâgaweninnewug keche tabwatowâwât tebinowa tabanemigowâjin che niandumeintwâ kokkinná kago che ázhetawetunzigwâ .
56002010	Che kemotissigwâ , che mennoizzhewabizzewât kokkinná kago , keche meenwâbomenágwitowât Kitche Manito gá Bemájeinunk oguhgequawinun kokkinná kago .
56002011	Onje Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin wanje betōng gâgega bemátizzewin ge nágwut kokkinná aninnewug che wâbundumowât .
56002012	Che guhgekimeyâng , che ágoonwatumunk kokkinná manitowunzenōk ningōt ánábuhtussinōk ezhetwâwinum giya uhnōch ákeeng ezhe bemátizzewin ; mozhuk quiuk keguh ezhe nunissátizzemin , mennoizzhewabizzemin , omá ákeeng ;
56002013	Keguh nundowâbundámin eu shâwandágoozewin giya Kitche Manito giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ che nágoozit ogitchetwâwizzewinink ;
56002014	Ween gá buhgittinunk weow keenowint ōnje , che bemájeinunk kokkinná mutcheizzhewabizzewinink , che beneinunk ween weow ōnje , gá onábominjig anishanâbag che mennoizzhewabizzeyunk .
56002015	Ono iuheen ekettōn , kuhgândwan , guhgequan kokkinná mushkâwizzewinink . Kago oweuh keguh pâpenotágose .
56003001	Guhgekim uhgew keche tubbussebuhgitinumowât weowwewân tabanemigowâjin , che tabwatowâwât otogemámewân , che gezhetáwât kokkinná mennouhnokewin ,
56003002	Kago oweuh aninnewun oguh mutche enásewân kago tuh megooshkâchetásewug , tuh bakâtizzewug oguh mennototowâwân kokkinná aninnewun .
56003003	Onje neenowint tebinowa neenkuhkepátizzeminábun ukko , kâ ukko neenge tabwatunzeminábun , newiazhemigominábun ukko , uhnōch enandumowinun mennowânegoozewinun neendenuhnokeminábun ukko , mázheninnewugizzewinink guhgâwanindewinik , neenshásheenganindeminábun ukko .
56003004	Gá kekandumángdush gá ezhe mennoweshâwanemát aninnewun Kekitche Manitomenán gá Bemájeinunk .
56003005	Kâween ween keenowint kemennoizzbewabizzewinenán ōnje , oshâwanjegawin atuh gá ōnje bemájeinunk , uhgesebegenumink ōshke negewin ōnje , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun uzzhōshkenágweinunk ;
56003006	E-e nebená gá meninunk , Jesus Christ gá Bemájeinunk ōnje ;
56003007	Uhgebenizzink oshâwanjegawin ōnje , kege sazekizzeigomin gâgega bemátizzewinink .
56003008	Me o-o nebwâkâwegeezhwawin , ketenenim keche guhgequayun mozhuk ono iuheen , konemá uhgew tiabwatowâjig Kitche Manitōn tá iyângwâmandumōg quiuk keche izzhewabizzewât , ono iuheen me wanissheshingin giábuhtuk aninnewug ōnje .
56003009	Metágwietun kuhgepách guhgwatwawinun , ádisokânun , nuhnishkâzetágoozewinun , guhgekândinkdush tebákonegawin ōnje , kâ ningōt inábuhtusinōn kuhgebátutōn .
56003010	Aninne tiabwatunzik meenwâjemowin , ningōtink uhgamá neezhink ge eeshquâ guhguhnonut , nuggush ;
56003011	Kekekandán eu izzhewabizzit gwakandunk , mutche izzhewabizze , banájeittizzo .
56003012	Ope ezhenázhuhumonán Artemasun , gamá Tychichus , keguh be-ezhá Nicopolisink gazhetiná ; neendenandum emá kopa bebōn che iáeyán .
56003013	Zenas gegetowemine beezh , Apollos giya uhpapámátizzewât , meezh kokkinná kago azhe muhnazewât .
56003014	Máno ketuhnishanâbamenánig menno uhnokewinun tuh enuhnokewug , konemá anewak tá ábuhtizzewug .
56003015	Kokkinná wâjewidjig ketuhnemikágōg . Uhnumikow uhgew siágeinungwâ mushkâwandumowinink . Shâwandágooze win keguh wejewegōnâwâ kokinná . Amen .
57001001	Paul , Jesus Christ otowâkânun , giya Timothy , kekánissenán neendoshebeumowânán Philemonun , ween uhgache ságeungid , neejuhnoketâgaweninnemenán ,
57001002	Giya siágeunk Apphia giya Archippus , keejeshemágun azhemenán , giya uhnumeájig kewegewâmink :
57001003	Keguhshâwandágooz , Kitche Manito Kōsenán keguh mennoinnowamik , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
57001004	Megwech neendená Nekitche Manitōm , mozhuk tuzzbemenán anumeáyánin .
57001005	Uhnōndumink kesâgewawin , kemushkâwandumowin , eu azhe sâgeut Kitche Manito Jesus Christ , kokkinná giya anumeánidjin :
57001006	Eu uhnokewin kemushkâwandumowin konemá tuh sōngun , ope anduhzhindumunin wanisheshink Christ gá ezhe mennototōk .
57001007	Neenkitche mojegandámin e-e kesâge-ewawin ōnje nekánis , ōnje kitche nebená kegemennototowâg anumeájig .
57001008	Eu ōnje , ánuh neendá sōnganim Christ ōnje ope guhgâzominán eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
57001009	Onjedush uhsâgeinán kekuhquajemin , ōnje Paul okewanze tinnowuh neendow , nōngumdush Christ otowâkânun neendow .
57001010	Kekuhquajemin , Onesimus neenguis ōnje , 'ow gá menigoyán magwouh uzzhowâkâneweyán :
57001011	Ween ketábuhcheásebun ukko , nōngumdush ketábuhcheánán niyazh :
57001012	Minowâ neendizzhenázhowâ ; eu ōnje mennototow , ween me tebinowa neow ;
57001013	Neendánuhwe kunwanemábun , konemá neendá ge uhnotumág magwouh uzzhowâkâneweyán meenwâjemowin ōnje :
57001014	Kâween ningōt neendátotunze keen atuh anandumun ; konemá wanepuzh ketá ge ōnje mennoizzhewabiz .
57001015	Konemá me eu gá ōnje máját wanebeek , keen keche iáwut gâgineek ;
57001016	Kâween ween nōngum tebishko bemetágunink , owushemadush che apetandágoozit , tebishko wekânissemá siágeint , kekinowâch mamindnhga neen owushemadush keen ōnje niyazh keweyâsink giya Kitche Manitōmink ?
57001017	Kishpin anowamewuhnan ezhe mennototewgo ga ezhe mennototoweyumbun .
57001018	Kishpin ningōtono ge ezhe mutchetotōk , mazinuhumōk kago , neen neenguhtebáán .
57001019	Neen Paul gá ozhebeumán tebinowa neninj , ōnje neenguhtebáán : kâween ningōt neendikittose menik keen mazenumowweyun , keowigo kemazenáumow .
57001020	Kagat , nekânis , máno neenguh mennowânegwandum keen ōnje Kitche Manitōn : mennototowweshin Kitche Manito ōnje .
57001021	Onje neenkekandán che tabwatowweyun wanje ozhebeumonán neenkekandán owushema che totumun menik aketoeyán .
57001022	Kezhá ozhissetōn wegewamink keche uhbeyán : ōnje neendenandum neenduhnumeawinun ōnje keguh menin .
57001023	Epaphras ketuhnemikág , neejowwâkân Christ Jesus ōnje :
57001024	Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , neejuhnoketágaweninnewug .
57001025	Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin keguh wejewegōn kechichâgōnk . Amen .
58001001	Kitche Manito , ge kitche nebewá tussink , oge guhnonán kōsenánin uhnánōch uhge ezheguhnonát mamándáwizzidjig ōnje ,
58001002	Ishquiách ono gezhiguttōn kegeguhnonigonán Oguisun ōnje , ween gá onuhgemint che tebandunk kokkinná kago , ween giya ozhetōn ákeeng ;
58001003	Ween wiákashkát ōsun ogitchetwâwizzewinink , anonájin manjimenunk kokkinná iuheen , ogegetowin omushkâwizzewin ōnje ope gá otâpenunk kemutcheizzhewabizzewininánin owwe námátábe gache tebákonegat ogitchenikânik .
58001004	Owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozewât mezhinowag , apetandágwutinne otuhnozowin , apetandágwutinik weenowá .
58001005	Owwananun mezhinowan gá enájin ningōtink , keen Neenguis , nōngum o-o gezhigut kegeōndin ? Minowádush , neenguh Osemik weendush neenguh Oguisenun ?
58001006	Minowâdush ope bánint ákeeng wiazhkut gá negit , eketto , kokkinná Kitche Manito omezhinowamun oguh uhnumeatágōn .
58001007	Tuzzhemát mezhinowamun , eketto , otochichâgokowân otoskenegamundush ototowân mishquuhkonag ishkota ezhenágoozenit otezheán .
58001008	Otinân koshá Oguisemán , kenámátábewin , Kitche Manito , gâgegasin : mushkâwizzewin ketogemáwewinink quiuk izzbewabizzewin .
58001009	Kege sâgetōn quiuk izzhewabizzewin kege sheengandán mutche izzhewabizzewin , me eu ōnje , Kitche Manitōm , Kema nitōm , kegetotág che pâpenanemoeyun owushema azhe pâpenanemowât kewejetuhkewamágunug .
58001010	Keen Kitche Manito wiazhkut miájetáng , kege máje ozbetōn áke , gezhik ketuhnokewin keninjeeng .
58001011	Tuh banátutōn , keendush gâgineek keguhtiá : tuh gatashkâmuhgutōn tebishko beenzikowâgunink :
58001012	Agwewinun batuhbinuminjin keguh ezhe buhtuhbenántuh gwakenágwitōndush : keendush me go gâgineek tebishko kekekenonowinun , kâtuh waquâsasenōn .
58001013	Ahneen uhnew omezhinowamun gá enájin ningōtink , neengitchenikáng enuhkuhkayá námátábin nánázh kemiátawizzemug che buhgitenugwâ anámiuhe kezitang che tuhkokânutwâ ?
58001014	Kânuh kokkinná uhnoketâga ochichâgomág áwissewuganoninjig che uhnoketowâwât uhnew ga tuzzhezhájig ishpemink ?
58002001	Me eu ga ōnje ápiche iângwâmandumunk kâwekâ ketáwe wuhnanduhzemin menik n'wândumung ningōtink che wunneshinzewunk .
58002002	Onje kishpin mezhinowag odikitowinewâ mushkâwesink , kokkinnádush bwâkobetojig eu ekettowin banátizzewug ;
58002003	Ahneen ga ezhe kushketoeyungobun che ozhindumunk papámanduhzewung o-o kitche ezhetwâwin , netam gá menigoeyunk Kitche Manito ōnje , tebinowa gá nōndowâjig kegeweendumágonánig ;
58002004	Ween Kitche Manito wâtotunk mamándátotumowinink uhmegewat Ochichâgwun ween azhe meenwandunk ?
58002005	Onje kâ oge buhgitenumowâseen mezhinowan minowá che ákewung eu enájemoyunk .
58002006	Kiut bazhek aninne ningooche gegeto eketto , áneen enábuhtizzit aninne , niágutuhwanemut , aneen enábuhtizzit Aninne Oguisun , uhmowutissut ?
58002007	Nowutch punge nōndás ketenuhgemá mezhinowag apetandágoozewât ; kewewoquânekowâ kitchetwâwizzewin , mennoizzhewabizzewin , kege buhgittená che tebandunk ketuhnokewin :
58002008	Kokkinná iuheen kege buhgitinumowâ anámiuhe ozittáng , opedush kokkinná anámiuhe buhgitinumowât kâween kago otishkobuhgitinuhzeen : kâ muhshe koshá kewâbunduhzemin kokkinná iuheen anámiuhe gá buhgitinumowinjin .
58002009	Kewâbománán Jesus ween punge nōndás gá enuhgemint mezbinowag , apetandágoozewât ōnje uhgwâtuhgitōt nebowin , owewoquânit kitchetwâwizzewin mennobemátizzewin ween Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin kokkinná aninnewun ge ōnjena .
58002010	Quiuk izzhewabut , ween kokkinná kago gá ozbetōt , ope nebewá oguisemán kachetwâweát ween bemáje-ewatche quiuk ozitōt kokkinná kago okuhgwâtuhgitowin ōnje .
58002011	Ween bamáje-ewat , uhgewedush bamájeinjig , bazhekowug ; me eu ōnje , kâ águtchese wekânissetōk uzzhenângomát .
58002012	Ekettōnk neenguh wâweendumowâg nekânisug ketuhnozowin , minowâdush , nowwiuhe uhnumeawinink keguh nuhgumotōn .
58002013	Minowâdush neenguh tabwa-anemá , minowâdush , binná neen , giya Kitche Manito gámenidjin uhbenocheun .
58002014	Onje oge otâpenán ánint misque , giya weyâs , uhbenocheeng uhbe ezhenágoozit , onebowin keche ōnje banájeát Mutche Manito ween mushkâwizzewin nebowin ayát .
58002015	Che bemájeát uhnew ako bemátizzewât gwatungig nebowin owwâkânigowât .
58002016	Kâween mezhinowag oge ezhenágwitōn weow ; Abraham onjânisun otizzhenágwitōn weow .
58002017	Me eu ōnje kokkinná iuheen quiuk izzhewabut che ezhetōt weow azhenágoozewât wekânissemág , quiuk che shâwanjega kitche sáságewitchegaweninne Kitche Manito azbe meenwandunk ge mennowweshâwandágoosewât anishanâbag omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ ;
58002018	Ween tebinowa ge kotuhgito , kuhgwadebanindewin okushketōn che nezhokomowât uhnew gwatuhgitonidjin .
58003001	Me ōnje , manobemátizzidjig wekânissetōk , ánint tabandumag gezhigōnk ezhetwâwin náguttuhwanemik anonint giya Kekitche Sáságewitchegaweninnemenán ween Christ Jesus ;
58003002	Ween quiuk totum azhe guhnonigoot anonigoojin tebishko Moses quiuk gá ezhe izzhewabizzit kokkinná andussogat .
58003003	Wuhow aninne owushemá apetandágooze Moses apetandágoozit tebishko ween wazhetōt wegewâm owushema apetandágooze apetandágwuk wegewâm .
58003004	Kokkinná wegewâmun aninne ōnje geschichegâtawun , weendush kokkinná kago wazhetōt Kitche Manito .
58003005	Moses izzhewabizze kokkinná andussogat tebishko uhnoketâgawenineeng gezhá che tebátotunk ono iuheen náágutch ga tebátotuminidjin ;
58003006	Christdush Oguisemáng enandágooze tabandunk kokkinná owegewâm ; keenowintdush Christ owegewâm ketáwemin , kishpin mushkâwandumunk buhgoosanemoyunk , bâpenanemoyunk ga áquo bemátizzeyunk .
58003007	Eu ōnje ( Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun gá ōnje ekettōt , nōngum gezhigut kishpin enandumag che nōndumowag ogegetowin ,
58003008	Kago mushkâweto kago ketaewân , gá totumag eu gezhigut gá kuhgwadebanemigoeyag buhgwuttuhkumigáng ;
58003009	Eu ope kōsewâg kagwadebanemewât , owâbundánâwâdush neenduhnokewin nemetuhnuh tuswa kekenonowin .
58003010	Me wanje neege nishkâtizzetowugwâ uhgew anishanâbag neenge eketdush mozhuk mutchetotumōg otaewâng , kâ okekanduhzeenâwâ neendizzhetwâwin .
58003011	Neenge guhgatinámowâ magwouh nishkâtizzeyán , kâtuh peendegasewug neendunwabewinink . )
58003012	Tuttebábig , nekânissetōk , konemá oweuh andussheyag kâ keguh tabwa-anduhzeen ketaewâng che buhkawinag giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito .
58003013	Kuhgekindig mamashkōt , gázhegukin magwouh gezbiguk , konemá oweuh andussheyag mushkâwâchegâtaink otá , mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje .
58003014	Kege ezheigomin ánint Jesus Christ otizzhetwâwin cbe otâpenumunk , kishpin mushkâwe meenjimenumunk gá áquo bemátizzeyunk ;
58003015	Magwouh uzzhiekettōnk nōngum o-o gezhiguk , k'shpin we bezindumowag ogegetowin , kago mushkâwâto kago ketaewân gá azhewabizzewât e-e gezhigut ope Kitche Manito nishkeint .
58003016	Ahnintdush ope n'wândumowât nishkeáwât : ánuhwuh kâween kokkinná Egyptink gá beōnje ságáungig Mōses ōnje .
58003017	Owwanan Kitche Manito gá nishkâtizzetowáwâjin nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin ? kânuh uhgew áwissewug mutcheizzhewabizzewin gá gegishkungig , uhgew oweowwewân buhgwuttuhkumigáng gá buhpongesininne ?
58003018	Owwanan uhnew gá mushkâwittowâwâjin odikitowin , che peendegasigwâ otunwashemonowinink , kânuh ween uhgew tiabwatunzigwug ?
58003019	Kewâbundámen che kushketosigwâ che peendegawât ōnje eu tabwatunzigwâ .
58004001	Umbasuh kotájotá , ánuh kewâweendumágomin che peéndegaeyunk otunwabewinink , oweuh bego ketá wuhnitomin .
58004002	Meenwâjemowin kege guhgekimigomin tebishko giya weenowá guhgequawin gá guhgekemintwá kâ ningōt inábuhtusinine uhgew n'wândungig kâ mushkâwanduhzewug .
58004003	Neendabwatámin che peendegaeyáng otunwabewinink gá ekettōt : gá ekettoeyán magwouh nishkâtizzeyán kishpin peendegawât neendunwabewinink : ánuhwe kokkinná ono anuhnokewinun gá énuhnokeeng ápinna wiazhkut gá áko oschichegâtag áke .
58004004	Me o-o gá iekettōt ningooche uhgetuzzhindink eu neezhwâswogwun , Kitche Manito ge uhwabe nazhwâswogwunigutinik kokkinná otuhnokewinink .
58004005	Minowâdush orná kishpin peendegawât neendunwabewinink .
58004006	Binná áquo átag , ánint ōnjitá tuh peendegawug , uhgewedush netam guhgekeminjig kâ ge peendegasewug ânga kâ tabwatunzewug .
58004007	( Minowâ okekinowâjeweendán bazhek gezhigut , ekettōnk David otonink , nōngum o-o gezhigut , ope keche wekâ , aketōtigo nōngum gezhiguk , kishpin we bezindumowwag ogegetowin , kago mushkáweto kago ketaewân .
58004008	Jesus kishpin gá menágwân unwabewin kâween otáge tuzzhinduhzeen , minowá bazhek gezhigut .
58004009	Nuhguttumowâwug unwabewin Kitche Manito otuhnishanâbamun .
58004010	Ween gá beendegat otunwabewinink obonetōn tebinowa otuhnokewin tebishko Kitche Manito ezhe nuhguttunk otuhnokewin . )
58004011	Wekoochetotá che peendegaeyunk eu unwabewin , kago oweuh keguh ōnje pongeshinzemin che ágoonwatumunk .
58004012	Kitche Manito odikittowin tuh tábuhtut mushkâwut , átuh wâbetayág uzzhowweshk , ezhe kená , bazhebowwuttingin bwâtocheshoongin ochichâgomá giya bemátizzewin ánekowwetuhnang , giya weembegun ; okekandánun otenandumowin taewâng .
58004013	Kâ oweuh weágusse ge oshichegâzōse opemaiube otinábewinink ; kokkinná iubeen bákisinōn oskezhigōnk niáguttuhwandungin .
58004014	Aquo iyáwunk kitche sáságewitchegaweninne ween gezhigōnk gá iezhát , ween Jesus , Kitche Manito Oguisun mushkâwe menjimenuntá o-o uhnumeawin .
58004015	Ketiáwânán kitche sáságewitchegaweninne kakandunk azbe sháwaneminunk : ōnje kokkinná kago ge kuhgwadebanemá tibishko andeyunk , wekâ mutcheizzhewabizzissig .
58004016	Umbasinno mushkáwanduntá che beotitumung shâwanduhze námátábewinink , konemá keguhmikámin shâwandágoozewin che nezhokomágoeyunk ningōtink suhnágizzeyunk .
58005001	Kokkinnah kitche sáságewitchegaweninnewug magwa aninne gá ōnje gá guhgegeninjig anishanabag gá onákonintwâ Kitche Manito otizzhetwâwinink che sáságewitchegat mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje .
58005002	Otá shâwaneman ono kakandunzinit kago , giya ono wanisshinidjin ween giya tebinowa weow azhe nenuhmizzeyunk ezhe nenuhmizze .
58005003	Tebinowago weow tá ōnje sáságewitchega tibishko azbe sáságewitchegaát anishanâban .
58005004	Kâ oweuh ototâpenumázoseen o-o kitchetwâwanemowin meatuhgo Kitche Manitōn tebinowa twâweigoot tibishko Aaron gá ezhe kitchetwâweigoot Kitche Manitōn .
58005005	Me giya ween Christ kâween tebinowa oge ezbetoseen weow che kitche sáságewitchegaweninewit uhnew koshá gá egoojin , keen Neenguis , nōngum gezhigut kegeōndenin .
58005006	Minowâdush ningooche gá ekettōt kesáságewitchegaweninew gâgineek tibishko Melchisedek andit .
58005007	Ween ogezhiguttomun magwouh gegishkunk o-o weyás ope gá uhnumeatowât Kitche Manitōn uhnew gashketonit che bemájeigoot nōndowâ ōnje uhsagizzit .
58005008	Ahnuh Oguisemáwe wanje tabwatunk okuhgwâtuhgito win ōnje :
58005009	Opedush wawane gá guhgekemint : gebe izzhewabizze uhkushketōt che bemájeát kokkinná tabwatágoojin .
58005010	Kitche Manitōn nandomigoojin tibishko Melchisodek kitche sáságewitchegaweninne ga izzhewabizzit .
58005011	Ween , kitche nebená kago neendián wâeninán kitche suhnágutdush keche ekettōnk ōnje kâ kenetánissetotunzeem .
58005012	Ta ápeech uzzhiegwouh tebinowa che guhgequaeyagobua kenundowanemáwâg oweuh keche guhgekemá netam Kitcbe Manito oguhgequawin , ánjigo kebe uhbenoche-ewin gache tanōneyagobun .
58005013	Kokkinná totoshâbo májidjig , kâ okekanduhzeenâwâ quiuk oguhgequawin uhbenoche-ewewug .
58005014	Sōngunk weyâs natáwegidjig omejinâwâ , uhgew kitche keenwazh anduhzhekungig we kekandumowât wanissheshininik giya miánátuk .
58006001	Me eu ōnje bonetotá Jesus Christ netam omeenwâjemowin umbasinno wewâweenga gezhetátá , kago weká totunzetá ga ositáwandumeigoeyunk , umbasino muskâwanduntá keche mikkowwoyunk Kitche Manito .
58006002	Umbasinno tabwatuntá baptizewawin guhgequawin giya buhgitinumátink oninjemáng giya ábejebáwin nebowinink giy gâgega tebákonegawin .
58006003	Me o-o ga totumunk Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunk .
58006004	Kâ tá kushketoseen uhgew ningōtink gá wâsashkumowintwâ , ningōtink gá gotundumowât gezhigōnk gá ōnje menintwá ochichâgomádush gá menigowât Kitche Manito otizzbetwâwin .
58006005	Gá gotundumowâtdush Kitche Manito omennoguhgequawin , giya mushkâwizzewin minowâ áke ga takoshinomuhgut .
58006006	Kishpin uzzhakewawât , kâween minowâ tá ezhe gwaketásewug mennoizzhewabizzewin , ōnje tebinowa otóshke suhsuhgáquowân Kitche Manito Oguisun uhpâpenotowâwâtdush mizzhishuh .
58006007	Onje áke manequat kemewunâbo naningim bowōnjesag wanje netáwigink kokkinná kago natáwigetōngin Kitche Manito shâwandunk .
58006008	O-o menasagâwunjeeg uhnetáwigewât wiyákotawuhgukkin wabinnegâta kagâ nánibbekinjegâta waquaiág áke ga châgetag .
58006009	Siágeinuhgook , owushema kemenno enaneminenim neendenandámin keche bemátizzeyag , ánuh me o-o aketoeyáng .
58006010	Onje Kitche Manito kâween mutche izzhewabizzisse che wuhnandunk ketuhnokewinewâ giya kesâge-ewawinewâ gá wâbunduhag otuhnozowinink , gá ezhe uhnoketowag .
58006011	Kokkinná andussheyag uhnágwuk mozhuk eu uhnokewin gâgineek che mushkâwandumag nánázh che eeshquâ ákewung .
58006012	Kago ketimekago , keguh nopenánáwâ uhgew quiuk izzhewabizzidjig , uhnew iyângwâmetágoosewinun .
58006013	Onje ope Kitche Monito gá wáweendumowât Abrahamun , ōnje káween owushema tá ezhenánápegeezhwase meatuh weow gá nánápegeezhwapun ;
58006014	Ekettōnk , ōnjittá shâwanjegang keguh shâwanemin , giya dush ōnjittá bátienoittewinink keguh bátienōin .
58006015	Opedush keenwazh bátōt ototissigoon Kitche Manitōn , gá ezhewâweendumágoot .
58006016	Aninne anápegeezhwa , owushema apetandágoozinidjin , omennositōnâwâdush okekanindewinewâ anápegeezhwawin ōnje .
58006017	Me e-e Kitche Manito ezhe mesábunduhát gabemátizzinidjin che mashkōtandunzig otenandumowin omushkâwetōn nánápegeezhwawinink .
58006018	Nazh iuheen , gashketoseeng Kitche Manito che maishkoochesitōt , Kitche Manito kâ tá gubgenowishkese , konemá ketá nianduhzemin keenowint kegeozhemomin che bemátizzeyunk che otápenumun enandumowin anosumeyung bagitenumágoeyunk .
58006019	Eu buhgoosanemowin meenjemukiegun kechichâgonánig ōnjittá mushkâwesin , beendegasa ágoyegunink ;
58006020	Ewada nâgânebutōt májá keenowint ōnje , ween Jesus , gá ozheint che kitche sáságewitchegaweninnewit gâgineek Melchisedek gá eschichegâzōt .
58007001	Wuhow Melchiscdek , Salemink ogemá , Kitche Manito kitche sáságewitchegaweninemun onuhrishkowán Abrahamun ope kewanit nánun kitche ogemán ge áwenesánit oge shâwanemándush ;
58007002	Abrahamdush , omenán Melchisedekun ningōtwayug matáchingin ayát , ánekuhnotumink , quiuk izzhewabizzewin ogemá , minowâdush kitche ogemá Salemink , me innuhwandewinink ogemá ;
58007003	O-osiseeng , ogeseeng , uhgenegisseeng , uhmájebemátizzisseeng , uhneboseeng , Kitche Manito Oguisun gá ezheint ge ezhá gâgineek sáságewitchegaweninne .
58007004	Binná náguttuhwandumōk , azhe kitche apetandágoozit wuhow aninne ; ween Abraham ōsemá gámenájin ningōtwayug matáchingin gá munewunat nundobunewinink .
58007005	Kagatdush uhgew Levi oguisun uhgew ayájig sáságewitchegaweninne otinuhnokewinewâ anonáwug metoswawân che otâpenumowáwât anishanâban azhichegâtag tebákonegawin : me eu wekânissewân ototâpenumowâwân ánuh Abraham onejânisun .
58007006	Weendush kâween emá ge ōnjegit enuhgimáse ningōtwayug ge otâpenumowân matáchingin Abrahamun ogesháwanemándush , ween ayát wâweendumátewin .
58007007	Onjittá , nōndás apetandágoozit mená sbáwanjegawin , owushema apetandágoozinidjin omenigōn .
58007008	Omá , oweuh aninne nabojin bazhek otián uhnew metáchingin , ween emá nabosig , otián .
58007009	Neendá eket , ween Levi watâpenunk bazhek matáchingin tepáumága bazhek matáchingin Abraham ōnje .
58007010	Onje kiábe osun weowwink iá , ope Melchisedekun nagishkowut .
58007011	Kishpin quiuk izzhewabizzit Levi otizzhetwâwinink ( magwouh Levi sáságewitchegaweninewit anishanában obeotissigōnâwâ tebákonegawin ) wagonan minowâ bakánizzit sáságewitchegaweninne ga ōnje pusegwepun Melchisedekinche ezhenágoozit , kâdush Aaronink che ezhenágoozissik ?
58007012	Kishpin sáságewitchegaweninewun ánzhichegátag tebákonegawin giya tuh áuzhichegâta .
58007013	Ono iuheen anduhzhindumingin puhkânizzewug tabandungig kâ sáságewitchegaweninnewissewug uhgew azheweenzhojig .
58007014	Mizzhisshowwenágwut Kekitche Manitomenán ōnje mokishkât Judahink ; Moses kâ ningōtono ogeittunzeen osáságewitchegaweninnewinewá uhgew azheweenzhojig .
58007015	Owushema mizzhisshowwenágwut : iá bazhek sâságewitchegaweninne Melchisedek anandágoozit ,
58007016	Kâween wuhow sáságewitchegaweninne aninne oweow ge oshichegâzōse gâgega bemátizzewin omushkâwizzewin ge ōnje oshichegâzo .
58007017	Onje uhge ekettōnk , keen gâgega sáságewitchegaweninne Melchisedek azhewabizzit .
58007018	Gata tebákonegawin gá netamisink pekooshkâ , ōnje neennuhmut kâdush ningōt inâbuhtusinōn .
58007019	Onje kâ kegezhetáseem tebákonegawinink owushema wanissheshink guhgequawin beénduhguchegâta quiuk gezhetáintwâ , ketá kushketōmin che ezhe wequeyunk Kitche Manito uzzhiát .
58007020	Onjedush guhgatinámegeezhwawinink ge ōnje oshichegâzo uhsáságewitchegaweninnewit .
58007021	( Ahnint sáságewitchegaweninnewug ge ozhichegâzowug uhge guhgatinámegeezhwaseeng ; wuhowdush ween guhgatinámegeezhwawinink ge ōnje oshichegâzo , uhnew ōnje gá igoojin Kitche Manito ge guhgatinámegeezhwa kâweendush oguh ánjetoseen odikittowin , keen kesáságewitchegaweninew gâgineek tibishko Melchisedek ; )
58007022	Azhe owushema Jesus apetandágoozit me tibishko owushema azhe apetandágwutinik wâweendumágawin .
58007023	Ahnint uhgew bátienowug sáságewitchegaweninewug kâdush kushketosewug gâgineek we bemátizzewát ánga nebowin ōnje :
58007024	Uhowdush aninne tuh sáságewitchegaweninne gâgineek , ánga tuh gâgega bemátizze .
58007025	Me eu ōnje kushketōt kokkinná che bemájeát uhgew buhnázekowâjig Kitche Manitōn ween ōnje : ōnje gâgega bemátizze zhiuh uhnumeatumowât .
58007026	Me uhtowuh sáságewitchegaweninne ga ge iyáwungobun , quiuk manito manoizzhewabizzit , benizze , wátokásik mache izzbewabizzinidjin : owushema apetandágoozitdush gezhik apetandágwuk .
58007027	Kâween uhgew kitche sáságewitchegaweninewug aeendotumowápun andusso gezhiguk kâween ieendotunze she ōnje sáságewitchegat tebinowa omutcheizzhewabizzewin netam , eeshquâchdush anishanábag omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ kokkinna osáságewitchegatumowân , ope ningōtink sáságewitchegat tebinowa eu weow .
58007028	Tebákonegawin gá ōnje ozheintwâ aninnewug sáságewitchegaweninewewât ánuh uhgew aninnewug nashewuhnátizzidjig gegetowin koshá guhgatinámegeezhwawin takoshinomuhgut , squâch tebákonegawinink Oguisemá wanje sáságewitchegaweninewit ween gâgega Kitche Manito Christ .
58008001	Binnah ono iuheen , gá tuzzbindumungoon , me o-o kokkinná mámowy , ketiáwânán , wuhow towuh kitche sáságewitchegawenine ween námátábit ogitchenikâng onámátábewinink tebakonegat gezhigōnk .
58008002	Mazhinowakundowât , Kitche Manitōn quiuk mazhinowakundunk wegewam ween Kitche Manito gá onuhkizzetōt kâ anishanâba oge onuhkizzetoseen .
58008003	Kokkinná kitche sáságewitchegaweninne ween otozheán che sáságewitchegawât sáságewitchegawinun wanje enandágwuk wuhow giya ween kago , kago che sáságewitchegat .
58008004	Kishpin ákeeng iát káween tá sáságewitchegaweninewese , ōnje iáwug sáságewitchegaweninnewug , sáságewitchegajig tebákonegawinink azhichegátag .
58008005	Uhgew uneshâ guhgekinowâshichegawin aezbenágwuk gezhigōnk atagin tebishko Moses gá ezhe guhgekimigoot Kitche Manitōn ope wáozhetōt wegewâm , iyángwâmizzin , ( eketto ) wawane izzhetōn gá ezhe kekinoumonán wudjewink .
58008006	Nōngumdush owushema kitche sáságewitchegaweninnewe owushema apetandágwutinne wâweendumágawin wiánekuhnotunk wazhissink owushema wanissheshink wâweendumátewin .
58008007	Netam wâweendumágawin kishpin ápiche ge onissheshinogobunan , kâ táge tuhgoosinōn bakânuk che ge oschichegâtag .
58008008	Onje ope nanebekimát , eketto binná gezhigut tub ochichesa , eketto Kitche Manito , ope che ozhetoeyán ōshke wâweendumágawin Israel onejânisun , owegewâmewâng , giya Judah owegewâmewâng :
58008009	Kâween ween eu azhenágwuk wâweendumágawin gá ozhetowemug ōsewân , eu gezhigut uhge sâgitchesuhginekanugwâ ákeeng Egyptink , ōnje kâween oge kunwanduhzeenâwâ gá ezhe wâweendumowugwâ , kâdush neenge nánáguttuhwanemáseeg , eketto , Kitche Manito .
58008010	Me o-o wâweendumágawin ga ozhetowugwâ Israelug owegewâmewâng ge ceshquâsag ono gezhigutōn , eketo Kitche Manito : neentebákonegawin neenguh uttowâg otenandumowinewâng neenguh oshebeumowág otaewâng : ogub Omanitomenáwân neow giyadush neen neenguh otuhnishanâbamemág .
58008011	Kâween kokkinná aninnewug oguh guhgekimásewân owejetuhkewamágunewân , giya kokkinná aninnewug wekânissewân , ekettónk , kekanemik Kitche Manito : ōnje kokkinná neenguh kekanemigōg , nōndás apetandágoozidjig , giya owushma apetandágoozidjig .
58008012	Neenguh shâwandumowâg omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ , omázheninewugizzewinewâ giya omutche bemátizzewinewâ kâween kiábe neenguh papámandumowâseeg .
58008013	Opedush áketōt , ōshke wâweendumágawin , nágwut gata wâweendumágawin uhge gatachegâtag , eu bagishkunuk , ane gatashkág wanjishkowwissin che wunissink .
58009001	Kagatdush netam wâweendumágawin tuhgobun ezhetwâwin uhnoketowint Kitche Manito wegewâmink ákeeng .
58009002	Mutche-egin ge oschichegâta áqutcheiuhe bátōchegâtâg wâsâkoninjegunâtik uhbuhtuhkisink , giya otopowin , giya puhquazhegun wiábundi-ittink o-o wegewâm Sanctuary ezhenekâta .
58009003	Minowâ bátogotag me eu owushema apetandágwuk anegoquág wegewâm ;
58009004	Beendik e-e mutche-egin ozâwâ shoneá weengusqusegawin , otossowin wáweendumágawin kokkinná ágwuniegâta ozâwâ shoneá ōnje , beenjeiuhedush ozâwâ shoneá akeek abit , gezhigōnk gá ōnjeeg puhquazhegun uzzhuttag , Aarondush osuhkáoon gá ōnje ságebuhguk giya otopowinun wâweendumátewin .
58009005	Ogitcheiuhedush Kitche Manito omezhinowamun muzzenichegâzowug ubgowâtaumink sbâwanjega námátábewin , nōngumdush kâween kushketōsemin wawane we tuzzhindumunk .
58009006	Ope ono iuheen gá geschichegâtag sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush mozhuk peendegawug eu uhnetamichegâtag wegewâm , uhnoketowât Kitche Manitōn .
58009007	Beendikdush nowwiuhe anduhgōk kitche sáságewitchegawenine peendega ningōtink , ningo kekenonowin , kâwekâ bizzhishshik peendegaseen , mozhuk sáságewitchegun misque oge peendegen , weow ōnje , anishanâbag omutcheizzhewabizzewinewân ōnje .
58009008	Kitche Manito Ochichágwun wâbundiewa o-o ōnje mámowy owushema apetandágwuk mikun anumōk , kâ muhshe bákindanegâtasinōn magwouh kiábe uhbutuhkisink natumebetochegâtag mutche-egin .
58009009	Ono iuheen kekinowâchichegawin che wâbundi-intwâ anishanâbag megewawinun sáságewitchegunun , kâween kushketoseenâwâ , quiuk we menositowât weowwewân .
58009010	Ono iuheen eshichegawin uhnōch ieendotumink wekoongang , beneittizzōnk eshichegawin uhnōch ieendotumink weowwemá nánázh ope puhkân che izzhewabuk .
58009011	Christ ope takoshink kitche sáságewitchegawenine onissheshin uhtakoshink owushema apetandágwuk mutche-egin kâween oninjemá ge ōnie oschichegâtasinōn , keche ekettōnk kâ aninneeng ge ezhe ozhichegâzōse .
58009012	Káween manishtânishe misque , giya pezhckeensun misque , weenigo tebinowa omisqueem ge peendega ningōtink owushema uzzhuhpetandágwuk mutche-egin ge ōndinumágonándush gâgega bemátizzewin .
58009013	Kishpin iába pezhekewe misque , giya manishtânish bonákoosh giya pingwe uhge shegwâkizzōt , siswawabenumowintwâ uhgew wânizzidjig uhbeneintwá oweyâsewâng .
58009014	Kânuh owushema Jesus Christ omisqueem ( ween giágega bemátizzinit Ochichâgwun ōnje sáságewitchegat e-e weow , ) kânuh tuh ōnje benisinōn ketenandumowinewâ che uhnoketowag Kitche Manito ?
58009015	O-o ōnje ween ge ezhe ánekuhnotunk ōshke wâweendumágawin onebowin ōnje uhgew nandominjig otáiánáwâ wâweendumágawin gâgega bemátizzewin .
58009016	Ween 'ow aninne nágutuhmágat wâweendumágawin ōnjittá enandágooze che nebōt .
58009017	Squâch wâweendumágawin náguhtuhmágat kitche apetandágwut gá nebojin , magwouh koshuh aninne uhbemátizzit , kâ ningōt anábuhtusinōn .
58009018	Netam wáweendumágawin kâ bizzhishshik gemenitiseen , meatuh misque uhtuhkonumátink .
58009019	Moses kokkinná ge ezhe guhgequa guhgequawinun tebákonegawinink atag , ototápenán pezhekeensewe misque , giya manishtânishansewe misque , giya nebe , giya masquagin manishtânisshe obewyun , giya wâsuhgnngin mezhuskeen , uhsiswabeginundunk tebákonega mazaniegun , kokkinná giya anishanâbag .
58009020	Ekettodush me o-o misque wâweendumágawin Kitche Manito gá meninág .
58009021	Minowá osiswabenundán mutche-egin , giya kokkinná otossowinun .
58009022	Kagâ kokkinná iuheen , tebákonegawinink ōnje , che benitōng misque ōnje : kishpindush misque segisetoseeng kâ tá kusbketoseem che menoweshâwandágwuk mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
58009023	Enandágwut che izzhewabuk azhe kekinowâchichegâtag gezhigōnk , keche benichegâtag ono iubeen ōnje , gezhigōnkdush iuheen tebinowa benichegâtawun owushema wanissheshingin ōnje .
58009024	Christ kâ ge peendegase uhkitche apetandágwuk , oninjemán gá ōnje ozhetōng kekinowâche ekettowinun tabwawinun gezhigōnk ezhá ween weow tebinowa , nōngumdush anosumeet Kitche Manito iá keenowint ōnje .
58009025	Kâweendush naningim otá sáságewitchegaseen weow kitche sáságewitchegaweninnewug aeendotumowát peendegawât ningōtink , ningo kekenonowin , uhkitche apetandágwuk wegewâm , sáságewitchegawât , ánint omisquemewâ .
58009026	Kishpin e-e getotungebun , táge kuhgwâtuhgito , aquo ákewung , ge takoshin besáságewichegat weow uhwabenunk mutche izzhewabizzewinun .
58009027	Giyadush azhichegâzoot aninne ningōtink keche nebōt , náágutchdush che tebákonint ,
58009028	Jesus Christ gá ezhe sáságewitchegat weow ningōtink kitche nebená omutcheizzhewabizzewimewân ōnje , uhnewdush ákowâbomigoojin oguhwâbunduhán weow uhgegishkunzigwâ mutcheizzhewabizzewin che bemájeintwâ .
58010001	Tebahkonegawin wanissheshink uzzhuhgowâtasink che takoshinomuhguk , kâweenigo tebinowa iuheen , kâ kushkeásewug quiuk izzhewabizzewât uhgew buhnánázekungig andusso kekenonowin sáságewitchegunun sáságewitchegang :
58010002	Kânuh táge izzhewabusinōn uhge bonetásewug uhsáságewitchegawâpun ukko ? ōnje uhgew anumeájig ningōtink ge benichegâzowug , kâween minowâ tá mutcheizzhewabizzissewug .
58010003	Ono sáságewitchegawinun wanje mikwandunk mutcheizzhewabizzewinun andusso kekenonowubguk .
58010004	Kâween pâpish iába pezhekewe misque , giya manishtânishe misque , tá ōnje wabinegâtasinōn , mutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
58010005	Me wanje ekettōt , ope takoshink ákeeng , sáságewitchegun , sáságewitchegang , ká kege nundowanduhzeen , oweowwemágo gezhá kege ezhetōn .
58010006	Châgizzumink sáságewitchegunun mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje kâ kege nandumeigoosenun .
58010007	Opedush neendikit , binná neen takoshin ( mazaniegunink neendoshebe-egás ) azhe meenwandumun che totumán , Kitche Manito .
58010008	Ge eketto netam sáságewitchegun , châgizzumink sáságewitchegang , mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje , kâ kege nundowanduhzeen kâ ketizzhe niandumeigoosenun siáságewitchegangin tebákonegawin ōnje .
58010009	Opedush eketto , binná neentakoshin , Kitche Manito , azhe meenwandumun owwe uhnokeyán ; ototâpenándush natumisininik wiánekasininikdush uzzhuhtōt .
58010010	Eu enandumowin wanje mennobemátizzeyâng ningōtinkigo Jesus Christ weow osáságewitchegat me kokkinná ge sáságewitchegaintwâ .
58010011	Kokkinná sáságewitchegaweninnewug otuhnoketánâwâ osáságewitchegawin andussogezhiguk nebewátussink ánuh sáságewitchegang , kâwekâ ōnje wabinegâtasinōn mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
58010012	Wuhowdush aninne ningōtink gá sáságewitchegat mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje gâgineek námátábe Kitche Manitōn ogitche nikânink :
58010013	Uhbetōt omiátáwizzemun nánázh keche uhpizzit ábit .
58010014	Ningōtinkigo sáságewitchegat me ge gezhetáát uhnew quiuk izzhewabizzinidjin ga áquo ákewung .
58010015	Me wanje Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ekettōt ween wetokâzōt gá iekettōt kiut ,
58010016	Me o-o wâweendumágawin ga ezhe wâweendumowugwâ squâch ono gezhigutōn , eketto Kitche Manito , neenguh átowâg neendepákonegawinun otaewâng , neenguh oshebeumowâg onágutuhwandumowinewâng ;
58010017	Omutcheizzhewabizzewinewân , giya omázheninnewugizzewinewân , kâ minowá neenguh mikwandumowâseeg .
58010018	Onoedush azhe mennowweshâwandágwuk , kâ minowâ kago sáságewitchegawin tuhgoosinōn mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje .
58010019	Me eu ōnje nekânissetōk , wanje mushkâweta-ayunk , che peendegaeyunk owushema apetandágwuk wegewâm , Jesus omisqueem ōnje ,
58010020	Oshke izzhewabizzewin ōnje gá bákinumonunk bowwekushkekebichegunink ; keche ekettōnk , me eu oweyâs ;
58010021	Giya kitche sáságewitchegaweninne che kunwandunk Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik ;
58010022	Umbasino , bazbew ezhe we quetá quiuk ketainánin mushkâwandumowinink , mutcheizzhewabizzewin che ge seábáwuhchegâtag ketaináng keowwenánindush che gesebeginegâtag bánágumik nebe .
58010023	Umbasinno mushkâwe meenjimenuntá ekettowin , neendângwâmandumowininánig ; ( ween gá wâweendumágat iângwâmandum ; )
58010024	Umbasino nánáguttuhwanindetá , che sáságeittink che uhnokeeng wanissheshingin uhnokewinun :
58010025	Umbasino kago bonetosetá onuhquashkotátink , ánint anishanábag aeendotumowât ; umbasino guhguhgâzōndetá , owushemadush minowâ wiábundumingin takoshinomuhgut gezbigut .
58010026	Kishpin ketwan we mutcheizzhewabizzeyunk , ánuh kekandumunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin , kâween kago kiábe tuhgoosinōn sáságewitchegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje ,
58010027	Bazhekwun ga guhgenábundumunk tebákonegawin kitche nishkâtizzewin , ga banájeigowât shânganemájig Kitche Manitōn .
58010028	Ween bábápeát Moses otebákonegawin , uhge nebōt , uhshâwandágoozissik neezh niswa gá kekandungig ōnje ;
58010029	Ahneen menik buhshunzhaogowizzewin owushema ga iát , ketenandám , ween tatuhkokânigoot Kitche Manito Oguisun , wâweendumátewin misque , kâ ningōt inâbuhtusinōn anandunk , ga ge beneigopun , ween gá sheenganemát Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ?
58010030	Neenkekanemánán ween aketōt buhshunzhaogowizzewin neendebandán , quiuk neenguh tebishkotōn kokkinná kago , eketto Kitche Manito , minowâdush , Kitche Manito oguh tebákonán otuhnishanâbamun .
58010031	Nuhnezânandágwut keche pongeshink Kitche Manito gâgega bemátizzit oninjeeng .
58010032	Nágutuhwandumōk , kiut gezhigutōn wâsayá gá wâbundiigoeyag kitche megâzowin kege izzhewabizzim kiut , gá be ezhe kuhgwâtuhgitoeyag .
58010033	Ope wazheigoeyag , magwouh uhpâpenutágoeyagobun , kotuhgitowin ōnje , giya wâjewikig magwouh uzhizzhewabizzewât .
58010034	Magwouh uzzhowâkâneweyán kegeshâwanim kemeenwandám che banájetoeyag ketinotawizzewinewâ uzzhiáeyag owushema onissheshin tebinowawizzewin gezhigōnk .
58010035	Kago wabenun kago kemushkâwandumowinewâ , guhtuh kitche tebiegâta o-o .
58010036	Ketá enandám che betoeyag ; ge eeshquâ iyekumag Kitche Manito otenandumowin keguhtianâwâ wáweendumátewin .
58010037	Kiábe wanebeek ween wátakoshink , tuh takoshin , káween tuh beose .
58010038	Quiuk izzhewabizzidjig mushkâwandumowin tuh ōnje bemátizzewug ; kishpin koshá oweuh aninne uzzhotát kâ neenchichâg oguh niandumeáseen .
58010039	Kâween neenowint neendá izzhewabizzissemin uhgew azhatájig che banátizzewât uhgew atuh tiabwatungig che bemátizzinit ochichâgwun .
58011001	Musakauwandumowin nandowandumink iuheen wiábunduhzewuk wanje kekandumunk .
58011002	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje ōsemág menno ge ezhe weenzowug .
58011003	Mushkâwandumowin wanje kekandumunk , Kitche Manito ogegetowin , uhge ōnje oschichegâtag ákeen , iuheen wiábundumingin , káween kago ge ōnje oschichegâtasinōn kago wiábundumink .
58011004	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Abel owushema omennosáságewinán Kitche Manitōn , Cain azhe sáságewinát , ge quiukquandágooze , ge mennoizzhewabizzit , Kitche Manito otuzzhindán , eu sáságewitchegawin : mushkáwandumowin ōnje ánuh ánuhwe genebo kiábedush gegeto .
58011005	Mushkâwandumowin , Enoch ge ōnje ōmbishkâ che wâbunduhzik wekâ nebowin , kâwdush ge mikkowâse ōnje Kitche Manitōn oge otâpinegōn : okekandán uhniandumeát Kitche Manitōn .
58011006	Mushkâwanduhzeeng kâ kago tá ōnje niandumeáse Kitche Manito ; ween buhnázekowât Kitche Manitōn , ōnjittá tá tabwa-andum Kitche Manito uhtát , keche shâwanemát uhnew nandowábunduminidjin .
58011007	Noah omushkâwandumowin ōnje , Kitche Manitōn uhge ezhe guhgekimigoot , azhe sagizzit , gá ōnje uhnokeet che ozhetōt chemán , che ōnje bemájeát kokkinná andussotawizzit o-o uzzhenuhnokeet obátátōn áke , medush biezhe sazekizzekundunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
58011008	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Abraham ope nandomint keche ezhát otuhnuhkewinink eu ga menint che tebandunk , tabwatum májádush , kâwdush okekanduhzeen tibbe ga ezhágwan .
58011009	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje nukkowa nogishkâ emá eu áke wiáweendumowint miáwukeeng miátáwizzinidjin emá tunnuhke mutche-eginōnk tá , mámowy Isaacun , Jacobun giya , sazekizzinidjin mámowy wâweendumowutwâ .
58011010	Onje onundowâbundán otanuh wanuhkeshichegâtag Kitche Manito gá ozhissetōt , gá ozhetōt .
58011011	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Sarah mushkâwandum che onejânissit , ápiche gá kekât me ope 'zhonejânissit , ōnje uhtabwatowât gá wâweendumágoojin .
58011012	Me eu ōnje bazhek uhnew ōnje negeittewug weendush tebishko gá nebōngin anandágoozinidjin , andusshewât uhnungwug gezhigōnk giya nagow tuttebao kitchegumink bamissink tuzzhewug wanje netáwigidjig .
58011013	Kokkineá uhgew nánázh ge eeshquâ bemátizzewug uhtabwatumowât kâmuhshe ototissigoseenâwâ wâweendumátewin wâsâ oge owâbundánâwâ wâwoendumátewin : tabwatumōg giya omeenjimenánâwâ wâweendumátewin , ekettowugdush uhmiátáwizzewât uhbábákewâjetowât ákeeng .
58011014	Uhgew eu ekettojig omizzhishshowwenágwitōnâwâ uhnundowâbundumowât tuhnuhkewin .
58011015	Kagatdush kishpin nánáguttuhwandumowâpun tuhnuhkewin gá ōnjebáwât otá ge ùzzhakewanotánâwâ .
58011016	Nōngumdush nowutch wanissheshin tuhnuhkewin onundowandánáwâ eu gezhigōnk tuhnuhkewin ; me eu ōnje ká águtchese Kitche Manito Okitche Manitomewân keche enintwâ , oge ozhetowân gezhá kitche otanuh .
58011017	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Abraham ope kagwadebanemint , owwe sáságewitchegat Isaacun , weendush watissigoot wâweendumátewin osáságewitcheganun onezheka oguisun .
58011018	Ween gá enint , keenejânisun Isaac onejânisun tuh ezheweenáwug .
58011019	Enandum Kitche Manitōn che kushketōnit che ábejebáigoot nayáb , ánuh genebōt , ningōtink ogewâbundi-igōn Kitche Manitōn azhewabutinik ábejebawin .
58011020	Mushkâwandumowin Isaac oshâwanemán Jacobun giya Esauun oweendumowândush iuheen ga tokoshinomuhgukin .
58011021	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Jacob ope nabōt , oshâwanemán niyazh Joseph oguisun , uhnumeátdush nowwiuhgequasink ogitcheiuhe osuhkáoonink .
58011022	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Joseph ope nabōt ogetuzzhemát uhpuhkanit Israel onejánisun ge ezhe guhgequa uhge tuzzhindunk okunun che máchetowint .
58011023	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Moses ope nágit , niswo gezis onegeigōn ogegánigōn ōnje owâbomigōn ápiche uhgwuhnájewit kâdush ogotunzeenâwâ Kitche Ogemá otebákonegawin .
58011024	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Moses ope gá ōnje natáwigit Pharaoh otânun oguisinne , kâween we ezhe weenigoozisse ;
58011025	Owushema meenwandum che wejeguhgwâtuhgitomát Kitche Manito onejânisun uhgamá wanebeek che mennowânegoozippun mutcheizzhewabizzewinink ,
58011026	Enandum owushema che onissheshininik che kegebábápeint Jesus Christun ōnje , uhgamá che iápun kokkinná kitchetwâwizzewih Egyptink negánenábe opo ga ezhe tepáumágowizzit .
58011027	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , ogenuhgután Egyptink kâ ogegotunzeen kitche ogemá otebákonegawin ; gá izzhewâbizzit gá wâbundungin Kitche Manitōn wekâ wiábomásewint .
58011028	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , okunwandán kuhbekosa wekoondewin , giya ge siswabeginunjegawin misque , gá ōnje totunk , ween gá banájeát kokkinná nètam gá neginidjin keche tânginigoozissigwâ .
58011029	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje otuhkumishkánâwâ misko kitchegumme tibishko biangwuhkumigágin ; uhgew Egyptianug ánuh gewekooche totumowât kokkinná ge tuhpinawug nebeeng .
58011030	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Jericho otanuh , gá ōnje pekooshkâg Israel onejânisun ope neezhwâswogwun gá babámosawât emá .
58011031	Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , bisshegwâch equa Rahab , ká oge wejenebomáseen uhnew tiabwatunzinit ope watissigoot uhnew nandowâtonidjin innuhwandewinink .
58011032	Ahneen minowâ ga ekettoeyán ? kâ neendá kushketoseen kokkinná che tepájemugwâ uhgew aninnewug , Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel giya manitowâzonidjin ;
58011033	Mewug uhgew mushkâwandumowin gá ōnje mámázheájig ogemáwinink , quiuk izzhewabizzewug , otiánâwâ wâweendumátewin , ogebuhumowân mishebezheen otōninne ,
58011034	Otátaánâwân kitche ishotang , otozhindánâwâ anábuhtuhgánig uzzhoweshk ; neennuhmizzewinink ge sōngitchegâtane , sōngeta-awug mekâtewinink , otánuhwâwân menissinōn miátáwizzinidjin .
58011035	Equawug onebomewân nayáb menáwug , uhbemátizzinit ánintdush buhshunzháogowizzewig kuhgwâtuhgeáwug , kâ enandubzewug che we bemátizzewât owushema omeenwandánâwâ puhkân ábejebáwin :
58011036	Ahnintdush ge kuhgwadebanemáwug uhge nuhnisshepápenotowintwâ , buhshunzhawâwug kushkâbekiegâzowug kepáquiegâzowug :
58011037	Bemosinnuháwug , giya táskebonáwug , kuhgwadebanemáwug , uzzhowweshk ōnje nánáwug , papákewáchetowug manishtánisshewyán giya kitche manishtânisshewyán agwewâjin , ketemágizzewug uhguhgwâtuhgeintwâ ;
58011038	( Ahke kâ ta apetandágoozininne apetandágoozewât ; ) papágewâchetowug buhgwuttuhkumigáng , magwa wudjewink i-zzhisshebákumigág wâzhink giya wâweembuhkumigág áke .
58011039	Kokkinná ono menno onozowinun otiánâwân mushkâwandumowin ōnje ; kâ otiáseenâwâ wâweendumátewin .
58011040	Kitche Manito kege wuhwuhonigonán kago nowutch onissheshink konemá tá bemátizzissewug nezheka bwâ iyáeyunk ,
58012001	Me eu ōnje aquo iáwât kitche nebená wâtokâzojig , ningooche buhgittinuntá kokkinná kago quazhegōnk , mutcheizzhe wabizzewin kitche niágâch waotissigoeyunk , anegōk pemebuttotá kokkinná kemushkâwizzewininán kuhquajekunittewin .
58012002	Kunowâbomátá Jesus , ween máninunk kemushkâwandumowininán ween mojegandumowin atowint ōnje , gá kuhgwâtuhgitōt metigōnk , kâwdush opapámanduhzeen águtchewin ; owwe námátabe Kitche Manito ogitche nikânink .
58012003	Náguttuhwanemik Jesus , gá ezhe megânigopt macheizzhewabizzinidjin keche iyakoozissewag keche nikâbunduhzewag kenágutuhwandumowinewâng .
58012004	Kâ muhshe kesegesetoseem misque , megâtumag mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
58012005	Kegewuhnandánâwâdush e-e guhgequawin gagekemigoyag tebishko uhbenocheug gagekemintwâ ; neenguis kago pâpenotunkan Kitche Manito obuhshunzhaowawin , kago wekâ nikâbundunkan kishpin ánwanemik .
58012006	Kokkinná Kitche Manito siágeájin obuhshunzhawân , nuhnuhmáát , uhnanibbekimát kokkinná oguisun watissigoojin .
58012007	Kishpin kuhgwâtuhgitoeyag , Kitche Manito tebishko waōsingin , keguh ezhe shâwanemigowâ , owwanan wekâ Oguisemá ōsun buhshunzhaogosig ?
58012008	Kishpin wekâ buhshunzhaogowizzissewag ( kokkinná uhbenocheug buhshunzhaogowizzewug ) kekeminechâgunáwim , kâ oweuh ketonejânissemigoosewâ .
58012009	Minowâdush neenge ōseminábun omá ákeeng buhshunzhaoeyumintebun ukko neengitchetwâwanemámenábun ukkodush ; kânuh owushema neendá tuhbussebuhgitinumowâsenán neowwinánin ōsemá ochichâgomág konemá neendá bemátizzemin ?
