58012010	Giya ween omá ákeeng ōsemág buhshunzhaowawug wanebeek , anandumowâjin , weendush keche ōnje mennoizzhewa bizzeyunk azhe mennoizzhewabizzit che izzhewabizzeyunk .
58012011	Káween kago buhshunzhaogowizzewin ga meenwandumungobun nōngum , náágutch koshá nojemochegáta gá azhe mámákeint uhgew bashunzhaogowizzidjig .
58012012	Me eu ōnje ōmbenumōk oninjemán agotagin , giya kittegomág nánuhmizzidjig .
58012013	Quiuk omotók kezitáwâng mamákizzidjig keche buhkawabinegâzosigwâ ; binná tuh nojemowug .
58012014	Nopenuhnitig innuhwandewinink anishanâbatōk mennobemátizzewinink kâ oweuh aninne otáwâbomáseen Kitche Manito , eu bwá izzhewabizzit .
58012015	Mozhuk uhkowábig uhkowâbomik ápiche konemá oweuh aninne oguh wuhnetōn Kitche Manito osháwanjegawin , konemá kago ga wesuhgegetashkágoon che ositáwandumeigoeyun nebewádush guhtuh ōnje nisshewubnátizzewug .
58012016	Konemá oweuh , tuh bisshegwâtuhkumik izzhewabizzit , gamá guhgepáchieendit Esau izzhewabizzit ween ningooshkumowin weyâs , gá onje átáwat kokkinná azhe tebandunk .
58012017	Kekekandánâwá náágutch ope wâshâwanemigoozit ge gooshquanegâzo kâ ningooche omikkunzeen ga ezhe gwakandungebun ánuh ogenundowâbundán gegizebeeng .
58012018	Kâ kebe otittunzeem wudjew ga tângenumingebun , chiágetag ishkota ōnje , kâ kegebe otittunzeem kushkedibikut , makuttawâk , giya kache kotámegwuk ,
58012019	Uhnōndágwuk nōndágomutchegun giya gegetowinun uhgew n'wândungig eu ekettowin enáwug wekâ násáb che ezhe weendumowâsewintwâ minowâ :
58012020	( Kâ kushketosewug che nōndumowât azhe guhgekemintwâ kishpindush oweuh áwase tângishkunk eu wudjew , tá bemosinubá gamá tá shábogunámá .
58012021	Ozâm kitche kotámegoot che wâbundumingebun eu wudjew Moses wanje eketto , neengitche sagizze neengitche nuhningishkâ . )
58012022	Wudjew Sinaiink kebe-ezhám , giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito ototanuh , gezhigōnk Jerusalemink giya azhenowât Kitche Manito omezhinowamun giya , kâ tá kushketoseem keche uhgemintwâ andusshewât .
58012023	Kitche uhnumeawinink kebe-ezhám netam gá neegemuhguk , otuhnozowinewân azhebe-egâtanik gezhigōnk : Kitche Manitodush ween kokkinná kago tabákonunk giya ochichâgomág quiuk aninnewug manobemátizzidjig .
58012024	Kebeotisáwâ Jesus ween wiánekuhnotunk ōshke wâweendumágawin , kebeotitánâwâ misque saswabeginunjegang owushema azhe mennoguhgequat Abel omisqueem azhe guhgequat .
58012025	Tuttebábig kago ágoonwatowâ kago ween gegetōt ; wanowâ wiágoonwatowâjig uhnew gá gegetonidjin akeeng , kâ kushketosewug weozhemowât , áneen ga ge ezhe ozhemoeyunk kishpin gwaketowunk , ween wanje gegetōt gezhigōnk ?
58012026	Ogegetowindush ōnje nuhningishkâ áke , binnádush nōngum ezhe wâweendumága , eketto , ningōtink minowâ , kâween atuh o-o áke , neengooshkowabenunzeen , gezhik giya neengooshkowabenán .
58012027	O-odush ekettowin minowâ ningōtink , otâpinegâtawun ono iuheen gwashkowabenumink ono iuheen kashketosink che gooshkowabenumink máno tuh izzhissinōn .
58012028	Me eu ōnje neendotâpenámin ogemáwewin kashketosink che mátenumink tuh we onisshenōn ketaenánin ween atuh Kitche Manito che uhnoketowunk sagizzewinink .
58012029	Kekitche Manitomenán ishkota kokkinná kago chágákeag enandágooze .
58013001	Wekaunissemahtok , sâge-ewatá gâgineek .
58013002	Kago wuhnandun kago che peendegunag miátáwizzit ahdáeyag ; ánint o-o totumowát , obeendegunigonawan Kitche Manito omezhinowamene uhnissetowinowâsigwâ .
58013003	Nágutuhwanemik uhgew takobizzojig tibishko uhtuhgwipizoeyun : nágutuhwanemik uhgew kuhgwâtuhgitojig , tebinowa keowwewâng weowwewâng ketiám .
58013004	Wetegandewin mámowy quiuk izzhewabuk giya nebágun benut , bashegwâtizzidjig , wâmzzidjig , Kitche Manito oguh tebákonán .
58013005	Máno kebemátizzewin kago sásâgizzewin tuh tuhgoosinōn azhetuhneunigo ezhe nuhniandun : ge eketto káween keguh nuhguhnisinōn pâpish .
58013006	Ketá ezhe mushkâwegeezhwamin , Kitche Manito neenguh nezhokomág che ekottoeyunk kâween neenguh gotunzeen aninne ga ieendōtōwit .
58013007	Náguttuhwanim uhgew tabanemikig uhgew gagekemikwá Kitche Manito oguhgequawin nopenuttumōk omushkáwandumowinewâ náguttuhwandumink waquiá otizzbewabizzewinewá :
58013008	Jesus Christ pichenágo , nōngum gezhiguk , mego gâgineek tebishko .
58013009	Kago keguh ōnje papámewinegooseen ono papuhkânuk ezhetwâwinun onissheshin ōnje mushkâwitchegâtag mennoizzhewabizzewin kâween weyâs ōnje ningōt gá inábuhtusinōk , ánuh ge betuzzhekumink .
58013010	Neendiámin sáságewitchegun 'kozhuttag , uhgew mazhinowakundungig mutche-egin , kâ tá wesenesewug .
58013011	Weowwewân uhgew áwaseug omisquemewân bándegutōng uhnumeawegumigōnk kitche sáságewitchegaweninewug bándeguttowât mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje áquutchink kuhbashewinink châgizzegâtanewun .
58013012	Jesus giya ween azhe sáságewitchegaát anishanâhan , tebinowa omisqueem ōnje anishanâbag che ōnje benizzowât ge kuhgwâtuhgito áquchink otanuh .
58013013	Umbasuh ságáundá , názekowâtá áqutcheiuhe kuhbashewinink , máno keguh ōnje pápápeigomin ween ōnje .
58013014	Omá ákeeng kâween ningooche otanonk keenwazh keguh iásemin , kenundowâbománán bazhek che takoshink .
58013015	Eu ween ōnje sáságewinátá che uhnumeáeyunk mozbuk , che mámoyewumink sáságewitchegatá wanje netáwiging ketonináng uhmámoyewumint , megwach uzzhenint otuhnozowinink .
58013016	Che mennotumink che mámenitink mamashkōt kago enánandun kago e-e : tinnouh sáságewitchegunun Kitche Manito kitche meenwandum .
58013017	Tabwatowik uhgew tabaneminágwuk tuhbusanindizzōk , otuhkowâbomáwân kechichâgowâng tibishko uhgew tabohgindâzojig konemá mennowânegoozewinink tuh totumōg kâween ween osittáwandumowinink ; eu kâ ningōt ketá inábuhchetoseem .
58013018	Anumeatumoweshinâng quiuk neendizzhetahamin neendenandámin ápadush gâgineek quiuk izzhewabizzeyâng neendenandámin .
58013019	Kishpin o-o aninnuhgook totumag , minowâ wiebuh keguh beotissinne .
58013020	Nōngum Kitche Manito otinowandásowin , ween ge ábejebát Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , ween mámowy kanowanemát kokkinná otuhnishanâbamun , misque wâweendumátewin ōnje .
58013021	Ahpadush mennoizzhewabeinág kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewin azhe meenwandunk che izzhewabizzeyag uhnokewin che gegishkumag ga ezhe niandunk , anosummeskezhik Jesus Christ ōnje ween kachetwâwizzit gâgineek . Amen .
58013022	Keguhgâzominenim nekânissetōk bezindumōk o-o guhgequawin , oshebeumonim pungee ekettowinun .
58013023	Kekekandánâwâ kekânissenán Timothy , uhge buhgitinnegâzōt , kishpin wiebuh betuhkoshink neenguh bewejewâ che bewâbominuhgook .
58013024	Uhnumekowwik uhgew tabaneminágwuk kokkinná , giya anumeájig Italyink andánuhkejig ketuhnemikágowâg .
58013025	Shâwandágoozewin keguh wejewegōnâwâ kokkinná . — Amen .
59001001	James , Kitche Manito giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ otoskenegamun otuhnemikáwân asheneezhwawânuhgizzinidjin , saswashkâjig mizzewâ .
59001002	Nekânissetōk náguttuhwandumōk che mennowânegwandumag ope ezhe pongeshinag kuhgwadebanindewinink .
59001003	Kekandumink o-o uhkuhgwadebandumink kemushkâwan dumowinewân , uhnoke beowin .
59001004	Máno beowin , wawane tuh uhnokemuhgut , keche ōnje mennoizzhewabizzeyag .
59001005	Kishpin oweuh andusheyag ayásik nebwâkâwin Kitche Manitōn oguh nundotumowân ween mánát wanepuzh kokkinná aninnewun ; oweuhdush wiágoonwatowâsig , tuh menádush .
59001006	Mushkâwandumowinink guttuh ezhe nundotumága kâween ween che ágoonwawandumink , ōnje ween wiágoonwawandunk tebishko uhbuhbámáshkág kitche gumink apetandágoozit , puhbuhmewabuhogōnk iyōmbewabuhogōnk .
59001007	Kâween uhuhtowuh aninne , kago oguh nundowandumowâseen Kitche Manitōn .
59001008	Aninne neezhwiyug anandunk , kâween quiuk nánágutuhwanduhze ga izzhewabizzit .
59001009	Tuhbusandágoozit wekânissemá , máno tuh mennowânegooze , ōnje ishpe buhgitinegâzo ;
59001010	Wiánutizzitdush , ōnje ge tuhbussebuhgitinegâzo , ōnje tebishko mezhushkowâwâsuhkonang guttuh ezhe ungo .
59001011	Pichenukigo gezis m'wâkuhungin uhgezhâtag châgetawun mushkoosewun wâwâsokonan pongesinōn uhbishegandágwukebun banátut , me gache wiánuttizzit aninne , ga ezhe pongesink kokkinná izzhewabizzit .
59001012	Tuhshâwandágooze aninne kashketōt uhguhbikunk okuhgwadebanemigowin , ope tebákoniht wewoquân gâgega bemátizzewin oguhtián , eu Kitche Manito gá wâweendumowât uhnew siágeigoojin .
59001013	Kago oweuh aninne kagwadebaneminjin tuh ekettose , Kitche Manito neenguhgwadebanemik che ekettōt , kâween Kitche Manito tá kuhgwadebanjegase mutche izzhewabizzewin , kâdush oweuh aninnewun oguhgwadebanemáseen .
59001014	Kokkinná aninnewug kuhgwadebandágoozewug , ope ningooche azhe wekooshkâjin tebinowa onáguttuhwandumowin ōnje , uhwiazhemint .
59001015	Mutche nágutuhwandumowin , watisshewamuhgukin , me mutcheizzhewahizzewin wanje netáwegink , mutcheizzhewabizzewin ope gázbetámuhgukin me nebowin wanjesink .
59001016	Kago wuhnisshe kago keowwewân siágeinnubgook nekânissetōk .
59001017	Kokkinná wanissheshink megewawin kokkinná quiuk megewawin ishpemink ōnjemuhguk názhuhkemuhgut Oōsemá wâsayázewin , ween wekâ wiánjetosig otenandumowin .
59001018	Tebinowa ween otenandumowin ōnje wanje ánjenegeunk tabwawinink , tebishko netam aditagin , keche ezhenunk .
59001019	Eu ōnje , siágeinuhgook nekânisetōk , máno kokkinná aninnewug tuh kezhekâwug che nōndumowât , sebiskâch che gegetowât , sebiskâch che nishkâtizzewât .
59001020	Onje aninne onishkâtizzewin kâween quiuk uhnokemuhgusinōn Kitche Manito omennoizzhewabizzewin .
59001021	Eu ōnje , pemaiuhe buhgitinumōk kokkinná wenizzewin , kokkinná mázheninewugizzewin ; otâpenumōk bakâtizzewinink ekettowin me eu ga ōnje bemátizzewât kechichâgowâg .
59001022	Aketōnkigo izzhewabizzig , kâween atuhgo che nōndumag ; kago wiazhindun kago keowwewân .
59001023	Oweuhdush n'wândungin ekettowin , uhtotunzikdush tebishko aninne wiábundizzōt wâbemochichâgwawinink .
59001024	Onje wâbundizzo , májádush , bábegadush owuhnandán azhenágoozit .
59001025	Weendush kanowâbundunk quiuk tebákonegawin wânuhkewin uhgâgega iátdush uhwuhnanduhzik e-e gá nōndunk uzzhizzhewabizzit , anuhnokeet uhnokewin wuhow aninne kagat tuhshâwandágooze .
59001026	Oweuh aninne andussheyag neenduhnumeá enandum tákobetosigdush otanuhnew , wiazhindunk tebinowa ota , otuhnumeawin kâ ningōt inábuhtusininne .
59001027	Quiuk uhnumeawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin anosumeet Kitche Manito giya Oōsemá , me o-o , che mowwutisát , gáwusshizzidjig , giya shágáwidjig , okotuhgitowinewâng , keche ningooche che muhkuttawâsininik weow omá ákeeng .
59002001	Nekaunisetok , Jesus Christ , Gachetwâwizzit Kitche Manito omushkâwandumowin iyáeyeuk , oweuh pekinōnk keche apetanemásewag .
59002002	Kishpin oweuh aninne bebeendegat ketuhnumeawegumik ozâwâ shoneá tuhtebeninjebizzoon iát , giya suhsagákoniat , giyadush katemágizzit aninne beendegat , ápiche begokoniat ;
59002003	Oweuhdush sasagákoniat kitche apetanemut , kishpindush enut , omá námátábin wanissheshink námátábewinink , katemágizzitdush aninne enut , nebowin emá , uhgamá omá námátábin , neenduhpizzitabewinink :
59002004	Kâween innuh bazhek aninne owushema ketuhpetanemáse , bazhek apetanemut , kâween nuh mutche enandumowinun ketizzhe tepákonegase ?
59002005	Bezindumōk siágeinnuhgōk nekânisetōk , kâween nuh Kitche Manito oge onuhgemássen katemágizzinidjin omá ákeeng wiánutizzidjig mushkâwandumowinink , uhsuhzekizzekundumowât ogemawewin eu gá wáweendumowât uhgew siágeigoojin ?
59002006	Keenowâdush kege pâpenotowâwâ katemágizzidjig . Kânuh ono wiánutizzidjig aninnewug kemutchetotágosewâg , kânuh ketizzhe wekobinegoosewâg tebákonega námátábewinink ?
59002007	Kâween innuh opâpizzhinduhzeenâwâ eu mennoizzbewabizzit uhnozowin eu azhewenigoeyag ?
59002008	Kishpin kemooshkenatōg tebákonegawin azhebe-egâtag , keguh sâgeáwâ kejetuhkewamágunewâ tebishko azhe sâgeitizzoyag , quiuk ketizzhewabizzim :
59002009	Kishpindush bazhek owushema apetanemag , bazhek apetanemag , kemutchetotám , kebanájetōm tebákonegawin .
59002010	Onje owwagwan ga ápiche kuhnowandumogwan tebákonegawin , kishpindush ningōtoyug mutchetotunk kokkinná tebákonegawin obokobetōn .
59002011	Ween aketōt , kago bishegwâtizzekan ; giya eketto , kago nisshewakan . Binná kishpin bishegwâtizzissewun , nisshewayundush , me e-e bokobetoyun kokkinná tebákonegawin .
59002012	Me go ezhe gegetōk , tebishko uhgew ga tebákonegowizzidjig tebákonegawinink wânuhkewin .
59002013	Kishpin oweuh nágwitosig shâwandágoozewin , guttuh tebákonegâzo che shâwandágoozissik ; shâwanjegawin anewishkunk tebákonegawin .
59002014	Ahneen anábuhtuk , nekânissetōk , aninne kishpin nemushkâwandum ekettōt , iásigdush uhnokewinun ? mushkâwandumowin innuh otábemájeigōn ?
59002015	Kishpin kekânis giya ketowamá pingwoshshâgetit , katemágizzit , kago uhmejisig gázhegutinigin ,
59002016	Bazhekdush enag , buhkanigo bakâ , kezhosin , giya tabissineen ; kishpindush menásewag menik azhe nundowandunk weowwink ; áneen anábuhtuk ?
59002017	Mego tebishko , mushkâwandumowin , kishpin uhnokewinun áwunzenōk , nebomuhgut , ōnje uhnezhekawizzemuhguk .
59002018	Kagat , oweuh aninne konemá ekettōt , keen kemushkâwandum , neendush uhnokewinun neendiánun ; wâbundi-isshio kemushkáwandumowin uzzhiásewun uhnokewinun , keguh wâbundi-indush nemushkâwandumowin neenduhnokewin ōnje .
59002019	Bazhekgo Manito ketenandum ; kemenno-enandum ; Matche Manitōg giya tabwa-andumōg , uhnuhningishkâwug .
59002020	Kewekekandán innuh kagebátizzeyun aninne , e-e mushkâwandumowin uhnokewinun uhtuhgoosinōk nebomuhgut ?
59002021	Kâween innuh Abraham kōsenán quiuk ge izzhewabizze ge enandágoozisse uhnokewinun ōnje , ope siáságewitchegat oguisun Isaacun , sáságewitchegun uhkozhuhtag ?
59002022	Kewâbundán innuh omushkâwandumowin azhenágwutinink , uhnokewinundush omushkâwandumowin quiuk ge ōnje ozhichegâtane ?
59002023	Mazaniegundush mooshkena tabwawinewun , eu aketomuhgut , Abraham ogetabwa-anemán Kitche Manitōn uhginjegâtanedush quiuk izzhewabizzewin che áwunk ; Kitche Manito anowamájin ge ezhewená .
59002024	Kewâbundánâwâdush aninne quiuk azhe ozhichegâzōt uhnokewinun ōnje , kâween atuh mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
59002025	Mego tebishko bisshegwâtizzit equa Rahab , kánuh ge ōnje ezhichegâzōse uhnokewinun ōnje ope bándegunát anoninjig uhge májenázhowâtdush puhkán enuhkuhkayá ?
59002026	Tebishko weowwemá uzzhochichâgoseeng ubnebomuhguk me giya mushkâwandumowin uhnokewin tuhgoosinok azhe nebomuhguk .
59003001	Nekaunisetok , kago nebewá o-o andussbeyag ogemákundun kago , ōnje kekekandánáwâ owushema mutcheizzhewabizzewin che iáeyag .
59003002	Onje nebená kago kemutche totámin kokkinná , kishpin oweuh aninne mutche totunzik eu aketōt , quiuk azhewabizzit aninne áwe , kushketōt che meenjimenunk kokkinná weow .
59003003	Binná tuhqunjegunun ketátowwânánig pazhekokozheeg otonewâng keche tabwatonungwâ , kegwagwakebetowânánig kokkinná weowwewân .
59003004	Binná ween giya uhnew nábequânun , kitche muhmechâwun , kitche notinōn ōnje mámácheeskâwun , anewakdush ōnje gágewashkâwun ánuh kitche agâsink mámenuhquiegun , wâinnequaumowâtigo wâtokajig .
59003005	Me tebishko otanuhnewemá , agâsink buhkazewin , wanje ogemákundumink kache apetandágwukin iuheen . Binná , kitche punge ishkota wanje kitche bishkákonag !
59003006	Otanuhnewemá me ishkota , áke mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; me tebishko ketanuhnewinánin magwaiuhe kebuhkazewininánin , obanájetōn kokkinná weowwemá , me wanje suhketag otanuhnewemá .
59003007	Kokkinná áwaseug , kokkinná giya benasewug giya kenabekōg , kokkinná giya kitche gummeeng ayájig , wângowitchegâzowug , gewângowitchegâzowug , aninnewug ōnje :
59003008	Otanuhnewemádush , kâ oweuh aninne otáwângowitoseen ; kâ kushketowinewunzenōn che ogemákundumink , mooshkena nebowine pichebowin .
59003009	Megwetcheweánán Kitche Manito Kōsenán uzzhioyung ; kenuhnibbekemándush aninne , uzzhioyung , ween Kitche Manito azhenágoozit gá ozhichegâzōt .
59003010	Mego e-e bazhekwunk otonemá megwach uzzheketōnk , giya uhnuhnibeketágoozink . Nekánissetōk , kâween ono iuheen tá izzhewabusinōn .
59003011	Mokidjewun nebe wâshkobung innuh nebe mokidjewunk giya wâsuhgunk mámowy ?
59003012	Kitche shomenâtik innuh nekânissetōk bakânuhkin nuh menekânun tá , ōnje netáweginōn ? obemáqutōnk innuh tá ōnje netáwigenōn kitche shomenun ? kâween kago mokidjewun nebeeg tá mokidjewunzenōn shewetágunâbo mámowy giya sháwetágunágumisinōk .
59003013	Owwanan andussheyag nabwâkât aninne ? tuhguh oguhwâbundiewan azhe mennobemátizzit omennouhnokewinun ōnje bakâtizzewin , nebwâkâwin ōnje .
59003014	Kishpin mutche he enanindeyag ketaewâng kago kitchetwâwanemo kago , kago guhgenowishkindun kago tabwawin .
59003015	O-o nebwâkâwin kâween ishpemink beōnje názhuhkemuhgusinōn , ákeeng ōnjemuhgut , weyâsemáng ōnjemuhgut Mutche Manitōng ōnjemuhgut .
59003016	Guhgáwanindewin , kekânindewin , andubgook me ōmbegizzewin anduhgook kokkinná giya mutche uhnokewinun .
59003017	Nebwâkâwindush ishpemink wanjemuhguk , benut , bakâtut , wângowut , mámázh keche nundotumink kago mooshkena keshawâtizzewin , menno menekânewun , kâ owushema apetanemowin tuhgoosinōn , kuhgianizzewin tuhgoosinōn .
59003018	Uhmenewung quiuk izzhewabizzewin ketegâtane weowwewâng innuhwandewin wazhetojig .
59004001	Ahnde wanjemuhguk nundobunewin kemegâtewinewâ ? kâween innuh kemázheninnewugizzewinewâ kenaguttuhwandumowinewân ōnjemuhgusinōn ?
59004002	Ketenandám we iáyayag , kâdush kekushketoseem che iáeyag , kenishewam owwe kushketoeyag che iyáeyag , kádush ketiáseem , ōnje kâ kenundotunzeem .
59004003	Kenundotumágam , kâdush ketiáseem ōnje kâ quiuk kenundotumágaseem , keweiōm kemázheninewugizzewinewâng .
59004004	Bisshegwâtizzetōk aninnewetōk , equatōk , kekekandánâwâ nuh innuhwandewin ákeeng me omiátáwizzewin Kitche Manito ? owwagwan ga innuhwandumogwan áke me Kitche Manito omiátáwizzemun ?
59004005	Ketenandám unishâ mazaniegun ekettomuhgut ochichâgomá gagishkowunk me wanje guhgáwanemungwâ ánint ?
59004006	Owushemadush ween megewa shâwanjegawin . Eu ōnje eketto , Kitche Manito onishkanemán kachetwâwanemonidjin biakâtizzinidjindush omenán shâwanjegawin .
59004007	Buhgitenumowik Kitche Manito keowwewân , megânik Mutche Manito keguh ozhemihowâdush .
59004008	Bazhew ezhe wequeeg Kitche Manito uzzhiát , giya ween bazhew tub ezhe weque uzzhiáeyag , benitōg keninjewân , mache izzhewabizzeyag benitōg ketaewân , keenowâ neezhwayug ayenandumag .
59004009	Kushkandumōk , mowwik , ázhequag , kebápewinewâ tub gwakesin che omowwewineyag , kemennowânegoozewinewâ che gwakesink che okushkandumowineyag .
59004010	Tuhbussebuhgitinumōk keowwewán anosumeet Kitche Manito , weendush keguh ōmbinik .
59004011	Kago mutchetuzzhindig kago , nekânisetōk , ween mache tuzzhemát wekânisun tebákonát wekânisun omutchetuzzhindán tebákonegawin otebákonán tebákonegawin : kishpindush tebákonumun tebákonegawin , kâween kekunwanduhzeen tebákonegawin , ketebákonán .
59004012	Bazhek mágewat tebákonegawin , ween okushketōn bemájetát giya banájetát owwanan wiyáweyag tuhtebákonitteyag ?
59004013	Umbasino nōngum keenowâ aketoeyag , nōngum gezhigōnk gamá wâbunk , eu otanuh neenguh ezhámin . ningo kekenonowin emá neenguh iámin neenguh kishpinutâzomin , neenguh átáwamin , neenguh kushketomin otawizzewin :
59004014	Kâdush ween kekekanduhzeem ga izzhewabuk wâbunk : wagonan e-e kebemátizzewin ? kâween nuh áwun áwunzenōn , niágwuk ukko wanebeek , bâbegadush ungomuhgut ?
59004015	Ketá ekettōm kishpin Kitche Manito enandunk , neenguh bemátizzemin , o-o neenguh izzhewabizzemin .
59004016	Nōngumdush kemennowânegoozim kesōnganemowinewâng , o-o mennowânegoozewin me mache izzhewabut .
59004017	Nōngum 'ow kakandunk ge ezhe mennototunk ōnjittádush we mennototunzik me e-e mutcheizzhewabizzit .
59005001	Mahjahg nōngum wiánutizzeyag aninnewetōk , mowwik wâōnōk , kekotuhgitowinewân keguh otissigōnâwâ .
59005002	Kewânutizzewinewâ begishkuhnut , kebeenzikowâgunewân oguhwasewug ogemejinâwán .
59005003	Ketozâwâ shoneám , keshoneám uhgwâgoosin uzzhagwâgosink eu ga wetokâzomuhguk che mutchetotágoeyag , oguh mejin keweyâs tábishko ishkotang . Ketoguisetōnâwâ uhtwágunikâtumag squâch gezhigutōn .
59005004	Binná , anoninjig ketuhnokewinewâ uhgew gâshkishungig keketegânewân otebáumágowinewâ , eu manjemenumowagwá kekuhgianizzewinewâng ázhequamuhgutōn ; omowwewinewân giya uhgew bashkooshegajig beendegamuhgutinewun Kitche Manito Sabbaoth otowwugán .
59005005	Kege mennowânegoozim uhbemátizzeyag omá ákceng kege mutcheizzhewabizzim ; kege totám keta , tebishko e-e gezhigut oweuh gá nisshewajin .
59005006	Kege banájeáwâg kege nesáwâg quiuk izzhewabizzit , kâdush kege nánákonigose .
59005007	Eu ōnje beōk , nekânisetōk , nánázh ope Kitche Manito che tuhkoshink . Binná ketegaweninne obetōn gache apetandágwutinik menekân ákeeng , kitche keenwazh obetōn nánázh keche otisigoot wiebuh che kemewung , giya squâch che kemewung .
59005008	Keenowâ giya beoyeuk ; mushkâwetōg ketaewân : Kitche Manito otuhkoshinowin bazhew tuhgoo .
59005009	Kago mutche enanindig kago mamáshkōt , nekânissetōk , konemá keguh banátizzisseem ; binná tebákonegat kebishquânt nebowwe .
59005010	Nekânissetōk , kekinowâbomikōg mamándáwizzidjig gá gegetojig Kitche Manito onozowinink ga izzhewabizzeyag che beoyag che kuhgwâtuhgitoyag .
59005011	Binná mennowânegoozewug neendenandámin uhgew kashketojig che beowât , kegenōndánâwâ Job otizzhewabizzewin , kegewâbundánâwâ uhwaquiyánik Kekitche Manitomenán , Kitche Manito kitche keshawâtizze , nokâtizze shâwanjegawinink .
59005012	Owushema andussink kago , nekânissetōk , kago mutche geezhwa kago pâpish , kago gezhik che nuhnápegeezhwayag , giya áke , kago giya pâpish nánápegeezhwa kago : máno á , ekettoeyag , á tuh áwun , kâween ekettoeyagdush guhtuh ezhe áwun ; keche ezhe pongeshinzewag bátándewinink .
59005013	Oweuh nuh andussheyag kuhgwâtuhgito ? tuh anumeá , oweuh nth mennowânegoozit ? tuh nuhgumo nuhgumonun .
59005014	Oweuh nuh andussheyag ákoozit ? oguh nundomán nâgânizzinidjin uhnumeawinink ; oguh uhnumeatumowâwândush ; keche nuhmuhkonint pemeta , Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink :
59005015	Uhnumeawin mushkâwandumowin guttuh ōnje bemátizzewug wiákoozidjig , Kitche Manitodush oguh pusegweendenán , kishpindush ge mutcheizzhewabizzit tuh mennoweshâwandágooze .
59005016	Weendumátik mamáshquut kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân , uhnumeatumátig mamashquut , konemá keguh ōnje nojemōm . Sângunk anumeawin , quiuk izzhewabizzit anione otuhnumeawin nebená apetandágwut .
59005017	Elias aninne acnandumung me giya ween aenandunk , wawane ge uhnumeá keche kemewunzenōk ; kâdush ge kemewunzenōn , ákeen nissokekenonowin usshe ningōtwâswogezis .
59005018	Minowádush ge uhnumeá gezhigōnkdush ge ōnje kemewun , ákeengdush ge ōnje netáwigenōn menekânewungin .
59005019	Nekânissetōk , kishpin oweuh andussheyag puhkayag tabwawinink , oweuhdush nayáb menonegoot ;
59005020	Máno oguh kekandán , ween nayáb menonegoot macheizzhewabizzinidjin , oguh bemájeán ochichâgwun che genebonipun , oguh gátonun kitche nebená mutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
60001001	Peter , Josus Christ otanonájin , otozhebeumowân miátáwizninidjin saswashkâjig mizzewa Pontusink , Galatiaink , Cappadociaink , Asiaink , Bithyniaink ,
60001002	Uhgew gá onuhgeminjig ween Kitche Manito Osemá , kiut kakanemájin Ochichâgomán uhbeneigowât ōnje , quiuk keche izzhewabizzewât , uhsiswabeginuminkdush Christ Jesus omisqueem , keguh sháwandágoozim , innowandewin tuh bátienut .
60001003	Megwetch 'zhenint Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun ween gá ozheinunk che negeunk minowâ , che mushkâwandumunk , che tabwatumunk Jesus Christ otábejebáwin ōnje .
60001004	Neendá takoshinomin otawizzewinink eu ga begishkunusinōk bánuk , kâ ánisusinōn , gezhigōnk gezhá atwâgunikágoeyag ,
60001005	Onje kekunowanemigōm Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewinink , mushkâwandumowinink che gâgega bemátizzink , gezhá gezissin che wâbundi ittink ishquâch che gezhiguk .
60001006	Eu ōnje , me wanje kitche pâpenanemoyag nōngumdush wanebeek kebwâwizzim , ( kishpin ōnjittá enandágwuk che izzhewabuk , ) kitche nebená kuhgwadebanindewinun ōnje .
60001007	Uhkuhgwadebandumink kemushkâwandumowinewâ , owushema uzzhuhpetandágwuk ozâwâ shoneá , eu ga bánátuk , uhkuhgwadebandumink ishkotang , konemá tá mikegâta keche uhnumeáng quiuk che izzhewabizzeeng che kitchetwâweint ope Jesus Christ che wâbomint .
60001008	Ween ánuh káwekâ kewâbomásewâ kesâgeáwâdush ween , ánuh kâ kewâbomásewâ nōngum ketabwatowáwâdush , ke pâpenanemōm , kâ tá kushketoseem che ekettōnk apeeche pápenanemowinewunk , mooshkená kitchetwâwizzewin :
60001009	Uzzhotâpenumink waquiág kemushkâwandumowinewâ , uhbemájeintwâ kechichâgowâg .
60001010	Eu gâgega bemátizzewin , mamándáwizzidjig nandowandumowât ápiche , uhgew gá ōnwâchegajig shâwandágoozewin ga otisigoeyag .
60001011	Uhnundonaumink nuhmunj ope Christ Ochichâgwun gagishkowâjin gá etumowât eu gá etumink negân Christ oguhgwâtuhgitowin kitchetwâwizzewin keche nayábejisink .
60001012	Gewâbunduháwug kâween ween tebinowa weowwewân neenowint atuh oge uhnoketánâwân iuheen nōngumdush wândumágoyag uhgew wândumonagwâ meenwâjemowin , ōnje mámowy Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun gá be ōnje názhuhkeet ; ono iuheen Kitche Manito omezhinowamun anandumowât che kunowâbundumowât .
60001013	Wuhwapinitizzōk kenáguttuhwandumowinewân uhnesátizzig mushkâwandumōk nundowandumōk uhwaquiág , shâwandágoozewin ōnje eu kebetágōm , Jesus Christ keche wâbundiewat weow :
60001014	Quiuk azhewabizzidjig uhbenocheug izzhewabizzig , kago izzhewabizze kago azhewabizzeyagobun magwouh uhnōch uzzhizzhewabizzeyag , magwouh uhkekanduhzewag kago :
60001015	Weendush ween gá nundominág kitche mennoizzhewabizze , me giya keenowâ me ga ezhe mennoizzhewabizzeyag kokkinná uhnōch mennoizzhewabizzewinink ;
60001016	Onje ezhebe-egâta , mennoizzhewabizzik ; ōnje nemennoizzhewabiz .
60001017	Kishpin nuhnândumag Oōsemá , ween tabákonunk kokkinná andusshewât aninnewug otuhnokewinewân , kâweendush oweuh owushema otuhpetanemáse , we kuhbikumōg menik omá ga iáyag che kotájeyag ;
60001018	Onje kekekandánâwâ kâween kege gishpinunigoseem bagishkunukin iuheen ōnje , tebishko shoneá , giya ozâwâ shoneá keguhgepách izzhewabizzewinewun , kosewág gá ōnje kekandumag ;
60001019	Kache apetandágwut Jesus Christ omisqueemdush , tebishko manishtânishans ningooche muhkuttawizzissig ketuhgizzissig :
60001020	Ween gá onuhgemint chebwâ ozhichegâtag áke , ishquâchdush keenowâ gá ōnje nágwitōng ,
60001021	Ween ōnje ketabwatowâwâ Kitche Manito ween gá ábejebáát ánuh genebonit uhgemenát kitchetwâwizzewin ; kemushkâwandumowinewâ giya kebuhgosanemowinewâ Kitche Mânitōng tá iá .
60001022	Onje kege beneáwâg kechichâgowâg , tabwatuming tabwawin ochichâgomá ōnje keche sâgeagwâ wekânissemág , eu ōnje sáságeittig mamashkōt ápiche :
60001023	Onje kege ánje negim kâween eu ga begishkunut , Kitche Manito odikittowin ōnje , eu bamátuk giágegasink .
60001024	Kokkinná weyâs tebishko mezhuskeeng wáwásokonan apetandágwut . Mezhuskeen nebwushketawun uhwâwâsokonawung pongesinōn :
60001025	Kitche Manito odikittowin gâgegasin . Me o-o ekettowin meenwâjemowinink wanje guhgekemigoeyag .
60002001	Eu ōnje opemaiuhe buhgitinumōk , kokkinná mázheninewug izzewin , kokkinná kuhgianizzewin , kokkinná guhgâwanindewin , kokkinná mutchegegetowinun ,
60002002	Tebishko waskenegidjig uhbenohheug , nundowandumōk quiuk totoshábo guhgequawinink keche ōnje netáwigeyag :
60002003	Kishpin gekotundumag Kitche Manito osháwanjegashkid :
60002004	Uhbenázekowag , tábishkogo bemátuk ásin , aninnewug gáwábenáwâjin , Kitche Manitodush gá onuhgemájin , kache apetandágoozit ,
60002005	Keenowá giya tebishko bamátukin uhsineen , ochichâgomá wegewâmink kege ezheigōm , keche sáságewitchegawenineweyag , keche menno izzhewabizzeyag , konemá ketá sáságewitchegam ochichâgomá sáságewitchegunun , e-e tinnouh Kitche Manito watâpenunk Jesus Christ ōnje .
60002006	Eu ōnje ozhebe-egâta mazaniegunink , binná , Sionink neendutōn wagemáwung ásin , ishquaiuhe wegewâmink , gá onuhginjegâtag , kache apetandágwut oweuhdush tiabwatowât kâ tuhagutchisse .
60002007	Keenowâ tiabwatumag , kekitche apetanemáwâ : uhgewdush tiabwatunzikōg , me eu ásin wazhegâjig gáwabeumowât , mego eu natumisink ishquaiuhe wegewâmink ,
60002008	Asin bazogashinink giya azbebeek nishkâtizzewin , che ōnje nishkâtizzewât uhgew bazogashingig ekettowin , uhgew tiabwatunzigook : ōnjittágo eu enuhgenáwug .
60002009	Keenowâdush gá onuhgeminjig , ningōtozhán ketáwim , keenowâdush ogemáwe sáságewitchegaweninewug ketáwim , quiuk izzhewabizzidjig anishanâbag ketáwim ; keche wâbundiewayag ogitchetwâwizzewin ween gá beságizzewinág kushkedibikutōnk uhgebuhgumewinág miámuhkâtandágwut owâsayázewinink :
60002010	Kiut kâween ketuhnishanâbawisseemwâbun , nōngumdush Kitche Manito , otuhnishanâbamun ketáwim ; kâ kesháwandágoozisseemwâbun kiut , nōngumdush keshâwandágoozim .
60002011	Siágeinnuhgook , keguhgâzominenim , tebishko miátáwizzingin giya babámátizzingin , metágwietumōk weyâse enandumowin , eu mágánát ochichâgomá ;
60002012	Máno quiuk guttuh izzhewabut ketizzhewabizzewinewâ magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig : ōnje , nōngum azhe mutchetuzzhemikwâ tebishko mache izzhewabizzidjig , konemá ope wâbundumowât wanissheshingin ketuhnokewinun , oguh kitchetwâweáwân Kitche Manitōn mowwuttissintwânin .
60002013	Buhgitenumōk keowwewân kokkinná aninne otebákonegawin Kitche Manito ōnje ; kishpin kitche ogemá áwit ; ânga ween owushema apetandágoose ;
60002014	Giya kishpin ogemág buhgitinumowik keowwewân ânga , ween otizzhenázhowân , che buhshunzhaōntwâ mutcheizzhewabizzidjig , tebáumágowizzewât uhgew manototungig .
60002015	Me o-o Kitche Manito otenandumowin quiuk uhmennototumink che pezân ábeagwâ kakanduhzigoog azhewabizzewât kagebátizzidiig aninnewug .
60002016	Wiánuhkeengin uzzhioseeng kewânuhkewinewâ , kitchebuhbeenzikowâgun che gátōng mutcheta-awin , Kitche Manito otoskenegamunigo izzhewabizzik .
60002017	Kitchetwâwanim kokkinná aninnewug . Sâgeikōg wekánissemág . Gosik Kitche Manito : kitchetwâwanemik kitche ogemá .
60002018	Bemetágunetōk , tuhbussebuhgitinumowikōg ketogemámewâg keowwewân , kokkinná kotájewinink kâween atuhgo mennoizzhewabizzewât bakátizzewât kishpin giya miázheninnewugizzewât .
60002019	Me quiuk izzhewabizzewin , kishpin aninne tabwatowát Kitche Manitōn osittátotowint mutchetotowint , ōnje kuhgwâtuhgitōt .
60002020	Wagonan e-e kitchetwâwizzewininan ope buhshunzhaogowizzeyag tebinowa kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân ōnje , bakágo ketotâpenánâwâ ? kishpindush mennotumunne ōnje kuhgwâtuhgitoeyagdush , bakágo ketotâpenánâwâ o-o Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunk .
60002021	Me o-o agoeyag che izzhewabizzeyag ; ōnje Jesus Christ giya ween ge ōnje kuhgwâtuhgito keowwenánin , uhgenuhguttumonunk che kekinowâbominunk ga izzhewabizzeyunk , keche násábáunag gá unne ezhe tuhkokeet :
60002022	Ween kâween wekâ ge mutche izzhewabizzisse kâ kago kuhgianizzewin mikkunzeem otonink ;
60002023	Ope mache guhnonint , kâ mutche guhnonáse , ope kagwâtuhgeint , kâwe kuhgwasagewase ; obuhgitinumowân weow uhnew quiuk tabákoneganidjin :
60002024	Ween tebinowa weowwink gá iuhtōt kemutcheizzhewabizzewininánin metigōnk , keenowint kege nebomin mutcheizzhewabizzewinink , keche ōnje bemátizzeyunk quiuk izzhewabizzewinink ; gáinuhguhnámint me wanje nojemoeyag .
60002025	Mánishtânishug waneshinowâjin ketizzhewabizzimwâbun nōngumdush nayáb kege uzzhakewam kanowanemát mánishtânishun , ween gagekemát kechichâgowân uzzhiát .
60003001	Giya keenowâ wewemátōk , tuhbussebuhgitenumowikög kenábamewâg , keowwewân ; kishpin oweuh tabwatunzik ekettowin , giya weenowâ ekettowin ánuh nōnduhzikwâ , konemá tá ōnje tabwatumōg wewewân azhewâbizzinit ōnje ;
60003002	Magwouh che wâbundumowât kemennoizzhewabizzewinewâ , mámowy kekotájewinewâ .
60003003	Osuhsagâwinewân kago tuh izzhewabusinōn , áqutcheiuhe weowwewáng uhpuhpezekuhumowát wenisisewân , ozáwâ shoneá uhmuhtindumowát , uhbezekoniawât .
60003004	Máno tuh izzhewabut , aninne giánint otaink , eu bagishkunussinōk bakâtizzewin , tuhbusanemowin , ochichâgománg , me o-o anosumeet Kitche Manito kache apetandágwut .
60003005	Me o-o gá i-izzhewabizzewát kiut quiuk izzhewabizzidjig equawug , Kitche Manitōn omenáwân weowwewân sáságawittizowug tebinowa onábamewân , ogebuhgitenumowâwân weowwewân ;
60003006	Me o-o Sarah gá ezhetabwatowât Abrahamun , neendogemám uzzhenângomint ; ween ketodânissemigowá menik mano izzhewabizzeyag , kishpin kotájeissewag uhnōch sagizzewinun .
60003007	Giya keenowâ onâbamemátōk , wetegamikōg uhgew , quiuk kekandumowinink ōnje , kitchetwâwanemint weowwemá tebishko nánuhmuk otossowin , azhe wuhweej sazekizzeendink shâwandágoozewin bemátizzewin , ketuhnumeawinun keche bánáchichegâtasinōk .
60003008	Squâch , bazhekotōg ketenandumowinewân , shâwanindig mamáshqut , tebishko tebinowa wekânisinindink , azhesâgeittig , keshawâtizzig , keshawânotátig ;
60003009	Kago mutchetotátewin ázhetá mutchetotátekago , kago iázhetá kezhe guhnonik kago , tiuhgwutchigo keguh shâwanemág ; ōnje kekekandánâwâ kenundomigōm o-o keche izzhewabizzeyag , konemá keguh ōnje shâwandágoozim .
60003010	Ween siágetōt bemátizzewin , nundowandunk che wâbundunk wanissheshingin gezhigutōn , máno oguh kunwandán ota nuhnew che mutche gegetosig , giya otōn wekâ che mutche gegetosig , kuhgianizzewinink ;
60003011	Oguh ozhindán mutcheizzhewabizzewin , tuh we mennototum : oguh nundowâbundán mennoinnowandewin che nopenuttunkdush .
60003012	Onje Kitche Manito oskezhikōn kunowâbomán quiuk izzhewabizzinidjin , otowwugun bákissininnewun uhnōndumowât otánumbawininne : Kitche Manitodush oskezhigōnk mutcheenanemán machetotuminidjin .
60003013	Owwanan uhow ga mutchetotonág , kishpin nopenuttumag eu wanissheshink ?
60003014	Kishpindush kuhgwâtuhgitoeyag quiuk izzhewabizzewin ōnje , kemennowânegoozim ; kago gosá kago , kago giya kushkandun kago .
60003015	Kitchetwâwanemik Kitche Mánito ketaewâng , gâgineek washowandumōk keche nuhquatowag oweuh kuhquajeminág buhgoosanemowin gagishkumag bakâdizzewinink sagizzewinink .
60003016	Quiuk keche enandumag ; eu kishpin mutche tuzzheminágwâ tebishko macheizzhewabizzingin , konemá tá águtchewug , ōnje uhguhgenowishkewát uhtuzzhindumink , kemennoizzhewabizzewâ Christ ōnje .
60003017	Owushema mennoizzhewabut , anandunk Kitche Manito keche ōnje kukgwâtuhgittoeyag quiuk izzhewabizzewin gamá keche mutcheizzhewabizzeyagobun .
60003018	Onje Christ ningōtink ge kuhgwâtuhgito mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje , quiuk azhewabizzit , quiuk azhewabizzissig ōnje , konemá ketá buhgumewinegonán Kitche Manito uzzhiát , uhge nesint weyâsink , tuhtátuhbeetdush ochichâgōnk :
60003019	Eu ōnje oge owwe guhgekemán ochichâgomán awâkânewinidjin ;
60003020	Uhgew tiabwatunzikwâbun ope ningōtink Kitche Manito kitche keenwazh uhgebeōt Noah ogezhiguttomun , magwouh nábequân uzzhozhetōng , eu bunge bamátizzidjig me niswâswe , gá ōnje bemátizzewât nebeeng .
60003021	Me e-e tebishko baptizewawin azhe bemájeigoyunk nōngum ( kâween ween ningooche uhbuhgitenumink wenizzewin weyásemáng , meatuh nuhquatumink quiuk enandumowin Kitche Manitōng , ) Jesus Christ otábejebáwin :
60003022	Ween gá unne negâneet gezhigōnk , Kitche Manitodush ogitchenikâng iá ; Kitche Manito omezhinowamun , ogemákundumowinun giya mushkâwizzewinun , tebandumoná .
60004001	Eu ōnje , ōnje Christ keowwenánin ge ōnje kuhgwâtuhgito oweyásink , ushwewinikotátizzook tebishko che enandumag : ōnje ween guhguhgwâtuhgitōt , oweyâsink ogenuhgután mutche izzhewabizzewin ;
60004002	Kâween kiábe tuh bemátizzisse magwouh uhbemátizzit ákeeng , aninne otenandumowin ōnje , meatuh Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunk .
60004003	Eu ope kabekosag kebemátizzewininánin tatussin keche enuhnokeyunk miátáwizzidjig , meenwandumowât magwouh uhbamosayunk bisshegwâtizzewinink mutche enandumowinink , kewushquabewinink , ōmbuhkumegizzewinink , wekoongawinink , uhsáságewinintwâ muzzenineeg :
60004004	Mámuhkâtandumōg uhwejewâsewagwâ azhewabizzewât che izzhewabizzeyagobun , kemutchetuzzhemigowâgdush :
60004005	Oguh tuhgindumowâwân uhnew gázhetánidjin che tebákonánit ono bemâtizzinidjin giya uhgew nabonidjin .
60004006	Onje , me o-o gá ōnje weendumowintwâ o-o meenwâjemowin uhgew gá nabojig , konemá tá tebákonáwug , aninne weyâsink ōnje , tuh bemátizzewug Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje .
60004007	Uhwaquiág kokkinná iuheen bazhew tuhgoo : e-e ōnje we uhnesátizzig , uhkowâbig , uhnumeág .
60004008	Owushema tussink kago ápiche we keshawânotátig mamashqut : keshawâtizzewin tuh ōnje uhgwuhniegâtawun nebewá mutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
60004009	Shâshâwanindig mamashqut , che sáságizzissewag .
60004010	Kokkinná aninnewug ga ezhe mámenintwâ me ga ezhe nánezhokomátewât mámashqut , manoizzhewabizzidjig mezhinowag uhnōch azhenágwutinik Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin .
60004011	Kishpin oweuh aninne gegetōt , Kitche Manito odikittowin azhebe-egâtanik guhtuh ezhe gegeto ; kishpin oweuh aninne uhnokeet , máno tuh totum Kitche Manito go azhe megewat mushkâwizzewin ; Kitche Manito kokkinná iuheen ōnje tuh kitchetwâweá Jesus Christ ōnje ; ween ga uhnumeatowwint gâgineek . Amen .
60004012	Siágeinuhgook , kago mámuhkâtandun kago , o-o ishkotang azhenágwut kuhgwadebanindewin ga guhgwadebanemigoyag , kago go miátáwuk andotátingin che izzhewabuk ;
60004013	Pápenanemók , ōnje ánint ketiánâwâ Christ okotuhgitowinun ; ope ogitchetwâwizzewin nágwutinik keguh mennowânegoozim .
60004014	Kishpin mutchetuzzhemigoeyag Christ otuhnozowin ōnje , keshâwandágoozim ; ochichâgomán ogitchetwâwizzewin Kitche Manito ketotissigōnâwâ ; weenowâ omutchetuzzhemáwân , keenowâdush kekitchetwâweáwâ .
60004015	Kago oweuh andussheyag oweuh nashewashkidjin , ezhe kushkandun kago , giya oweuh gamotishkidjin , giya oweuh mutcheizzhewabizzidjin , giya oweuh aninne ápiche wandumizzinidjin bakânizzinidjin aninnewun otinuhnokewinine .
60004016	Kishpin aninne megooshkâchetowint Christianewit ōnje , kago tuh águtchese ; oguh kitchetwâweán Kitche Manitōn e-e ōnje .
60004017	Ochichesamuhgut ope che tebákonegang Kitche Manito owegewâmink ; kishpin máchesag keenowint , áneen ga izzhewabizzewât ope eeshquasanik uhgew tiabwatunzikōg Kitche Manito meenwájemowin ?
60004018	Kishpin quiuk izzhewabizzidjig uhgâwâ bemátizzewât áneende uhgew wa Omanitomesigook mache izzhewabizzidjig keche nágoozewât ?
60004019	Eu ōnje , máno uhgew gwatuhgitoiig Kitche Manito otenandumowin ōnje , oguh buhgitenumowân , ochichâgowân che kunowandumowât , uhmennoizzhewabizzeeng , tebishko quiuk Manitōng .
60005001	Okewanzeug wâjewinágook neenguhgâzomág , giya okewanze neendow , neengewâbundán Christ okotuhgitowin , ánint neenguhtián kitchetwâwizzewin e-e ga nágwuk .
60005002	Usshumikōg nangowawânuhgizzidjig wâjewenágook Kitche Manito tabanemájin , uhkowâbomikōk kâween ōnjittá enandumag atuh kâween ween bejenizzewinink ; quiuk tebinowago che enandumag ;
60005003	Kâ giya wagemákundumingin Kitche Manito tabandunk , keguh totunzeem , keche kekinoumowagwâgo nangōtwawânuhgizzidjig .
60005004	Opedush tuhgoshink , ogemá tabanemát manishtânishun , keguhtiánâwâ wewoquân kitchetwâwizzewin wekâ ga banátussinōk .
60005005	Giya keenowâ ōskenowatōk , tuhbussebuhgitenumowikōg okewanzeug keowwewán ; kagat kokkinná andussheyag tuh tuhbussebuhgittenumátig keowwewân , uhgweyeuk ketuhbusanemowinewâ : Kitche Manito onuhgânán kachetwâwanemonidjin , omenándush shâwanjegawin tuhbussanemonidjin .
60005006	Tuhbussebuhgitenumowik eu ōnje keowwewâng Kitche Manito anámiuhe oninjeeng , konemá keguh ishpebuhgitinumowâ ope ochichesag :
60005007	Ween buhgitenumowik kokkinná kenáguttuhwandumowinewân ; ween kenáguttuhwanemigowâ .
60005008	Innissátizzig , ukkowâbig ; ōnje kemiátáwizzeem Mutche Manito , babánekimoot messhebezheeng uhpapánundowâbomán oweuh keche mikowât owweumowât .
60005009	Metágwanázho-ōk mushkâwegâbowig mushkâwandumowinink ōnje kekandánâwâ kekânissewâg ákeeng giya weenowâ tebishko azhe kuhgwâtuhgitowát .
60005010	Kitche Manito kokkinná shâwanjegawin , ween nandominunk gágega kitchetwáwizzewinink Jesus Christ ōnje , ope gá kuhgwátuhgitoeyag wanebeek , mano keguh gezhetáigowâ , keguh sōgeigowâ .
60005011	Ween tuh kitchetwâwizze tuh ogemáwe gâgineek . Amen .
60005012	Kege ozhebeumonim punge Silvanus uhgemájetōn , nabwákât wekánissemá áwewetōk , keguhgázominenim che mushkâwegáboweyag o-o quiuk Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin .
60005013	Anumeajig Babyionink , mámowy gá onuhgemigoeyag kesuhgeninjenigowág ; giyadush Marcus neenguis .
60005014	Uhnumekotátig mamashqut che ojeendeyag che keshawânotáteyag . Keguh mennoinnowandim kokkinná menik Jesus Christ tabaneminag . Amen .
61001001	Simon Peter , Jesus Christ otoskenegamum otanonájin , otoshebeumowán ono tebishko azhe mushkâwanduminidjin Kitche Manito omennoizzhewabizzewin ōnje , giya Bamájeinunk Jesus Christ ōnje :
61001002	Sháwanjegawin giya mennoinnuhwandewin tuh bátienut ga otissigoeyag Kitche Manito uhkekanemag ōnje giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ,
61001003	Azhe Ogitche Manitowewin mushkâwizzewinink kege menigonán kokkinná iuheen eu wanje bemátizzink Manitowewin , ōnje uhkekanemunk ween nandominunk che kitchetwáwizzeyunk che mennoizzhewabizzeyunk :
61001004	O-o ōnje kitche apetandágwukin wâweendumátewinun kege menigomin ; ono ōnje ánint ketá otápenánáwân Kitche Manito otizzhewabizzewin , uhge nuhgutumunk bagishkunnk ayág ákeeng mutche-enandumowinink .
61001005	Minowádush kezhissbowwizzig konemá keguh iánâwi mushkáwandumowin giya mennoizzhewabizzewin , giya kekandumowin ;
61001006	Tebuhmanemowinun giya beowin ; giya Manitowewin ;
61001007	Wawekánisingin keshawátizzewinink , giya keshawánotátim .
61001008	Kishpin ono iuheen bátienuk kegishkumag , keche bátienoyag ketizzhe igōnáwán Kekitche Manitomenan Jesus Christ okekandumowinink .
61001009	Weendush ayásig ono iuheen kuhgebeengwa , kâ wâsâ ukwábisse , owuhnandán uhge beneint kiut omutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
61001010	Eu ōnje nekânissetōk owushema kezhishshowizzeeg , kenundomigowinewâ ketonuhgimegowinewâ che quiukquandágwuk : ōnje kishpin o-o totumag kâwekâ keguh pongeshinzeem :
61001011	'Squadam keguh pákindánumágōm kecbe beendegayag Kekitche Manito , giya gá Bemájeinunk Jesus Christ otogemáwewinink .
61001012	Eu ōnje kâween neenguh wubnanduhze kecbe kekandumoninuhgook minowâ ono iuheen ánuh kekekandánun kemushkâwizzimdush nōngum quiuk tabwawinink .
61001013	Kagat quiuk izzhewabut neendenandum , menik ga iáwânan o-o wegewâmink , keche ōmbwainuhgook , keche mikwandumoninuhgook ;
61001014	Onje neenkekandán wiebuh neenguh gezekám o-o wegewâm , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ gá azhewâbundi-it .
61001015	Minowâdush neenguh wekoochetōn keche we kushketoeyag ope ge neboeyán , gâgineek che kunwandumag ono iuheen .
61001016	Kâween neenge nopenuttunzemin kuhgianizze ádissokânug , ope kakandumoninág Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ omushkâwizzewin otuhkoshinowin , kege wâbundámin tebinowa keskezhigonán ogitchetwáwizzewin .
61001017	Oge otissigōn kitchetwáwizzewin bisshegandágoozewin Kitche Manitōng ōnje , ope watisigōt tinnouh gegetowin kitche kitchetwâwizzewinink , me uhow siágeug Neenguis , ween ápiche nemeenwandum .
61001018	O-o ekettowin gezhigōnk wanjemuhguk nenōndámin , magwouh uhwejewungid emá eke Kitche Manito owudjewimink .
61001019	Ketiámindush owushema quiuk ekettowin ōnwâchegawin ; enandágwut keche ukkowâbundumunk tebishko wâsayá siágátagin kushkedibikutōnk nánázh gezhigut che máje wâsayág , giya wâbun uhnung mokuhunk ketaewâng .
61001020	Kekandumōk o-o netam , kâ kago ōnwâchegawin azhebeegâtag mazaniegunink , gemōch ánekuhnotunzeeng .
61001021	Onwâchegawin getuhkoshinomuhgut kiut kâween aninne otenandumowin ōnje ; manoizzhewabizzidjig Kitche Manito oteninnemun , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun azhe guhgekimigowâtigo ge iekettowug .
61002001	Kuhkenowishke ōnwâchegajig iábuneeg ukko magwa anishanábag , tebishko ga ezhe iáwat kuhgenowishke guhgequajig magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , oguhbetōnâwâ gemōch mutche guhgequawinun , tebishko ágoonwatumink Kitche Manito uhgishpinunigowâjin , oguh betázōnâwâ kezhesag che banájentwâ .
61002002	Nebewá oguh ezhe nopenutánâwá ga ezhe bátázewât ; uhgew ōnje ga ezhe tabwawinewung , gutuh mutchetuzzhinjegâta .
61002003	Osáságizzewinewá ōnje , kuhgiazhe keezhwawinun ōnje keguh onuhgumigowâg keche átáwawât keowwewân : otebákonegawinewâ kiut ōnje , kâ beomuhgusinōn , uhbátámintwâ kâ nebámuhgusinōn .
61002004	Kishpin Kitche Manito gá sháwanemásegwan omezhinowamun gá mutcheizzhewabizzidjig , oneeswabenán mutche ishkotang oge ezhe buhgitenán che tákobizzonit kushkedibikutōnk che kunowanemint nánázh tebákonegawegezhigut ;
61002005	Kishpindush kâ shâwanduhzegwan kiut ta áke , uhge bemájeát Noahun niswâswâ bamátizzinidjin , gagequat quiuk izzhewabizzewin , uhge mooshkotōt áke waomanitomisigōk ;
61002006	Uhge châgizzunk otanowun Sodomun giya Gomorrhaun pingwe atuh uhge uttag , uhge banájetōt uhge gwanuhbewabinunk , owâbunduhátdush uhgew ánint ga ezhe bemátizzidjig che omanitomissigwâ ;
61002007	Uhge bemájeátdush quiuk azhewabizzit Lot , ween gá kotuhgito wânizzidjig omutcheizzhewabizzewinewá ōnje :
61002008	( Onje uhow quiuk azhewabizzit aninne , wâtegamigowâjin , uhwâbundumink , uhnōndumink okotuhgitonit quiuk azhewabizzinidjin ochichâgwun andusso gezhigutinik omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ ōnje ; )
61002009	Kitche Manito okekandán ga totunk che bemájeát quiuk azhewabizzinidjin kuhgwadebanemintwânin , giya che kunwanemát macheizzhewabizzinidjin nánázh e-e gezhigut ope che tepákonegang keche buhshunzhaogowizzewât :
61002010	Onjittá uhgew n'wâpenuttungig oweyâsemá wánuk izzhewabizzewin , uhsheengandumowât che tebanemintwâ , uhsōnganemowât ; tebinowa ōnjittá , kâ sagizzissewug owwe mutchetuzzhemáwât nâgânizzinidjin .
61002011	Kitche Manito Ochichâgwundush kache apetandágoozidjig , kâween omutchetzzhemásewân uhnew anosumeet Kitche Manitōn .
61002012	Uhgewdush nowokâtat áwase apetandágoozidjig , ge ezhichegâzo keche otâpenint che bánájeint , omutche tuzzhindánáwân uhnissetotunzikwâ , guhtuh banátizzewug tebinowa obegishkunutomewâ .
61002013	Tuhtebáumágowizzewug omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ , tebishko uhgew manowânegotojig weowwewân , che kewushquabuteowât weowwewá gázhegukin , ketuhgizzewug , mutche aninnewug ábápenotumowât tebinowa owiazhindizzowinewá , magwouh ayeezh owwekonigoeyag ;
61002014	Oskezhigowân mooshkenanig bisshegwâtizzewinewin , ká kushketosewug we bonetowát mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; owiazhemáwán nánuhmizzinidjin ochichâgomán ; otaewân kokkinná mooshkenawun sáságizzewin nánáguttuhwandumowin ; kuhgianizzidjig uhbenocheug .
61002015	Ogooshquanánâwâ quiuk izzhewabizzewin , ningooche ezhe wuhnishinōg , onopenutánâwâ Baalam , Bosor oguisun , otizzhewabizzewin ween gá siágetōt tebáumátewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje .
61002016	Ween kegesheguhnoná omutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje : natágegetosig babazhekokashe uhgegetōt , aninnewug uzzhinwat gesheguhnotunk o-o anwâchegat okewuhnátizzewin .
61002017	Uhgew me ōndiebânun nebe anduhgoosinōk , anáqut papámásink notinōnk , uhgew uhwun kushkedibbikuk kunwandumowâwug gâgineek .
61002018	Ope kitche gegetowinun azhe gegetowâjin uhzhanundomáwug weyâsenandumowinink ōnje , uhgew wazhemojig uhgew kushkedibikutōnk bamátizzidjig .
61002019	Magwouh wâweendumowâwât wânuhkewin , weenowâ owwâkânewewug begishkunutōnk : ōnje aninne owwâkâná kishpin oweuh anewishkágoojin .
61002020	Kishpin ope ge ozhindumowât owenizzewinewâ ákeeng , uhkekanemáwât Kitche Manitōn giya gá Bemáje-ewat ween Jesus Christ , minowâ wâwayágishkáwât ákeeng uhnewishkágowât , ishquiách owushema izzhewabizzewug netam gá izzhewabizzewât .
61002021	Owushema tá ge onissheshin kekanduhzikwâbun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , uhgamá gá kandumowât , nayáb ezhe gwaketáwát uhnuhgutumowât guhgequawin gá menintwâbun .
61002022	Azhewabutinnego quiuk tabwa ekettowin , anemoosh nayáb omejin oshissheguhgowân minowâ , kōkōshdush gá kesebeginegâzōt owwe tutebitá minowá uzzhishkeeng .
61003001	Me o-o ánekách mazaniegun , wazhepeumonuhgook , siágeinnuhgook keche ōmbwatoyán bánukin kenáguttuhwandumowinewân keche ōnje kunwandumag :
61003002	Konemá ketá kunwandánâwâ ekettowinun manoizzhewabizzidjig ōnwâchegajig gá ekettowât , giya neenguhgekimigowininán Kitche Manito gá Bemájeumint , gá ezhe guhgekimeumint .
61003003	Kekandumōk o-o netam , tuhtuhkoshinōg equâch gezhigutōn ga pâpenotungig , uhnopenutumowât tebinowa otenandumowinewân ;
61003004	Guhtuh ekettowug , áneen eu wâweendumágawin owwe tuhkoshink ? ōnje , ōsemág gá ukko uhpuhgutingwâmewât , kokkinná iuheen ezhewabutigo azhewabukkebun wiazhkut wazhetōng áke .
61003005	O-o kâ enanduhzewug keche kekekandumowât , Kitche Manito odikitowin ōnje , gezhigōn ge ōnje ozhichegâtawun kiut , giya áke , uhságebemuhkebun nebeeng giya anámebeeng :
61003006	Eu ōnje áke eu ope ákewungebun , banátut , uhgebanátuk nebe ōnje :
61003007	Gezhik giya áke nōngum ayágin kuhnowanjegáta me go ekettowin ōnje keche banátuk ishkota ōnje ope e-e gezhigut keche tebákonegang waomanitomissigook aninnewug che bamátizzewât .
61003008	Siágeinnuhgook , kekandumōk o-o ningōtwayug kago , Kitche Manito otenandumowinink metoswâk tusso kekenonowin ningo gezhikgo otuhpetandán , giya ningo gezhik tebishko me toswâk kekenonowin .
61003009	Kâween Kitche Manito buhbakekâtizzisse owâweendumágawin , ánint aninnewug anandumowât ; keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgito keenowint , ōnje kâ enanduhze oweuh che banátizzit , kokkinná onundowanemán che ánwanindizzonit .
61003010	Kitche Manito ogezhigutōn tuh tuhkoshinomuhgut tebishko gamotishkid takoshingin nebádibbik ; me ope gezhik giya áke guttuh májámuhgut , kitche kotámegwawag , kokkinná iuheen tuh ningetawun ga ezhe kezhetag , áke giya kokkinná uhnokewinun anduhgogin tuh châgâgetawun .
61003011	Onje neenkekandámin kokkinná ono iuheen che banátuk owwagwanug wiáwewagwan kokkinná mennoizzhewabizzewinun kokkinná manitowin ga áwung ?
61003012	Uhnundowábundumunk uhwawebizzeyunk e-e gezhigut Kitche Manito che takoshink ope gezhik suhketanemuhguk tuh ningeta ga ezhe kitche kezhitag ?
61003013	Keenowintdush eu wâweendumágawin ōnje kenundowábundámin ōshke gezhik giya ōshke áke , eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin uzzhiág .
61003014	Eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook , ōnje kenundowâbundámin uhnetinnowun , kezhisshowwissik konemá keguh mikág innuhwandewinink keche ketuhgizzissewag .
61003015	Enandumōk Kekitche Manitomenán keenwazh okotuhgitowin me kuhnowanjegawin ; tebishko siágeunk kekânissenán Paul tebishko nebwâkâwin gá ezhe menint , kege ozhebeumágōm ;
61003016	Giya go kokkinná omazaniegunink uhtuzzhindumink ono iuheen , ánint kago kitchesuhnágut owwe nissetotumink , uhgew kekinnoumowâsewinjig mashkâwanduhzigook , ogwakebetōnáwâ tebishko azhe gwakenumowât puhkân ozhebe-egunun tebinowa uhbenátowât weowwewân .
61003017	Keenowâdush ween siágeinnuhgook , ōnje kekekandánáwá ono iuheen kiut , ângwâmissig , konemá giya keenowâ ningooche keguh ezhe suhgábeginegōm kushkedibikutōnk miázheninewugizzit ōnje , kepongeshinōmdush tebinowa kemushkâwandumowinewâng .
61003018	Máno ashkum mushkâwandumōk ashkum kekandumōk . Kitche Manito gá Bemájeinunk Jesus Christ okekandumowin . Ween tuh gitchetwâwizze nōngum gâgineek . Amen .
62001001	Eu wiazhkut miájetáng geáwung , eu gá nōndumáng , gá wâbundumáng , tebinowa neskezhigonán , wiásumábundumáng , eu neninjenáng watâpenumáng ekettowin bemátizzewin ;
62001002	( Bemátizzewin mizzhishshowwenágwichegâtag , neengewâbundámin newetokámin , kewâbundieninemin eu gâgega bemátizzewin , eu wejeendunk osemá kegemesâbundiegomin ; )
62001003	Giya keenowâ che wetokowweyángebun azhe wetokowungid Osemá giya Oguisun Jesus Christ .
62001004	Ono iuheen ketoshebeumoneme che kitche pâpenanemoyag .
62001005	Me ekettowin gá nōndumowungid keweendumoneme , Kitche Manito wâsayá , kâdush kago kushkedibbikut ogegishkunzeen .
62001006	Kishpin ekettoeyáng newetokâzomin , magwa kushkedibikut bamosayáng neendá kuhgenowishkemin , kâ quiuk neendá izzhewabizzissemin .
62001007	Kishpin wâsayáng bamosayáng , weendush wâsayág ayát , newetokotátemin mamashkōt Kitche Manito Oguisun , Jesus Christ omisqueem kesebeginegomin kokkinná kemutcheizzhewabizzewinenán .
62001008	Kishpin ekettoeyáng kâ kago neendiámin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , neendá kuhgenowishkindizzomin , kâween quiuk tabwawin neengegishkunzemin .
62001009	Kishpin ábawâzoeyâng nemutcheizzhewabizzewinenánin ween keshawátizze quiuk izzhewabizze che mennowesháwanemeumint nemutcheizzbewabizzewinenán giya che benizzeumint kokkinná kemutcheizzhewabizzewinenánin .
62001010	Kishpin ekettoeyâng kâween nemutcheizzhewabizzissemin , kuhgenowishke Kitche Manito neendá enánán giya ogegetowin kâween kegegishkunzemin .
62002001	Neenduhbenocheemetok , ketoshebeumonim ono iuheen , che mutcheizzhewabizzissewag , kishpin oweuh aninne mutcheizzhewabizzit oweuh neendiáwánán che guhnonát Osemá , Jesus Christ quiuk izzhewabizze :
62002002	Ween mennoweshâwanjega gá mutchetotumingin , kâweendush atuh keenowind mutchetotumun kokkinná go anegoquág áke .
62002003	Kunowandumowuk oguhgequawin me wanje kekandumunk uhkekanemung .
62002004	Ween neenkekanemá aketōt kunwandumowâsewintdush oguhgequawin kuhgenowishke , kâween tabwawin ogegishkunzeen .
62002005	Weendush kanowandunk odikittowininne , me 'ow siágeát Kitche Manitōn me o-o wanje kekandumunk beenjinná Kitche Manito uzzhiáeyunk .
62002006	Ween beenjinná Kitche Manito neendá aketōt azhewabizzinitigo Kitche Manito otá izzhewabizze .
62002007	Nekânissetōk kâween ōshke guhgequawin ketoshebeumosinonim , gatá guhgequawin atuh wazhebeumonágook , wiazhkut miáje guhgequang . Gata guhgequawin n'wândumag wiazhkut miáje guhgequang .
62002008	Minowâ ōshke guhgequawin ketoshebeumonim iuheen tiabwawinewung gagishkungin giya gegishkumag , ōnje kushkedibbikuk ge kuhbekosa , quiuk wâsayádush nōngum wâsayá .
62002009	Ween áketōt wâsayág iá , sheenganemátdush wekânisun kushkedibikutōnk iá , nánázh nōngum .
62002010	Ween siágeát wekânisun , magwa wâsayá , kâween tá bezositashinze .
62002011	Weendush shânganemát wekânisun kushkedibikutōnk bamosa , kâ okekanduhzeen azhát , ōnje kushkedibikut oguhgebeengwaigoon .
62002012	Ketoshebeumonenim uhbenōcheitōk , ōnje kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân kemennoweshâwandágoozim otuhnozowinink ōnje .
62002013	Ketoshebeumonenim , nōsetōk , ōnje kekekanemáwâ wiazhkut miájetáng ; ketoshebeumonenim , ōskenowatōk , ōnje kegebuhkinowâwâ Mutche Manito ; ketoshebeumonenim uhbenōche-etōk , ōnje kege kekanemáwâ Osemá .
62002014	Kege oshebeumonenim , nōsetōk , ōnje kege kekandánâwâ wiazhkut miájetáng wanje bemátizzit : kege oshebeumonenim ōskenowatōk ōnje uhmushkâwizzeyag Kitche Manito odikit towin gegishkumag kebuhkinowâ Mutche Manito .
62002015	Kago sâgeto kago áke , gamá iuheen ákeeng atagin : kishpin oweuh aninne siágetojin áke ōsemá osâge-ewawin ká ogegishkunzeen .
62002016	Kokkinná kago atag kokkinná kago manwandumink kokkinná giya kago manwâbundumunk ogitchetwawebemátizzewin , kâween ōsemá áwunzenōn , o-o bego áke ,
62002017	Ahke májámuhgut giya wanisshesnink átamuhgut , weendush Kitche Manitōn otenandumowininne ieendotunk , tuh gâgega bemátizze .
62002018	Uhbenocheitōk me 'ow ishquiách anitumag Anti-Christ che tuhkoshink , nōngumdush bátienowug Anti-Christug ; me wanje kekandumag ishquiách áwung .
62002019	Ge ōnje ságáumōg uzzhiáeyung , kâweendush ketinowamigoosenánig ; ságáumōg koshá uhwâbundi-inungwâ uzzhinowamisinowungwâ .
62002020	Ochichâgomá kege menigōm kokkinná kago kekekan dánâwâ .
62002021	Kâ kege oshebeumosenonim ōnje uhkekanduhzewag tabwawin , uhkekandumagdush ōnje kâdush kago kuhgenowishkewin tabwawinewunzenōn .
62002022	Owwanan kagenowishkid , kâween nuh ween , Jesus kâween Christ áwisse aketōt ween ayágoonwatunk Osemá giya Oguisemá ween Anti-Christ .
62002023	Owwagwan ga ayágoonwatowâgwan Oguisemá kâ otiáwâseen Osemá :
62002024	Máno gegishkumōk gá nōndumag wiazhkut miájetáng . Wiazhkut miájetáng gá nōndumag gegishkumag keguh beenjenuhwânashkowâwâ Oguisemá giya Osemá .
62002025	Me o-o gá wâweendumonung gâgega bemátizzewin .
62002026	Ono iuheen gá oshebeumonuhgook , kekuhkepácheigōnâwâ tuzzhindumink .
62002027	Uhchichâgomá gá meninágoon kegegishkowâwâ kâ oweuh aninne keta guhgekimegoosewâ kago mego o-o uhchichâgomá gagekiminág kokkinná kago tabwawinewun kâweendush kuhgenowishkewinewunzenōn , ketá beenjinuhwânashkowâwâ uhchichâgomá azhe guhgekeminág .
62002028	Nōngumdush binná uhbenocheitök , beenjiná Kitche Manito iyáeyeuk nánázh che takoshink che águtchissewag ope takoshin .
62002029	Kishpin kekanemag ween quiuk izzhewabizzit : kekanemáwâ ween quiuk izzhewabizzinit Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege .
62003001	Binnah Osemá azhe sâgeinunk , keche ezhe weenigoeyunk Kitche Manito oguisun ! áke wanje kekanemigoosewung kâ oge kekanemigooseen .
62003002	Siágeinuhgook , keenowint nōngum Kitche Manito oguisun ; kâ kekekanduhzemin ga izzhewabizzeyung , kekekandámin koshá ope nágoozit azhenágoozit keguh ezhenágoozemin , keguh wâbománán ga ezhenágoozit .
62003003	Kokkinná aninnewug o-o anandumowin ga gishkungig ebenitōnâwân weowwewân Kitche Manitōn azhe bènizzit .
62003004	Oweuh mutcheizzhewabizzinidjin obokobetōn tebákonegawin ; mutcheizzhewabizzewin obokobetōn tebákonegawin .
62003005	Kekekandánâwâ 'zhōnje takoshink ákeeng che májetōt emutcheizzhewabizzewininánin , weendush kâween kago mutheizzhewabizzewin oge gishkunzeen .
62003006	Bánjenuhwânashkágoojin kâ mutcheizzhewabizzissewun acheizzhewabizzinidjin kâwekâ ogewâbomigoseen , kâ giya kekanemigooseen .
62003007	Uhbenocheitök , kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoosewâ , ween quiuk azhewabizzit , quiuk izzhewabizze tebishko Kitche Manito quiuk azhe izzhewabizzit .
62003008	Ween macheizzhewabizzit Mutche Manito áwe , ōnje Mutche Manito mutcheizzhewabizze wiazhkut : me eu , ōnjittá gá je ezhichegat Kitche Manito Oguisun owwe banájeát Mutche Manitōn .
62003009	Oweuh Kitche Manitōn wanje negidjin kâ mutcheizzhewabizzisse ; kâ tá mutcheizzhewabizzisse ânga Kitche Manitōn ge ōnje negidjin .
62003010	Me o-o onejânisun azhewâbundiewawât otizzhewabizzewinewâ giya Mutche Manito onejânisun ween quiuk andotunzik kâ Kitche Manitōn ōnje negisse , ween giya siágeásig wekânisun .
62003011	Me o-o ekettowin gá nōndumag wiazhkut wazhetōng áke che sáságeittink .
62003012	Kâween ween Cain gá izzhewabizzit gá mázheninewugizzit gá nesát wekânisun : wagonandush gá ōnje nánát ? ánga otizzhewabizzewin mutcheizzhewabutinne , wekânisundush quiuk izzhewabizzewun .
62003013	Kago mámuhkâtandun kago wekânissetōk ákeeng sheengandágoozeyag .
62003014	Kekekandámin kekuhbekátámin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ketotitámindush quiuk izzhewabizzewin , ōnje nesâgeánánig wekânissemág : ween siágeásig wekânisun nebowinink iá .
62003015	Ween shânganemát wekânissun nisshewashkid , kekekandánâwâ nashewashkid kâ kago gâgega bemátizzewin ogegishkunzeen .
62003016	Me wanje kekanemunk Kitche Manito uhsâgeinunk , ōnje uhgebuhgitenunk obemátizzewin keenowint ōnje ; giya keenowint ketá buhgitenámin kebemátizzewininánin kekânissenánig ōnje .
62003017	Owwagwan wiánutizzegwan owâbomátdush wekânisun katemákizzinit shâwanemásigdush ; áneen ga ge ezhe ságeát Kitche Maniton ?
62003018	Neenduhbenoche-etōk , kago kesâge-ewawinenánin tuh tuhgoosinōn gegetowinink , ketizzhewabizzewininán koshá atuh quiuk .
62003019	Me o-o ga ōnje kekandumunk , quiuk izzhewabizzeyunk keguh mushkâwissetomin ketaenánin anosumit .
62003020	Kishpin ketaenánin weendumágoeyunk mutcheizzhewabizzeyunk Kitche Manito owushema apetandágoose apetandágwuk ketaenánin kokkinná kago okekandán .
62003021	Siágeinnuhgook , kishpin ketaenánin weendumágoosewunk kago chemutchetotumunk , quiuk neendizzhewabiz , kege enandámin , azhe meenwandunk Kitche Manito .
62003022	Kagodush nandotumowungoon kemenigonán ōnje kunwandumowunk otizzhetwâwin azhe meenwandunk ieendotumunk .
62003023	Me o-o oguhgequawin che tabwa-andumunk Oguisun Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , giya che sâgeitink mamashkōt ga ezhe guhgekimenunk .
62003024	Ween kunwandunk oguhgequawin Kitche Manitōn weowwinink iá giya ween Kitche Manitōn weowwinink iáwus me o-o wanje kekandumunk keowwináng uzzhiát Ochichâgwun gá meninunk .
62004001	Siahgeinuhgook , kago kokkinná tabwa-andun kago guhgequawinun , kuhgwadebandumōk , Kitche Manito keche oguhgequawinit , ōnje kitche nebewá kagenowishkidjig manitowâzojig geságáumōg ákeeng .
62004002	Me o-o ga ōnje kekandumag quiuk Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , andusink guhgequawinun azhe guhgequang Jesus Christ ge takoshin ákeeng , Kitche Manito áwe , 'zhezhe guhgequang :
62004003	Andusink guhgequat wiágoonwatunk Jesus Christ weyâsink ge tuhkoshin , káween Kitche Manito ōnjebát me o-o Anti-Christ gá nōndumag che takoshinomuhguk , nōngumdush ázhiuzzhisin mizze ákeeng .
62004004	Kitche Manito kedebanemigowâ uhbenocheitōk ketuhnewishkowâwâgdush ōnje ween gagishkowag owushema apetandágooze apetandágoozinit ákeeng gagishkowâwájin .
62004005	Ahke otinowandánâwâ , ákeeng otuzzhemáwân áke obezindágōnâwâdush .
62004006	Keenowint Kitche Manito mámowy , ween kakanemát Kitche Manitōn kebezindágonán , ween kakanemásig Kitche Manitōn , kâ kebezindágoosenán . Me o-o wanje kekandumunk quiuk tabwawin giya kuhgenowishkindewin .
62004007	Siágeinuhgook , umba ságeitetá : Kitche Manito sâge-ewawin ; kokkinná siáge-ewat , Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege , okekanemán Kitche Manito .
62004008	Ween siágeásig , Kitche Manitōn kâ okekanemáseen ōnje Kitche Manito sâge-ewawin .
62004009	O-o mizzhishshowwenágwuchegâtag , owâbundi-itink Kitche Manito sâgeinunk , ōnje Kitche Manito obeizzhenázhowân ákeeng biazhegwunit Oguisun siágeájin , konemá ketá ōnje bemátizzim .
62004010	Me o-o ságe-ewawin ; kâween ween keenowint uhsâgeunk Kitche Manito , ween Kitche Manito osâgeinunk , biezhenázhowâtdush Oguisun , uhsáságewitchegat kemutche izzhewabizzewininánin ōnje .
62004011	Siágeinuhgook , Kitche Manito azhe ságeinunk , ketá ságeittemin giya keenowint .
62004012	Kâ oweuh aninne wekâ wâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn , kishpin ságeitteyunk kege gishkowânán Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin , kemooshkenashkágomindush .
62004013	Me o-o wanje kekandumunk uhgegishkowunk giya ween gegishkonunk , ōnje ogemenigonán Ochichâgwun .
62004014	Kegewâbundámm ketebátotámin Osemá oge be-ezhenázhowân Oguisemá che ōnje bemátuk áke .
62004015	Owwagwan ga ekettogobunan , Jesus , Kitche Manito Oguisun , Kitche Manitōn ogegishkowân , giya ween ogegishkágōn Kitche Manitōn .
62004016	Kekekandámin , ketabwatámin Kitche Manito sâgeinunk . Kitche Manito sâge-ewawin , weendush azhe bemátizzit uhsâge-ewat , Kitche Manitōn ogegishkagōn giya ween ogegishkowunk .
62004017	Me o-o keságe-ewawininán quiuk ge oshichegâta ketá sōngeta-amin ope gezhigut che tebákonegat Kitche Manito ōnje , azbe iát ketizzhe iámin omá ákeeng .
62004018	Kâ sagizzewin tuhgoosinōn ságeittewinink , quiuk ságeittewin ōnje ságitchewabinegâta sagizzewin : ween siágizzit , kâ quiuk eshichegâzose che sâge-ewat ōnje sagizzewin kotuhgitowin , ween siágizzit kâ quiuk izzhewabizzisse che sâge-ewat .
62004019	Neságeánán , ōnje ween netam kege ságeigonán .
62004020	Oweuh aninne ekettōt , neensâgeá Kitche Manito , shânganemátdush wekânisun , kuhgenowishke : ween siágeásig wekânisun , gá wâbomájin , áneen ga ezhe ságeát Kitche Manitōn gá wâbomásig ?
62004021	O-o guhgequawin ween kege ōndinámin , ween siágeát Kitche Manitōn , oguh ságeán wekânisun giya .
62005001	Owwagwan anandumogwan Jesus , Christ áwit , Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege : owwagwandush siágeágwan Osemán otá ságeán Oguisemán giya .
62005002	Me o-o wanje kekandumunk uhságeung Kitche Manito onejânisun siágeungoon Kitche Manito kunwandumowunkdush oguhgequawin .
62005003	Me o-o uhságeint Kitche Manito kunwandumowint oguhgequawinun ; oguhgequawinun kâween kesuhnágenosemin .
62005004	Owwagwan Kitche Manitōn wanje negegwan otuhnewishkán áke me eu azhe uhnewishkumink áke , kemushkâwandumowininánin .
62005005	Owwanan 'nuh 'ow uhnewishkunk áke ? ween atuh tiabwa-andunk Jesusun , Kitche Manito Oguisun áwinit ?
62005006	Me wuhow takoshink nebe misque ōnje , Jesus Christ káween atuh nebe ; nebe misque giya ōnje Uhchichâgomá , tepájemōt , ōnje Uhchichâgomá quiuk tabwa .
62005007	Niswa gegetowug ( gezhigōnk , Osemá , giya Ekettowin , giya Uhchichâgomá , ungew nasidjig bazhekowug .
62005008	Niswa gegetowug ákeeng , ) uhchichâgomá , giya nebe , giya misque , o-o niswe azhe mámowy tuhgwemuhgutōn che bazhekwunk uhbazhekwunk .
62005009	Kishpin tabwatumunk aninne odikittowin , Kitche Manito odikittowin owushema apetandágwut , me o-o Kitche Manito odikittowin ogetuzzhemát Oguisun .
62005010	Ween tiabwatunk Kitche Manitōn Oguisinne ogegishkán ekettowin tebinowa , ween tiabwatunzik Kitche Manito kuhgenowishkeá , ōnje kâ otabwatunze ekettowin Kitche Manito gá iekettōt tuzzhemát Oguisun .
62005011	Me o-o ekettowin Kitche Manito gá meninunk gâgega bemátizzewin , o-o bemátizzit Oguisun ogegishkumine .
62005012	Ween ayáwât Oguisemá otián bemátizzewin , ween ayáwâsig Kitche Manitōn Oguisinne kâ otiáseen bemátizzewin .
62005013	Ono iuheen wazhebeumonuhgook keenowâ tiabwatumag Kitche Manito Oguisun otuhnozowinink che kekandumag ayáeyag gâgega bemátizzewin konemá ketá tabwa-andám Kitche Manito Oguisun otuhnozowinink .
62005014	Me o-o azhe tabwa-anemunk nandotumowungoon kago kemenigonán anandungin che meninunk .
62005015	Kekandumungoon uhnōndonunk nandotumungoon kago kekekandán iyáeyunk kago nandotumowungoon .
62005016	Oweuh aninne wâbomát wekânisun mutcheizzhewabizze omutcheizzhewabizzewin nebowinewunzinik , oguh nundotumowân Kitche Manitōn oguhmenándush bemátizzewin uhgew nabowinewunzinig omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ . Tuhgomuhgut mutcheizzhewabizzewin uhnebowinewung , kâween neendikittose che uhnumeatumink .
62005017	Kokkinná mutchetotumowin mutcheizzhewabizzewinewun , ánint mutcheizzhewabizzewin kâ nebowinewunzenōn .
62005018	Kekekanemánán oweuh Kitche Manitōn wanje negit kâ mutcheizzhewabizzisse , ween Kitche Manitōn wanje negit kunwandán weow , macheizzhewabizzinidjin kâ ningōt otátotágoseen .
62005019	Kekekandámin Kitche Manito uhtebaneminunk anegoquág áke mutcheizzhewabizzewin ezhissin .
62005020	Kekekandámin Kitche Manito Oguisun takoshin gá meninunk nebwâkâwin che kekanemung ween quiuk izzhewabizzit weowwinkdush ketiámin ween tiabwat Kitche Manito Oguisun , Jesus Christ me o-o quiuk Kitche Manitōn giya gâgega bemátizzewin .
62005021	Uhbenōcheitōk metágwaetowik muzzineneensug . Amen .
63001001	Okewanze otoshebeumowán gá onábomint equa , giya onejânisun , ween siágeug quiuk , kagatdush kâween neen atuh kokkinnágo quiuk kekandungig quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
63001002	Quiuk izzhewabizzewin ōnje gagishkumunk keguh gegishkámendush gágineek .
63001003	Shâwanjegawin keguh wejeigoon , giya innuhwandewin , Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ Osemá Oguisun ōnje ; kagat Quiuk ságeittewin giya tabwawin .
63001004	Neenkitche pâpenanim makowugwâ keenejânisug quiuk izzhewabizzewât Osemá azhe guhgekiminunk .
63001005	Binná nōngum kekuhquajemin equa , kâween ōshke guhgequawin ketoshebehmosinōn gata guhgequawin kiut buhtuzzhekumung che sáságeitteyunk .
63001006	Me o-o ságeittewin , kenopenutumowânán oguhgequawin ; me o-o oguhgequawin azhe nōndumun wiazhkut miáje guhgequang ketáwe nopenután .
63001007	Nebewá kagianizzidjig takoshinōg ákeeng keche ekettowât Jesus Christ kâ muhshe takoshinze , aninneeng che be-ezhenágoozit . Me 'ow kagianizzit giya Anti-Christ , ( shánganemát Christun . )
63001008	Kunowâbundizzōk keche wuhnetosewunk uhnokewin , menik gá ieendotumunk , quiuk tepáumátewin ōnjitá keguhtiámin .
63001009	Owwagwan giya mutcheizzhewabizzegwart ga tabwatunzik Christ oguhgequawin , kaween Omanitomisse : ween kanowandunk Christ oguhgequawin niyazh otiáwân Osemá giya Oguisemá .
63001010	Oweuh otissig o-o guhgequawin betosig , kago peendegunákan andáeyun , kago nuhnândotumowâkan Kitche Manitōn keche shâwanemigoot .
63001011	Nanândotumowinussittumowât Kitche Manitōn che shâwanemigonit ototâpenumowân ánint omutcheizzhewabizzewininne .
63001012	Nebewá keweinin , kâween keweoshebeumosinōn mazaniegunink oshebe-egunâbo ōnje , ōnje neendenandum keche beotisinán che beguhnoninán osumeskezhik keche pâpenanemoeyunk .
63001013	Gá onábumint keejezhán onejânisun ketuhnuhmikágōg . Amen .
64001001	Okewanze otoshebeumowâ Gaius , ween siágeug quiuk .
64001002	Siágeug , owushema neenduhpetandán eu andussink kago , che mennoizzhewabizzeyun , che mennobemátizzeyun , kechichâgōnk azhe mennoizzhewabizzit .
64001003	Neenkitchepâpenanim ope wekânisemág buhmennotepájemót quiuk izzhewabizzewin gagishkumun , azhe mennoizzhewabizzeyun .
64001004	Me emá owushema ge pâpenanemoeyán ope n'wândumán neenduhbenōche-emug quiuk izzhewabizzewât .
64001005	Siágeug , quiuk ketizzhewabiz , andotowutwâ wekânisemág giya miátáwizzidjig .
64001006	Otuzzhindánâwâ ketizzhewabizzewin anumeawinink , wawane bemewenintwâ quiuk keguh izzhewabiz :
64001007	Onje , Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink wanje mácháwât , kâween kago ototâpenumowâseen miátáwizzinidjin .
64001008	Ketábeendegunánánig uhgew towug anishanâbag konemá ketáwetōkámin quiuk izzhawabizzewin .
64001009	Neengeoshebeumowâg anumeájig ; ween Diotrephes manwandunk we gitchetwâwizzit andusshewât kâ kege peendegunigoosenán .
64001010	Me eu ōnie kishpin takoshinán neenguh kunwandán en gá izzhewabizzit uhmutche tuzzheminunk mutchegegetowinun : kâ azhe nianduhze ánuh ge mutchetuzzheminunk , kâ uhpeendegunáseen ween tebinowa wekânisemág otōnjeán giya anishanâban che peendegunánit osâgitchenázhowândush uhnumeawegumigōnk .
64001011	Siágeinuhgook , kago nopenutun kago eu mache izzhewabuk , quiuk izzhewabizzewin koshá nopenutumōk ; ween manoizzhewabizzit , Kitche Manitōn otinowamán ween macheizzhewabizzit , kâ owâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn .
64001012	Demetrius kokkinná aninnewun omennotuzzhemigōn , quiuk kagat mennotuzzhemán neenkekandámen quiuk mennoizzhewabuk .
64001013	Bátienut wâoshebeumán , kâween koshá oshebe-egunâbo , giya megwun neenguh iōseen che oshebeumonán .
64001014	Wiebuh keguh bewâbomin anosumeskezhik guhguhnonitteyunk . Máno keguh innuhwandein ; uhnumekowik ketinowamáguninánig otuhnozowinewân .
64001015	
65001001	Jude , Jesus Christ obumetagunemun , James wekânisun , otoshebeumowân uhnew shâwandágoozidjig Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , kanowaneminiig Jesus Christink gá nundominjig :
65001002	Máno keguh shâwandágoozim , innowandewinink ságeittewinink ápiche .
65001003	Siágeinuhgook , ope wazhebeumonuhgook wawane tuzzhindumink ōnjittá bemátizzewin , enandágwut keche oshebeumonuhgook , che guhgâzominuhgook , wawane keche megâzoeyag mushkâwandumowin ōnje ningōtink gá menintwâ anumeájig .
65001004	Ahnint aninnewug gemōch peendegaotawug , uhgew maweshá ge onuhginjegâzobuneeg keche banátizzewât , waomanitomisigook aninnewug , uhgwakenumowât Kitche Manito osháwanjegawin wenizzewinink , uzzhágoonwatumowát onezheka Manitōn , Kitche Manito giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ .
65001005	Eu onje keguh mikwandumoninenim , ánuh ningōtink kege kekandánâwâ o-o , Kitche Manito ope gebemájeát anishanában ákeeng Egyptink , náágutchdush oge banájeán uhnew tabwatunzinigoon .
65001006	Giya omezhinowamun uhgew gá kunowanduhzigook netam gá ezhe buhgitenintwâ , uhgew gá nuhgutungig tebinowa otinduhnukewinewâ , otápiche kunwanemán uhtákobizzonit kushkedibikutōnk nánázh e-e kitche kitche tebákonegawegezhiguk .
65001007	Tebishko Sodom giya Gomorrha , otanowun giya aeenduhgogin , uhbuhgitenumowât weowewân bisshegwâtizzewinink , uhnopenutumowât miátáwutinik weyâs , negân owâbunduhan ga ezhe kuhgwâtuhgitonit mutche ishkota ōnje .
65001008	Uhgew giya aenábundungig , owenetōnâwâ weyâs , osheeagandánâwâ keche tebanemintwâ omutche tuzzhemáwân nâginizzinidjin .
65001009	Michaeldush kitche mezhinowa ope kakândewât Mutch Manitōn , ( otuzzhindánâwâ Moses weow , ) kâween ogemutchguhnonáse , eketto atuh , Kitche Manito keguh genuhumág .
65001010	Uhgewdush omutche tuzzhindánâwâ e-e kakanduhzikwâ onoedush iuheen kakandumowâjin tábishko áwaseink , ono ini een ōnje banájeittezowug .
65001011	Tuhsuhnágizzewug uhgew ! Cainun azhánit ezbáwug , ono penutánâwâ Balaam omázheninewugizzewin che tebáumátewizzewât , banátizzewug Core omutchegegetowinink .
65001012	Ketuhgizzewug keweekoongawinink keskeshawâtim winink , ope wâjewekoongamikwânin , uhshundizzowât uhkeche jissigwâ : ánuhqutōn nebe anduhgoosinōk , puhbámáunk notin ōnje ; metigōg uhmenewewât naboquatagin , uhmenewewisigwâ nezhink nebowug , moniegâzowug ojebekâwewât ;
65001013	Uhmutwaáskáwât tegowug kitchegumeeng , uhbetawetowât tebinowa otuhgutchewinewâ ; wanisshingig uhnungwug , uhgew kanowandumowinjig makuttawâg kushkedibikut gâgineek .
65001014	Giya Enoch neezhwâswa Adam ōnje ogetebátotánun ono ekettōnk , Kitche Manito tuhkoshin mámowy metáchink metoswâk anumeanidjin ,
65001015	Keche tebákonát kokkinná keche kekandumowintwâ kokkinná uhgew waomanitomissigwâ otinuhnokewinewâ manito uhnokewinewunzenōk , giya omutchegegetowinewâ , eu waomanitomissigook mutcheizzhewabizzidjig uhgemutche tuzzhemint .
65001016	Me uhgew nanáwudjemojig , ubnopenuttumowât tebinowa otenandumowinewá ; otonewán gegetomuhgutinewun kitche muhmechâg gegetowinun , owushema otuhpetanemáwân ánint aninnewnn uhwânutinit ōnje .
65001017	Siágeinnuhgook , kunwandumōk ekettowinun Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ anonáiin gá ekettowât kiut ;
65001018	Gá ezhe weendumonágwâ tuhtáwug ga pâpenōtungig squâch uhgew ōnjittá ga n'wâpenutungig tebinowa onáguttuhwandumowinewân manito wunzinik .
65001019	Uhgew uhmewug uhgew bakânitojig weowwewân , weyâsemá enandumowin azhewabizzidjig , kâ Ochichâgosewug .
65001020	Keenowâdush , siágeinnuhgook , sōngetōg keowwewân kemushkâwandumowinewâng , uhnumeáng Kitche Manito Ochichâgōnk ,
65001021	Kunwandumōk keowwewân Kitche Manito oságe-ewawinink , nandowâbundumink Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawin che gâgega bemátizzeyag .
65001022	Shâwanemikōg ánint uhpuhkânitōng :
65001023	Ahnintdush bemájeikōg sagizzewin ōnje che sâgitche wekobinagwâ ishkotang ; uhsheengandumink kagat buhbeenzikowâgun uhgetuhgág oweyâsemá ōnje .
65001024	Nōngumdush ween kashketōt uhkunwaneminág che pongeshinzewag , ween gashketōt che beninág ningōtono keche igosewag anosumeet okitchetwâwizzewinink kitche pâpenanemowinink ,
65001025	Ween atuh nabwâkât Manito gá Bemájeinunk , ween tuh kitchetwâwizze che tebákonegat , che ogemákundunk , che mushkâwizzit nōngum giya gâgineek . Amen .
66001001	Jesus Christ owábundiewawin , eu Kitche Manitōn gá menigoot che wâbunduhát otoskenegamun iuheen wiebuh ga izzhewabukin ; uhnokedush otuhnonán omezhinowamun che weendumowânit otoskenegamun Johnun :
66001002	Ween okunwandán ( otoshebeán ) Kitche Manito odikittowin , giya Jesus Christ omushkâwegeezhwawin , kokkinná giya iuheen gá wâbundungin .
66001003	Tuhshâwandágooze ween ga kuhnowâbundunk , tuhshâwandágoozewug giya uhgew bazindungig , ekettowinun ono mazaniegunink kishpin kunwandumowât ono iuheen wazhebe-egâtagin : ōnje gezhigut bazhew che ochichesag .
66001004	JOHN otoshebeumowân názhwâswawânuhgizzidjig anumeájig Asiaink : Keguh shâwandágoozim , giya innowandewin dush ween ōnje nongum wiáwit , ween gá áwit , ween giya ga áwit ; giya nazhwâchejig Ochichâgomág anosumisinik onámátábewin ayájig ōnje ;
66001005	Giya Jesus Christ ōnje ween nabwâkât quiuk tabwat wâtokâzōt , netam gá negit nebowinink , ween wagemákundowât kitche ogemán ákeeng . Ween siágeinunk , uhkeseábáwutonunk tebinowa omisqueem ōnje ,
66001006	Ween kege ogemáweigonán , giya che sáságewinunk Kitche Manito giya Osun ; ween ga kitchetwâwizzit ápiche ga ogemáwit gagineek . Amen .
66001007	Binná , takoshin magwa ánáqutōnk ; andussink oskezhikomá tuhwâbomá ; giya ungew gá buhzhebuhwâjig ; kokkinná bamátizzidjig ákeeng guhtuhmowwewug ween ōnje . Me ga izzhewabuk , Amen .
66001008	Neen Alpha , neen Omega , wiazhkut uhmájetáng giya uzeeshquâtáng , eketto Kitche Manito , ween wiáwit , ween gá áwit , ween ga áwit ween miámowy Mushkâwizzit .
66001009	Neen John , kekânissewâ , kitche kewaewâ kotuhgizzewinink , giya Jesus Christ otogemáwewinink obeowinink , Minisink Patmos ezhenekâtag neendiánábun Kitche Manito odikitowin ōnje giya Jesus Christ omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
66001010	Ochichâgománg neengeiá Kitche Manito ogezhigutomink neengenōndán kitche gegetowin neempikqunáng tebisnko nōndágomutchegunink inwa ,
66001011	Ekettōnk , neen Alpha , neen Omega , netam giya squâch : wiábundumun , oshebeun mazaniegunink , ezhenizzhuhumow názhwâswawânuhgizzidjig anumeájig Asiaink ayájig : Ephesusink , Smyrnaink , Pergamosink , Thyatiraink , Sardisink , Philadelphiaink , giya Laodiceaink .
66001012	Neengegwaketádush owwewâbundumán e-e ganonigoeyán . Ope gá gwaketáeyán , neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneá wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn neengewâbundánun ;
66001013	Nowwiunedush neezhwâswa wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn oweuh Aninne Oguisun azhenágoozit ezhenágooze , buhbeenzikowâgun otuhgwin ozitáng uhquagutinne , guhkitchepizzo okákegunink ozâwâ shoneá kitche pizzoon .
66001014	Oshtegwân wenizzissun mánishtânish obewi-ink ezhewâbishkânewun gonink ezhewâbishkâne ; oskezhikōn misqukkuna ishkotang ezhenágwutinewun ;
66001015	Ozâwâbekōnk ezbenágwutinewun ozittun , tebishko chiágetagin kitche ishkotang ; otinwawin matwaáskágin inwawane .
66001016	Ogitchenikâng otuhkonán neezhwâswa uhnungwun : etowâbetáyáne uzzhowweshk wanje ságáumomuhgutinik otonink ; oskezhigōnkdush gezis ápiche sâgâsegat me azhenagoozit .
66001017	Wiábomugdush ozitáng neembongeshin tebishko nabōngin . Neendângenikdush ogitchenik , neendigdush , kago sagizzekan ; neen netam giya squâch :
66001018	Neen 'ow Bamátizzit neendow , giya 'ow gá nebōt ; binnádush neen gâgega bemátiz , Amen ; neen neendiánun ápápegiegunun Mutche Manito uzziât giya nebowin .
66001019	Ozhebeun menik iuheen wiabundumun iuheendush nōngum ayágin giya iuheen náágutch ga iágin ;
66001020	Kiátukin iuheen wiábomudjig neengitchenikâng , giya neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneá wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn . Neezhwâswa uhnungwug me uhgew mezhinowag neezhwâswawân anumeájig : neezhwâswa wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn me neezhwâswân anumeájig .
66002001	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig Ephesusink ; Ween takonát neezhwâswa uhnungwun ogitchenikâng , eketto ono iuheen , ween bamosat nowwiuhe neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneá wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn ;
66002002	Neenkekandánun ketuhnokwinun anuhnokeyun , kebeowin azhe kushketosewun che muhmázhetoeyun uhgew macheizzhewabizzidjig ; kege kuhgwadebanemáwâg uhgew anoninjig neendáwemin aketojig , kâdush ween áwissewug ; mikkowáwug uhguhgenowishkewât ;
66002003	Kege kuhgwâtuhgito , kege be , kege uhnoke neenduhnozowin ōnje , kâ kege wunemikowwese .
66002004	Ningōtonodush kewe-enin ōnje kege nuhgután netam kesâge-ewawin .
66002005	Eu ōnje kunwandun emá uhge pongeshinun , ánwanindizzoon , enuhnokeen netam ketuhnokewinun , uhgamá keguh beotissin gazhetinna neenguh májetōn kewâsâkoninjegunâtik meatuhgo ánwanindizzoyun .
66002006	Me o-o aáeyun , Nicolaitanun otuhnokewinewân , kesbeengandánun uhnew shângandumánin giya .
66002007	Ween watowugât máno tuhnōndum Ochichâgwun anát anumeánidjin ; Ween anewishkunk neenguhmená che mejit gâgega bemátizzewin metigōn nowwiuhe Kitche Manito ogittegânink batuhkizzōt .
66002008	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig Smyrnaink ; Me ono iuheen aketōt Netam giya Squâch ween ga nebōt , bemátizzedush ;
66002009	Neenkekandánun ketuhnokewinun kesuhnágizzewinun keketemágizzewin ( kewânuttizdush ween , ) neenkekandánun omutchegegetowinewân uhgew neen Jewew aketojig , kâdush áwissewug , Mutche Manito otuhnumeawegumigónk wetokâzowug .
66002010	Kago gotunkan ono iuheen ga ōnje kotuhgitoeyunin : binná , Mutche Manito ánint keguh kepáquogowâ , che kuhgwadebanemigoeyag , metoswogwun keguh kotuhgandán , mushkâwegâbowik nánázh nebowin , keguhmenin wewoquân bemátizzewin .
66002011	Ween watowugât , máno tuh nōndum Ochichâgomá anát anumeánidjin , ween anewishkunk kâween tuhwesuhganduhze áneka nebowin .
66002012	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig Pergamosink ; Me ono iuheen ekettōt wunow ayát átowâbetayánik uzzhowweshk ;
66002013	Neenkekandán ketuhnokewinun , giya andáyun emá Mut che Manito onámátábewinink , kemushkâwemeenjimenun neenduhnozowin , kâween kegeágoonwatunzeen nemushkáwandumowin , kâween pâpish ono gezhigutōn magwouh Antipas uhgenesint magwaiuhe keenowâ Mutche Manito uzzhiát .
66002014	Pungee neendiánun iuheen wâeninán , ōnje ánint iáwug keenowâ tabwatungig Balaam oguhgequawin , ween gá guhgekemát Balakun keche oppuhgitowât bezogashinowin anosumewát Israel onejánisun , che mejewât iuheen siáságewinintwâ muzzininneeg , che bisshegwâtizzewâtdush .
66002015	Giyadush ánint iáwug tiabwatungig Nicolaitanug oguhgequawinewâ , eu shángandumán .
66002016	Ahnwanindizzoon ; uhgamá gazhetinná keguh beotissin neenguhmegânigowâg neenduzzhowweshk neendonink ayág .
