66002017	Ween watowugât , máno tuh nōndum Ochichâgomá anát anumeanidjin : Ween anewishkunk neenguhmená che mejit kiátuk manna , wabishke asin neenguhmená , uhsineengdush ōshke onozowin oshebe-egáta , eu oweuh aninne kakanduhzik meatuh 'ow mánint .
66002018	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig Thyatiraink ; Me o-o aketōt Kitche Manito Oguisun , ween waskezhigoot tebishko misquhqunag ishkota azhenágwutinik , ozittun ozâwâbekōnk azhenágwutinik ;
66002019	Neenkekandánun , ketubnokewinun , kekeshawâtizzewin , kemushkâwandumowin , kebeowin , ketuhnokewinun ; squâchdush owushema menik kege enuhnoke menik netam gá enuhnokeyun ;
66002020	Pungee iuheen neendiámm wâeninán , ōnje máno ketenanemá 'ow equa Jezebel ōnwâchega equa anwátunk weow che bisshegwâtizzewât giya chesáságewinát muzzinineen .
66002021	Neenge mena che ánwanmdizzōt obisshegwâtizzewin , kâdush ween we ánwanindizzose .
66002022	Binna nebágunink neengun oppuhgená , uhgewdush wâjebigshegwâtizzemájig kitche kuhgwátuhgittowât neenguh totowâg kishpin ánwanindizzosigwâ .
66002023	Neenguh nissemán onejânisun nebowin ōnje ; kokkinná anumeájig oguh kekandánâwâ neen áweyán nandonaegayán , ábetowinun giya otaink : kokkinná andussheyag keguh ezhe meninimigo aezhewabuk ketuhnokewinewán .
66002024	Ketenindush keen , giya ánint Thyatiraink ayájig , menik ayásigwâ oguhgequawin , menik kakanduhzikwâ Mutche Manito aquandumát , aketowât ; kâween puhkân pemewunán keguh wewi-issinonim :
66002025	Eu ayáyun gezhá mushkáwemeenjimenun nánázh che tuhkoshinán .
66002026	Ween anewishkunk , kunwandunk neendunokewinun nánázh waguiág neenguhmená mushkâwizzewin uhnewishkât bamátizzinidjin ;
66002027	( Oguh ogemákundowân pewâbeek osuhkáoon ōnje ; tebishko wâbegunne otossowin bwâpokosingin me ga popokoshinowât , ) tebishko nōs gá ezhe mezhit .
66002028	Neenguh mená wâbun uhnungwun .
66002029	Ween watowugât , máno tuh nōndum Ochichágomá anát anumeánidjin .
66003001	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningótwawân anumeájig Sardisink ; Ween neezhwâswa Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun giya neezhwâswa uhnungwun ayáwát , me o-o aketōt , neenkekandánun ketuhnokewinun ; nozowin ketián bemátizze yun , kenibdush ween .
66003002	Uhkowâbig , mushkâwetōn iuheen ashkoonegâtagin , wiashowwissingin che nebomuhguk : kâween nemikkunzenun ketuhnokewinun quiuk che izzhewabuk anosumeet Kitche Manito .
66003003	Kunwandun eu ōnje o-o azhemenigoeyun , azhe nōndumun , mushkâweminjemeen , ánwanindizzoon . Kishpin uhkowâbizzissewun keguh otissigōn ope ananduhzewun che otissinán .
66003004	Punge onozowinun ketiánun Sardisink ōnje wânusinig beenzikowágunewân , neenguhwetosamigōg wâbishkizzewinink , ta apetandágoozewug .
66003005	Ween anewishkunk wiábishkequtinik beenzikowâgun oguhtuhgwin , ká neenguhgeseumowâse bemátizze mazaniegunink , neenguh weendumowân otuhnozowin Nōs anosumeet , anosumewâtdush omezhinowamun .
66003006	Ween watowwugât máno tuh nōndum Ochichâgomá anát anumeánidjin .
66003007	Ozhebeumow 'ow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig Philadelphiaink ; Ween azhewabizzit , ween tiabwat , ween David otábápegiegun ayát , ween biákinunk , kâdush oweuh aninne otá kepáqununze , eketto ono iuheen ;
66003008	Neenkekandánun ketuhnokewinun ; binná neengebákindasitōn ishquândam anosumeyun , kâ oweuh aninne otá kepáquhunzeen , kitche agâsenut kemushkâwizzewin , kege kunwandán neendikittowin , ká kege ágoonwatunzeen neendunnozowin .
66003009	Binná uhgew wâtokâzojig Mutche Manito otuhnumeawinink , uhgew neen Jewemin aketojig , kâdush ween áwissewug , uhguhgenowishkewug ; neenguhtotowâg keche be ochicheengwunitōkwâ anosumeun kezitáng oguh kekandánáwâ uhságeinán .
66003010	Onje kege kunwandán neendikitowin neembeowinink , me giya neen ga ezhe kunwaneminán e-e tebiegun kuhgwadebanindewin , ga takoshinomuhgut kokkinná ákeeng che kuhgwadebanemintwâ kokkinná ákeeng andánuhkejig .
66003011	Binná , gazhetinná neenguh tuhkoshin : mushkâwemeenjimenin eu ayáyun , kago oweuh aninne keguh muhkumigoose kewewoquán .
66003012	Ween anewishkunk , neenguh totowâ che suhkáágunewit Nemanitōm otuhnumeawegumigōnk , kâ minowâ tuh ságáunze : neenguh ozhebeán Nemanitōm otuhnozowin weowwink , azhenekâtanik giya Nemanitōm ototanuh , ōshke Jerusalem , eu gezhigōnk gá be ōnje názhuhkeeg Kitche Manito uzzhiát ōnjemuhguk , giya neendōshke uhnozowin .
66003013	Ween watowugât , máno tuh nōndum Ocbichâgomá anát anumeánidjin .
66003014	Ozhebeumow mezhinowa ayát ningōtwawân anumeájig magwa Laodiceanug ; Amen , nabwâkât quiuk tabwat , wiazhkut miájetáng kokkinná kago Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt eketto ono iuheen :
66003015	Neenkekandánun ketuhnokewinun , kâ ketuhkizzose ká giya kegezhisose , ápadush tuhkizzoeyun gamá kezhizzoyun .
66003016	Onje punge uhgezizhoeyun , kâ ketuhkizzose , ká giya kegezhizose , keguh shishshukowânin neendōnink :
66003017	Onje kedikit , newânutiz , nebewá neendiá onokâjegun , kâ kago neennundowanduhzeen ; kâ kekekanduhzeen nisshewuhnátizzeyun , ningōt inábuhtizzissewun , katemágizzeyun , kuhgebeengwayun , pingwoshshâgitteyun :
66003018	Keguhgâzomin che gishpinuttoweyun ozâwâ shoneá ayáyán gá kuhgwadebandumink ishkotang , ketá ōnje wânutix , giya wâbishke beenzikowâgun konemá ketá uhgwin , águtchewin kepingwoshshâgittewin che nágwussinōk ; pemeta winun keskezhigōn mushkeke bemeta , keche wâbeyun .
66003019	Menik ságeugwâ , neennuhnebekimág neembuhshunzhawág ; eu ōnje , ángwâmizzig , ánwanindizzōk .
66003020	Binná , ishquándang nenebow , pápágáquiegayán : kishpin oweuh aninne nōndunk neendinwawin , pákindanunk ishquândam , neenguh beendega neenguh wetopomá giya ween neenguh wetopomik .
66003021	Ween anewishkunk , neenguh mená keche wetuhbemit nenámátábewinink , tebishko azhe uhnewishkumán , nenámátubdush mámowy Nōs onámátábewinink .
66003022	Ween watowwugât , máno tuh nōndum Ochichâgomá anát anumeánidjin .
66004001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk neendená , binnádush , ishquândem uhbákindásink gezhigōnk ; netam inwawin nōndumán , qundigo nōndágomutchegun anwat uhguhguhnozhit ; eketto , omá beezhán , keguh wâbunduhin iuheen nágutch ga izzhewabukin .
66004002	Bâbegadush igo Ochichâgománg neengeiá : binná , námátábewin gezhigōnk áta , bazhek námátábe námátábewinink .
66004003	Ween námátábit tebishko jasperink che kunowâbomint , giya sardine ásin , onuhgwândush gewetásin námátábewinink , emeraldink ezhenágwut .
66004004	Gá gewetáiuhe námátábewinink neezhtunnuh usshenewin námátábewinun ; námátábewininkdush neezhtunnuh usshenewin okewanzeug newâbomág , uhnámátábewât , wâbishkekoniawug ; ozâwâ shoneá owewoquânun agowâjin ōshtegwânewâng .
66004005	Námátábewinink ságáumomuhgutōn wâsumowinun , uhnemikewunk giya inwawinun . Neezhwâswa wâsâkoninjegun biskunawun anosumisink námátábewin , me uhgew neezhwâswâ Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun .
66004006	Anosumisink námátábewin áta kago kitchegumme wâsachegunábeek muskâziswâbeekōnk ezhenágwut : nowwiuhedush námátábewinik gewetáiuhe giya námátábewinink , newin áwawaseug mooshkenanewun oskezhigowân anosumewât giya otishquiámewâng .
66004007	Netam áwase missbebezheeng ezhenágooze , ánekáchdush áwase , pezhekeens ezhenágooze , akonissewât áwaseug anineeng enutangwa , akonewewât áwase babámisat megize ezhenágooze .
66004008	Kokkinná newin áwaseug naningōtwâso ningwegunawug gewetáiuhe ; mooshkenawug oskezhikowân beenjinnuh ; kâ unwabesewug gezhigutinik giya dibikutinik ekettowât mennoizzhewabizze , mennoizzhewabizze , mennoizzhewabizze Kitche Manito ween miámowy Mushkâwizzit , ween gá iát , nōngum ayát , gaiátdush .
66004009	Ope uhgew áwaseug kitchetwâweáwât , ope kache apetanemáwât ope megwetchenawât , ween námátábit námátábewinink , ween giágega bemátizzit ; neezhtunnuh usshenewin okewanzeug pongeshinōg anosumubbit uhow námátábit námátábewinink , otuhnumeatowâwán uhnew giágega bemátizzinidjin , otuhpuhgitōnâwân owewoquânewân anomisink , ekettowug ,
66004010	
66004011	Kekitche apetandágooze , Kitche Manito , che kitchetwáweigoyun , apetandágoozewin mushkáwizzewin , ōnje keen gá ozhetoeyun kokkinná kago , keen kemennowânegoozewin wanje ozhichegâtag .
66005001	Neengewawbomahdush ogitchenikâng námátábinidjin námátábewinink mazaniegun ozhebe-egâtag anámiuhe giya ogitcheiuhe , neezhwâchink uhgokewussegâta uhgokewussegunun .
66005002	Newâbomán mashkâwizzinidjin omezhinowamun , gegeto anegōk : owanan tiapetandágoozit che bákinunk mazaniegun , che bokobetōt 'zhokewusegâtag ?
66005003	Ká oweuh aninne gezhigōnk , giya ákeeng , giya anámuhkumink , mikowâse , keche ta apetandágoozit keche bákinunk mazaniegun , giya che kunowâbundunk .
66005004	Neenge kitche mowwedush , ânga kâ oweuh aninne mikowâse che bákinunk giya che uhgindunk mazaniegun , giya che kunowâbundunk .
66005005	Bazhek okewanze neendig , kago mowwekán , binná misshebezhe ningōtwawânuggizzidjig Judaug , David 'zhozhebekâwit , ween mushkâwizze che bákinunk mazaniegun , che bokobetōt uhgokewusegunun .
66005006	Neengewâbomá , nowwiuhe okewanzeug , mánishtânunishans nebowwe , tebishko gá nissinjin , neezhwâchewun otaskunun , neezhwâcheninewun giya oskezhigōn , me neezhwâswa Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun uhmáchenázho-ōntwâ mizzewago ákeeng .
66005007	Ween obeotâpenán mazaniegun uzhotâpenumowât ogitchenikânink uhnew námátábinidjin námátábewinink .
66005008	Opedush watâpenunk mazaniegun , newin áwaseug , giya usshenewin neezhtunnuh okewanzeug pongeshinōg anosumeet mánishtânishans , andusshewát nōndágomutchegunun otiánâwân giya ozâwâ shoneá omotiápekōnsun uhmooshkenawun manomágwukin , anumeájig otuhnumeawinewâ ono .
66005009	Nuhgumowugdush ōshke nuhgumōn ekettōnk , Keen keta apetandágooz che otâpenumun mazaniegun che bákinumun 'zhuhgokewusegâtag , ōnje uhgenisigoyun uhge kishpinussheyâng nayáb , kemisqueem ōnje Kitche Manito che tebanemeyumint kokkinná azheweenzhojig , kokkinná anishanâbag kokkinná papuhkân anwajig , kokkinná anduswawânugizzewát anámiuhe gezhigōnk ;
66005010	Giya kege ozheimin che ogemáweyâng giya che sáságewitchegawenineyâng Kitche Manito che tebanemeyiumnt , neenguh ogemákundámin áke .
66005011	Neendenáb nenōndáwágdush nebewá mezhinowâg , giya áwaseug giya okewanzeug uhgegetowât , gewetáiuhe námátábewinink : andusshewât metáchink metoswâk mametōswâk ;
66005012	Ekettōnk anegōk uhgegetowât , manishtânishans gá nesint ta apetandágooze kecheiát mushkâwizzewin , giya wânuttizzewin , giya megwetcheweittewin .
66005013	Kokkinná bamátizzidjig gezhigōnk giya ákeeng , giya anámuhkumik , giya uhgew kitchegumink ayájig , kokkinná giya beenjeiube ayâjig nenōndowâg 'zhekettowât , tuhshâwandágooze , tuh kitche apetandágooze , tuh kitchetwâwizze , tuh kitche mushkáwizze , ween námátabit námátábewinink , giya mánishtánishans gâgineek giya gâgineek .
66005014	Náwidjigdush áwaseug Amen , ekettowug . Ashenewidjig neezhtunnuh okewanzeug pongeshinōg uzznuhnumeatowât uhow giágega bemátizzit gâgineek .
66006001	Neengewawbomah mánishtânishans biákinunk bazhek uhgokewusegun , nenōndándush kago uhmutwawag uhnemikeeng inwawag , bazhekdush náwidjig áwaseug ekettōnk , bewâbundun .
66006002	Binnádush , newâbomá , bazhek wâbishke bazhekokashe : 'owedush bamomigoot metigwâbeen otuhkonán ; owewoquândush mená , ságáumdush uhnewishkunk , giya keche uhnewishkágat .
66006003	Opedush biákinunk wiánekasin uhgokewusegun nenōndowâ ánekach áwase 'zheketōt , bewâbundun ,
66006004	Minowâ bazhek bazhekokashe ságáum miskooze ; mushkâwizzewindush mená uhow bamomigoot keche ikkoonunk innuhwandewin ákeeng ; keche nesitewât mamashqut : kitche uzzhowweshkdush mená .
66006005	Opedush biákinunk ako nissink uhgokewusegun , nenōndowâ ako nisewât áwase uzzhekettōt , bewábundun . Binná newâbomá muhkutta bazhekōkashe ; weendush 'ow bamomigoot tebábeeshkochegunun otuhkonán oninjeeng .
66006006	Nenōndowâ nowwiuhe newewât áwase uhmutwa ekettōt , ningo tebiegun puhquazhegun mámashqut bazhek shománeka , nisso tebiegundush squazhishshug , bazhek shománeka ; ângwâmizzin , kago banájetokan pemeta giya shomenâbo .
66006007	Opedush biákinunk eu akonewink uhgokewusegun , nenōndowâ akonewewât áwase 'zhiekettōt , bewâbundun .
66006008	Neendenáb , neengewâbomádush nagwazit bazhekokashe : onozowindush uhnew bamomigoot nebowin , mutche ishkotadush onopenuhnigōn : mushkâwizzewindush mená keche ábetá minowâdush usshe ábetá menik che uhnewishkunk áke che nieshewat uzzhowwesk ōnje giya buhkuttawin giya nebowin , giya áwaseug ákeeng ōnje .
66006009	Opedush biákinunk ako nánunink uhgokewusegun , neengewâbomág anámubiuhe sáságewitchegun uzzhuttag ochichâgowân ubgew Kitche Manito odikitowininne nasigoojig giya ekettowinun tiabwatumowâjin ōnje .
66006010	Anegōk ázhequawug , ekettowug , áneen ope Kitche Manito manoizzhewabizzeyun , tabwayun , ga tebákonegayun , che buhshunzhaogoyun uhgew ákoeng andánuhkejig nemisquemenáb ōnje ?
66006011	Wâbishke beenzikowâgunun menáwug andusshewât ; enáwugdush tub unwabewug kayábe wanebeek , nánázh weejuhnoketágaweninemewân , giya wekânissewân keche nesintwâ tebishko weenowâ giya gá azhe nesintwâ .
66006012	Neendená ope biákinunk ako ningōtwâchink ubgokewusegun binnádush áke kitche nuhningishkâ ; gezisdush kitche muhkuttawizze tebishko muhkuttawaginōnk obewiyum gá ōnje ozhichegâta , tibbeke gezisdush misqueeng ge ezhenágooze ;
66006013	Uhnungwugdush , ishpemink pongeshinōg ákeeng , tebishko kitche shomenâtig azhe pongesink shomenun , ope gwashquâshidjin kache notingin .
66006014	Gezhikdush májámuhgut tebishko mazaniegun tatebishkágin ; kokkinná wudjewun giya menissun ningooche azhe bejenishkáwun uzzhiágebun .
66006015	Ogemágdush ákeeng , kitche apetandágoozidjig aninnewug , giya wiánutizzidjig aninnewug , kitche menisseno ogemag , kitche mushkáwizzidjig aninnewug , kokkinná giya awâkânewidjig kokkinná giya tabanindizzojig gázowug wâweembápekânink ázhebekōnk .
66006016	Otitánâwân wudjewun giya ázbebekōn buhtuhgwooshkokowisshináng gázheshináng che wâbomiseumint uhow námátábewinink námátábit , onishkâtizzewindush Mánishtânishans :
66006017	Kitche apetandágwuk gezhiguk onishkâtizzewin tuhkoshinomuhguk , owwanan ga kushketōt che nebowwit ?
66007001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabukdush ono iuheen , newin mezhinowag newâbomág nebowwewug aeeshquaiuhe ákeeng , uhmeenjimenumowât náwingin notinôn ákeeng , keche notinzinōk ákeeng , kitchegumeeng , giya kâween , giya ningooche metigōnk .
66007002	Newâbomá minowâ bazhek mezhinowa unne ōmbishkât wâbunōnk ōnje , uzzhiámowât Giágega Bemátizzit Kitche Manito otuhkokewusegun : anegōkdush ázhequa uhguhnonát uhgew newin mezhinowan gá meninjig che banájetowât áke , giya kitchegume .
66007003	Otinándush kago banájetokago áke , giya kitchegume , kâ giya metigōg , pánemá geuhgokewuswungidwâ ogutigwowâng Neenkitche Manitomenán otoskenegamun .
66007004	Nenōndowâgdush uhgew akokewusegâzojig ningōtwâk usshe nemetunnuh usshenewin tusso metōswâk uhgokewusegâzowug Israel onejânisun .
66007005	Judainkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug . Reubeninkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug . Gadink ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug .
66007006	Aserink ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug . Naphthaliminkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug . Manassesinkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug .
66007007	Simeoninkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegazowug . Leviinkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegázowug . Issacharinkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug .
66007008	Zabuloninkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegázowug . Josephinkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegâzowug . Benjamininkdush ningōtwawân , metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk uhgokewusegázowug .
66007009	Opedush o-o gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk , neendenáb , binnádush kitche nebewá anishanâbag kâ oweuh aninne tá kushketose che uhgemát , kokkinnágo papuhkân azheweenzhojig , naningōt ota , uhnōch papuhkân anwajig nebowwewug anosumissink námátábewin anosumeetdush mánishtânishans , owâbishkânik obeenzikowâgunewân uhnebeeshun otuhkonánâwâ oninjewâng ;
66007010	Ahzhequawugdush anegōk ekettowug , shâwandágoozewin Kekitche Manitomenán ween námátábewinink námatábit , giya mánishtânishans .
66007011	Kokkinná mezhinowag gewetáiuhe nánebowwewug námátábewinink giya okewanzeug giya newin áwaseug pongeshinōgdush oskezhigowâng anosumissink námátábewin otuhnumeatowâwân Kitche Manitōn .
66007012	Ekettōnk , Amen : tuhsháwandágooze , tuh kitchetwâwizze , tuh nebwâkâ megwache-enint , tuh mennoizzhewabizze , tuh mushkâwizze , Neenkitche Manitomenán gâgineek . Amen .
66007013	Bazhek okewanzedush nuhquatum neendig : owwananug uhgew wâbishke beenzikowâgunun agwidjig ? áneende wanjebáwât ?
66007014	Neendenádush , neendogemám , keen kekekandán . Neendigdush , me uhgew kitche kuhgwâtuhgitowinink buhōnje ságáungig ogegesebeginánâwân obeenzikowâgunewân uhgewâbishkâtowât Mánishtânishans omisqueemink .
66007015	Me wanje iáwât anosumisinik Kitche Manito onámátábewinink , otuhnumeawegumigōnk : ween námátábit námátábewinink oguhwejewân .
66007016	Kâween minowâ tuh buhkutasewug , kâ minowâ tuh gáshkuhnábágwasewug ; gezissōn kâween minowâ oguh bonesundágosewân , kâ giya sago gezhetag .
66007017	Mánishtánishans nowwiuhe ayát námátábewinink oguh bimusshumán , oguh ezhe suhgábeginán mokidjewun-nebegōnk , gâgega bemátizzewin nebe , Kitche Manito oguh gâsezebeengwanán osebeengoone oskezhigonink .
66008001	Opedush biákinunk ako neezhwâchink uhgokewusegunun , kitche pezân áta gezhigōnk , ábetá tebiegun menik .
66008002	Newábomág neezhwâswa mezhinowag uhnebowwewât Kitche Manito neezhwâswa nōndágomutchegunun menáwug .
66008003	Minowâ bazhek mezbinowa be-ezhá benebowe emá sáságewitchegun ukko uzzhuttag , otuhkonán ozâwâ shoneá otosowin ; nebewádush weengwuskwusegun mená , che sáságewitchegat , mámowy otuhnumeawinewung kokkinná anumeájig , ozâwâ shoneá otosowin sáságewitchegun uzzhutag anosumisink námátábewin .
66008004	Uhpuhquanag weengwuskwusegun me e-e bowwejeendunk anumeájig otuhnumeawinewân mezbinowa oninjenink ōnje ōmbishkâ anosumeet Kitche he Manito 'zhezhámuhgut .
66008005	Mezhinowadush ototâpenán weengwusk wusegun otossowin , omooshkenatōn ishkota sáságewitchegun uzzhutag ōnje , otuhpuhgitōndush ákeeng , medush inwawinwinun uhnemikewun , wâsumowinun , giya áke nuhningishkâ .
66008006	Názhwáchejigdush mezhinowag neezhwâswa nōndágomutchegunun takonungig , kezhetáwug we nōndágomotowât .
66008007	Netam mezhinowâ nōndágwitōt , mikquumenánewun , mámowy ishkota misque genigowesin , ákeengdush oppuhgitchegâta ; akonisewât metigōg châgizzowug , kokkinná wazawushquágin muskoosewun châgitawun .
66008008	Wiánckashkágatdush mezhinowa nōndágwitōn , kitche wudjew chiágetagin ezhenágwut kitchegumeeng apuhgitōng : ánintdush kitchegumme misqueeng , ezhenágwut .
66008009	Akonisewâtkush bamátizzidjig kitchegumeeng nebowug ; akonisewâtdush nábequânun banatutōn .
66008010	Akonisewátdush mezhinowa nōndágwitōn , kitche uhnungdush gezhigōnk ōnje pongeshin wâsâkoninjegunink ezbe bishkuhna , ánint sebewun pongeshin giya mokidjewun-nebegōn nebeen .
66008011	Wesuhgebug ezhenekâzo 'ow uhnung : ánintdush nebe me azhe wesuhgunk , nebewá aninnewug nebowug eu ōnje nebe uhwesuhgunk .
66008012	Ako newewât mezhinowagdush onōndágomotōn , ánintdush gezis banátizze , ánint e-e giya tibeke gezis , ánint giya uhnungwug , me ánint azhe kushkedibbikuk , ánint e-e gezhigut , kâ gewâsayásinōn , ánint giya tibikut .
66008013	Neendenábdush nenōndowâdush mezhinowa pemissat nuhnuhgezhik anegōk uhgegetōt eketto , tuh suhnágizzewug , tuh suhnágizzewug , tuh suhnágizzewug , ákeeng banátizzidjig uhgew niswa mezhinowag kayábe ga nōndágomutchegajig ōnje !
66009001	Ako nánunewâtdush mezbinowa onōndágomotōn , newâbomádush uhnung ákeeng pongeshink gezhigōnk ōnje : ábápegiegundush oweembápekág ningooche waquiásinōk ween mena .
66009002	Obákenándush e-e weembápeká ningooche waquiásinōk ; ōnje puhquanadush emá weembápeká , tebishkogo uhpuhquanag ningekoozegunink ; gezis giya nuhnuhgezhik kushkedibekisen uhpuhquanag e-e weembápeká ōnje .
66009003	Magwa puhquanadush ōnje ságáumōg uhtisáwiasheug ákeeng : mushkâwizzewindush menáwug tebishko mutchekenábekōg ákeeng azhe mushkâwizzewât .
66009004	Enáwugdush keche banájetosigwâ mezhuskeen ákeeng kokkinnágo washkegeenjin , giya oweuh metigōn ; uhgew atuh aninnewug Kitche Manito otuhgokewusegun ayásigōg oguhtigowâng .
66009005	Uhgew oge ezhe menáwug uhgew aninnewug , che nissigoosigwâ , náno geziz atuh keche kotuhgeintwá ; okotuhgitowinewâ tebishkogo mutche kenabeek takwumájin , aninnewun apetandagwut .
66009006	Ono gezhigutōn aninnewug oguh nundowâbundánáwâ nebowin , kâdush oguh mikunzeenâwâ : oguh nundowandánâwâ che nebowât nebowindush oguh ozhemigōnâwâ .
66009007	Bazhekokazbeg gázhetáwâjin owwe megâzowât ezhenágoozewug uhtisáwiasheun , ōshtegwânewâng ozâwâ shoneá wewoquân ezhenágwutinewun , oskezhikowândush eninneeng enutangwawug .
66009008	Wenississewân equa wenississink ezhehágwutinewun , webetáwân mishebezhe webetáng ezhenágwutinewun .
66009009	Buhkákáquânun otiáwâwân pewâbeko buhkááquânink ezhenágoozewun ; uhmutwa ângawât bazhekokasheeg mawinnuhzhewâwâjin owwe megâzowât inwawanewun oningwegunewân .
66009010	Mutche kenabeko ozowâng ezhenágwutinewun ozowâwân , omushkâwizzewinewâ ozowâwân tuhgone : omushkâwizzewinewâ che wesuhgandumeáwât aninewug náno gezis .
66009011	Otogemámewug 'ow ubnew mezhinowakundunk weembápeká wiaquiásinōk , otuhnozowin Hebrew inwawinink Abaddon ezhenekâzo , Greek inwawininkdush Apollyon ezhenekâzo .
66009012	Bazhek suhnágizzewin kuhbekōsa ; binná minowâ neezh suhnágizzewun guttuh ochichesawun .
66009013	Ako ningōtwâchewât mezhinowag onōndágwitōn , nenōndándush inwawin , náwidjig ashkunug ozâwâ shoneá sáságewitchegun uzzhutag ōnje ,
66009014	Uhguhnonint uhow mezhinowa ako ningōtwâchewât ween ayát nōndágomutchegun , ábuh náwidjig mezhinowag uhgew takobizzojig emá kitche sebeeng Euphrates .
66009015	Náwidjigdush mezhinowag ábiegâzowug uhgew gázhetájig ningo tebiegun , ningo gezhik , ningo gezis , ningo kekenonowin , che nesáwât akonisewât aninnewun .
66009016	Andusshewât bamomegoojig menisinoweninewug , neezhwâk tusso metoswâk , tusso kitchewâk ; nenōndumdush andusshewât .
66009017	Me eu azhewâbomugwâ bazhekokasheeg uzzbenábundumáng uhgewdush bamomigoojig ishkota buhkuhaquânun otiáwâwân , giya Jacinth , giya wazhowâsqukunag ōshtegwânewâng bazhekokazheeg mishebezbeeg ōshtegwánink ezbenágwutinewun , puhquana ishkota , wazâwâsquhkunag sâgitchebetane otonewâng .
66009018	Eu ōnje me akonisewât aninnewug nasigowât eu ishkota , puhquanag ozâwâsqukunag ōnje siágitchebetanig otonewâng .
66009019	Omushkâwizzewinewâng otonewáng iáne giya ozowâ wâng , ozowâwâng kenabekōng ezhenágwutinewun , mewun uhnew wâsuhgubuhwawâjin .
66009020	Ahnintdush aninnewug uhgew nasigosigwâ gá totumowât oninjewân ōnje , káween otá uhnumeatowâsewán Mutche Manitōn giya ozâwâshoneá muzzinineeg , giya shoneá , giya ozâwâbeek , uhsineen , giya metigōn ; uhnew wiábemuhgusinōn , nōndumomuhgusinōk giya bamosamuhgusinōk .
66009021	Kâ ánwanindizzosewug onisshewawinewân , giya ocheessuhkewinewân , giya obeshegwâtizzewinewân , giya okemotewinewân .
66010001	Newawbomahdush minowâ bazhek kitche mezhinowa gezhigōnk beōnje názhuhkeet , ánáqut uhbeuhgwit : onuhgwân ōshtegwânink iáne gezisōnk ezhenágooze oskezhigōnk ishkota suhkáágunink ezhenágwutinne ozittun .
66010002	Mazaniegânsdush otuhkonán oninjeeng bákigininne ; ogitchezit kitchegumink otátōn , onumunjezitdush ákeeng ,
66010003	Anegōkdush ázhequa mishebezhe wiáonojin inwa : opedush wiázhequat neezhwâswa uhnemekeen ōnje nōndágoozewun .
66010004	Ope neezhwâswa uhnemikeen mazatágoozinit omuzzetágoozewinink newe ozhebe-eganábun ; nenōndándush gegetowin gezhigōnk ōnje guhnonigoyán , uhgokewusun ono iuheen ono neezhwâswa uhnemikeeg aketowât , kago ozhebeunkan .
66010005	Mezhinowadush wiábomuk nebowwit kitche gumeeng giya ákeeng gezhigōnk ōnje ōmbinekane ,
66010006	Onánápegeezhwanun uhnew giágega bemátizzinidjin omushkâwitōt odikittowin , ween gezhik gá ozhetōt , iuheen giya ayágin , giya áke iuheen giya ayágin , giya kitchegumme giya iuheen ayágin , kâween kiábe beowin tuhtuhgoosinōn .
66010007	Onodush gezhigutōn ako neezhwâchewát mezhinowa ope gágetōt , ope máje nōndágomutchegat , Kitche Manito ogiátojin iuheen tá gezhichegâtawun gá ezhe weendumowât otoskenegagamun mamándáwizzidjin .
66010008	Gegetowindush n'wândumán gezhigōnk ōnje , guhnonigoyán minowâ , ekettodush , máján owwe otâpenun eu mazaniegâns eu biákisink mezhinowa oninjeeng nábowwit kitchegumeeng giya ákeeng .
66010009	Neendezhánundush 'ow mezhinowa neendenádush , mezheshin eu mazaniegâns , neendigdush , otâpenun kokkinná mejin , kemissut guttuh ōnje wesuhgun ketoninkdush ween ámo seenzebáqutōnk guhtuh ezhewishkobun .
66010010	Neendotâpenándush mazaniegâns mezhinowa oninjeeng , kokkinnádush nemejin ; ámo seenzebáqutōnk ezhewishkobun neendonink ; pichenunkigo gá mejeán nemissut wesuhgun .
66010011	Neendigdush , keguh tebájim minowâ anonunewât kitche nebená anishanâbag , papuhkân aezheweenzojig , papuhkân aeenwajig giya ogemág .
66011001	Uhsahgunusk nemenigo suhkáoonink ezhenágwut : mezhinowadush nebowwe , ekettōnk , pusegween , tebáun , Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik , giya sáságewitchegun ukko 'zhutag , giya uhgew anumeájig emá beendik .
66011002	Ketegânansdush eu áqutcheiuhe uhnumeawegumigōnk kago ween tebáunkan ; miátáwizzidjig menáwug , oguh tuhkokâtánâwá Kitche Manito ototanuh nemetunnuh ussheneezh tusso gezis .
66011003	Neenguh mená mushkâwizzewin neezh uhgew newâtoko widjig guhtuh tepájemowug metoswâk ussheneezhwâk usshe ningōtwâswa metunnuh tuswa gezhigutōn , mutche bebuhgewyán neginōshun che uhgwewât .
66011004	Me uhgew neezh olive-metigōg , neezh wâsâkoninjegunátigōn anosumeet Kitche Manito ákeeng batuhkisininegin .
66011005	Kishpin oweuh aninne we mutchetotowât , ishkota otonewâng ōnje ságitchebetane obanájeándush omiátáwizzemun : kishpindush oweuh aninne we mutchetotowât me o-o ga ezhe nesint .
66011006	Me uhgew mushkâwizzewin ayájig keche kepáquhumowât gezhigōnk , kâ tá kemewunzenōn uhnew gezhegutōn magwouh uhtepájemowât mushkâwizzewin giya otiánâwâ misqueen keche ezhenágwitowât nebeen , keche buhkitaumowât áke uhnōch tinnouh kago nebowin menikigo anandumowâjin .
66011007	Opedush , gezhetáwât eu odikitowinewâ , áwase bowōnje ságáunk weembápeká wayaquiásinōk oguhmegânán , oguh mámázheán , oguhnesán .
66011008	Weowwewândush mikunâng guhtuh átanewun kitche otanong eu ochichâgōnk Sodom giya Egypt atumink , emádush giya Kekitche Manitomenán gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquōnt .
66011009	Uhgewdush anishanâbag , aeenotawizzidjig papuhkân aeenwajig , papuhkân aezheweenzhojig oguhwâbomáwân nabonidjin nisso gezhik usshe ábetá , kâween jebágumigōnk tuh menásewug che átowât weowwemán .
66011010	Uhgewdush ákeeng andánuhkejig tuhbâpenanemowug uhnew ōnje tuh wekoòndewug tuh náneendáittewug ga ezhe pâpenanemowát ; ōnje uhgew neezh mamándáwizzidjig okotuhgeáwâbuneen ukko ákeeng andánuhkenidjin .
66011011	Squâchdush nisso gezis usshe ábetá ochichâgomá bomátizzewin Kitche Manito onje onázekowân uhnew nebowwewugdush ozitáwâng ; kitche kotájewin opongeshinotágōnâwâ uhgew wiábundungig .
66011012	Onōndánâwâ kitche gegetowin gezhigōnk ōnje enintwâ uhgew , omá be-ezhág . Ishpeminkdush ezháwug ánáqutōnk ; omiátáwizzemewân owâbomáwan .
66011013	Mego e-e tebiegun áke kitche nuhningishkâ , ánintdush e-e kitche otanuh pongesin , neezhwâswa tusso metoswák aninnewug nesáwug : ánintdush sagizzewug , okitchetwâweáwândush Kitche Manitōn ween gezhigōnk ayát .
66011014	Ahneka suhnágizzewin kuhbekosa ; binná , akonissink suhnágizzewin bábega tuhkoshinomuhgut .
66011015	Ako neezhwâchewâtdush mezninowa onōndágwitōn ; kitche gegetowindush gezhigōnk ōnjemuhgut , ekettōnk , ogemáwewinun omá ákeeng ween Kekitche Manitomenán giya Christ otebandánun , nōngum ween guhtuh ogemákundum gâgineek .
66011016	Neezh tunnuh ushe newin okewanzeug námátábidjig onámátábewinink anosumeet Kitche Manito oskezhikowâng pongeshinōg , otuhnumeatowâwân Kitche Manitōn ,
66011017	Ekettowugdush , kemegwecheweininneme Kitche Manito kache Apetandágoozeyun , nōngum ayágin giya kiut ayágebun , giya pichenuk ga iyágin , ōnje kege otâpenumázoon kekitche mushkâwizzewin , kegeogemákundum .
66011018	Azheweenzojigdush nishkâtizzewug , kenishkâtizzewindush tuhkoshinomuhgut , nōngumdush ope nabojig che tebákonintwâ opedush keche tebáumowutwâ ketoskenegamug mamándáwizzidjig giya anumeájig uhgewdush gwatungig ketuhnozowin kokkinná , babewizzidgig , giya natáwigidjig , giya keche banájeutwâ uhgew banájetojig áke .
66011019	Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik bákisin gezhigōnk , otuhnumeawegumigōnk wâbunjegâta otossowin eu owâweendumágawin ; wâsumowinundush , giya inwawinun , uhnemikeen , giya nuhningishkág áke , giya kitche mikqumenánewun .
66012001	Kitche mámuhkâtuhkumik nágwut gezhigōnk ; equa gezisōn otuhgwinun tibeke kezisōndush anámiuhe ozittáng , ōshtegwâninkdush wewoquân ussheneezh uhnungwug :
66012002	Magwouh unjeko , mowwe , magwouh owwe benenekat , owwe suhgenazit , owwe negeáwusōt .
66012003	Minowâ bazhek mâmuhkâtandumowin nágwut gezhigōnk ; binná miskooze babámisat kitche kenabeek , neezhwâchininewun ōshtegwânun metáchewun otashkunun , neezhwâswadush wewoquânun ōshtegwânink átanewun .
66012004	Ozowinkdush ako nissink uhnungwun , gezhigōnk obemetábánán ákeengdush , otuhpuhgenán , kenabeekdush nebowwe anosumeet uhow equa wâbenenekat owwe goonát uhbenocheun pichenukigo negenit .
66012005	Quewezansundush onegeán , ween wâogemákundowât kokkinná azheweenzonidjin pewâbeko suhkâoon ōnje : onejânisundush Kitche Manito ezhewetowâ , onámátábewinink .
66012006	Equadush buhgwuttuhkumigáng eninneshemo , Kitche Manito uhge ozhetágoot ga tuhnuhkeet , medush emá che bimusshumáwât metoswâk ussheneezhwâk usshe ningōtwâswemetunnuh tuswa gezhik .
66012007	Megâtimdush gezhigōnk ; Michael giya omezhinowamun omegânáwân genabeekōn ; mutche genabeekdush , megâzo mámowy omezhinowamun ,
66012008	Kâ mámázhe-ewase ; kâ minowâ ningooche mikkunzeen che iáwât gezhigōnk .
66012009	Kitche kenabeekdush sâgitchewabinegâzo , uhow kakât keenabeek Mutche Manito anint giya Satan , ween wiazhemát ákeeng bemátizzinidjin ; ákeeng oppuhgitchegâzo , omezhinowamundush gesâgitchewabenáwug mámowy .
66012010	Nenōndán anegōk mutwa gegetōm gezhigōnk , nōngum shâwandágoozewin takoshinomuhgut , jpya mushkáwizzewin Kekitche Manitomenán otogemáwewin giya Christ omushkâwizzewin : ween machetuzzhemát kekânissenánin neeswabinegâzo ween machetuzzhemápun ukko gázheguhkin giya dabekuhkin , anosumeet Kitche Manito .
66012011	Buhkinumowâdush Mánishtânishans omisqueem ōnje , giya odikittowinewâ ōnje ; kâdush osâgitoseenâwân obemátizzewinewân nebowinink .
66012012	Eu ōnje pâpenanemōk keenowâ gezhigōn , keenowâ giya andánuhkeyag . Tuh suhnágizzewug ákeeng andánuhkejig , uhgew giya kitche gummeeng andánuhkejig ! Mutche Manito kebenázhuhketágowâ , kitche nishkâtizze , ōnje okekandán tuhquânik omushkâwizzewin .
66012013	Ope mutche genabeek wiábundunk ákeeng uzzhuhpuhgitchegâzo , omutchetotowân equawun ween gá benenekánát quewezansun .
66012014	Neezhdush kitche megizze oningwegunun mená uhow equa , buhgwutuhkumigáng keche ezhesat tebinowa andánuhkeet anduzzhe usshumint , keche iát emá menik iá menik , ábetá menik , keche nuhgunnát mutche kenabeekōn anomenit .
66012015	Mutche kenabeek osâgituhnandumowân uhnew equawun nebe , konemá tá wabábuhgo uzzhenanemát .
66012016	Ahkedush onezhokomágoon uhow equa ; táwunnemuhgut uhgoondunk nebe , eu mutche genabeek siágittuhnandunk otonink .
66012017	Mutche kenabeekdush onishkâtizzetowân equawun , otowwemegânándush ánint onejânisinewun , uhgew kanowandungig Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , uhgew ayájig Jesus Christ odikitowinun .
66013001	Nenebowdush nagowwikâng kitchegumeeng , newâbomádush áwase uhmokeet kitchegumeeng , neezhwáswa ōshtegwâne metáchewun otashkunun ; metoswa wewoquânun atanewun otashkunink ōshtegwânun mutche gegetowin onozowin átanewun .
66013002	Ahwase 'ow wiábomug leopardink ezhenágooze , ozittun muhkoozitáng ezhenágwutinewun otōn ; mutche kenabeekdush omenán mushkâwizzewin , giya onámátábewin , giya kitche ogemáwewin .
66013003	Newâbundumowân bazbek ōshtegwân , ápiche begoegâtane goochetanebomuhgutinik , uhbemwâgunewitdush nojemomuhgutine ; kokkinná ákeeng bamátizzidjig omámuhkâtanemáwân uhnew áwaseun .
66013004	Otuhnumeatowâwân mutche kenabeekōn ween mánát áwaseun mushkâwizzewin : ekettōnk , owwanan azhenágoozit wuhow áwase ? owwanan ga kushketonipun che megânigoot ?
66013005	Menádush otōn keche tuzzhindunk kitche iuheen , giya mutche gegetowinun ; mushkâwizzewin mená nemetunnuh ussheneezh tusso kekenonowin , che bemátizzit .
66013006	Bákittonanedush uhmutchetuzzhemát Kitche Manitōn uh mutche tuzzhindumowât otonozowininne giya owegewâmene , uhnew giya gezhigōnk ayánidjin .
66013007	Menádush che megânát anumeánidjin , che buhkinowâtdush : mushkâwizzewindush mená , che mámázheát kokkinná azheweenzonidjin kokkinná uhnōch anwanidjin , kokkinná anishanâbag .
66013008	Kokkinná ákeeng andánuhkejig keche uhnumeatágoot , uhgew otuhnozowinewân wazhebe-egâtasininik Manistânishans obemátizze mazaniegunink , ween gá nesint wiazhkut wazhetōng áke .
66013009	Kishpin oweuh aninne watowwugât , máno tuh nōndum .
66013010	Ween azhe suhgábeginint owwâkânewinink guhtuh owwâkâne : ween uzzhowweshk wanje nisshewat , giya ween uzzhowweshk guhtuh nesá . Omá anumeájig obeowinewâ , omushkâwandumowinewâ .
66013011	Newâbomá minowâ bazhek áwase ákeeng ōnje mokeet ; neezhewun otashkunun mánishtânishansink ezhenágwutinne , mutche genabeekōnkdush ezhe gegeto .
66013012	Kokkinná mushkâwizzewin otián uhnew áwaseun nâgânetumágoojin ototowândush ákeeng , andánuhkenidjin che uhnumeatowânit uhnew netam áwaseun , ōshtegwân gá bemwâgunichegâtanik nojemomuhgutinne .
66013013	Kitche mámuhkâtuhkumik ieendotum ototán ishkota gezhigōnk keche ōnje pongesinik anosumewât aninnewug ákeeng .
66013014	Owyazhemán uhnew ákeeng andánuhkenidjin , ono totumowinun ōnje wanje kushketōt mushkâwizzewin uhnōch ieendotunk anosumenit áwaseun ; uzzhenintwâ uhgew ákeeng andánuhkejig , ozheik muzzinene azhenágoozit áwase gá bemwáguneint uzzhowweshk ōnje , anawakdush gebemátitizze .
66013015	Otián mushkâwizzewin che menát bemátizzewin muzzinoneen azhenágoozinit áwase muzzininne , áwase giyá tá gegeto keche ōnje nesintwâ uhgew ga uhnumeatowâsigwâ muzzinene áwaseun .
66013016	Ototowân kokkinná , kitche ián giya babewizzinidjin , wiánuhkenidiig giya owâkânewinidjin , keche ozhebeōntwâ okitcheninjewâng gama oguhtigowâng ;
66013017	Kâ oweuh aninne tá kishpinutâzose , giya tá átáwase , meatuh 'ow wazhebe-egâzōt , áwase otuhnozowin , giya menik otuhnozowinun .
66013018	Omá nebwâkâwin iáne . Máno ween nasetotunk oguhgemán andussinit áwaseun : me eu andussit aninne ; eu andussit ningōtwáswâk usshe nishwâswemetunnuh usshe ningōtwâswa .
66014001	Neendenahbdush , binnádush , Mánishtânishans nebowwe wudjewink Sion , ningōtwâk usshe nemetunnuh usshe newin wâjewegoojin , Osun otuhnozowinine ozhebe-egâtane oguhtigowâng .
66014002	Nenōndándush gegetowin gezhigōnk , nebewá nebeen matwawagin inwawin , kitche uhnemikeeg anwawât inwa ; nenōndán mutwawag mutwawachegun :
66014003	Nuhgumowug ōshke nuhgumowin anosumisink námátábewin , anosumewât newin áwaseug , giya okewanzeug : kâ oweuh aninne kushketose che kekandunk e-e nuhgumōn , meatuh uhgew ningōtwâk usshe nemetunnuh usshenewin andusso metoswâkoozidjig , uhgew gá kishpinuninjig ákeeng .
66014004	Me uhgew banáschichegâzosigwâ equa ōnje ; ōshkenegewug . Uhmewug uhgew n'wâpenánájig Mánishtánishansun aezhánitigo : gá kishpinuhninjig magwa aninne , netam mánekânewidjig Kitche Manito giya Mánishtânishans ōnje .
66014005	Kâ kago kuhgianizzewin mikkunzeem otonewáng : kâ ningōtono ezhe mutchetotunzewug anosumisink Kitche Manito onámátábewin .
66014006	Newâbomá minowâ bazhek mezhinowa pemissat nuhnuhgezhik , uzzhiámowât gâgega meenwâjemowin che guhgekemintwâ uhgew ákeeng andánuhkejig , kokkinnágo azheweenzojig , kokkinná uhnōch anishanâbag ,
66014007	Uzzheketōt anegōk , gosik Kitche Manito kitchetwâweik ; tebiegun otebákonegawin ochichesane ; uhnumeatowik ween gá ozhetōt gezhik giya áke kitchegumme giya mokidjewun-nebegōn nebeen .
66014008	Minowâ bazhek mezhinowa nopenuhke , ekettōnk , Babylon pongesin , pongesin , eu kitche otanuh , ōnje ototowân kokkinná azheweenzonidjin che minequanit shomenâbo , nishkâtizzewin obisshegwâtizzewin .
66014009	Akonisewât mezhinowag onopenánán , ekettōnk anegōk gegetōnk ; kishpin oweuh aninne anumeatowât áwaseun , giya omuzzineneen otâpenunk otozhebe-eguninne ogutegonink , giya oninjenink ,
66014010	Oguh menequan shomenâbo Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin gáseginumink kago uhtuhgonegâtasinōk minnequâchegunink onishkâtizzewinink ; guhtuh kuhgwâtuhgeá ishkota wazâwushkwukonag ōnje anosumewât Kitche Manito omezhinowamun giya anosumeet Mánishtánishans ;
66014011	Puhquanag okotuhgitowinewâ ōmbishkâne gâgineek : kâ unwashemonosewug gázhegukin giya dabekukin uhgew anumeatowâjig áwaseun giya otizzhenágoozewin muzzineneen kokkinná watâpenungig otozhebe-egun otuhnozowin .
66014012	Omá me uhnumeájig obeowinewâ ; omá 'ne zhiáwât kanowandungig Kitche Manito oguhgequawinun giya Jesus omushkáwandumowin .
66014013	Nenōndán gegetowin gezhigōnk uhguhnonigoyán , ozhebe-egan , tuhshâwandágoozewug nabojig Kitche Manitōn weowwinink nōngum ōnje , kagat eketto Ochichâgomá , ōnje unwabewug otuhnokewinewâng otuhnokewinewâdush onopenánigonáwâ .
66014014	Neendenábdush , newâbundándush , wábishke ánáqut , ánáqutōnkdush námátábe oweuh Aninne Oguisun me azhenágoozit , ōshtegwânink ozáwâ shoneá owewoquân otiōn , oninjenink gánánig pushkooshegun otuhkonán .
66014015	Minowâ bazhek mezhinowa kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk beōnje ságáum oguhnonán anegōk uhnew ánáqutōnk námátábinidjin , kinjetanun kepushgooshegun ; ochichesa shiegwouh che pushkooshegang kittegân ákeeng wâbeta .
66014016	Weendush ánáqutōnk námátábit oginjetánán opushkooshegun ákeeng ; ákedush pushkooshegâta .
66014017	Minowâdush bazbek mezhinowa beságáum kitche uhnumeawegumik gezhigōnk ayát giya ween gánánik pushkooshegun otuhkonán .
66014018	Minowâ bazhek mezhinowa beságáum sáságewitchegun ukko uzzhutag ween otuhnewishkán ishkota ; oguhnonán anegōk uhnew takonuminit gánánik pushkooshegun , otinnân , kinjetánun gánág kepushkooshegun , mowwunjetōn waoqunzoōtagin ákeeng showimenun ápiche uhetawun .
66014019	Mezhinowadush oginjetánán opushkooshegun ákeeng , omowwunjetōn showimenágáwunj ákeeng , obeenjwabenán Kitche Manito anduzzhe ozhetōt shomenâbo onishkâtizzewinink .
66014020	Anduzzhe ozbetōng shomenâbo shisshegooshkegâta áqutcheiuhe otanuh ; misquedush ságáumomuhgut anduzzhe ozhetōng shomenâbo , bazhekokezheeg osuhgetōnabitchegunewán , beukkobe neezhwák ussheneezhtunná tusso tebiegun ope eshidjewun .
66015001	Minowaw bazhek kekinowâchichegawin newâbundán gezhigōnk , mámuhkâtuhkumik , neezhwâswa mezhinowag squâch neezhwâswa nebowinun otiánâwân ; uhgew ōnje Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin mooshkena .
66015002	Newâbundán kitchegume wâsachegunábeek genigowwisink ishkotang : uhgewdush gá uhnewishkowâjig áwaseun , giya otizzhenágoozewin , giya okekinowâjebe-egâzowin , giya andusshewât otuhnozowinink , nebowwewug kitchegume wâsachegunábeekōnk uhtuhkonunk Kitche Manito omuhmutwachegun .
66015003	Mosesdush Kitche Manito otoskenegamun otonuhgumonun onuhgumōnâwâ giya Mánishtânishans onuhgumōn , ekettōnk , Kitche apetandágwut mámuhkâtuhkumik ketuhnokewinewân , Kitche Manito Kache Apetandágoozeyun ; quiuk tabwawinewun ketizzhewabizzewin , Keen wagemákundowutwâ anumeájig .
66015004	Owwanan ga goosinōk Kitche Manito , owwanan ga kitchetwâwitosig ? keen atuh kemennoizzhewabiz : kokkinna azheweenzojig tuh be-ezháwug keche uhnumeatoquâ anosumeyun ; ketebákonegawin gemizzhisshowwichegâta .
66015005	Náágutchdush ope enábeán binnádush , uhnumeawegumik mutche-egin ekettowin , gezhigōnk bákindasin .
66015006	Neezhwâswa mezhinowag beságáumōg uhnumeawegumigōnk neezhwâswa inápinawinun otiánâwân , wiábishkânik bebuhgewián negin otuhgwinâwâ okákegunewângdush ozâwâ wâ shoneá ogitchepizzoonun ogitchepizzoonâwân .
66015007	Bazhekdush náwidjig áwaseug názhwâchejig mezhinowag omenán neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneâ omotansun mooshkenanik Kitche Manito onishkátizzewin ween giágega bemátizzit .
66015008	Uhnumeawegumikdush mooshkena ábuhta Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewinink giya omushkâwizzewinink , kâdush oweuh aninne kushketose che peendegat uhnumeawegumigōnk nánázh neezhwâswa inápinawinun neezhwâswa mezhinowag ōnje uhgezhetáwinewung .
66016001	Nenondahn kitche gegetowin , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk uhguhnonintwâ názhwâchejig mezhinowag májáeyeuk owwe segwabenumōk ákeeng , ketomotansewân Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin .
66016002	Netam miáját owwe segwabenunk ákeeng otomotansim , ápiche kitche ákoozewin opongesinotágōnâwâ uhgew aninnewug ayájig áwase okekinowâchebe-egâzowin uhgewdush anumeatungig otizzhenágoozewin .
66016003	Ahneka mezhinowadush osegwabenán otomotansim kitchegumeeng , nabōt aninne omisqueem ezhenágwutinne , kokkinná bamátizzidjig kitchegumeeng nebowug .
66016004	Akonisewâtdush mezhinowa osegwabenán otomotansim sebeeng , giya mokidjewun nebegōn , kokkinná misqueeng ezhenágwutōn .
66016005	Nenōndowâ mezhinowa nebeeng ekettōt , quiuk ketizzhewabiz , Kitche Manito nōngum ayáyun , gá iágebun , giya ga iyág , ōnje me o-o azhe tebákonegayun .
66016006	Ogesegwabenánâwâ anumeájig mamándáwizzidjig omisquemewâ kemenágdush misque che minequawât , ōnje enandágoozewug .
66016007	Nenōndowâ minowâ bazhek uhmutwa ekettōt , sáságewitchegun uzzhuttanik ekettōnk , ezhewabut , Kitche Manito Kache Apetandágoozeyun , tabwawin quiuk izzbewabizzewin ketebákonegawin .
66016008	Ako newewât mezhinowa osegwabenán otomotansim gezisōnk mushkâwizzewin mená che châgizwât aninnewun ishkota ōnje .
66016009	Aninnewugdush châgizzowug kache gezhetanik omutcheetánáwâ Kitche Manito otuhnozowin , ween anewishkunk ono nebowinun , kâdush ánwanindizzosewug keche kitchetwâweápun .
66016010	Ako nánunewátdush mezhinowa osgenán otomotansim áwase onámátábewinink , otogemáwewindush kokkinná kushkedibikutinne ; otuhtukqundánâwân otanuhnewewán azhe wesuhgandumewât ,
66016011	Omutche enáwân Kitche Manitōn gezhigōnk owesuhgandumowinewân ōnje , otákoozewinewâdush , kâdush ánwanindizzosewug otizzhewabizzewinewân .
66016012	Ako ningōtwâzhewâtdush mezhinowa oseginán otomotansim e-e kitche sebeeng Euphrates kokkinnádush nebe iskutta , e-e mikun ogemág wâbunōnk keche onuhmotowât .
66016013	Newâbomágdush niswa wánizzidjig ochichâgomág omuhkuhkeeng ezhenagoozewug beságáumōg mutche kenabeek otonink beōnje ságaumōg giya áwase otonink , giya gagenowishkid mamándáwizzit otonink .
66016014	Mutche Manitōg ochichâgomág áwewug , muhmándá ieendotumōg kokkinná anegoquág áke ogemág otizzhánâwân owwe mowōnjeáwât eu kache apetandágwut gezhigut owwe megâzowât Kitche Manito Kache Apetandágoozit omegâzowinink .
66016015	Binná , tebishko gamotishkid neendizzhe takoshin . Tuhsháwandágooze ween akowâbit , kunwandunk agwidjin peengwoshshâgit keche bemosasig che wâbundumowint otâgutchewin .
66016016	Omowōnjeándush emá Hebrew inwawin Armageddon ezhenekâtumink .
66016017	Ako neezhwâchewâtdush mezhinowa oseginán otomotansim nuhnuhgezhik , kitche gegetowin beōnzittágoot kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk gezhigōnk giya námátábewinink ōnje , ekettōnk , gezhetáwinewun .
66016018	Gegetowinun uhnemikewun wâsumowinun kitche nuhningishkâ áke wekâ azhewabusinōk aninnewug áko tuhnuhkewât ákeeng azhe kitche nuhningishkâg áke .
66016019	Kitche otanuh niswayug ezhe nuhnishkoká otanowun andánuhkejig pongesinōg , kitche Babylon mikwanjegâta anosumeet Kitche Manito che menint shomenâbo , okitchenishkâtizzewin minnequâchegunink .
66016020	Kokkinná menissun ozhemomuhgutōn giya wudjewun , kâ mikegâtasinōn .
66016021	Kitche mikwumenánewun gezhigōnk ōnje pongesin , pongesinotágowât aninnewug andusso menuhguk ningo tebábishkochegun uhpetinegutōn , aninnewugdush omutchetuzzhemáwân Kitche Manitōn ōnje e-e mikqumenánewunk nebowin ōnje kitche apetandágwut .
66017001	Bazhek názhwâchejig mezhinowag omotansun ayájig be-ezhá uhbeguhguhnozhit , neendigdush , omá be-ezhán ; keguh wâbundi-in azhe tebákonint kache bisshegwâtizzit equa námátábit nebewá nebeen ;
66017002	Ween uhow bashegwâcheigoot ogemán ákeeng , ákeeng andánuhkejig kewushquabunáwug shomenâbo eu obisshegwátizzewin .
66017003	Medush ochichâgománg buhgwuttuhkumigáng azhe ezhe nizzhit , newâbomádush equa uhnámátábit uhzhuhpubit misko áwaseun , aneginitigo mizzewa mutche onozowinun ozhebeegâtanewun , neezhwâcheninewun ōshtegwânun metáchewundush otashkunun .
66017004	Uhowdush equa manitowagin , giya misquagin , agwidjin , ozâwâ shoneán matindungin , giya miskâziswâbeekōn giya megissun , ozâwâ shoneá minequâchegun takonunk oninjeeng mooskena mutcheizzhewabizzewin weenizzewin obisshegwátizzewin .
66017005	Nowweguttik onozowin ozhebe-egâtane , KIAHTUK , KITCHE BABYLON , BASHEGWAWTIZZIDJIG EQUAWUG OGEWAWN , OMUTCHEIZZHEWABIZZEWINEWAW AHKEENG .
66017006	Newâbomá 'ow equa kewushquabeet anumeájig omisquemewâ ōnje , giya uhgew Jesus Christ otuhnumeawin wanje nuhninjig omisquemewâ : opedush wiábomug neen kitche mámuhkâtandum .
66017007	Mezhinowadush neendig , wagonan wanje mámuhkâtandumun ? keguh weendumōn 'ow equa kiátojin , áwaseundush bamewinegoojin , názhwâchininik ōshtegwânun matáchinit otashkunun .
66017008	Ahwase wiábomut ge áwe , kâweendush áwisse , guhtuh bemoke eu weembápekáng eu waquiásinōk , nisshewunátizzewinink guhtuh ezhá : uhgewdush ákeeng andánuhkejig tuh mámuhkâtandumōg , ( uhgew otuhnozowinewán wazhebe-egâtasinōk bemátizze mazaniegunink chebwâ ozhichegâtag áke , ) ope wiábomáwât uhnew áwase , wiáwepun kâweendush iá , kiábedush áwe .
66017009	Omá me onáguttuhwandumowin ween nebwâkâwin ayát . Neezhwâswa ōshtegwânun me neezhwâswa wudjewin emá equa uhnámátábit .
66017010	Neezhwâchewug ogemág , nánun ge banátizzewug , bazhek iá , minowâdush bazhek kâ muhshe takoshinze ; ope tuhkoshink wanebeekigo guttuh iá .
66017011	Ahwase wiáwepun , kâdush áwisse , ween me e-e neezhwâchewât , ween me bazhek názhwâchejig , nisshewunnátizzewininkdush ezhá .
66017012	Metoswa ashkunug wiábomutwâ me metoswa ogemán , kâ muhshe oweuh ogemáwewin otiáseen , otiánâwâdush mushkâwizzewin mámowy áwaseun bazhek tebiegun tebishko ogemág azhe iámowât .
66017013	Uhgew bazhekwuninne otenandumowinewâ , áwaseundush oguh menáwâ omushkâwizzewine .
66017014	Me uhgew ga megânájig Mánishtânishansun , Mánishtânishansundush oguh uhnewishkágowân ; ōnje ween Okitche Manitokundowân Manitōn , giya Otogemákundowân Ogemán : uhnew wâjewegoojin nundomáwug onuhgimáwug nebwâkâwug .
66017015	Neendigdush nebeen wiábundumunin , bashegwâtizzit equa uhnámátábit , me anishanâbag kitche nebená uhnōch azheweenzojig , uhnōch anwajig .
66017016	Metoswadush ashkunug , wiábomutwâ áwase gagishkowâjig me uhgew ga sheenganemájig bashegwâtizzenidjin , oguh nisshewuhnájeán oguh peengwoshshâgitōn , oguh mejinâwâ oweyâsine oguh châgizzewâwân ishkotang .
66017017	Kitche Manito ogeuttowân otainink che totuminit anandunk , che enandumowât che menáwât áwaseun otogemáwewinewâ , nánázh Kitche Manito odikittowin che tabwawinewunk .
66017018	Equadush 'ow wiábomut me e-e kitche otanuh wagemákundowát ogemán ákeeng .
66018001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen newâbomá minowâ bazhek mezhinowa gezhigōnk ōnje be názhuhkeet , kitche mushkâwizzewin uzzhiát , ákedush wâsayá ogitchetwâwizzewin ōnje .
66018002	Anegōk ázhequa , eketto , Babylon kache apetandágwuk , banátut , banátut , Mutche Manitōg otuhnokenotánâwâ , owâzhewân kokkinná wânizzidjig ochichâgomág , otokokobenágunewâ kokkinná wânizzidjig benasheug .
66018003	Onje kokkinná azheweenzhojig ogeminequanâwâ shomenâbo obisheshegwâtizzewin onishkâtizzewin , ogemág ákeeng ogewejebisshegwâtizzemigōn , átáwaweninnewug ákeeng ashkum wânuttizzewug , ween owânuttizzewin ōnje .
66018004	Nenōndán minowâ bazhek gegetowin gezhigōnk ōnje , ekettōnk , beságáumōk neenduhnishanâbametōk , kago otâpenumowâ kago omutche izzhewabizzewinun keche otissigosewag onisshewawinun .
66018005	Omutcheizzhewabizzewinun gezhigōnk tuhgoshinomuhgutinewun , Kitche Manito okunwandumágōn omutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
66018006	Tebáumowik tebishko azhe tebáumonág , neezhink tebáumowwik otenuhnokewinun ōnje , minnequáchegun gá mooshkenatōt neezhink mooshkenuttowik .
66018007	Menik gá ezhe kitchetwâweittezoot , ápiche owânutizzit , menik kotuhgitowin kushkandumowin menik ; ōnje eketto otaink , ogemáqua neendenub , kâween neshegáwisse , káween kago kushkandumowin neenguh wâbunduhzeen .
66018008	Eu ōnje , ogotuhgitowinun oguh otissigonun ningōtink gezhiguk , nebowin , mowwewin , buhkutawin , tuhshâgâkizzo ishkotang : ōnje Kitche Manito ween tabákonát mushkâwizze .
66018009	Giya ogemág ákeeng gá weje bisshegwâtizzemájig gá menno wejetuhkewamájig oguh mowwemáwân , oguh netágetowâwân , ope wâbundumowât puhquana e-e che châgizzōt .
66018010	Wâsâ guhtuh ōnje gâbowwewug ōnje uhgotumowât okotuhgitowin , guhtuh ekettowug , tiá ! tiá ! e-e kitche otanuh Babylon , e-e kache apetandágwut otanuh ! ningo tebiegun ketebákonigowin tuhkoshinomuhgut .
66018011	Ahtáwaweninnewug ákeeng tuh mowwewug che mowwemáwât ; kâ oweuh aninne gishpinutâzose otátáwawin minowâ :
66018012	Ahtáwawin ozâwâ shoneá giya shoneá , giya muskâziswâbeekōn giya megissig , giya wanissheshink bebuhgewiánegin , giya manitowagin , giya sanebá giya misquagin , giya thyine metig , giya uhnōch kago otossowinun , kitche áwase-webit , kokkinná giya otossowinun kache suhnáguk metig , giya ozâwâbeek , giya pewâbeek , giya wâbegun ,
66018013	Giya wâskobung wuhnuhgak , giya manomágwukin , giya bemetan , giya weengwushkwussegun , giya shomenâbo , giya bemeta , giya báság puhquazhegun , giya mamenewayág puhquazhegun , giya áwaseug , giya mánishtánishug , giya bazhekokazheeg , giya otábánug , giya owwâkânug , giya aninnewun ochichâgowân .
66018014	Menekânundush ono kechichâg nandowandungin kebuhkawinegonun kokkinná iuheen manopogwukin wanissheshingin kepuhkawinegonun kâween wekâ minowâ keguh mikkunzenun .
66018015	Uhgew atáwajig ono iuheen wanje wânuttizzewâjin , wâsâ tuh nebowwewug ōnje gotánâwâ ogotuhgitowin owesuhgandumowin ,
66018016	Guhtuh ekettowug , tiá ! tiá ! e-e kitche otanuh wanissheshink wâbishke bebuhgewyán negin agwuhniegâtag manitowaginōn , ozâwâ shoneá uhmuhtindunk , giya muskâziswâbekōn giya megisun !
66018017	Onje , ningo tebiegun o-o tinnouh kitche wânuttizzewin ápiche banátut . Kokkinná nábequân ogemág kokkinná nangōtwawânuhgizzidjig nábequânink kokkinná giya nápequán aninnewug , giya menik atáwawât kitchegumeeng , wâsâ ōnje gâbowewug .
66018018	Ahzhequawugdush ope wiábundumowât puhquana uhchâgizzōt , ekettōnk , wagonan otanuh azhenágwuk o-o azhenágwuk kitche otanuh !
66018019	Weáguseun otuhpuhgitōnâwâ ōshtegwânewâng , ázhequawug , uhmowwewât , iázhequawât , ekettōnk , tiá ! tiá ! eu kitche otanuh , kokkinná uhgew wanápequânidjin kitchegumeeng ōnje wânutizzewug , owânutizzewin ōnje ! ōnje ningo tebiegun ge ápiche banáshichegâzo .
66018020	Ween gezhik ōnje bâpenanemōn , giya keenowá manoizzhewabizzeyag anoninjig mamándáwizzidjig , Kitche Manito obuhshunzhawân keenowâ ōnje .
66018021	Kitche mezhinowadush ototâpenán gitche ásin besebochegunábekōnk ezhenágwutinne , obuhkobewabenán kitchegumeeng ekettōnk , me o-o tebishko eu kitche otanuh Babylon ga ezhe binnewabinegâtag kitche mushkâwizzewin ōnje kâwekâ minowâ guhtuh mikunzeen .
66018022	Nōndágomutchegajig otinwawinewân , giya nagumojig giya pepegwinōndágomotojig , kâween pâpish kago tuh nōnduhzeen keowwink , kâ oweuh uhnokewinewung uhnōch kago uhnokewin ká minowâ guhtuh mikunzeem keowwink ; besebochegunábeek káwekâ minowâ tuh nōnduhzeem mutwawag keowwink .
66018023	Wâsâkoninjegun kâwekâ minowâ tuh wâsâkoonasenōn keowwink ; ween wâwit otinwawin , ween giya wanâbamit otinwawin , kâwekâ minowâ tuh nōnduhzeem keowwink ; ōnje ketátáwawenineeg kache apetandágoozidjig aninnewug ákeeng ōnje kecheesuhkewinewâ kokkinná bamátizzidjig wanje wiazheintwá .
66018024	Ween weowwink mikám mamándáwizzidjig omisquemewâ , giya anumeájig , kokkinná giya nasinjig ákeeng .
66019001	Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen nenōndánun kitche nenebená gegetowinun nebená anishanâbag , gezhigōnk , ekettōnk , Alleluia : Shâwandágoozewin , kitchetwâwizzewin , mushkâwizzewin , tabwandungin Kekitche Manitomenán :
66019002	Onje otebákonegawinun tabwawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin : ōnje ogetebákonán kache bisshegwâtizzinidjin , ween bagishkunuzhetōt obisshegwâtizzewin ōnje , ge buhshunzhawâ otoskenegamun omisquemene ōnje .
66019003	Minowâdush ekettowug , Alleluia . Opuhquanandush ōmbábuhtane gagineek .
66019004	Neezhtunnuh usshe newin okewanzeug giya newin áwaseug pongeshinōg uzhuhnumeatowâwât Kitche Manitōn ween námátábit námátábewinink uzzhekettowât . Amen ; Alleluia .
66019005	Gegetowin beōnzitágwut námátábewinink ekettōnk , uhnumeatowik Kekitche Manitomenán kokkinná keenowâ menik watoskenegameminág keenowâdush menik gwasag uhbenocheitōk giya kitche anishanâbatōk .
66019006	Nenōndándush inwawin kitche nebená anishanábag ukko anwawât tebishko inwawin nebená nebeen anwawag , tebishko kitche uhnemikewung ukko anwawag ekettōnk , Alleluia ; Kitche Manito miámowy mushkâwizzit , ogemákundum .
66019007	Umbasino pâpenanemotá , mojeganduntá , kitchetwâwanemátá ; Mánishtânishans owetegandewin tuhkoshinomuhgut , owewun ázhia gegezhetá .
66019008	Gemenádush wiábishkegutinik wanissheshink buhbuhgiyán negin keche uhgwit keche benizzit che wâbishkizzit ; wanissheshink bebugewyán negin me , quiuk izzhewabizzewin anumeájig .
66019009	Neendigdush , ozhebeun , shâwandágoozewug uhgew nandominjig che bewesinewât Mánishtânishans wesinewinink . — Neendigdush , me ono quiuk tabwawinun Kitche Manito aketōt .
66019010	Ozitángdush neempongeshin uzhuhnumeatowug . Neendigdush , tuhtebábin , kago e-e totunkan : neen keejuhnoketágawenine bazhek kekánissewâ uhgew ayájig Jesus odikittowin ; uhnumeatow Kitche Manito , Jesus odikittowin me eu Ochichâgomá mamándáwizzewin .
66019011	Newâbundán gezhik uhbákishkág , binnádush wâbishke bazhekokazhe ; weendush bamomigoot Nebwâkâ Tabwa ená , tebákonegawinink nundobunewin otozhetōn quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
66019012	Oskezhigōn misqukquanág ishkota ezhenágwutinewun , ōshtegwâninkdush nebewá wewoquânun átanewun uhnozowin ozhebe-egâtane kâ oweuh aninne okekanduhzeen , ween atuh :
66019013	Beenzikowâgun gá geendábeginegâtag misgueeng otuhgwin ; otuhnozowindush Kitche Manito Odikittowin ezheweenjegâtane .
66019014	Menisinōgdush gezhigōnk ayájig onopenánáwân uhbemomigowât wâbishke bazhekokazheen , wanissheshink wâbishke bebuhgewiánegin agwewâjin wâbishkizzewug benizzewug .
66019015	Gánánik uzzhoweshk ōnje ságitchebitane otonink chebuhkittawât azheweenzhonidjin , ogun ogemákundowân pewâbeek sukáoon ōnje : otuhkokátán shomenábo anduzzhe ozhetōng Miámowy Mushkâwizzit Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin .
66019016	Onozowin ozhebe-egâtane okonâsink giya obwâmink , WAGEMAHKUNDOWAUT OGEMAHN , MANITOKUNDOWAUT MANITON .
66019017	Newâbomádush mezhinowa gezisonk nebowwit ; anegōk gegeto , otinnân , kokkinná benasewun gezhigōnk babámisanidjin , ōndás , bemowōnjeittig che mejeyag Kitche Manito owesinewin :
66019018	Keguh mejináwâ ogemág oweyâsewâ , giya menisseno ogemág oweyâsewâ giya kache apetandágoozidjig aninnewug oweyâsewâ , giya bazhekokazheeg oweyâsewâ giya bamomigoojig oweyâsewâ , giya kokkinná aninnewug oweyâsewâ wiánuhkejig giya awâkânewidjig uhbenocheug giya kitche anishanâbag .
66019019	Newâbomádush áwase , ogemág e-e giya ákeeng giya omenisinomewân mowōnjeittewug owwe megânáwât uhnew bamomigoot bazhekokazheeng , giya omenisenomene .
66019020	Ahwasedush tuhkonán mámowy gagenowishkinidjin mamándáwizzit gá muhmámándátotuminit anosuminit , uhnew gá wiazhemájin uhgew áwaseun wazhebe-egâzonidjin uhgew anumeátowâjig omuzzininnemun , uhgew nayazh ishkota kitche gumeeng gá ápuhgeninjig eu chiágetag ozáwâsqukanag ōnje .
66019021	Ahnintdush uhnew bamomigonidjin otuzzhoweshkone onisigōnâwâ eu siágitchebitanig otonink : kokkinná benasewug tabesinewug oweyásewâ : kokkinnádush benaseug tabesinewug oweyâsewâ ōnje .
66020001	Newawbomahdush mezhinowa gezhigōnk benázhuhkeet , tuhkonunk ábápekiegun ezhábápekáumink wiaquiásinōk kitche pewábeek otuhkobichegun otuhkonán oninjeeng ,
66020002	Otuhkonándush uhnew bebámissat mutche genabeek , 'ow okewanze genabeek , 'ow Mutche Manito giya Satan , otuhkobinán metoswâk tosto kekenonowin .
66020003	Obeenjwabinán eu waquiásinōk weembápeká uhkepáquowât , otuhkokewuswândush , che wiazhemásig anishanâban minowâ , nánázli metoswâk tusso kekenonowin che kuhbasag ; squáchdush tuh ábiegâzo wanebeek .
66020004	Newâbundánun námátábewinun newâbomágdush uhgew námátábidjig , tebákonegawin menáwug ; newâbomemán ochichâgowân uhgew gágishkegwaōnjig Jesus odikittowin ōnje , giya Kitche Manito odikitowin ōnje , uhgew gá uhnumeatowâsigook áwaseun giya otizzhenágoozewin , uhge otâpenuhzikwâ eu ozhebe-egun nowwiguttuhayánik giya oninjewâng ; bemátizzewug owetobemáwât uzhogemákundumowât mámowy metoswâk tusso kekenonowin .
66020005	Ahnintdush nabojig kâ minowâ bemátizzissewug nánázh metoswâk tusso kekenonowin uhguhbasag , : me o-o netam ábejebáwin .
66020006	Shâwandágooze , mennoizzhewabizze ween ánint ayát netam ábejebáwin ; áneka nebowin kâ oguh ogemákundowâseen e-e tinnouh ; siáságewinájig Kitche Manitōn giya Christ gutuh áwewug tuh ogemákundumōg mámowy Jesus metoswâk tusso kekenonowin .
66020007	Ope metoswâk kekenonowinun kabasag , Satan tuh ábiegâso uzhowâkânint ,
66020008	Tuhmájádush che wiazhemát anishanâban mizzewa ákeeng ayájig Gog giya Magog , che mowōnjeintwâ che megâzowât : andusshewât nagow kitchegumeeng azhenuk me azhenowât .
66020009	Ezháwugdush uhmungutayánik áke ogewetáskánâwâ anumeájig okuhbashewinewâ giya siágitōng otanuh : ishkota gezhigōnk beōnje názhuhkemuhgut uhgonigowât .
66020010	Mutche Manitodush wiazhemát , ishkota kitchegumeeng oppuhgitchegâzo eu chiágetag ishkota wazâwushqukunag ōnje áwase giya gagenowishke mamándáwizzit uzzhiáwât , tuh guhgwâtuhgitodush kopagezhik kopadibbik giya gâgipeek .
66020011	Newábundán wâbishkág kitche námátábewin , weendush 'ow námátábit , anosumeet oskezhigōnk áke giya gezhik oshemomuhgut , kâ ningooche mikegâtasenōn keche iáwât .
66020012	Newâbomágdush gá nebojig uhbenocheun giya kitche anishanâbag , nebowwewât anosumeet Kitche Manito mazaniegunundush , bákisinōn minowâdush bazhek mazaniegun bemátizzewin , nabojig tebákonáwug uhnew wazhebe egâtagin mazaniegunink ōnje , gá ieenuhnokewâtigo .
66020013	Kitchegumedush omegewanun uhnew nabonidjin ayánidjin emá ayânidjin andusshewâtdush tebákonáwug gá ienuhnokewâtigo .
66020014	Nebowin giya mutcheishkota ishkota kitchegumeeng oppuhgitchegâta . Me o-o aneka nebowin .
66020015	Menik makowâsewintwâ che ozhebe-egâzowât bemátizze mazaniegunink , ishkota kitchegumeeng oppuhgináwug .
66021001	Newawbundahndush ōshke gezhik , giya ōshke áke , netam gezhik netam giya áke májámuhgut , kâ kago minowâ kitchegume tuhgosinōn .
66021002	Giya neen John newâbundán manoizzhewabuk kitche otanuh ōshke Jerusalem , gezhigōnk Kitche Manito uzzhiát benázhuhkemuhguk uhge gezhiomuhguk tebishko oweuh wâ onâbamidjin .
66021003	Nenōndán kitche gegetowin gezhigōnk ōnzitágwut ekettōnk binná Kitche Manito omutche-eginōm magwa aninne iámuhgut , oguh wejetuhkewamán uhnew , ween oguh otuhnishanâbamenun Kitche Manito tebinowa ween oguh wejewân oguh Omanitomenáwân .
66021004	Kitche Manito oguh gâsezebeengwanán kokkinná ozebeengoone oskezhikonink ; kâ minowâ nebowin tuh tuhgoosinōn giya kushkandumowin giya mowwewin , kâ minowâ wesuhgandumowin tuh tuhgosinōn : gata iuheen májámuhgutōn .
66021005	Weendush námátábit námátábewinink eketto , binná , kokkinná iuheen neendōshke nágwitonun , ozhebeun neendigdush , ono ekettowinun me quiuk tabwawinun nebwâkâwinun .
66021006	Neendigdush , gezhetáwinewun , neen Alpha giya Omega , wiazhkut miájetáng , giya ishquâtáng : neenguh mená 'uhow giashkuhnábágwat unishá uhmokidjewung nebe bemátizzewin .
66021007	Ween anewishkunk oguh tebandán kokkinná kago ; Omanitomun neenguh 'ow , neenguh oguisenundush .
66021008	Uhgew gwatáchishkidjig , giya tiabwatunzigōg mache izzhewabizzidjig nashewashkidjig , giya bashegwâtizzidjig , giya châsuhkejig muzzineneen anumeatowâjig kokkinná kagenowishkidjig , ánint oguhtiyánâwâ e-e gitchegume e-e chiágetag wazhâwushqukunag ōnje , me o-o áneka nebowin .
66021009	Neenbenázekágdush bazhek mezhinowa názhwâchejig omotansun ayájig mooshkenagin názhwâchingin nebowinun neembe guhguhnonik , neendig , be-ezhán o-o omá keguh wâbundi-in wanâbamit Mánishtânishans wewun .
66021010	Nemojenikdush ochichâgománg ashpág wudjew neendezhewinik newâbundi-ik kitche otanuh manoizzhewabuk Jerusalem gezhigōnk Kitche Manito uzzhiát beōnje názhuhkemuhguk .
66021011	Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin uzzhiág , owâsayázewin ápiche sunáguk muskâziswâbeek me azhenágwuk , tebishko jasper uhsineeng , miskâziswâbekōnk azhenágwuk .
66021012	Uhsinne wâkiegunekâta kitche apetandágwut kitche ishpá , ussheneezh metoswa tusinōn squândamun uhnew ishquândamun ussheneezh metoswa mezhinowag iáwug , onozowinun ozhebe egâtanewun weowwewâng , uh me ono onozowinun asheneezhwawânuhgizzidjig Israel onejânisun otuhnozowinewân .
66021013	Wâbunōnk enuhkuhkayá nisenōn squândamun ; kewatinōnk enuhkuhkayá giya nisenōn squândamun ; shâwunōnk enuhkuhkayá giya nisenōn squândamun ; apungishkemōk egiya enuhkuhkayá nisenōn squândamun .
66021014	Owwâkiegunekâtag e-e otanuh metoswa ussheneezh tussink uhsinekâta anámiuhe emádush uhnew me uhnozowinun ussheneezhidjig Mánistânisbans anonájin .
66021015	Weendush gaguhnozhit ozâwâ shoneá suhkáoon otián owwe tebánuk otanuh , sqândamun giya owâkiegunewung .
66021016	Newink ezhe usshowayá , eu otanuh , mego aquâg giya anegōk otayág , otebáán e-e otanuh e-e suhkáoon metoswa ussheneezh tusso metoswâk tuswa tebiegânsun aquág giya anegokotayág , giya anishpág , mego tebishko .
66021017	Otebáán e-e owwâkiegunewung , ningōtwâk usshe nemetunná usshe newin tussotosquun tebishko aninne azhe tebiegat , me eu mezhinowa .
66021018	Eu wâkiegun wanje ozhichegâtag jasper eu gá wâkiegunekang , bizzhisshik ozâwâ shoneá eu otanuh , tebishkogo bánuk wâsachegunábekōnk azhenágwut .
66021019	Anámiuhe eu wâkiegun eke otanuh muhmuzzenitchegâta uhnōch azhenágwuk sanegukin uhsineen , netam eu gá ozhisitóng jasper ; wiánekasink , sapphire ; akonissink , chalcedony ; akonewmk , emerald ;
66021020	Ako nánunne , sardonyx ; ako ningōtwâchink , sardius ; ako neezhwâchink , chrysolyte ; ako niswâchink , beryl ; ako shângutchink , topaz ; ako metáchink chrysoprasus ; ako usshe bazhekōnk , jacinth ; ako ussheneezhink , amethyst .
66021021	Ussheneezh squândamun , ussheneezh megissug andusink squândamun babazhek megis iá , mikundush eu otanuh bizzhisshik ozáwâ shoneá tebishko bánuk wâsáchegunâbeek azhenágwuk .
66021022	Kâ kago uhnumeawegumik newâbunduhzeen keche iág , ōnje ween Kitche Manito Kache Apetandágwut , giya Mánishtânishans me uhnumeawegumigowunk .
66021023	Otanuh kâween onundowanemáseen gezisōn , giya tibbike gezisōn , che sâgâseganit , ōnje Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin owâsashkán , Mánishtânishans me wiásashkunk .
66021024	Azheweenzhojig uhgew bamájeinjig owâsayázewinink , guttuh bamosawug ogemág ákeeng ogitchetwâwizzewinewâ otuhpetandágoozenun obeendegutōnâwâ .
66021025	Squandamewung , kâwekâ tuh kepáquiegâtasinōn , gázhegukin kâwekâ emá tuh tibikusinōn .
66021026	Oguh beendegutōnâwá azheweenzhojig okitchetwâwizzewinewâ otuhpetandágoozewinewâ emá .
66021027	Kâween pâpish kago tuh peendegamuhgusinōn ga ōnje wenuk giya kago mutcheizzhewabizzewin giya kago kuhgenowishkewin : uhgew atuh wazhebe-egâzojig Mánishtânishans omazaniegune bemátizzewinink .
66022001	Newawbundi-ik bánuk sebe bemátizzewin nebe miskâziswâbekōnk ezhe benut Kitche Manito onámátábewinink uhbe ōnje sâgichidjewung , giya Mánishtânishans .
66022002	Nowwiuhedush uhmikkunáwung giya iactowwuhgâmewung sebe metig bemátizzewin metoswa ussheneezhwawân papuhkân azhenágwuk menewit wanje netáweging menewe andusso geziswuhguk , wauhnebeeshewit 'ow metig me e-e n'wâjemoigowât uhnōch azheweenzojig .
66022003	Kâ kago nuhnibekindewin minowâ tuh tuhgoosinōn , Kitche Manito giya Mánishtânishans giya onámátábewin guttuh iá beenjeiuhe e-e otanuh otuhnoketâgaweninemun oguh tuhuhketágōn .
66022004	Oguh wâbomáwân ōskezhigone otuhnozowin ogutigowâng guttuh iáne .
66022005	Kâween guhtuh debikusinōn emá , kâwekâ wâsâkoninjegun onundowanduhzeenâwâ , kâ giya wâsayá gezis ōnje , ōnje Kitche Manitōn omenigōnân wâsayá , gâgineek guttuh ogemá kundumōg .
66022006	Neendigdush ono ekettowinun me nebwâkâwin quiuk tabwawin : Kitche Manito manobemátizzidjig Omanitomewân otuhnonán omezhinowamun che owwe wâbunduhát otoskenegamun iuheen ōnjittá wiebuh tuh gezhetáwinewunōn .
66022007	Binná , bâbega neenduhkoshin ; tuhshâwandágooze ween kanowandunk tebájemowin o-o mazaniegun .
66022008	Neen John newâbundánun , ono iuheen giya nenōndánun , n'wândumánin giya uhwâbundumán neempongesin ozitáng uzhuhnumeatowug mezhinowa wiábundi-it ono iuneen .
66022009	Neendigdush tuhtebábin , kago e-e totunkan , neen keejuhnoketâgawenine bazhek kekânissewâ mamándáwizzidjig uhgew kanowandungig , aketomuhgut o-o mazaniegun ; uhnumeatow Kitche Manito .
66022010	Neendigdush kago uhgokewusunkan tebájemowinun o-o mazaniegun , bazhew tuhgoo keche izzhewabuk .
66022011	Ween mache izzhewabizzit máno tuh mutcheizzhewabizze kiábe , ween wânizzit máno guttuh wenizze kiábe , ween quiuk azhewabizzit máno go tuh quiuk izzhewabizze kiábe ween giya manoizzhewabizzit máno go tuh mennoizzhewabizze .
66022012	Binná , bâbega neenduhkoshin neendebáumágawin newejewegōn che menugwâ kokkinná aninnewug otuhnokewinewâ bego ga izzhewabutinik .
66022013	Neen Alpha , giya Omega , wiazhkut miájetáng giya ashquâtáng netam giya squâch .
66022014	Tuhshâwandágoozewug weenowâ andotungig azhe guhgequat , konemá quiuk tuh enandágoozewug che ezháwât metigōn gâgega bemátizzewin , keche peendegawât ishquândamun e-e otanuh
66022015	Onje áqutchink anemōg iáwug giya châsuhkejig giya bashegwâtizzidjig kokkinná giya uhgew manwandungig guhgenowishkewât .
66022016	Neen Jesus neengeuhnonán nemezhinowan che weendumōk ono iuheen uhnumeawinink ; neen uzhojebekâwit David , neen David oguisun , neen wâsayá giya wâbun uhnung .
66022017	Ochichâgomá giya áwazhit ekettowug ōndás oweuh nōndunk ōndás máno guhtuh eketto , oweuh ge enandunk guttuh be-ezhá che otâpenunk bemátizzewine nebe unishá .
66022018	Kokkinná aninnewug neendenág menik nōndumowât uhtebátotumink o-o mazaniegun kishpin oweuh aninne owushema kago átōt ono iuheen Kitche Manito oguh átágōn nebowinun wazhebe-egâtagin o-o mazaniegunink .
66022019	Kishpin giya oweuh aninne otâpenunk ánint ekettowinun o-o tepájemowin o-o mazaniegun Kitche Manito oguh otâpenumowân obemátizzewininne mazaniegunne bemátizzewinink atanik , oguh otâpenân emá e-e manoizzhewabuk otanuh , giya oguh otâpenumowân otuhnozowininne ono iuheen wazhebeegâtagin o-o mazaniegunink .
66022020	Ween aketōt ono iuheen eketto , kagat onjittá bâbega neenduhkoshin ; Amen . Me tebishko be-ezhe tuhkoshinin Kitche Manito Jesus .
66022021	Kekitche Manitomenán oshâwanjegawin keguh wejewegōnâwâ kokkinná . Amen .
